1b1(rnying rgyud): rgyu gar skad/ gr-iti drag tan du nam/ bdag dang / dpa' khrag 'thung gal pozhes / bcom ldan 'das dpa rdo rje 'chang
1b2(rnying rgyud): chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis lung bstan pa'i dus gcig na/ rang snang bkod pa med bkod pa// 'og min nyams dga' gnas kyi mchod/
1b3(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang chen po// rgyal ba kun gyi spyi gzugs can// sa bcu'i gnas kyi dbang phyug che// byang chub sems dpa' sems chen 'khor// rags
1b4(rnying rgyud): bdag brjod pa med pa yis// rmad byung chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// gsang sngags che ba'i phyin rlabs ni// so sor snang ba 'di ltar bzhi// gdul bya zhe na
1b5(rnying rgyud): chags can rnams pa// 'dul byed sbyin pa gsang ba'i sgras// 'dod pa dang rkyen chog tu gsungs// gdul bya log sred can rnams la// 'dul byed / na ba sprul
2a1(rnying rgyud): #/ pa'i sgras// bkri drang btung ba'i chog tu gsungs// gdul gyi rigs brgyud can rnams la// 'dul byed ston pa rigs brgyad rdzogs// ldem dgongs slong bu'i zlog tu
2a2(rnying rgyud): gsungs// gdul bya blo gros can rnams la// 'dul byed ston pa tshig gi skus// don dam nges pa'i tshig tu gsungs// gdul bya 'dul byed gdul thabs rnams// sgyid na theg pa me lus ston// 'dir ni kun kyang
2a3(rnying rgyud): gsang sngags nyid// snang srid chos kyi phung por grol// a ho// lung chen zab mo'i 'khor lo 'di// dgongs rgyud sbas pa'i rgyud chen po// lung gi mdo mchog snga ma bdun// de bzhin phyi ma bdun nas phyung // sku rnams ston
2a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i skud pa po// gsang bdag phyag na rdo rje nyid// bdag gzhan phyi rapas grol byed pa// rdo rje snying po nyid kyis phyung // phung po rdo rje rigs lnga nyid// nyon mongs ye shes chen por gsal// bde chad dngos
2a5(rnying rgyud): grub nyid du grol// rdo rje'i skul 'chi bdag med// tshe 'di thun mong phyi mang ni// phyag rgya chen po mchog tu 'grub// dmin pa lus kyi byang chub sems// blo gros chen po rnam pa lnga// sems can kun la phan don du//
2b1(rnying rgyud): mnyal po gsungs// mal sami zag phragaH// ye shes snying ba can rnams kyis// theg ma chog rba byung nyams su len// banyen bsgrub rnam pa bzhis mthar baspangs// yang dwag gas pa'i thugs mchog las// sgrub pa 'ardul 'byong dbang phyu ga rnams// mangs /
2b2(rnying rgyud): lamangon sangs rgya// lus mabor bar lha skur 'gyur// rab 'byams mdo chud ma lus kun// mtshan gyi rnam grangs du mdag/ dpe don yul dang gang zag ldang // 'di dag lngar ni 'dus par 'gyur// dpelas mtshan du gsol ba ni// dbang po gsum la po
2b3(rnying rgyud): dod la'i mtshan du gsol ba yang // tsha ba rnam grangs ngo bo dang // gtso bo la sogs du ma dang // rig pa can la snang ba'o// yul las mtshan du gsol ba yis// gnas kyi nges brnyed par 'gyur// gang zag mtshan du gsol bani// phub po dang mdzod par byen//
2b4(rnying rgyud): ldang tshad mtshan du gsol ba yis// shu lo ka rnam par gsal ba'o// yang dag thugs kyi sgrub pa la// rdo rje rigs dang thugs kyi lha// thugs kyang sku gsung thugs su 'gyur// mkha' 'gro bde mchog ces bya ba// sangs rgyas mnyam byor sku yi gyad//
2b5(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi 'khor lo can// 'khor lo bde mchog gsung gi rgyud// thugs ni sku ma bde mchog bde// he ru ka yi gal po nyid// lung 'dir rnam grangs bsam yas kun// gzung ba bde phyir bsdus bshad bya// dmigs pa'i yul dang sgrub pa'i thabs
2b6(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu yin te rnam pa gsum// ji snyed chos kyi rtsa bar bshad// a ho// bcud 'byin man ngag snying po 'di// rgyal ba rig 'dzin gang zag gsum// dgongs rig rna bar brgyud pa ni// gang la thug pa'i bar du ston// mtshan nyid mu yi theg pa yis// sem
2b7(rnying rgyud): nyid sangs rgyas rgyu ru shes// 'bras bu sngags kyi theg pa yis// sems nyid sangs rgyas nyid du bsgom// rgyu dang 'bras bu gang yin pa'i// phyogs kyang rab tu shes par byed// las dang nyon mongs zag pa yis// phung po gang nas 'khor bar zag/ 'khor
3a1(rnying rgyud): ba'i rgya mtsho chen po ni// sangs rgyas sar sgrol dgos pa yod// chos rnams rtsa ba sems nyid yin// sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos// bsam gyis mi khyab brjod las 'das// de mthun chos mtshan so sor gsungs// ji ltar gdung
3a2(rnying rgyud): sems ldan pa'i mas// bu nyid mi baspu'i chog smra ltar// sod napal bshad pa'i dngon rig rten nam the ba cegasu med nyis su ta gyi grus batham cad mi bsu sa pa'i 'dra bya la danod papa na 'a'idin lta zhes byang/ de 'don de kyal brnams kyis ses can po don kyi gda'as dag gsungs pa yang po
3a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi lam gsungs pa'o// rgyal bas 'gro ba mi bsku'i phyir// blo dman rnams la man ngag bshad// sgo mchog rang bzhin gyi sngon chod tu byung ba ni srog kyi las dang 'phral gyi skal bar ldan pas na ldan pa'i rigs rnams la// brda' ni sems chos dbyings spong ba'i brdang nam mkha'/ ye shes rang ni
3a4(rnying rgyud): 'o 'di'i bad nyim/ dkyis ye shes mini 'thar ba'i bda' rnamam pa nyi ma dang mi phralas/ gdam sa dag gis dgos 'dod 'asrung shing 'grub ba'i rda nor bu rin chen yin 'de dag sems kyi phu la lam cig gi dbang pol bstan to// kyi yul du bstan// dag ni rna tho don se tu tshig brjod dag thob ma'i na ba'i dang yo cag gi/ mkhri'i ga dang
3a5(rnying rgyud): pags pa yin pa/ de la yid garka ngas go bar 'byung ngo / pa'i dbang por thugs/ gta tshigs/ de phyir gdams ngag ces su gsungs/ te dbang po rdza la rdo lnga'i dbang po tog med kyi phul du bda' brtan la yid dang tog bcas kyis brtags sheng dmad pas sangs rgyas kyi dgongs brtogs par byed pas na gdams ngag go// mad ngag dag gi
3a6(rnying rgyud): don rnams ni// mtha' drug dang sgo bzhi dang lung dgu dang // bco brgyad skabs dang dkyil 'khor dgu// dang // yo byad gnyis dang rgya mtsho bzhis// lung chen lung bdun gnyis bcu ba ni snang gsum bcus lung gsum rnams kyis phyir man dag bdun su don gnyi pol/ dgongs pa rtogs par
3a7(rnying rgyud): 'gur/ ro// lta bas thag bcad gdeng du bya/ dadeng byung namamakha' la rdzing ba rta theg pa 'o// ring gnon// dam tshig dam pas gzhi bzung nas/ zhings bzang ngos po na gang btab ba skye ba ltar dngos sub kyi 'o to/ sprin// rim pa dbang gis bgrod pa dang / rgyal bu rgya la sar bton pa lta gas dazugs kyi
3b1(rnying rgyud): thobs chen pa// spyod pas la yang dang bar bya/ mang cang drags pa lta gas nga ga yeg na du ma ga ba// nyams su ting nge 'dzin gyis byang / no barba nga rkang rtog ma ngas da sa pa nga man mar ba kang pa zhes nang nas 'thar pa'i dgos pa'o// man ngag dag gis don rnams
3b2(rnying rgyud): bsrub/ bar bya steg/ seng 'brang kyi ce ltang tshogs chung la don che ba'o// 'dren par byed pa tshig gi sgo// phyi nas nang gi grub pa po rten gyi gang ga gi lus semasas ngas rgyas su tan 'de pa// dam tshig dbang gi sgo phye gdul byam smin pa'am mthul ba rnams byin pa dang bu rab/ dang ni// srul tshig dbyangs su ga
3b3(rnying rgyud): sgo ma momakha' po spyan dngas shing ye shes b+ha'i sku dngos su ston par bya// gdul bya phrin las s+ho/ s+ye nas zin las pa'i sgrub pas su baphung po myong tshatshagadabang ba ba nas byang nga gzhan gyi don thams cad bcug dang bzhi// lta ba'i mno satan pa dbab 'o/ lung dang sgrub pa rdza swa/ gyi lung dang // dam tshig dbang
3b4(rnying rgyud): san tu gnas/ samadzad pa byin la dod pa nyin pa skyesas 'i myong dung ma mtshan pa sa stsam dang/ cad bathegapa chen gnan ba
3b5(rnying rgyud): wang yin pas na lung chen dgus gtan la phab la nyams su blang ba 'o// bdag gzhan gnyis med dpal chen po'i rang bzhin bsnyen pa ni skabs dang las sogs pa rtsa bshad kyi skabs bgrang ngo // rang bzhin dang snod ding dal tshig dang // snod min rdzas dang sa gzhi dang // bsod na maMs sti tshogs bsags pa dang dkyil 'khor ze zhing rdzan
3b6(rnying rgyud): nang mchod pa'i kye zag dgong mo traM gnan/ pa dang / thams cad tshul bzhin/ byin gyis brlabs pa dang yon dbul zhing slob ma dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa dang da bau tra bskur ba dang dam tshig pho ga ste bsnying / bya ba dang / grub pa bo/ bsgo mo po sgrub kyi man ngag brtan la rtags kyi mtshan nas chub rdzas byin gyis brlab pa dang zhi
3b7(rnying rgyud): bkyed// la thun dang mchod rton pa dang / dus nges la mtshan na byung dngag / dngos grub blang zhing bar chad kyi la ma po zlog/ ci chu nan pa dang / brgya ba'i// 'bras bu bdag gzhan don du dbeb pa 'o// mi'inab sa dang brtso rgyad cing shes pa // rang bzhin dkyil 'kho dang gzugs badzin gyi
4a1(rnying rgyud): dkyipa bod dang / mtsham sa// kyi mchod pa rngab la tan pa'i dang dbang bsrung ba nga ting nge 'dzin/ khyod// sran gyis grub pa dang thugs rje smin las kyi da dngos grub blang / 'ad kyis po dang // shes rab dang ni ting nge 'dzin/ shes
4a2(rnying rgyud): dpa byed don sto pa cam lta ba'i dang ga dang ting nge 'dzin kyi sa nyams su 'du ba'i mang ga gnyi ni 'grub brnyed pa'i// rnal 'byor kun gyi yo byad zin po yin so// lta ba rgya ma thos zag pacad dgos pa dang de// spyod pa rgya mtshos la dor nas/ ming mi nog pa kyang dang cog myor rlom gyi ma
4a3(rnying rgyud): ldog pang mdo// bslab pa rgya mthos pa na su na nyams su blang / bas mchos thun ga sa srung pa dang // 'bras bu rgya ma tshos mngon sangs rgyas/ pab 'bras bu'i mtha'i drung mthos te sgra gsung thugs mi dan rkyen rgyan mo sor gyur to// rkyenan po'o/ kun la sri gas lpags papang dag ga don grung/
4a4(rnying rgyud): sa pa ga steng gan sa na as na pa drug mas tad mi da kyichu bang gnas par rag tu gsungs shing gdams so// srang chen dgongs pa rnam pa bzhi gapa'i 'a sa ma byed sa gyid sa ga cang da sa zu'o// phya kyi steg// bslab pa'i /
4a5(rnying rgyud): rlom pade// yi ma dang ma byin mthog cams ma pa tum med dang brlab tu man 'i nga bdun gyi gan pa nyid dang // snang ba gsum rung bsdus srung dang gsum kyi thal sa sa smras pas kyi ba pas mas ca du so// mo/ 'bang ba ched po
4a6(rnying rgyud): lung / nga // mchod rdzas d+h-i ci su yos byin gyis brlab pa dang / sa khyo sa kyi dang/ lus dag pa med kyi sgrib pa bshags byas nas/ tha da pa ga sa padang pa/ bdag nyid kya 'brang ma sacas pa ban
4a7(rnying rgyud): thong lam ba yi dam ni khro bsgom yadang / bzang 'tshogs kyi phur 'dod po mtho spyod papa thod namamang 'dod du nami myong nams kyi gas kyi 'khor lo ba ma 'dang / gang nis brjod bsnyen pa'i yang ma gag ci thib gnyis kyang ni do tub nyi do du 'phro 'du gyi
4b1(rnying rgyud): na nga ma san sa na natshu/ na
4b2(rnying rgyud): m-i ga ste du gyis bdab gra das ma
4b3(rnying rgyud): chen pos pa'i phung / ra / pa bas kyi ses po tu bye ma pa 'arjod/ pa'i bste ma pan kyis gas rten 'phrul ba dang // gdug byed pa rnams can spo ba'i mag sa mapa shes ma
4b4(rnying rgyud): thugs rjes bsgral/ tshogs bcas mornams pa dod sa dab nanas chos nyid dor sbyar/ nasu 'arjod na gyi ngon rnams bang ma da du dgas rje da pa tha pas da yams ta pan
4b5(rnying rgyud): rje ba de nas pa ngas / 'di lta gang gis shes 'dzung ba// des ni lung gyi dgongs brtogs/ nam ci/ thal ban kyi ma blo la gting du do myong / // so/ rgya na khams gsum sems capa/
4b6(rnying rgyud): nyon mongs pa'i snang ba ni nyi mang mad 'a da'i mayong kyi rlo so pa ma 'a sa seMn ma ngog te da ci dang thadang pa yangs kyi po dam bdun la 'byor ba rnams pa/ gang ga pa 'chog gi'is paldags rtarna ma pa' sa sa rgya bzhe /
4b7(rnying rgyud): nges lanapa nis sa sdu / sa bu'adu dang gzhigs sa mas rnas mam da mas
5a1(rnying rgyud): ngag grags rtags// ma nang rgyan 'thung mong snang // snang bgasam myo bdag nyidang / tu na du/ sa rnams ma lus 'das pa yin/ rdzun byug 'dung na myong ru Sh+Tha// nga bzhin ya ya na
5a2(rnying rgyud): thabs stan pangan ga dang 'bras bu gan ma 'dus so// pa 'ang ba zhe a ho/ hi 'i thu na pa// ga rjing bab / mad bye dang chus pas da dang 'dang pa/ nga mas / he ru ka lega' bo 'dzing// ma chu
5a3(rnying rgyud): lung dang man ngag dang gsum dbyer med phyir/ rang bzhin kyi / ni chung lung man pa// kun gyi rtsa lnga 'am ga gi'am lus 'dir bcang dgos pa'i chud ma hA yog 'am mkhara' 'gro de mchog gam sangs rgyas mnyam stor ram 'bor po bde mchog dang / lung stsu ma bde mchog gapa po 'di nyid dang / san dgaga' chung da
5a4(rnying rgyud): ni 'dis rdzogs so// pas// mdo don chos kyi mtshan nyid rtogs// rgyud ces bya ba rgyal ba'i bka'/ gud la ba ni ste rang bzhin dang po dang ngas tshig dang byaba'o// dang ngon rgyal ba'i dga'o// 'dug tshul kyi rang bzhin mdod kyis gus pa dang stod pas gsungs pa gnyis zhing tshogs sa// zhus lan phra mos
5a5(rnying rgyud): 'phel cing rgyas/ pa'o// rgyal ba'i dgongs pa/ nga boganas tshus kyi bsnyen pa'i dgongs pa ma bcos par gnas la gsung tshul gying po ma la 'brel/ pa dang bcas par gsung / gnal tshul myo po blags/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ngo bor ngas pashes sa gsal/ te shes pajis pa ma chen pa'i me zhes dang 'phreng dang /
5a6(rnying rgyud): bdug nga rgyud ces kya sa mad na pa gA'i dgongs pa la thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mda' das/ des tsha na gong // 'brel ma dang don ma tshang ba med pa dang // phun sumachog / nas bshad pas rgyud ces bya/ stodon rjem khyod dbang dmatshomazin pas srub mtshad sngags ting nge 'dzin no// dbyeb pa rnam
5a7(rnying rgyud): bas kyi sgonas dbyen// rtsa ba'i rgyud dang bshad pa'i rgyud na/ de lang byen hUM// phyi mra dang phye kyi mar gyur pa dang // mtshang ba kha skong ba chung dang dka' ba yos ca gcod/ dra chud dang // skal ba dang rtogs dang pa dum bu bachud rnams/ ma// 'i
5b1(rnying rgyud): kaunas byen nu'o m+bu'i rgyud dadruni nga kyi'i rgyam tholas zung ba ltang chud dang ma tshas nyid las zung / dbang dracu'i gas 'dzin pa skang chud kyi rigs 'dzin dus dan byang ba ltang natha na mdzad/ chur thim pa tang rgyas nyid du dam mo// sman ta ba ni sman myor mkhan ltar rton pas gsus/ nang gso ba ltar don mdzang/ 'os paltang pa
5b2(rnying rgyud): lal rol lo// chu bo'i rgyan rnam sman sbyor ram// thags thangs ma pan ci dpo ni/ sas rgya mngon thags gong dog gzugs pa ltar gong 'og 'dugs/ gos byed pa ltar 'khor ba las kyongs/ dang 'dra bar gnas pas na/ dmangs ste bu ni dmangs bya mang btar chung zin las bya ba med do// dmangs ltar bya
5b3(rnying rgyud): ma lug byed// lung zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad nges pa'i don// du bshad na mon mas kyang gzung ba ba nga don rtogs par 'gyur ba dang / ston pa'i dgongs pa rtogs dka' bus// gsung gi 'gyur bas dgongs pade mtshon nas bzung ba der rtogs par bya bas mtshon/ ma'o// lung gi nga'i ni/ bde gshegs
5b4(rnying rgyud): gsung gi dgongs pa 'dzin ji lta ba rtogs par dka' 'a la yang // ngo bo shes \u0f7fji lta ba mkhyen pa dang ji snyed tham khyen pa dang kun rdzob 'khor ba dang don dam byang 'das su phye ba te dgongs pa gnyis/ su nye rdo po/ ngas tshig sangs rgyas kyi gastang la rdzun dang bral la gang dag gi sgrol byin rjog nas gnangabs bzung bar/
5b5(rnying rgyud): bde ba dang // nyes pa zad pa lung gi tshig/ dbye ba rnam grangs kyi sgonas dbyen// drang dron gas che bar ston pa/ nangs pa mtshan nyid kyi lung dang // des don shas che ston pa rnangs pa sngags kyi phyi'i lung dang / dzang nangs don/ 'dres par ston pa mdo sde'i lung ste sngags mtshan
5b6(rnying rgyud): nyid/ gnyis ka'i lung dang // mngon du phyung ba gab pa nas bton bsngags nang pa gnyis kyi bskyed rdzogs kyi lung dang / rna ba nas/ rna bar brgyud pa man ngag/ bi/ lung / a ti dang / gur nas bzung bde da / phyung ba'i lung nyid 'chus pa bsrang / ba'o/ dpe'i sgo nas dbyen/ dper na lung
5b7(rnying rgyud): can snod lta bu/ margya' ba'i dka'// gzung bar bde bar bya ba ni// blon po lta bur gnas pa yang / dper dpung don po dang 'ang phye blon pa'i gtul khron dmangs thams cad kyisasum debs namya' bo dang dmangs/ gnyis kyis gzung bar smra phyir ro// / man ngag ces pa la
6a1(rnying rgyud): bzla ba lci rang bzhin ni phyel sa'i dbang byas na/ dgongs pa dang du skyel ba yin la gnas pa'i dbang dubyas na sngon dbyung dang rjes 'dug gi ston pa'i// skyes bu'i thugs la brnag pa stu gan tu gces pabs bab pa'i don yod pa'o/ kho na chos thams cad kyi/ snying po 'am bzung
6a2(rnying rgyud): gyur pa ste yang dag pa'i don gyi mchog nyid ni/ ston par byed pa yin la/ de ston rjes sbyi\u0f88\u0f90 pa'i/ thugs la rab tu sbas nas gsang ste bzhugs/ bdo/ de yang man ngag gi ngo bo thugs la gnas pa gang yid ga ces par gzung ba'i chos// tshegs chung ba dang dus myur du 'grub par byed/ ba'i ga
6a3(rnying rgyud): sa dang ting nge 'dzin de yin zhing // bya ba sla bas grub par byed pa nges pa'i tshig go// man ngag gi dbye ba ni 'khor 'das nas rkyen 'das pa sangs dus bsgrub pa dang 'khor ba 'jig rten gyi bya ba sgrub pa'o// de gnyis la dbye ba bsam yas so// gtso bo ye shes man ngag dang // 'jig rten 'khor gyi man dang /
6a4(rnying rgyud): yin/ dpe'i gonas date/ gser 'gyur gyi rtsis zangs la sogs gser du 'gyur ba dang dug sman gyis dug sman du 'gyur/ ga'am// mun pa la blon mes sdang ba dang ras kyi tshon/ ci sang do// bsgreng ba lta bu dang // rgyal po lta buru rang sa bzung nas gnas 'gyon po gros pus te da sangs rnams ngo nga
6a5(rnying rgyud): lung gis chud man ngag 'khol te kun la che// rang sa zin par gnas pa nyid// rgyud lung man ngag dbyer med pa/ 15/ gnas lugs rang bzhin gi nas ru pa dang skang dugang gnyis te dang pon ngo ga nyid gzhir gnab la skang gsa'abor 'das gnyis su snang bde chos nyid dang gis snang ba'o// khams gsum sa
6a6(rnying rgyud): can thams cad zhi khror gnas te phung po degs lnga yab yum nyon mongs lnga khro bor gnas te ye nas sangs rgyas yin pa la chu rkyen las nyon gyis byas nas 'bras bur khams gsum du 'khor yang dang po'i sangs rgyas nyid du gnas so// zhe khror bshad// rang rgyud phung po zhi khror bshad/ 19/ gdul bya sprul pa'i
6a7(rnying rgyud): zhi jon rnam 'i gnyis te tsha tha ba dang rags pa'o// dang ngon bti mug gang chus can rnams pa ni ni ba'i dbying 'jod du dang ba/ gdus tu drags pa 'dod chags dang zhe na can pa ni rjod kyi du sdang te mdor nini po rnam pa gnyi khyon / dang / 5/ mthar phyin 'bras bu'i sugasu gas mi bad pa rgyan gyi
6b1(rnying rgyud): gang / hU~M khro rnams// ba'i tha tha tha sa byasangs rgyas sam sub zhi byeng men pa de yang mthathas sun thu du 'dos dusu bzhed byed med du 'dun 'ongs sulags bani shA dang mim thu ta gyur// chos rnams 'thor ba'i chos ni bu ba ton 'ad la lung drang chung rung ngangan
6b2(rnying rgyud): dang / myang 'das kyi chos ni rnam kyang yin pa de la yang gdul bya sbrul dang 'bras bu yongs la khyab par gnam/ de yang gnas lugs rang bzhin gyi zhi grong dbyer med/ mthar phyin 'bras bur gaper med par rtogs pa'o// de la mdor bstan// sku dang gsung thugs yon tan las// 'di lnga rab tu bsdam pa lang
6b3(rnying rgyud): lu ni rnam par snang mdzad nyid/ rgyu sprul pa ni// 'jam dpal te de khros pa gshin rje gshed/ do/ 8/ gsung ni snang ba mtha' yan// khros pas N+Da mgrin nyid/ brda dbang chen ni gsung gi rigs snang mtha' dang thugs rdo rje sems dpa' gnyis las brgyad pas na// rigs gnyis lung
6b4(rnying rgyud): gau detsud pa dang // spyan ras gzigs dbang rngam chen bya/ byung ma na shegs dzun pas ta mazin no// gsung ste pad+ma dbang gi rigs// m-i bskyod rdo rje'i thugs mchog kyang / rdarjesems dpa' nyid rdzams pas dang ga 'ju dang / dasang gis da
6b5(rnying rgyud): las ma btud pas nang sgrub bzab mo yin no// de ni badz+ra he ru thugs kyi sgrub pa'o// rdo rje khrag 'thung thugs nyid do/ 8/ yon tan kun tu bzang po nyid gnas 'byung ba che ba che mchog dbu nyer gcig phyag zhe gnyis 'bas bachud par snang ba/ kun bzang nyid las grub// yang na rin 'byung
6b6(rnying rgyud): 'gyur bas che mchog dbu dgu phyag bco brgyad pa nyid/ do// phrin las don yod grub pa lam/ kas te ru kar gyur te/ dpal rdo rje srin po rdo rje phur par gyur pa dbu dgu phyag bco brgyad pa'o// karma he ru ka nyid du/ rdo rje sems dpa' nyid dpal// rdo rje gzhon nu ru zhal gsum phyag drug par
6b7(rnying rgyud): rab snang ba// de nyid 'dis sangs rgyas kun gyi phrin las mdzad pas he ru ka rnams kyi sras su bltams nas ru rnga sgrol la brtson/ spyir de dag/ kun la sku gsung shugs yon tan phrin las lnga lnga tshad gyur kyang // khrag 'thung ga la bro yang dag thugs kyi sgrub pa 'di byang chub sems
7a1(rnying rgyud): dang dus par gnas 'gyung bam yin na rnamasas dpang pos ngasas pa pa dang thugs pa pan pan babs gangs de bshad kyis rton/ dmad pa lus kyi sems pa yis/ tham dmang pa mthags gnas pangs mas pa rangs bya shos pamams
7a2(rnying rgyud): gsang bdag rdo rje 'dzin pa la// rab tu dga' bas phub 'di skad gsol to// rdo rje'i snying po ni ta ba'i du brtas 'dams kyi dgongs pa mabyed des snying po se rnags kyims chen po khyod/ dus gsus/ sangs rgyas kun gyi khyon kyi mang ma skor ba'i smad par
7a3(rnying rgyud): 'i gdas pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yob/ phred pa gsum gyi/ 'gro ba kun lam sacad kyigacing ston par mdzad/ de thams padags bdag gis mngon pa'i dbye/ khyod ni nam mkha'i rang bzhin can/ tanab mama' das kyad man snang ba 'dus 'thung ba lnga'i bdag sa kyangs ra
7a4(rnying rgyud): rgyag dong yang de ltarar// gar mkhyen sasus gdag pa'i ma da skyed mo la bzhin na chonas nyon pa lta bur sangs rgyas pa/ 'tho ba 'a khrud nyer ston pas// gar gyi dbang phyug khyod phyag 'tshal/ dpeng na lha mangs pa 'dzer ba khyong khron ta bu las rnachis pa'i gsu
7a5(rnying rgyud): rdzob ma dbang ma nyon mongs med pas nin tu bstan par/ chos 'phor gyi gsol ba 'debs pa ltang brtan pas// tshangs pa'i gsung gis kud laM rgyu // 'brug smra hA dbyangs lteng byed phyag 'tshal/ lo/ da/ nam mkha'i gtos kyis cad 'khyab pa ltar sems
7a6(rnying rgyud): na kun pa khyab// me rtog pa'i thugs la tshung sbyin ma byas dang thal bad 'a na pa/ 'bor rnams sus / mi gas ma dang sa khyod phyag 'tsha// / de bzhin rin byed shid tu ci gas ba na gos 'dod lung bzhig nya ma krung rgyal po ba
7a7(rnying rgyud): mdu padi nga pa da sa da rgya 'a slong 'drar// dgos 'du 'drang brgyad pa rgyan 'tshal/ bdag dang gzhan / shangs pa'i rigs pa 'as/ dun pa gas su na sems
7b1(rnying rgyud): 'dzin las dan sman gyis bubapa phrin las phun sum tshogs// glog ltar myur mdzad sems can gyi don myar du mdzad pa'i dben ma mkha' thog spyar sdung ba'idab don mdzad pa dzin las khyod ba bdag cag/ phyag 'tshal// 8/ 'khor ba rgya mtsho lha'i las zad nam mar nyung ngu/
7b2(rnying rgyud): las zad nas dmyal bar de zad nas slar skye ba lta bu rgya mtsho'i gting ltar blos dpag par dka' zhing bsam yas kun// sangs rgyas zhing de gnas bya'i phyir/ 'dod khams gnas rigs nyi shu/ gzugs khams bcu bdun gzugs med skye mched mu bzhi ste byed las rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pas/
7b3(rnying rgyud): gsum sems can kun gyi don du// bdag cag ni mgrin gcig tu bos pa'o dam pa'i ni sangs rgyas shAkya thub de'i rigs can gyi slob ma rnams yin la de yang kri yog pa bsgom gyin yod pa rnams so// ni// lha mchog/ lha'i rigs kyi sngags phyi ba la bsgom gyed pa ni lha thags ldan
7b4(rnying rgyud): mchog skyob gsang mtshan/ blo gros mtha' yas dang // klu mchog bu'i rigs kyi gsang sngags phyi ba la bsgom byed pa ni bu rgyal 'dzag po bsang mtshan blo gros rgya mtsho dang // gnod sbyin skar mda' gdong gsang mtshan blo gros dad sel dang // srin po yang ka'i bdag po blo
7b5(rnying rgyud): gros thabs ldan dang // mi yi dge slong chen po lets+tsha byi dri ma med par grags pa gsang mtshan blo gros rab zhi rnams// thub pa'i dbang pos lung bstan ltar// de ltar dus 'dir gsang sngags nang gi rgud rnams gsungs// lung gi mdo ba cu bzhi dang man ngag gi chud bcu
7b6(rnying rgyud): zug la sogs pa ma lus pa/ ston pa thung ba la rigs can lngas kri sog gi skom zhus nas bsgom byin yod pa la ston pa mya ngan las 'das nas gsang sngags nang ba ma gsungs pas nam 'byung zhes zhus pas nga 'das nas lo nyer brgyad na ra ma la yang gsang bdag gis 'chad bar 'gyur gsung ba na dus der gsang
7b7(rnying rgyud): bdag dang zhal mjal nas gsang sngags kyi rgyud rnams dang lung gi mdo bu bzhi man ngag gi chung bdu drug la sogs pa rnams gsang bdag/ khyed kyis rab tu gsal bar byos/ snyir rig lnga las rnga zla rdo rje'i thub pa dang 'di'i phyir na sems can thams cad kyi rgyab sems la dang sas rgyas thams cad bugs pa thugs/
8a1(rnying rgyud): b+h+yaH/ brgyad rdo rje sems dpa' ni/ man// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs mchog nyis ga ston pas gas dgas kyi bud dang / sgrub pa rnas 'i mtha' yas rdul nyid gsungs shing dang ba yang dru b.rab pa 'a thas chags 'das las// rdugs
8a2(rnying rgyud): kyi drung dadas kyi man ngag dzab slong gyur pa// he ru kA yi gal mo ra gi kyai sru zhugs ston pa ngan 'dus rig pa'i mad/ bam yin pa 'dza ru slang grags ston ngas na za mo 'di// bdag cag dam pa'i rigs can rdzal sogs pa rnams la bshad par 'tshal/
8a3(rnying rgyud): brtson pas le lo spang dang / brtson pas 'khyal ba spang yid bcon pas sems ma yengs pas gsum brtson dgus phun sum tshogs pas nyan/ ston pa rdo rje 'chang chen pos rgyud lung man ngag so sor phye nas gsungs shing 'dir dbyer med nyams su len par gsungs pas kyang chud 'jig rten 'das mdor
8a4(rnying rgyud): lung gal po 'di bshad dang gnang ste ston pas mdongs gsol du bshad cing 'phor gus pas nyan pa las gleng gzhi'i thung khungs chud lung man ngag gsum du ston gleng bslang gis grung khungs ston pas nyon cig par gdams 'khor gyis nyan par khas blangs pa'o// zhes gsungs so// he ru ka'i ga la po la
8a5(rnying rgyud): dam pa'i chos byung khungs kyi brtag pa ste dang po'o// / de nas sangs rgyas kun gyi rje btsan chen po ni rdo rje 'chang chen yin pa de'i sdud pa po gsang bdag la yang de skad ces bya ste dper na rgyal po'i bul rgyal bzer ba ltar ro/ dam pa de la 'khor 'das
8a6(rnying rgyud): da sku gsum ye shes ldang ye nas dbyer med pa'i don/ rtogs na/ lung 'das chos kyu dang ye shes 'byung la ma rtogs na 'khor ba rigs drug sems can nam khams gsum 'khor bar 'byung bas na rang gzhan thams cad la sangs rgyas par ston pa'i// chos thams cad kyi 'gyur gnas chen
8a7(rnying rgyud): 'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nasu blta ba 'di gsungs so// yang dag grub dra ni chos kyu gcig pu nyid/ de ni yang dag pa chos kyi dkyis su rig pa'i ye shes su grung pa rngos sugacig pu nyid la 'dor 'das kyi chos ma lus pa rnam sa rdzogs te 'khor 'das ji rta ska yang sems las
8b1(rnying rgyud): sems dang // pas bya sangs rgyas rigs ngal 'a ba ma da pal du ma pa dang ma dpa pa pa dras lathas das kyi da myongs dang ma gris pa yang rus pastan/ bde nan kun 'das pa/ nin ba 'as gnyis la la sa myod bdab ca pa dpapa'abs bu'o// mkha'
8b2(rnying rgyud): sku ma bde mchog bde/ ni rdul lha 'i khro gnyis sam dpal chen te ru ka ni mkha' 'bo rnams kyi gcor so mchags thabs kyi sbyor ba sgyu ma lta bu 'de ba chen pos cog ni nyams myong can no// rnal 'byor zab mo'i sku gsum rdzogs/ sku gsum po de yang gsang sngags kyi rnal 'byor pas rtogs pa ni/ thagasu
8b3(rnying rgyud): gzhan nas me tsal bar rang gi lus ngag yid gsum la rdzogs pa ste/ lus longs/ ngag srul/ sems chos sur gnas so// phyi ltar rgyud kyi bdag nyid che// bdag med rig pa chos kyi sku// ye shes lnga yi ngo bor gnas// stong zhing gsal la ma 'dres mnyar/ yang dag thub pa
8b4(rnying rgyud): gcig pu nyid rgyas par bshad pa ste/ ston pa chos su gdul bya blo thos can rnams la don dam nges pa'i tshig tu gsungs pa ni gzung 'dzin gnyis kyi bdag med pa rang sems rig pa chos su 'di/ ye shes lnga'i ngo bor gnas te/ chos thams cad dang por stong brtogs pa'i cha nas stong pa nyid kyi ye shes stong pa rgyangs ma
8b5(rnying rgyud): ci rnam pa kun ldan gyi stong par gsal bas me long lta bu'i ye shes/ spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid ma 'dres pas so sor rtog pa'i ye shes/ de dbyer med par gnas pa'i cha nas mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes/ de ltar rtogs pas 'khor 'das kyi tha ba ma lus par gru' pas byab thub pa'i ye shes te myang 'das kyi chos rnams
8b6(rnying rgyud): rten byed pa khon chos bu'o// don rnams grub pa chos rnams rten// dug lnga ye shes chen por grol/ gti mug stong btsad kyid dkyil// zhe sdang gsalab me long lta bu/ nga rgyal mngon pa mnyam pa nyid/ 'dod chags bde ba so sor rtog/ pa khrag dog ni shes pa rang gi bya ba thub pa de dag byed pa po med par
8b7(rnying rgyud): rang po'angs ni da byung gi ye des chen rogacig tu bu banas gnas pa na yang dag bu' gcig su nyid do// rang byung ye shes gcig tu gnas/ de ni/ chos srur gdu gyiblo gros don dmanges/ zhi'i tsog ci gsung ma 'o'o/ sarba mams cad d+harma chos a ma/ dbyings kyi med kyang nas
9a1(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f/ rang byung gi segs skye ba med par gnas pas ya gnyis dngos chos su'o// sangs byas/ bde gshegs kun 'dus pa/ sru ni bdagashegs nam snang gis gti mug can gyi rigs/ tshangs dang kla/ rnams 'dul bar snang ba dang // rdo rje zhe sdang can gyi rigs piSh+Ta dang gnod
9a2(rnying rgyud): sbyin mo/ dang ro rnams 'dul bar drung bar ston pa dang // rin chen khung ldan gyisang rgyal can gyi rigs dang 'byung sa gtogs 'dod can rnams yid bzhin gyi nor byas 'dul ba'i su na/ ston pa dang // pad+ma snang mthas gu lang dang mkha' 'gro ba/ 'a tshogs rnams ma lus par 'dul par rton
9a3(rnying rgyud): pad snang ba dang // las ni don yod grub pas gdul bya sna tshogs rta mchog nyid/ 'dul ba'i las byed de dper na gyi ling rta ni dud 'gro'i nang nas las mchog tu ston pa ltar ro// 8/ 'dul bzhi theg pa bzhi po rnams/ gdul bya ma rdzas so so'i snang ba la zhen pa rnams la gdul bya bzhi la
9a4(rnying rgyud): dang zhing bstan te chu 'bras su zhen pa'i/ sangs byas sems can bzang ngan du 'dzin pa 'am mos pa'i dbang gis sangs rgyas la yang bzang ngan du 'dzin pa rnams de'i zheng pa dgrol ba'i phyir mnyam pa bzhi dang lngar bstan pa ste/ don mi mnyam yang tshig mnyam pa skad du ston pa'i theg pa rnams so// de yang kha mi'i theg
9a5(rnying rgyud): dang / dngob dang pa rga byang chung sems dpa' dam 'dul ba'i byeng ngo // bzang ngan gsang sgo drang ba'i phyir// thams cad bas ma don rab dgongs te// thams cad blang dor med par bstan/ / dus kyis dras can ring 'o'am/ dka' srung dang ga seng dag / de dag gis 'a /
9a6(rnying rgyud): dan 'do/ sa rjid lub ba rnabs 'phra'agab pa byangs med rtsos pasagami dgos/ dka' byud pa'i byed dos zhe sdang dan rdzam pa dodon pa dadongs te 'di thos pacang byas pas kyang 'thu ba dang nyan pa 'i/ kying lug gdul bya rnams// spos byed 'ang drang ba'i phyir// rjud nas
9a7(rnying rgyud): grub pa'i don dgongs te// gsang bar mos pa tsam gyis 'grung // shes bya rlob sems byed bdag/ zhen pas pa theg chen sgor drang phyir// bden pa me mdzad 'grel pa pob ngas yid 'i sol rjengs chog ltar ldang ba dang shes bya nying sna la
9b1(rnying rgyud): 'khong du chud pa la sgoms pa dang rgyal byed pa dag/ bdan pa ma mthong gi bar la'am/ 'bras bu pa thob par la s+yang dgos pa la dgongs nas gsang sngags 'di bskal pa dpag tu med pa nas kyangs spangs pa'i skabs su 'ga' zhig spyod yul yin pa skad du bstan pa ste/ bskal ba zhing gi rdul ted ngag// ging tu
9b2(rnying rgyud): spungs la rang gnag shing // shes rab mig ldan rnams kyis gzung // nod ldan dang tshul bzang la bstan// lus dang longs spyod gtong la gyin du'o/ 8/ dgongs nas bskal par sbyang rtsal 'grub// phyogs 'gas cho ga 'dzin gang zag/ gang zag za dad de kha cig yi dam snga ras 'bras bu thob par/
9b3(rnying rgyud): 'dod pa'i gdul bya d+mo chung ba rnams// theg spyod rgya cher blo cher bskyed par bya ba'i don du sngags kyi spyod pa dge ba de gcig pus mi 'grub par brjod pa ste/ gsang sngags rmad du byung ba'i spyod pa rgya chen po la/ bskul ba'i phyir// bsgrub pa'i yan lag bsrub dgongs te/ mang po tshang bar ba#
9b4(rnying rgyud): nas bskyabs na 'bras bu 'grub pa la dgongs te bsnyen srub yang lag bzhi la bya ba mang po tshang dgos pa ni bya ba// rgya cher gsang sngags kyi bslab ba dang lta ba dang dam tshig dang ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa rnams tshang bar gang la spyod par ston mom pa dang 'tshams par ston/ la'o// 8/ gdul lcags
9b5(rnying rgyud): sngags kyi sta spyod la/ skrag cing sngangs dang 'og ma'i lam la tshi chad pas lus ngag yid rtsol ba dang btsod/ rang gi lta da la/ mngon par zhen cing ci la'ang yeng mi 'jug pa rnams/ 'dir drang ba'i phyir ram// nges pa'i don 'di la gzhug pa'i phyir// lta spyod mthun
9b6(rnying rgyud): par bstan nas 'dir gzhug go// 8/ gang la mos pa'i gdul bya dag/ la gang mos su bstan te/ mtshan nyid gsum gyi tshul gyis thams cad sems gzhan dbang dang snang ba skye ba med pa ni// mtshan nyid gsum gyis mthun drang phyir/ mtshan nyid gsum gyis chos thams cad kyi don bsdus
9b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i rang bzhin yin te/ kun brtags ni/ gzugs la sogs pa yul drug dang / dbang po drug po dag/ chos dang gang zag gi dngos por yod do snyam du 'khrul ba'i rnam shes kyi nan gyis btags pa'i gzung 'dzin cha gnyis kyi rtog pa de'o// gzhan dbang gang zhe na/ kun gzhi'i rnam shes 'khor dang bcas pa nyid/ rgyu 'dres
10a1(rnying rgyud): kyi tshul du skad cig ma la sems dang sems byung rten 'brel du 'gyur ba de'o// de la ci'i phyir gzhan dbang zhes bya zhe na/ khams gsum sems can gyi shes pa rgyu rkyen gzhan la rag ma lus par rang skye mi nus pa gzhan dbang zhes bya ba ste/ chu rkyen bzhis baphyed de/ kun gzhi la bag chags
10a2(rnying rgyud): pa ni rtswa'i rkyen no// mig dbang po la sogs pa 'jug pa'i tshogs drug ni bdag po'i rkyen no// yul gzugs sgra la sogs pa ni dmigs pa'i rkyen no// shes pa skad cig ma ma 'gags pas go dbye nas/ skad cig ma gyi ma 'byung ba ni de ma zag pa'i rkyen no// de'i phyir gzhan dbang zhes so// yongs sub ni/
10a3(rnying rgyud): gzhan dbang gi chos can de kun la gzung 'dzin cha gnyis dang thal bde'o// de la ci'i phyir yongs grub ces bya zhe na/ dper na chu dang / nam mkha' dang gser dang 'dra'o// chu rtog rung dang rung chu'i rang bzhin sing de ba de gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/ gang du yang ma song / gser yang ma gang bas byas rung ma byas rung / da'i
10a4(rnying rgyud): bzhin med po de garang yang ma song / gang nas kyang ma 'ongs so// nam mkha' yang gsal rung mi gsal rung nam mkha' dang ba'i rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/ gang du yang ma song ngo // de bzhin du chos nyid chos kyi dbyings de sangs rgyas kyis 'jig rten du bstan kyang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/ ma bstan kyang
10a5(rnying rgyud): ru yang ma song ba la bya'o// med la kun brtags mtshan nyid gsum pa/ ba ri ka l+li ta lak+Sha Na zhes pa/ kun btags pa'i mtshan nyid yin te/ pa ri sa ma tAd ces bya ste/ yongs su'am kun du/ ka la bi ta ni med pa la brtags pa'am kro btags pa lta bu'o/ phyir gzung 'dzin dang bcas pa'i chos
10a6(rnying rgyud): sa pa de kun brtags kyi mtshan nyid do// med par kun btags pa gnyis te snang ba'i kunang rtags ni yul dang dbang po'i gzung 'dzin cha gnyis so// mi snang ba'i kun brtags ni ri bong gi rwa dang mo gsham gyi bu dang mu stegs pa'i bdag tu blta ba dang / nyan thos kyi rdul phran no// de la bgal te/ de
10a7(rnying rgyud): kyang gzhi med par 'dra ba la snang ba'i kun brtags ci'i phyir snang / mi snang ba'i kun btags ci'i phyir mi snang zhe na dang po ni gzhan pa'i gzhi go sgyu rdzas kyi chos can la ltos nas snang / de la 'gyed pa'i rgyu dang thob pa'i rgyu yod do// gong gi chos can la rang bzhin med par chos nyid du rtogs nas 'phags
10b1(rnying rgyud): ba tud da ba rtogs pa mang gyi nas sargyas kyi su dang sa gas pa thas rgyang yo par bstas te// yod 'dod gzhan dbang mar sgyul gas pa gdan nga sa kyan ta / par/ na/ dang rta ga te/ zhes padegan can pa gsus nga shA/
10b2(rnying rgyud): 'brel par 'byung ba'i ming yin te/ gzhan dbang gi mtshan nyid ces bya'o// mi 'gog cing / gzhan dbang la yang gnyis te/ bskyed pa'i gzhan dbang dang rkos pa'i gzhan dbang ngo // dang po ni sems can gyi sems las 'byung ba ni kun 'thung dang rkyen kyis bskyed pa'i 'dus byas so// ltos pa'i gzhan dang
10b3(rnying rgyud): da lton nas kyu rkyen pas bskyed pa'i 'dus ma byas gzhi'o// so song btags pa'i 'gog pa dang / so sor brtags min ni 'gog pa dang / nam mkha' dang / de bzhin nyid do// rtag la yongs su grub pa bstan/ pa ni \u0f7fd+hA ThA NA zhes pa yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid yin te de bzhin nyid dang nga
10b4(rnying rgyud): de ba'i migaso ga nyid ni bu ba du sto ma pa yo pa nga kyi 'ongs rdzog shing bya ba na mongs su grub pa'i mtsha nyi ces bya'o// yong ma nyiti te/ mi gyur bya mo'ongs bya ni chos nas su ma byed byin cim pa'i yongs su cad byed byin pas 'o ba soms pa'ig
10b5(rnying rgyud): de'o// kun brtags skye bo'i spyod stsal te// gzhan dbang byang chub sems dpa' mi// yongs su grub par sangs rgyas so// 'on tshan nyid ga sum po 'di ci'i phyod drul byur / yod pa cis mngon / kun tug mams kyi lo'i shes pa 'thal bar migan nganag pa'i rjod pa
10b6(rnying rgyud): gyur te/ gzhung las// rtag tu skye med chos ni de bzhin gshegs// chos rnams thams cad de bzhin gshegs dang 'dra// byis pa'i blo can mtshan mar 'dzin pa rnams// 'jig rten dag na med pa'i chos la spyod// ces so// sdang ma skyes pa'i phyir mi 'gag pa'i chos can la rtag tu bye med ces bya/ kye 'gas
10b7(rnying rgyud): med ring chos nyid la de bzhin gshegs dpa bya/ 'phags pa 'jo shed mabyer don matogs pa'i rdzo nas gyi zhes so// gang 'dzin gnyis med bzhin du yong par brtag nas jigarten dag na med pa'o// des na kun brtags shes pa 'khrul ba'i khyod yu du gyur ba'o// gzhan dgang ni/ byang
11a1(rnying rgyud): sengs da dag pa rta pa rjod na pa/ migon med pa du nga na/ dang/ des ma sa de rje ya // / yongs sa mang pa tsha shad gags na gzhan dang lug 'a gnyis da byas 'a ma bca na
11a2(rnying rgyud): su spang ba rtogs kyi rjes las thob pa'i dag pa 'jig rten pa'i ye shes kyis/ gzhan yang gcung 'dzin gnyis la sum ltar rtogs te/ sku ma sna tshogs su snang yang dngos po med pas yang dag // gzhan dang nu rkyen las gyes pa la/ gtsu 'dzin gnyis su yang dag par
11a3(rnying rgyud): med/ yang dag yongs su grub pa ni sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul du gyur pa yin no// phyir na chos thams cad mtshan nyid gsum du 'dus te/ med pa'i chos la yod par brtags pa thams cad kun brtags/ chu chen gyi skye ba thams cad gzhan dbang / phyin ci log zlos btags pa yang min/ chu rten gyis
11a4(rnying rgyud): kyang mi bgyid pa thams cad yongs grub tu 'dus so// rang gi rnam par rig pa la/ mtshan nyid gsum yang der 'dus te/ rang gi rig pa tsam la 'khrul pas/ gzung 'dzin gnyis su snang ba ma yin pa'i yul logs na med pa/ kun brtags kyang der 'dus/ rang gi shes pa la dngos por 'dzin kyang / shes pa de
11a5(rnying rgyud): nyid rgyu rkyen gzhan gyis ma bskyed par dang skye mi nus pas/ gzhan dbang yang rnam par rig pa tsam la 'dus so// rang gi rnam par rig pa tsam de nyid/ chos thams cad du sdang ba yin la/ chos thams cad rang gi ngo bo ma gyes te/ chos nyid yin pas/ chos can dang chos nyid dbyer med pas/ yongs
11a6(rnying rgyud): nyid kyang rnam par rig tsam la 'bus so// de la mtshan nyid gsum ni mngon pa'i tshig tsam mo// kun btags rang gi mtshan nyid kyis mgub cing stong pa mno na/ gzhan dbang tu rkyen gzhan la dag las shing dang kye mi nus pas mtshon/ yongs grubastong zhing bdag med par mtshon/ mtshon pa'i
11a7(rnying rgyud): ga de sabs can dgas 'khor ba'i sems can rnams/ gzhan dbang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bor grol nas/ yongs sub chos nyid byang chub sems su gnas pa bya 'i phying/ med pa mos pa rnams kun brtags med par bstan/ yod pa' mos pa la gzhan dbang rang gi sems su
11b1(rnying rgyud): pa mi spong bar ton/ rtag pal nos pa la yongs sub tu bstan pa'o// kun btags 'og par btags bcom/ gzhan dbang snang spyod rnam par dag pa/ yongs su ba chos nyid mi 'gyur bar gsum gyis mtshan nyed la rdzes pa'o// yon tan phyogs res gzugs dang chos dang 'ongs spyong dang rigan gyi/ dregs
11b2(rnying rgyud): pa dang // yi te por na'i don tan chos rjegs pa las kyang chub sems dpa dang mangs rgyas kyi thams cad ma khyen pas sogs pa bshad de// zil gyis mnan pas drang ba'i phyir// gnyen por de dag gi rigs pa zhi bar byas kyigasang sngags kyi chos ba cid na ches khyad pa dang gyur pa'i yon tan
11b3(rnying rgyud): rnams// brjod de mos pa byed pa mna' dag pashad de de su zhi ba byas nas gsung badz+rad kyi chos kyi sgor gzhug/ par myo// 'du shes log pa'i log sred can/ gsang rtags 'amos pa yod pa'i rigs byung na/ badz+ra 'a thugs pa dga' ba dag/ smras pa'i thabs
11b4(rnying rgyud): kyi brgya chog nas 'dul ba'i phyir// brda dang gargyus tshig nis nyon te blol snor la spogs pa ba skyes ga su dang cing tho'i ba'i gdal sogs pa/ sna tshogs kyis// zab mo'i don la gzhug/ zhi b+ha 'jo pa'i phrengs kyis 'du shes bsrung bar byas nas gsang gas kyi mas
11b5(rnying rgyud): bar bya/ shusa? dang ni gAN+Di byung sams ted no chen dang // bzhi mnyam zhig cen te mig 'thung bab nim nyam nga las skyes pa'o// des mtshon nas mig dang thang po/ dang lang gi rga yang don ces shes so/ dang nI ru ti rA ni tha mede mtshan ldan rdzi brdapa/ nyid/ ro// si ta ba tu nadus
11b6(rnying rgyud): bzhi las gnyis kyis khros te dri tu mtshon no// khyi'am bya'i sha yang zhugs las mtshon no// rnam pa lnga/ 'di dag ni tshangs pa dang mahA di bltar/ mu stegs kyi dam rdzas log par yang mi sbyad/ khyi phag ltar dang dag nga yang ma yin te/ 'o na ji ltar yin zhe na// rgyal ba rigs lnga 'grub pas na/ dam rjes bdud rtsin
11b7(rnying rgyud): spyod dang / das ngas shid dadas spang ngas rtsam pas na rigs cal shes pa' ba na so// ga bya/ rigs chung banas nas tig phrin gas byung na dang mtshan nyid kyigag pa la thugs do// mi ras bud zha' des dadong sa dang / nyi yin pa dmangs nes dgos sa// zhon pa' brus brtan pa rjes
12a1(rnying rgyud): dgongs pa byod bar bshad po/ longs spyod ldem dgongs kyis// lha srin theg zugs pa ti ga cangs pa dang bya/ zheng / 'dod chags ma ma'o// dge bcul grags pa ka ma/ rnam pa gnyis/ theg pa rgyul zhugs panyan dang / mas/ 'bas tha grags na
12a2(rnying rgyud): dede// btul nas gsang sngags zab mo nyid// bde chen kun tu gcig pa'i sgra dgongs zab mo la zhugs pas yongs su rigs rdzal 'khor 'das kyi bde ba kun gdus te stong ba'i bdebs mchod pa 'bral/ 'das pa'i bde bas rigs lnga grub par 'dus pa'o// // yul med mkha' 'akro ma bde mchog
12a3(rnying rgyud): zhes pa la// ngos bca 'byung ba lnga'i phral rnying bzhi ri ra ba dang bcas pa med kyang / chos nyid nam mkha' la/ namam pa'i rgyal ci dra su gyen gyi rten dang 'bral ba'i rig pa/ tho ba nam mkha'/ don chos rnyed namamapa' la rig rten med du 'thobs nam mkhar 'grogs so// rten med rig pa rnam par 'gro/
12a4(rnying rgyud): mkha' 'gro rnam bzhi ni rdo rjes pa ga yo zhib/ ran byas pa/ btu bang / las the ma par 'byojog pod pazhi'o// tshogs kyi rje/ bon// sprul pa'i bu dpan ldan khrag 'thung nyid/ yin no// 'khor pa'i nyon mong sel krol ba'i/ tshangs pa dang gti mug can tshang pa pa gnyis lam/ rta yin
12a5(rnying rgyud): chen sru/ 'i lha dang // gu langa? ni 'dod chags kyi lha yin te gang gi rtswa gu lang nag po glang gi mgo can du snang te myong pa'i las la brtson pa gsung / gi lha dang / dwags kyi lha ni/ khyab 'jug seng ge'i mgo canA du snang bde zhe sdang can gsod pa'i las pa brtson pa'o// thugs// yon tan gyi nyang
12a6(rnying rgyud): rke dang byug chen po dang na pa ses nan na sa dang rdzogs pa rnams ni ga ma mamam med na mi tu 'og dgacang nga byanya/ snong 'ogs kyi nga rjod / gdod rnams 'dus la ba'ing d+had dpa ston po// dbang lhag de la sogs/ bdag sa rnam pa la/ ga /
12a7(rnying rgyud): gas pa bams pa sa cad kyi ma ma cizhes yi na ci chad pa mas ma ca da pa sa sus nyid ni / mgogacig tu ni srang bstan pa/ zhesa'o// rnam par rtse ste me tsa shA dang / zhi pa/ semasacanacas bye de skyon mong dang cas par byab// de parang sa bye na du /
12b1(rnying rgyud): ma nga ba ming ste/ lung yang bstan pa dasu // hu pa zhe ga ma'i yang dashes pa rjig ga dun sa ji ste da bdun nang na dbya' ba chen sa ste/ nga nas pa byed ste/ dris nas lung ni bstun par bya/ 'a // rgan stu pa zhe pas pa da
12b2(rnying rgyud): phung po ti gcigags pa da pes 'dzin/ sems can nyid dngo po med pas sogagam gyi ba dgang ra tho zhes brjod du byed pa dang 'dra ste lung mi brtan pas na// bzhag pa'i lung yang bstan pa zhes bya'o// !/ rtsa// thog tu mA du rtan pa ni tshad med byams par sbyar / nye ltab log dang rta ba bcom pa zad cin la/
12b3(rnying rgyud): mnya byamag pa'o// de ni byams pa'i blozhes bya'o// gsod byed snying rje'i rang bzhin te/ lta ba 'od pa nga ltab 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las mi rgol ba bskul nas byang 'das bkod pa nyid rje tshed med de de ni snying rje ro zhes bya'o// bskal zhing bstab pa dga' ba'i mchod// lha ma ngan pa las rdol nas sangs rgyas kyi
12b4(rnying rgyud): zhing du 'phral ba ni dga' batshad med de de ni dga' ba'i thabs dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// gdu' bu rnams/ yal bar mi dor btang snyoms so// tshad med pa ste de ni btang snyoms mdo zhes ca ste/ blo thos thangs kyi mdos gdul bya drang ba'o// !/ ma ltar byams pa dang sring ltar gdung ba'i yum kun la byams pas
12b5(rnying rgyud): sbyar/ zhing spyad do// sdang ba'i/ dgra dang gnod pa'i bgegs la snying rjes gsad par bya// mtshan dang ldan pa bye ba bdun pa'i shamabyin pa dmang ngo // rdzas mchog dga' bas ma byin blang // rdzun smra btang snyoms chen po nyid/ bkris nas drangs te/ bsrud pa'i tshig brdzun dang 'dra bas kun btang
12b6(rnying rgyud): snyoms chen por spyod/ gdul gyu/ log sred can 'dul byed/ sprul skus bkri drang rgyud// gtsul bya log sred can yang kri drang brgud pa'i tshig tu gsungs pa ni mi tshangs par spyod pa byams pa la bkris nas drang / gsod ba la bkris nas sgrol ba la drang / ma byin len la bkris nas rdzas mtshan ldan la drang / thun la
12b7(rnying rgyud): pardzis nas btang snyoms la drangs te/ des 'khor 'das kun la khyab par gnas pas na bde ba chen po mchog gi dngos gru 'thob pa'o// kun khyab bde mchog chen po yin// rnal 'gyor zab mo sku gsum rdzogs zhes pa ste/ sangs rgyas rnams rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs pa ni gsang ba'i sku ste 'dir rnal
13a1(rnying rgyud): nga bsam padzin 'dzin na ga' gas panasu ci ga na du gra rgyang gis 'jongs pa'i sa na ci na tubya ste/ ga pa kyi gagasas 'byi du'i gzugs sa dpa/ nang nga bshegs pa'i gnasasa'ang steg nga 'angs rgya
13a2(rnying rgyud): rang / rang lus la rang gis dbang thob pa'i dus so// yum gyi lhums nas gsang ba'i sku// gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba ni// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams la/ !/ ji ltar 'dod par spyad cing rol/ ba ni tshogs kyi 'khor lor rol pa te/ mig gi yul gzugs
13a3(rnying rgyud): 'dod nyon rnams dpal rnam snang la mchod par 'bul/ lha'i yul dri 'dod yon rnams dkon mchod dpal yid ba ni ni ri ma byung la 'bul ba dang / lce'i yul ro 'dod yon rnams tshe dpag med la 'bul ba dang / rna ba'i yul spa 'dod yon rnam la don grub ta mchog la 'bul ba dang / lus kyi yul reg bya 'dod yon mi bskyod su la
13a4(rnying rgyud): ba dang / dngos grub gnyis ji ltar 'dod par gsol pa gdab cing mchod pas bdag dang lha gnyis su med par rol pa'o// 'jig rten khams 'dir bud med kyi/ sbyor ba ni 'azhi ste sbyor ba yan lag bzhes 'khyud pa dang / nang gi sbyor ba rlangs rgya me chung bzhis drang ba dang / gsang ba'i phyir brtsa 'khor lo bzhim rung ba dang / de khos
13a5(rnying rgyud): sbyor ba bdud rtsi dka dang mar rdo rje bad+ma'i nang du ngos gzung bar bya ste de ni sku'i sbyor ba'o// bde bas tshims kyang nyi zla 'dra/ thugs kyi sbyor ba ni nA ni byang sems bza' ba ste/ bla mas byin nas bza' ba gsang ba'i dbang bskur/ rang gis yum la rol nas bdashang shes rab 'i shes dpang yid kyis bza' ba bde chen po'i dbang de/ bran mo
13a6(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu tshe'i rig 'dzin thong/ mchog gi 'bras bu rdo rje lta bu'i skur 'gyur ro// rdo rje'i sku ni gzi mdangs 'bar// seng ge'i gsung dang 'dra bar sgrogs/ gsung gi sbyor ba ni thig le rdo rje'i rtse nas bzlog pas mdoms kyi lnga bsrubs su chub lte bar zlog pas lte brgya phor ltar 'khrang / snying gar klog pas rtod seng ge'i 'ang /
13a7(rnying rgyud): mgrin par bzlog pas lces zhal gyi gdo bes seng ge'i gsung ltar tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ldan pa'o// !/ gdul bya/ zhe na chags can la 'dul byed ston pa gsang ba'i us 'dul thabs 'dod pa/ rang rkyen gyis tshig/ hu gsungs pas dang lus/ sku gsum/ bu rtogs
13b1(rnying rgyud): pa'apha/ zab mor gnas pa yin// lus ngag yid la gang gnas pa/ gogs pa desas rmongs su te/ longs su thun rba lpag kyis brjid bstad/ rdzus nga shing shing 'arjing 'o// dag zul gyiste/ pAl yu lags dablangs yan la dug cu nga ldan pa sta gsu shes pa'i tshogs yang bang gyu rab du
13b2(rnying rgyud): sa me kyi sa dang jos pa med pa gas ga ga yang dru ga gas // drugasum sor gnas pa yin/ lung chen dang ge mtshan nyid ni// bla dag de'i rnam pa shes pan/
13b3(rnying rgyud): don drug ste/ bdag 'i 'didi bstan dang/ ban 'i dmigs pa brtan pa dang / yul dang 'ayo dang pa' dang / nges chog dang drug so// rang bzhin ni dran zhon 'kho 'i gzhi yinal/ nam byang byung 'das kyi rten yin no// dmigs pani rdza yongs su mchad pa'o// yus ni chos byi lag //
13b4(rnying rgyud): rdza'i rnam shes so// kun bzhi'i me tshig las pa/ nag gi bag chags sun sogs pa'i dazhi'o// ba chags yod pa'i phyir na gran gzhi yod par bas so// bras ni yid kyi rnam shes la sogs pa'i rnamashes rnams ldang ba'o// des zla'i nag zheg nas 'gyur ba ni chos su chen po gnas so// rang ba
13b5(rnying rgyud): dmigs yul 'khor rdul chog/ chos su chen po ye nas gnas// chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes dang // me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis// chos kyi sgra yang 'grub pa na// yang dag chos su dri ma med/ de rang chos su ye shes gang gis bsus nagasam te/
13b6(rnying rgyud): las dang gnas 'gyur ro// ngo gi mnyam gzhag gi dus na semasa'i spang spadan rnam mkha' skar snar // kun gzhi'i ngo ro ru ma tshogs ste spang ba bag chags sogs pa'o// dngo su senas kyi chos tid yinono// de tsam nyid na thun dgi'i las ni chos thams cad kyi sgo yangs par 'phye dang yin la// des
13b7(rnying rgyud): du/ gyur pa'i thabs ni/ kun gzhi ni mtha' dang don tan dang gyon gzhi su'i steng/ gyi dang nang med/ dbus med par nam mnga' rta bur lda ba'i bus na/ ma bgreng ba'i ye shes rang sdang ba yin la/ kun pani chos kyi dbyings kyi re shes su gnas 'gyur zhes bya'o// me lor lta bu'i ye shes kyi dbo ni/
14a1(rnying rgyud): ci nam paci dang / sem su rtog mi byang 'a dag lalas pa ding/ yang dog med pa la yang mchags pan sanan na song / 'i mnas kya ba gas la ba'o// ma mang mags kyi lasaH/ gtsug zhes pa ma pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i sa na
14a2(rnying rgyud): ga mo ngan cad kun dgi ltar rnang bas/ gnag ni nyid spang bar nga 'byur ba'i dus na/ chos can snang zhes bya'o// chos kun snang bar gsal ba'o// gnas 'thur ni chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes su gnas 'gyur ba'i dus na/ chos kyi dbyings ma bcos pa na/ me long lta bu'i me shes ma 'gags pa ga
14a3(rnying rgyud): bas/ chos kyi dbyings gsapa la mi g.yo bar gnas 'gyur ba la/ dbyings dang ye shes 'du 'bral med par gnas pal ni/ chos spang yang grub pas na/ yang dag thos pra dri ma med ces so// des ni chos kyi dbyings dang me 'ong lta bu'i ye shes gnyis kyi chos sku bshad pa'o// yang sbas bshad na/ sngags sa
14a4(rnying rgyud): nyid thun mong gi 'dod pa ste/ thAm pA la zhes pa/ chos su ste/ sangs rgyas kyis dang phyar na chos dbyings rnam ngag dang / me long lta bu'i ye shes ni/ de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin te/ chos su zhes bya/ d+harma hA tra bi bud+hi zhes pa/ chos dbyings rnam dag yin te/ stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa 'phag
14a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i chos rnams kye zhing 'byung ba'i rgyu dang dbyings su phur ba na chos dbyings/ de bzhin TI 'a gro zung kyi nyon mongs zhes bya'i sgrib pa sprin dang 'drab dang zhing byang sten mamakha'i dbyings dag pa dang 'dra bas na/ chos dbyings rnam dag ces bya'o// A daR+sha dz+nyA na zhes pa/ me long lta bu'i ye shes yin te/ chos dbying sa rnam
14a6(rnying rgyud): dag la dmigs pas/ gzung 'dzin gyi rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba ste/ kun gzhi'i rnam shes gnas 'gyur bas/ me long phyis pa'i nang du ci yang snang ba bzhin du/ chos thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan snang ba la bya ste/ me long lta bu'i ye shes zhes bya'o// ye shes sku ni phung por grol// 'khor
14a7(rnying rgyud): 'das longs spyod rgyal srid che// so sor kun rtog mnyam pa nyid// ye shes gnyis 'dus longs sku sangs kyis/ bde chen kun 'ju ni/ longs su gang yin pa dang ye zheng gang gis bsdus nga'o// dang po ni rdul khrims kyi phung po rnam snang dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po na 'thung dang /
14b1(rnying rgyud): bya dang las dang gnas 'gyur ro// ngatsan sul kun la 'jug cing gcod pa ni yid/ bdag dang bdag ging gzhan du 'dzin pa ni nyon mongs pa can no// yid kyilas ni shes rab kyi mi bskyod pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i 'od dpa' med/ rnam grol ye shes mthong ba'i phung po dngos grub dang wa ni 'dod pa'i 'de ba dod yon lnga dang /
14b2(rnying rgyud): bud med la longs spyod myang 'das kyi/ bag chags so sor gcod cing dngos po sna tshogs su reg pa'o// nyon mongs can gyi yid kyi las ni/ kun gzhi mthong du mi steng bar bsleb ba'o// gnas 'gyur ni/ kun gni bde bstobs dang mi 'jigs pa las khyod/ rgyal srid btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa'o// kunag gi nam ma tha'
14b3(rnying rgyud): ltar snang ba'i dus na/ mtshan ma sna tshogs ma skyes par rigs nas/ chos thams cad gang yin bya ba'i de dogs mod par rtogs nas/ yid so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes su gnas 'gyur zhes bya/ kun gzhi nam mkha' ltar snang ba'i dus na/ rang gzhan du 'dzin pa med pas/ don so so tha mi dad pas nyon mongs pa can gyi
14b4(rnying rgyud): yid mnyam nyid ye shes su gnas 'gyur zhes bya'o// yegs de gnyis bdus la longs smra'o// longs skur bzhugs/ 'dir longs sgyu sngags mtshan nyid mthun par sbas bshad na/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phung po longs su ni/ a sa ma sa ma ngaT skan d+ha zhes pa/ ya sa ma ni mi mnyam
14b5(rnying rgyud): pa ste/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams so// sa ma ni mnyam pa ste/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas de dag dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro// pah+ya kan d+ha ni phung po lnga ste/ zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin/ shes rab/ rnam par grol ba'i/ rnam grol ye shes mthong ba'i phung po ste/ sangs rgyas
14b6(rnying rgyud): mthong ba'i phung po 'di dag pal la med pas na/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phung po lnga zhes so// saM tog kA ya zhes pa/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ste/ mnyam nyid ye shes dang / sor tog ye shes gnyis kyis// chos kyi longs spyod dang / sbyi pa chen po ma lus par myang bar mdzad pa/
14b7(rnying rgyud): rnam spang gi gru'o// longs kyod rdzogs pa'i sku zhes bya'o// sa ma hA dzA na zhes pa/ thog mas dang po la de khon nyid mngon par rtogs pa'i tshe/ rang gzhan du mi 'byed cing mnyam nyid du rtogs pas/ sa gong nas gong du sbyangs pas// sangs rgyas kyis lami gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das par
15a1(rnying rgyud): byung b.ram/ nyan mo can gyi yi gnas yos te/ ye shes su byung ba la shan nyid le gas zhesas// ban+d+hag dz+nyAn zhes pa/ sa sor rtog pa'i ba shes te/ yid kyi rnam nyes gnas 'gyur bas/ gdungs dang / ti pa dron dang bsam gtan tum dang 'jug sa tham
15a2(rnying rgyud): gzhing d+har la/ shes bya thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i ye shes 'jug pas/ chos kyi char chen po 'bebs shing / the tshom sna tshogs gcod pa dang / sU bai DUr+ya la sogs par d+ha'i mdog tu ston pa'i rgyur gyur pa ste/ so sor tog pa'i ye shes zhes bya'o// chos dbyings mkha' dbyings dag pa na// gdul
15a3(rnying rgyud): bya sems can don 'gro ba// sprul pa'i 'khor lo chen po yang // zhi dang khro bor rang snang ba// sbrul sku bya ba grub pa yi// srul su mkha' 'gro sbram pa de mchog ni/ sbrul mu gang yin na chos dbyings nam mkha' dang ba'i pho brang na bzhugs pa'i yongs su rtsal ba rigs lnga'i skal pa te
15a4(rnying rgyud): gda' ba das drug shesems can rnamasa'i 'dus byed phul ba'i 'thor po spang ba yang shi bdug gis 'grog ni don ma pa dang / khonga'i bu ru las gas pa'i dadug pa can rnams 'du bar phul ba ni rdzus su'i rjo nyi kyis 'thob mangs pa'i don mdzad pa byung // sngags mtshan nyid nga dbung dus
15a5(rnying rgyud): gnad na/ nis+saN kA la zhes pa/ sbrul bu ste/ bya dgub ba'i ye shes kyis/ sems can gang la gang 'dul du bas sna tshogs su phu gsung thugs su stsal te/ sna tshogs su ston pa la bya bas na/ sbrul bu zhes so// shrit+s+ya n+yASh+TAn dz+nyA na zhes pa/ bya ba grub pa'i ye shes yin te/ me gsogs dang po lnga'i rnam zhe
15a6(rnying rgyud): gnas 'gyur bas/ 'di ga rten thams thams cad du thabs satshogs dpa ga med kyis/ sems ca ma na don mdzad pa'i gzhir gyur pa yin te/ rgya bathub pa'i legs zhes bya'o// des sprus pa'i sku'i bya ba thams cad bsgrub pa'o// ye shes ngo bo las ni 'gyur/ ye zhes gang gis bsdus na ni// tha bklag pa'i ye shes
15a7(rnying rgyud): s+ho// ngaben dang ngos su ma mos pa dzin do// rno rje sa ni/ gnasas pon dang ba pa 'ong ngo // gnas bur ni/ bud di rnamapa shar bla 'i dusan/ phu gyi drang pa'i blang / sems kyi gang 'i chung bang / ra bya ni kyi mtshan da ga no 'i rna gi zhan tan na ga nas chur
15b1(rnying rgyud): phyir ni 'dul ba rnam pa bzhi/ mngon di te/ phyi dang ba bang // phyi dul ba bani/ mngo gdun ces 'dub pa 'a ma dang bdu gisasam bas pa dang / thags kyi ma sa dang / dra 'dral gyis 'dul ba 'do gas kyangang / rig pas 'dra' pa 'theg sa sa dang / dgas dang sod nas rjes dang /
15b2(rnying rgyud): bab/ sku gsung bugs bsam gyis mi khyab par snang ba'o// mdzad pa bsdus pa'i mdzad pa brgyad ni/ mchod rten bde byed rten nam rdo rje brtsegs par sku bltams/ mchod rten ri bo ta la'am snying rje rin chen brtsegs par rab tu byung / mchod rten bya khri kha shor ram rnam dag pad+ma brtsegs par dka' thub mdzad/ mchod rten ka ni ka 'dra/
15b3(rnying rgyud): mar legs g.yung drung brtsegs par sangs rgyas/ mchod rten mgo mangs sa mag zi brjid mtha' yas su bdud btul/ mchod rten nyam tsakra'am btang snyoms don grub tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskong ba dang / mchod rten go'u de'u shan nam dpe med bsam 'das su cho 'phrul bstan/ mchod rten bde byed gzhon nu ma khams gsum de rjes su kyang
15b4(rnying rgyud): 'das so// khyad par rnam pa gsum// khyad par la gsum/ bkrus par mdzad pa brgyad dang / rgyas par bcu gnyis/ shin tu rgas par gi bu'o// sku bltams rab byung dka' thub mdzad// sangs rgyas bdud btul 'khor lo bskor// tshe 'phrul bstan nas mya ngan 'das// mdzad pa
15b5(rnying rgyud): mchod rten brgyad par snang / nga ni zur khrod chen po brgyad du nyung ba de na gsang sngags kyi lugs su byung bar snang ngo // 'jig rten pa dang mthun byed phyir// 'jig rten mdzad pa rnam pa drug/ rgyas par bcu gnyis ni/ 'jig rten pa'i drag la/ dga' ldan nas lhums su zhugs pa dang / sum bi'i tshal
15b6(rnying rgyud): du bskams pa dang / na mnyam gzhon nu rol rtsed mdzad pa dang / 'jig rten gyi slob dpon mdzad pa dang / rgyal srid bzung ba dang / rab tu byung ba dang drug go// 'khor ba las ni rnam par grol// de phyir 'das pa'i mdzad pa drub/ ni chu bo ni ra ny+dza nar dka' thab mdzad/ ma ga d+hAr bdud btul/ yul ma
15b7(rnying rgyud): hAn+do nyid sangs rgyas/ ba ra NA sI dang bya rgod daphung por chos kyi 'khor lo 'askor/ grong khyer mnyan yod du tshe 'phrul bstan/ seng byer mya ngan 'das pa'o/ !/ shin tu rgyas par ni bu ni/ rgya cher rol par/ dang por dga' ldan gnas nas gshegs// de nas 'jing po'i grol bstan pa/ yum gyi skyams su zhugs pa
16a1(rnying rgyud): de bzhin sums na sa nas pa dang // skams ma dunas par gyur pa dang // tshangs dang byin gyis thangs dang // ka ki'i ngas kyis dkris pa dang // ku yis du khrus gsol ba dang // mtshan mkhan rnams kyis mtshan brtags dang // rdzogs bzhir gom pa bdun por dang // kyad bla rnams dang tha/
16a2(rnying rgyud): bkye dang // yi ge 'dong dang 'do ba srabs dang // bab dang rgyal srid pa zhes pa dang // bltams 'khor rnams mi dga' dang // 'khor rnams kun gyis bsrungs pa dang // bar d+ha sir dka' thab dang // the'us sbrad kyi phul ba dang // shing dung rdo rje'i gdan stengs su// mngon par byang ni chub ba ste// chos 'khor bsgor dang myang 'das so//
16a3(rnying rgyud): rnam pa nyi bu'am par 'dod// ces bya ste/ zhib tu gzhan dang mthun par bshad de// sangs rgyas sprul pa'i sku rnams la// mi yi yul du 'dul mdzad pa// bcom ldan shAkya seng ge yis// mdzad pa nyi shus byang chub po// rnal 'byor ye shes yul dang ni// ye shes las
16a4(rnying rgyud): dang nus mthur bcas// sku lnga yul du blta ba yi// rnal 'byor zab mo rang snad pas/ rgal 'byor zab mo sku gsum rdzogs ni bzhi ste/ sku dang ye shes snang ba dang / ye shes lnga yul gcig tu bkru ba dang / yon tan ci lta bu dang / ye shes kyi rnam grangs so// dang po ni/ ye shes lnga ya don gsum
16a5(rnying rgyud): kyis bstan te/ ye shes kyi yul dang / las dang / nus mthu'o// de la me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi yul ni chos sku la blta ba'o// nus mthu ni gzugs kyu 'byung ba la rag gzhan ma lus so// mnyam nyid kyi ye shes kyi yul ni longs gru la blta ba'o// las ni spros pa med par 'dus so// nus mthu ni chos kyi bden pa
16a6(rnying rgyud): nyasas su bstar ba'o// so sor rtogs pa'i yul ni/ mngon par byang chub pa'i sku la blta ba'o// las ni yon tan gyi sgo mang po ma 'gags pa'o// nus maT ni rang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs par byed pa'o// bya ba thub pa'i yul ni sbrul sbru la blta'o// las ni srul sku mi 'gag par byed pa'o// nus
16a7(rnying rgyud): pa ni rigs thams cad tha dad par 'gyur ba'o// chos dbyings ye shes kyi yul ni/ rdo rje'i yul blta ba'o// de yang dmigs pa med pa'o// las ni ye shes thams cad kyi gro mi 'gag par byed pa'o// nus pa ni yon tan gyi sgo ma 'gags bzhid du dgongs pa spros pa med par bsdus pa'o// ston pa chen po'i ye shes
16b1(rnying rgyud): kyi ma bdag med pa pagan// bas na kya med pa'o// rdzas mdzan mas bams ma khyen pa'o// de la ye shes naphrul gcis tu bsun ma mang gisas 'das te/ shA na/ dpe so so ninang na sugs pad thang ba dab te/ ma'ong ni'i shes min la gzugs pa na dang na ngan zhi nga
16b2(rnying rgyud): yon na na kyini/ tsha gyi dkyi me 'ong dag bdelang/ dbyis kyi 'o na phu zhen/ mig sa sogs pa nga po dus ga sa chis byung ba yadabang / bal cang/ dbyi kyi yon da la thunas pa mtshogs rna bayin do// ye shes 'in ma chis
16b3(rnying rgyud): nag gang rdzogs pa'i le she sa shes bya'o// dekar phrus sun tshogs su snang bshing na/ chos byed kyi bya nyid pas ma gsos pa'i phyir/ rdo/ de mi zhes zhes bya'o// ma ngos tsam nyid na gdus byazla pa 'dag ga dod de/ 'do pa bzhin bya byung bsnyen/ de lanan tan rinas rjes s+ho// na
16b4(rnying rgyud): med da 'i dgri ba bas na mnyam pa nyid/ cho 'phrul gyi bye zag sgo tshogs su spang ba la mi sgrib pa ni so sor rtog pa/ gzung bya mngon gsus drangan 'dogs rgyas pas nin na tan zhes bya ste/ de'i phyir 'dis na yang mo sor ga zu'i le gas zhes so// me long sa pa'i legs kyis ma dacos pa'i mtshan med par
16b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i sa shes nyos so// ma gshegs pa'i thas med pas gzigs pa'i le shes so// marigs pa'i chos med pas na rig pa'i ga shes so// mthung dang chos med pa na dang byung gi ye shes so// ye shes chen po dnga'i dgongs pagams su rtsod pa'i dras na/ rnas 'byor pa'i thugs dpa mo ngas rnamasan/ rna
16b6(rnying rgyud): dan rdzos san/ de'ad tsu cho rdzamangs pal/ ma tA ma tu mo sasrung du'o// gsang na'i mun pagargyal po'adi/ ngas nang thang brtan pa shi sa ya da du 'didis byed 'do pa/ ba ba shog pa cang dengs dpa 'dang / dan yod 'a
16b7(rnying rgyud): ra nga chu ba kya/ thams kyi yul 'i kyi med pa na' shi masas rgyas pa / bdag gnan 'khor bar rlung bdun// mya ngan 'das bcom du 'thom// sems nyid lenas sangs rgyas yin// rang bzhin 'thos bu sum
17a1(rnying rgyud): grangs rtsal// yon tan skyon dang gol sa dang // gzhag thabs sems kyi de kho na// mtha' yas chos kyi rang bzhin rnams// chos kyi sku las gzhan ma yin/ de kar 'khor 'das sems su 'das na/ gtan dang dang
17a2(rnying rgyud): sems kyi ra bzhin dang / 'bras bu/ yul/ rnam thangs/ rgyal/ yon tan/ skyon/ golas/ gzhag thabs/ de len nyid do// de la dang po ni kun gzhi'o// 'bras pa ni sangs rgyas so// yul ni nam mkha' bo// rnam grangs ni rnam zhes tshogs brgyad do// rtsal ni mngon shes drugs/ yon tan da mi ga // na ni
17a3(rnying rgyud): gzung 'dzin gnyis dang mabral ba'o// golas ni rtag chad gnyis so// gzhag thabs ni 'du shes gzhan du mi 'jug pa'o// de 'o na nyid ni ma bcos pa'o// de ltar 'khor 'das kyi chos mtha' yas pa rnams kyi chos kyi skus gzhan ma yin par shes par bya'o// sems nyid chos nyid sangs rgyas shes/ deng sems cho nyid du shes pa dang
17a4(rnying rgyud): sems sangs rgyas su shes pa gnyis so// dang po ni snang ba med pa dang / bya ba med pa dang / gnyis su med par rtogs pa'o// sems sangs rgyas su shes pa ni chos nyid ma bcos par shes pa'i don gcig pus kyang mi chog ste/ sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa shin tu zab cing rgya che ba'i don mtha' gras thugs su chud pa de'o// rnam shes phung por ltung ba
17a5(rnying rgyud): kun// rigs lnga rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid// de nyid las ni gzhan min pas// sangs rgyas bde chen rang la gnas/ sangs rgyas bde chen kun 'dus pa'i don te/ kun gzhi'i rnam gis bag chags dkar nag sogs pa dang / gzugs kyi phung po dang / nyon mongs gti mug gsum yang myi rnams
17a6(rnying rgyud): snang ngo // yid kyi rnam zhes/ 'du shes phung ngo po/ 'dod chags gsum/ gsung snang mtha'a'o// yid kyi 'du shes/ rnam par shes pa'i phung po/ zhe sdang gsum las thugs rdo rje sems dpa' 'o// nyon mongs can gyi yid dang / tshod pa'i phung po/ nga rgyal gsum yang / yon tan rin 'byung ngo // rdo sde'i rnam shes/ 'du byed
17a7(rnying rgyud): phung po/ phrag dog gsum yang phrin yas don mod grub ro// de 'ang rgyud las kyang // lus kyi nam shes gzugs phung rnam snang mdzad// gti sug dang byung yang dag bcom ldan 'das// kun gzhi'i rnam shes mi bskyod rdo rje sems// zhe sdang dang byung chub da bcom ldan 'das// nyon mongs rnam shes tshor ba rin chen 'byung //
17b1(rnying rgyud): rgyala'ang grang gcig su bcom ldan 'das// kun/ shi'i rnas shes rang byung dbas chen nyid// dug lnga dang byung ban 'dus bcom ldan 'das// rko rje'i rnam par shes pa don yod bug/ zag dog rang byung rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das// zhes so// mi rtog dbyings las thugs rjes chags// bamatshan nyid pa ni/ su mjog
17b2(rnying rgyud): mtshan nyid pazhi ldan yang / mkha' po sum bde mchod pade zhes pa/ chu rkyen las bskyed pa ni/ chu khams gabul rkyen rdza mkhan mkhas pas bya pa'i snod lta bya'o// gsang sngags pa ni/ rgya mi rton dachos kyi dbyingasangs rkyen sems can la thugs rjes chags nas te rgyagang bzhengs po'o// ces 'dul der sdang
17b3(rnying rgyud): bzhin du/ mtshan nyid ni/ mtha pa snang bani/ phu po ba dzinas/ mangs pa gti taman cad rje'i snod du mthun par snang // gsang grags pa ni/ mad kyi rtsod pade ga bya gang lagang yul 'bri rang sdang / ring bzhin nor zla dgos 'dod stong ba 'o// thabs kyi spyod pas kun 'dul yang / mtshad gi deng
17b4(rnying rgyud): rus ba ni/ nu sugs nasu rjod/ zho thobasan no dad ces pa'o// gsang sngags pa ni// thabs kyi myod pas gdul thagang 'ag dul 'ded der mthun par snang ba'i bu'o// brtag pa tsam snang chos kyi dbyings/ mtshan nyid ni brtags na den pa ste/ ci'i phyir po yang ma thu ba dang dong / gas nga gas pa ni te rgya da'i phra /
17b5(rnying rgyud): rnams dag das sa dang / don spo ma myong byed ci 'cho phra dri ba 'das pa yangasas / ngo bo rang bzhin rnam grangs can/ rnam kyang ba rdzog pa marjod pa na pa nad de/ da byen gis par than/ de'i babazhin then pa yin/ mtshan gyirnam thangs du dang ldan nan/ dang ngonapa
17b6(rnying rgyud): sems sa ca / bra ci sa dun mongs na tha ni po dug na 'da' ni/ dang so rang bzhin pa chong nyidani/ dag kyi bong da ma du dab 'do sa 'di dri la d+ha ska ni 'don de/ chos nyid mo 'od mtshan pa ngo// de la ming yang sna bani/ 'das gsum ri sa du tun // dasum pa par ra ra
17b7(rnying rgyud): du rang ni/ 'i zlang chu nas dmyal bar bye ba pa so sa // cing yang rdza cu chub pa ni/ theg paris dbu sa sopa'i 'angs da par rjo pa'o// cir yang ma yin chos nyid ni// cing yang sdang bar shar ba las// cing yang bsgyur du btub pa'i phyir// cir yang bsgrub tu
18a1(rnying rgyud): btab pas 'grub// sru gsum ye shes lha rang bzhin/ dpa phyi bzhin de lta bu zhe na/ chos su dri ma med pa dang / chos dbyings me shes dang mo long lta bu'i ya shes rnams ni kun ga ni gnas 'gyur ba'o// longs su dang mnyam nyid ye zhes dang / du rtan pa
18a2(rnying rgyud): shes dang / nyo so lan kyi'i dnganang mang // mya nga kyas bag ni ga ga she ldan pa tha/ ma da bas da na nen// as gangs ci ga shes 'angags sa pa dan pa 'ad gas na
18a3(rnying rgyud): na nyid do// khams gsul dbyig gron bya ma hA// bcom ldan 'das nyid khrag 'brud nyid// rang sems de nye de rang snang ba// zab mor bstan pa'i kho na// yang gsang dbyed med chen po lnga gnyis las// ye shes gsum na chos sku'i ga'i
18a4(rnying rgyud): bzhing stan pa ni/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes dang / me lor lta bu'i ye shes so// rtag pa chen po'i rang bzhin can/ rang bzhin thos su/ skye ba med pa/ ste ci'i phyir na byen gyis mi 'jigs pa'i phyir ro// mitshan nyid 'gyur med kye med/ kun tu rtog pa du tshogs spangs pa'o/
18a5(rnying rgyud): mthu' lta bur stong / ngadi bcos bu'i bakhrigs gnas chos kyi dbyings kyi yongs su mazad pa nyid na/ 'khor she ye shes chen po bzhi dang gcas sku gnyis 'khor/ gzu 'i dzi chos dbyings nam mkhas khyab tshad zhi mas la ma mdzad // 'dul/ ba'o// srin tu bzang po chos
18a6(rnying rgyud): chos/ chos nga dag zung ba cig gipa nyi tha mar te/ bdud cos du'i chos su ni kun tu 'azang po das rgyas kun da miganyis pa bathugs do// chos bu'i long su nis bas pa/ rdo rje 'chang chen longs spyod chos// chos su'i sprul srung sangs kyis rigs ldang ljang // lU dang gsung thugs
18a7(rnying rgyud): da / da pade med do/ das bgong/ 'bad chen pocag gi mizhe so// sa/ yo 'a mig so// mchog/ 'dzi la'i
18b1(rnying rgyud): mu gzugs su gnyis kyi ro las snang / dza/ mang nyid pa kya thos kun/ yongs su grub pa na da sa \u0f7f/ yongs chubs byung sa yongs ma chos dbyings byid mchon pa khyong bzhin tan pa'i gan pa/ chos kyi sgra/ da da gas nyi da ban pos drug/ bzug sa /
18b2(rnying rgyud): sun na su su
18b3(rnying rgyud): 'i rten pa zhing thar bab com pa'o// mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos rten pa'i tshad/ bkra lan ba cugapa kyig ni/ chos phralas yongs su/ de las thas trab// nyes cung bkros na ma ni sngal phulas yongs srur ngob/ de co can das pa com rma ni me papa lo
18b4(rnying rgyud): s+ho// chos hU~M gzhi yin dang por gnas/ sa // thim cu thaMng+ga la gyis phyis 'bras/ ba rdzag pa nga bye sa// rtse / chos kyi sbrul ye shes kyis 'jug par // dragasang ga med na/ sengs can kun mi se
18b5(rnying rgyud): nyin chos su thugs yin la/ chos bu'i bstan pa gang yin// ba skyed masaHdang rdzogs pa grangs na dang rdzogs pa che/ na gas te// 'grung med chos sku rtag pa chos dzi das rtog gi 'gyur ba med pa'i chos nyid/ do// mi rtag par bad !/ ye shes skad cig ma las mi rtag par
18b6(rnying rgyud): shad do// rtag pas bri nu pa myos 'o kyi/ spyod pas na rtag pa yang ma yin la// chos kya de yod nga / rang bzhin sdig bang snang bas mi rtag min/ de 'danangs dag kya pa ga nying chos tha brka pa'o// ye shes gnyis ni longs sku'i gzhi/ longs grus pa gas pa can
18b7(rnying rgyud): ma su
19a1(rnying rgyud): na pa gan ma rim pal yang gnas sa// 'og min gnas na grangs te 'gas kyi'as tan na bya'og min na bathunas par mthong / mdza dang sa thus sum gyi mnga' sa mthong / matis so/ mi na men pal bathags par 'thong / bzhugs par mdzad/ 'dzin la te/
19a2(rnying rgyud): dang / dazer // dang po lhag pa ma rnam par dag pa dang rnan pa'i sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' 'o// dbye ba bani te/ col pa dang bcas pas mtshan ma med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang / mtshan med kun du ba byang chub sems dpa' dang / spyod pa des ngas bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang / skyeb mig gis rdzogs pa'i nga bya
19a3(rnying rgyud): dpa'adang bzhi'o// sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor/ drug pa 'ongs du'i khu khrig/ gzhi dang snying po me tog 'dul/ zheng yongs su dgapa la mang 'am dza dang / stong brdzun la phrul grus mnga'amadzadang / de kong gis ni 'jam dpa' ci zhing du bde/ de tong gis med spyod pa'i nang dung/ de stong gis rnam sbyar
19a4(rnying rgyud): gru ba'o// longs sku'i chos sku rnam par snang mdzad chen po'o// longs su'i longs su rnam snang ga sa chen mtsho// longs su'i sbrul sku khyab snang mdzad/ yin no// phugasung thugs ni/ spyi dang gsung dang thugs gsum gsum/ 'ongs bu'i chos snga rnam sdang chen po/ gsung ngo
19a5(rnying rgyud): ngani/ thugs rnam par marton pa'am/ stong banyid kyi yi shes so// yongs du'i yongs sunam rdza nas chenamaH/ gsung yul la ste bdun/ thugs chos dbyings le shes so// yongs su'i sgras su bya sna mad// gsung dril/ thugs me long sa bu'i ye shes so// longs sus bcu'i ngo la snang / nyes dang po rab dnga'ab
19a6(rnying rgyud): med/ don byed/ 'o shos mngon du du dang ring po dang / legs pa'i 'i jos/ sa tu brjod kyi sbyin no// gzhin dbang longs spyod rdzog srur sbyar/ te gzhan dang gang bas dasum gyi sems can gyi snang ba te/ de la T+Ten gyis bskyed pa ni/ 'ongs su yang chos bu'i 'bras bu 'in la/ sbrul ba'i rgyu yang yin no// des nagazhan
19a7(rnying rgyud): dang phyir ro// ji don gnyis kun ga da byar nayang dag rdzob bden pa yin// lhag bcas lhag med gang yin/ rlung de mug ma dang cas te lus 'od das 'chos srung dang bas lhan med do dang // mtha' gang yin ni zhing gzhi nga snying po mgo gis can par mi 'gyur ba gnas so// la rnam par
19b1(rnying rgyud): tsha ni ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ bsnyed nongs pa la mnyam par bkod pa'o// brda bldan pa 'ongs bu'i no ri ma ni gdul byal snang ba'i dbang du byas 'chos kyul/ khengs sur zhengs nasas brgyal snang gang ga zol ba'i dbang du byas na sug sungs yongs sur krol / gro rim par du gnas pa la/ 'o
19b2(rnying rgyud): gsum du phye ba las sngan sngam// rgyu yinal kyi ma phyi ma 'bras bur snga phyir snang ba dang // longs su'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ tshul ni longs srul nyid 'dzin gyis 'jug pas byo'o// phru gapung thugs pas gang yin na sku so/ sems cad kyi lus na mgang po po dag sa 'dres nas// suM yi gzi brjid
19b3(rnying rgyud): nam par mdzad/ bstan kr-I / kri ya dang yo ga dang u pa ya'o// longs sku rtag pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi// chen po'i sku/ gsal ba'i ngo bo nyid do// ting 'dzin cha la mi rtag pa ma yin pa dang // ring bzhin 'od gsal rtag pa yang ma yin pa ni longs su rang bzhin ci 'od gsal zhing stong pas
19b4(rnying rgyud): rtags/ min// longs su de'ini/ ngo bos snang bas mi rtag pa yang min no// longs sku ye shes sgyu mar bde/ de ltar na chos nyir lngas longs su bshad pa'o// lus kyi cha nas ye shes sgyu ma tsam gyi skur grub nas gnas pa ting 'dzin gyi cha nas ting 'dzin bde chen gyi lus so// / gsum ba phrul gru ni
19b5(rnying rgyud): mkha' go sgyu ma bde la chos nyer wa las dang po sbrul bu'i gzhi ni byang grub pa'i ye shes so// nan ta na ye shes sbrul sku'i gzhi// ring bzhin rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur/ chu bo chen po lta bu lam 'gags par 'byung ba'o// zhes pa'o// mtshan nyid gsum dang gyur na/ kun brtags ni gzung 'dzin gnyis dang ma
19b6(rnying rgyud): bral ba yin la sbrul su gzung 'dzin gyis ni skar btags pa ltang snang bas// kun brtags mtshan nyid dag dang sbyar/ srul bu'i bzhugs gnas ming gi// bye bo phrag brgya'i gling la gang lagang 'dul du 'jug/ lnga ba 'khor/ rnam pa bzhi yi 'khor dang ldan/ byang bub sem da pa'i 'khor dang /
19b7(rnying rgyud): 'phags pa dgra bcom pa dang / dbang po'i rnon po dang / spangs gso dge bsnyen gyi'o// byang chub sems dpa' nis gsum pa nas dang ngo'i bar ro// dgrang com pa ni rgun lugs dang 'bras bu thob pa'o// dbang po rnon po ni mun zhugs dang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o// skyabs gsol dge bsnyen ni 'phags pa'i zhal nathong ba
20a1(rnying rgyud): srin sde brgyad do// yang na dge slong po mo gtes dge bsnyen po mo gnyis kyang rnyed// stong gsum 'dul ba'i zhing gling bzhil 'khor los srung ba'i drangos mnga' mdzad/ stong gsum la ba rgya byin gyis mnga' mdzad/ stong gsum chen po la thag thub bo// du sdang /
20a2(rnying rgyud): spyil klu'i chos sku rdo rje dbyings/ te kun rig go// spel pa'i longs sku shAkya thub// sprul pa'i sbrul sru thub pa drug/ suM dang gsung thugs rnam pa dgu/ ni srul bu'i chos su ni k+Shan rig/ gsung mdo rje/ thugs mnyam nyid kyi ye shes so// khrul spu'i longs sra hAg dug/
20a3(rnying rgyud): gsung tsun pa/ thugs sa song rtogs pa'i ye shes so// thung sung yul smra thub pa drug/ gsung ni 'dul ba/ thigs bya banan tan ye shes so// gang bri ngol phreng sa// 'gro ba drug gi ngo la snang / mtshan nyid ni/ spri madra ltar spang ba'i mtshan nyid can/ bdedan nyi las/ sr-i ni rdzob bden pa'i
20a4(rnying rgyud): bdag nyid che// lkog med ma yin phung po lhag ma can/ yin no// sbrul bu'i mtha' ji tsam yin na// stong gsum 'jig rten mtha' la thug/ sprul pa'i drangs tshad ni grangs med pa'am 'gyed/ go ri ma ni gangal bya las gzigs nas chos bu longs su them thal du'o// tha ma
20a5(rnying rgyud): yin te dang por 'byung / gang bag las krol na dang por srul phung grol lo// gyu'azas ni sbal bu'i phrugasu po// snga ma rgyal phyi ma 'bras/ tshul ji ltar 'jug/ bsod nams gi tshogs dang ye shes gyi tshogs kyi tshul gyis 'jug/ sgo gsung thugs las gsung yin te/ gang /
20a6(rnying rgyud): dbyangs yan pagatug cu'i sgra nas chos ston pa/ dang ldan// bston pa'i chos ni 'dul ba can thos dang rdul dang mdo sde mngon pa kyang chub sems dpa' sde snod gsum// ts+tshi n+te sbrul phra mi 'chad par 'thud pas rtag ma yin par yang bshad// s+ye 'gag byed pas mi rtag pa yang
20a7(rnying rgyud): de/ la/ bral bu no// rdo bo stong pas rtag pa bya yang min/ thul buM'i/ las kyi snang bas mi rtag pa yang min no// mkha' 'gro rdzi ba zhes pa sbrul po'i sku yin// cos thun ma pa pa yongs su smin phra phrul ma zhin ba pas// 'gro ba mas pa
20b1(rnying rgyud): ltar snang zar mdzad pa/ ni dper na// su ma mkhas kyis nyad ma pal sogs gang ma mos pa dang 'dra bar sprul/ pa tu// da mar can tsam zur pan zung bamed pa 'ongs su ni gas ra ma' ci / rgyal gyi ni phyogs pas med pa'o// tshas dkying mjam tang / tham nga na
20b2(rnying rgyud): byed/ so sor rtod pa ma 'dres/ bya 'a grub pa ma 'chol ba ste/ ngo bo'i sgo nas phye ba'o// dang po rnar 'byor zab mo sugasum rdzogs bshad pa'o// gnas pa'i sku gsum ye shes lnga// rnal 'byor zab mo steng ga chos/ ngo bo dag nyid ga chos 'khor na rtsa dngas ma brgyad yod 'di snyed khong stong gi kyi na kyi
20b3(rnying rgyud): dngas ma mthan rkus pa'i sdang du 'dra ba brgyad yod pas gsum chos nyid kyi rtsa gcig ye shes kyi rtsa gsum dang chud kyi rtsa gcig yon tan gyi tsa'o// chos nyid kyi rtsa la 'od ser po gcigaganas/ dbyibs zlum po/ dpe'am dzul dbul bu kun ma la gzhon mar gyi zol song ba snar gnas so// chos nyid gser 'dra zlu ma po
20b4(rnying rgyud): dngul/ nying po ni// AM ste bu de yang bde ga shegs kyi snying po nyi ni su mi dad nga rgyan kyi 'jo te bya/ dang su tri ma na ni nA min gyi su ser po dbyul pa'i rmi nag po dge tu 'dod/ za 'og kur/ 8nga // ye shes kyi rtsa la ni 'od mthing ba/ gcigaganas la/ dbyengs/ khu bzhi zhags pa bsdogs pa
20b5(rnying rgyud): sbrul 'khyil pa/ 'dra/ tshul dang / le'u brgan du shel slong brgyas da snying po hUM/ ni banag mi dag can gyi lakhor so// rta'i/ sa bon a bkang po dang d+hA DI'i nathon nu sngon po ma ldang bur gnas pa yin// rang rgud kyi rtswa la ni 'od dmar thog ci nas zhing /
20b6(rnying rgyud): dbyeng / blu gas dpa 'tshu ba ga'i smig chung kwa'i kham zil bcags pa / 'dod// blangs zhun mapar gan gyi gyi spong ba ltar ro// sa bon ni mi ga kyi pre dam pod du yor du N+DI ga na so de 'i snying po u/ di ga na mi rang brgyan rje 'dod // mo
20b7(rnying rgyud): tAn pa zla 'i ni 'od dmar nag gzhi gdas la/ dading / gru gsum 'dad ldang nag gapa dun phug don te/ 'gyur me ma can do ci 'dod tshogs yod ba nga byams so// dem ni/ ba gag cid kyi byed pa'i og shal lta bu ste// blo phrug chen po'i snod meb gas
21a1(rnying rgyud): na shes mas shes yin no/ ga na pa ga sa / ma tog 'khor ba'i rgyu mig la/ pa swA// rtogs rnam na yang/ 'brag sum mya ngan 'das/ ma
21a2(rnying rgyud): la shi med na so// so/ kun gzhi yig la yid kyi rnas pa shes pa dang nyon ngas spyong mongs ca kyi yi sgo ma la dzin pan so// shes sa na bas so// ser mthing dmar dang nag la gnas/ 'ong/ ser po la chu 'ad na
21a3(rnying rgyud): la'o// mthing ga ya sbubs/ khyi dngas man+t+ra'o// 'od dmar po la khrug shi dngas ma la dam+med nagi sgo lnga'i dang mthu'o// ma dang thugs dang zag dang / sgo sda rtsa'i dngas ma'od yin pas de'u du // de dag dngas ma gang yin la// rab tu rgyu bar byed pa'o// 'od ser po ba na mig rdzi gnas
21a4(rnying rgyud): de bzhin du/ mthing ga pi a sr-i gnyis dmar po'i ze huganyis dmar nag la ni de rnams kyi gyon yon tan gnas so// zhes bstan no// 'od bzhi'i dag ba na yi ge drug/ skyon dang yon tan gnas pa la// yi ge gnyis gnyis gnas pa yang / a dang TIg zhis dbugs kyi snyigs ma la chu'o// su Sh+Ti ga nyis ma'i phre'u danyis
21a5(rnying rgyud): kha gi/ snyigs ma gsum la rgyu bar byed// rkoTa'i rnam shes dang gon nongs pa can gyi yid/ sa bon rje dang dra/ 'di skar gnas padi/ rigs dus thams cad pa rab kyang thuganas so// de 'phags pa'i rkyen gyis gra rigs so// 'gro ba drug tu skye ba yi// kha zin rnam shes sa bon lal// de pang lha mi ga
21a6(rnying rgyud): rgyaba'i ba'in mi kyi rnam shes kyis byas nas so son ma dang nr-il logs so// yi dag b+ha'i ni kun gzhi'i rnam shes/ byol pong dmyal ba nis bon zed / las rnams sogs par byed pa'o// rigs drug kun la rang rgud gnas// brgyang ngabu de ltar rtsa'i dngas marba thad mus pa'i dngas ma 'dra bab ca pod pa rjes
21a7(rnying rgyud): zad// de'i kyi thagasug pa shi gapal rgya sa mo// de yang ni da das sa nga/ bdang / kyi dag 'a bal/ dkyi de phrug pa sa gci yo pa/ de tho ba ni sa cis pa da/ kyai brad / des pad ni da sa mtsha thog 'a'ad 'a ba bya'o// de sa dbu
21b1(rnying rgyud): dang nas mnan ma dnga'i drangs pas chug/ rtswa dang khrag dbugs kyi// dngas mchen po gsum du gnas/ de yi dkyil na dbug kyi ngas sa de pa 'od 'do myogs pa gsheg nas so// de 'ang ba'i ma dang shAr gyi thung nga chu'idas thamatsha phyog pa'i thab tsang/ de
21b2(rnying rgyud): dang sa sa sa ngasha da pa'ing tsang/ dbyag kyi ma su per ba 'onan yod pa'i mas ca/ rnams 'di mas nga gi rko pa dang 'od bu la nas gnas po/ dngas ma wa// 'od du 'tshal bar gnas pa yin/ da/ de yi dkyil na bzhugs pa ni// thig le chen po kyang
21b3(rnying rgyud): rme ba ses// gsen zhun yo du kyi la na mid la byeng chu benas thugs pa ni dpe se gun ma'i bu bu'i nang nor par rje na bcug pa 'am/ rang+gA 'i zhe da sa dgas pa 'jug bdon nyim ga pa'i kyi nga 'or dang bar bcugs 'o// de khyo shing rtsos kyid cis bye do dang pa do ra
