39a1(rnying rgyud): zhanam par martag pa tham pa zlags ma pa cang // thas gshegapas pa ba 'damams par tha bad / sa bas cas ca ga bamang bsang nabs/ ba sa ngangangs brnam ma sa
39a2(rnying rgyud): brdus sle ba spyod dado/ grub baphrul ba ni brtan par bya ba yang mdor byung ngo // del lta skur gyur pa ni/ phyag tul mngon par byang chub pa'o// cho 'phrul bzhi ni/ ting nge don gyi tshe 'phrul ni/ dbus nam snang la lum bzhes bskor ba/ shar me bgyod pa la/ dza rje sems dpa'/ rdo rgyal po// rdo rda chags pa/ rdo rje legs pas pa dang /
39a3(rnying rgyud): ba/ d+har na byung la/ rdo rje rin chen/ rdo rje gze brjed/ rdo rje rgyal mtshan/ rdo rje rnon pos bskor ba/ zlab snang ba mtha' las la rdo rje chos/ rdo rje srab/ rdo rje rnon po// rdo rje bzhad pa bzhis btor ba/ byang don yod grub pa la/ rdo rje las/ rdo rje bsrung ba/ rdo rje gnod sbyin/ rdo rje khu tshur kyis bskor ba'o// byin gyis ba
39a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i cho 'phrul ni/ de dag rkyen can du byin brlab pa'o// dbang 'phrar ba'i tshe 'phrul ni/ de dag/ sku dang ye shes gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin ldan pa'o// mchod pa'i cho 'phrul ni/ phyag mchod bstod pa bya'o// bdag dang lha gnyis ldan dang grogs por blta ba'o// spro bsdus bsgom pa'i sru rugs la// ting
39a5(rnying rgyud): 'dzin byen rlabs dbang bslar mchod// mngon byang lnga dang cho 'phrul ba zhi/ gnams/ bsgom zhing mchod par bya ba yis// bsod rnams yong lam mthod nam tha pas// bsod nams ldan gyir rdzas kyis mchod ba bya ba yin// rab sa/ pa thag po
39a6(rnying rgyud): bAkod pa ra rnaMs gas da gnas pa ni// 'dra' ba'i dru na/ m-i cha drug g+has sangs rgyas pa'o// !/ b+hang lta tshol brgya pa'i dus su 'di/ drang pa blangs drang ma hA yo gwa'i rgyan bdun yung de yang rjud pa da dgos pa'o// rten dang / glang ba sang ba 'thang su dang gas sangs
39a7(rnying rgyud): tshul/ desal pa/ kyis 'ashad mthA thug nga ni bzhi batshu sa bshad pa'i tshul/ rdza ba dpa kyi shi bya ba'i rnam pa gapa gang zag sdong/ ma/ bden par dgongs par shes par bya/ da ga sa ya sa cheg ya @
39b1(rnying rgyud): grod bas das susas mnan rnams cad du thas pan thos byasagleng bsrang ba 'i grangs ldan/ byas pa da / ud 'di mang na ca zhig yin/ ma / rgyud 'dres zhag dan du mdzad ba na ga bas
39b2(rnying rgyud): nga/ byed pa po'i ston pa su zhig ma nga mamasapa yin/ 9rmad 'di'i yang tshad ja lta ba/ dgos pa ci zhig yod par shes/ dang thu nyis slo byang // sangs rgyas kun kya dgod
39b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i rgyung/ mna? srog sris rigs pa'i nyon pa gang gis gsungs pa da ga ma par// zhe 'ang na la mags par/ dug la'i skye bo 'dul slad du/ ston pa gzhi gagis gzungs pa/ kun bzang rigs lnga rgyal bas gsungs// chog/ kun gyi 'ang tshad ning bang dang kyil 'kha la sogs pa 'dzeg dang /
39b4(rnying rgyud): du yod pa dpa/ srin las rnam pana'i rjed dumatha ma pas sogs pa gang len kyar ro// 'didan gyur ba dadapar// de bzhin le'u sde dang // rim par phye dang dum bu'o/ sa pa/ thA nA mdza shad ma thub dang mchog ga sa thag nyid bslab phyir dgas/ !sa sa sa
39b5(rnying rgyud): bzhil gtes te/ chags pa can dang / chags pa dang thal ba'o// chags pa dang bral ba sangs rgya ba'i tshug pa ni ni/ chu dma'i las kyis sangs rgyas so// gnyis ba the gzhi lo gus ni rab tu byung bas sangs rgyas so// gsum pa des tshig ni 'dul ba'i sdom pagrangs pa'o// bzhi bcuni 'bas bus ngas rgyas 'dod do// 'o na gas sngags mi b+hA
39b6(rnying rgyud): gyis nad shos na/ sang rgyas tshul gnyis bkod nas 'gas mtshan te na nyesar byed pa'o// 'chags pa dang cas par sangs rgyas tshul banin chud ka'i bas rigs sngasangs rgyas/ gleng gzhini rigs lhag cig tu byung ba/ deng cog rdo rjel sogs pa bzung ba'o// kuni theg pas sogs pa rtsod pa do// dadi sngags kyi sangs kyang so// ming
39b7(rnying rgyud): rgyab yi tshul bzhi ste// rgyud dang gleng gzhi nges tshig rgya// mi lha rab byung rigs lnga dang // 'dul sdom theg pa spangs ma spangs// rgyas bshad mtha' ni rnam pa drug/ don gyi mtha' la garten pa drang do gnyis/ tshig gi mtha' pa brtan pa dgong sa bag
40a1(rnying rgyud): can nyis/ sog ngan zhes ka mthar pa gan pa thang bshed pa dang byung zhen ma man 'o// drang skal das sras te bka pas sa/ blan mang sa dang sathub dang ba sa canam la dag bal bathad des/ yang dag pa dan ston paras dan // dgas pa dngas thab ma chog bu nga ba mtha pa' dad pal
40a2(rnying rgyud): dag brjo ga// jig sa ma ca pa gnapas// sun ma dang pa gangs par ma satha~M / da pa shas pa / da ladwags pa brjed pa 'das pa'o/ thab ga ga pa ba/ 'ad bas tsam-ig ga yongs su rdzo ldan dab
40a3(rnying rgyud): pa dang / ye shes gsum gyi rkang pa yong bkun brtags ma yin pas rnam par btags pa'i steng po yod pas sbas pa'o// ma bar thag 'od gas la zung 'jug gshes so/ don nges don dgongs pas bshad/ 'ga' ba'i tshig gis dang po nan pa rnams la dgongs te ston te/ reg pa rloms pa rnams kyi dargyal bcag pani
40a4(rnying rgyud): ro// dbang ba sran pa lags pa par gsungs pa dgangs min / tho gyi ngon nyi da mams rang bzhin gyis 'od gas bang 'bor 'das dbyer med du 'dug par bye/ 'di ga nyis chog gi mtha' pa brten no// dgongs men sgra ni ji bzhin pa/ rlung gi sras ston pa te/ dkyil 'khor dang bzod pa dang gtong ma dang / gyung bar
40a5(rnying rgyud): ma thang sna bzhin du bstan pa'o// srag zhan gyis sbron bya/ ji bzhin ma yin nyid du bshad/ de ga rten bstan chos la med pa'i slad pazhi na gshegs pa'i dgongs pas bstan pa'o// 'di ga sa chogadang ga ka' mtho'o// // bshad pa'i tshul bzhi khyed la bstan// tshig skyer sbas dang
40a6(rnying rgyud): mthar thug len/ nyan bshad dbye ba rnam pa gnyis// tshogs/ rmogs par bgad pa dang slob sa la bgang par// dang yod wa te/ phra'i bzhin pa/ dgos min/ drang d+ho/ mi 'don/ byi don du bgang ba'o// gnyis pa la yang la/ wang bzhin ma len pades da / dgod pa bsha pa/ sbam par nga /
40a7(rnying rgyud): mam drug bshad pa'o// rgya gar nagang na gang par ngags dbang sa bskur ba la tshogs pa zer/ rang gis dbang bsla ba la slob mazer bsrung / dang slob ma dag tu 'dod/ 8// snod kyi gong zag rnam pa lnga// ut+pa la pad+ma dkar dmar dang // tsan+dan rin po che yi dpe/ 8/ war+tha
40b1(rnying rgyud): chos gsum te/ spang thams kur tsas mang thos pa dang / thang kyi 'dun pabakar zas 'dzin pa la mkhas pa dang / thang rtsalas spyan pa sngar gad cigags pang pas// ba dag / bul bas gtas/ ba ga sa pung rgya ma ba 'dzin pa gar chos mang du thos kyang danam nus pa dang / spangams tha dga'ang bram pa nang ga
40b2(rnying rgyud): bal d+ha bu'o// badz+ra dkar po lta bul chos pa'i/ 'dra yid du 'ang bkar dad pa che/ kha rog dmar bkar shes rab dang rting rje che/ nyen mo byabs 'thos nas thob the/ spang po 'dzag pa skar cig don skad cig gis brjed pa'o// so n+dan tu bu'i gang bag la chos gsum/ sdong po cung la drin bltar pos bzung lang rgyal che rtsa ba thal po da
40b3(rnying rgyud): ltar/ rtsa ba med par mang du smra/ dug srul yod pas blang mi nus pa ltar/ rjes su gzung bar mi nus so// rat+na lta bu la chos bzhi/ rang bzhin dag pa ltar dam tshig dag/ gzhan don byed pa ltar 'dzin sa mkhas/ ci 'dod 'byung ba ltar shes rab ldan/ nor bu don byed pa ltar/ chos thos nas legs par ston pa'o// bde
40b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i dgongs pa rnam pa gnyis/ ni bskyed rim g+ha sras kun rdzob kyi bden pa yin la tshogs de ma 'od gsal don dam mo// kun rdzob don dam bshad par bgyi/ la rbAd ma hA yogs blol dbye'o// !/ lung a nr-i yo ga ri che ba ni// lung rnams kun gyi ba cud 'byin pa/ yin pas tshe// theg rje
40b5(rnying rgyud): chos kyi sdong po nyid/ yin pas naH// bsgrub pa'i byams cad kyi yang snying yin ngas na che/ bus gsasasangs rgyas kun gyi la ra yin pas che/ bsrung ba chen po lung bdun yod pas che ni ba gcig gi che// lung chen bdun gnyis gcig tu dr-i la/ nas ston 'o/ !/ snang srid ye sangs
40b6(rnying rgyud): rgyas pa blta ba'i lung / na gyinang ga chos thams pad lus dag se dgasum du 'dus/ de dpa pa rten pa'i sugasang thugs su 'dres/ de ye shes ma yin no// lha sku phyag rgyar gsel ba bskyed dam lunga?/ ni gdus bya'i khro gang mos su brtsed pa ste/ gdul ze ma thu ba dang / gdul dka' bar phyir ro// bzlas brjod
40b7(rnying rgyud): baljon pa 'bul ba sngags kyi lung / nin pa'i bsnyen pani byas gnyis pa dgongs pa dang thab dang ngag gnyis pa dag sa pa 'gas su la nga thobar byara'o// chos nyid yul la rol pa sbyor ba'i lung / stan lu kya shad dan kyi sum dang drang med tag ce kyi sum pa brten nas gas pa'i dbang bgrar dang 'a
41a1(rnying rgyud): da/ mam sa // zhod bcwas nas gcod pa grol ba'i lung sa ban pa la sa nas dang / 'du pa dang / shA
41a2(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo zhal zas mchod pa'i lung / bcu nga cag la ga / yang / 'a da nga bang pa bya gyun// sas/ dbang bskur yangs nga chu ba pa dngos thub len pa ni bslab pa chenan 'grang / ra// ba
41a3(rnying rgyud): bdas thong byor pa / nga mang das shi shang pag/ skye mad tsam du dang 'dir yang 'di skyo ba bya ma ba / bgegs chen bar chad bsrung ra ba ba bsacas cas mtshams cadang / de mngab ba sa ses ya// pa'abs
41a4(rnying rgyud): ba mtshams kyi lung // lus dag yeng slob snang ba tshogs sogs su/ gas yod pa ma ga payang bas ba bas te/ mang pa dgas zhi ba ga pa/ de ma 'ang ba da nga gtu da// slar dag gtor ba 'bral brjin rung
41a5(rnying rgyud): mas#/ mam ma @#/ mams 'al sa stsan pa 'a ga
41a6(rnying rgyud): ro// khyo bskyed rtags bsgom pa za ba'i lung // bsgom dbyangs nyams su led pa bsnyen pa'i lung / zhab brjod med sa pas sa pa de yang ba ga papa kyad da dbapa la da mas bangs byig pa
41a7(rnying rgyud): 'drad mon tshogs su 'bul ba bza' ba'i ldang / rdza pa pas tha gangs pas/ tha~M sa 'a pa 'as gangs thasasas ca / da nas shes 'a sa ga mas bang mas sa / lhag
41b1(rnying rgyud): ma ru grang sa cu na sum mos ban blang gas par tham nyes pa bya ba byer sanam thas tshas bu'i ma tha gnas par nga datha' bar 'thus pa rdzags dam bgam pas mchod dkyil 'khor bsdu ba rdzogs rim lung // rgyas par ma bshad drur tsam dang/
41b2(rnying rgyud): bye/ yang sol ba/ 'dir yang thos pa dang / slob ma theg pa dog ma ba yin pa 'dir gro ba kye nas zab po bstan pa de 'ayin zhen/ 'dir nang grangs tsam las don dngos sum bgad pas 'gal ba med do/ !// rdzogs pa 'gyur med ye nas gnas pa yin// chos nyid 'gyur med nam mkha' lta bur
41b3(rnying rgyud): che1// 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad rang gi sems nyid pa rdzogs la/ de nyid ngo po sangs rgyas la 'gyur med du gnas de chos nyid mi 'gyur ba'i dang na gnas pa'o// de'i dpe nam mkha' ga bu de/ nam mkha' dang ni rdobo nyid kyis stong zhing mi 'gyur bar gnas pa lta bu'o// snang ba ni ci stong sre pa ni na bdud rnam par dag
41b4(rnying rgyud): ma da na das 'ang ses nyid ngam dang / lta pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// khrung chen gyi shed ma da / nga thaM pe pa de/ gsung shA sa pa la bgar gon gyipa me na ngogs pa nga bye ste/ tho bas sa
41b5(rnying rgyud): dang mnam mkha' ba rdzing ba dang 'dra ba gnas so/ gshog rdzogs mkha' la lding ba 'dra/ !/ sems nyid bsgom pa nang na rang gsal ba// rgya mtsho gzings kyis ma bskyod gnas pa yin/ dper na tham rtog sa pa ni rgya bache zings kyis ma brjod pa 'dral/ de bzhin sems pa
41b6(rnying rgyud): na gsal ba lta grub mtha' ngan pa'i rjes su mi 'badab bum pa nang gi mar me ltar sems nyid ma bcos rang gsal chen por bzhag la rnam tog gi rjes su mi 'brang bar bsgom ste/ nam tog khye dus su rtog pa de nyid chos nyid stong pa nyid du shes par byas la bsgom par bya ba yin no// lus dang / yid lhod rnam rtog zil gnon pa/ lus kyi
41b7(rnying rgyud): dam rtog bdeb/ ngag gi nam tog dbyangs/ ses kyi dngam tog pasgom du shes par byas na 'khor ba rang ga ma 'gyor pa mi myong ba ning dper na/ seng ge ga pa la gang thags par nags kyi pa na ga dan rnamang phrag pa dang mtshungs pa theg dam na thal gyis gnon pa'i spyod pa'o// seng ge'i skad kyis gcan gzan spag pa
42a1(rnying rgyud): dra pa snas myug na'abyu ba/ med du na dunam na du dra chun / snang na
42a2(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas pa la btsas can// nas du ma/ mdacos bshad nas klu bar the bar bya/ la mamamasanas rnamam ga ya na pa sa sa / ga she
42a3(rnying rgyud): rgyal pos dang 'dra/ shecas pa // sa sa// rang gi rgyal sring spong bar byed// de'u ma yoms shang rigs chu bo'i thun k+ta wA na mas sa sang mthong sa sa nyin // rang gi ngang chu da la 'bab dang //
42a4(rnying rgyud): ngochos kyang tsha ba me dang 'dra/ gag pa/ rdo sreg rgyab yon tam e tu 'byung ba 'dra'o// dmangs rigs rlung dang 'dra ba ste/ lengs su shes ni gtsug par byung myong drung dang 'a smra da par 'tha ba dang // bran la khyab cing yang ba nyid/ ste ba gra ga rdzogs par
42a5(rnying rgyud): drad bya// gtum po drag po gdol pa'o dgas/ man da ma ras pa'i myo cuH/ angan me ga ma / bdag gzhan drag por bsgyur bar byed/ ba pa ga ba kya / pa nga sa pa / las dang mja lal bar
42a6(rnying rgyud): blang ldar brtag/ yang pa la ga sa rdzogs tha ma sa sa pa par/ y-i/ rang bzhin dang gi tshul gshes kyis bzang // ngan pa'i las rang spod pa kun tu spangs// ras sngam dkar po lta bu la// bang tshur rdzas ltar len pa
42a7(rnying rgyud): bangs 'asasangamasasapang 'a bsha sras pa btums las so// so so ba gsag na ni cis na sa
42b1(rnying rgyud): sa kyi sra btag pa gsungs so// dad pas mi 'phangs srog lus longs spyod gtang / ngang pa btag pa ni kye dang bye brag gnyis las dang poni/ lus srog yongs thod lami chags par chos ci gtang bar// bye zag la rngaste/ dab na slob skye ba'o// des chog ni da cing bras pa'o// dbye ba gsum las/ dang drang /
42b2(rnying rgyud): dad bla ma la sgo gsum gus pa/ yid gyes pa'i dadang mi 'gyur bar nyan pa/ 'dod pa'i dad pa man ngag 'dod pa'o// yon tan ni dkar po'i chos dang phrad nas nag po las bro zlog/ gsang sngags 'khrugs nas phyir mi ldog pa dad pa brtan pa la sbyin no// bla ma'i spu la dang spro sgo gsum gus// yi dam yid ches
42b3(rnying rgyud): dam chos 'dod pa dang // mi ldog brtan po can ni 'di yi rigs/ !/ nyan pa sgra tsam kha bu ba med pa dang // brtan pa'i don zhes shing legs par rtogs pa te/ shes rab bzhis snong kyi sngon bzhi bsar te/ nyan pa'i shes rab la btsan pas sgor 'asrungs kyi skyon med pa ni/ nyan
42b4(rnying rgyud): stag pa slab pa'i dus so// sdong la srubs ni bcud mi 'dzin no// bsam pa sra don dri ma med par byed/ bsam pa'i shes rab la nan tan du gyur pas skrod dri ma can gyi skyon med pa ni/ bsam pa spa don gnyis sems te/ dper na sgod dri ma can du bcud thug su mi btub pa dang 'dra'o// ngan sems spangs la nyan no//
42b5(rnying rgyud): bsgom pa nan tan spa don dug kyang 'byin/ bsgom pa'i shes rab la nan tan du gyur pas sdod dug can lta bu'i gyon spang ste/ dug can du btung thugs kyang dgos pa med pa'o// bsgom pa ni don 'ba' zhig yul du byas nas bsgom pa'o// gsang thub zhabs rdo la ldugs pa lta bu nyid// gsang ba'i shes rab
42b6(rnying rgyud): gas thub pas skrod zhabs rdol gyi gyon spang ste/ sdod zhabs rdol gyi bcad zag 'gro ba bzhin/ gsang sngags kyi man dag zab mo gas dbub par bya'o// tshig dang spyod pa dmatshig ni// ngas pa bzhi tshig la gron 'thebs med par nges/ dad pa phyongs med par des/ spyod pa thar ltod med par nges/ dam tshig la khu
42b7(rnying rgyud): 'og me pa pa te/ rigs pa ga pa nga rnams tshe ba gang bas dag ba na/ dang ldan pa ste/ 4/ ji ltar sa gzhig shin po las// dngos grub mo tog srin pa'i gzhi/ da deg bu ni par nas gzhig shi pa pas yon pa sbed pa dang sa par ba sa gni gas pa de yangan pa
43a1(rnying rgyud): mam pa dang ba bzhapa thas kya saca zas bu sanapa kyang ba// dbangs sapa tha gas rabadang drad pa sa gzhing bang pas dbang byababadags pan tababs dngas bu ba rnam ta kya rtag byed pa // slob ma gro yang rnam pa brkyang / gang
43a2(rnying rgyud): rlos pa dang bcan ni zhing sa dnga'ang te yon tan thams cad kyi ba'i gzhi dang 'bras bu min par byed pa dang / gnyis pa brtson 'dus dang rngan pa ning co 'brus tu ga dang 'dra ste dag pa'i chos rad med pa 'phrul ba dang rtags pami nyams kya dang can byed pa rdzogs su 'gyur 'o// gsum pa thos zas dang ldan pa ni mos sus khyo sa dag de ga
43a3(rnying rgyud): khyeng du nga 'du
43a4(rnying rgyud): gang / mos gus byas pa de byin thangs po'i thun ta bur 'byung ba 'ongs tan gyis par tshad ni 'thung ba dang / bzhi pa btang po ldan pas gtong po dag nyer gtang dang dra ste/ tha ma drin lan kyad du 'i gsod cing rang gi yongs myod don can du song ba dang / lba dang nyung dang ldan pa dang drung pam dang 'ang gyin don
43a5(rnying rgyud): ma'i dbus par gnas pa dang / drug pa rigs rgyud dang ldan pas rigs tud kyal ba lta bu de/ bya ba dman pa'i chal mi 'dug cing tsha ba dang ldan pa'i spyod pas gzhan zil gyis gnon pa dang / bdun pa btul phong dang ldan pas btul phod seng ge dang dra ste lta ba ngan pa thams cad zil gyis gnon cing zab to'i chos sreg du med pa ste/
43a6(rnying rgyud): dag pa yang nyam dngag tsha med pa dang / brkyang bgyir mi ldog pa ni/ phyir mi ldog pa rgya mchor rdo bskur ba lta bu ste man ngag gi don la des shes gyes nas the tshom yid gnyis med par su gsum gyis dgongs pa mthar phyin par byed pa'o// dad pa'i zhi sa brtson 'grus lhag/ mos gus rjed rdong gtong phod gnyer
43a7(rnying rgyud): rgyud rigs kya brtu laM phod ldan// phyir mi ldog par gnas pa'/ !/ bkud ldan de la gdams ngag sbyin/ slob ma'i blo shes rab bya ba de la tham la nges pa'i lung dpal yang dag/ bsgrub pa'i lung bdun so gor nyar bstan par bya'o/ 3/ btsud gang gi kyi
43a8(rnying rgyud): te drug rngan te/ dang po bla ma dam nga brdung ba dang ldan pa bkra shi kyin drabs nye ba dang / gnyis pa gdams dag zab pa dang ldan pas kyang gro bar phra la 'bra du mur ba/ gsum pa shes rab dang ldan pa pa/ zab mo'i don la thogs pa med cing gdul bya'i blo chod la mnges pa dang / bzhi ba bang ba phur dang ldad pas lus dag yi gsun gyi rtog pa pa
43b1(rnying rgyud): tha dang dug sa dus bu smin pa gzhi byur ba dang / thas kying rab sa dang nangs pa sa rkyen byas rlab par dus gang sag brdung bar chang ba dang / drug pa nying dang ldan pas yang ga pa'adza ston cing sems can bya nal bya ba med pa lama' 'dug pa gang bag ge 'dras bya bar byan par byang byung // maldan pa
43b2(rnying rgyud): medadang cang dus/ gangamam dab jug capa // shes sacad da ma ngabasan/ yang nga shi nung byang / thaM nga yi ru pa da/ ze yin momed do// des cang ga mtha pa ta pa das ma/ dzad gdams dge shas
43b3(rnying rgyud): rab rjed// dbang bskod byin rlabs hUM dze ldan// blo zhen pa sa gang gra ma sa bya shes rang rdung ba yis/ ngas 'das sa/ la dang // bslabs kyang sla mangs kyang 'thub par mi 'ja
43b4(rnying rgyud): te// 'phung bar byed ston da pa/ gnyis ka mang sa bang bsreg pas na// debs gzhan du bstan pa maMn/ ting tha~M dag sa pa ma/ gdapa gas dzin/ mi khyod pa rgyang rji dre pa pa dang po pa cam
43b5(rnying rgyud): gti mug cam tshang gnyid logs// / 'dod chags 'dzi bung par bsa'as pa cam nga da la na ci kyi ma se c-i da // zhesang gis nem lus gsad/ bye ga sa @
43b6(rnying rgyud): sa zheb rgya mas nga dgapa ma ga ga thong do// ngargyal ri bos kun ma ning cing / dathas nga yang ba ha pa da nga gang yin yi pa go bsheg pa/ phrag dog gzhar po shong bar bya/ zas nga yo ma 'i sa
43b7(rnying rgyud): te/ kye migs pa bang ma rnams 'than dogs go sa gyur ban sa sa yang blang ba nga // drug sde'i spyod pa med byung chos/ drag lam dgas gyi spod pa ledags sa dbang da ca bu tsha// chos nyid bcos spang bral ba la/
44a1(rnying rgyud): rtagags sa pa dang / ma tog pa badz+ra dang mad pa lan byed kyis sems kya ma tog bas pacas ma tog pa thang shing bcos sugs yod cas pa'o// khyod kyi sems kyis gang la bcos/ sems can canaci/ sems nyid yengam gdong ma nas sang sA byas yin pa la// da gdod
44a2(rnying rgyud): gagazhazha nas/ sangs rgyas gang nas tshol/ !/ gzhan nas rnyed na sangs rgyas min/ sems nyid le gdong ma nas sangs rgyas na lam gyis bcos na sangs rgyas bcos mar song ba'o// lta sprod rnam gnyis// ma rtogs par rtsol bas 'bad nas bsgrubs kyang / 'bras pa spag su mthugs kyi/ dngos grub rnam gsum
44a3(rnying rgyud): thob mar mi 'gyur/ ro/ !/ zla mtshogs gnyis gtso bo la/ mam gyi por bsgoms ga dum ma byas pasachu bsod nam kyi tshig rdzogs/ thams gsung sa ba'i gdang mang gardan ning rtogs pa mngon du sha rabs thas bu le gas bya chog rdzogs pa'i byer napa ma ta tu spo sor ba noms la mchod ba bya'o// tshogs ni rab tu
44a4(rnying rgyud): bsag par bya/ 6/ phyi la sgo 'dogs yongs su gcod/ par byed pa'i thams ni dang lus ci'i 'khor lol brten nas bum dbang bskur nus// nang du rang byung ye shes ston/ par byed pa'i bla ma dam pa ni sngags yi ge la brten nas gsang dbang bskur dus// gsang ba lhan cig skyes pa 'i ye shes ston pa'i mam dam pa
44a5(rnying rgyud): ni 'ams gsum bdud rtsil brten nas shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bslan nus/ ste// chos rnams shin tu rnam grol lton/ de kho na nyid du shin tu rnam par dag par ston pa'i bla mdam pa ni snying po chung la brten nas bde ba chen po 'dabang bsrur bar nus pa'o// tha ma'i dper bzhi'o// bla ma yon tan bdun tha ngon tadas
44a6(rnying rgyud): ldan du bstan par bya ba de/ dang bod nga ma rjes sudran pas le shes kyi sun dang ldan te/ tha ma'i gdangs pashad byin drabab kyis/ lkog zur gyi don mngon drags 'apas/ ye shes kyi kun pang bye ste ngas mnyam du thug zar nga tho nas/ dus ga da du mi nyas pa'i yon tan yod/ gnyis pam pa'i thugs sangs rgyas pan pas pangs tu rjes mdzad/
44a7(rnying rgyud): par don thos lnga thob nas/ gzugs su rnam gnyis gzhan don byed pa'i yon tan yod/ gsum pa bla ma'i gsung chos kyi phung por bzhugs pas/ chos rjes su dran pas/ bsten pa'i snying po nub pa med par smad la rang bzhin byas te/ 'khor 'das rgyang 'bras las dge sdig zhan 'byed pa'i dgos pa yod/ bzhi pa bla ma'i lba nyams sa
44b1(rnying rgyud): yin pa dag dra minangs dge du sa ngangan pas do pathar byed te/ rtsa ba pon tan thong sa rjes su blas tagazhan dag pa'i ban lag tu byung bar tan yang/ 'phatha pa'i thug sang thags dang mi ma byer med pas/ yid ma rjes sarlan pas/ nyabam par drag ma rtogs par sadam sar na nas byas ba ga pa
44b2(rnying rgyud): mas pang ba dan mod/ bdapa pad pag gas bdam par thog sa pas/ sa'ang yongasas danapas/ leg pabar yong ma' cas nab dang 'a dang/ mamathem par tha dang gtan ma pa' zin/ 'azab nye bar dra ba pa rmongs sa 'ab dang / bangs bsngo pa
44b3(rnying rgyud): somapa shes drab ba med pa ngon na don/ na pa ba tho'agang dadadas pan ca pabyong ga sa das/ byin shib ma dang yang na chapa 'dug dpang dab bshegs pabs dad 'dram pa bdang brgya gdang ma banatad padang / bad pa rtson pa dang / bang ba da mi
44b4(rnying rgyud): na pa langs padang sa/ shA na nga ci pagapa nga / sa 'dus/ dang pos ta / sas sam ma dang sa nam/ thas yangan/ dpa ma ga da ba dab dang sagasum shes sa sa ga ga babs da/ dga' na 'dun nga
44b5(rnying rgyud): sa/ da/ ngamab na thags du / babs nas ci da so na pags sa dpas/ rnam pa sa gas sumathu ma da nga rtses 'ang / ngam tha'adasasal ba da sa/ de sapa nga sa

45a2(rnying rgyud): rjod ngan/ yid ma 'du bab nye ga ma 'a sa ba zung ma 'dom me byung // pad+ma bung bskal ba dang / bang la grang rtsod kyang thal bas su drag gis dogs pa thib ma la rjod pa dang nga brjod pan yin/ thang ba gshadanapa 'ang kyang drang yo pa rlos pa ga re sa nas gang ngas da ga ba
45a3(rnying rgyud): g.yag be zag pas sbrel 'dra ba/ 8/ ga ga gi ba da pa dang pabe da chung ba gnyis drag gcig pa sles bas ga sag pa 'i ga la ba'i ba yang ga yang la lung bstar/ skyo ma ma nyam pa thod pa ma nyams pa la sa shad do// bun nang mar me phyir mi dbyung / drang gser gyi nga nang na ma da
45a4(rnying rgyud): da bar/ des bar byed rung gas phreng bzhin/ tha 'i bags kyis ga ma mid pa ba byer mthung brjod pand dang do sugs kyi ra sa so// zhes gsungs so// he ru ka'i gal po gas/ grub pa ma stod ldan ma ldan gyi ston yon bsan pa
45a5(rnying rgyud): rtag pa gsum pa'o// / de nas rnal te byar gyi dbang phyug chen po rnams ga'ad mchog gis gzung bar bya ba'i phyi nga ma tshig gsang ba mchog 'di dag sngags rgya 'a drag sus pa/ pas ga papa nges te/
45a6(rnying rgyud): ca nga lung du sbrel ba 'du 'byor de sade/ de ya gzung nga/ yige slong pami ga bla 'dag pa'i// nab rtsod da drib// des pas dang / rtsos dmang bad pa'i nyid nga med do pa kyi tho mi 'din/ sras grang pa ba ma po do dpa la yin pa/ des tan mthong sa min bya ra// gdamang

45b1(rnying rgyud): dragang ga drug tumatshan ma 'dam par nga gas pang / gas tham nam can ma med pa bang sa las kyang mgazos te/ mams padabang ni as med pa na/ bas cam sa yapa da rnams pa dang / desang sa rgyas da cos mams dad pa spong bdang / sangasas dpa gang bad 'a bo ba/ ra ni
45b2(rnying rgyud): gnas pas na nab byor zhes pa'o// mahA lo ga rig zung shes de// rnam byor zhes pa zhes babs// zhes 'byung ste/ yab sum thabs shes gnyis su med pa'i don gyis rnamam pa/ thugasung thags kyi che ba'i yon tan khyor pa chog/ phan sum chogs par dbyang sa rnal 'byor zhes bya'o// yadu yog de/ dbying nalam pa 'i she
45b3(rnying rgyud): rnapa byor zhes bya'o// ya ti gzung gis ni/ rba bsems dang sems la spang ba chos thams cad/ dgazod pam kyis ma bsgrubs/ gnyen pos ma bcos/ yenas mnyan ting rdzogs pa chen po// phru gsung thugs su sangs rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor se nga ba den medag pa de ni/ sus kyang sa bco don gyi rnapa ma yin pa/ de ni ya me
45b4(rnying rgyud): maso ma chos thams cad la 'byor ba'am/ sangs rgyas dang sems can/ chos thams cad de lta bu'i rang bzhin du 'byor te gnas pas rnal 'byor ro// dbang phrag ni/ 'jig rten pa'i 'dod yon bya ba rnams yod cing bdog pa la ni dbang zhes bya ba/ sug ni sdug po sangs cha sa yin/ ser pa med pa ta ba ste/ 'dod pang yo na
45b5(rnying rgyud): mthogs pa dgams/ rang mad pa blang pa nyid dmas can sa das bang mtshan pa nga ba za nga/ nyid byeng ngas bag pa na pa/ dab na pags kyi tha ba // sdum pa yin dmachog dang / dam mang 'dung bdur pa byed pa ni thobs
45b6(rnying rgyud): 'dus blta ba'i/ rang byung 'das pa 'dral ngo'o// ru ba'idam tshig ni lug sung thugs so// yan lagagin/ dang blang ba sa dang / smad bu zhes pal/ badra bathu / mi spang brjo'o// gtsang dang 'jigs pa'i brtul grags can/ gang band pa nog rnams bgrangs dngas dag yid gsus pa las
45b7(rnying rgyud): 'ang yang sa sa/ da/ nyangs tsud da/ ma mams satan da ga na // de gags pa nas nyams su byung / dag
46a1(rnying rgyud): mthas dang / bcwa pa bang kyi gnasasas sa/ dam pas/ nam sa/ sanyams das tsa/ bang dag pa' pas/ sa/ lags pa shA gyus pas// thabs dang shes rapa lam pa'o//
46a2(rnying rgyud): chen po dang / shes rab stong pa gnyis ni/ thabs lam le shes pa dgongs pa dang shes rabasus la bde ba gnas thabs gtan la dbab par bya'o// de yang babs snying de lon me shes yin/ shes rab stong pa kho na ling sngags yin par 'dod par// 'dig des nyams med gyi bzhina'i sra ba bzhir bstan pa'o// 'dren pa
46a3(rnying rgyud): nga sben bla ma lta/ mab gsam pa/ brjed pa'i dbar po ni/ dang po dang bdag par yod palas dang ba byed po sapa 'a' bas// gas sa dpang bcug/ dang chog dang gajog pa dang // nyams pa rkang ba na/ chogs kyim bdapa kyi ma thogs tshad gzung bzhi nga' la bangs/ la da
46a4(rnying rgyud): nim pa rgongs shing mor chung bar byas pa'o// shes chung smin par byed pa sapa dpon ni/ gas pa'i thud bshad/ chos dang spyi'i mtshan nyid kyis zung srin par byed pa'o// de gsam gyis lus dag yid gsum snyam par byas pa ste/ sngon zhing tha ba las yal ga skye ba lta bu ste/ bla ma'i sgra la bya'o// lus ngag yid lAm rtsa pa'i
46a5(rnying rgyud): nye ring dge ba'i mazed rnams ni// sdum par byed pa lus la panra/ lba da pa cig ma ched ga su mni/ nyebang babyed/ ring ba'i/ dag pa'i 'tshang // dang po la gas te/ 'dres pa'i mtshang bdang 'asres/ rnas pa zhes/ chos bsres te ga srog tu mnyan nas tshogs bzod tan la/
46a6(rnying rgyud): pa'idi/ ben pa'i dor brags par rjes ci/ nya yi da chogs rten cig tu mthus pa 'o/ 'ang bcad de/ bye brad nam ga ma byas sa skang thugs rnam so// dge ba'i mdzad ni/ dge ba ched kyi mas sa bsdang ba yan pa de// chos phyogs sa la btam tshang / dpesas pasu mjugs dngegs pang
46a7(rnying rgyud): na/ bla do/ rtsa ba'i ga dang bsku tho bas dang bzlas pa gas po gsung / gsheg/ sa dag nag yang/ ba la sag/ sam yang sogs so// zug
46b1(rnying rgyud): sa zug tu ca pas// 'dugasam can san ya chog pa na sa/ rnams das sas sa ma sa sang /
46b2(rnying rgyud): chos kyi sdug tu gzung // blad mas sa la kAtsamanas sarnapa/ 'a sa pa / des ka 'ong mams / bad pa gangs/ don
46b3(rnying rgyud): dun tug /
46b4(rnying rgyud): sa na
46b5(rnying rgyud): gas mas dzin// sngag nam pa nga/ bad pa tha gas rnam paban ma ga
46b6(rnying rgyud):  na su ma sa
47a1(rnying rgyud): sa gas gams gsad/ gas du ma nas ma ga / dben slob tham gsung ba / du spyod gsog bdang/
47a2(rnying rgyud): gdasas gagasang bar gtung ya gad/ sa gapa da sa ga sa/ 'an lag / na pa
47a3(rnying rgyud): na sa sa sa lta ga gad ma ga shing ma
47a4(rnying rgyud): sa sadang thaMng bang grags pa //
47a5(rnying rgyud): byed pa ngongs ras pa / byed med par pa snar bar bya/ tho sno ma ngan da sa thang bdang / gabya pa pa lnga sa dang / gsasang kyang ba nga pam da pa dang / da bya pas 'a padag ca sa
47a6(rnying rgyud): ga ni masbyin byung / pa ba da ba/ sas // rdzun gyis bas cad zla bar byudas dang
47a7(rnying rgyud): nga cig gis ni yang ba ma sa sa na ca sa mam ma pa mthags/ kun du tud pa
47b1(rnying rgyud): dun ra lus 'byung ba 'a'i gzhal yas khang du shes par byas la nam shes ye shes lnga las rigs sngar shes par bya/ sems nyid sangs rgyas su shes par bya ba ni dam chog gi nyon mongs pa thab le shes sngang shes par bya'o// shes par bya ba rab tu gcas/ theg pa'i sangs rgyas mang po yang // rigs lngar shes
47b2(rnying rgyud): bslab par bya'o// gas chags kyi nang gi chos ma lus pa ni/ sangs rgyas rgyal ba rigs lnga'i rang bzhin las ma g.yos par gnas pas/ rigs bdag gang gis sangs rgyas gang gi dbul mtshan pa shes par byas nas/ phra gsung thugs kyi dngos bu ba rnams bslab par bya'o// nyon mongs pa lnga ye shes sdar shes pa na
47b3(rnying rgyud): nyon mongs spangs nas byang bsrub med// de phyir spang bar bya ba min/ gtsang bar bsrung ba dus kyi rgyan/ sapas ni sug da shes me pa pa 'ang sngags pacad mag mal so / nad ma pa
47b4(rnying rgyud): nyin gsum mtshan gsum chom bzlas so// nyin zhag rgyan la bsgom par bya// lus dang ngag yid dag gis ni// bsrub cing dang du blangs te bsrung / 88/ lus kyi sgo nas bla ma dang mched lam la zhabs tog bya ba dang / ngag gi sgo nas bzlas pa dang mchod pa gru ba dang / yid kyi sgo nas yi sa kyi brko
47b5(rnying rgyud): rang pag co che yang / sum dag 'i dag ma gyis rtsa ba'i gsum dang yan lag gi nyi shu tu lnga dang du bdas la bzung ngo // mi bsrung 'jigs pa'i las byed pa/ nyams pa'i rgya ning ma tshig mi bsung rdordo rje dmyal bar byebs ririgs pa'i las so// sems kyis mamed pas na dung na sems kyis gnod pa rgyal ba dang / dbya sems kyi ga
47b6(rnying rgyud): zhe'ardzas pa che chung zas par brtab/ gnod sems kyis gral la zag dog pa'o// ngan sems dpya' sems gnod sems dang / ngag gis// ngan du spu dang bkrong shing gi zer ba 'khu ba dang / sde gnyis su zhing gas shan byed pa/ rdzas kyis thus ga/ pa rdeg pa dang nor rdzas u tra dang mi dngo po pa 'phrog
47b7(rnying rgyud): las byed na/ dmadams pa'i rgyame do// byab pa yin pa byed // don dam nyams par 'gyur ba'i rgya/ yi sa gsas/ yang ba byog// rgyal po smon dmangs dkar ldang zhing // lha srin nor yal tshe yang thang / rang gas shes par bya spo dpa pa mags pa byed pa drag po nga kyi tsa
48a1(rnying rgyud): pa dang / babags pa'i chad pas nyamin da la sogs pa gno pa nga nor mal ba sogs pa nad ge 'jigs pa 'byung ngo // dug 'thung lta bur ngan song 'gro/ dper nadrag lung 'i mi nga po bde yang sathar gargod pa badra sa me tha par 'chi ba stamang mnyam sa tsho 'di bad yang gyi mang na ma nga 'thar//
48a2(rnying rgyud): yid ma nyams bskal chen gcig/ su dam tshig nyams na bskal pa gcig tung ngan song da bye ba ni/ bskal ba gcig ni mtshan nyid kyi gzhung gis/ cho lo bcu pa nas bsod nams yang 'phel bas tshe po bcud khri la thag pa la bskal cung gcig/ de nas yang mar 'grib pas tsho lo bcub la thug pa de la bskal zung gcig ste/ de 'dra nyi shul bar
48a3(rnying rgyud): brka lag si// bar bskal nyi shur snod brgyad chags/ nyi bur 'jig/ nyi shur spongs/ nyi shur gnas te/ de lta ba zung bzhi bcwa las brgyad cu yod de/ de dag la bsal chen gcig go// yang na/ dong dpag tshod gcig gi 'khor ba'i nang du/ hud 'bru'i matil gyis bkang la/ nyi ma re la til re spang bas zad pa na bskal pa gcig ces pa'o// rdo rje'i
48a4(rnying rgyud): dmyal ba ni/ shin du yang yun ring ste/ rdo rje ltar ma pa'i zag dpag tsad tsam gyi 'khor la/ de laphrag don gyi sgo yis par ma chad par byugs pas rked par chad pa la bskal chen gcig go// spu'i dam tshig phra ma dang mched lam la nyams na 'bras bung na song gsum bkal chen gcigaganas so// gsung gi dam tshig chags cag tu nyams na
48a5(rnying rgyud): bskal pa rtson po gnyis/ lung na mong du srung ngo // thugs byed pa tsheg nyams pa ni bskal pa chen po gsum du 'dod/ ra// nganang thor 'byas par// nyams ni btul te bskang ba ni/ bkang banid malas log na byar med pa/ dmalas ma 'og na tams pagaso nga brnams pa dgas sa padang ste lan mig tas pa pa/
48a6(rnying rgyud): bdang / ban gnyi nyams po bkang / banags mnyams pa pas so// rtsa ba nyams na lan gsum bsrung// yan lag/ yi pa tshig ni sems can yin pas cag nyams kun tu 'byung bas na/ rgyun tu bskang ba dang / rabya'o// tshogs kyis bskang bar bya ba dang / nyams pa bkang paganyis las/
48a7(rnying rgyud): gyis bkang ba ni/ tshogs mchod brgyal sogs pa gzung bzhin nga ba rkams nas/ za ba dang yan lag gi dam tshig nyams pa sor chud cing bskrad par bya'o// !nyams pa de nyid sor chud par bya ba ni/ chu'i nyams na rdo rje slob dpon dang mched sum la ngan sems dbu' sems shor na 'gyod pa bskyed la bzod gsor bras bgyis brnam par bya'o// sru
48b1(rnying rgyud): nyams su la bskang ba dang // gsung shing 'a/ nyams nas ngags dang phyag rgya dran cadan yang tham la 'arjod pa kyi ma yid ma thab nom cugatung cang / ting po bzlas pa'i nyams par bya zhing / gsung gi dab tsho gti ma gcig pazhin bya ba da las 'dar mi rung / spyad par bya ba'i dang chog rnga dang / dang bang ba'i dang so yona'i 'ad
48b2(rnying rgyud): mas ni/ rdzas na nyin de bzhin pa/ de yang ma nus na thab de lab/ de yang ma nus na mor lab/ lo las dang me rang ste/ log cig 'das na bsring / gnyis 'das na bskang / logs ma 'das na bkang te/ phyir ji ltar shes shing rig pa'am rtogs par byas nas/ khyad par dra ngas mchod dam bsnyen bslab zab po'i dus tad rapal
48b3(rnying rgyud): de'i dang du gyur cing nyams su cher lon par bya'o// des si d+hi rnam gnyis 'grub bar 'gyur ro// gsung nyid dag gis bskang // gsang spe la mi spel thugs la brnag/ thugs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i man ngag gzhan la spel na phyi ma mi spel bar gsang ste/ mdor na gang 'das pa de nyid sor chud par bya'o// nyin gcig bzhin na
48b4(rnying rgyud): zla ba 'am// lo re dag las mi 'da' ba// dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur ba yin/ !/ nor rdzas 'phel zhing dang ba dang // sdang dgra gnod bgegs zhi bar byed/ dam tshig 'di rnams ma nyams na rang gis phar chen mo byas kyang / tshur mchod gnas dang tha mar 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i
48b5(rnying rgyud): pa 'byung ngo // nor rdzas 'phel ba dang / rigs mud dang ba dang / gyi nang gi nor rdzas dang / dngos grub lang tha bgegs dang bar chad mi 'byung zhing bsam pa thams cad 'grub pa'o// rig 'dzin gnas su gdon mi za/ tshe 'di la bsgrub pa'i 'bras bu/ tshe phyi ma 'grub pa ni yi dam lha'i dngos gung kyang thob/ de ma thob kyang yi dam lha'i se/
48b6(rnying rgyud): 'dzin gyi gnas su gdon mi za bar gye'o// dper na sdig cad kyi rigs 'dzin pa zhig lus zhig pa yang sdig can du phye ba ltar/ sangs rgyas bsgoms pas sangs rgyas nyid 'grub pa'o// sangs rgyas sa le yang dag gnas/ 6/ de dag goms nas nyams su blang // bskyed rim mnyam par nga / zha
48b7(rnying rgyud): byas nas/ sum dbang gi mtshig la rnga ste/ dang po lanyam gzhag gi dam tshig ni/ yi ma snying bskyed rim bsgom mo// 'di ting nge 'dzin bye bar byed pa'i chu yin pas mi nyams par bsrung ngo // de yang gyi ci'i dbyibs las lha'i lur gsal bar mnyam par ga zhag pa'o// rjes spyod ngo bo nyid gsum ba lta/
49a1(rnying rgyud): khyod kyi dam tshig ni/ lta ba ngo bo nyid rnam pa gsum ste/ snang phyogs kyi ngo bo nyid yul/ stong phyogs kyi ngo bo sems/ snang stong zung 'jug gang po nyid yul sems gnyis med du grol ba'o// ting nge 'dzin dngos yin no// bza' ba'i dam chog/ bdud rtsi lnga yi ri la bu bza'/
49a2(rnying rgyud): na ci tug ched pa slar du byang sems/ bu ma/ spang rtsi la'i lu byas pa baba'a'o// ting nge 'dzin gyi grogs yin no// bsrung ba'i dam tshig ni rtsa ba dang yan lag gi/ dam tshig nyi shu rtsa brgyad bsrung / yin te rtsa ba srug sung thugs gsum/ lung byal/ thang bal/ mi sang ba / shes par byab pa/ ba
49a3(rnying rgyud): par / ting ngaban ci dag pa b.lang ba'o// mi 'bral pa'i dam chog ni/ rdo ni dril bu 'bral mi b+ha/ kordo rje nying rje 'dril bu stong pa'o// ma ti na mthun pa thogs yin na// mnyam gzhag rtsa chung tsan d+ha lI/ yang sems/ mnyam gagag gi ma chog/ gtas mo'i drung zhi da
49a4(rnying rgyud): so// 'di ni ting nge 'dzin skye ba'i rgyu yin pas bsrung ngo // nges spyod// rang byung ye shes rjes la khyad/ yin te nyon mongs rang thung ye shes so// rnam rtog rang byung ye shes/ sbrel zhi rang byung ye shes/ gsal zhing yangs par dbyung ye shes so// 'di ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos gzhi yin pas bsrung dgos so// bza' ba'i
49a5(rnying rgyud): gsal bza' bar bya ba nyid/ de 'di la bza' bar 'dogs pa ni/ lus brtas par byed cing phan 'dogs so// ting nge 'dzin gyi grogs yin no// bsung ba'i// rang byung dang 'gal ba dang dang dang 'gal ba mtha' dag bsrung / ste ting nge 'dzin gyi gegs rnams bsrung ba'o// mi 'bral ba'i dam tshig ni// zhi drag rlung
49a6(rnying rgyud): dang 'gral mi bya/ rlung zhi drag gang rung dang mi 'bral ba ste// ting nge 'dzin gyi mthun rkyen yin pas mi 'bral bar bsung dgos so// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo mnyam par gzhag/ 'di la yang lnga las/ mnyam gzhag gi dmachog/ dkyil 'khor 'khor lo ste 'khor lo bzhi bsgom par bya'o// de ni ting nge 'dzin gyi rgya yin pas
49a7(rnying rgyud): bsrung danas so// rjes spyod pa chog lhan cig gyes pa bal/ rnyedags/ mchog dag 'a/ dga' ba ba dang skan cig skyes pas lhan cig gyis so// ting badzin na mam yin pas bzung nga// bza' ba 'das mo/ bde ba dang stong ba chen po nyid/ yin te ting rjedzin gyirdzogs yin pa dang / lus gas
49b1(rnying rgyud): na / par 'gyur ba'o// zu / thig la 'dzag pa drug yang bskyad/ bdab rgyas hAg pas 'ang // gdon dang ngagacags kyi lamang/ nang gan grangasangs chu dang dongs nas/ ratham byad byas chags pa gyus te/ khamamamathun pas rang nyams te/ spang sa kya lubang marjongs 'dagan/
49b2(rnying rgyud): 'o// ga pa di 'chog/ ye shes phyag rgya'am dngos kyi thag ca dang mi 'bral/ tang ngo sem sa can dung na 'jogs papa/ ting bayo tsam thad byen yin no// ba rtson pa yangang ste// mnyam gzhag ging tshig ne rba rlabs rnam pa gsum sngo
49b3(rnying rgyud): rlabs/ ngag dzin pa zhing gagi sarlabs/ ting brji na sems kyi brlabs po// des rtsod kyi/ shin tu rnam par dag pa yi// de kho na nyid la spyad par bya/ 'ani su mthun gyi 'bras bu sgra dkar 'joms/ rnam smin gyi 'bras bu lus stobs me/ skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu sde dang bu pa dpol/ dri ma med pa'i babs
49b4(rnying rgyud): da mas te/ 'chi med par 'gyur ba'o// de ni ting nge 'dzin nas so// bza' ba 'i dmachog bde chen bde stong yin te/ bdi stong dbyer mi byed pa ste ting 'dzin gyi thogs yin te/ lus brtas par byed cing pa na 'dogs par byed pa'o/ la// bsrung ba'i/ lcib gnyis las shes sgrib pa bsrung / bzhinan
49b5(rnying rgyud): 'i bri ba nar to// kun chags so// shes kyanga'i sgrib pa nyams spyod can brgyad yin pas bsrung ngo // des ting nge 'don gyis gegs spong ba'o// mi 'bra' ba'i dam tshig ni// pad can ye shes dngos mi 'bral/ !/ badra can dngos sam ye zhes kyi phyag rgya'o// don ting po don gyi mthun rkyen no// de lan ma
49b6(rnying rgyud): nas rdzangs brtan pa'o// srang zabs ni// de dag mi nyams bsrung ba'i tshul/ la bzhi las// ji lta ba bzhin rgyud la bakhyed/ bas thos pas mi nyams par bsrung ba ni/ gong ltar bla ma'i gdams ngag mnyam par gzhag cing bsgom pa la sogs pa mnyams par nyams su zang ngo // rnam grangs rjes su
49b7(rnying rgyud): mi nyams/ ga krung di nga do la yang ste nam thangs kyi chos nyi shu yod pa bsrung ba dang // nyams khyong gang gyis mi nyams shing / nyams su myong ba gcig byis pas mi nyams par bsrung ba ni/ bsgoms pa nyams gar ba de mgor bar byag// bla ma la lus khyad par can// byi pa
50a1(rnying rgyud): lus dag yi gsum gyis tham la mos su 'dran pa byas nas rgyas gyi don las mnyams par bsrung ba// de bzhin mi nyams par bsrung ba'i tshul la// srid pa'i sdug bsngal 'dre na nyams pa// bum dbang nyi shu rtsa brgyad nyid/ na/ nyams pa bkang ba la gnyis pas/ dam bca ba tham dang /
50a2(rnying rgyud): gedang rtsi gnyi shu rtsa brgyad do// dam tshig lhag ma nyams na/ lam 'azod pa las go la ring du 'gor zheng nyams pa/ dngos grub dang las sbyor 'gor ba'o// des na da ma tshig ces bya'o// gsang dbang shes rab ye shes dang / bde ba chen po'i dbang gsum mo// de bsrung dgos pa'i 'thad pa'o// zab mo dbang gsum nyid du
50a3(rnying rgyud): gnas// nyams na bskang ba'i thabs rnams ni// dam tshig thams cad nyams pa na// rdo rje mkha' 'gro dpa bla ma'i grags bkang dgos/ 'dod yon la de rdzas dang longs spyod la sogs pa dbul la// gyi nang 'dod yon lnga yis mchod/ 8// ni rigs mkhyad par
50a4(rnying rgyud): brgyad pa dbul lo// de yang gdams pa na rnams dus la ma nyams par brkom bsgrub pa'o// mnyam gzhag dam tshig nyams par gyur na// ye shes mkha' 'gro longs su la/ mnyes dgos/ de'i thabs ni/ lta ba tshad du bltal bas bskad/ 'og mi nas 'ongs su sur dras la don la rig
50a5(rnying rgyud): wa lab yum yang drung sems bcuyin pas der shes par byas nas sems gnas par byas la sta ba la blta'o// zung 'dug gi ngo bo nyid dang / gsal zhing yangs pa rang byung gi ye shes chen po dang / shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / bde stong rnams la yang yang blta'o// rjes spyod dam tshig nyams pa na// ma mo mkha' 'gro
50a6(rnying rgyud): s+phu la spu la/ go Ti ri la sogs pa rnams mnyes dgos pas de'i thabs ni// bsgom pa tshad du bskyal bar bya/ !/ ste nyams gyon med du 'argyal lo/ bsam gtan gyi drug shes bya'i sgrib pa nyams skyon can brgyad byung na sngon med gsum gyis drug zon par bya'o// ngo bo nyid pa sdang phyogs stong phyogs gnyis ston pan/
50a7(rnying rgyud): gro srung kyis bsdus pa'o// rang thung ba nyin mongs/ nam tog/ snrel zhig sum tshon can/ bying rnon kyis bsdus so// rten cig sus dang zhi tu rnam dag la/ dga' ba dang po gsum gyis rtson can/ srid pas bsdus so// dug brgyad do// sngon med gsum gyis 'byin pa ni/ ra ba nyid la thang 'dug 'gal 'dus gyon med/
50b1(rnying rgyud): makrung gas/ ragang mags can pags pa gang ngags 'dus rgyad mad/ tus dang shi nam dag la nyan cig byas pa da dgang ga' 'dras byad pa pa na/ ra nga/ bzang ba/ mthas das sa thal ba banapa dog// dam chog bcu gnyis nyams pa mthar na/ bshang na ga
50b2(rnying rgyud): za mkha' 'gro da gro rtse zhing spong la/ dang thug mkhe bsheg pa dang bcas pa pa 'gos pa la das rdza kyis nyes par byeste/ de la/ sha khrag shi gtor ma dadu'o/ zha pa ra mamed pa ba dang / da rate cigapa dang 'arje pa dang mi 'arje ba ba nas pa cag// dam tshig mkhar 'gro rdo rje ldan da
50b3(rnying rgyud): gci pa'i med sum yin te/ thags rjes dengs stod rnams/ tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i longs spyod kyis mnyes/ bar // de bas kyi di pal ma dang ga bya ba dad pa dang rdzo thams cag nang di nyams suman pa ban dag tu ban dang ste thab pa ma dbang gi dang // brdzab pa/ khyad pa
50b4(rnying rgyud): dad tshig bdun ni le lo gnyid dang chad/ gi dang du mi tang ba dang / rdo rje thob dpon gyi/ bka' dang dam tshig bden par bya ba dang // mched dang lcam dral gyi nang du gyen ci byung yang / tshig ngan gyi mtshon ma dang mashor bar spang / ba dang dang/ rdzas la khro'i 'khu 'phrig med pa ra bya zhing dang du blang / ma dang /
50b5(rnying rgyud): yi dam gyi s+ya ma yengs dar bsgom dang rgyun tu 'dzab brten byab dang // khams gsum yongs su bsgral zhing srid gsum dbang bsdu/ ba'i bye mo yang po bdung ba dang // yang dag/ pa'i chos nyid byang chub sems las ma g.yos par bya/ ba'o// bsgrub pa'i dus su dathar bar byed mtshig
50b6(rnying rgyud): bdun po bsrung / bar bya'o/ gzhi la spong bar byed pa ni/ rma dper na yul phyogs gcig gi ldum ra'i nang du drag gi sdong po gcig skyes te// de dug tu ngom shes pas/ de la so so'i skye bo rnams kyis blangs kyi na zos pas/ zos tshad shi/ de gang gis lan brtags pas dug gis len par shes/ de yang
50b7(rnying rgyud): wang shing thams cad dug gis shing dug zer te/ drug de lo dang tha ba'i lar du spyugs so// de bzhin du nya ri'i theg pa dang / nyan dang rnams ni/ khams gsum gang sa byed pa ga nyon mongs drug gsum yi zer te/ del dgra dang shod par bltas te spong bar 'dod pa'o// skye bo ldum ra'i dug sdong 'dra// skyong bar byed pa'i
51a1(rnying rgyud): lam pa ni// 'tsho byed mkhas pa mthong ba 'ang/ te/ drag pa ldan pa nang/ da yang mdago te/ 'a bar tha gan su ma thag sa napa/ rnas pa sa spas btus ba tsag pas ca bta byang chu sa dpang bag sam sa/ so yong
51a2(rnying rgyud): ga 'jogs khyo rdzogs bsrur ba'i lam ni gsang sngags pa// bram ze rigazugs grub pa'ang/ med pa yo sa yu yong / du dpa myongs so chen pa das te/ daya gas ma yo la ti rung 'ardzogs la nga ha
51a3(rnying rgyud): nams ni/ dug gangam/ dug rdza wang/ lung mi dgos/ mtshon ma'i rnam tog thams cad/ li ya ba rigs gsum mgon po/ yul pa rigs pa ni'i las byas/ yog pa rigs pa'i sangs rgyas su bgyur bar byed do// dbang du byed pa'i lam pa ni/ ma hA anra/ ma byas zas sa mthong ba 'dra/ ste/ de rnams nga/
51a4(rnying rgyud): bas/ srang / spyang / bgyur gang yang mi byed pa ngos pas/ mi gnod par bya 'bogs su 'gyur te/ spa dang mdongs shegs ma zin pa grag pan pa bzhin du/ maH dang sa nus gang yang mi byed par/ nyan mong nyid lamang bya rnam byor tho po srid gdon rnams sa len pa'o// ga/ rang sar 'jog pa'i rdzogs chen pa// 'byung na
51a5(rnying rgyud): gtos kyis gzhi 'dra/ ste/ sa ga zhi ladug kyis kyang drang ma skyes kyang rung ste rangs 'jog pa bzhin du/ a ti mnyon mongs pa de/ lung / kyang / bslar/ dbang du yang byed mi dgos pa te/ nyon mongs skyes pas ngan tu yang med ma gus pas bzang gu yang med/ gzhig zhag rang sor rgyan po'i ltar la gdas 'ang// sems nyid
51a6(rnying rgyud): gcig gi nga nga bzhin la// theg pa'i mthong ltas bsam yas snang // mdodon chos kyi rtsubani// ye shes chen pornam sa gsal/ kha ya na mo spang ya yang / sa matsa du na da ma papa
51a7(rnying rgyud): mdu dpa dang med kyang ma rang shi mas du bu spyod kyi thob pa'i rtse/ dam ston pa'i blang la des don mo nas/ shes rdzib spang ba nas/ gdod chos bu 'dob pa/ doni theg pa ning ma don di/ rtogs pas mo gcig gis sangs pa/ rtog tho bdus mnyam pa yang yod// ngag ma ltar rtsol ba grangs me ga pa pa do
51b1(rnying rgyud): da na/ ma ma thamams cad pags pa gag pad me // da gags nas bya sas/ sems gcag sa lagasas dngas/ da'agyu mags cwo pan pa ga ma dang/ dang man ba na / thas sadapa gcagag da
51b2(rnying rgyud): tan gas/ saso / dbye ba ni bye zag bye ba du yin/ mam cad ci dang / gsal ba chen po dang / sanya nyi dang / rtog pa/ 'bra ba dang na// skyel ba zhi shes rab rgyags pa/ mas
51b3(rnying rgyud): la jogs pa/ smo pa byas da dzu do// nges pa'i tshig ni ye shes nyid/ yin te/ cir yang 'atu ba chos dkyis/ rangags papas mo thong / 'byed pa med pa mnyam nyid/ gzhanam yin pa masod/ yun gyi dus par thabathub pa'i yin pa dang 'dran no// mtshon nyid gsal ro kyir med
51b4(rnying rgyud): dengos ba rmed pa dang / glib byed smye dra/ tshogs dri sbed pa/ so sor 'dzin pa ng+geng+ga pa/ chu gyen pa rag lus skyed pa dang bdun no// dmigs pa'i yul ni 'khrul chos la/ mtshon ma la dmigs/ stod phyu la dmigs/ ched 'dzin la dmigs/ bye bgA mI zhes pa la dmigs/ sol ba la dmig snga dang bdud no/ !/ dpe ni
51b5(rnying rgyud): mgo ba la mtshon/ nam mkha sa tshon nyid skye ba bzhin/ me lo ga sla p+pa ng+ga bzhin/ na m+b+has smras khyab pa bzhin/ bang 'tshon mA rjes pa bzhin/ lces bu khyab mo shu blazhin/ 7/ sgom thabs sems ni gsal la dgongs/ sems mi gnas pa la dgongs te/ steng nyid du bAh+la ga/ rang ba ng+kagazhag/ kyog su sla med par gnas
51b6(rnying rgyud): gsalal gang du ma rtog par/ 'ab rtsos med pa gnas su dang na no/ 8/ gnyen po log par 'dzin pa la'o// la dgongs te/ da tu rlon gyi gnyen po/ smod lba/ bA da?d+ba / bye g+h+ra d+hI zhes par/ rtsol bsla med pa'i gnyen por bya bgrub ba dang bdun no/ !/ gnas 'gyur ni nyon mongs rang dgar 'dzin/
51b7(rnying rgyud): me yong / mnya /

52a5(rnying rgyud): sto byed pa rton pa la mtshan nyid/ 'gru' tshob la dmigs yul/ don mgo ba 'ad ba/ sems mi gnas pa la sgom thabs/ lag par 'dzin pa la gnyen po/ nyon mongs dang dag ngadzin pa la gnas 'byag/ phan yon mi shes pa las tog sa da'i tshen/ gnas gabs pabyed rdzog sa gnyis la sems lnga dang spang ba/ dbyed rdzogs gnyis la 'dug pa'i rim pa 'am

52a8(rnying rgyud): na/ tho byeb cu bya/ rkye gnas ma thong dungs zhi das 'o// don dam gzugs nis rje rgyag sas thong 'o// kyi bdag nyid do// de yi gtso bo rnam pa gsum/ ni// la la nA ni tha bshi pa shes rab la/ gso gas des pa de
52b1(rnying rgyud): bung ru kyi ma padag son ga nga bdag 'a ba sa// nas ba mduganas do// ras nA ni gangs thabs kyi bzhin yin te/ byes pa'i sathams dgas ga sebs napas tha'as drag pa/ a ba sbyin mal ta du gnyis su mang pa gzugs/ yang she
52b2(rnying rgyud): dbyer med par dbus na gnas pa'i bdag nyid cagasam sras bshad pa'o// bdud rtsi chubs bshad pa// dri chu chu ba ni la lan ste don yod grung 'a'i bdag nyid ca na dus dang na song bras da'i 'apyod pa zung rang bzhin du yang 'dod do/ 'phyang ldan ma// r-ik+te rgya ba ro mchog ma/ ras / bud mi nga da
52b3(rnying rgyud): larba rna ya 'o gnas na thag tu thug pas khrag mang bar 'dod/ dngo mdzod dpag med gtsor ba shad pa'o// byang sems rgya ba lci khyer ma/ ma~M sa ba t+sarI te/ dngas naganas pas thig ge hU~M bo nas dus kun kyar pa'o// rang bzhin gyis bshadag/ chos rnams phra mo'i rang bzhin la/ draganas par ston pas napa
52b4(rnying rgyud): dga' byed ma ni shin tu phra/ zhes na ste/ shes rab stor nyid kyi don la dga'ang ste/ stong nyid kyi don can gyis rtogs par dka' btogs na dga' bar byed pas ma// chos rnams brjod du med pa'i rang bzhin du nyon pa ni/ res NA te// ro bcud ma ni spros pa me ste khrag tungs dong
52b5(rnying rgyud): gagisas pa 'tshog badra dang dran pa byed te/ dpe nab shi ning nyung ngo // dbyer med pa yi bdag nyid ni gas rgya te/ gzus ded nga bdad kyis me kyi ra bzhi thar meng pas da/ gcu 'o sa
52b6(rnying rgyud): na// kun spangs pa yi rang bzhin yin// / des // des pa'i gas gas gad do// gnas/ rkang pa g.yon pa'i mthe bong na/ gdas la// rang bzhin med par gnas pa'i spyir// a d+ho bya zhes bya ba gnas/ mi rtse yin te/ dper na chos gcig pa gang mam du nga/
52b7(rnying rgyud): te/ dran pa dang mi rtsed pa de kyang dang / dbang po tha tshor bad/ 'de chupa yi co depa yo dathagan 'o// / byin pa ni gdas pa 'dzid nam mkha'i rang bzhin mi nga'i phyir// kuk+Sh+ma rU ba de po tan te/ das yang / kyi stan ya da dam dzu de thang nga
53a1(rnying rgyud): she ra stong bar shes nas bla mo/ yin la/ gnas brla g.yon pa na gnas pa nga bzhin 'dod lnga yi// bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ming ni gsal pa mnas pa'am bang na 'dod pa mags pa/ dI bya'o// gnas/ gsang ba'i g.yon na rtag chos 'thung la
53a2(rnying rgyud): da de khon nyi/ dmigs pa'i zhes rab ya kyi na ni meng // mo'o/ gang / nye bar ma bani phyag rgya chen po dang // klu mthun bdag nyid du mi na/ 'ad pa nagayo na ma las nyi nyi tha dril ba gnas pa med so// gang// snying ga'i
53a3(rnying rgyud): lte ba g.yon pa r+ya/ gnas rang zhin// 'khor 'das kha span bras 'khor dang dbyer med pa'i gzugs yin pa'i phyir na snang ba srid pa thabs kyang 'das stong pa zhes rab de gnyis mnyam par myor bas dus phral ma'o/ kur mdza/ gdal/ nu ma g.yon na chang bzhin bde chen bsgom/ ba ni babs shes
53a4(rnying rgyud): du gnas sa de khon bde chen po ste dngos ldan zhes bya'o// b+hA ba kI ni gnas ma'o// gnas// mgrin pa'i g.yon na gnas pa ni/ rang bzhin lus dag yid kyi/ dri ma med byed she kA'o// gnas// lag mthi la g.yon na gnas la dang po la/ la sogs pa'i// dus nges par byed pa
53a5(rnying rgyud): 'o// mde nga ma des te/ do ni sa 'o// yang nanyes pa ma zhes bya'o// gnas/ ma mchu g.yon na gnas pa yang / rang bzhin/ bde ba chen po 'bebs pa'i briSh+Ta'o/ bde ba chen po'i don la 'jug pas na 'jug ma ste/ ngo dang 'khrung btsam gyis kyang sus la bde ba chen po kyi ba'i babs la 'dug pa'o//
53a6(rnying rgyud): gan ni// mkhur chos g.yon na gnas pa nI/ rang bzhin// rnam par lta ba mA ta rA/ 'phel sa te/ kun gzhi'i rnam shes la thabs dra ngang nyams su myong la byed pas na de yang lbo spyi'i go brna 'a'i yul du grags pa yin la rnga bar rung 'phel bas na 'phel ma'amam mo zhes bya'o// gnas/ mig ni g.yon na 'ang bzhin

53b1(rnying rgyud): gnas/ 'dun pa da pang g.yon gyican gan yang 'di ni me byed pa/ man// de yi phyir na ut+ma // ma ga me pa dang napa ga da // gan / sdi gcug na ganganadang sa dan rdo rje 'dzin chen po// dga' bar byed par phyir langaT/ da ca drag dang nyang dag da
53b2(rnying rgyud): dag pa da su tshan nam rgyang ma'o// gnas/ spyi bo dag nas rang bzhin spros pa dang // bral ba'i phyir a ba d+hu tAM'o// zhes kyang \u0f7f/ bde ba chen po zhes kyang/ sdig tsug tshangs drug ces kya \u0f7f/ branang dang ma zhes kyang byate/ bdeb chen pos yongs la khyab pas chos bco lba ba nas dang mnyam ga
53b3(rnying rgyud): gan// kyi de ni g.yas 'ching 'o// gtsug dag gi g.yas pa na// myang bas rang bzhin tung 'das las dga' phyir ra sa nA/ ro zhim po la sogs pa la gnas pasan ro bcud ma zhes bya'o// gnas/ lhag pa dag la gnas pa ni/ rang bzhin// su la sogs pa'i bdag nyid pra sA hA/ yin pa sa na
53b4(rnying rgyud): phang ba tshad dang ldan par byed pa na kun grangs pa zhes bya ste/ lus kyi dus pa tshad du spod pas na tshad ma ste yang na pra wa rdza ste 'bab ma zhes kyang bya'o// gnas/ 'dun pa g.yas na chu yi ni/ rang bzhin don yod thub pa'i bdag nyid/ !/ 'bab pa yin pa'i phyir na ming// bdag nyid kr-iSh+Ta wartA'o// zhes bya ste hu do/ ngo ba
53b5(rnying rgyud): mazhes \u0f7f/ shin tu gzugs ma zhes kyang bya'o// thabs su ldang ba dang rig pa'i bdag nyid yin no// gnas/ rna pa g.yas pa'i rtsa ba na/ rang bzhin/ thams cad rjes 'gro sA mA n+ya bas na lci khyeng ma ste/ khyi ma zhes kyang bya la/ kun du 'gro ma zhes kyang bya ste/ dbyer med pa'i bdag nyid kyis kun la khyab pas na gyi rkye na
53b6(rnying rgyud): sa so// gnas// mig g.yas rang bzhin byed pa'i bdag nyid du// gyur pa'i phyir na chu sbyin ma ste lus thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyi gyur yod pas na chu'i byed pa las sems bde ba'i ngo ro las byung bas na rgya sbyin ma zhes so/ he tu rA yi kA/ gnas/ mkhur chos g.yas na rang bzhin dpa' bo yi/
53b7(rnying rgyud): dga' ba dang bral ba'i yo gA'o// phyir na kyor zal ma te/ thabs dga' dang thang zhing shes rab stong pa nyid yin pas na dgang ba dang bral zhing rnam par spangs pa zhes bya'o// gnas// ya mchu dag la gnas pa ni/ rang bzhin// thams cad 'gro bas na bre ma NI/ zhes pa te/ dga' ba dang tod nyid ci gnas tham
54a1(rnying rgyud): rjes su 'byong ba'o// de la mtshan ma thams cad mtshan ma med pa'i stong par grol bas na 'byung gnas zhes kyang bya'o// gnas/ mgrin pa g.yas na mang bzhin thog ma yi// rang bzhin med pa sra d+hA'o/ 'phyar na grub ma sna thag ma med pa nas rang bzhin med par dung byed pa

54a3(rnying rgyud): sa na 'tshed ma'o// gnas/ nu ma g.yas na rang bzhin lus kyi 'bras bu ste ra/ zhing / 'thob par byed su ma bas na ming shin tu yid dga' ma ste/ lus kyi 'bras bu nyid la phan 'dogs pas yid dga' bar byed pas na yid dga' ma zhes kyang bya/ yid gzhungs par byed pas na yid bzangs ma zhes kyang bya'o// na sI'o// gnas/ snying ga g.yas

54b2(rnying rgyud): gnas nan 'khor po bzhi mjom pa'i dus na phyogs bzhi'i rtsa rnams ni lugs las bzlog par gnas te/ shar nas byang / nub stor ro// mtshams bzhi ni lugs las 'byung ste/ shar sngo/ sto nu ba/ cu byung / byang gar rnams su gnas pa'o// lugs zlog thabs yin/ lpags 'azung shes rab pon/ thabs nas Sha rdza rdzaganas /
54b3(rnying rgyud): lus la lugs dang lugs las bzlog/ mi phyed mamagon gan te/ gyi nas so dang sen mo 'bab/ tshing 'byung 'o// lug sung thugs rdo rje dbyer mi byed par byed pas na mi phyed ma'o// 'di dag pung sems 'babapa 'gro ba'i lus dbyed cing bas byed pa brtan 'o// phra mo lci gtsug phag
54b4(rnying rgyud): gan te pra dang baspu 'byung ba'o// skra rtse dang nga spasra pa 'byed pas na pa gzugs ma'o// bems pas brkus pa na gzugs can ma zhes bya'o// swa su rgyu// bzang mo ni rna ba g.yas dri ma rgya/ na gnas te na srabs dang dri ma 'byung ba'o// rna ba'i spa babang bar ston pas na pazang ma'o// g.yon ma zu naganas te
54b5(rnying rgyud): bzul gang thung bus kyi g.yon na brten nas tshang rang tu zhing garnams 'azung bas na g.yon pa mo'o/ tshang ra sha rnams chu// g.yon thung rna g.yon rgyas pa rgya/ mi thang rdab ga don na gnas te mus zung ngo // las zu kyi ni bu kyis gtong sa na mi thung ba'o// rus sbal mig gnyis mkhal ma

56b1(rnying rgyud): tum / sang cag tu ma ma// paH kyi mag ngas dang sum / bad // rnga prad+d+ha pa shes dang snru ma/ mas// pa tAm ba 'as brtan las dang// sat+t+ra k+Sha ga ma dang ma d+hA ba/ sa lasan da
56b2(rnying rgyud): bam// 'di babyang yan tan 'khor lor gnas/ bdag na ma pan/ yid yang mapa bum mangs pa/ 'ad bas masas dza dpa na rtsa/ 'ag na tha gas bas pa/ bas sha // tsan sum du \u0f7fgtas pa// dab
56b3(rnying rgyud): dag mi rgyas 'ab ba pa dus kyil 'khong gi dros zhing gams 'dusas// dayang 'a sa d+ha shes ba kyi rang bzhin gam na pa nas pas ji ng+yasu pa dang / ngas rnarlabs kyi rang bzhin ga las nag nas pa dang / a ban stis par nyid nyis med pa bzugs te kya ma sa byung // tshang thams ca dang mo rang bzhin par rjo'o// tshas thams pa da dzo me pa rang
56b4(rnying rgyud): bzhin sa da // dbang bdab bad nyings ba da// rla ba na thabanas nangs grub chung te/ thams dgas par byed papa drang chub mogs pa da / nyim des thags mas pam rung te/ nyim pa nyin pa bajags pa dang / rlung nyed ag sa rung ba za ba thalas nas das med pa nga dang / las gnyis po dang ska sas
56b5(rnying rgyud): bzhidang brog zhing gsum pa pathams pangam cings pa' rab tub mnyes pa'i no// dkyil 'khor bzhi la gnas pas na// srog shing gsum dang yang dag ldan// nyi ma b+hA ba rA tu la/ 8/ lte ba phrul pa'i dkyil 'khor na// 'dab mjug cu rtsa bzhi la/ 4/ dang ba sta banal ba das
56b6(rnying rgyud): 'khod ma ste dang bya zhing rjes nas ma'i bas ci bdud kyis brag so pa'i phyi'ong dang sanyam sa nas gnas pa'o// Na'i gras drug kurba ba ni yong ba ni/ chab 'byung ba sa las byis pa 'di te/ sa sasa'i rgyasa'i masa'i drung rnams so// gnas pacoM'i grangs zhes pa'o// kA lo sum cu bya thabab gas gdab pa ni/ kakha gathar/ tsa / TakAD+Da taH/
56b7(rnying rgyud): hadzad tan/ bar btang/ yang bas/ shas ta/ gnyis na/ mdu ngosag pa bgar du gnas padang // lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog pas na/ bdun da nas yig pa rdza gnas pa te/ mnab nyis tha' ba mnas gang gnyis ta' bar gnas pa'i thangs pag btsung dugan so// yi ge drug cu rtsa bzhir/
57a1(rnying rgyud): bdu da // sam sogs nga / lung so ga ma
57a2(rnying rgyud): rnabams su ci'o// stong pa bcu drug yi ge ni// rnam par dag pas sangs rgyas spyan// sems sogs ngo bo yongs gyur pa// chos kyi 'byung gnas dkyil 'khor yin// nang shor 'dang ma bcu drug tu gnas te/ Ali bcu drug yod pa ni stong pa nyid yin/ yung sangs rgyas rnyan da de'i 'khor rjegs
57a3(rnying rgyud): 'byung baba'i sa yin la/ phreng bamasa'i rgyu/ khrum sa'i me/ gang mas klung yin pas ni 'bor sems mapa ni yin lag com sangs cas ldan yin par 'dod pa'o// de ni nye bskul pa'i 'bor lo dang nyag chos 'byung gi 'khor lo 'brel nas gnas pas na chos kyi 'byung gnas zhes ca te/ 'khor bdor byas 'da' ba'i dkyib 'khod byed pa'o// da su lhing po chung
57a4(rnying rgyud): gnas pa'o// snying ga chos kyi dkyil 'khor la/ ni 'khor 'das kyi chos rnams snying gan sems nyid la gnas pa yin te sems nyid kyang 'das su gnas la sems las zung ba 'bor ba'i chos su gnas pas na chos kyi dkyil dbor ro// tsasi/ 'dab ma brgyad par gnas pa las/ taH ba 'thung bab ni las gyes nas
57a5(rnying rgyud): 'ad ma brgyad par gnas pa rting bul brtsad do// 'chub ba rtan ni/ sde tshan yi ge dang po brgyad/ ni atam tu ba yag te/ A la bi dang po dang tra li'i rje tshan gyi dang po ste bcad do// 'thung dang 'byung ba las gyur pa/ rting po nung ni chu'i chu nu'i sa dang chu'i mi du cu'i chung dang bzhir byas pas na/ snying ba drung bas 'thung
57a6(rnying rgyud): mja' ma na/ cu dang na shA ni/ gtsu pad+hA ti nan nasas gan rnams kya mapa gnasaso// phra mo'i phra gzugs brgyad pa ste// 'khor 'das chos gnas chu ltur 'bab// mas canan+da d+hang nga gi byung na das kyi rnams
57a7(rnying rgyud): dkyi tshun ma med pa ga nga rten na// mgrin pa longs spod dkyil 'khor la/ ni 'du na rje ma pas nga nyi pa dzin ngas myong ba na pa// / 'dab ma mas kyi sa byung nin/ sna d+ha mo sa/ nga pam 'ju / ga sa lam nga ldan//
57b1(rnying rgyud): bcu drug namapam snang gsal ma/ dzas badz+rag ni/ stong pa bcu drug yi gar dgra/ ba gnas \u0f7f/ stong ga gaman pa sab gags tshan bya'i ming mtshan cad la gas pa'o// bcu drug shes rab longs spyod cing / bdang brtan nas tham shes dang sa po rgya 'on pa la grang ba byar nas bya sems su sa tha chur/
57b2(rnying rgyud): zhing bsgom bachub kyad pas na bdud kyi wa yongs myod pa'o/ !/ brang pa bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin du gnas pas na ba can te/ khams bdud ci las kyang sems gcor gnas pa la/ spyi bo bde chen dkyil 'khor na/ gnas pa'i chu'i grangs/ sum cu rtsa gnyis 'dzub pa rdzags kA lis brgyan/ gnyis kor du gnas te 'do 'tha' bar
57b3(rnying rgyud): gzung jug lhag par grang nas gnas te de gi tu gas la bar byed pa'i bdag nyid du gnas so// tsa sod rte rnam par dag pas// gyis bu'i mtshan rnams rnam par dag/ bskyes tsan gzugs pa'i rji na t+ta bya sems kyi ji ma das dang na ba ga mas cigs so// rlung gis 'bebs 'dren gtsug tor grub/ hrI
57b4(rnying rgyud): ni d+ha / nga na la/ rdzu shis/ rbang giH/ rlung gam/ rlung dz+dzaH/ chu tshangs gas rgya pa mi kyi ti bu // dkyil 'khor bzhir gnas skad cig bzhi/ rnam pa tshogs pa'i/ da ga r+b+he/ nga das byed pa kham kyang dag pa chungs dag kyisags ya nas 'o// ma na
57b5(rnying rgyud): rnam par smin pa'i skad cig ste/ lus kyi bde bcung zhig tsam gyis rnam par smin pas bde bldang bas na mchog dga'i legs tsan du gnas pa'o// snying pa rnam par nye dbas 'joms pas 'di bachung la rnam rtog che bas na/ bde ba'i rnam par nyid pas dag 'bral gyi ye shes so// lte bar mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i skad cig ma ste bde stong shar bas tog pa'i mtshan nyid dang bras pas nyan
57b6(rnying rgyud): skyes kyis ye shes so// rnam pa du ma rnam par smin// rnam par 'joms pa rnams mtshan nyid/ !/ bden bzhi sdug bsngal kun 'byung dang // 'gog pa lam du gnas pa'o// nyan thos dang lha rab ste/ dun pa'i bden pa yongs su shes par bya ba ni/ lte bskul ba'i dkyil 'khor nas 'thong phye ba
57b7(rnying rgyud): gsapa pa'o// ngan bya sas ni ti ga rin pa nam to/ bris so// 'don pa'i dzin du na byab migs thas 'o// 'ad dom n-i/ mabe pa ba kyi tan shi sus so// de kho na nyid rnam pa bzhi/ ga kyi ba dang dod pa rtan ba te/ bri la logs pa mga' tad shing do te/ 'a
58a1(rnying rgyud): na panag/ das/ bdag dang sngags pa / san la na na da / na thas ya mad/ ma nam mas ma
58a2(rnying rgyud): zha dang ye shes pan nyid// dga' bzhi dga' bas chag tu dga'// dpa' ba dga' bstan cig zlas/ sangs nga she'o / a gdas yang sa 'ag pa pa ba sa 'das/ da can sams pa
58a3(rnying rgyud): 'dam pa nas gan sa ma ba dag 'o// shi ga sang bag ba la/ 'dad thabs kyi 'jigs pa da pa' ngas dnga'ang// bad brgyang par 'a ba nan/ khras kyi dag // ge bar rab kyang gnas nga gang na sa tu byes te la ba the de ba la sam rkang bas cas pad nga sa pa cig gyes pa'i ba zhe ci dag par/ sde pa bzhi ni gnas
58a4(rnying rgyud): brtan pa/ rang 'acang ni gnas na pa'i ma pa ni nye ba nas byas pathams da ge song ga thags pa an sa sa // ti da 'ang sa pas mapa la 'odas// thams cad yod par smrab dang / ba rdzab/ makri pa tha sa rnams sa nga 'das ldan pa nga ky-i na pa da par srungs na
58a5(rnying rgyud): lags yang dag ga la 'od sa no'o// dpon dge 'dun phal can sde/ pa ni tha me pa nas mdang ma sa ba na ma gnas san can ka/ chung 'bring chen po'i bye brag go// gnas bzhir rnam par gnas pa'o// g.yan pa zla ba nyi ma g.yas/ da na ba
58a6(rnying rgyud): sa ca mam/ gangasan shes me chub sa shin rje'i mang man no// A le pha mo she ca pa dor pa shes te/ ma ca la/ kA la rags/ shA'is dzan pa gas pa// mas ma nga ba kyang sa// a la sogs pa'i yul dang / brgya za tan sa/ nas na
58a7(rnying rgyud): ba gan te/ das mas dpa ya// ka la sogs pa'i kA le dang / gas padon sarnams tan can ba la ro// rdo rje rdo stong nga gas sa dang na pad+ma dang / khyon dang thas ma la ga sa/ gab nas cung nga ste can pa// thabs dang shes gang da nga rabachung rab rnams
58b1(rnying rgyud): sngagasas// ga sa gang ga sa sho zug gag san sa dasam da/ // da yang rdzas sa baN+DI bdudrug no// de sha dang tha bya ga dang // mthad 'dzid pa dang gnas/ spas sa
58b2(rnying rgyud): seng nya sing ge dang naka n+ya gad dum dang // tul wang dang ni na ts+tsha rjeg pa dang // tra nu gaT dang ni ma kar/ rnaH// kur+dz+dza tha ma dang ni smin na dang // tsa~Mn+da t+ka ra gla ga sa di she na nga dang / swar+tha nar dang / de nyes ga teg dang myong na 'ang ba dang / da pa
58b3(rnying rgyud): bdang na ma// ti la ka N+Di ba 'do na da na so ba dang A ka sha/ yag nga nam pa'as pam zhem pa yi nga// the pa ga dam nga bshen zhi gsag/ da ga da pa nga pa gas pa na // di da da nga// dadag pa

58b6(rnying rgyud): la pa ma // dang ses pas mag/ ga bags pam 'a bdang pa // rim pas sa gan nyin ba shad// mthab tam dang pa la/ ngan med pa na ba ba 'a ba sa mgyu da

59a1(rnying rgyud): phra mo'i tshul ni A rang ba/ sa r+thag rjem ma saman nom/ @6sa/ badz+ran nyim gsum nga la brtse ba ma e/ nis ma rdzas/ dran/ gsang bar nyis bzhi pa g.yon ma I/ gdon sa rgya pa tang gcan bas/ rdzags mas rgya nga
59a2(rnying rgyud): par nyim lnga pa brud ma u// snying gar nyam drug pa rus sbal A/ sdes ci'i n+ya du dras la/ nu mar nyi ma bdun pa mongs bsgom pa so ri/ ka a// mgrin par nyi sa brgyad par dbang ma dI/ ba'i cha mra'al/ g.yon nas brtsis pa'i mkhyen pa 'dis khyod kyi 'do yos nan payed na sa nyis
59a3(rnying rgyud): zu / lag mthil nyim dgu pa nyes ma li/ ma 'is prilam// mkhur chos nyes bcu pa 'jug ma l-I mo'i chunas ma ti// mig na nyi ma bcu gcig ma mo e/ seM me khra ga ni// snga rtsar nyi ma bcu gnyis mtshan ma a/ de'i rlung ba dz+ran// dpral gson nas yi pa'i tsho bde ba che po nas
59a4(rnying rgyud): gas drung gi gnas nas gang pa'i 'thang char yong par shem bcu gsum bsil ma o/ chung gis za'o// / spyi bor nyim bcu bzhi ga/ zi brjid a krung gi chu rab pam// g.yas/ rjen po ba da brings drung ba pas em cwal ca shesa'i 'as byed pa'i phre cig pa gsas nga ba de
59a5(rnying rgyud): sa pa te/ cu so gnyis pong / wam gyi bo na gnas par gnyis g.yas g.yon du // rang na ag na ni nam mkha' 'gag pa zhes pa ste/ chos bcoM wa lathab nam dang mnyam pas/ mtshan mo med par nyin mor rje dang zhwa / dang g.yon gyi dbus na ne// yangs su gang ba'i a dang aH/ dag 'byed ma dang kun spangs zung gi
59a6(rnying rgyud): nga yum po rkye na ti / yi na/ 'di 'a zhas lo rdzalas med 'a ma sum bu ni/ byi ba'i g.yas gapon chalas 'pho btsang bar gnas so// do na chad 'phel ba'o// g.yas su don 'dres pa'i chanas pachis na/ aHdang i gnyis la/ ro bcung ma ni rung gi drang ne me dpa ma ma'o// dang tshang ma dang / de ng+ra gir+tha te/ khrogater ma'o/ gang
59a7(rnying rgyud): gang na ba 'ad do// chos ni bcu drug dag la'o// bcu bdun mgo g.yas la mdog sngon o/ mdung ga ga ga 'o// bco brgyad rna g.yas skye ma/ su/ chung phy-i / bcu dgu mig g.yas rgya sbyin yang nges par te/ e// gangs nas sa pa 'dzin pa pa rgya sa gnas na rgya
59b1(rnying rgyud): na/ nya sha 'gram g.yas sbyor thab ma/ ga// nyur gcigag las man gcos man/ rang rdzogs// nyer gnyis / la grub mam/ gas// nga gsum lag g.yas 'am sa dz+ra/ gan gas nga/
59b2(rnying rgyud): bany-i na nga ya na ba sa nga // nyer bzhin g.yas yid bzang ni/ din sa'o/ nyer wa snying g.yas su mthor wA/ na mnyan ma ga // nyer dug lte g.yas 'dod ma lA/ ga ma/ nyar bdun parla g.yas gtum
59b3(rnying rgyud): bdag I/ mni'i'i sa snyam zin sngags sa// nyer brgyad chos 'gyung khang ma e/ nasi cu me ma tsan kyang ca/ nyer dgu byin par 'jigs ma A/ ni sa'i rdzanag can ma nan // sam cu rkang g.yas bdud 'jams a/ ba na pa'i drang kor ro ma gaganasas// pa na/
59b4(rnying rgyud): ngag na des cang nig pa krigs pa gan ba ste/ rnamam pa' ba gas ga ya'i bags pas pa 'dra cad pazhinanas do gi zung ro ma ba med pas na bla sa dan pa'i dra nga pa 'ara'o// zla ba gcig la tsas dpe nas na po 'dong nas bya bar yar 'phel ba dang / ba krag nas ba nas gangs kya sa nga ga tum ba/ g.yon dang
59b5(rnying rgyud): g.yas su 'gram/ me phyed ma ga sa napa la 'ama'ang sa dang phram tshul gangasaban yang// brdebs gag nas 'gasapa dang g.yon pa ma rkang samo rdzi barbang ga zhigang 'a pa dang // bdud 'joms ma gang gangs bang pa/ dang 'jigs ma dang / ban papa/

59b7(rnying rgyud): dang dras bral skyes sa gas na kyil/ ru 'o sa / sgom pa ma dang dbang mo dang / 'ag dang se pa na pa sa mnapa/ nya sa'adod pa med gsum byed ma rnyeng da gar dang/ ru ga sas/ yod bzangs pa dang lan sa pa 'chang ma dang / 'dun

60b3(rnying rgyud): bu l+r-ing logang gu ga sum mo'i dbyibs su chags so// nya mtshams la sogs nub gar bdun du yin te nub pa lang skrod rnam po tshwa dbyebs su chags so// mon thel sogs kyad ka rang can ni/ sa'i nar mnye kyang rdza mi stan sra bzhis 'dabyibs su chags so// zhes dazung ngabazhi'i drung dang rtsor/ dngos nag gsum sum dul d+ha lba dgang bya shes par bya'o// nyi ma tsa

60b5(rnying rgyud): cha yang zla tu stopas/ gzung bar bya/ ma ma rgya sa so// des thab nyi grang sa sa shes papa'o// nye mtshan dbug gu na da sumargya tshad mo kyang ca drug cu ste/ bzhini 'phel dang 'grib pa'o// thar ba' la nyis pa na/ rnag sa pa
60b6(rnying rgyud): nang du ts+tsha ba 'grib ces pa'o// !/ zhagag ceg bya byed bye de las 'phob bcu drug gis zungango // dgag gi thug su drug cu rtsa ba ni ni/ tsu cod kyi byed kyitshan// bu tshod ning thug bu gnyis zhes pa 'don to// bgag ci gis tshu cod ni sun du cag sa so// thun ga cig gis rtsod pa de po rnams kyis so// dpying rdzas do po'i nyen mtshan tu yab ma mnyam pa'i ro// bran pagi dbyug ma

61a1(rnying rgyud): dgapas thamasas/ zhes nan/ da tha sas ba da nas pa gan pa da gra namananyam gas/ tan ma nanapa ma 'thabs/ da thotsun ma brtsas 'a nga
