61b1(rnying rgyud): nga sa pa dang / nya sa pas ma cu bdapapa// da kar gan bas brtan kyang ni gan hA/ dus pa 'gas thams kran n+ya bcu drug blo/ sug ngas mas kya sacang/ gangasanams na tu bababargya nga rdza ga// 'phob tu du gong dab/ lung nga ma ba rgya ba ma
61b2(rnying rgyud): gruba'o// de sa dgasas nas nyi ma me rung gis dra ba babyed/ gnon bu phyi'i su gis bkris par byed/ khyims 'bregal na gas// 'ju pa na nas na nga tu/ g.yas na bying bya'i dang ma nas can byed byed do// shem chung du ma pa / thaba'i rung dums sa pan man cashegs pa'o// sa so gsas kya
61b3(rnying rgyud): gapas nas zhon du yob kya dang / bcad gnyis ba drug tu 'byurang ro// mA'i ba dz+ra rnam par dag pa nga gtu ga zus 'asum bcung // de 'a dbug su drug rgya 'i khyo sum gnyis so// rnam par dag pa khra ba yi// bye brag chub gzung byas te// dbyug gu nga dang de dag ni// gnas
61b4(rnying rgyud): sum cu rtsa gnyis so// tshod dum cu gnyes ni/ de langs bcu dru byung 'i dus na/ phan 'i las 'thub ra/ med rung rgyu 'i du na nod pa'i las chub/ dbye bsam byar nyis sa// tshod bcang lathun de byas pas na chod pana'o// bu chen zer na byid pas zung // chu mong sum su ci nyid kyis po su dugs bdun du
61b5(rnying rgyud): kun byed kyi pa sa stod brgya cu tu'o// de dag thams cad dkyil 'khor bzhi dra/ stengs du byer bsor ba zungs/ rlung bgi na te pa dung / ting ga tu phyir ma song cad \u0f7f/ chu dang gi gnas snyir gang bcung / mchi na ne cing sor bcu gnyi tu/ me thung sa gi gnas mgrin par btud rgya nas rlung gis chung phyir ro
61b6(rnying rgyud): gaH/ chung gi rlung rang gi gnas kyi thor bzung / de ltar 'pho bde re la ba ni zhi ste drug curtsa bzhir 'gyur ro// dbyug gu dug cu rtsa bzhir bgrang bar bya'o// legs par gzung bar bya ba ste// dkyil 'khor bzhi yang lte ba nas/ nye 'a'i 'os na srin po dru tra yi ga k+Sha dmar nag las me 'bar bas/ lte ba'i bdud rtsi zhunas yang song
61b7(rnying rgyud): snyi ga ri dud ce zhu/ yang ra song bas mgrin pa'i bdud ci zhu/ yang sod kyi bo'i bdud ci zhu/ lus bdud rtsing 'brel ba ni/ tsan ta li ni gtum mo ste/ ste lkog nas me 'bar bas/ 'khor lo bzhi'i bdud kyi'i lte bar 'bebs pa'o// nye ba'i dog thun gulas khrag go thog re la rtsa ro rgyang kun 'dar ma gsum zug nas gnas ba der 'khyil nas/ bde ba gsang
62a1(rnying rgyud): gnas rdo rje 'atrang sa 'o// tsan d+ha li ni 'bar ba yi// phyag rgya chen po'i bdag/ de'i ga pan yu pa dong draganas pa pa dang thas pa phyag tu me po gsu'i rnab par 'gyur te/ langs spab na gang ga rnam pa sum tsam du gang ba/ nyid 'gyur/ rnab byar ba yang dag pas// rdzogs pal
62a2(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas dpal he ru ka bslab par 'dod pa yi/ sa bde ba dang chung ba sres nas gzung bar bya'o// lam 'a gnas pachi/ rnal 'byor pa yi sa? dbugs kyi grangs dang bkun nas bde ba gzung bar bya/ sa nas bdeb pa yi ge aHsa stong par rgyas btab na rang nyid sangs rgyas so// gzhan du dam tshig shin tu gsang / skrod pa yin pa bzhin tu gas rab te/
62a3(rnying rgyud): thugs mi dmatshig nyams nas 'droba'o// 'di dag ni gas dbang dang / shes rapa ye shes dang / bde ba chen po nam chi man dag 'azung ba'i gzhi yin no// !/ e ni nye bskul pa'i dkyil 'khor te/ gag chos dazung dang 'bral bas na/ chos kyi 'byung gnas so// rnam par thar pa las sgo stong nyid do// bde ba bzhi las dgang ba'o// yum bzhi las dbyings phyug ma
62a4(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas ldan no// sa'i drung rang giganas ni nyeb gnas pas na sangs rgyas phran zhes bya'o// e ni chos kyi 'byung gnas la// stong pa nyid dang dga' ba dang // dbyings phyug lha mo sangs rgyas spyan// be ne chu dang mtshan ma med// mchog tu dga' dang mA ma k+Shi/ maud nyid sa
62a5(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor te/ 'byung ba bzhilas rgya/ chu ru' rang gi gnas snying ga/ rnam par thang ba'i sgomatshan mamed pa'o// bde ba bzhipas mchog dga'i ye shes so// yum ba ni ba rgya ma ma hA'i rang bzhin rnam par dag par// mA ni me dang smon pa med// bde ba dga' ba gos dkar mo/ 8sa ni mgrin pa yodas rtsod kyi 'khor lo te/ dbya ba
62a6(rnying rgyud): lalas me/ me chung dang gis gnas mthen pa'o// rnam thang la smon pa med pa'o// bde ba bzhi las dag 'thal dpa' bo'o// yum bzhi las mo gos dkar ma'o// yA ni rlung dang 'dus ma byas// lhan cig skyes dga' sgrol ma nyid/ !ramra ni lci bo bde chen gyi dkyil 'khor ro// 'byung b.las chung ste/ rlung gi gnas phye bod do//
62a7(rnying rgyud): rnam mar ngas 'dus mthas dang ban gyis 'odags papa'o// bde bzhi las gan cig skyes dga'/ yum bzhings drung dam chog grol ma// e bai mA yA ra kun 'dus so/ de lta bse ba ma lnga'i yi ge pa na na dus par brtan pa'o// thams cad rtsa ba kun gzhi yin/ rang gi ban gzho 'a dam shes nyid ma chud de/ babs kyis ma na pan
62b1(rnying rgyud): gzhi 'khor ba/ binan kyang bdas yin pas chu'i chud min no// de nyid rgya yi chud yin la/ !/ rang lus thabs kyi rgyud 'di la/ bas gnas pa' ca pa dbang duganas te/ 'thab byed deb bsgoms nas na tho gis kyi galam du mang ba nab byed nges kyil // gnas pa'i rtsa ni thub pa ya na/
62b2(rnying rgyud): lus kyi khams bdud rtsi 'an gsang bar gnas/ gas pa da dru gnas pa na/ nya' ba lu sa nang sa sa ny-i na pa dpang // grub pa'i sngags ni shes rab dbang / ma shesas pa zab pa gas pa ga 'ishes kyi dang gaN mang len pa te/ 'khong rdzags
62b3(rnying rgyud): rang shegs kyis rang sa legs pa bsgrub ba ba// snying po drung ni bde chen nyid/ ngogs rapa dang pa yin pa/ dag na dbang nye da shesas dang gas dang sa pa/ seM chos su brdung gcags cang sob ste/ bdang la ga gas sung sems pa dag de mad yan bzung tud do// gru gsung thugs
62b4(rnying rgyud): ni 'bras bu'i spyad/ ga ce da pa dang yang dan pa rubs/ me cag med dngas nyung sa/ yongs// ma na dad da gra pa ma ga nga dadapa pa da ngas sa tha ga sa nga// ngos ga sa med ma sa yangs than ca pos
62b5(rnying rgyud): da na ma she rga pa te// bsnyen pa sgrub bzhi gnas dmachog ni// so sor spong bar 'dod pa wa// mi rtag rigs lnga don dam mchog/ dpa' mangs mangs gapas med / de ngang 'dod bdas na pa dang yang ma nyid/ bu rdo sa ma pa rnams/
62b6(rnying rgyud): da ba ga/ dang pad rjo pa ga ba mags pa ga da// bsam gtan rtog / dpyod su gsung thugs/ dgos pa lan nga pa ma te/ dab / gas pa sa rbaH/ bdanan pa ma thag sa pani/ bdan nanas med pag yang sngag ga
62b7(rnying rgyud): sa sa ga/ dga' 'a thug bu 'jung // dbugs dguga'athung lnga'i le gas pa/ masasasas
63a1(rnying rgyud): 'argyang napa/ de nyid lnga kyang bdag tha nga na pa'i zug chon nam lags gang lan go/ nga // nata na nga bag// de yang sra pa ni dang than pa thags brgyad nas// thagapa na legs snga ma po// zhes gsug mo// rin chen yig 'bu lnga rtser sgo// sems bzung dang sngags dang /
63a2(rnying rgyud): ga ru// yig 'bru phyag mtshan mi spyo gzung / bzhi sem sa ga ba ni/ yi nga thags gang 'ag 'tha sa/ phyag tshad nyid pa slobang theg ni bud rigs do// de yang drags kyi bud kyis dpa/ rang 'gas snying la bsgoms nas pa/ zhes pa 'gogs pa gsangs so// ngags kyi da rten pa slab pa yon gnas so// rjes dran pa
63a3(rnying rgyud): zlar rtse gcig 'bad// sdig rgyu du srin me srin khams/ lab nges rbad de/ de ga pon mang por ga sang pa dang / rtag ra 'byung pa/ daya rig dang phyag sa can nam/ lug sung bag pating de dzin nyid/ dang pyo kyig kunathal// gnyis pa la ni dang tshul// gas pa srin du ma khyer nga// bzhing pa ye ba zhin ba // rab
63a4(rnying rgyud): sprin med nam mkha' bzhin// brta nas rdordo'i gnas nas ni// nam kha'i khams kun slob bya// zheb tu dgazhan nas gsungs pa dang bathun na// ting 'don phyi nang gong bur byas/ drag pa ting nge 'dzin na/ phye nang gi dngos posan bzlas nas/ gong thar byas te/ bdag nyid ltar bskom pa'i bsu'i bu ga bcug ci bsgob po'o// bdag nyid du
63a5(rnying rgyud): chu bsgom pa yin// sbyor ba yan lag drug gis bsnyen/ de gang sa dacig ribs thas ni bzhin pa rdzogs pa'o// de ni bachogag brted pa la byong ba'i yan gdug gi sgonas pasla ba zhes thab brten pa'o// nye bsnyen bdag nyid ltar bsgom la// ye shes pa dag la lcag+sas kyus thim/ na de nas ge brten pa ste/ bdag nyan
63a6(rnying rgyud): bsgom pa'i nying gar/ rmab la dro rjes tham bzhag pa hA/ ye shes sems dpa' skabasas pa// de sags kyi'i phyag rgyas drangs te/ rang dang gagis su med par bsgoms la// 'ani ga la lan cheg ma// khyod ni bgrub par gnas pa te// rang gi dngos grub bdag la rtsor// zhes pa la sogs pa 'arjod pa / rang ltar mngon sum du byano//
63a7(rnying rgyud): yan ca bzhen pa dang / nye ba nyen ni sengs slong ma mnan// bslab pa phram las dkyil 'khor gdon// sru gsung thugs su zla drug bslab/ de ltar sems kyang sa na ni ba rdzu par bya ste/ de 'ang sum ca te/ dong byang sems pas dkyil por ga na shing cig nyi thug sang thugs pa bsgom
63b1(rnying rgyud): shing dngasgrub pa// dbang rgya gzhan nas// nga srid nam gnye 'greng ba dang // de sring bdug tu banapa// 'dad pa pan la langs thod ga// rgas pamasogs pa ta/ nga 'don par bathun pad/ dbang ma dang / mang byab rnasam sa dang ga bar dug tu rnams// da de gagasas dan/ bdag ma sa
63b2(rnying rgyud): mthong na ni/ dzag phul gyi las kyis bslab po// de srab pa'i rabs ni banang gsum brgyam las gas palo// sgrub chen lha yi skur gsal bas// bdag 'dra 'o dkyil 'khor dbyung zhing bsgrub// 'di ni shes rab chung rnams la// rim gyis paslab pa'i rim pa'o//
63b3(rnying rgyud): ltaspar gas pa zhing dkyil 'ang byin dbab// de yang byud gagan las/ gong rdzogs pa'i makyis ni// 'i bye bad can// bdag dkyi por ga ni// drab chen po da bya'o// gos so// mdadag ni kun tu dngang sa/ brlab dang/ mangs de'i zhi me ngag// rka ma rgyal nam mad namad// de nas
63b4(rnying rgyud): parabya// zhes so// rang na sla rags la par byas nas/ de lab sras sbyor ba'i mab las 'ang wa ba'i dkyil 'bod dgung ging bsla par byab de/ dbang po dam pa'as tha byung ba ma shes dang dan pa rnams pa rib gyis bslab pa di da/ na nas bzlangs na 'thab par gsungs ngo // ri 'anyis pa'i nub pa rgyas pa dang // bcus pa dganyi na/ 'o nga
63b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i don du gsungs te/ gang zag des sbyar du mi 'grub mnyam pa'i dogs pa bas lana'o// !/ dang po bsnyen pa lo bla ru yang pong byang chub sems sbyangs pa ni bsnyen pa bya 'o// nas/ de nas/ nye ba'i bsnyen pa byab ni dang narags papas de'i lnga gsur thugs rgyag tu chen po rigs pa par byas nas bsgos pa'o// lhar sbyangs
63b6(rnying rgyud): nas/ brlab pani// de nas bzod yul bzung labye kyi ba nga gli yin pa thas pa kyang se sa padeb bathang dang / bsrub paM la/ thab med // byang sems nyar dkyil 'khor sgrub par byag dkyi 'khor gyi garnams sun rdangs shing btungs ma mang par byed/ chen po// / debang mag zlo ni// bsnyen
63b7(rnying rgyud): pa don dam byang chub sems/ sags pag// nye bsnyen bdag nyid ltar shes pa/ she mas ga ledags sa gang dgas pa kyi nal dag// bsgrub pa yum ne bskyed pa yin/ ya bag gnas na mas pa napabs yod pa nyang // bslab pa chen gyi ra pa ba rnam par/ byA
64a1(rnying rgyud): nga sems pas dkyil 'khor ga na ma#sa mam tha sadang da nga bya zugs pas/ na
64a2(rnying rgyud): ba sa so rig zung 'gyung ba ste/ de yang sangs rgyas mam sang thu sems dang 'gang pon nge mngon no// degs/ gsum pa la ni gzugs su rdzogs pa/ rang bang phrub kyi spordzogs padam/ thun rong gang tu de la gang dgas kyi ltar banos// bzhi pa la spa brags ga sems dang da dang gcis de
64a3(rnying rgyud): pa ga dgod/ thun mong dang grub btu par gsangs don 'a tsamacanam ga thoms sras sams ma ma zhing byed byeng zhi rdzas pa dang / ma ga / theg sas kun kyang nga skyen lung rnam pazhing 'dug
64a4(rnying rgyud): don pa te/ smrab brten pa/ thos nye rten spong bsu pa/ 'thas tu ban no// phyi rabs bslab pa byed pa yang // dang po'i nub la bya ba yang // 'od zer dkar po spro bar bya// dbu ma dkar dmar bsnol mar spro/ pa du 'dod de/ nag yo
64a5(rnying rgyud): 'dan pa rlomasar gros la par 'amachod/ tshur 'dos bub len pa rabs 'azhing 'azlas par 'o// rtags dang mar me dkyil 'khor sman// rak+ta rnal 'byor ting 'dzin gso/ gso ba nani/ tags nas ni/ gcong po zhing rtags gangs pa dang / sa yon rdo 'a byed pags pal sa shes dpa
64a6(rnying rgyud): 'apo bdadado 'gadas pas ngam/ ud pa sa gyu zhig sa ci las rnang spong 'das pangs/ ngadudzin med la gang ba byed dang 'i ba 'a nga / chog sa ni/ bung gtor mtsha mtshams kyang / theg
64a7(rnying rgyud): ba bye ces tha/ ting brdeb par nga byed ci ba ba dang/ nyos ba dab satos nasas dgas/ rta mga' chags cas pa nying pa dang tur ni rnye sor / gab nga cing 'dong dod do// lus ngag spyod pa thabs kyis zin/ ba 'di ta mi phrag sa / ba/ bdapa
64b1(rnying rgyud): lanapa rnam pa / na sa tha pa ca mas // rnam gro bslabar bya// byi ru'i brang bas snod rnams 'gengs// skang ces bdud zer rab 'brang ba'o// / dbang na rgyan/
64b2(rnying rgyud): dede na nga dang pos pos pang cithas nas dang garjod shes brtad/ mnya da 'di drin byed ma the tsa ma bams cad ca nges sada'ad mamo par tho nga dadas tha chud dus dang/ rom gyur ram/ 'do ngos na/ badzi na chung med/ dbang dgag 'ded/ ga
64b3(rnying rgyud): ya pa dang/ bco gso/ ce tha' ya tha nga tha / ngos tham // zhes gsungs so// he ru ka'i gal po las/ dam tshig bslang di nyams su blang ba'i brtag pa ste bzhi pa'o// sa la di rnyed
64b4(rnying rgyud): dag 'ang gabangs bya sa// bag gad tabs pa da gas da pa sad se // 'dabar dgapa/ do ga kyi brdzab zad pa dang / bang tica jug kyi bdu thugs gnyis 'as/ dang ni bun 'ab ga 'i mdo pa gsung ngo po// da'i 'di/ bu da pa ma/ zung dang po / man ngag pa dag tham
64b5(rnying rgyud): ces tshang da myo sa kya ma na// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gdul dka' 'dul ba chen pos/ bslab pa'i gzhiphun sum tshogs pa bzhi dang ldan par bya zhing rdzas dngas ga'i brtag pa 'di gsungs so// dathang bamams can cig na tsho pa ding brgyal te/ shes
64b6(rnying rgyud): na sus chogs brjos pasam bsgos gangs kyi rnonas na pa dang / 'bor na su tshogs pa dang ldan par bya ba dang / gnas than pa mtshogs pa de tsal pa dang / so cad can su gtogs pangs ga // de yang rdzamam rtan pa thags par ma sa/ gnasas bta sa na pa mags papan/ ngang dang sa gan rtags shi phu sus tshogs pa
64b7(rnying rgyud): bshes grang bya / 5/ shes pa 'a'o/ gnas so rtse// phun sum tshogs pa de re re la yang bgi bzhir ldan pas nas jug nas// rdzas la dis bzhi mi dag pa rta'aM/ brlab pa mcho gi 'phral pa zhing gi rdzas so// dngas gzhe pa yang ba/ nam mngan/ par snang / sagan rkyen gying rje ba 'o// brtags nas ni/

65a3(rnying rgyud): gas Shang du ba rtag par bya/ he dra rjod rdzas pa 'jom pa'ang mo / !/ shes pa phran sum tshogs pa ni// rdo rje bla ma slob dpon ni// rgyud lung man ngag rab 'bring mtha'// 'bad kyikyi skad ji sod cad pa ma' / 'don shes rdza dang na pa/ dang dang mnang gagi sa ba cas pa/ ba la gad na ldan pa/
65a4(rnying rgyud): ngas sa drang sa/ bcang dgas gangam las 'asab/ bsla pa da nas pa/ ngag 'dang na gakyang ro// 'di da rje yo cad pa mas shing dab dang pan gardzogs pa/ dkru ba dis ba la ba'ang// bam yang thad gci da 'i bu bdas pa gas so// mi 'khrugs spong ba'i su rtsas shes/ bde/ shes pa bang zhis
65a5(rnying rgyud): gas 'dzin na rde bapa dang / sa dang dang / cung cing rtso sa pa sogs nas pa ste/ rang nas/ skyed par byed pa'i ma dang sring mo nyid/ nyar gdung sems ni tu che 'o// las dang phyag rgya len pa'i 'khor/ ni zin las kyi sa pa la mangs pa dang ma byed pa dang gongs kun bram dang mnyam pa te/ 'bar ba ma tshas nas nyan mam jug gyur phan chad
65a6(rnying rgyud): shes pa'o// bsgom 'tshang las dang grol ba dang / rdo rdo rje por sgom zhes pa dang / rdo rje rgyal thabs bshad shes pa dang / rdo rje las kyi gams phrin las mnor par shes pa dang / rdo rje ging sgrol ba'i cogags pa'o// ging g.yog gtsug lag brda' shes pa// lus ngag yid dang yi ge'i brda'// shes pa'i 'khor ni gtsug
65a7(rnying rgyud): 'gan bung ban gas byas de bang te/ spo nas das sa da sa rtsi bang dang / zhi bang rjo dang / rdzas pa sogs pa dang / yid kyi ba nga de dan dod pa dang / yig ba dang mi gzis ba gad pa'o// 'khor rnams phran sum tshogs gyur pa dbyes pa babyed pa bras kyi 'bor dang / brag sa dang yang ba gang sa
65b1(rnying rgyud): dang / mang babadas sa thobs pargyag cang ba dang / sra byag thes sa kyi nang panarabs kyir ba da rnams so// tha ba ton / dgyes pa bskyed pa'i gzungs ma dang / gdad dran pad lhamed pa rlom yangang btegs dang byung ba 'bor dab dun ma'o// mchod sto ma thos
65b2(rnying rgyud): bgayod pa/ rdo rje'i byan po dang / gtses pa dang / chang ma ste/ 'tshar med pa'i chen po/ gsog 'jog med pa'i byen po// gse su dba'i phyag tshang rnams so// phyag tshang byan g.yos ma// thugs dang 'thad pa'i sems zin can// 'jod de bu ba'i thags ni ras dugs kyis da ma dag zang te slong mdas rtso dang
65b3(rnying rgyud): 'thad pa'o// rdul 'phyag skyes bur ldan par bya/ !ba'i dakhor ne na brdul 'phyag skyes bu dang / bar ma mtshams mkhan/ nang gi bkang la sdod pa dang / phyi'i mtshams mkhan chu len dang / phyir sdod pa rnams te/ mtshams gsum du gnas pa'i 'khor ro// gnas mchog phun sum tshogs pa btsal// ting 'dzin ye
65b4(rnying rgyud): shes mchog gi gnas/ ni rang nyid sems las su rung zhing ting 'dzin bsgom pa ste dang nyams dga' ba'i gnas nyin/ de yang shing mang na zhing khrag/ rtswa mngan rgya ga// sa phrag thag phrag gam/ rang khyim dben pa jam/ dgon pa nyams dga' bar sems 'chags// bkra shis dag pa chen po'i gnas/ ni tron 'phags pa'i zhab
65b5(rnying rgyud): bcags pa/ phya rdo rje gdan lta bu'am/ nang a su da'i brag phug lta bu'am/ gsang ba ri ma la ya gnam g+hagla yod pa'i ce'am/ sngar grub pa thob pa'i gnas sam/ chu bo ni rdo ny+dza na'i drung du dka' thub mdzad pa'am/ gyad kyi yul phyag na rdo rjer dbang bskur ba'am/ rim la yang sgrub pa lta bu'o// yid 'ong nyams ni rnam pa ra dang / la// de ni gnas kyi
65b6(rnying rgyud): mchog yin te// yon tan ma lus kun ldan pa// dgos par bya ba gnas kyi gzhi/ rang yid du 'ong zhing nyams dgang ba'i gnas ni/ gnas kyi mchog yin te/ de'i yon tan ni// me tog 'bras bu ldan pa'i ri// dga' zhing yid 'ong dben pa'i gnas// nangs par nar gyi mdangs sbal// dgongs mo rlung kyi zer spang
65b7(rnying rgyud): ci // rtse mo re rgyal gnam la brdegs// rtsa bar be'u lug mtha' la gyod// ga dang rkyang ni tho badrang la// ci shing nags tshal g.yur zab// dang pa bzhad kyi spa yang spogs// me tog sna tshogs gling du chags// nub phyogs mthol byang phyags kyongs// shar gdab lho ni gzhol ba dang // chu bo g.yas nas 'khor zhing 'dab// yid dong nyams dga'i
66a1(rnying rgyud): ga ma yin no// zhes// bslab pa dus kyi gnas su bya/ !/ nadus gang drag da tha la nan/ chos cad pakrag na gangs spyod pa 'don pas zung // yo byad phun sum tshogs pa ni// 'tsho ba zas kyi ya byad kyis// bkres dang skom pa'i dbul ba
66a2(rnying rgyud): sela'ardzas pa zhe ya na lasalas sa/ da/ sa gag las gab ga rgyas / da mam pam byo da pa ban / 'angs sa rnamamapan sa/ mngam ma
66a3(rnying rgyud): na no// rkye bzlog sman gyi ma byad kyis// nad pams tha bgags par cing ba / ma // ma nas/ sa shag/ ga mas sa dang / sa ya sa na / bslab rdzas

66b1(rnying rgyud): rtags/ pheb sa dun bar ro// dbang gnas rta ga ngas bu can bya mar ba sha sa do'i bod la mi bzhag na/ bya da kyanang gan nas stas na grub ba dun nga ba // bsgrub pa mchog gi rdzas btsal pa// khyis pagazhon gro bur dadu ga pa rab/ shibs thagasas/ dpyangs te ra ma dang byam pa nga gsung
66b2(rnying rgyud): dra na 'dongs dang mtshon gyis bldan/ na yos gas 'o// gdul bya'o zheng shing pa/ da cog gi byed pa dang / zas byed pa dang / mjed pam byed pas pa dang / dang mig thas cad pa bzung mad na med pa dang mas nas dam mas 'ag pa dang / thogapa 'a da dus pa dang pazhapa gag pa dang / sems yo
66b3(rnying rgyud): gdong ba dang / da nga gang ma dang / med pa ma sa kyang ba rnam nis 'a da/ du gyur pa ni// bcuni rnam pa yul du bya// nam mkha' gsum gzhong ngal gri chud/ yang da mam 'a 'phrag sa nga ni/ dra 'o ga sa yi yang nga// gan nga rag// bcung dang / klub dang thos par 'ang
66b4(rnying rgyud): mnas pa rnams 'banapas pas kyang// mkhas pas spang bar bya ba'o/ dpag ga / tha bzhin zlum po dang thug pa dang / 'khor mo rtsi bas brgyad 'dra ba shes/ 9/ sa pa dang / klas po ga dang / thas kyis dang dang / thangs pacad kyi sa
66b5(rnying rgyud): yo gong ba na ngas yang // bar snang brag ral dmar nag po/ na tha na pangs chags pags/ rababs gnags pa sa/ dam ci dang / gas pa song / srinas ba dzugasapa 'ang ba byangs sa mags pa dang za pa ma gas/ spang zhing 'og chu ltar dang sa?/ ban par sdang dag drus dang bar bya za /
66b6(rnying rgyud): ga ga sa sden mo ya ba sa lugs pa yongs pangs/ su tsaHmjung thul sa chu gas pa dang lung / ga sa chem/ !/ til po rang du srog te/ 'a ba rus sral thams rab dang // mtho man zhadas kyang ba dang gis zang gru mas pa dang rtsub pa das / bye'u/ rim
66b7(rnying rgyud): ga ga ma sa las ba// rdzogs pa tsams lags par rab btags shes thas pa sto tha' bya 'al / nga / ga ga dpa / shesas 'o// dam pa yong // ngas rgya gru nas

71b1(rnying rgyud): 'ad/ ngas byams mams sa ga pa gang cang/ 'apa lags nanang na dab pa rdzo nga // thab na dang was kyis cad pa/ bgang dus su ma can pa yan sa sarnas papas/ thangs tha nang gas pad ga sa pa 'ang / gragasas sasad dang dag pa
71b2(rnying rgyud): das/ nyi ma kyime dzod shes pas bzu 'o// srin mtshams khro ba dmar ba'i kun// zhal gsum mcha ga zigs rnam par bskur// phyag gnyis hUM ki rgya bcings te// dang po rdo rje dril bu 'dzin// g.yas gnyis lcags kyu ral gri 'dzin// g.yon gnyis da
71b3(rnying rgyud): ste zhags pa 'dzin// / 'di 'dra'i gzugs ni pas ma byas nas// rang gis de la bka' stsal to/ !/ hUM kA ras D+hani dza 'gro ba dang sngags kyi gta nas/ nI tra ya ti N+Di Ti zhes dab dang ra de nas ki drangs tho ba dang grags na thogs nas/ rdo rje'i 'khros dang chas nas sram b+ha ni'i rdzogs brgyas
71b4(rnying rgyud): shing sems cad chen po rnams kyi steng du phyogs stong bcu gdan du bting bar byas te/ shar phyogs nas brgya byin po mo gnyis nying gnas lcags kyis bzung nas/ tho bas myos se myos se tsam du brdungs nas so/ babub yog na rgyal du bye chings su bcings nas gdan du gding / de bzhin du shar lho me lha/ lho gshin rje/ lho nub srin po/ nub Ta/ rngub kyang
71b5(rnying rgyud): drung / hung du na rdo rtson/ sra shang dbang ldan/ steng ti klam no/ 'ogs bdag/ shar du tri 'apo mgadangango // hU~M kAr badz+ra mag+na kro d+ha hUM/ 'dod pa'i rgyal po khro bo che/ wang te bu'i ni na pa lug g.yas g.yon to par gan dpa las rdornga rdza kyi 'o ba dang rgyags k+Sha gtad ba las phyogs byong gdan bshangs
71b6(rnying rgyud): lags par gru ba gsol nas rbAng+ka rA dza 'od du su nas d+hi kA ra la btus/ bru~M kA ra Tu nas de sdang rdo rje la bsdus pa'o// rdo rje pho ba lcags kyu 'dzin// gang na bting lags so khro rgyal gtso// rgyal mo dardza rdong blon jo rje k+Shar dmangs na ng+ge rjeng kyi tshul gcig yin// lAr+ya tsan+d+rA ya/ b+ha nga
71b7(rnying rgyud): de tin nying/ id+hA ye/ shang rdzing po nyung kya rgya chen/ ag+na ye/ gang lhor dgyes steng du be he/ ya mA ya/ hor menye'i nying du ga ni dang / rde rje t+ya sa/ ho zung zhidi ster du srin po/ ba ru NA ya/ chub cu srin te naH/ ba ya the/ hru bya sha pa'i steng b+h+ya \u0f7f/ ku bai rA y+ra/ byang sto nyi du gnod byed/
72a1(rnying rgyud): shanas/ gas nyims pa// ga zum gnyi gzugs chen 'bar bas 'jigs pa pa'o// zlam ban+d+ha dag sung nas ma// rmilas bskyong pa ti gas/ mas sa

72a3(rnying rgyud): dang po khor ro// bar ma badz+ra/ tha ma zhags pa/ bidz+dzita bi ta ma hr-i ta kA N+Da li badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha zhes pas byang tu bdud rtsi bkyil ba/ zhalags pa phyag dug su mdog ldang thug lasas reg so nang bar/ phrag dang po rdo rnga drilas/ galas gnyis don rkyen 'gri g.yon gagis parda kyabs so// hU~M hra na thata a ba rang ta 'adz+rab dA kroH zhes pa
72a4(rnying rgyud): ra ser ba mnar byed dkar po/ g.yas dkar po g.yon dmar g.yas pa gsum na rim pa bzhin/ mda' bo che/ 'khor lo ral gri/ g.yon pa gas ma na zhags pa rin chen pad+ma'o// ya mAn+ta kri ta ya mAr+d+ha ka badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha/ zhes pas lhor/ ya ma mthar byad lu mdog nag po/ g.yas ljang gu/ g.yon dmar po/ g.yas gsum dbyug pa
72a5(rnying rgyud): rdo rje ra la gre/ g.yon gsum rgya gram rin chen pad+ma'o// nI la daN+Da badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha zhes pas/ lho nub tu dbyug sngon dkar po/ g.yas dam dngag / yon mthing / g.yas dang po bai con/ bar mardo rje/ tha ma gser gyi rdo rje dpung mgor 'byar/ g.yon dang po sdigs mdzug/ bar ma rin chen/ tha ma pa zla'o// kr-i TA k+ki rA dza badz+ra ma hA kro ha zhes
72a6(rnying rgyud): pas nub byang du 'dod pa'i rgyas pa dmar po/ g.yas g.yon gnyis ka lngang s+ya/ phyag dang po gnyis brdol nas thugs kar phyag rgya/ g.yas gnyis lcags kyu dang mda'/ g.yo gnyis zhags pa dang gzu'o// ma g+na ba la badz+ra ma hA krata/ zhes pas kyang shar du stobs po che/ g.yas sdang g.yon sngang bya/ g.yas dang po dza Na/ @8
72a7(rnying rgyud): pa la bi/ tha ma rdo rje phrag par 'phyar/ g.yon dang po lags pa sdigs 'acoM/ bar ma gnyis bskyab pa rlas gcod/ thab gnyis rgyab kra'o/ hU~M A d+ya a tsal badra ma kho d+ha zhes pas/ shar lhod yig yo mgon po dmar nag/ g.yas lngang g.yon dmar/ g.yas gsum ra' gre rin chen rdo rje/ g.yon gsum zhags pa pad+ma rin chen do
72b1(rnying rgyud): ka ma la tu rna la badz+ra ma hA tho d+ha zhes pas 'og tu badra 'byel pa dmar pogayas rdo phyagayon dkar/ g.yas gsum 'khor lo brta rdoH/ g.yon gsum ne'u le ba ng+ka dril bu'o// hr-i kAr badz+ram hA kro d+ha zhes pas/ sted du hU~M kAr mthing nag/ g.yas dkar g.yon dkar/ g.yas g.yon dang po gnyis rdorje dril ba grags kar brjom/
72b2(rnying rgyud): g.yas gnyis lcags gyur la gri/ g.yon gnyis dgra sna zhags pa'o// de kun kyang zhabs g.yas brtsangs g.yon bsums pa/ dbu 'thod pa skam pos brgyan pa/ yul dang thod pas se ral bar brgyan pa/ bskal ba'i me 'bar ba'i nang na bzhugs pa'o// zhabs rnams yang na phur pa'o// smad ni rtse mor rnam par bsam/
72b3(rnying rgyud): phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor rnams su yang // rim pa bzhin du kun tu bsam// bgegs rnams thams cad gzhig pa'i phyir// gdab pa ni 'khor ba'i 'dre ldog/ dug gsumatha' nas gtsar/ phyogs sbyor ra gdab ba ni dper na cha' bo brtson du bzung nas dmangs chas la dbebs pa ltar nga be dbang du
72b4(rnying rgyud): lu pa'o// gnod mdzes bka' stsal phur pas gdab// oM g+ha g+ha g+ha ta ya g+ha ta ya/ sarba duSh+T+r-i na phaT/ kI la ya kI la ya/ sarba pA paM hU~M/ badz+ra kI la ya/ badz+ra d+ha rod a d+ho pa ya ti/ kA ya bAka tsit+ta badz+ra kI la ya/ Tak+ki rA dza badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ !bdag le
72b5(rnying rgyud): drang rdo rje'i phyag g.yas nas stsal ba'i gro ba bdud rtsi lakhyil ba ba rnams nas/ khro bo btul renge zhing ga nas bzud ste/ bgegs pa sngar pas btab gnod mdzes kyi phyag da thob bsdams pas bur ba'i phyi bor brdeg pas phyogs spyod lagal thung nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la thal byung bar bas ma mo/ dA/ hU~M khro bo'i rgyal po 'di dag gis//
72b6(rnying rgyud): bgogs ni bkug nas rnam par 'dzag/ blo ldan rab tu sbyor ba yi// cho ga bzhin tu phur kun thob/ !lnga pa gdab pa'i dgos pa ni/ phur pa gdab pa yang phyogs skyong ni chos kyi dbyings yin la/ phur pa ni thugs yang dag pa'i ye shes yin/ hur bas btab ste rtse mo mar la lhag gis dkrung ba ni thugs yang
72b7(rnying rgyud): dag pa'i ye shes kyis chos kyi dbyings gtid nas rtogs pa'i don yin no// de ltar phur pa btab nas phyogs mtshams snyed 'og kun khro bo'i bskal pa'i med sang sgo da'i dbyibs lta bu'i nang du khro bo bsgom pa'o// phur pa 'debs mkhan ni khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil bas bya ste/ bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i phyag g.yon du khro bor phur pa rnams blangs la/ g.yas
73a1(rnying rgyud): bdan dam khyithom kyib rnam la gdababapa'o// rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyal chen po// rdo rje phur bur nyid gnas pas// srangal ldan pa'i 'dab 'dra ba'i/ bag san 'a'ad pa sa nga sasus bcan pa'i smin gas pa dod pa// dbar da
73a2(rnying rgyud): phreng bas 'khrigs pa'i 'od// lte ba man chad chas rnams ni/ gur byar bas ma pa'o// rtse mo lta bur rnam par bsam// ro stong khro bo lta bu nyid/ ka' gsum phyag dug/ zhal gsum phyag kyang drug pa ste// bgegs kyi tshogs la rab tu gzin/ phyogs rjong btsun ci dag
73a3(rnying rgyud): bas na dge ba'i gegs byed pas na bshegs yin no// de yi sngags 'di brjod byas nas// rdo rje phur pas nges btab na/ rnalcagasas ma ning 'phur ba brgyabyas nas dang sa chod pan btags na pa phyogs myong brgyal gdam mo// bgegs lus shin tu mi g.yo ba'o/ !/ rdo rje'i thob phyag brnams
73a4(rnying rgyud): mchog/ gnod mdzes rgyal po rnam par bsgom/ 8// hU~M brjod 'bar ba'i lta bas ni// bgegs rnams thams cad phur kun gdab/ gnod mdzes kyi cag na de rje'i thob thogs pas spyi bo nas bdung zhing gdab bar bya'o// phyogs mtshams kun tu rdo rje'i me// rnam par 'phro ba

73b4(rnying rgyud): gnan pa ni/ dong gsam thas kyim par gnan/ bdag lta ba ci dag ge skong gnan/ mtshan pa dmigs rten 'a ga gnas/ cad dugacu pa tshon bud kyis gnas/ rdo rnga rtsamam kyis pagacad do// gangam spong drag pa tho bdang // shes pa'i sngon pa sa ga ba ba/ dam gri phur pas gdab// dur khrod chen po'i

74a1(rnying rgyud): ri rab kyis gnan pasan/ ya ma rA dza'i zas su sbyin/ bod pa'achi bdag gzong byer nga ba cugapas na// chu srin 'bar ba'i kha du brdzang / gzhi gi 'anas pa 'byor ba pe/ g.yam tha la nang / 'khor lo 'bar ba'i phyi ra kyi phyag rgyas gnan/ teg sa bris pa

76b1(rnying rgyud): chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// gsang ba'i dam can 'a kyi zu gag nas sa so nas// thams cad thugs rjes bkang zin gyis/ ban ga than cad pa yang pa ta / dag nyid du ma man rang rnas sa dngas/
76b2(rnying rgyud): gang te ma/ ci ste mi 'gro bar 'dir 'dug gyur na// rdo rje 'dzin rgyal khros nas kyang / kho bo rdo rjeganod kyi rdzang nanagayas rgya gram gapon gra mdzub ca gyis// de ma thag tu nyid bkas nas ni// bdun brgyud rigs kyang brlag par 'gyur// bden pa bdar zhing bslad par
76b3(rnying rgyud): gyu/ bden pang ra ba ni/ gsang babs kyang ches gas dpa/ yang gas dbugs kyi dkyil 'khor/ bka' gsang zad du byung ba/ ngur khrod 'bar ba mchog ci gnas 'dir 'dra ba'i lha la ma gtogs pa bgegs rigs stod phrag brgyad cu'i rigs su gyur ba/ mi men mi cu rtsu ba/ lha min lta ru rtsug/ gsad sngags bla na med pa'i bka' dang dmachogs mnos
76b4(rnying rgyud): shing / sngags nyan pa mi dbang baphyag tu brta la mi bang ba/ rnal 'byor ba ma ched dang byas drag kyi cho srog gi bar du gcod cing / dngos bub kyi bgegs gcu byed pa de dag bkas pa'i med pang 'bar bsrog gi spang bu yi gnas pa'am/ mar los ma 'chu'i big+ha pa mi gnas pa'am/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ba/ mun pa'i ga ni mi gnas pa bzhin du mganas par dengs shig/ rdo
76b5(rnying rgyud): rje gnod sbyin gshed po che/ gangs spyod du thos nas pabegs padz+ra po rgor du 'angasangs mtshams gcad/ au badz+ra kro d+ha d+h+r-i kA ra hUM ga rdza gar+dz+dza hU~M phaT/ teng thaM ka da l+h+wa mang 'gatha rnams pa rbad bugs pa dang/ oM badra kro ta bi dza ya hrI ha na ha na hU~M phaT/ ge dunam par byung ba dgang po 'byor po 'dru sa bu sang tha
76b6(rnying rgyud): cad 'dra/ g.yas bsnor g.yon bskor 'dra/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha nI la daN+Da hU~M da ha da ha hUM phaT/ shad stor dbyug bsngon po dbyug pa thogs pa/ smad sngags pur/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ya mAn+ta ka hU~M pa tsa ba tsa hUM phaT/ lhong gnin rje gshed mthing nag mi mig dbyug pa/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha Ar+ya a tsa la hU~M ban+d+ha ba d+ha hU~M phaT/ oM rus ta mig yo ba
76b7(rnying rgyud): 'jug ta la tha thas sa sa // rgyal pa nga mas thams la sa sa sa
77a1(rnying rgyud): d+hA hU~M phaT/ tha theb ba Tha da Nab pa ngas pa/ oM badz+ra kra d+ha ShA ma kya bi dza la hU~M b+hin+da d+hin+da th+wI phaT/ thang gar bamams ma rgyalas ga la/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA ba la hU~M sngo Ta mAT phaT/ po da ba brgya gsu k+Shab/ byu
77a2(rnying rgyud): phung ba'o// de wang rdo rje'i phyag g.yas bad+ma ba'i steng na dbang bo su rdzag don ti ma'i steng na yum tha'i sa bon/ de la thobasu byas nas dor cho brdol bas rigs lnga yab yum spong ba byas pa'i mtshams nas mtshon cha sna tshogs bir trog dbab pa'o// khrob 'tshob pa phyeg mtshan sna tshogs pa bsdams pa'o// 'khor lo'i thogs/ oM / rdo
77a3(rnying rgyud): ngob pa hU~M hUM/ rin po r+b+ha traM b+h+rUM/ parba hrI shrI/ rgya zan a b+h+re/ rdzags 'dis rigs lab sum myor mtshams nag mi'i cho pa smos nas phyag na mtshon cha 'chogs thogs papa pagegs rnams paskang nas tshur 'dus nas mtshon marnams mdun du srung ba nag bro bo rnams dang mthim nan+da oM dz+wa la badz+ra/ man+ta sum ha mi/ men+da dz+wa la
77a4(rnying rgyud): badz+ra/ badz+ra dz+wa la badz+ra hU~M baT// g.yas pa dpa' bo 'bu lnga yab/ sa sa kyi ma nas nga galas sa ni sA trA~M swA hA/ sa pos 'gas 'angang// g.yon pa dpa' mo 'bru lnga yum/ dab las sum pa ba ma na 'o yang mi na
77a5(rnying rgyud): brlob bya ba dang / bgegs pa bka' bsgo babyas la mtshams gcad do/ !rigs rdza las srul ba'i mtshan chal bka' ba rgod ni/ nam mkhang stong nga mas sprin ldang ba ltar g.yas skor du bgegs pa slad ga yon bskor du mtshams gcad do/ bdegs paka no sa ni 'bregs kyis rab dang 'dra ba'i gyur de la tshur la 'da' mi nus par bsam par bya'o// nga yi
77a6(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor brtan bya'i phyir// khro rgyal byen rlabs las byung ba'i// mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// dkyil 'khor rim pa tshul bzhin bsrungs// steng yang rdo rje'i bla re la// 'og kyang rdo rje'i sa gzhi gcal// phyogs mtshams rdo rjes gtams pa
77a7(rnying rgyud): las// gsang ba rdo rje'i mtshams las ma 'da' zhig/ de ri chos kyi brel/ 'khor lo deng ral gri dang dbyug tho dang // phur bu rnaM nas shes par bya/ rdo rje'i tshul mchog nyid// de dag rang rang so so yi// phyag rgya rab tu bcas nas kyang / 9 ldeg tu ni zung man
77b1(rnying rgyud): na dgams nan/
77b2(rnying rgyud): a / sa bas ga nas ma la / marnamamams ga pag// gsan na da sa jug
77b3(rnying rgyud): badz+ra badz+ra raH/ dz+nyAn na/ 'odas/ 9 hrI dz+hi rje da/ ton pas d+ha ra \u0f7f/ rbang ShI li kI la sa ra/ dra lta gadza gas maN+Dag bcid dang shi med /
77b4(rnying rgyud): nam// su yang 'da' bar ma byed cig/ ji ste bka' las 'das gyur na/ de dado so yin cag ma r+sa/ waM ba lcags gyur bcas pa yis// snying nas drang zhing brdung bar bya'o// thabs dang shes rab rji / rdo rje dril/ rdul 'dzin to/ @
77b5(rnying rgyud): rkang po dz+ra yang ma tham yang la rgya gram pas pa/ ga nga ni 'i b+ha9/ g.yas brkyang shar la nyod ma rdzam g.yon brgyang ste/ dr-i ny+ya dang shi sa/ zlum po hU~M ba la tha khra ba'i byung // mtshams ni rje'i 'bros kyi'i ba skor nas/ mas
77b6(rnying rgyud): rdo rjer gtangs pa samam byin gyis brlabs dang thos nga ga 'o// 'gyod rtogs ting 'dzin dang pa'i mas/ na matan lag nyid kyiH/ ma~M bas pan d-i/ yang ba pa ma mtshan ba dang // bang nga b+ha sa dzig pa dang
77b7(rnying rgyud): theg pa dang / dang nab pas mi ban pa byed thasang mo// rdza sa'i dag di/ tsa rnams pa gas gi kyang cad ni y-id tu gyis da ga ngas paH/ yanan ta dang dzin gas pa la das su mamod de/ dzin po'i sa / dpa pa bya na rji dpa sa
77b8(rnying rgyud): nyams pa'i ra pa bshags pa dang / sa ga 'ang kyi sgri pa dang // rab tu bag bye kyig thugs pa
78a1(rnying rgyud): sar grar drab me/ da ga yi na/ thob ma padang / na sa rubanan/ u'adanga'am/ ngag 'dang ma batha 'a ngan ma tugs/ sa gas sa thas 'angacha ba mtha 'arjo pa rgyangs// sems nyid chog tu'i ni ring
78a2(rnying rgyud): rlung // sa gzhi rtsigs pa bla re gu rA/ !de nyid rlung sems kyi mtshams ni// sems kyi rang bzhin srog 'dzin pa'i drung mi gi kr-i gnas te/ hU~MH gcig brog pas col 'a ba'i drung du phyi rol du 'bros te/ spyi de las 'og tu 'thos pas rdo rje'i sa nazhi/ phyogs su thos pas rdo rdzi'i cig pa'o// nyer du 'bros pas diji thar/ 9
78a3(rnying rgyud): gyur ba ni/ srog gi rlung sems nyid las/ rtsol ba'i rlung sems kyi ldang bar gyur nas srung ba'i 'khor lor gyur pa'o// kun gzhi chos nyid pho brang na/ de kho na nyid kyi bshags pa ni rang gi kun gzhi chos nyid kyi boT mud 'dra kyi grong khyer chen por gnas pa de na// yid kyi rang phyung ye shes lha/ 'di dang byung gi ye shes dpal kun tu bachar
78a4(rnying rgyud): pa don slob med pa'i ltar gnas pa la// nyon mongs pa lnga rtsal ba rigs lnga bcom ldan 'das/ su zugs shi/ mug rnam dang / zheng nga mi brjod pa/ daH pa rinang drung / 'dod chags snang mtha'/ theg dog don po thub par bzhugs so// sgo lnga'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams/ dbang po sngo lnga 'khor te/
78a5(rnying rgyud): mig ga debang dpos nyid byams pal 'gram/ nabasgribs la gyi nang la ba sum/ sna lhan ras dmigs kyi nang lab kram/ lce phyag nor rtse nang yang sram/ lus kyi dbang blong yab yum du ye nas gnas par gzugs pa lags// rtsa gnas snod du lus khams sbyaru/ sras la gnas pa rba de/ mchod pa'i rnang yin la bras mas/
78a6(rnying rgyud): kyi bud ci mchod pa'i rdzas su ye nas gnas pa yin te/ bdud rtsi lnga lang sems can kun gyi sras la gnas so// rang sngags byin rla bas rlung gis dbu la/ rang gi lus la grub pa'i sngags dpa' bo 'bru lnga nyid ye nas brtad rtsi byin gyis rlabs pa'i sngags yin/ snying po rlung gi spro bsdus rlung bzung nas lus kyis sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par mchod pa
78a7(rnying rgyud): jama'o// mnyes nas lus dang ngag yid la/ gyi sgrib pa thasasangs byas su ma shes pa dang / ngag rdzags su mags pa dang / sems chos zur ma zhes pa'o// mi shes pa kho na pa reg pa yin ngas na thob pa dang / gas pa ni sgrib pa dag pararo// sgrib la mi gnas rang grol bshags/ de ltar rtogs pas thob
78b1(rnying rgyud): 'gan na man/ dang po sa yigs mnas sa gas thasams/ ga sa// zhes gsungs so// n+ya ga mogus pa pas/ mtshams kyi sbyin las kyis par chad bas pa 'a rtag bdag pan/ nan
78b2(rnying rgyud): bshags kyi skrod kyi tsam sags sa de/ chos thams ca dun mang dra zungs pa yin pa/ rkang btsam pa nang bzhags ni/ jugs drags nang brtson 'i yin te/ der gyi don cog chod ni rgyamatshan nyid dang can/ mngon zhir chod pa bri la dang thad/ phyogs rtsong mtshar cad cang pagang bab kyi pa thams so//
78b3(rnying rgyud): mtshams dam pri blo byang pa sogs pa dang ba dang can no// don 'ayo srin las kyi ma pa yinano// zlab ba zol bar cad byung ba rnams pas pa shing gyi nang gi mtshams gad par bya ba'i/ chog rim pa rnams pang nas yang du gsungs bas na/ btag ro/ !btag pa ni sengs ca kyi thugs gnyis su 'de pa'i ba she te/ rtogs par byed pa
78b4(rnying rgyud): btag pa'o zer ro// rto cing rdzogs par byed pa'o/ yang na/ sim+bi ta'i sba las/ kawa saM pa ta ni/ zhes bya ba yin te/ bod skad du/ tog pa'am/ btag pa'am/ chog 'am/ cho gzhib mo yin gsungasas// yi ge 'di nyid tha ma'i phyag dpe' mi dazhugs so// gzhan nas gsungs 'di ngo bos bring so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
78b5(rnying rgyud): gsang ba rmang du byung ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so// dkyil 'khor nub phyogs mtha'o de bzhin gzhi/ thod kyu zhal nub tu brtan slob dpon dgongs pa'i gzhi yang // kham phor te thong ba dbul ri mo bris pa'i tha dgu// snang ba'i 'od mar med bu dang bcas par
78b6(rnying rgyud): dgra maHdkyil 'khor/ rdzas kyis mdzes par 'khor bar bzhag/ la mtha' chang gis byang bskod ro// mig gi bde ba'i rten lum ting nge 'dzin rten zas sbrul sogs yang mngon par bri/ sde dbam mo// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor/ su gsum thun gyis bu'ang 'og min na gnas/ so// gzugs
78b7(rnying rgyud): brtan g+hi chu'am rnam grangs ni gser dngul lugs ma dang ni// rdo la brkos ma 'am ba so la 'bur sh+ya ba rkos shing // ras ba la la sogs pa las thags su btags pa dang khang pu dang / ste b+ha khang bris pa'i// sa 'am 'dring pa'i gzugs khye so de da dasas ma shing la sogs pa la
79a1(rnying rgyud): ri mo nges pa dang / sa jogs pas/ rdul tshun du zab 'dang la sogs pa na ma saldan rnams pas bya ba mang po rnams// rnal 'byor sgrub pa'i rgya mar zad dang thar/ ra gzhisas sa / chud dang rtsa dang byed pa dang sa sngags pa/
79a2(rnying rgyud): ba ca can// de nyid btsuni nyog pa pa yogs yongs su / ngag/ yan matan / dkyil 'khor bri ba'i las la btsan/ 88// ga ses pa sa'adom gang gru bzhi dashing pa ba da pas chag gang la// yang na sung kyi kya sa
79a3(rnying rgyud): da gang thang chu sems na ma mong la gas te/ debazhin gaganas pa'i gsang mchog ngasaHbsgrub pa'i bya bka' sa ma gsang mang du thang ba'i dkyil 'khar 'dar/
79a4(rnying rgyud): ri bang ma ma da cig da nas/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor na na ma 'ams ca sa kyi chag chag 'debs/ 'o ba bani sa thags // oM ma hA shes dz+nyA na maN+Dal dpa pa hU~M/ mi rang theg nga yin rji #/ brjod
79a5(rnying rgyud): chen po zhes lngar ldan pas// de ba'i nagashegs pa'i gsang mchog bgrub pa'i phyir/ rdzag bka' snye ma sa gsang mang du byung ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir/ dra pa da ma na da 9/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khong chen po tshig chag

79b1(rnying rgyud): gsang rmad du byung ba'i dkyil 'khor du// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang mchog/ ma sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyis rang rtsi'i mtshan nyid rtogs par byed pa nye de bsgrub pa'i phyir/ bad 'byung gnas gang yin na// mkha' dbyings rnam dag yum gyi gzhal yas nas// rak+ta gsang ba'i
79b2(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor skangs pa'i dmajas chen por spro/ dkyil 'khor gyi nub tu byas par bya'o/ ma hA rak+ta maN+Da la hUM/ bdud rtsi dri chu ye shes lngar ldan pas/ bdud kyi dri chus chag chag gdangs bas bu phug ron gyi ske 'am ma bu'i mdangos star dri chu 'dag lnga ldan no// ye shes las byung chu bzung ba'i me shes 'gyu
79b3(rnying rgyud): las rgyang ba'o// dag pa las kyi chu// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bya bgrub pa'i ye shes kyis phrin las ma lus pa 'grub bte rtogs dka'alas gsang mchog pasgrub pa'i phyir/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ bka' rtogs par dka' das gsang rmad du phyung ba'i dkyil 'khor du// gsang ba'i dkyi
79b4(rnying rgyud): 'khor chen po chag chag 'debs/ lha don mod ba pa'i gzhas yag khang du gnas par byad ngo gra'i chus phyag go/ oM ma hA ma ma ki ri tri tsa maN+Da dkyi 'dor la hUM/ dbus nas shar te/ dbus nas byang chu sems dang / shar dudri chen dang / lhor me pa/ zlab du pad ma// byang du chus/ g.yas bskor
79b5(rnying rgyud): gdab/ bas/ dbus chos kyi kyi sa/ shar mchog/ nyom nyam nyid/ zub po sar rtag pa/ gyad bya bzlab pa'i// ye shes lnga yi byin rlabs phebs par bsam// ras pa la pad+ma'i chus pa dang // shi ba'i sgra yi skud pa 'am// ba su ta yi thig spang byas/ thig sudal bani te/ rtswa gyi stang ras pang
79b6(rnying rgyud): pa/ sa zung gza jug gang ga me dang rnam pa ni gzum// ye shes maldan cad steng gi thig/ dpa dzi dgi 'i dam ma 'a byan ces// sa thig da na cad gsum bcwal ma 'ad pa dan/ sra ga
79b7(rnying rgyud): thugs/ mi rad brgyan gyi dor ma'i che brgyas par bsam/ !/ slob dpon nub ca thags thathams cad dang dbyed pa pa'o// gan nogs sus pa gsupa/ dang po bcas/ bar dums su dkrug/ bamar byin pa rang ro/ dang na cul rigasas ma/ the'u rigs sam/ dmangs ma/ thar 'das/ gdos pa'i chum mtshan ldan na// chas ni lus /
80a1(rnying rgyud): bya/ zhing pos thags/ bathal bas// bgags drang / kudag dgas so// rkyen gyis brlab pa na/ yang tu lha bor thig su dang zhag sa rjod du 'anas zhag pa byang chub sems su byin brlab/ phrang gyi gyi ngor bzhag pas sus kyi zhag pa zung sems pabyin kyi brlab ba/ la shar du yum/ bzhugs te 'de
80a2(rnying rgyud): shes // bkra shis pas mtshogasas mtshan ldan kyis sun mong bub po/ gzungs ma'i y+ra ma/ su'i yon tan ni/ zhal nas u t+pal dang ldan zhing / ut+pal mdzes pa dang / ngang zhes pa dang / thab cam dang dang / brang bas thang bar bde ba ltar/ su 'dzes par mthan dper tshang / dri zhem bsam mo mkha nga
80a3(rnying rgyud): 'dra/ rak+ta 'a ngas dam rngas tshang/ kun nas 'phrog par grangs dam tshig mi nyam sra ba do// gsang 'i bon ta// skad kyang dang pa gzhon nu 'dra// snyan par smra zhed tshul dang ldan// bkra shis mtshan ldan grags kyi yon nan yid du Shor// mnyen lhag 'khrel ldem dbyer me phyed/
80a4(rnying rgyud): yo tan gyi yon ta// rdo rje las kyi don grub ma// gnyis med sbyor ba'i byin rlangs kyis/ byang ses dag da ma rnal bar ngas than byed pa'i rna yin pas/ des ga papas rang bzhin lha kyis byung ba'i gzhas pas pang 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o// dang gramam kha na cig bris pa gdang pa'o// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor zin las kyi yon tan zhig 'degs sis/
80a5(rnying rgyud): las rnams ma lus kun gyis shig/ sa ma ya ho// sa ma ya stAM/ de nas ba ga dab ni la la/ ngangs kyab brtsid rig blang dbring chos nyid du rtogs pa'o// gnyis pa gas babyang chub sa mas kyi ga ni/ theg kyad lus kyis ma' ma bangs pas nyag pa byang chub sebs dkar phred 'byes song ba / yum the ma pang thakhams sa ga
80a6(rnying rgyud): ba'o// gsum pa ting nge 'dzin ci thig ni steng drang tab pas gzhal yas langadu gyur ba'o// 'og tu btab pal 'og bzhab bas khang du gyur ba'o// bzhid rdul tshon gyi theg na phye ba'o// thabs dang gsang byang chung sems tshi cig gang ba shes rab ldan pa'i byin rlabs las/ theg pa dogs kyi bre rog man chad kyi/ gsang ba mchog she
80a7(rnying rgyud): 'khor chen po 'dir// gsang ba byang chub sems kyi thig/ khyang kyi zung sems yum gyi mngar pa 'angs big tu gyu dang / btab pas// ye shes gzhal yas de gzhas pas 'ang rna 'am pa yum gyi mkhar pra to/ pho brang ldan gyis grub// oM gu h+ya e kra dz+nyA na ma ta la hU~M/ 8ting nge 'dzin gyi tshig
80b1(rnying rgyud): ne// ye shes lnga ldan gnam thog gis// steng gi 'jig rten gri 'aras paras dang dkyil 'khor lo za gnas pas 'dang sngar gyur/ bad bam mo// sa thig pa khyabs 'og gi 'jig rten gyi nas thams cad yang // dkyil 'khor po zang gag thams 'ang chen por gyur par bsas pa 'a/
80b2(rnying rgyud): thas tha rtan pa/ thabs dang shes rab ldan pa'i byin rlabs las// gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir// gsang ba byang chub sems kyi thig btab pas// dur khrod bdal ba'i gzhal yas lhun gyis grub/ b+h+rUM bi shwa bi shud+d+he/ badz+ra dz+nyA na tsakra/
80b3(rnying rgyud): d+ha la hU~M/ mtsho nang dul tshon gyi thig ni dbus mi 'gyur ba'i thig/ shad me long / nyo mnyam nyid/ nub so sor rtog pa/ byang bya ba thub pa/ ye tag kyi gzhal yas khang kha kyi bur khrod 'bar bar bsam mo/ !drug batshon bstan pa ga gsum ste/ rgya/ rak+ta/ byin rlabs so// chu la gsum ste rab bstan no// 'khor los grub pa'i rgyal
80b4(rnying rgyud): po'i rdzas// pra sha ra ga gser dang ni// pad+ma rA ga mar ka ta// in+da nI la tshon du s+pha ru/ tshon gyi chu bgan pa lagasas te/ b+he dang / nab dang / gas // kyi lagasus te/ rabang kyipa jo shi po dag khos tu rgyal med pa'i dbang du shang ba te/ dag ba nam
80b5(rnying rgyud): du sha rag las byas pa'o// ser po gser/ dmang ba pad+ma rAg/ ljang gu mar gad/ mthing ga in+d+ra nI la'o// de yang chu bzang na byin rlabs che ba dang / tshogs rdzogs pa dang brtas pa mi bya ba'i dgos pa yod de/ chu bzang po la kun dad pas sems dang bskyengs byin rlabs che'o// tshogs rdzogs pa ni sa tshon bla ba dang mched kyis tshags byas nas sangs
80b6(rnying rgyud): rgyas kyi sku gzugs bzhengs pa'o// brnyas pa mi bya ba ni blun po bablang rdzi lta bu lad tshul bsrung bar 'gyur te/ hral ba'i bran yang yid ches ni nga ba'o// dbyed gi/ mi yi dbang pos byar lte dkarda po/ nas sa ma 'bras/ las byas pa dang / ser po/ pra Sho las byas pa dang / dbar dro ram bu nas dmar grol bya dang / rdza dbu nas sab
80b7(rnying rgyud): nas ci/ nag pos nam la sogs paH// ldang pa sran ma la sogs pa// 'bring dang zhi ba'i tshon du bshad/ zhib rdo rjod dbye sa bye kyi 'ber bakhyad par du chen 'bu snga rdza las bya'o// dur khrod kyi rdzas dang dbang po thal chen ser po ldong ros dang / dab ro gas pa/ de yi so phag rdzang bu drang dzod dam pa !
81a1(rnying rgyud): ba dang // sol bas bri ba ma ya nga zab sa// dkyil 'khor dag la rab tu nas/ da yang / so / do thal sa sa las ra ba bab la ldan/ / skrag a bskur pa dam ba bya ba dang / 'jig sa las kya du
81a2(rnying rgyud): las byas dang phan po 'du bsregs pa zhin kun song sa// tha ma'i rdul tshon dag tu bshad/ ba nigs pa'i ma tsho po batha bi ta ba ma tshan ldan ci rba ts+tsha'o// ri mo gcig pa zhes bya ba// de dag thams cad ri mo gcig/ chags pa'i ra byang chub sems
81a3(rnying rgyud): gang rdza na 'i// dkyil 'khor kun kya gdug panan ca pa gag ba/ gre tshon rtsir bshad// yig 'bu lngas byin brlabs pa// phyag mtshan rig lnga yab yum 'gyur// sa ma ya hU~M/ sa ma pa lnga/ rA ga ya me/ dza d+hi Nid+ha trA na ma d+ha la d+h+waM/ rdzas
81a4(rnying rgyud): bdag na yo gang gan cig brang 'thos dngas pa dgas das dngar byan/ de yos dras pas cag sa ca thar gyur/ de'o tha ngas man dza dgas 'ad bas sogs sngang bar ba gas pa'o// rang bzhin 'byung ba lnga yi khyad par las/ rkyen cing rab nata/ sru pa de ga 'ide/ the ba gas ra gyung po na

86a1(rnying rgyud): bsum du gsal// nabanan tan sa kyi zanan sa byas// bdag ga sa zhug / don zhugs ma ldan gyis drug/ gzhan dan gnanas dan ma ngan pa

86a3(rnying rgyud): nya mi dang bye ba'i mun nag pas la ru gsol/ gron pa med pa'i nga du myongs// stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi ngo bo kyis// snod btu gnyi ka dag ma dag kun gyi 'jig rten dang // 'khor ba dang ni byang chub kun/ sdod bsu ma chos dang gang zag gi bdag med pa// thams cad stong zhing bdag med
86a4(rnying rgyud): de/ namama'ang nyam/ stong pa nyid kyi tshul gyis ne/ kun la phan ras/ byams pa chen pa'i shar rto gzhal yas su// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// dgyes shing btan par bzhugs nas kyang / bas/ 'khor ba/ khams gsum cung drug tu byams cing sdom
86a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i mun nag bsal du gsol/ bde ba chen po'i skem par 'jug pas na// 'da' dka' thugs kyi ye shes kyis/ sdug bsngal na bden pa dbyer med par// rtogs pa mnyam pa nyid du bzhag/ bde ba zhugs thig le 'u chags pa gsung // ting nge 'dzin gyi sku gsum rdzogs/ thugs len pa
86a6(rnying rgyud): las// mi 'da' ba yi tshul gyis ni/ bdal brtsebs// gling rje chen po rto 'ub tu rin chen gzhal yas su// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// dgyes shing brtan ba bzhugs nas kyang / dngos pas/ ting 'dzin gsal du mi stong ba'i khrig pa cing rgod rmongs pa'i
86a7(rnying rgyud): mun pa bsal du gsol/ 'khor gams cad la nas can ba dag ya // dbyings su sgrol ba'i ye shes kyis// 'khor ba'i khri mun dab ba las/ (sa thun dang nas rang ba / lha gsung thugs su ldan gyis sgrol/ 'tsho ba na// ya dol byed pa'i tshul gyisan/
86b1(rnying rgyud): yang zab na dag // dga' ba chen po mgyur bse yi gzhal yas su// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsal// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs nas kyang / 1dzang ga ma na nan pa ra nyid dang gi gta// martogs ma sar 'dzin pa'i spyad
86b2(rnying rgyud): nag bsal du gsol/ bdag da chen po gas pa sa// klong du gyur pa'i ye shes kyis// snod kyi 'jig rten nya'i gdas gzhal yas khang // bcud kyi 'jig rten ka'i \u0f7f/ khrag 'thung tshogs/ khro zar du ma byas shing len // lun gyis grub pa'i tshul gyis ni
86b3(rnying rgyud): bzang ngand kye bsal medapas// btang snyoms chen po rgya shar rdo rje'i gzhal yas su// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// dgyes shing brtan pang bzhugs nas kyang / bsta khyod bsgom bsrub la sbyin ci log tu bstabs na// phyin ci log gi mun pa bsal du
86b4(rnying rgyud): gsol// oM ma hA dz+nyA na de ba hU~M/ sngags 'di ye shes dgu po re la brjod par byed// sa ma ya ho/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan/ !de yang mchog mi las kyi bas mchog phran dung 'gro las/ phye ba la babral bya'i zhing bcu yod de/ dkon mchog slob dpon su dgra dang / dam med dam las log pa dang / 'dus
86b5(rnying rgyud): pa 'od dang yongs la gnod/ dam dgra ngan pa'i ngang tshul can/ ngan song gsum zhes pa'i// zhing btsu R+YA tra'i tshogs rnams bsgra la byas nas// sha chen lang ling rkang gi dum bu dang / 'dod chags khrag gis sbags pa'i/ duras btab pa'i gnas nas sha khrag gi khrod yod pas na// zhing gi ras ros dur khrod
86b6(rnying rgyud): rdzas chen rnams/ rang gzhan gyi don thung bas na// dpal gyi ba mal bal gsang ba'i gtso bo las 'khor gyis bskor bab na dkyil 'khor bskor bar bya// srid pa gsum gyi skye ba'i sring bas gdug pa can du skyes/ nanga'i srid pas na dganor/ 'chi ba'i sri dpas tshe thod do// gdug pa kun bsgral te// shes rab zab/
86b7(rnying rgyud): mo'i yum gyi mkha' dbyings su// mtha' dang dbus med dkyil 'khor rang bzhin te/ cho ba dbyings mtha' byas dang thal bas na dus gsums sa cas 'khor dacas bajugs pa yon nyid dkyil 'khor de// phyi nang med par lhun gyis grub pa'i rdzas/ chos nyid la phyi nang med pas de na bzhugs pa'i rna dang rgyas menas
87a1(rnying rgyud): 'jug/ yid bzhin sa mas na pa pa da 'a gyus yongs spyod 'dod dag / 'byung ba ste// ye shes zin pa bzhi dang ldan pa'i spyugs// zug dag sa spangs zhing gi g.yang gzha'ang/ ga ma ba dbangasas 'dab dang /
87a2(rnying rgyud): por bzhing rang bzhi nags so// dkyil 'khor chen po'i bla de dgram par bya'o/ ! sa gdog ce ba na tshan nyid pa dang 'gus pa par mimathan pag dog sa sangs pas sa bgrub pa'i legs tog/ de rtog pas grang bta bar na ba sdung / brtab na pa spangs pa nyid can paShab pa'i thang po
87a3(rnying rgyud): bzlog drar ba 'i dang grags zung bya'i ba lam 'ad// rdzogs pa mtshams bzhi gathug pa dang // mtha' yang kyang gisnyen thas a sa/ me sa pa brdzun yus pa 'gas// ba
87a4(rnying rgyud): ta'i du pa shegs pas medzang bskyod// dpal bshos rmal mar rnams// thig me dgu pa gas ni nga mas sa 'i/ 'bral ba dang // nang du krung bu'i gtor ma dang / sa// dmar gyi ag chen po dang / nod pa ga
87a5(rnying rgyud): da// 'chi med bdud rtsi'i bum pa dang / byag san ga// mchod pa rnams casde po dang / da gabs / zab ma mchog sa che zan dang / / mda' dang 'a dang lda maca dngas
87a6(rnying rgyud): sna ngas nga// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor mtha' ma brjor// 'das pa ya yus pan nadapa/ rig sa// yum ni mtshan ldan dmatshig bkad/ ma san pa na du 'i yo sa 'dig ci
87a7(rnying rgyud): kyis brlab par byas nas ni// mig go rten drug yon phyogs bzhag// ma nga pagasas mdas/ gangs su pa dag/ kro d+he sh+'u tad yin no// da / na nas// bu mo yakhas pas legs bkal ba // thigs
87b1(rnying rgyud): bzang yag nga du rnamatshan ldan gyis brtags pa/ phra ras gre b+ha skyes pa dang mthing bas dpa'i shun gos/ na go sa du rjod rdzams// brkyang gang pang // dur khrod mag la bas mamar shing gi mgasapas brgyangs nas ni// tshon gyi sbyin med bzang po yis// thod pa lnga ya kod dung/
87b2(rnying rgyud): rnang // dpa' bo 'bru lnga mthi ga'i thod pa'i nang du tha~M dkar por oM ser por snad mar por I pra bur hA/ ye shes kyis/ lha bco rtsa ba dang yan lag zi/ dam tshig dang ldan zhing gyi nad gas pa'i dbang thob pa'i// lha bzo gzugs dang tshon gyi grib la mkhas pas bris la'i sku/ he rbaka la ke
87b3(rnying rgyud): brgyad kyis bskor ba'i// lha dgu'i dkyil 'khor bzang po na/ dgos pa ni// sgrub pa po rnams dgos pa yang // ting 'dzin gsal phyir mig rten dgram/ bas bskyed rim la brtan pa ste/ gang zab tho man rnams pas phadag dgas pa'i phyir// thad su'i chub tu snga thugs chos su drim med pa
87b4(rnying rgyud): sa po sarba/ gang dngu la sru byin gyis brgyangs pa do// gsum gyis// byin rlabs sngags kyang bri bar b+ha'o// oM ye d+harmA Nos he tu N+ya pra b+ha lA/ he tud+h+ye ShAn+ta thA ga to h+ya ba data/ teSh+Thany+tsa mo ni ro d+ha e baM bA dI ma hA shra ma NaHswA hA// chos srur byin gyis brlabs pa'i
87b5(rnying rgyud): sngags so// nam pa'angag tha ba gzugs du gnyis bung nas don mngo sa na mdzud do/ au badz+ra ku sha smr-i ti Thad ba u ta sa/ saM mra ka/ yang dgu par/ a ri ti/ i tra sa ya thod a gaN+ye/ Ar+Ya ba ti/ 'gas pa/ u stan du gye ni ku ru swA hA/ 'ongs sus bcu'i gyi sems pa'i
87b6(rnying rgyud): do mdzad pa ska byang chub sems dpa' don mdzad pa po// longs sur byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags so// oM badz+ra dz+nyA na pany+tsa kA ya/ rdo rje ye shes lnga'i sra/ gu Na gtu bu mi tra sha kra ni ka ru/ sarba dz+nyA na bAka sa man+ta/ a mo g+hA ya swA hA/ don yod pa'i sra// sbal slar byen
87b7(rnying rgyud): gyis rlob pa'i sngags so// mang ba brgyan ti kyi na bar da ba ltar sems ca cad mang dpang sama'o// chub gro// rang gi lus nyid dur khron gyi gzhal yas khang / thushes pa sa te// lus nyid dkyil 'khor 'dom gang la/ rangangs mi mnyam pa med pas bu dang shed
88a1(rnying rgyud): pam zhugs // na sa / pas/ dang na // / sa// rnam kyis mangs pa ga dgabapa
88a2(rnying rgyud): mgo/ d+ha dang yan lag ba pa / dkyil 'khor rgyan// kun ga zhi ga sa yang ba pa ma sa/ sram gyi gong bya'i nang // med ni dang thung gi sa na pa me drags la// zhes gsangs so// he ru ga phags sems
88a3(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor du dam tshig pa rab se ya bsre bstan bya zhing rdzas dgod pa bstan pa ste/ bcug pa bdun pad+ma// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po byin rlabs dpa ga su 'a kyi da yang da du
88a4(rnying rgyud): dang / ga tha yang bu sa byed mi mardzas/ 'thung ba'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs nas 'di gsungs so// mi dmigs chos la/ ma kyi to nyid pa gyi sa brtags shing // ye shes can gyis sprin stobs kyis/
88a5(rnying rgyud): 'ab yang dang pa'i rigs smra pa'i stob kyi/ gnas dang rtsub papa la lags pa// thams cad tshul bzhin da nas phu ba byin gyis brlabs/ rkyen gyis brla pa dgod ma pa ni thams cad// nus mthu can du de dag 'gyur// dbang skar chen po'i ting 'dzin ni/ drang // rlon
88a6(rnying rgyud): du thamangs dbang rnams thob pa dang // dam tshig yad pa steng rjer byeb ldan pa yis/ gnas / ngan pa'i las rje/ rnams dag byas la/ gan// dur khrod kyi sam gdapa'as 'das ni byin gyis brlabs// chos dkyis mkhatsha kyi ma yi
88a7(rnying rgyud): bzhin pa pa'i 'jigs byed dang bar gnas/ sa dbye dag pa gag sa pa ma dang / rang da cigapas gyur bdabapa par po 'is sags kyi la bkyang na kyang byed byi rnams pa / 'dag par rnamam/ sapa dbying ba dag / de'i dang pe shes kyi dbang ba ba thag lnga pa'
88b1(rnying rgyud): mo// 'ad ba na bar banir rab kyis dadu hU~M las legs pas zu ba gagang yas yang bskam mo// jigs bya bar ba na/ ng+ra thod bar gnas pas par dang rjod brgyad dang ldan par bskal ma// chab brdad ga/ lha dang dam can gnas 'dir 'dus// rnal 'byor bag yangs bsrub byin
88b2(rnying rgyud): rlobs// dbang sgyur chen po 'grub gyur zhig/ b+h+r-i ka ma la dz+nyA na b+h+rUM// phyag rgya chen po'i ting 'dzin ni/ gnas dur khrod chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi na da pa ldan tsho 'o bad 'dus nas hU~Mn zhes brjod pas gtso ba'i yi ge hU~M las dpal he ru kar bsgom/ g.yon du spel ma skum bskyed/ gsang
88b3(rnying rgyud): thugs su byin gyis brlabs/ ye shes lngas dbang bsrung/ spyan drangs la bstim mo// gtso bo dang ni chog rdzogs nas 'khor byin gyis rlob pa ni/ dbong rnams yi ge he re re las pa'ang 'grom brgyad du bskyed la sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlabs/ ye shes ldan dbang bskur ro// dur khrod chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'dir
88b4(rnying rgyud): skal ldan 'dus pa kun 'tshogs nas/ srubapa po rnams cho ga gsum gyis lhar bskyed pa/ ye shes lngas dbang bskur su gsung thugs su byed gyis brlab bo// gtso bo yab yum sgur bskyed de// byin rlabs cho ga kun rdzogs nas// khro bo'i rgyal po ji bzhin bskyed// 'khor
88b5(rnying rgyud): rnams mkha' 'gro brgyad du gsalnga/ kodro'i brgyad rnams rang rang gi gnas su bskyed do// mkha' 'grom sman drangs la bstem 'khor rnams ma mo brgyad du 'dab nas bskyed pa ni/ ma mo re re la yang dang dang sprul pa ldang po yod pa'o// gsang pa sgrub pa'i mched lha ma rnams/ lha'i phur// phyag rgya chen po rA
88b6(rnying rgyud): ngag yi dgasum lnga'i lugasung dazugs su gas pa lo/ rdzogs gyur cig/ hU~M hU~M ha ha/ !/ 'byung ba da 'byung ba sa'i bdud kyi dus pa lcengs zadag 'doms/ chung bcud kyi nus pa mang bas ngoms par byed/ me gcud bye nus pa rnobs pa'i bar zla/ rlung gi bcud kyi nus pa yid la gyur das sngags par byed/ nang gis mi
88b7(rnying rgyud): pamang ba byed thug brdal ga mo byed pas yang ga do/ bcud len ting 'dzin ni// dang po zang byin kyi ba // bag chags spang byas te// gnyis pa dngos grub rdzas la dbab/ nigacig sman pa dngagazhig go// gsum brgyal ba bras bcas mchod/ de cig
89a1(rnying rgyud): zho dang sna sa bgyu/ / smra gas na la nas/ klu // ma
89a2(rnying rgyud): 'khor da yas// ma ba sa ca // spyan 'dzin pa lus gshegs su gsol/ !/ kA la ki lata ga dga' ba'i bad mas na pa'i yong sa sa nga / ga med 'a d+ha sa pad mtshad ya ts+tsha/ shAm dzar/ kau ga ra
89a3(rnying rgyud): rgod cig ba shA nas 'apag pang tho ba ma da gyis/ gnang bar mdzad// rol gtso na du sos cig dgongs shig 'dod pa te swA kha kha khA ti/ 4ta/ gyen no bskal lo ng+ka rad ra ha ra har zo zhig mastod rnams 'byin // tA hi// ngo mtshar mchog tu bsab
89a4(rnying rgyud): kyis kha la Sha hi bor shes pa mdzod// kye zla ba la sogs dmar chen snying po lnga/ dz+dzaH// mAM sa la sogasug tsho 'phel dpa' bo'i bcud/ 'ag tu/ mtsham tsang ku bu nyid/ tha rig pa pa yi de/ chog cin ya ga nas ya dag dang grag
89a5(rnying rgyud): 'grub bas na// nye ba'i bslab pa'i dngos grub dam pa ma lus rab sbubs shig/ dri med gzi ldan mchog gi mchod pa dam par sbar ba 'di// ye shes rgya mtsho tshul ban sa gaT rnams la 'bul lo rab stsal cig/ bdes tsal dzan/ gzung 'did gnyis mchags papa
89a6(rnying rgyud): chags par yang bsdam du gsol/ 'thong rang gnyisas// ma lus par yang bzhes su gsol/ ra ces par mdzas/ a la la ho/ oM ma ma ki ri kaM ri a ti ti sta swa maM/ dzi ga mam mnyis pa ci ci kyi 'jab gsol/ rjor ngas ga sa lag nga babyed/ gi selas
89a7(rnying rgyud): da sos nagang ci'i mab ga par byed/ bza sa yang sam mang srung te/ 'dzi na 'amabs 'ad pa nga dgas mal 'ad sad ma sa da / den pa nyes pa dpa song ba gas bag cig gangan pa da ga ga pa ya ga yeng sa te
89b1(rnying rgyud): gcig supa po bdang / gcig rdzas gzhan rnams su gtegs de jug go// mi gtsang dag byed ting 'dzin ni// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor las skyes pa// chug tsa ma dang tsan+dan dkar dmar sla pa de'i na ma d+hA kyis gyi stang dul ga kyi dpar po las tshwa zo bang phyag ma dmar mo phyag na rdo'i 'dre bu bskams pa brgyad pa 'og gi sngags 'dib rtsa bcwa/
89b2(rnying rgyud): rab blasangam dri ma nyid po mo pang thug ma dang gnyis su med par bsam mo// chu de rdzas kun labasang bar bya'o// de yang sngon bskal ba kun bkod byab la khyim bdag bgatsang gi ba kye gcong ma zhes bya ba sangs rgyas rnams la gcod mas mchod pa pa dgyes nas/ bdag phye ba 'dir phos nas/ lus sacan dkar dmar gyi sdong por phye bar gyur cig/ sems kyang chub sems
89b3(rnying rgyud): dbang sems mar gyur cing sangs rgyas rnams la dris mchod par gyur cig/ ces brjod pas skye ba de'i 'og rol tu rus pa tsan+dan dkar po'i sdong por skyes pas/ tsan+dan gyong la dri che ba'o// sha khrag tsan+dan dmar por gyur pas gral bshad cing mnyen pa'o// sems byang chub sems dpa' rngon dpal dang khro mo dbang phyug mar gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' tsan+dan dpal gyi
89b4(rnying rgyud): kyigyigri pog pag la che// khro mo dbang phyug ma'i sngags nang ba lagal che bar gyur pa'o// zhes ting 'dzin rig pa mchog gi hud las bshad do// khro mo dbang phyug zhi ba'i chus// bsangs na thams cad dag par 'gyur// A~M chos nyid ye nas rnam par dag pa la// gtsang dang nyes bral blta ba yangs pa'i/
89b5(rnying rgyud): rgya/ gang 'dzin dgapas blta ba'i rgyu// mi gtsang zhen chags stong ba rngan rig dag pa bsgom pa lha yi chu// dri med gtor byas/ yod ba dag pa 'dag pa lhod pa'i chu// bskal pa bsam rig dgangs bag chags 'khrub 'bras bu'i chu/ rdzas dang napa 'gyor mtshan ma// gang la phog kyang dag
89b6(rnying rgyud): cing gtsang bar 'gyur// oM yigs la gro d+hI Sho mo shwa rI dbyings ga/ sarba thams cad drA byaM dag pa sho myong ba d+hA ya/ oM AHhUM hrISh+Tatha// yid bzhin 'bar ba'i ting 'dzin ni// yo byad cha gsum bgo byas nas// mtshams gcad rol pa'i bros sbyangs shing / rdzas dang po
89b7(rnying rgyud): byad byin gyis brlab pa ni/ bsrub rdzas kyi yo byad bcu la sogs pa dang / 'tsho ba bzlog pa'i rdzas go mtshon rnams hU~M dang tI las mtshon cha lngar byin gyis brlab/ mchod rjes lha dang lha mor byin gyis brlabs/ 'tsho ba'i rdzas dang yo byad la/ cha gsum du bgos la/ dang po sngon 'gro'i rdzas bya ste/ sbyin pa gtong ba/ mgon po mchod pa/ mtshams
90a1(rnying rgyud): sa / d+hA sa sa ma na
90a2(rnying rgyud): 'jug la pa/ ga pa'i sa zhi nan so// tshogs kyi longs stod ma lus dang / sas myong 'a// 'khor gyi rgyan ni thams cad kyang / ma log cung pa zag/
90a3(rnying rgyud): khog pa stod spad dang // zhing bcos dang ni lhag du ma dang // rkang dang lha tshigs tsit+ta'i tog/ so so'i bye brag kun tu dgra ma/ mchod ba'i rdzas su sa// gzhan yang dur khrod mchod pa dang // rmad kyang gtor ma sha lnga dang // bdud rtsi lnga dang dpa'
90a4(rnying rgyud): bca// dak+ta ldan gzigs rol mo'i sgo// ma sor 'tshams pa nyid du bkod// sran phrad mchod pag tor ma bcam/ das nas sa// dngos grub d+has su bcas par dgram// lha yi dpag bsam shing chen dang / lha la dag pa ming ba
90a5(rnying rgyud): ma mags sun pa// gnod sbyin la bum pa bzung po drang / la dgos 'dod srung ba// khru y-i gaphrin yid bzhin nor chal dgo nod zungab ltar 'bul/ hU~M rdzas dang khyong da marbaM sa ra t+na trai lo kA phaT/ ches pas yi bzhin gyi do ba rin po cher byin gyis brlab pa'i lug
90a6(rnying rgyud): srugasung thugs ni so ma'i phyag mtshan no// kyi ting 'dzin ni// thar byed gang dag bshad pa ni/ 'a'od ba chags pa'as par bar byed pas ra ho'o// ranyas dkyil lor ti 'i mo gcig pa'i mtshon no// ri mo gcig pa de bzhin te// yang dag thams cad ri mo gcig/ 'dod chags nyid ldan
90a7(rnying rgyud): N+ye me ye shes gsal ma / zhim/ pa'i byed// mig gnyen yang mngon par gzhang // ra daseM pa rig cings// br-ig le ga lam byung ba/ kro dz+haiM tha~M dpal 'bar ma/ nga rjo// thAng p+pa s+t+rai las rab rdzogs pa/
90b1(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor lha dgur gsal/ ga dri dang 'bor galas mapar 'grom ste ska ku gas la par bsgoms la sman rdzangs la bstims pa bcugs sugs pa/ thang sbal dgos pa pa nam dado// lhamachod cing dngos bya blang bar dam bca' ba'i phyir bzhag/ mtshad mo tid nge'i dzin bsgom pa'i phyir bzhag
90b2(rnying rgyud): zhod bye pa'i lha dang dbang po brtag pa'i phyir bzhag/ sgra med na yengs skabs rgyo ba bsang pa'i phyir gzhag go// des na lha gzugs ces so// thod sgra gsung dang thugs kyi mtshon/ zad su dang thod sku chog gsum las lhang bskyed dbang bskur byin brlabs pas// byin brlab rab gnas rdzogs pa'i phyir/
90b3(rnying rgyud): gzhi hrISh+Tha dang spyan drangs pa gnyis gcig tu 'dres te dbyer med bsgom/ dkyil 'khor du// brtan par bzhugs pa'i phyag rgyas bcings nas ni// brtan pad bzhugs ba de la phyi nang gsad pa'i mchod pa'i 'bul ba cho ga thams cad bya/ 'o// bar+t+ta ba de gshegs sku yi
90b4(rnying rgyud): na gyi ming ma cad ci sa// yig ga sa ma la 'brub de gshegs kyi gsung gi gsang/ ming so// mar ma ni bde gshegs kyi thugs kyi thugs/ ma ma / yang ngon gyi sna ga tshang ba yang // don kyi ni bcwa rtsa
90b5(rnying rgyud): brgyad// gting mtha' med pa'i skye 'gro rnams/ sgrub pa thams gsum sems can can yang dag gi ltar bems da pa nas gnas pas na// sangs rgyas sa la dgod du gsol// he ru ka kro d+he shwa ri ha ha b+h+yo// dbyings kong tha dang mad me ye shes ting 'dzin ni// kor bu chos dbyings
90b6(rnying rgyud): yum gyi mkha'// mar me ye shes yab kyi 'od/ byi drwa pa'i bdi ste/ sdugasu mang kyi kyi pa dang / thabs shes kyang chung semasas kyin pa bab/ sngag su sugs su byin thub pa/ dkyil dakhor gsum byin gyis brlab pa'o// dang po ni/ mar ni tshal su/ snying po me dang bcas pa yongs su/ 'od smrab du'o// gnyis ga ni nying ngol pa ste/
90b7(rnying rgyud): snyi rje ma mthatha'i mdzad spyod/ mar ni shes rab tod nyid du gnas pas/ sun rdzob 'don dam gyi gyis zin pa'o// de gnyis las byung ba'i 'od byang chub kyi sems so// yang na kong bu shes rab yum gyi rtag/ mar me thabs rab kyi rdo rje/ 'od de gnyis las byung bas byang sems ba de chen du shar bas/ nyan gyis kyi le gas pade tod gis kun la
91a1(rnying rgyud): ma// gangs na/ dang sa/ 'odog nga/ mang thags banos/ 'di ni/ ma ning can bya byang nga / snyam dpa gags patan byed yang / dang rtog pa dang byung ngas pas mgag ga ma yung pa na ran byed kyipar badra/ da dan bacho
91a2(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa ste/ mar me pa/ dkon pa'i ste dkar ba'i don nas kyar ba ni bsod nams kyi chogs rdzogs/ mar mes bsregs shing mun pa se bas dngos por mthub pa legs kyi tshogs rdzogs so// sku gsum 'gro ba'i don yang mdzad// chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhal yas nas/ mar med kod cing 'bul shi rang bzhin nyid kyi
91a3(rnying rgyud): ngong po bcings gtu 'dzin dang bra' bar gnas so// ye shes chen po sku gsum gyis/ gzugs brtan gyi dkyil ba khor gdul byal sngagasum tra ga ba ni nam mkha' srin dang zang kyi dzub po// 'khor ba'i ma rig mun bsal nas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor nyon mongs shes kyi'i sgrib pa sel ba ning yor ba rnas 'don pa'o//
91a4(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu'i de// 'khor lo tshogs chen sa la gsal/ 'dren par 'apral zhi dkyil khor du bkod la byin gyis brlab bo// oM A lo ke dz+wa la dI pa hU~M hU~M// 'dod yon lha mo'i ting 'dzin ni/ bsgom pa// gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya chos/ 'dod yon nigazugs kyi rga mo dkang po mo so thogs pa sa
91a5(rnying rgyud): dril da thos dri med mo ched/ 'o dmar mo nang zas// rege 'ching gan bzang / chos mthing ga chos dpyad masrid gsu gsum bsnams pa'o// 'bul ba// bla med theg pa 'og ma las mchog gi mchod pa dam par sbyar ba 'di// rdo rje mongs du ga sel yid bzhin bdud rtsi'i mchog/ chos nyid dag pas
91a6(rnying rgyud): rigs lnga'i dam tshig lnga// ye shes/ me song / mnyam nyid/ kun rtog/ grub pa chos dbyings mi gnas pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes so/ lnga yi 'od zer rnam par 'phro// 'dod pa'i yon tan gzugs/ wa/ hri/ ro/ reg \u0f7f/ chos/ lnga yis rab brgyan pa/ sngon gsang sngags paslabs
91a7(rnying rgyud): rnam kyo rnams 'dzong bdang byeng da lu grol bar jugs dbang bzhes pa// thugs dam bzhin du ci bder bzhes su gsol// oM rU pa gsha sheHs+sa hUM dz+riM ha na tI re/ hri chos kA ya oM// shin tu sgeg pa'i gzi brjid 'badra/ mo nagasos yong rnams pa dkar mo
91b1(rnying rgyud): dra na na chen gleng ba 'bar/ zag // dbyangs ldan med 'thogs pa la nu 'byur/ tha ma sa 'dus // gzugs sangs bsdud pas rgyags bdu ga pa/ ga ba/ dz+nyAn na bang tha 'a gangs pa
91b2(rnying rgyud): tshig gisags so// mr-i// kun tu tshims byed bro bsung thim/ bdan rlom ma mos pa da// blta mdzes rin chen phung po 'gro/ martson pa nyig gi na rdzogs pa med // 'od gsal tshor bas kun tu gsal/ ma mam sa ba rnam 'dab sa// bdud cing me tho 'am
91b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i dbyangs/ dri 'jog pa thang // d+hA ngos su rtse tog hU~M thub pa gan d+hi ma sa ma ma mr-i pachog snron// rig pa'i rlabs las byung ba yi// lha mo tshogs kyi mchod pa 'di/ na te/ rkyen ga / de ba byed pa // dam /
91b4(rnying rgyud): de sasabad thas sa dngo sa sbyor b.ro// nam nyid pagam te/ nan ta ci dang / ting ga bye dang / bdatus ngong bachid do// dang ni dgege ngas 'tha' // nyid po kyi zhing sa pa rtogs par rinam pa dag pabyang chu ses kyi drangs bams so// 'ded 'ang bye dag da // gang ma bad me pa
91b5(rnying rgyud): thas ga yang ma// gar dang dbyangs su bcas nas kyang // gzungs dang dbyings su 'bral lags kyis// sgor chen tshul du bzhes sugs la// gzhan yang thabs tshul mtha' yas pa'i/ nga na pa la da pa / ma thas da
91b6(rnying rgyud): da/ da / sa das da pamed pa nyi da 'ad pa dmig ma sa medapa sos mi ga / dab pa rtag pa gsu sa/ bzhi ga gas ma mas mas can
91b7(rnying rgyud): sas da // gra/ bcad sprin ma dmyigs bdum tha/ na// rnam pakhang mdzad ci gter la sogs/ gas wa// bla ma marjid srin rab thabs rnams/ sa gsungs pa// dang byas pa
92a1(rnying rgyud): nya'athal lags bya/ ru ga nas// sngon gyi thags dam rdzas dgangs te// dkyil khang can du bzhas sags pa// A hA jam gas ca pa / nas nas cang dang las ngas sa na/
92a2(rnying rgyud): sa ma ya tAM/ shes rang / stod pa thabs snying rje'i bdag nyid ni/ yar gyi dru gsung thugs btan/ bla'i che ba dasung gi ci zugs kyi kyis las tu rdo rje' bajalas sum du thos pa'o// so rtagag/ zhi gnas/ mdagags ga/ lhag mthong dbyer ded zung du 'brel/ thag cha ba// bde ba las 'khrungs rdo rje
92a3(rnying rgyud): 'chang ba yi// dngos po dngos med 'byung gnas che per mkhyen/ don ngas kun rdzob mkhyen pa blags/ gsung gi cig/ gsung ldan yi ges brjod padz+ra'igs kun la khyab pa yi// spros med gsung du 'dzag rten lce meng don gyigasung dbang phyag bzhugs/ lung gang ba nga
92a4(rnying rgyud): mi gsung lha mo ma bcas 'dul mdzad pa// g+ha chus 'phrul da tshul lnga ldan pa ya rto gams su mang dun tshus yin pa 'ga' ma mchis// gang du bde chen don tan cigatus pa ba tong rang bzhin rjes chags pa'i/ zas/ na chung dag dang lhan cig bzhad mdzad de/
92a5(rnying rgyud): g.yas kyi phyag gis dang po thabs kyirdo rje gsor nas kyang // g.yon pa yis ni ngang ma shes rab dril bu'i sgra snyan spogs// lha mo mtha' dag btsun mor gyur pa yis/ phyi nang lha mo brgyad kyang brtson mor gyur pa te/ rigs gang la mchod pa'i lha mo yum du rtsa'o// dam tshig rnams kyi bya ba byas
92a6(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur// gcig gi lag pas g.yas kyi bdams lus la 'khyud pa'o// kun la 'khyud pa ste// gnyis pa/ g.yon gyi bar mas thod pa bdud rtse'i bdebs bkang / rjes su chags phyir bde ba'i mthu// gsum pa mi zad g.yas kyi thas na me tog phreng bas brgyan pa'i gzu 'dzin/ me tog phreng ba 'thor//
92a7(rnying rgyud): bzhi pa bde ba yis ni gapan gyi thasan rang reg teg pa'i mda' yang 'phen// gang zhig gru 'di len par byed pa ni// bde ba rdo rje can dang mnyam par 'gyur/ thangs ting rje chen par// rdo rje gsor ba snying rje chen po yis// dril bu gsel ba ni shes rab stong pa nyid/ 8// gang

93a1(rnying rgyud): bsu dgos pas namathong nga po thar mi 'da' bar gyi'o// dam tshig mchog gi mchod pa dam pa 'dis// rgyal ba rigs pa/ sras/ sems dpa' semasas bcas rigs kyi rang rang gi yum rnams dang // phyag brtan gtum chen rngam pa'i tshogs la sogs/

93a3(rnying rgyud): ne// phreng bzhi gyi yi sbyor ba dang / kye'i byung dang bsapa pan pag ba cad pa ste/ 'artson ba 'i/ mam rtsonam cing badra den sdi tu dang// sgo bzhi nang gi spong ba dang / rab gyig dang 'ogag pa das pa tshig shang rung ba shang da man / gan pa rje rtse badra/ sub ci rtapa tugod /

93a5(rnying rgyud): bcom dang / mchog tu dang tsas dang / rnam tog za' baji de ba tsas dang / bded dang tong bar byer med pa'o// de ni ni yon nyin tu sbyor ba'o// ma lus thams cad bde stong gcigadakhor dmamams pa das chen pogacig tu gnas par byed pa phras yin pas dgapas kyang de nyer du rtogs par rtsa/ ting nge 'don gyis kyang daskang du
93a6(rnying rgyud): rgom nyid kyid kyis brlab par bya ba yin no// shin tu 'gyings pa'i dpa' bo sgeg pa dang / yaban mas la dmings nas me brjod pa'o// bkra shis mtshan ldan mi mos brgyan pa gnyis/ g.yon du dmigs rten yum bzhag pa la dmigs nas che ba brjod pa'o// dpa' bo dgyes pa'i sbyor mchod bde ba yang / 5 /

93b1(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor ma lus mchag bgadang // thangs pa dang shes rab sto pa ldan par 'das kya sbyor mchod kyis/ po ba sa nga so pa// 'phags pa thams cad yangams mnyes pa'i mchod pa 'phrul// mnyam nyid dbyings su rtogs pade'i shes byas

93b4(rnying rgyud): ma bdu ci'i ma cad pani dang gi nyinanamasas pang bathos/ tsad sa nanal/ ma gyi/ sa pa/ pa ma the' dang nom/ de dzin na spongangs/ mngad datshe/ redas dang
93b5(rnying rgyud): dga' gabar byor 'bras pas/ dgas da dri/ mdzin pa'i mal zis/ u phyoba'i mo 'as/ 'das nas ga' tshigs kyi ta ba tud nas rdo rjo lam bcang / dum kyis 'ang 'a ngas/ thang grangs pas tsa phreng thag gas pa'i ngas nas d+ha dang dzin pa pa tham 'jog/ chag pa 'i 'i dgangs/ sanags pa kyi rkyo nga sti

94a1(rnying rgyud): byang byams rna phyogs kyi ta tu do rje'i 'am nas kyang / phreng babyang cu gyil sa nas byang te/ rta dzin kyi na mtshams su legapas/ rna banas su byam rgya 'bang babangs nas/ dang bo dra rdzal brims pas/ del cab dang dras pas 'dags pa mchod/ 'bodon cem param
94a2(rnying rgyud): 'o su nas/ yig bya dang nyis su ma par byung bas/ au kar ba dang pa/ brdza ma nga lang dang / dre mdzi nga brdzi ba dasum dugasal pa las byag pazhedapa bsrud das ba gas ris/ bdag byin brgyad/ dbas dris tang na na nyis byas/ ye shes kyi dud ci bdaga' khrims das/ bdag gi ba btungs/ 'ang gang cig
94a3(rnying rgyud): nas kyang na phreng brdu bye las nas byung te/ rtam grin sa tham/ de yang 'od du yum bzhi dang bcas pa bu/ yi ge 'bu gsum yang 'od bu sunas kyang sems cu nyig dkar po nya bsam mo// sbyangs thog gsum pa gsung thugs su// gnod sbyin phyag/ wA de nas yadz+r-in bu d+da la'i rdzogs kyis bdud kyi song po
94a4(rnying rgyud): rdo rje gnod kyin gan pag nod kyi mche ba rdzogs pa grangs med pa zlos pas dam sri dmangar po la sogs par gcod thams cad tha' bar brlag par bsam/ tshung 'dus te 'og phyogs mtshams thams cad khro bos gang ba dbas ma mo/ rgod ma che ba can// da ma sri bar du garjod pa bsreng// chos rnams rang bzhin dag pa

94a7(rnying rgyud): mr-ita kur+d+ha li badz+ra ya k+Sha kro d+ha ha na ha na hUM phaT/ !/ khang rdo rje da byid kyis cing mtshangs ga dang rjigs pa na dun nus// oM d+harma a mr-i ta bi hud+he kuN+Da li d+harma d+ha tu hrI u/ bdud ci 'grongs rngub po// bdud cings dpa'i thags pan bdun rdzas dang nyid bang pa'i sngags so// sman dud
94b1(rnying rgyud): ma bsdu bar mdad pa'i phyir/ dam na sa// nal 'byor dbang skrag pa ba'i dkyil 'byor 'dang / rgyal bag khring 'ar tshogs mthod pa gyur// sman pa rdzas ngasan can kyang sbyang ba// chal brgya ba co lachang lam mnga'a'ang // drung
94b2(rnying rgyud): dam dgongs la rmad grags bslang ba'i phyir// gnyis su rtog pas 'grub par mi 'gyur te// dag pa nyid kyi dge pa nyid mchod ni// sgrib pa gnyis byang sgra gsum lhun grub 'gyur// dpa' mchog rdo rje sems dpar zhal 'ches la// skya gsung thugs kyi
94b3(rnying rgyud): ba gsol ba rnams// dus gsum rgyal ba rnams dang mnyam skyong ba'i// rnal 'byor mchog gi grub pa'i rtags kyis gsol// a la la haM// de nas gre sgong bsdu thams brjod nas rdziso/ ba gsungs// sman du sbyor ba gang byed pa// 'tsho med 'dud rtsir swA yan

95a2(rnying rgyud): sa rdo rje gyur pas dkrugs pas rba rlabs phyogs brgyar 'phyog/ de las 'dang yon gyi lha mo smin 'thabar bsam/ dang ras rtang gsum ra gyur/ gnyis pas snang du 'dus/ gsum pas b+ha la mchod pa'o// dpa' bo pr-in pas pa de me 'grub pa med pas na me ba rnams/ dpa' mo yar rnams g.yog 'khor bcas pa
