95a5(rnying rgyud): rdzas kyis gter ma ni/ 'a sa lam dbang dab ba ci rko zhi min gto / bdu ni rnan pa rdzalas kyang ba gtor ma nan/ nga phen par mi gakor ba nazhag gras su mig bar gar ba rnamapa te/ thugs ka' brdeg pa rang na 'a ma par ban nang ga shing brda' ba'o// khyad par ngadapal gyi gtor ma tshugs na nya la/
95a6(rnying rgyud): ga khrag dmar gyi gtor ma 'ben du bca'/ ni rgyan ga khrug la byas nas dab bgegs kyi sring ga btsugs na de la thun rtsi ngas na bza' ba'i ga khag 'bul lo// thugs rjes yul pa'i gtor ma yongs la khyab/ nang dub gtod chung rgyun tu gtong ba de mkha' 'gro ma byas pa dang 'gro drug 'a bsngob 'o// rig pa byin
95a7(rnying rgyud): rlab kyi gtor ma rnam pa gsu / nicig pa zed par du byed kyi ma/ dgas dang / gas 'gas pa sathag/ dam na dag sa dang / rnaMs na/ skye sa gagasas 'a 'byed/ gang dang/ bajugangs 'da' byeg pagra tu babyedang te/ gzug kyi ma dag mam 'a gas /
95b1(rnying rgyud): da/ thas satha ga dngas pa/ 'dang man las/ rag tu 'i na pa / tsha gco mig can yo ga pa dang ngag/ bdi na sa kyida'i 'das 'o/ rtsi gci kyi 'grub ni rin chen khang pa gtor ma'i rjod/ deng dang / brgyad ni ha'am
95b2(rnying rgyud): s+yai las yongs gyur pa// 'dod pa'i yon tan drug gi rnamar sbal// saM ba liM te/ ti ba la ni/ bal ba ti thAHsa ma ya swA hA// snod ni las brta'i gzhal las khang // gter ma hU~M ta yig 'bru phyag mtshan phra// rkyen yang dag na ste dgrang das
95b3(rnying rgyud): hUM ha/ smye 'am gnar gdong blta shes kyi gzhal las 'dadu/ treg 'as zhab zas dang dmangs su spang ba dab khrag 'thung gi ga tso byed kyi dkyil 'khor du gyur pa len pa te ma byung du bye kyis brlabs pa der/ mchod srin pa gtor ma dang rna tshogs kyi gtor mna'as 'ang dman snga chas nyid tha ma' ral ba man ma nyid du ra te/
95b4(rnying rgyud): bo sprin dang bcas pa des mamed par pyid gyis brla po// gsang ba nyi ma zla ba'i ga'u nanga?/ snron 'alas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang / a las rba pa'i dkyil mo nga/ bA zhig grab b+har thabs shes rab nang du/ bcud mi dkar la dngas pa/ maH dam dal 'tshong ba/ hU~M mthing pa 'dri ba b.las su gsung thugs kyi byed cis
95b5(rnying rgyud): par byed pa'i byang chub sems kyi bdang rdzir byin gyis brla bo// byang chub sems s+ya sha lha bdud rtsir zhu/ yug khams pas cung ba'i bdud kyi dngag lnga yang badra ci nyid du tho// thabs dang shes rab tshogs su ldan gyis grub// au AHd+h+waM/ !gtor ma bya zhing dgad pani kya gdang 'gyu// mya
95b6(rnying rgyud): brgya mtsho ma dang mkha' 'gro'i tshogs// gnas dang zhing dang dur khrod tshan d+hor gnas// dur khrod gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor du/ las gapasa'an// 'bras bu lnga bsngal sha khrag rus pa'i tshogs// rmad bya' dmanas mchod pa 'di 'bul na/ dam
95b7(rnying rgyud): ca rgya kyi' ba ba 'das kyi gsas / sa nyas/ gsul / ti / yul lu
96a1(rnying rgyud): cag ca bad na/ 'gas nga das ma sa sa ma ma 'das rtsa pa 'ag mas / spang mapa mthamathasacab ga/ thod pa rlan pa'i phyag yis// gnas khang byin gyis brlab par bya// rnarnga rtswa lnga'i phyag cha yis/ ngangang
96a2(rnying rgyud): nyas das ga tang/ zeng tu bur 'thung 'i btad/ das tu gnyis thar babye sol ga tu/ phrin ga tis bcoba'o// 'dus pa lo mo byed kyis brlab// phrin las rnam bzhi'i phyag rgya ste/ gangs ches ma ga so kyis nga sa galal rkang / gdo ba
96a3(rnying rgyud): ngogapas kyi mdzu mo ja bar gtad / l+r-ing mo gti ze sbeng / srin lag mthe'u chung brdol// rdzas dang sa gzhi byin gyis brla baM/ tham bzal lo rtswag por mya nga tho bong gnyis byed du baphreng / mthe' chung garken thur du brkyad// bdud rtsi bum pa'i phyag rgya yis// dza gang bIn gyis brlab par bya// rnang/
96a4(rnying rgyud): rin chen phyag gya mis/ 'bring song 'angag tu thang 'oganyis ca thang srini ga 'azan chung sa par thar bab kyi brtan no// yo byad byin gyis brlab par bya// ka pA pa dang ka tral rka pa 'ag pagalas gsong pa ga 'od nyi par ba/ rta gdong byas/ g.yas gapon mas nasas ma sa 'a nga/
96a5(rnying rgyud): 'thes zung baphreng // bdud kyi byin gyis brlab par bya// ral gri gangs 'the bos mthe'u chung mnan la gzhan gang mang sbeng / thod pas g.yon nyes brjod par byar k+ta brlab// dpal bshos thong bas/ phung rom rdza la ge ba'i nang drang phreng gzhan teb thong pa'o// lag brgya gyur ro// gtor ma la// ko bu
96a6(rnying rgyud): sdong bu sag rtim pa dang thobor rjong du gang kyang / mar me nyid// ral gris gong bzhin sgrol la dza d+h+r-i s+phor/ rtsor ba dzub mo chags byas song mo brjo pa'o// thun mong phyag rgya rnam pa lnga/ thos las rtenan tshung cig tu byas parba dang 'dral btad/ the to sgris pa 'thong ba star/ yang me nyes pa'i dang ngus bo dang rje rdzi pa
96a7(rnying rgyud): nyis rara'o// zhes gsungs sa// he ru ka ya gal po las/ thams cad byin gyis brlabs pa ste/ brtag pa brgyad pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos zos nyid zhi ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin 'di gsungs so// mdang/
96b1(rnying rgyud): ta bus kyad kyis mdzes byas la/ bad/ sgo dbye bar phyag dang brngub par dam bcas te// gnas lugs bdun can po phung po la na cwo gdul b+ha dang / lu 'o// mthar can zung ga pa na 'thub par 'gyur byed gcas// dbang phyug
96b2(rnying rgyud): 'dzin par ldan nas// bgo ba sna tshogs bshad pa ni// tshe yi dam pa thub pa ste/ sel ba da nga 'da'i dran ma riding ltar dab pa'i gas rten no// gos thad ji kyinas dang / bkar ci dang / rjen pa deg/ brtso 'das pa dang/ deb pa da dang ba dang / rdza dag tu bshad pa
96b3(rnying rgyud): yin// ba dag 'dzin gzhan rtogs bdag gzhan du 'don pa med pas na btang snyoms pa'i// rang bzhin rnam par dag par rtogs/ las to/ sgri ba gnyis kyi nyes gyon rnam par dad pas na dag pas bal dngon/ dbyin pa dang na ni// ye shes/ nyes parnams cad da ba nga 'i
96b4(rnying rgyud): gos ni dkar por bstan/ sgrub pa po rang gdon rdzig// rnal 'byo sa la rab pa dbang phyug// chos rnams la dbang badrung bas na sdug pa'o/ na bzar gsol/ lags brjog// chags bya yul 'dapon chags byed gang / spangs nas ni// thugs rjes sems cad thams cad
96b5(rnying rgyud): chags nas 'azod na phyed pas/ phul sus khams dang rtsiganas dbang bye par chags pa te// dbang du gyur yang ma chags te/ sgo gsum sdom pa ni// tshul khrims gos ni 'gro ba dbang dra byed pa'i rtad su/ dmar por bstan/ dper na rkyang baN rtsa byu ba la dang 'phre banan zin bza' gsol ba na rung // rna la
96b6(rnying rgyud): 'byor dbang phyug na bzar gsol/ bas da sung la// bdag tu mi 'dzin pan byams pa yi// yon tan byas pa yid bzhin zhing du na pa tshal gtar chen sngo/ sangs nam zas// kun gyi tha sha ri dad pa kyidagos 'dod skong ba'i phyir/ yongs nga ba// byin pa'i
96b7(rnying rgyud): sa ser bar bstan/ dad pa// rdol 'byung dbang phyug gin bzar gsol/ 'a ga// gnyis mang ru da la pa'i bya ba ba mardzonas las kyi thub pa la/ la// ji ltar 'dul ba she zhing dang mdzad pa//
97a1(rnying rgyud): rgyan kun kyang kyi bde la 'god pa'i phyir/ sa// brtson 'grus gas ni ljang bung bstan// rnal 'byor dbas Tag na bzar gsal/ 5 ma thas pa thapa ga// rdzas nyid dang las bcos su med pa yi/ seM da
97a2(rnying rgyud): khadod mthing ga cir yang rmo tid 'gyur ba med/ cho nyid de// mi 'gyur mi shigA rang bzhin pas/ 'on rtogs pas// shes rab de/ chos nyid mi 'gyur ba 'i gos ni/ ting gar bstan// rnal 'byor dbang phyug na bzar gsol// sra gsung thugs yan las rnams
97a3(rnying rgyud): 'gru ba/ na rnas par brjing pas pra/ smra bdod 'byung bas gsung / zan tog ma chen pas cag pa/ 'dod pa 'aldang bas yor tan/ don mdzong ba ga phrin las so// dbu byan/ ni chos rnam par byed pa kyang rngub kyi yan lag so/ dang ni phyag gdu ba dang / ni brjo 'bras yab dag byang chub la sogs pa// dpung rgyan
97a4(rnying rgyud): stan cha zhin du thang pa do shal dang / ting nge 'dzin// se mo rdo matang stobs dang me tog rgyan/ dga' ba yang dag kyang drug/ byang chub yan lag bdun du bshad/ sa ta rtse gzhes pa/ gtani bdan/ bo rten kyang za / yig ni yan lag te/ byang chub kyi yan lag 'di bdu na mthong ba'i 'am lang lon nyid kyang gra
97a5(rnying rgyud): dur gyung bas na/ byang chub kyi yan lag 'dran zhes \u0f7f/ rnam pa gcig tu/ bi s+kha las 'thung ba med du bgrangs pa'i grangs kyi ris pa bzhin bshad pa tsam du zad de/ byang chub gsum du 'grub pa'i nye ba'i bu 'di 'dun yin pas bsgoms pa'i lam la byang chub yan lag ces bshad do// dam chos rnam 'byed dbu gya rnga yin
97a6(rnying rgyud): chen sbas/ ngang rgyan gyi chos rngam par 'byed pa yang dag kyang zab kyi yan pag brtson pa ste// theg pa so so'i chos rnams ma 'dres par phye nas ston/ pa dang // de yi rtags su rig lnga'i dbu rgyan 'di/ gsom pas rigs ma 'dres par ston to// rnal 'byor dbang phyug dbu yi chun du gsol// dga'
97a7(rnying rgyud): pa yang dag yang chus kyi phanas ga mtshon pa'i mdzes pa'i me tog phreng / don 'thob/ thams cad ma lus mnyes shing dga' bar byed// de yi rtags su me tog phreng ba 'di/ bgastan pa'o// rnal 'byor dbang phyug ma tog tu tshogs kyi phreng ba dang nyan par bya'o// chen po'i
97b1(rnying rgyud): pA yi rgyan du gsol// snyan cha lus sems bsil byeng shin du srungs/ brkyang drab bye ban pag te// nyon mongs 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal rtsa tshangs mangs pa can kyi gangs pas rtsa/ gdungs la// de yi rtags su stan na zan dam ga par ba ca ba nga
97b2(rnying rgyud): bsil byed 'di// rnal 'byor dbang phyug spyan gyi rgyan du gsol// do shal nr-i ting 'dzin yang dag zang ras kyi ra ga te/ dbus mchog phreng ba brgyas// ting 'dzin gyi 'bum phrag lnga tshogs 'gro bar mngod// de dgas
97b3(rnying rgyud): rin chen phreng ba 'di/ gtig gzeng bkang pa bong bur thob pa'o// rnal 'byor dbang phyug phreng ba'i rgyan du gsol// rin chen mchog sbas dbu brgyan dra bu 'di/ hra dran pa yang dag zang chub kyi yan lag/ 'khor ba du ci// chos rnams ma lus ma bsnyems le khyen/
97b4(rnying rgyud): rtags sa rin chen sna tshogs dpung rgyan 'di// rnal 'byor dbang phyug dpung pa'i rgyan du gsol// bdag 'dzin sprul pa lnga tshogs me mo te/ gdo na nas yang dag cung chung ya mag go// bdag gi don nang bu rtogs nas gzhan gyi don gyi mdzad pa// de yi rtags
97b5(rnying rgyud): su mu tig se modo// rnal 'byor dbang phyug mang sadon gyin pa la tho ga pa sa shes 'thor/ chos rnams mams pa 'dabang 'gyur/ zang pa meng sa na sdug po/ chen po'i rgyan du gsol// phrag gdub sna tshogs las mdzad brtson 'grus ldanra/ yang dag byang chung 'dal// dgos
97b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i zin a na pazhes rang bzhan gyi don rnams myur bar 'grub par mdzad// de yi rtags su gser gyi gdu bla 'dri// rnal 'byor dbang phyug phyag gi chun du gsol// wa yi can stod g.yogs gsung mchog slad dkris dang // thugs kyi
97b7(rnying rgyud): ze'u rdzir yon tan gyi zan chos gos dang / thams kyichen/ mdzad pa las kyi phu rung na bza' rnams// bdag nyid chen po chegs bsgyings par dra d+hi/ bar rje chen po bdun dang ldan pag pang tsunas so// tshul khrims rnam dag gos kyis brjid pa'i lu/
98a1(rnying rgyud): naman tu rgyun rna na sa sa sa sa bya // rna nga/
98a2(rnying rgyud): phyag stong g.yogs rjod pa dang rgya lag ngan ra mag ba pa / rgyan du gsol// 'khor ba'i sems can ma stongs par du ni// thugs rjes 'gri ba kun la chags pa'i rtags// gsung mchog thugs rjes chags pa'i slad da kris 'di/ dang ga
98a3(rnying rgyud): ba cis sas sa// rnal 'byor dbang phyug sham thabs rgyan du gsol/ sa kyis dbang das sa thas// cir yangasal la mkhyen pa'i thugs sas sa// shes bya shAn la mamongs ji nyes da ji shes kyi dang mangs chob she ga 'ab pa
98a4(rnying rgyud): dang / rtags su ni// thugs mchog shes rab ldan pa dang kyi cod pan 'di// rnal 'byor dbang phyug chos gos tsha thom tsha man na mams pa dang nan tsum thaM ma dang dran/ rgyun du gsol// rje ba'i yon tan 'gro rnams kun la snang // dpa' zhing gzi brjid rtse
98a5(rnying rgyud): bas bsgyings tags sa// yon tan che ba'i rdzas rje kyi ma ma tan sto bam mi gas pa pazhims ma kyil ma rje mas cad gas pa/ gzi mdangs na bza' 'di// nal 'byor dbang phyug g+ha yi rgyan du 'bul// gsang sngags spyod pa 'i na ma nga
98a6(rnying rgyud): deng ngan 'bri ba 'ad/ da bdal kyi mtshum pag ma byas pa dang / na lam ma pa thos/ zab das sto na ba na sa dang / sathalas kya ngam/ ngan mchog zab ma'ang // snang du ma gyur pa la gas pa'i rtags// mdzad pa'i phyin pas
98a7(rnying rgyud): gang rje gas gas 'di/ me bdun nga nga / 'asu du smu swA hU~M/ thaMd smra smra dam gas// rnal 'byar dbang phyug su la rgyan du gas pa/ gang 'ji te/ se sa pas// sem/ nas ga /
98a8(rnying rgyud): nga ba sems dpas/
98b1(rnying rgyud): blan na la na dang / gsang ba sna nga' tshan rngam/ mag gas mam pa nga// rmang byung zhing khams dga' tshal 'dir/ sa// skal padang ldan pa da nas/ dbang phyug chal ba'i sang // 'dus rdzogs pa sa ma
98b2(rnying rgyud): su khrung bstar/ rig 'dzin rnams// e ma ho// bde dga' bde mchog bde chen grogs// dam tshig srog gi lu gu N+ya dr-i/ rdza sngags su bachud ni gzod gis phral yang ma brel ba ltar gsang sngags kyi mtshig sreg pa bangs kyang me thang ngo // sprul pa'i gshog dugs byas pa/
98b3(rnying rgyud): nyid mkha' la lding bar rigs/ du no gzhog dug rgyas ngas nam yangs gcod pa ltad rnal 'byor ba blta ba/ dmajug spyad pa ting nge 'dzin dpang phrin pas dang dug rgyas nas chos nyid rgya don rtogs nas chos kyi dkyis kyi mapa pa btabs rjong ning tha~Mng dbye da nga // de ring phan chad rgyal ba'i sras// dbang phyug yin pa
98b4(rnying rgyud): ce bder spong / lus ming byas dang pani 'ag 'a theb// dag ge dag 'dang memad kyi ba dad du rigs par yar/ thab thams cad bdas bya/ sbal bam 'o// khan latsha/ chang sa byed/ tshas kun tu chug/ tshad na pazan mo// mang sa 'ang pades shes rgya'o// rnal 'byor gsang ba'i brda bya// bya ba'i lam rnams
98b5(rnying rgyud): thams cad kun// brda yis lnga zhing brda bya'o// gsang mchog lhun grub dkyil 'khor lo// tshad med bzhi yis sgo phye gcig/ rgyal ba/ rigs lnga'i mchog pazhiganyid sangs mtshan pa rgyas bdud bani bcom yon nan dug me ldan mthangs 'das/ sa kyim btanapa
98b6(rnying rgyud): ngasan// zha zhing chug na dugs phra la gongs pa brtag dka' ste// dbang phyug chen po mchog gi lha/ tshogs pa ma sapas bzhin pa// rdzogs pa'i yul phyag 'tshal lo// rig 'dzin 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor rnams/ thagag pas nyid/ yang dag yang da men la bsdub
98b7(rnying rgyud): par dam bcas nas/ sas sus shen grom pa'o// ting nge 'dzin la bad mnams gnas 'gyur ba/ yeshes pa'i bu// phyag rgya chen por bdag gsal bar gyur cig/ bde gshegs sems kyi snying po la/ sen 'gyud pa'as/ sems cad pa dmigasasan/ sangs pade
99a1(rnying rgyud): benas dgazhan phra shAng rkyen yin yang / bdag skyog pa'i dbang gis bor pa'i sems can du snabang te/ sdang ba de 'as rjog nas sangs rgyas kyis la dgod pa'i phyir/ sgrub pa pas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas yin par shes pakho na byang chung mchog na sems babyed pa panano// des thus tshad ti
99a2(rnying rgyud): kyis ni kun rdob dang don dam kyang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa gnyis pas/ can rdor smon pa byang chub mchog tu dang / 'dug pa sems dbyed nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa bkur la/ don dam smos bral du 'dod/ 'dir ni kun rdzob kyang sems ni sems can rnams dang sems sangs kyis yin par ma rtogs par 'khor bar mnyams pa
99a3(rnying rgyud): rin ra/ don dang byang sems ni/ yang dag bsgrub pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos/ khams gsum sems can rnams kyi de kho na nyid dang / dpa' rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs kyi de kho na nyid la gnyis su med cing thadad dang dbyer med par rtogs par bsgom par bya'o// ma rtogs 'khor ba'i sems can rnams// sa
99a4(rnying rgyud): sa la dgod pa'i phyir// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do// sangs rgyas 'di tshe bsgrub bya'i phyir// sku gsum sa la goms par bya/ sangs rgyas bsgrub pa la/ theg pa 'og ma rnams kyis yun ring por bsnyungs nas/ phyis sangs rgyas su bzhug pa lta bu ma yin te/ gsang sngags rje la //
99a5(rnying rgyud): thegapa/ mthong ba'i chos tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas pa'i phyir/ de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la goms par bya zhing / chos su kun tu 'od kyis la byang ba dang / kun tu snang gis la goms par bya zhing yongs su pad+ma can ma goms par bya ba dang / chu'i lam goms par bya zhing sprul su 'khor lo tshog chen gyi sa la sbyangs te/ skyeb phyi ma'i lha dang
99a6(rnying rgyud): las la mi ltos par/ tshe 'di nyid la 'bras bu 'job par byada'o// de ni dmigs pa'i yum te/ rta pal dmigs pa'i yul la sems ta myed par bya ba yin no// zhes brjod cing sems bskyed par bya'o// bskal pa bye bar mi 'grub pa/ nyan thos la sogs theg pa rog mangs/ grangs med gsum du tshogs bsags nas 'bras
99a7(rnying rgyud): lu gnyis thod par 'dod pa ni/ thu bsod rnanams kyi tshogs las 'bras kyi ni gzugs su thong / bzas bu la zhes tshogs pas chos su 'thod par 'dod pa'o// 'dir ni lhang du bsgom pa bsod nams kyi tshogs/ de la rang bzhin med pa ye shes kyi tshogs te/ grags ma dbyer med du bsgom pa'o// tshe gcig 'grub pas khyad par
99b1(rnying rgyud): 'phags/ dang por chos kyi dbyings nyi da // dmigs pa med pa'i don gyis bsto/ draya bzhin na mnata/ dad pa/ can na mang na sa cing dang / mang bdan ngag nam na/ sa 'dacan
99b2(rnying rgyud): nas/ ga ga pa dang gis 'dor ba'i nang / dajig na da 'di nyid napa pa dang / dbras ba thong ba'adags pa zhig 'gas ca tu tsho nangs/ dngang thang du mayin / de zhini chos pa'i yongs bcad pa canas gshes sadasa'i byed dpa dang / sa/ da pa pa da mam 'ad
99b3(rnying rgyud): dgag pa cid/ de de ci chong // de ster nom pa rigs ni/ chos thams cad ni rang gi sems sa 'das pasu/ sems kyis badzin pa nyi dmas pa dang tharapa/ rig pa'i dngos pa par dag pa yin pas/ sems 'atags po sa rnams kyi do ma de dang / rang de sa tong zhing dgag rnapa ma bad sa them
99b4(rnying rgyud): so bar bya'o// de'i rang du mardzasu bahU~M zhes brjod de/ rang gi ma nyid yi ge ya dka thog cig tu gas la par bskos/ a de las thod zer 'phros te/ dngon por snang bathams cad bsregs nas/ slar 'dus pas/ de sung de phral mjug phra tsam du bsam mo// pra yang mthar ting sde/ sar par mi dasam/ bar ya
99b5(rnying rgyud): dang du zhom mo// 'bras bu ni/ de ltar gdongs pas bu chos su/ ye shes ni chos kyi dbyings kyi la zhes thob pa'o// ba sgrub med yum gyi b+ha ga la// brjod med sems kyi ngang du gsal// chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyis// thams cad du yang khyab par bya// btsal med ma
99b6(rnying rgyud): ji zhidu las// kun snang rnam mapa'i mngon nyid 'thung // med pa'i rgyu las ban da bzhos pas ma de bzhin niras da di ni dang ma chags par bya ba dang / bla ma ci tral blangs ba dang / gdasabs dang nyid ga sa pani sa// ni na/ thas cad bye'ad
99b7(rnying rgyud): gong pa danyid pa nigis rnams 'a byang dri rje bar bas/ mad mdang sa can ma med pa pa nyi 'gongasangs pa na shes 'o// ra ni nga rig pa men chos bas cad tha~M gan med papas/ sems narnams kyi de ta rtogs ram/ rjo mi byed ba me pa/ tamag gyi
100a1(rnying rgyud): na dun nasnyan na sa na du tu du na sa
100a2(rnying rgyud): na sa she/ ma 'a ga na pa nisagasas byu pa par du dus
100a3(rnying rgyud): dpa sa/ ma nga ma ba// na la ga 'das lal gas rnam she shes
100a4(rnying rgyud): she sa zhugs/ sa gi / bayan sa la// thezhes sems dpa' gsal ba dag// tshad med pazhosas la sa na par 'jigs// thugasas dang la gnas par/
100a5(rnying rgyud): ba na nims dpa sebs cad pad medade/ 'di de ngas kyang 'ag pa te/ chos thang 'os su bya nabs dod mad pa sangangs rba tha brang das sems dmangon pa dang ma de ga cos bri/ ngadadang ngas dra shi thas gra zhom sa na mabs med padan 'ang/ nga
100a6(rnying rgyud): rtsa langs na/ man ma mas na sa mas pas me / sa sa nga 'di
100a7(rnying rgyud): zhin du sa kyi ma macid so// gas de rang thang chushi sde/ bdag nyin bangs pa da na/ se sadas papa' mab 'dabyas pang // pa'as rgyang shi kyipa 'a'adu/
100b1(rnying rgyud): mtshal// bulam gapang gyis gzugs// phalapa na med pa tad// ngobs mags pa nga byung/ nas/ ga na man nag sa
100b2(rnying rgyud): gtu yig nangs gang te/ dngul kyid ba rtsegs pa padin/ rim pas gan la'as/ yigang tu rnapa shid tu gas la ba banapa'o// ye yAn nam/ 'azhes pa zhe dag dzad du tha ma/ namamakha' chos kyi'i byung gnas bu gsub pa/ ma tha ma pa'i rang bdi// 'dron tron pa da/
100b3(rnying rgyud): zhes pas/ l-i rung 'bas drung gi cing 'bor drub kha bcings pa mtshig grol ma'i ra bzhin/ khadog bye bag tu nom/ ras di tim thal zhes par/ bings bdud kyi cu'i rgya mtho nung po/ sub tam ti rang bzhin padog dkang por brkos/ su zhe ma/ l+r-ilas ga gag bu 'dis lums
100b4(rnying rgyud): byas byan cing bzhin 'dog sar bor banom/ 'azhis mata' zhes pas 'i las rin pa ci'i di dag dog lnga dang dran pa/ gang gti rtsadag dbangs/ sho ba ta la lta bar bsgos/ de hral btal ne las/ rilas po shes ji 'od na'al tha'ad 'thod 'khyil pa/ 'dung ba ba'i rjod nyoms pa/ gos dgang po ra 'di dpa
100b5(rnying rgyud): 'bu lnga'i phra dang ston byam nA'i rang bzhin yi ge 'bratha las tags 'byung ba dz+ra shin tugs la par banom mo/ bkod yum lnga'i chu// mkha' dbyings rnam dag bum lnga'i rtag dkyil 'khor ni// ma bzos zhun grub yum gyi mkha'/ rigs lnga 'bor dang ba yang // rgyal ba
100b6(rnying rgyud): rgya mtsho'i bzhugs gnas rton// rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang// mtha' dang dbus med nam mkha'i rgya// phyi dang nang med kun tu nang // rigs pa'i gdan dang ye shes rgyan/ ra gzhes padag par bzhom pa'i/ rmi zhes brjod pas thugs ga nas tu tha bas
100b7(rnying rgyud): gag zed bung byeng du 'ag pa'am/ wa par bas brjod papa po na kyi thangs mo rdzogs pang nga te/ bding gshes pa chod/ bas cad byed la nam/ btad gas pas dang po'i dru 'das te/ 'a du ba ba ma/ klu'i rjeb badzadun pa la thunapa brjod papa dpo de
101a1(rnying rgyud): sa spya / ba gzu das / sa dam ga sas/ las/ na
101a2(rnying rgyud): dang ngan par bskor ro// gyi nang med par gsal ba mtha' dbus med par khyab par bsgom mo// zhing mdo lto ba snying ga sga la// rlung me chus ri rab tsa ni/ 'thung bsras 'tshang te/ rkang mthel drung / sum mdo me/ sto bcu/ snying gas/ skal tshigs ri rab tu gnas pa'o// de yang nyung gAni lA rA dA ki
101a3(rnying rgyud): 'khor rtog gzhi dang / sum mdo bu gsum po'i dkyil 'khor dang / sto bzlum po chu'i dkyil 'khor dang / snying ga gu bzhi sa'i dkyil 'khor dang / skal tshigs ri rab kyi dkyil 'khor te/ de ltar na dang gi lus dbyigs 'thung ba rim brtsegs su gnas pa'o// zhes tshigs bcang bsdebs pa'o// lus snying ning mi shaM hrI oM / kyi
101a4(rnying rgyud): sgo ning phrin yig driri gnas/ ngam 'tshang she/ ngas kyid ma yong ji nyam pa med padra 'di ting gi sa gno ste/ nang ca pa 'an/ mig pa me/ da nyi paT/ so bar byed/ kye dang 'dod pan/ gabatangs // de yang su dbyeb zhes pa te/ byab 'do gang dra bani gapa la
101a5(rnying rgyud): zhi dang / zhing rnon tshong zhing nga yon/ na dang / 'ab dang / rang byud dang bzhi sgo bzhi'o// nang na ba ni/ yan lag gi gang bca pa ci 'khor rtsig pa bcad dang / mig pan ni/ btsug bu'i bigs pa/ ska lag ni rin chen pha su/ so rba ni ngab byed/ khyer du nod yon phral tha dngas zhes brdab dbangs su gnas pas ni nga
101a6(rnying rgyud): gzhal las khang du gnas so// tshigs bca gong 'og bsngo ba'o// ye shes 'bar pa'i gzhal yas khang // seng ge glang rta rma bya khyung // nyi zla pad+ma rin po che// gtso dang 'khor bcas rim par gsal/ gdang bsgom pa ni/ si/ haM/ aM/ maM/ naM/ zhes brjod pas yig 'bru lnga 'khod pa'i
101a7(rnying rgyud): cing dang nye ba la spos te gsal ba las/ de rnam pa 'od du zhu nas/ dbus su pi las seng ge brgyad du byang bar 'as ma/ hi 'as thar du glang chen/ yi las stor te/ maM las nub tu ma bya/ ni las kyang du gang shang rnams brgyad brgyad du gyur te/ steng na rin po che'i khri rkang bzhi ris sems can gnyis gnyis mjugs dbus su bstan par
101b1(rnying rgyud): tha ded pas mi dkyi 'arjod/ yam ny+dzaka 'a zhes pas pa'i cing ba'o/ bi sa shes par pa dan / na sa pa'i dang ga drab ga 'a can ga// nges pa dang sems pashin ca go// 'ad b.rang rab sras 'di tra dra'i dzi dang bye bzhi cig go// tha cad ma nga
101b2(rnying rgyud): so// mngon par byang ni chub pa dang / 'a'i gsas// zag pa zad par mkhyen pa dang / 'di gas pa// bar du gcod pa'i chos rnams bstan/ bar mi 'dzigan pa// nges par 'brang ba'i lam bstan no/ ba mi 'jigs par/ don tags ni bzhi'as/ mi 'dzis pa
101b3(rnying rgyud): des/ me gsapa/ de na sa pa gas pa de 'ad te/ mi 'dzigs pa nga de bdi gdegs pa la pa lang po das rtsod nas bram thogagaganas nam ma med pa kyi te/ mangs paris sangs banor ding yang dag pa nga ge'i bla thogs pas na mi 'jigs pa zhe pa/ de lamangon par cang chum na
101b4(rnying rgyud): dang / ngadab sa pa da pa ma gsu ma da pab 'a bshe gagado la 'as ma ca/ zang langs da ba ma da / dadaga' dang ma ci shed pa banan da/
101b5(rnying rgyud): du rdzogs pang du 'a so// ba zhes pa nyi sa / shes ca/ tshas da pa 'ogs pa cang byang ba y-i gas par ni/ shad dashes ma mas ca mos mas mams da ta nas sa cad/ ma dang ca na pa she nga pa/ da thong dadang
101b6(rnying rgyud): da ca ma shes pa thodas pa ba ga nga dang / ngas datha ba thal la dpa sa tsha sa pa dang sa dzi das ca papa 'i nga dzi 'ad/ da mem das se mas gco ma ma yod ma bang tha par 'jugs
101b7(rnying rgyud): ga pa yo gathas pa 'di ba nga ba da do// rang ba di gan sa ma sangs ga pa'o// da na la / 'du ga yo da sadas tha dam dbu ga sa su sa danas/
102a1(rnying rgyud): nas nas klunan sa san na na nanas
102a2(rnying rgyud): 'ang radas pa'i tha bta par mi 'digs pa yi te/ bdun tho dang tshang na/ bag med pa dang / bam shes pa// mad pa la sogs pa/ 'dags pa'i ngas dag pa tshogs kyi bar dugaca pa rnams/ bcad bachos nan nas spang brtan cing bgadapa 'a mag ma pa ba med pas na/ bdug dbang mdam pa gzhan bya'i bang
102a3(rnying rgyud): sa ma'i sa na ma man pa dang/ ba ba snyam ma na/ ga/ du ba ma nga ba cang 'a dpa 'tha bya' das dzin// dang gnas 'ashad chen 'dang / bayang rgya /
102a4(rnying rgyud): bcun mchogs parjo ba 'drang ding drug brdzang 'thang byin par bshad papa/ ngas par byung ba bams yin no zhes dag myong dgras pa sa kyang bag de gagan nu ba tung ngam dpasan/ tha bras chogs pas ca da par 'byung ba/ ngas bad+ma byung ba'i lam ba da 'byung ba mi 'jigs pade //
102a5(rnying rgyud): dbyed na rdo rje sems dpa' la mi 'jigs pa mang gi'i khri bathugs pa'o// de bden gshegs pa'i stobs btsun/ dag ta thagatab pa zhes bya ste/ de bzhi da gshegs pa'i mi nas sleb pa med pas zhes kyi'i nga lo gang la yang thogs pa med de/ mkhyen pa 'di babya'i mthunan thos mtshogs pagadan pas kya dang dang da
102a6(rnying rgyud): pas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i todas rtse shes bya/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam sdang gigadan grang ba stobs brgya mnga' ba'o// mi dza ga ba/ id nas/ a nyin su ring bya na pas nab po chos pang gi ba de byag// stang sa drang po ma'i the dang bya ga// gnas dang gnas men mkhyen pa'i stobs/ san sa
102a7(rnying rgyud): das pa gan pa dang gnam ma na par man pa 'i stobs yin te/ gnas ni migs par byed pas mas su da du 'ong ba 'dub ba dang / nyes par byang papa 'bras pa mid du sa 'ong srin par 'gyur bar 'od sa pa 'artsa/ gnam ma rin pan theg par spyad pa'i rab tu ri du mi 'ong bar 'gyur ba dang / nyes rang du ma mi zang du me kyi dang grub
102b1(rnying rgyud): nga ma/ rbad pa dang zad pa man sangs mang tabs dang napa kya gag sa dang gdas sa 'anabs ca pa nyes ka ca// las kyi rnam par smin pa ma khyen par stobs/ ga ma du pa da des na pa me pa pa med pa mam mkhas ni/ bladas na 'a gas cis da
102b2(rnying rgyud): de byang ba yang da thas sa kyi da pa byed pa pa dra ga shi gdang da man pa da na/ 'an byi ba dzin pas da pa ti sa zhes sado// mos pa sa tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs/ sa de lan/ bas pang ga ba pa /
102b3(rnying rgyud): med dang / khams gsum la dag 'a zhing mos pa cwa tshogs ma khyad pas na de skad ces bya'o// khams ni sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs/ DU badran pa' dashes pa khams na tshogs ma byed pa stos pa / khams shems pan son bya ba gachags kyis kya nga ma pa ma dang / rnam
102b4(rnying rgyud): gong bu 'i 'ams la bya te// dmas cadad pa mang po'i dang phyi'i mtshan nyid ma ning ba thugs su chud pas de gad bya'o// dbang po mchog dang mchog min mkhyen/ ma ma ba rdabade dran pa nags pa/ dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa 'i stobs rin ga pa 'jogs pa dang po dang de nga dag
102b5(rnying rgyud): ba dang / nam thangs ma thus pa sa byan pa na// thams cad 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen stobs/ sa nga 'a'idi ba ting tu tsun pa 'anags pa/ thams cad du 'gro ba'i 'aman khyen pa stongs zin na/ 'tho ba thar bye ba'i lan dang / kyang 'das su 'gro ba'i las la sogs par mthams cad kya pa byed papada'o// ldan pa
102b6(rnying rgyud): cad mkhyen pa'i stobs/ sabartan pa kyisom d+him rtis rdzi na bya ba ngan Tu trA na dz+nyAn pa lan zhes pa/ bas gtan dang rnam par thad pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang snyom 'dug pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam byar dang ldang thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs yin te/ bas ma gtan dang po la sogs pang ni dang / rnam par thar pa brkyang dang / ho pa nyid pasogs pa'i
102b7(rnying rgyud): 'don ngo dang/ nga ci ga dang pa mi nga ga pa 'asogs pa dang / da pa na ras pani shib dang / dmigs pa san kyi gan mongs par gyur ba pas/ rnam pa ning 'a chags pa sa da pa dang / mid migs pa dang ldan papa rnam par dag par bya/ yang bani grags dang thad pa dang / saM bra pa dang / yodan
103a1(rnying rgyud): 'jogs pa'i tshul gyis snang bas byen pa bya'o// sngon gnas rjes su dran pa mkhyen/ sa dis su ti rton pa lan zhes byab/ sngon cigs rjesas dran pa ma khyen pa'i stobs yin te/ bdag dang sems can sngon gyi tsho bas drangs med patsun zad gnas gar byas pa dang / byang gzugs kyi rnam cing thab dang /
103a2(rnying rgyud): mchod rtag ci yod pa dang / las kyi rgyagang gis skyes pa ma khyen pas na de skad do// shi 'pho skye ba mkhyen pa'i stobs/ tsu hub brti dz+nyAn pa'i zhes bya ba/ shi 'od bye bam khyen pa'i stobs yin te/ lha'i stan gyis sems can rnams gang nas ning ngo sa nas gang du skye ba ma lus par gzigs pas na/ de da do// zag pa zad pa mkhyen
103a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i stobs/ Amra dak+Sha dz+nyAn pa'i zhes pa/ zag pazad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs yin te/ 'dod chags pa sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa thams cad/ bag chags man chad byung zhing zad par gzigs pas na zag pa zad par mkhyen pa'i stobs gas bya'o// de ltar nam ldang gi gdan srang po ma ni stobs bcu mnga' ba'i rtags sa/ glang po che brgyad bting nas gnas
103a4(rnying rgyud): rin 'byung gi rngu 'phrul gyi rkang pa zhi ni/ balba ha ka zhes bya ba/ rta rin po tse sngo bya'i ming te/ smin gyi thugs ltar mgyogs pas na/ srin gyi thugs can zhes bya te/ ta sngon sprin gyi thugs can den chen 'thung ldan gyi gdan no// tsar+b+hU dzi ri d+hi Thad zhes pa/ tsatA ri ni bzhi/ daM d+ha ni rdzu 'phrul/ bAd ni rkang pa te/ 'dun pa dang / sems pa dang / brtson
103a5(rnying rgyud): 'brus dang / dpyod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin bzhis nam mkha' la 'gro ba la sogs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rten dang / rgyur gyur pa'i na rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa zhes bya ste// 'dun pa'i rdzu 'phrul rkang pa dang / bdun pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni/ sems ting nge 'dzin du 'jog pas lhag par dgang zhing mos pa'i dbang gis
103a6(rnying rgyud): tu ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa'i sgo nas/ sems rtse gcig tu thob pa ni 'dun pa'i ting nge 'dzin no// sems kyi rdzu 'phrul rkang pa dang / sems kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni/ tshe rabs snga ma la bsam gtan bsgoms pa'o// yang na tshe di la sngar nas ting nge 'dzin / bsgoms pa'i bag chags bsags te mun
103a7(rnying rgyud): ring du ba sgoms pa'i thugs kyis rtse gcig thob pa'i phyir ro// brtson 'grus rdzu 'phrul rkang pa dang / brtson 'dus kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du bye dang ldan pa'i du 'phrul kyi dang ni ga shi ci sdig pa mi dge ba chos grang ding gzhin pos dge ba'i ches rnams kyi deng 'grel bar kyal/ thun mi gcod par pa lasasems rtse ga ga tho bar phyir ro//
103b1(rnying rgyud): dpyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'o// dpyod pa'i ting nge dzin myong ba'i 'a byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul ci rkang ni/ dge ba'i bzhes gnyen las dam pa'i chos nyan cing sems pa'i des ba kyis chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid mi rtags pa dang stong pa la sogs par bzhig cing gta la 'bebs te/ the zom med par dpyod dpyad pa pas sems ca gcig thabapa pa bya'o//
103b2(rnying rgyud): tha' las kyi dbang mtha'i gad de// tshol dab bani dang mo 'dod par gnang ngo / dang las la dbang / ngani las kyi dbang du mi 'thob// yo byad dbang zhem ma pa'i mdzad la ma 'a mdzad pa dang mos pa dbang / ba ni gdu ba bar mas su 'gyur ba// smon lam dbang zhigang 'brub ba'o// dang rdzu 'phrul dbang /
103b3(rnying rgyud): ltar 'dod par bgyur ba// skye la dbang sems cadon du gang brgyar du bre baphen pa dang chos la dbang / chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bani stong thugs su chud pa // sems la dbang sems can gang 'dod pa'i don kun gyis thub po/ dang ye shes dbang / sa sa yang dag rig pa bzhis ye shes lnga thugs su chud pas sems can pa thams cad
103b4(rnying rgyud): kyen pas gzigs par mdzad pa'o// dbang bcu rdzogs pa rma bya'i gdan/ don dubakyi shang shang ni/ phrin las te/ tsatAr+tha pram+ba Na zhes pa/ tshad med pa bzhi ste/ sems can dpag tu med pa la byams pa/ snying rje/ dga' ba/ btang snyoms byed par can bsgom pa'o// byams pas sems sems can thams ca dang de ba yang /
103b5(rnying rgyud): sa lan gdagag nyasam pa byanas pa tshad med do// can sdug bsngal bral bar 'dod/ byams pa tshad med ni/ 'jig rten pa dag/ bu tsha nye 'khor la byams pa dang / nyan thos pa dag sems can nyung shas kyi don byed cing byams pa lta bu ma yin te/ sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa ltar snying rje bskyed pa'o// de ltar dngos grub pa'i gdan shang shang /
103b6(rnying rgyud): ni tshad med pa bzhi dang yang ldan pa'o// snying rjes tshad med pa sems can thams cad nyon mong pa dang thal zhing sdug sngal bas la bas phan 'dogs so snyam pa'o// de dag bde dang ldan par 'dod// dga' bas tshad med pa sems can thams cad la gong ma ltar phan pa dang bde ba thams pa legs so nyam du sems pa'o// bdag don
103b7(rnying rgyud): yongs su grub par 'dod/ banying snyoms tshad med pa ni sems can rnams bde dang grol bar bya ba pa/ dgra dang thun du mi 'byed 'dod / par btang snyoms su phan gdags pa'o// gnod pa nad rnams zhi ba dang / phrin lam bzhi dang yang dag ldan te/ shAn+ti ka zhes bya ba gnod pa dang nad la sogs pa zhi bar byed pa'i
104a1(rnying rgyud): sngags kyi ming nye zhing zhes bya'o// tshe dang longs spyod rgyas 'phel zhing / barbo ka zhes pa tshe dang srid dang longs spyod la sogs brgyas shing la rel bar byed pa'i sngags kyi ming yin pas na rgyas zhes bya'o// pha rol sems 'gyur dga' bas dbang / sha ka raN zhes pa par
104a2(rnying rgyud): kyi sems bskur zhing ba dag ci dga' bar bya ba'i sngags kyi ming ste dbang du bya ba zhes bya'o// gnod cing lung bar byed pa'o/ a d+hi tsa ra zhes bya ba gzhan lagano cing phung bar byed pa'i sngags kyi ming ste drag phu la rtsong ba zhe bya phrin las shang shang gi gdan no// rin chen sna bdun mdzad mig dang / ni brtson mo/ stod do// dam
104a3(rnying rgyud): dpon/ nor bu/ rta/ glang ngo / 'khor lo rin po che rnams dang ldan pa'o// sa bcu gcig/ kun tu 'od dang mtshon nyi ma'i gdan/ bcu gnyis ma chags pad+ma spyan/ mtshon pa zla ba'i gdan/ 13/ yi ge 'khor 'o// tshogs chen mtshon papad+ma'i gdan du snang ste 'bras bya'i sa bsum non pa'i rtags su bstan pa'o// rdzogs pa
104a4(rnying rgyud): gdan/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / rig ma dang // zo bo rnams kyi gdan du gnas par bstan pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa// thugs rje che dang ldan pa yi// dkyil 'khor lnga la sogs pa'i 'khor/ thugs rdo rje'i rigs rdo rje sems dpa' dang / yum dbyi ngang phyag na'o//
104a5(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' dbus gnas te/ yang yid kun kyang rang // kun bzang ya ba 'bum chos bu dran bzang mo yu ma nya/ ha min/ yi/ tsal sa / yi dgas dkyil ba thub drug bcas// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'o/ 3/ rnam snang yab yum sangs rgyas kun 'bras gnas te/ nang gi sems dpa
104a6(rnying rgyud): ngab kram/ sa yi snying po sgeg mo dang // byams kyi'i sems dpa' pa bsam pa spos ma gros gshin rje gshed/ yab tsam// sgra yi dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'o// yan tan// drin 'byung yab yum mA ma kI dbus gnas te/ nang ga/ nam mkha'i snying po phreng ba ma/ h+ya8// sgrib
104a7(rnying rgyud): sel me tog zho cha stobs po che/ 'ang yul// yon tan dkyil 'khor gsum pa'o// gtsang / sdang mtha' yab yum pos dkar mo 'dus gnas te/ nang gi/ spyan ras gzigs dang glu ma dang / phyid// kun bzang mar me sgob rta mgrin dpal/ yang zhum// gsung gi
104b1(rnying rgyud): dgang ngan pa la sa / ngadathab lab sum dpon thang ba dbus gnas na/ dang / cag na dajug ngam 'das// / 'dam dpal dritha ba ka bdud pa 'phrul bcag/ tham pas dpal la'angs par/ mas sa sa
104b2(rnying rgyud): dang rngan b+har ba// dbus khyod rje rje ma da'al ma babul gzhan ma rigs padel brgyad/ brgyad ga// tsha ma bu lnga nu gsal bar bsgom/ dkyil da' da tsamatsha'i byad padzin/ 'do ma na ze na cang sa/ bzang gcang mjas pa na/ dbya' da bang dmang dang / ya
104b3(rnying rgyud): du byen dkyil 'a la/ nab 'dod dung rjel drang rdebs na tshan bu zhes bya/ yang na dza za ga la gas ci 'dzi ma nas dkyil 'khol la 'josas su rdzog pa'i canas chom bya'o// grub pas sangs cas bstan pa'i lung bzhin du/ lha rnams kyi// du mdo so so sag mtshan dang // phyag tu rgya ma
104b4(rnying rgyud): ga sa dag sod // dbye rdzogs thub ba'i lha dag bsgom// nam mapa'i dkyil nas ye zhes thAm/ babyed ma 'o/ man ngam dpa 'a na ji sha 'angs gang la ti ngan pa zhes dad pa dang can
104b5(rnying rgyud): tha~Mng dro dang ti bcug bcos dang te/ 'dadu'i mthing thang rang ngam/ de bye bang cad te/ rdza la me rjod papa dri mo grangs med pa 'dros te/ don nyi kya dang mi ba gang dri zhes pas/ dang pa'abrel zeb/ lce badz+ranas pas rnam gcis ca tha bar bapa/ tha 'du gakyis ba
104b6(rnying rgyud): dang panas gtsang byeg tug pags pa gdang nas dbyung babazhin na// 'bas gnyid mnyam pa'i phyi 'byung / rin ba tshong dag ca tam/ d+hanaH/ mthur na/ dbang kya/ donal tshan/ dab dgar gyi rkad gamigs sate mug pa dam 'dang / zan snga mags kyis kunas/ gangs mdang can pa na
104b7(rnying rgyud): tri rnaMnas pas sur dbyings thug ma brlag pas pa yab la brten pa/ gragag ma rje bu mongs pa sgra mdog mning gagacig byed do// de la legs rdzas dbang bcad du gtung thugs su byin gyis brlang mnga' gsang kyi gyis brla/ mnga' das dkyil de'ang ga dan no// nges pa las ni rdo rje ma/
105a1(rnying rgyud): masamamaldan sa sa// gsu pa sa sa ma / dang sa na ldan kun ga shAs sa// ga na du nus pas/
105a2(rnying rgyud): du bu mdzin/ phra pa pa ni/ dradas/ phyag mtshan rtse ma rdo rdzogs ca par byung nyid du grub/ masapachen po ma las thas tha pa na phru ya sa brdzogs pa kyang/ grub pa// yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya'o// mi gangapag dub tu spong
105a3(rnying rgyud): gags dkar bzha ma zhal/ chag sa sa// rdo rje bangs 'khor lo zam sbyin chen g.yas// zha pa// dril bu ba dam pad+ma zab ral gri g.yon/ thA// dbyangs phyug ma g.yas yal garten cag g.yon dril bcu sngo// srog 'dzin
105a4(rnying rgyud): nyin da mi pa rlung gi yi ge hU~M// nam mkha' mu zhes bya ba nyi'i/ rlung gnas sa pa kyi na na ya du sems gnas/ 'dab da man bu nyid sems bengs te zu'o// rnam gis phung po shes rab dang / bad btan pa ng+ka dgas ce te/ phum tha dpa mgase nag pa/ maud sogs sa
105a5(rnying rgyud): nas nga dus babang zhis ru ba gis drang bad byal/ rnam par das pa nga mi tsa nas rna rin pa padag/ dgas pa mami nga'ags pabyed do// sa ba nga 'a nga da ga/ tho pa dang mirten byed pa'i byo bron bye/ sro zhi gas sa tha ba nan/ de gsangs
105a6(rnying rgyud): drug pa de dag/ rang ngag sul tha dpa chos tshogs la 'jug pa byed do// rnam shis kyi rung dang nas rang ci lung bas bcan te/ rnam par gas ngas rig pa dang / gas rab kyis zhes pa'o// sems na pa rnapags/ thal ba la shes rab kyi phung ngo'o// brta rtogs bya ba/ lus dag ni myong ba'i tshul gyi
105a7(rnying rgyud): mi dag/ lung du 'dun pa dang / rting che mas pagazhan gabar bya dngas na/ rnam par rig byed pas bya/ ang dI \u0f88\u0f90 zhes bya ba/ rdzo nang dang rngon pa ma yin pa dang / rdzom pa dang rin/ ljon pa ma yin pa yang yin pa dang / 'di rnams nam par rig cad pani du/ gdan ces shes shing rtogs par ma spa bas na/
105b1(rnying rgyud): nam da payin pa kyang // zhe sdang chen por rang gnas so// chu mams can sa nag dang 'a sa sa cas kyangs dang nga masada'// yum gyis gsang ba'i gzhal yas su/ phus kyi gapa das gad pa te nga sa gnanas nga thams// byang chub sems las na rnams pang sa
105b2(rnying rgyud): ma la sri kyis da tu gas par byas na nga mdzin par byeng / srur gsal ba// rdo rje sems dpa' yab yum gnyis// sgo zhing rang la thim par byed// snang mdzad dkar g.yas lnga gdon dmar ba'i zhal/ rnam snang ma kyi mapa'abs han ta/ da'i da
105b3(rnying rgyud): rdzogs par bsgoms te/ u mdog dang dbus zhal dkar po zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ phyag g.yas kyi dang po// 'khor lo// bar ma rdo rje rngan rin chen g.yas/ g.yon dang po// dril bu bar ma pad+ma dza ma ral gri g.yon/ thams sangs rgyas sman phrag g.yal pa sa sa pa rten
105b4(rnying rgyud): dril bu su mdog dkar/ rlung rdzal sa dang 'dres pa'i rlung gcags phur byed bu'i yi ge ai/ 'byung ba/ sa ni gsung ma ge li zhes bya ba nyid// gzugs kyi phung po tshul khrims dang / ru bzhan rte ni/ dra brtad chung na zhes bya ste/ lag pa dang dacig pa la sogs pa gzugs ning ga pa kyang rung
105b5(rnying rgyud): gzugs zhes bya'o// rgan d+hani dus gsum gyi gzugs bzang ngan dang / tsha phra thams cad gcig tu bkrus pa'i ming te/ gzugs kyi phung ngo zhes bya/ de yang bu'i gzugs sa su ma rung 'thung ba bzhi yin/ 'bras bu'i gzugs bcu gcig ni/ rgyu 'byung ba las byung ba'i ga la sogs dbang po lnga/ de dag ni yul gyi stes cu dang / rnam
105b6(rnying rgyud): rid byed min pa'i dru ba dang cu gcig go/ rnam par rig byed na yin pa ni/ bsam gtan ba ni las skye ste/ chu gzugs can las skyes pas gzugs su bzhag/ gzugs ni gsum ste/ bstan du yod la thogs pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs ni 'byung ba bzhi dang / ba dog dang dbyings so// bstan du med la thogs pa dang bcas pa ni ma gsags dang nga
105b7(rnying rgyud): dang do yul rdza'o// brtan du dang med 'ongs pa pang med pa ni/ nas par rig byed ma yin pa'o// sems can cigachags kyi phung por 'dzegs pa dang / rgyal ba'i tshul khrims kyi phung po yang 'cha' bas 'jigs pas chos mthun no// !chu sems canapa gnas pa'i nyon mangs banag ta brag 'bras bu sangs cas gdas pan yinas/
106a1(rnying rgyud): de gnyis dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin du rtogs papa rnam sdang yab phram ra thung ngo // gti mug chen po rang byung nga / lha'i rtsi bas pa// rin chen 'byung ldan bus ser g.yas sngo g.yon dmar ba'i zhal/ gams // rin chen bar ma rdo rje thal 'khor lo g.yas/ dang // dril bu gdam pa
106a2(rnying rgyud): tham na ral gri g.yon/ lus// mA ma ShAM g.yas yangal thu dad brten g.yon dril bu rnams bu mdog ser sngo/ !/ sram de lung na// chu dang 'grogs pa'i rlung gcang yi ge swA/ sun 'byung ban// chu ni mi gan mi zhes bya ba nyid/ runi// tshor ba'i phung po nyi rje dziman
106a3(rnying rgyud): ya na ci zhes pa/ bde drug pa thogs bcor ba rnam gsus yongs sdod thams cad gcig tu brkus pa'i ming rtse/ rjer ba'i phung ba nasaH/ tsha bang de ni sas sems sa dbe cing ded byed na de dang 'bral ba mi 'dod pa dras na yang zlar zad par dang dang / tsar ba sdug brdza ni sras sems la rjod pa brung
106a4(rnying rgyud): de dang bral bar 'dod pa dang / gnyis ka ma yin pa ni lus sems la gnod pa byed pa med pas bral bar 'dod pa yang med/ lhag par bde ba pa na 'dogs kyang med pas phrad par 'dod pa yang med de/ gnyis kar 'dod pa med do// sems can la yod pa'i tshor ba'i phung po dang / 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po mnyam ste/ sems can gyi
106a5(rnying rgyud): tshor ba yang bde sug btang snyoms su rtsod la/ ting nge 'dzin gyis kyang nyams su myong ba'o// nyon mongs na// nga rgyal chen po ye shes na mnyam nyid ye shes rang byung ba/ nub kyi rtsibs stengs su bskyed pa// mtha' yas dbus dmar g.yas sngo g.yon dkar ba'i zhal/ g.yas dang po// pad+ma ba dang / rdo rje sam 'khor
106a6(rnying rgyud): lo g.yas/ dad // dril bu bar rin chen tha ma ra gri g.yon/ tsun// gos dkar mo g.yas yang ma brten g.yon dril bu 'dzin bu mdog dmar/ !rang shin// 'du shes phung po ye shes dang / ye shes na mo sar rtog 'di/ 'ashu zhes kyi phung pon/ saMdz+dza pan d+ha ni ni met+ta tAd ga tan de mi ka zhe
106a7(rnying rgyud): tsa te/ gzus dang sogs papa/ 'di ni dkar po'o// 'di na sngon pa'o// bzang ngo // ngan no zhes mtshan mar 'dzin pa dmigs pa'i tshul dang / de ma thag pa'i rkyen la sogs pa 'dus pa pas shes pa 'byung zhing / 'di yin na snyamang mtshan mar 'dzin pal byabs na/ rnam shes su drang du rung gis kyang / mdzang par glegs pa bzhin du
106b1(rnying rgyud): shes sa btags/ 'du zhes kyi bu mo thul pa mtshan na 'dzin pa la gsum te/ cung / zin pa/ tshad med pa'o// chul gzugs pa sogs pa dmigs par bya ba'i chos so rnams so// mtshan par 'dzin pa ni 'dog dang dbyings kyi bye brag tha dang nga mang bar// zung ngani 'dod pa'i la sa ngan ba la dmigs // can po na bas ma
106b2(rnying rgyud): brta dang pon pang nes man chad de gzugs kyi 'ams la dmigs pa so// tshad med pa ni nam mkha' ma tha mas phye ma ched nas dadu shes med mi nam na chad de gartags med khams pa dmigs pa'o// tu sems can pa yod pa'i 'du shen rgya che drung gnyis ka ma yin pa gtam dang 'bras pa yang dag pa'i sangs nas la yod pa'i ye shes kyi phung po ti cho
106b3(rnying rgyud): te/ 'du shes kyis 6 khams gsum shes par byed la/ ye shes ces kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'o// zhes chos mthun par sbyar ro// nyon mongs pa// 'dod chags chen po'i bdag nyid de/ thugs ni// me dang drod mnyam pa'i rlung yi ge AM/ yum 'thung ba// me ni yang / phyi zhes bya ba'o//
106b4(rnying rgyud): 'khor po'i rtsibasas// don yod grub pa ldang g.yas dkar g.yon dmar ba'i zhal/ da // ral gri bar rdo rje thal 'khor lo g.yas/ dang po// dril bu ba nga rin chen zam pad+ma g.yon// sgrol ma g.yas brten g.yon dril ldang / thugs de// rlung gi rlung ni gsung ni yi ga tra/
106b5(rnying rgyud): zung ga// rlung ni yi ge traM zhes bya ba nyid/ nyon mongs// phrag dong / ye zhes kya bub pa chen por snang ba'o/ bu// 'du byed phung po ye shes grol// sems dang ldan pa'i 'du byed lnga bcu rtsa gcig ni// saM sA ra kan ta ni aM bi saM rga rang rAHzhes de/ sems pa la sogs pa'i lag sa
106b6(rnying rgyud): 'du byed kyi ma 'byung zhing / mngon par 'du byed pa'i mtshan nyid ldan pas nang du byed kyi phung po zhes bya'o// 'du byed kyi phung po sems can la gnas pa dang / ye shes rnam par grong ba'i phung po de ga shegs la gnas pa gnyis kyang mthun pa ste/ 'du byed kyis kyang ma lus par 'jug pa dang / ye shes rnam par spong ba'i phung pos kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i yeg
106b7(rnying rgyud): srod yul la 'dug pa yin no// 'dra byed la sems ldan lnga bcu ca gcig dang / sems dang mi ldan pa'i bcu ga'o// lnga ni kun tu 'gro ba ni/ rdzus badz+ra dang dang / kho rdo rje dang rnam par shes pa bde la gcod do// reg pa gsum 'dus yongs su gcod// yid la/ dmigs pa'i yul la sems gartod cing mngon par phyogs par
107a1(rnying rgyud): byed pas sems kyi 'jug/ tshor bas dge za dang mi dge ba dang pung rtan pa'i 'bras pa myos byed bstan// 'du shes kyis dang pra rko dza'i be zag pa dad par gsal ba med rnam shes don rnams byen// sems dpa Sha na skyon dang yon tad dang gnyi ba ka
107a2(rnying rgyud): ming/ mal sa 'dod papar byed pa'i sa mo// wa yul so sor nges pa ni// 'dun pa ni bsam pa'i dngos po gang ses gtod/ ma len do// mos pas zhings pa'i ngo po de nidang/ mos yul nges par 'dzin/ ma'o// dran pas ni 'dris pa'i so'o// ma brjed de// /
107a3(rnying rgyud): bdag pa'o// ting 'dzin shi brtags pa do yol sems ni rtse gcig pa/ tu gnas pa'o// shes rab thaM na na pas de bar rab tu rnam par 'byed/ !/ bcu gcig dge ba zhes bya ni// dang po shems dang 'bras ca mad pa dang nyon mchog la mngon par yid ches byed// ngo tsha shes
107a4(rnying rgyud): pas ni bdag gam chos ci dbang du byas nas kha na ma gro med// khrel yod pa ni 'jig rten dbang du byas nas kha na ma gro bral 'dzem/ sa'o// ma chags pa ni chags pa'i gnyen po ste/ yid 'thung shing mi len pa'o// dge rtsa chags gnyen po// zhe sdang medapa pa ni zhe sdang gi gnyen por grar byams pa rtse ba'o// pa'i dge rtsa
107a5(rnying rgyud): byams// gti mug med pa'i ni yang dag pa'i don rtogs pa'o// dge rtsa rtogs// brtson 'grus le lo'i gnyen po ste/ dge ba la sems mngon par sloba'o// shin tu sbyadra ba la nig nas ngan len ciganyen po ste lus sems las su rung ba'o// gnas ngan min// bag yod pani sadod la mi chags
107a6(rnying rgyud): me spahA/ dA ti rkyed te mi dag pa thong ba'o// btang snyoms gsum 'as 'dir 'du byed ci tang snyoms so// ma chags brtson 'grus gnas// rnam par mi 'tsho ba ni ni rdzing med pa snying rje nyid/ yin no// rtsa ba'i nyod mongs drug po ni// 'dod chags ni dod yo rtsal nyer cher len
107a7(rnying rgyud): zhen cir chags/ pa'o// khong khro ni sems can kun mthun nas mnar sems/ ba'o// nga rgyal ni nga gi yus kyi phung po bdag dang bdag gi brtas nas gzhan dga'as bdag kyad par du 'phags so gas nas/ gus pa med cing kun la 'gying / ma'o// ma rig pa ni las dang 'bras
107b1(rnying rgyud): bdan ga mnas/ sdigs// bzlab lags namagasapa tab dang/ nga dbang ba dang / da/ sad nga dang sa/ la bya ba dang // dats+tsho pa su zhas dang yid gnyis zab dang //
107b2(rnying rgyud): mongs nyi shu ni// khro bas ni 'phral du gnod pa byed/ pa laganas te gang ba sems kyi kun nas man sems pa'o// khon du 'dzin pas ni mdud par 'dzin/ ma'o// 'chab pas ni kha na ma thoms ma khyud/ pa'o// 'tshig par ni chog pa rlang pos zhe 'debs pa nyid/ do//
107b3(rnying rgyud): dog ni gzhan ni pa tshogs pa/ la sems khong nas 'khrugs/ pa'o// ser snas ni sbyin pa mi dang mthun byed/ pa ste sems kyis kun tu 'dzin pa'o// sku ni gzhan bsgra yang dag pa min/ ba don rtog pa 'o// g.yo ni bdag nyid nyes pab ma ba'i thabs bzung /
107b4(rnying rgyud): rgyags pa shi dag gi phun sum tshogs pa la chags pa'i sa dga'/ ba'o// rnam par 'tsho ba ni seMng dan pal bro 'tsham zhing / 'cho // ngo tsha med pas kau 'ad la thebs bdag la mi 'dzeme/ pa'o// khrel med ni 'a dang thobs gzhan la mi 'dzem pa'o// mug pa ni sems ni
107b5(rnying rgyud): ma'i rung bas spong ba ste// rgod pa ni sems ni ma zhiga'o// ma dad pa ni mas dang 'angab cad kon mchog bde pa la yid mi ches/ mas sems dang ba dang mi mastan pa'o// le los ni dge ba la sems mi sgo// bag med man kon song ba las sems ni mi bsung ba/ ra yan du btang ngo //
107b6(rnying rgyud): brjed ngas pa ni/ dran sa nyon mongs pan kyis dge ba'i don mi gsal// rnam par g.yeng ba zhi dug rdal sems kyang 'gro// shis bzhin ma yin pa ni nyon mongs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i shes rab kyis/ mi shes bzhin du 'jug pa'o// bzhi ni gzhan du 'gyur ba ni// 'gyod pa
107b7(rnying rgyud): da po nga ba yid la gcags pa'o// gnyid ni dbang med kyang sems sru pa/ 'o// rtogs pa ni kun tu tshol ba'i yid/ 'dod pa ti bas pa dang na bkyi da ze nga ga// dpyod pa zhi rtog pa yid kyi da pa/ brjod pa'o// sems
108a1(rnying rgyud): mi ldan bcu bzhi ni/ tshogs bdu gag pa'o// thob pa ni sdang med pas rnyed pa dang ldan pa'o// 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug dang / bdi gems kyi 'dod cags dang mas pa rgo sa ga 'o// 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jugs dang
108a2(rnying rgyud): yang med pa bye mched pa 'jug pa'o// 'du shes med pa rnam shes dug 'dog pa la zhugs das 'gag/ srog gi dbang po ni mi mabu pa rnams sngod kyi las kyi 'phangs/ las tshe ring bung ji thaMd du gnas nas 'chi 'pho// rigs mthun ban dang sems can de rnams kyi lus 'dra/ bar gyi/
108a3(rnying rgyud): rigs mthad pa ga pa byed rnams dang mthun par 'bud/ pa'i// rga bzhi de dag gi rgyun gzhan tu ba.uH/ ma'o// gnas pa nid nyar de dag chun yang chags// mi rtag pa ni de dag ni rgyud rgyun chang / ma'o// meng gi tshogs ni chos rdzas man thong sa nyid kyi / bla dgas so la/
108a4(rnying rgyud): cho ga gi tshogs ni chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi bye brag gi tshig/ tha dgas so// yi ge'i tshogs ni yige rnams te de gnyis/ gsal zar byed/ pa'i phyir ro// so so skye bo ni 'phags pa'i chos sku thab pas med/ pa'o// de lta bu'i cha dang mthun pa das ni 'jug po po
108a5(rnying rgyud): 'os la sogs/ ba 'ongs su bcad dem thongangs dang yor phe' pa dang / bcogs pa dang dris dang / dru das 'ad ngas dang da pa'o// pa tha ma ying / kun pa nga 'i bung cag mnyam gzhag ye shes 'gro/ shing gi tha bas la bcugs/ ru mam sa/ yum gyur pan kya do
108a6(rnying rgyud): gang mnyam gzhag rdzogs pad+ma'i lci la// rlung lnga mnyam nyid yid gsum hU~M/ rlung rnga ni/ srog 'dzin pa/ sa dang 'dres pa/ rga dang bres pa/ me dang ngagam / rung ge chung lnga po dbyer med pas can gzhi dang yid dang nyon mongs pa can gyi yid gsum yi ge hUM // tshes gsum a ni skye ba med/ dadus zas 'khor
108a7(rnying rgyud): pa/ lus ma byas myang 'das dang / lung ma bstan gyi chos gsum yang de na dam par kye ba med pa yi ge ma yin la/ de nyi chos can dang chos nyid dang chos kyi dbyings gsum phyed med pa sum mo chub che'i chung mig gnas pas nyid lab lum dang byams pa yab yum mo// rab tu tu ba na bgagis las nam nyid/ sgribasel yab yum mo// shin tu
108b1(rnying rgyud): skra'i 'doms na/ spyan ras dang / kun ba par yang yul mo// mngon par chu btse'u chung dang rtse la/ phyag nor/ 'jam dpal phab yum me// spyir de ltang ngo ro// sa snying dkar gsal myu gu dri la/ shad lho'i rtsibs mtshan du sa'i snying bsgo mdog dkar po g.yas dpa'i rdza gra bsdanas pagayod dril // ga
108b2(rnying rgyud): ni lA swe dkad so so song ba rnams pa 'gying bag dkarba/ g.yon lab la 'thud pa'o// gang ske'i rtsa chad la// byams pa dkar po phyag na klu shing bsnams pa g.yon pa dzi la/ 'o// lus/ rU pa dkar mo lcag na spos khang bsnyems/ sa nyid yang yus dang byams pa yang sum kyi
108b3(rnying rgyud): can sde// mig la me yi rlung rgyu bas// khro na min te/ rlung ni// chulas yi ge k+Shi ni mig go rnam shes dang // me'i bung las ni dbang po gnyis spang ba rna ba la/ byams pa'o// hU~M niHsa b+hing g.yum sgeg mo ni gzugs kyi rta mo ni mig gi rnam shes la spyod pa ste// dza ne mig ni dbang po byams pa'i byed
108b4(rnying rgyud): mem ste dus dpyid dus yin par bshad// nam ga'a'i snying mo mthing ga g.yas ral gri g.yon dril/ bu/ phu2/ s+tha ni mA le mthag na phreng ba 'dzin nga lha mdog sngo/ nyon kyi surbadal/ sdib me la sngon po gsas po ti gdon thil/ sa us/ puSh+pe sngon mo phyags me tog bskams
108b5(rnying rgyud): nas nying sgrib ses la yum gyi nga bzhin ni// rna bar rlung gis chung rgya bas/ na ba'i rnam shes nang naganas pa dang / rna ba'i rnam shes phyir 'char ro// nang na gnas yig/ rab tu chu ba rnam shes tAM// b+hI A ni 'bres pa gcig la klag go dribase gyi/ ni rna ba'i dbang po yin/ sa ro// tri ni zam snying gi sus med ma
108b6(rnying rgyud): dorbo ba'i dbang po'i yul sba yin de la spyod pas yum mo/ sgra la spyod pa ste// hU~M/ lo tog ma'i sa bon dus bzhi la ni dbyar dus yin par bshad/ me tog gi rus so// nub gyang du/ spyan ras dmar sgra g.yas pad+ma g.yon dril/ bu/ yum/ dri na gI da ti dmar mo yi wang bsnams/ 'o// rug kyang gi bu dan/
108b7(rnying rgyud): bzang rin chen snyi ma g.yon dril bu su mdog dmar// A lo ke dmar mo phyag na mar me bsnams/ phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams pa' cher mtsha phyag la tags pade nag mtshad kyis don mdzad pa'o// rang bzhin// shin tu chu ba sA la gnas/ lanas shes las ni dri las spyan ras gzigs so// sa ni
109a1(rnying rgyud): las spyan ras gzigs/ 'phags ba spyan ras gzigs so// rna'i yul/ dri las ni yi de zi las bskyed pa'i glu ma yi ge hri// hU~M na'i dbang po ngas ni kun bzang mo ha mo mar me baM/ gabon// dus ni ston 'bras bu thams cad smin par byed pas na ston gyi dus yin
109a2(rnying rgyud): pa'o/ su sa 'i thum 'i mas do// na du/ phyag rdor ljang bu rdo rje dri la/ sa/ do ni nIr tig byed pa'i nod bu rung/ 'dzin ldang / thang ga kyi tha rang // 'jam dpal u tral gangs na ra khri 'dzin dril bu 'dzin/ lus// gar+b+he ljang gu phyagan dri tshab bsdams/ 8/
109a3(rnying rgyud): na ngas bya'i babras // chi pa dang bsdu sa ske 'argyas bsan gyi na sa nas pa dig bas ma'o// da myong ba zangs sa// zhidabang phyug na pi yang bsnams/ bzla dag dang ba gadra byag de son gyi ma sogs pa dang/ gan ris kying ma
109a4(rnying rgyud): rkyen sa/ druganag cha bsnamasab gsas par bsnganas/ thal hu/ bang ga ma btan po ta brtsams
109a5(rnying rgyud): da ca zin 'dogs 'a cos so mas 'dub/ gnas kyi'i rgyam tshol sogs pa'o// snro Tas/ yi dwags thub pa dmar nan rin chen sgom/ mi dgas rnams lus/ gnas drod cing ser bu'i dog la sogs pa'o// byang nar byu dbu'i ba'i thu pa// chos kyi rgyal po rung ka me ru bsdams/ dmyal ba rnams pa/ bdang
109a6(rnying rgyud): rjed kyi dag to ma te da do// kri snyas bang du tan sum gri tho nga 'idag pa ye dang rang yid lta ba byed nga bad pas// sbrul spu thub pa chen po drug 'de rten bdang dan dugag yang tad rta gas jug ta ga so// 'dul rab na tong
109b1(rnying rgyud): mongs drug/ tang rgyang che/ nya min dran dog/ mi dod pags/ khyong so nyis// 'dags da la de sa // de rkyen pha rol phyin pa drug/ nyar kyang thabs brtson du kyi nga gyi ston/ thag dog pa ma tan/ dang mangs chung thams/ ga bla shes pa/ se na gyingag namangs dang // rigs
109b2(rnying rgyud): dug rang bzhin yon tan drug/ lhas rig rag pa'i yon tan yod ngas bring bzhi yan chad mthong bas sems can sa chos kyi gakhor lo bskor bar bskul/ nya min bas dkyang mi 'chibs/ dpal mgon po dmag dben du bos byas nas/ mdon ma mkhangs byer/ stag gzig nas sung gis gzos kyang mtshon gyis ma sod/ mi sdom pa dang
109b3(rnying rgyud): gas pa'i yon tan/ byol song la lto gos btsal sla ba'i/ yi dgas par sngos pas tshims pa'i/ dmyal ba la snga phyi dran pas rnam smin 'dzad nus pa'i yon tan// sa bon drug gi yi ge dang / lha'i a dkar/ lha min gyi su ser po/ me'i rje sbeng bu/ gyol song gi du dradag/ yi dag bre dmar ro// dmyal ba rje nag po rnams las rin nab rnams
109b4(rnying rgyud): da// shes chen po rnam drug pas/ sa nyis ma/ sa ra/ zhis// mngon par shes bcug gis gshegs/ mam nas/ ge rgyal cas ma nam da kyi ga
109b5(rnying rgyud): gshin rje gshed po thod dbyug bsnams/ shar sgo gshin rje gshed pa rtsa mdog tho nagag pas na me pa'i dbug zogayon sdigs mdzub mdzod pa'o// yum// deHrdoHgnyis ni 'jig rten pa dang 'das pa 'dren pa sku mdog dkar mo phyag gnyis kyi lcags kyu bsdams/ pa'i// lho sgor // gzhan gyis mi bug bder
109b6(rnying rgyud): nag g.yas/ rdo rje g.yon sdigs mjug bsdams/ yum// a mu de bu ser nag phyag gagis kyi rdo rje zhags pa 'phen pa'i tshul du balhums/ pa'o ba mngon yod pa'o// nub sgor/ rta mgrin su mdog dmar nag g.yas thod g.yon sdigs mdzu ba dang bcas pa'o// spu lasazhags pa sngams/ pa'o//
109b7(rnying rgyud): yumra// yog 'jig rten dmar mo phyag gnyis kyi burgyad kyis brnams par mdzad pas na 'jig rten gsupa 'bying ba zhes kyang bya'o// lcags sgrog bsdams/ byang skor// bdud rtsi 'gyel pa ljang nag g.yas rdo rje rgya gram gdon rigs mdu bgags pa dang cas par bsdams/ phur/ b+ha smai suM mdog lngang
110a1(rnying rgyud): nag gaganas sam sa da kyi thagapa sapa pas babyed / dril bu bsnams/ tha tha bzhin// yang dag ca dang shas pab tu sas na/ rgyu ba'i drung las ni/ gas sa pa 'a 'asapa bye / das nga nga/ reg pa hU~M las gan dang
110a2(rnying rgyud): po / rtag pa min pa dzaH/ las thags kyu mamo// khrus kyi dbang po// reg byed zhes so// rdorje dang ni ming pa 'as hUM las sto com a chad min hU~M/ 'asazhags pa ma'o// gas pa'i dbang po// reg bya sum kyi brdal hU~M ste tan min bram bdag tu mi na pa bi/ thugs srog mdo// gas dang // reg bde
110a3(rnying rgyud): bapas/ shes h+yaM rdzang bdud ci kyil ba zas ni mtshan ma min hoH/ b.las rdzi bu mar gnas so// phyag tu bzhibs/ bskyed pa'i nye bzhini nob la bsum brgyad do// dang sa bon gyi phyag tu bzhini hUM ba toH/ brjod pa'i sngags/ bzhin sa sh+ya tasa?/ ga gyaM/ woT be/ har+Ne ton bzhi'o// bca' ba da'i 'phyag rgya ni ga
110a4(rnying rgyud): bya dzu rab nga na de'u chang gnyis mdung / mdzub mo gnyis thugs kyu ltar byab/ mdzub mo gnyis madrung nas zhags pa d+har byab/ sor mo dam du lcags srog lta byal/ dkyis pa bskyed nas dril bu ltar bya ba'o/ mtshon pa'i brda// nyon mongs sgrib pa rnam dag pas/ ma lus pa mtha' dag par byed pas na mthar byed gzhin rje gshed do//
110a5(rnying rgyud): nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dag nas zhi ba'i las mthar gyin par byed ces bya la// las kyi sgrib pa dag nas rgyas pa'i sa rnams mthar gyin par byed/ lani stobs po che// snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgrib mdag par mthar phyin par byed/ bani dang gilas mthar byin pa ta mgrin no// shes bya'i sgrig pa dag nang mtha
110a6(rnying rgyud): par byed pa/ dang drag po'i ngas// mtha ma phyin par byed nga 'dud rtsi 'khyil ba zhes su bshad pa yin/ las bzhi mthar phyin pa gzhan don/ sgrib pa bzhi dag cing mthar phyin pa dang don yin/ rgya/ nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa rnam par dag las/ bar byed pas lugs kyu ma// las 'brasas kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag dang rtsed bsha
110a7(rnying rgyud): pam 'gyur// pas rnams kun las rnam dag pas/ thab bsnyoms par lug pa'i sleb padag par byed pa sngags klog ma/ yon tan gyi shes pa'i sleb pa ma las rnams 'bras bur dag par byed ba sgom dril bu ma'o// de nyar slob rab rgyas rnams so// rnam dag 'gyur// de nas bde bar gshegs pa ni ras
110b1(rnying rgyud): dang nas da pa las/ su gas ga 'a sa pa rgya sa nyag/ na 'a ga na ma ba ba nang khyang/ thams cad kyi gas ga dkyil 'khor 'di dag gsungs sa// shAs bas das
110b2(rnying rgyud): drang gnyis/ i I/ mad pa'i bla ring thung gnyis/ u U/ bkug pa ri gnyis/ r-i r-I/ ma ning gi ba'i/ l-i lI/ e lI/ bgreng ba'i gnyis/ o au/ bstod pa'i gnyis/ ai aH/ rnam par bcad pa'i wa gnyis so/ ka kha ga g+ha nga/ nam ma pa'i yig/ tang dang 'brag so// gnas 'ong na dang tha bar byed do/ tsa tshe D+hi ta/
110b3(rnying rgyud): sa/ Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/ rtse che dang rnanams/ ma'i ye ge gyen pa 'bar ba ltar bathag go// pra da d+ha na/ phyen gyi dang sems/ rtse ba 'bod pas na 'thor ba sbyar ro/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ macu gnyis nas rgya byar la 'bar ba ltar ro/ ya swerbe so nan ra s+ye tse dang nan la khyed kyis dang so wa mar+tha sha dzeg h+ye so dang / Sha
110b4(rnying rgyud): gogachen gyi dkyil dang sangs/ ha greb k+Sha/ lte ba nas par 'byung ba'o// shes rapa stong pa nyid du gnas/ pas a li kA pi'i rang bzhin bshad na/ snying rje dang stong nyid la thabs shes su gzhag pa ni shes rab stong nyid de/ chos rnams kyi rtsa ba stong nyid rtogs pa kho na shes rab bo// de stong pa nyid yi ge A yis
110b5(rnying rgyud): der pa chos sur gnas shing rtogs // thabs ni snying rje chen po nyid/ sto nyid rtogs nas snying rjes 'azod no tshogs byed pa thasas kyim nam na// thabs gzugs pus mo don mamanan// chos srugazugs sngar 'breb 'o// A ni// shes rab yu ma la thabs ni yang / 'ang yinapas par
110b6(rnying rgyud): thabs shes dbrel ba'o// shes rab snod la gyi gajig rten yin te rang bzhin gyi bems sto du gnas pa'i chanas so// thabs ni bcud/ kyi sems can yin ta rang bzhin rig stong du gnas pas so// 'gyur med shes rab 'gag med thabs/ shes rab 'gyur ba med pa'i chos nyid yin te be nam mkha' nga / thabs
110b7(rnying rgyud): bag med kyi ye gas yin te nyi ma dang 'dra'o// shes rab chos kyi dbyings yin te stong shing 'gyur ba dang / las ye shes thabs/ thabs ye shes chen po yin te/ ye shes kyis thams cad mkhyen par don mdzad de/ thabs shes dbyings le gas gnyis med du gnas so// shes rab ni sto ste de'i don ni rtogs dag pas
111a1(rnying rgyud): zab pa yin samaman ta/ thabs pabye ta/ mdon ni ma che ba'o// na 'dab ltabasasas/ yangangs/ thob dan rtog/ chod / cho sun d+ha gan/ cims// g.ya mas sa cag sa mas nga
111a2(rnying rgyud): ga mas ca/ laM shed bre khang dag te/ sasacasacad do// de yang sar t+na tIg/ na zhi sa/ samaH/ sa mo ha ti/ kaM shadag pa/ gang dpa/ A Ar log/ cag shes la/ ga gang ba bye rigar te/ da cags dang pa/ des sa hA ma ga / da
111a3(rnying rgyud): chog dru ba ba/ tAM badz+ra ra ti/ da rje dag ma/ sas d+ha ma k+Shi hi rA dzA ya/ ngo mtsha hralab/ hUM lA s+ye sa ma ya stAM/ sgeg sa dus labab/ na rang 'i nying ba/ traM A gar+b+ha ya/ ting ba/ tAM sA le sa ma ya ho/ phreng ba ma dzus yin no// bla na ras ga gas/ g+h+ri ha hUM padrA pa dam/ ngas kyig/ mAM gI ti rA ko& haM/ tha ma /
111a4(rnying rgyud): chags so// ma do dza~M ku ru pA Na/ rgyal mdzad kyag/ aM trI rti rA ga yA mi/ gar mchags par bgyi'o// thams \u0f7fmaM d+ha ra Ne swA hA/ gzungs pa/ dzaHd+hu pe pra be sha/ thos ma rab tu grags/ sgribs pa/ ts+li ni s+sa raM b+hA ya sA hA/ sgrib pa bas 'a ba'i ci dang/ hU~M bur+the a be sha/ me togs pa pa/ kun bzang /
111a5(rnying rgyud): sA rA dzA ya swA hA/ kun nas rgyal po ched du/ baM dI pa mu bi rI/ sgron ma bad ba ma/ 'jas dpal/ muM shri I rA gA ya swA hA/ gsung gi chags pa'i chadang/ hoHgan+te tsit+ta/ dri ma phugs/ bskyed lpags kun bzang / hU~M hU~M hU~M go lnga yid kyi nam shes gas ma 'das pa ye shes kyis pon/ badz+ra tser+t+ta au/ rdo rje 'dugang/ brtsod
111a6(rnying rgyud): gas kya ba / ya a a sa gas gi kyi tha med kyi gyis / brdo ba ngas mar+ha e/ darje bang / tha 'dug gi zed ldags ma'i ma pa'i/ e mra ne g+ho sha'i pa yi na swA hA/ oM mune d+he shAn ma 'a'i so/ swA hA/ oM mra ne l+r-i pab/ swA hA/ e sa
111a7(rnying rgyud): 'a yang ba po/ swA hA/ oM mu ne k+Sha yi dag sa thub pa dzes pan swA hA/ oM mu ne ye dmya ba'i drung pa'is bon swA hA/ sgob rab cwas te rba sngags // hU~M ya mAn+ta kr-ita gzhi rjemam byed phaT/ badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hI shwa rI dzA mA ni rdo rje 'pha me po mas dang lpag ma las ma hU~M phaT/ sris kyigs kya la
111b1(rnying rgyud): na napanan tu tu du sa na du ga ga ma tshun tu
111b2(rnying rgyud): te bad pa bcad phaT/ ka ma d+har me po ti sha de ni ni yidam bca' des cas pa hU~M phaT/ na panyan pa ni the 'apa 'tha nga 'das the me pa pam pa ba
111b3(rnying rgyud): phung po lnga ni sangs rgyas kyi gad ni/ rnam par shes pa rdo rje se mas dnga'/ gzugs rnam par/ tshor ba na 'byung/ 'ducas 'dang pag med/ 'du byed ngan pa ba yin pas// phung po lnga la byin gyis rlob/ ma 'dzin las mnganas// 'bra pa ldani rig pa ga da
111b4(rnying rgyud): me da sa nga ngas/ namanga' 'bye phyigs// yid pa' dang 'thung bar nags ga sa ma rungs ba dag pa 'am masas a martog pa cad// mi gsags lnga mdzad dngas ma/ dang bza sas sa sa
111b5(rnying rgyud): yi ga dang ngol sogs pa rgya'i phyi mched ni thang rgyab sems dpa ga no// byang chub sems dpa' yab yul gdan migs rnamasapa lags pa sems dpas/ yul gzugs 'gas pan phram/ mig sa dbang kyimams dpa'/ dus bani sa // rang chung ban shis yin las kyang/ @
111b6(rnying rgyud): dpang rnams kyi dzin pa'i ni rang gi tung la 'grozhes par byed pa'o// dang ga bani dang phyi bzhi te// lha mos bcad kyi mchod pa byed pa'o// nyan mongs drug po brtsal na/ brag dag ta mas/ 'ad nags mi/ gtima' la tu/ ser bla ma gas na nga dmyal ba/ thub pa'i da// dbyings dang
111b7(rnying rgyud): kun tu bzang ba ste/ 233/ rigs drug pa gas thugs rjes 'bras bur sapas ma pa 'dzin/ sa pa na rdzo// yan lag bani snyam lakhams a gdanata/ 9/ khribs bgegs spyad pa mdzang /
112a1(rnying rgyud): gang she zungs// snyoms tshad byed zlag ca da/ gab tang sto ga pazhir byid rtog// rtsa gnas gdasas ga dzidag mchu pas lha yi byibs su gsal/ pag/ khams kyi bdud ci gdung mthun pa nas kyi rnam pa bde/
112a2(rnying rgyud): chags/ yi ge maN+Dal gnang dub tu pas gzang rang bzhin stong zhing gsal/ ma'o// ting po// rlung m-i She de 'o gang sa rna pas ni rang bzhin namang po zung 'jug dbyer mi byed par byed// do// rnal 'byor bgang gig ting nge dzin 'di skad bsgom par gang byed pa/ de ni// phung po
112a3(rnying rgyud): khams/ rdza yum hA dang skye ma ched rnams/ sems dpa' sems pang // ye gdongs nas rigs pa'i dkyi 'khong tu mngon par rdzogs mang sangs rgyas/ bsan/ gtagazigs/ de phyir rang bdag lenas bzhin kru kyis thub pa'i dkyil la por du gnas pa de zhes nas rang bzhin cad khyer
112a4(rnying rgyud): ting nge 'dzin gyis/ bskyed/ ro// oM me hA shU n+yA hA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba u k+Sha ko&haM/ stong pa nyid kyi le zhes bya dbang babyung ba'o// oM ma hA Ad na/ me 'od ba re shes kya dbang bkur pa'i/ dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ oM ma hA chen po sa ma hA mnyam pa nyid dz+nyA na eshes pa rdzu
112a5(rnying rgyud): pa rang bzhin At+ma bad tid ko& hrI/ 'o// oM ma hri pre t+ya be k+ShaN dz+nyAn badz+ra rAk+Sha sa d+hA hA haM/ song ton par re shes tu rdzags ci dbang bzung // oM ma hA kr-i ta a nuShAn dz+nyA na badz+ra khye chu dzo ga pra sA hA baM At+ma ko hA haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA kA do rjen par byed kyisas pa pa'i rdzag
112a6(rnying rgyud): yA badz+ra swa dz+nyA ba At+ma ko&hi/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta bA kA gtsang badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&hi/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta thugs badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga twe ma hA a nu rA ma ba gas kyid kyis padz+ra thor chags par byama'i sngags so/ ge Sha dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/
112a7(rnying rgyud): oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA d+h+wa dza badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+maH k+Sha ma hi/ yab du byos kyang seM tshis gas pa tshang // sangs rgyas bde gshegs rnam mo// chog 'a pa ji kyad kyis da cis bang bldan dag 'di bsu 'i tha gA nga // rigs ma yum gyi bum par
112b1(rnying rgyud): dral/ dang gtung ba dang ba da da cag// bdag la dbang bsgyur ba dam pa stes/ mnas dag pa dang lung ba sathams tsha la das brta pa das na gyi yang bangang/ rags dag pa das can bdu sa pa ni/ ngag pa bang 'ang/ dkyi dang mchog dkyil 'khang bstod/
112b2(rnying rgyud): ga dpa ci kyi rjod pa'i dad ni// gsang ba sgo yis byed kyis brlabs/ su nyi kyi 'thabs pa 'gas pa'i dbang bsrung ba'o// byin bri brlabs pa'i chags kyis// gsung ni shes rab ye shes la/ gyi dbang bathur ba'o// sri kyi rdzob pa'i rdzogs kyis// thasas ni bde ba chen po
112b3(rnying rgyud): dprasa'o// ste/ mchod pa te phrin las kyi sngags kyi / yum gyi chags pas rjes su mchod/ a gu gni gsang dbang gsum kyis rjes su 'gas pa'i sngags kyis mchod pa 'bral ba ste yon tan gyi sngags so// ma hA s+ya dzan sangs rgyas pa 'dod yon gyi mchod pa ste phrin pas kyi sngags so// zags pa'i bde ga nga de
112b4(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas mchod pa'o// gsang sngags 'di yi yon tan las// gsang sngags rgyal po 'di bcu yis// ye shes lnga/ su gsung thugs gsum gsang ba byin gyis bslang cing rjes su chags pa'i sngags gnyis// sku dang gsung thugs mi zad pa'i/ swa zin gyi sa brnangs pas rma mi chan pa can
112b5(rnying rgyud): 'khor po de bzhin du/ gsung dang thugs// rgyan gyi 'khor lo rab bsub cing // phyi 'dod pa'i 'dod yon rdzas mchod pa dang / dang nang 'dod pa'i yon tan/ gsang ba'i mchod pa gi 'dod pa/ a T+Ta dag / rjes su chags pa'i sngags dang ma hA k+She dza mchod pa'i sngags so// yis// yon tan mchod da
112b6(rnying rgyud): las rnams dang grub// sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor skal bzang la// reg pa'i dbang lnga bum pas rdzogs/ mi brtsod pa bum cu'i dbang dang / rnam snang ming gi rin 'brang cod pan/ sA nga mtha rdo rje de/ don grang dril bu'i dbar ni// dang d+ha bum dngang / gsang dbang / gos rab ye shes/ bde ba chen po dang /
112b7(rnying rgyud): bzhi lam du gang bsgom pa'i// gang zag phub pa po mi yi lus su gnas kyang // sems kyi dgongs pa rdzogs sangs rgyas// ci dgongs par bzhugs pa'o// de yan cad kyis zin pa'i chags pa shad shin no// !rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor skyed nas pa shes kyi dacing por 'grub par bya ba'i
113a1(rnying rgyud): shes sgrub pa'i gsang sngags nyon// brdas mdodza mchog ya dzaH/ oM rgya gi chung can tu khyod b+ha ga bAn/ mam / ma hA ben thog ru Ni ka thunas / dra rgya ho// gnas pa ba na/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ ngam kyi dus la ba/ hU~M hoH/ phyag tu
113a2(rnying rgyud): spyan 'dren pas byon/ pra be sha phaT/ sgrib pa rdal/ A be sha ya/ ye shes bsugs par tha/ pra be sha ya a a/ dam tshig sring ba zab/ A be sha ya a aM/ nya le gas pazhis pa kA ya pA ka tsita tiSh+Tha badz+ra/ sug sung thugs tan pa'i dzi/ a ti bu he/ h+ya 'tshal ba/ pra ti ts+tsha ho/ nga / dkyin/ a
113a3(rnying rgyud): la la ho/ phyag gis mnyes pa'o// d+harma gyos kyi rtsab rtsa mu dra pU dza ya/ mchod \u0f7f/ karma mu dra yas kyi phyag rgyas mchod ba pu dzA ya/ sa ma ya mu dra dam tshig gis thag cas mchod pa/ pU dzA ya/ kA ya gru phrag rgya chen po'i mchod pa mu dra ma hA pU dzA ya/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo bi shwa mu le
113a4(rnying rgyud): byaHde bzhin gshegs pa thams cadapa sgo snga tshogs nas phyag 'tshal po sarba taShAM uSh+ma te/ de thams cad du nam mkhar 'phags pa/ s+pha ra Na i maM ga ga na khaM swA hA/ khab pa 'di nas mtha' gang ba byung so// oM pa nA pe ma/ chags pa chen po'i zla/ pe nu su ra to/ bde bachen po'i chu/ taM bu pa ra mu/ nod ma nga'i bya
113a5(rnying rgyud): sarba ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi bu/ de bdin gshegs pa'i bya/ sa ma yo ta mu/ dam pog gi g+ha/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ci bu/ sarba ma hA su kha sid+d+hi hu/ thams cad de bachen do'i bu/ oM AHb+h+rUM/ srags banas/ rak+ka tsit+ta ra nya'i gaste 'thal pa'i chags/ sho d+ha ni hU~M swA hA/ shrI badz+ra
113a6(rnying rgyud): puSh+pe buM/ me tog 'bral ba'i thags/ shrI badz+ra rA ga d+hu pe d+hu/ rdzos/ shrI badz+ra A lo ke hrIH/ mur me/ shrI badz+ra gan d+he gAn/ d+hIHga/ shrI badz+ra ni bi h+ya zhab ngas kha kha khA ti/ btsog so ga/ shrI badz+ra gi ti hrIH/ rdza stan/ na maHsarba ta thA ga ta a d+hi pra tIdz+dza ho/ hU~M kha raM kha ra kha ra~M ga ni/ k+Sha ya
113a7(rnying rgyud): saMd+d+hi au/ rdo rje gapang gyur bye// thAg sid+d+hi A/ gzung ngo rjeg pang bye ga/ tsit+ta saMt+l-i b+h+yAM/ thag // oM AHhU~M/ su mdo// chang phreng pa/ u pa bya/ rje pa dang/ ki ma lwa mya la/ bridang ca ga 'i bye ba/ badz+ra a mr-i ta/ 'ang / a ha ma s+ye tho dr-i mdzo
113b1(rnying rgyud): 2Sh+Ta ra/ A ha~M ShAn/ gnas / e A hU~M lags gnas pa 'o// Sha dad+hA na/ oM sa rban thag tu tharnams da ga gas bya rna ba sgram na ga kha ga 'das
113b2(rnying rgyud): ya mchod pa mchod pad 'bul lo// pU dzA ya swA hA/ de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis thugs kyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// rtsa bar gyur pa'i phyag rgya ni/ cha ba'i phyag rgya thams cad 'byung ba'i chu ni rdo rje rngal mo ste/ zhes sogs so// g.yas pa thags kyi rang bzhin la/ gyi song mo rnams
113b3(rnying rgyud): A I hA rnams bkod// g.yon pa shes rab yum gyi dang / gi sor mo rnams m+bi m+bi nA~M kyai hrI rna nas bkod do// thabs dang shes rab ldan par gyur pas ni/ lagapa tha' mo// myong ba'i phyag rgya 'byung ba'i rgya// 'bru rnams oM dang suM rtse sngar gzhan rnams bsnol te rtse sdang pas/ so
113b4(rnying rgyud): yab kun spong bas// bde ba chen po 'byin pa'i rgya// rnam par grol bar rigs nga'i gnams kyi phyag rgya'i sgonas bu mtshon pa'i phyir/ rdo rje sems dpa'i// rdo rje rnam snang gi 'khor lo rin 'thung gi rin po che/ snang ba mtha' yas kyi/ pad+ma don yod grub pa'i ral gri yum kyi dril su pa rnam
113b5(rnying rgyud): nyid/ rin chen myu gu nam nying ral gri 'bar/ spyan ngas gzigs// pad+ma dkar po lcagan rdo rje'i rdo rje rtse lnga 'bar/ sa'i snying po'i sam zhig go// gzugs mdzes me song nam snying gi yum zin mo chena'i phreng ba dang / gyan ras gzigs kyi yum bu ma'i// pi wang
113b6(rnying rgyud): susu gar mkhan yagangs gang byed pa mchog nyid de/ phyi'i rang bum ni byams nga/ klu shing sgribaser gyi chos kyi 'khor lo dang / kun pazang gi// rin chen ste ma 'jam dpal gyi u t+pa la/ sram rnams la/ me tog mas// me tog phreng dang bdug spos mas spos mchod ma/ ma me
113b7(rnying rgyud): me byug pa mas drang por das dri la sogs pa'i/ gson rnams laba' 'gyung 'ardzi bu'o// kun rtsa bzang mo phyag mnyam gzhag gi sar ro lnga las ye shes 'gro/ snga'i 'od zer/ kun ba bang gi// yum gyur masun tu rangs mnyam gzhag gisathe bong gnyis rtse lda dang padz+ra nya ba rdzogs shangs pad+da
114a1(rnying rgyud): skyil/ zung ngo // rta'i thub pa cag na// pi wang dang ne mi te gseg par dang / lha min// go cha rtsom song po ti yi dwags rin chen sgrom/ dmyal pa'i byung ba'i// me dang chu 'i bram pang ni rab tu bstan/ gang gzhin rje gshed// me mgo ying rtag pa gdengs pa
114a2(rnying rgyud): dang snying stong sa jo ma rdo rje sadzod pa'i steng nas gnon/ nub mkhyen// thod dpyag/ sprul gyisang kres pa ga yas na thogs nas chen pos gso gyi thod pa Sha gnon pa dang / srang dud ci 'grol bas gams ci// rdo rje rgya gram las kyis g.yod po thod pa gnon/ shar/ lcags kyu mahong zhags
114a3(rnying rgyud): pa Sh+Ta/ thub tugs thog sa/ s+pho Ta kyang drilabum ho// lag pa/ gar dang ngag sde dbyangs kyi yid kyis mchod pa 'di ye shes nyal 'bul gyis/ thugs// chos nyid dra dag pa'i slob mas dbang dang dngos grub sbrul du gsol// phyag rgya bzhi yi don bstan pa/ bzung da pas/ maM
114a4(rnying rgyud): 'dol ma mchog she phyag rgya dang / phrin pas ma// byed pa las kyi phyag rgya dang / 'ang ngo sa chen// bsam pa chas kyi phyag rgya dang / reH/ gsal ba ra babyed pa su yaM phyag rgya rten pa dang bzhes// thams cad kun la 'dzod sems kyi ses mas das pas sa
114a5(rnying rgyud): d+has btab pa tshe/ man 'aH/ dam tshig phyag rgya rnam pa bzhi/ dang pab nga dang tshig de rgyag tung shes/ sra phyag can dad/ bram chen gyi mdab pa dpan kyi tha chags pa bu dang phyag zhabs su ldan par tham ste// sra ni phyag rgya chen po dang / de la su phrag rgya chen po pa bye dzan/
114a6(rnying rgyud): drad gyu tshes/ stan rdordo rje ma thu yang yin na sa sa bya rnams tu len pa re du shes mi 'byung / this bu'am lugs yul g+ha yin snyas nas phyag 'tshal bas na ga dran pa'i rgyur che ba'i phyir/ zhwa phyag tu can ba zhes byar// gsung ni chos kyi phyag rgya dang / gsung gas te thug ca ni/ de ltar wa bdom pa the'i steng
114a7(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'angor/ de'i steng du/ slob dpo po pa bzhed pas rje phreng ba'i thamar gsung gi mig bus padar bar bshad / rdzob dpan pa 'drang sa sngal po d+ha'i bzhed pas/ rdorje 'bred dal du bgag par kyang gnas khyod kyi dugasung rig 'dus paskor ba ba da/ de yang bden pa ton pa'i dpung dang ba
114b1(rnying rgyud): par da nga // dang bdan tu smras dang sa canam thams ca dadang thar ba'i dgas rdo rdo rtse 'a 'chung ba/ gnyis ni cig gi gzung bas kyis bya ba pa dang ldan pas mig 'as bkor ba // phrin las las kyi phyag rgya dang / ni dgang brgom pa'i thugs gang tra snrel tsa shing drardab tu bag spang ba bas sa ka/ ngas
114b2(rnying rgyud): don kun gyis bya ba 'i rtags kyi rdo rje rtsa bram gzhi gcig tu byung ba yin gzhan don kun du brtags su kun tu dwe rtse byung ba yin no// de ni drin las kyi phyag rgyal// thugs ni dam tshig phyag rgya'o// thugs dang tshig ni cag tu ni/ don rtags pas mi 'dang ba/ rtagacis don mtshon par byed las kyang m-i da // la
114b3(rnying rgyud): mamadonga'i rtags yin la/ du bdes kyang me rton cing mngon par pyod pa kar/ don thugs yang dag pa'i mned kyis phrin las ci ma dad pa'i rtags cag mtshan byung ba ni/ don rtags las mi 'da' ba 'ig la/ sngags tshan des dan thugs yang dag pa ye shing de mtshon cing rton pa byed pas zhid maces ngo pa
114b4(rnying rgyud): thugs kyis gzung 'dzin ci rnam tog 'joms pas rdo rje/ chos kyi 'khor song shor bas na dadzer ma/ 'dod pa rgong bas na rin chen/ gyon gyis mgos pas na dang / nyon mongs gcong bas ra' ma/ chos thams cad sna pa rang bzhin ma dang rji'i rnaM// rtse pa byag/
114b5(rnying rgyud): drag por byed/ yed mchog gi phyag caste/ phur thos kyid byengs lasu mi 'dang ngas na dang byig co kyi dbyings kyi dang dkun 'jogs pas na drag pa'i las kyis can 'joms par byengad bas na phur ro// baM gyi las kyi dbang du byed/ decig tu chen po yang ti du nye yang ces sus dang bang dang byed des yang sa
114b6(rnying rgyud): ma yaM las kyis rgyas par byed/ mtshos kyi phrag tu pe/ lung dang rtogs pa'i chos kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa rin po che byas par byed pas na rgyas pa'i las dang sbar ro// yA yaM las kyis zhi bar byed/ rdzan pas kyi phyag rgya ste/ yang lhag par zang sems kyis las nyon pa sus bzhi bar rjed pas na pa'i
114b7(rnying rgyud): dang byur ba 'o// 'bar dus kyi thos sa lus bkun phyag cu ni bang bangar du byas// gsum pa chos kyi phyag bzhin g.yon/ byams yo sa sod pa zhin du brtsod pa// yum ni dam tshig gi phyag rgyal// / nyidang tha babyed pani// yab ni phyag rgya chen po phra gams kyad /
115a1(rnying rgyud): mkha' gsang rgyu rnangs can lasas ca na/ ma sa sa gas// 'am cu sa da las ma 'ad/ ma / gsal ba sgral phyag rngu ba na// / dam rgyag rang blang /
115a2(rnying rgyud): ye shes gas bya/ la sa// phyag rgya chen bachos kyi thA// las kyi phyag tu sprul pa'i rtsa/ 'a ma sus kya da sa 'o// chos kyi phyag rgya langs khyod rdzogs ma tha nga // de sa ga can ci // de nas bde bar gshegs pa
115a3(rnying rgyud): nams kyis yon tan gyi dkyil lakha sangs rgyas kyi rgya ba 'di 'gro ba'i don dugasungs so// de la sangs kyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa btsabargyad ky-i rgya pa 'di dag bzhin pa'i myi gsungs pa ni 'dis te// narnas ma ma mam da

116a1(rnying rgyud): bsags gad dang / mas padas yin pa tha ba 'ad dang / mtha ba pa bsnang ngas nad byud// rnam par grol banyams pa yang/ na / nas bas chags pa 'a bya/ nyanags ma sa sags
116a2(rnying rgyud): par po langs na de skad ces bya'o// lus las ye shes sngon 'gro 'brang / sarba k+Sha la ka rA dz+nyA na bu d+hi ga m-i n+do Tu ba 'i brti/ zhes byab/ lus kyi las thams cad ye zhes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba yin te/ dgra bcom pa cig lus kyi las bsams bzhin ma yin par byed de 'jig rten gyi yid dang gal brta bra ma yin gyi/
116a3(rnying rgyud): slo pa ma kyang sems sa tha te/ phanas nga sangs rgyabs kya na segs rje su ni/ gzhi na cig sung na ga kyings mang ba na lags rdzu sa 'bang ba'id/ ba na sa 'a thams cad pags do seM zhing leg kyi ngas yang banas/ ga
116a4(rnying rgyud): mdas rje su ldan pa na mams na da// ngagalas ma gas rngon 'gro'abrang / sa pa ga myong she/ zhe sa gag sa mas dmags dang ngas sa sas 'a 'a / ngas byed ma
116a5(rnying rgyud): drwa nga me nga ba/ gan dang gangs san/ ngan sa bas pa begs 'a zhime na// yang las le gas sngon 'gro 'brang // sa 'dang rmad du ga nga mangs/ nasapa/ 'a byings mas da rigs ldan legs pa sa bas sa/ 'angs
