116b1(rnying rgyud): bdags pa'i dus dang d+har+sha ba zad cang rtsal yang dzags ma par byabs su zud ba na 'das pa'adus las chags mthogs pa las gas paka/ da sbyar ma chags ma thogs gzigs/ bad+ha nra trAn sogs rdza ma sbyar pa/ dkar bya dus lam chags ma thags pa'i logs gzigs pal 'dug gogs pa na la sol pa ha dang /
116b2(rnying rgyud): gyi sa kyid nga pa'i la tag pas na sgra gcig mched cig dan la thogs shing mi mkhyen pa lta ngam len gyis/ dkar gyi dras kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / sar+tha be rlung gi rdul phra ma'i bangs dang sems can kyi bsam pa dang rtsod pa lasags pam zhus par mnyam par bdag pa dang ma bkag pa'i dus dang thar ba med cing ces pa 'ardzogs pazed
116b3(rnying rgyud): nga drugs su chud padzi da ngad ltar gyi dus lasogs pa'o// ma 'ongs ma thogs ma chags gzigs// a\u0f89\u0fa4 ta tAn sa sogs snga ma sbyar pa/ ma'ong sa da'i dub lam chags mthogs pa'i legs gzigs pa 'dug brji tha cos pa tur ma'ongs pa'i dngos po gtsicigs brtag pas na ga gang khyen gyi/ gzhan la rjogs gang di can
116b4(rnying rgyud): bta ba yid kyis/ ma ngas pa dus kyis sa rgyam byin dang tum chung 'grom zung ba dang / sems can gyi bangs pa dang pyod pa la chags pam ngas par thags pa chud pasan ma 'angs pa'i dus pam nas sa mthags pa dgas garigs par 'jug par// deban chad sangs cas kyilas sa 'dres pa nad do// so so yang
116b5(rnying rgyud): dag rig pa bzhi// chos don ngas tshig thobs pa'o// mad+ha ma pad cas pa/ mam pa ngan pa gas pa yang nan/ cha ba dang / dan dang / ngam nga rtseg dang / thabab dang zhi pa 'as mamams pang dag par ridag pa nas kya// yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid// bcang tu
116b6(rnying rgyud): ma ba rgya zla bang dag pa/ sonis 'bras t+ya ta/ mthas par 'arjog pa gas/ ni sangs rgyas bcad/ phred na tsas thams dpang banyid ma nar bar bags pardzud cing mang par nga rdzas mim ta/ yang dag pa zhus pa'i sangs byas shes bya te/ yang dag par di dri ba garigs da tha'ang/ bta na dang / babyen bcang /
116b7(rnying rgyud): rig pa dang ni nang par ldan// ga ng+ya dz+ra pa/ ban das/ za zhan pa/ ma dun pa ma su thas chags te/ datha bdu dang byang chug pa shes ji sa / nya pa mas dang / nya pasro rdi nas/ 'dags pa sa can nga/ ba da pa ga
117a1(rnying rgyud): lhag ma bdud ni nang pa te/ rig pa mag dang 'dra ba 'tshad nas dang bas rgyan cing thob par 'gyur bas na rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa'o// bde gshegs legs par gshegs pa nyid// drug ta zhes pa/ gcig tu ni/ rko rta dag tathag ta tha chub ba ces te/ legs par gnag
117a2(rnying rgyud): bas na gzugs legs pa bzhin/ a bud d+hA tA ga ta sun Sh+Ta dzA ra ba ta ces te/ phyir mi ldog par gshegs pas na lags par gshegs pa ste/ rims na dalegs par byang ba bzhin no// yang dag ta bya ga man+tata su ga ta su b+ha tsA g+ha Ta bta ces pa ji tsam du 'gro bar bya ba ma lus par phyin pas na legs par gshegs pa ste/ bum pa
117a3(rnying rgyud): legs pa gang ba bzhin/ zhes bzung / yang na/ rta r+m+ma skar+d+ha las 'thung ba/ bu ga ta i hi su khi to b+ha ga bAn swan ta a bu tri ta d+ham+ba sa man+ta ga tata d+hu ts+ya te pu ga ta zhes te/ bcom ldan 'das bde bar gshegs shing mtho ris kyi bde ba dang ldan la gnod pa mi mnga' zhing / gnod pa med pa'i chos dang ldan pas na bde bar gshegs
117a4(rnying rgyud): ba'am bde ba brnyes pa la yang bya ste/ 'di ni sngar grags pa dang / d+harma ga d+ha las byung ba dang gyur te/ bde bar gshegs pa zhes btags so// 'jig rten mkhyen pa zhes bya ste// log 'di ces pa/ lo ka ni 'jig rten/ bid ni bdi dz+nyAn te/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du gdul ba'i sems can gyi
117a5(rnying rgyud): khams pa gzigs shing skal ba yod pa dang med pa rtogs par mkhyen pas na 'jig rten ma sten mkhyen ga zhes bya'o// skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur// du sung dpyas da zi ni/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha mo gyur ba ste/ sor mo'i phreng ba la sogs pa de sdang che ba dang / dga' bo la sogs pa 'dod chags che ba dang / steng rgyas 'od srung pa
117a6(rnying rgyud): sogs pa dati mug che ba'i gdul bu'i sems can rta nod dang 'dra ba gdul dka' ba rnams 'dam pos 'dul ba'ang 'jam pos gdul/ drag pos 'dung ba'ang drag pos gdul/ gnyis gas 'dul ba'ang gnyis kas gdul/ thabs bzang zhing spa bas thab bzhin du btul nas/ don grub pa'i mchog kyang 'das su gnas par kha 'o bsrung nas
117a7(rnying rgyud): pa na sbe bu du ba'i 'pho gyur ba zhes bya// 'di ni bla na med pa'o// a tra ra ni blan med pa te 'dibs rtag pa'i ston pa med pas nangan med pa zhes bya'o// lha mi kun gyi ston par 'gyur/ dade bu sa nu nA NI tA hA zhes pa/ sharu yan ga shes paspyi tshig gi don dran ston cing thob pa laH/ tan cig gi rkyen

118a1(rnying rgyud): par byar te shad pas natshigs su bad pa'i rje zhes bya'o// ched du brjod dang utra zhes pa/ u gyid na su na zhes bya ste/ gang ga 'ad phyir 'ad pa ma yin cis sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa 'i rdzagadag rgya gzhan cemam sa sulas gsol la byed du 'ad cir ga pa la rnams te/ dpe
118a2(rnying rgyud): dus kyi tsho com ldan 'das nang du yang dag / 'jog las bzhengs te stan la bzhugs nas dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do zhes mdo las gsungs pa lta bu ste ched du brjod pa'i sde zhes bya'o// gleng gzhi'i sde/ ni dran zhes pa ni mod dang dngul la sogs thogs ci las phreng zhes de bshad pa dang / gzhi 'di dang skabs 'di dang /

118a4(rnying rgyud): da ltar gyung / i ti byig zhes pa ni/ i ti o ngi nyi de lta bu dang rtsi rtag zhes bya ba ni/ gra ma'am snang ba ste/ sngon srung gi gtam bzlas shing bshad pa yin pas na de ste bu bung ba'i sde zhes bya'o// skyes pa rabs dang dzA ta ka zhes bya bdi com ldas 'das sngon byang chub sems dpa'i ltung ba spyod pa'i tshe/ gang dang gang du skyes pa dang /
118a5(rnying rgyud): dka' ba ci dang ci mdzad pa bshad pa yin pas skyes pa rabs kyi sde zhes b+ha ba yin no// shin tu rgyas/ bi du l+ya zhes pa/ bi Tal bu ba~M bi bu l+ya zhes bya ste/ shin tu chas par bshad pa'am/ mdo rgya chen po nas sa dang phar phyin sa sogro bzhin tu rgya che zhing yangs der bshad pa'o// rmad du gyur dang / ad+h+ya ta d+ha s+kha zhes pa/ sang
118a6(rnying rgyud): rgyas byang chub sems dpang dang nyan thos rnams kyis mkhyen pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang byid kyis tha' ga ngom tshar du dra pa bshad pa yin pas na drang du byung ba'i chos kyi sde zhes bya/ gtan la phab// u ba dag zhes pa ni/ mardo rje don g.yon nyid mthor ba gzhan gyis zhing song band cing gtan la phab ba rjes su mthun pa'i chos bshar
118a7(rnying rgyud): ba'i sam sna bu'i chos mngon pas byabs nag dan la phab 'di sdo// de ta dra/ gsung rab yan lag becu gnyis po// 'gro ba rnams la ston pa'o// nges rgyas rnamasas ma 'a thub 'o// 'od 'dirnams mongs bu yin pa la phrul su'i cheng brjod pa ci zhin thu la sra nyid kyang songs su'i cheba'o// thogs
118b1(rnying rgyud): bar dang mthar dge pa/ ga rtsuH zhes bya ba/ sra do ni dang po yin te/ tshangs par spyod pa'i dang la ba/ ka lba ni/ gser bzang po cheng yang bces shing brdung drang ba dang 'dra bar/ yon tan gyi rim pagong ma kun gyi sbed du rbang bar 'gyangs sha dge bas bya te/ snyi na dang po nyag pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pas dge ba thams
118b2(rnying rgyud): dacig ni dbyung bas na/ thog par dge ba zhes bya/ ma h+yeg l+la Na zhes tha batshangs par sdod pa'i ba bani gas ma bzhan bzhi la sogs pa'i sems mnyam par 'jog pa'i pir te/ lhag pa'i selas la byabs na bang du dge ba zhes bya/ parba ba srad ka rba shes byab/ tshangs par khyod pa tha lani/ 'phag
118b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i ya shes kyis don dam pa'i bden pa mngon par rtogs pas na/ lhag pa'i shes rab yin te/ tham dge bzhes bya'o// mya ngan 'das par tshangs par spyod// bzud rtsigs thab/ tha na/ ba\u0f89\u0fa4 Sh+ya thI ta thAg zhes bya ste/ tshangs pa'am/ bsi par gyur ba/ don tu mya ngan las 'das pa la tha/ dza ba
118b4(rnying rgyud): zhe bya te/ gang gis thob par 'gyur zhing spyod pa la bya bas/ mya ngan las 'das par bya ba'i phyir spyad pas na tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya// don bzang sna tha zhes pa/ bzhi bzang po/ a ni don te/ don ma log par bstan pas na don babar po zhes pa/ tshig 'bru bzang po nyid/ saH ldan zhes pa/ su ni bzar do
118b5(rnying rgyud): 'bru te/ tshangs par spyod pa bshad pa'i tshig 'bu ko zhing brda phrad par slab ste/ brjod pa phun sum tshogs pa'i phyir/ tshig 'du bzang po zhes bya'o// ma 'dres ko'a'i zhes thab/ as+ya b+hA ra Na ShA dge ba'i zhes bya te/ mu stegs can la sogs pa phal dang thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir sa 'dzes par zhes bya ste/ yongs su rdzogs pa

119a1(rnying rgyud): na du/ rnamasas du ma sa/ dag pa na nas/
119a2(rnying rgyud): yad ces yang dag pa'i nas rab kyis yang dag pa nge ga bzhin du lan par mthong bas na/ yang dag par mthong ba zhe sa'o// nad med pa dang ra dra zhes pa leg saldan pa TIg/ twa dIn banen te/ nya mongs pag gal gyi gnyen po nangs/ nyad mongs pa dang ba'i rtan mongs pa'i del pa nad pas 'acing yongs su sa par ma
119a3(rnying rgyud): dbyar bas dang med ban/ dus chad med// akA ye gzhes pa/ bc-ig tan/ 'di mas na'ad arna la na zhes te skangs dang yang basbron du rbang stengs des tha mad pa'i phyir dra ba ba med ces so// 'dan/ sarba tha su la rnaMms pe 'azhes te/ rjod pa ma ba zhi'i dus kun tu tha bar thabs dus chad pa med pa nas 'o// nye bar/
119a4(rnying rgyud): gnod pa o ba na mi bzhes pa/ mag 'dun bane na tas pan yarba yo ba na mi gzhes te/ sdug bsngal ma lus pa las nges par 'byung ba la nye bar spyod pa'i phyir nye bar btod 'azhes so/ 'di ma sor yod/ shes kyas zhes pa/ as da yad ke ta 'gyeg y-ika pa k+She kra ba/ zhes pa/ sos 'di mthong ba rnam pa la yod bar
119a5(rnying rgyud): gas pa dang dmang pa yid pa phyir 'de zang sa mang pa sa tha/ yang nas rdzam thu de blang meg brtsa pa sapal ga zhes pa/ grong dpor 'ang pa mdapas ni lanyas shig saskabs 'byed pa dang ldan pa'i bye di cos sngan da pang te/ cig shes sa dang sa ba dan tham dang thur bag ba go pa ngas/
119a6(rnying rgyud): dis pang la dzad pa zhes gags sa// mkhas rnams rang gis rig par bya// Shadz+ra ba ni ma bad+hA zhes pa/ mata rba dang ma na med pa twI zhes pa/ gcig tu na/ tog ga 'phral ma yin te/ shes rab ca rnams kyi rang gis rtogs par bya ba yin pa dang / yang na mnis ma da thA dra be nI la zhes 'be/ brjod du med pa'i zer
119a7(rnying rgyud): sas rang gis rig par zad pas mangs pa rnams kyis rang rig par ba bzhes so// legs gsungs chos 'dul legs par bstan// sA sh+lau zhos bton pa'i nasasra bdenan zhes pa/ rna la dA sa pa ba nin rje nata pra shang de sa nas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul
119b1(rnying rgyud): rus dang ga pa na ma sasho gas sa sadapa nas/ ko sumam 'thas sa/ thog sa sa yangan nang kyi 'an masam nama'am sa pas 'gas la// ngas 'byung rngugs pa'i byang chub 'am/
119b2(rnying rgyud): zhes pa/ sarko nye 'a sri ni tsA ga zhes te/ chog 'di nyid ni/ 'odams gong ma bshad pa'i na te/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gro bar byed bas mya ngan las 'das par nges par 'ang ba'i phyir nges par 'byung brdzogs pa'i thang chub tu 'gro bar byeng ba zhes thaba'o// me mthun med cing 'dus par ldan// aHsa su bzhes pa/
119b3(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la gan thos rnams bka ba mi mthun pa med de/ gcig tu 'dus pas ni mi mthun pa med cing 'das pa dang ldan pa zhes thong // brtan pa yod pa sa rbati sha zhes pas ni bcas pa'am yod pa'o// ba tig ra ba ni skabs sam dpung gnyen nam brten du rung ngal bya/ mu stegs can po chos ga tha 'angs ngan 'ar
119b4(rnying rgyud): byen pa mi nyasal ba sa gsungs pang brten pa 'ad ba zhe pa/ chu ba bcad// seM n+do blo / gshes pa/ smon ni chang ba/ rmo tin ni sdu gtogs pa te/ 'grob 'am chus ded cing byer / bu tshig yi te/ phyir na 'a khor bar bya gang 'pha brgyan cad pal ba te/ rgyal ba cad pa zhes bya'o// chos kyi rnam grangs ma zas
119b5(rnying rgyud): mkhyen// sos dran 'dang kyi chos kyi rnam grangs de rnams mkhyen nas gsungs pa yang theg pa 'ogam brtson gyis myangs pas mkhyen nas gsung bar 'dod la/ gsang sngags pa ni bcom ldan 'das thab pa nyid kyang yongs su rigs pa'i bral bar 'byung bas/ gsung bar 'dod pa'o// mngon par shes pa drug dang
119b6(rnying rgyud): ldan pa/ ma byin// ngan sa dang po nas gnas gang 'byung ba lkog gyur gyi tshas rnams la/ dkar mngon sum du 'dug pa dang da bar shes pa ni mngon par des pa zhes bya'o// g+ha yi mig gis mthong ba dang // dka kyi mas kyi di skad pa dang / senas gar byis pa'i gzugs thams cad mthang ba'o//
119b7(rnying rgyud): yin pa thos pa dang / sleg da dang bad na tshogs tshus dang ga dang / sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa dang / sems can ma 'as pa dang bga' gal me chung shes pa'o// lus kyi rdzu 'phrul shes pa dang // 'bar ba dang / 'thar ba dang / mang bung dang / bab nga na dang / hral mi cing / sal zing ba
120a1(rnying rgyud): dag shes pa'o// sngon gyi gnas ni rjes su dran// da ltar gyi dus nas bzung ste tshe snga ma gang ga nas/ las ci byas dran pa'o// zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa ni// mthong bas spangs pa dang bsgoms pas spangs pa'i nyon mongs pa gang spangs pa dang / ma spangs pa'i rigs shis shing zad pa dang mi skye ba'i ye
120a2(rnying rgyud): shes thob pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' nyid du 'dod// byang chub sems dpa' yab sum rnams mngon zhes drug dang ldan par gnas pa'o// des sems can ma sras pa la chos 'chad par bskul ma 'debs so// mtshon dang dpe byad ldan gyur pa// mtshan dang sum cu rtsa gnyis ni// phyag zhabs
120a3(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan// de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag pa rnabs kyi mthil la/ 'azod mo rtsibs stod dang ldan pa/ mu khyud can ste ba dang bcas pa/ rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa ni 'dis se/ nus pa'am bsol ba nos blta bu mnga'ab te/ de ni tham bsra bsngal dang / chos nyan pa la sod pa dang gtsug pag
120a4(rnying rgyud): nga dang mchod rten la bsti stang byas palas byung ba te/ de ni gakhor shin tu mang ba'i sngags so// zhabs ni shin tu gnas pa dang // zhabs kyi mthi la gnyis mnyam ngar sa la 'jog cing gabs bum pa med pas shin tu gnas pa ni/ yi dmal brten pa pas byung ba rta/ de ni mi g.yo zhing shin tu brtan pa'i rdza ltas so// phyag zhabs rba
120a5(rnying rgyud): bas 'brel pa dang // rang nga'i rgyab po ltar byaganabs kyi song mo bas brel ba ni sbyin pa dang / ngag tan pa dang / don khyongad pa dang / donam thun pa 'thu rnam pa bzhi goms par byas b.las byu ba ste/ don mur nga 'dra ba'i sngags so// phyag zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa dang // bdun yang shin tu mdzo ba
120a6(rnying rgyud): dang / phrag dang gangs shing bas kyi ladra gang shin dra'ang sa zhing gzhon na chags pa dang bya ba das kyi 'o ba'i zug gong nyis rta pa dang du shin tumathong ni rang ba dang bang ba dang / btung pa zhes zhing rnams sung de babyin palas blang ba ste/ de da shes na pa 'a ba dang rab dang nga bzhin tu ma pang nam pasu ba de bzong pa'i
120a7(rnying rgyud): sa so// phyag zhabs sor mo ring ba dang // sa pang kro ba dang srog gi rim gre byas pa de / srog gzod pa grangs ngas sor mo ring ba dang // ting pa shin tu yangs pa dang // ti ba ring bas na nga ba yangam pa dang // sku yang che zhing drang ba dang // su gang bdun du 'phags pa drang bas su me nga
120b1(rnying rgyud): sa ma supa ya gas so/ zhabs na pags par mthob dang // yan lag sgra yang ste du 'brel// kya dang nga pa sa nas thugams pa da na masan ga ma da du na sa
120b2(rnying rgyud): nga 'ji dzin/ dang nyan ma che med nga na'i 'argyas so// ri dgus yi ma'i byin pa 'dzi// thig pa dang ma ba dang rgang nga zhing nyam par ma sa gos 'dum mabyed pa zlas papa gas mimam la 'arnaMg pa dang pa ga tha ni gshang sa nas
120b3(rnying rgyud): 'byu ta/ de kar du 'dzin pa'i grags so// phyag gis brlar ni drung por sleb// sa nga so ba ga ste ma rgyad kyang phyag gi mthi gnyis kyis bras mo ltad ba sa pas thag pa drang por rjeb ba ni 'dog cad yod pa'i dod nga mas nami dgod bar gtong nang me sa dmas pa'i 'gra ste/ don pa tha
120b4(rnying rgyud): drang 'dzidags so// gsang ba'i gnas su srabs su rba ba// bang dang ca shes bya das badzin na zhi ngas sa sabs sa na dang rdzogs pa dang mang banas dang ten ma the ba dang byebar thar ba'i sems pa narnabs brnams pa dang cing ba pyod pa yang dag par 'phra ba dang / gas yang cigs
120b5(rnying rgyud): nga ste/ de duza mi ma so// gser ldan sa bu'i mdog dang ldan// mdog krung shin tu 'jam pa dang / shin pa bya pade geshi ni yas pa bdag ga tha dang bu sarba mi so 'di nye ma dang blan da du gas bdudu dang 'dzid dang das dpa
120b6(rnying rgyud): baMho/ de ga nyi nig dang dus da nga bdang / zhang 'ad ba dang dag pa nga bang sa bya so// sku yang re re ga yas phyogs 'khyil// zhal ni mdzod sbas brgyan pa dang // dang bye 'i dre byas nang gnyis pa dang // sa gal sogs pa 'brel ba dang /

121a3(rnying rgyud): sa dag pa da sa da da / bo n+d+ha snang du gang 'gag/ dbu'i sdigazug gsus pa bzhib/ sa ma sa dus
121a4(rnying rgyud): sa la ya mas nga 'a sa sa da pas pang smyig ngag sa
121a5(rnying rgyud): da du bya na sadagags ga dang thaM pa sa shAng ba ste/ de yang ca po mang pa thagasas// yangs shing thub pa'i ljags dang // gsung ni tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang lus// rdzabs byangs pa dan ba 'don gang lag ci bya ba sa shing sa pa dang
121a6(rnying rgyud): pa nga/ nga gas mdzang te/ de na ra gag ga 'das pa dgrams pa pa blas pa'as blang ste/ de gnyin ni lan lag sde dang ldan pa'i bgrang ma nga 'di 'byam mo// gsung ngan rag rdza nga ngan pa na 'ongs pa zhes zhi nam par shes par 'thar ba dang shad dga' dang mthan za ba
121a7(rnying rgyud): mas sris sa du na nga/ sa shongs 'dza// sang ge' 'bram pa sa thu dang / mi tshan nga ba sa nga kye te nga bas su 'ongs ga 'tha 'ang shing sus
121b1(rnying rgyud): te/ den cig ku cimanyan pa'i dugams// choms ni shin tu dkar ba dang // choms kyang shin tu mnyam pa dang // matogs dang drang shig dang dro ltar ni kyang dag ba'i choms mangs dang / choms pa bzad panamadangs masham pa na sar ba dang / brta' ba dang gta tu nga dus
121b2(rnying rgyud): dag pa las kyang bya ste/ de nyis ni ba yod nas pa gas pa'i bsdus so// tshems kyi thugs kyang bzang ba dang // choms mnyam shi zangs ba da kyi nga med par bzhi bcu tshang ba dang // rnams ma rnams mdod pas thags cang ba dang / 'thon dkyi dang me nga sa mnyim ni nga ni
121b3(rnying rgyud): di/ sran ring po nas bden zhing tha ma med pa'i tshig slab las byang ba te/ de dag ni 'khod dbyer mi byed pa'i snga ltas so// sman yang dkar nag dbyes pa dang // ba yi rdzi ma lta bu'o// sun dkar nag gi ma ma 'dres shing shin byarnam par dag cing mdog dam pos ma gsogs pas su dgang na ga rjes pa dang /
121b4(rnying rgyud): re mdog shin du legs par gnas la ma 'dzings pas pa 'jimag bu bang gis byu nga bzhin du nyes par bas mapa med ma ma chags mi spang ba dang / rmong sad/ med pa mig gis bstas palas thang ba te/ de dag ni can nas mdzes pa'i sngags so// de rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan bzang po bram ca rtsa gnyi
121b5(rnying rgyud): dpe byad bzang po brgyad ca n+de// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam pa ni mngon par 'dra tha ba thams cadas sa dben pa ste/ sen mo zangs kyi mdog ltar 'jug/ sangs rgyas batham ldan 'das rnams ni zhes rnams cad kyi 'gol sar pa'i bzhen pa zhes thams pa dang 'drang sa pa dam mas padal
121b6(rnying rgyud): 'di'i brag mdang ba te// sen mo'i mdog kyang snyam pa yin// rigs rgyu na pa bya// sen mo mtho ba'i zhing tshang 'a ma pa'abs sen mo sngam/ bamin/ da pa'i cha bzhin mtshogs pa te// sor mo rgyas la ge cis gyur tes nga/ rim gyis gzho
121b7(rnying rgyud): in/ phrag cang zugs kyi rjenapas dang 'tsho bzhin kyang ba ste 'i// rba yang mi mngon pa'in/ nyon 'das pa'i dzud pa gros pas rtsa ba mdud pa med/ badzin/ shin tu dben pa'i chos ma ngang ngas// long bu mi mngon pa yin/ mi mnyam pa thams cadapas rmong sa/ zhabs kyang mnyam/ pa 'in/
122a1(rnying rgyud): sags// seng ge 'asabyas pa bzhan pas/ galan mang pa' mas sug/ ngas sa sa/ nga ba'i skabs pa bzad pas na/ ma cag ga gangs mas
122a2(rnying rgyud): gapas phyogs sa bskrad cing brtan pas pate/ mdzes par bzed/ ma/ shA 'ad she// ma yo bar bzhud man/ ma nyis su yang lags/ pa/ nas ga tu tes// shin tu

122b1(rnying rgyud): gtsang ba ban/ chos nag po bstan pa dang thal ba chos dang rul ba bam pa ba zhe skye ba med/ ba yin/ shing bal ltar bang ba rab khrob car chab ston pas// phyag shing bar snang 'jam pa yid/ rang gi skye ba dang bye bo phal 'byams pa pa dag sung can pa brnyes pa sa phyag ga sa sum pa ran la shin tu pa na
122b2(rnying rgyud): bdu pas phyid gi ri mo zab/ pa yin/ bdod pa'i chos yangs bston pa ste phyag nir mo// ring ma yin la bslab pa'i gnas ha cang ngangami ring bar 'cha bas nal/ ha cang mi ring ma yin la// gzugs brtan 'jig rten thams cad du brtseb ste// zhal la gnams kyi gzugs brtan spang ba yin// so
122b3(rnying rgyud): tshogs dang ldan pas te// ljags ni srab pa yin/ 'jam pa sngon du gtang zhing 'dul bas sngags 'jam pa yin/ byams pa'i skye bo 'dod chags pa rnams kyis chos dang 'dul ba gting dpag dka' bas ljags shin tu dmar ba yin// glang po'i sra dang 'brug gis dbyangs nyar ba nyengs pa'i mang bas // nga po'i
122b4(rnying rgyud): nga ro dang 'jug gi dbyangs/ dang dran pa yin/ snyan cing 'jam pa dang nyams su bde bar sba ba'i thobam mnga' bas// snyan cing 'jam pa nyams su bde/ ba'i gsung dang ldan pas/ l+r-ing ba kun tu myong ba las 'das pas// choms mche shin tu zlum pa yin/ khro bo rno ba rnams 'dul ba choms sa
122b5(rnying rgyud): ba/ rjod pa rin/ cho dang rung bzhin tu dkar bab choms sa ches dkar ba pos sa kyogs mnyam pa la bzhugs pa stes cheg/ mnyam ma yin/ ris kyis bdon pa rtogs pa'i rtso skon pas choms mtheg rim las gzhol/ ba yin/ shas rang kyi rimathod po 'ab zugs pas// shangs legs par mtho ba dang ngan
122b6(rnying rgyud): pa pin/ 'dus pa'i bye bo gcing sa mnga' bas gangs shin tu gtsang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyis che bu 'du 'angs pa mang nga// spyan ring mdzin/ gzigs shin tu rnam par dag pas sun/ rnam dag pa yin/ sem can gyi tshigs ni ni tu ba ba gas pa te/ rdzi ma lu ka/ ba yin/ nya dang dang rta ba yi dang skyes
122b7(rnying rgyud): chung mchog mig dkar dag 'byes shing badz+ra'i 'dab ltar 'dab brnams kyis mngon par dga' bar byangs nye spyan// dkar gang 'byes pa pad+ma'i 'dab/ ma ltar 'dug pa yin/ rtag tu pangs pa gzigs pa ste// smin ma ring ba dang ldan pa yin/ 'jam par 'du' ba la mkhas pas srinas 'jam pa bin/ gyon 'ams
123a1(rnying rgyud): bad das te nam kyi su mnyam pa san sa/ dgang dra ga na par bya ma rtsibo rab nas sdum/ pardan/ thamang ca tu nga shing do dpa nasas// spyan legs shing snyan shal rang ba na// pa ya byung ba rnam par yang
123a2(rnying rgyud): napa su mas na 'an pa/ dbang po mnyam padang 'dzin/ brnanags rnams sangs/ zhis sa legs bami ga 'ja dzin/ 'phral ba 'das pa dang // na pa pa nga sa
123a3(rnying rgyud): byas pa / ga da mas gnas tu smras papa dzigag pa ngas / mug pa dang / 'an pa/ ga na ya sa / dang ma da ma 'a ma 'a

123a5(rnying rgyud): rdzas rnams kyis smin las tshong rtswa'i chen por bsan pa 'di dgra gsungs sa// tshe 'phral nas pa gsum nyid de// phun brjong pa mi myo phrub dang // rnga 'phral bsan pa'i cho 'phrul dang // rdzas su bstan pa ma 'phral phyin// phrin las rnam pa

123b3(rnying rgyud): glams paman cang te'u bsdams// dpa' mo yum lnga po zhal gci phyag gnyis g.yas gri gug g.yon thod/ maro// IM ha/ rdo rje sems dpa'/ na maHhi/ nam mya d+ha/ swA hA hU~M/ badz+ra ga dbang / bshad to// khag tung hU~M hU ho/ ma/ phaT/
123b4(rnying rgyud): oM paM/ phag so/ haM yaM/ ya ya~M ni/ hriM maM/ rmongs byed ma/ hriM dz+riM/ khyod cengs/ hU~M hU~M/ skrag ched ma/ phaT phaT/ gtum mo// oM badz+ra ha badz+ra satwa yab rdo rje sems dpa' hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM baM badz+ra baM taM yus pag mo hUM hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM he badz+ra bai ro tsa na rnam snang hU~M hU~M
123b5(rnying rgyud): A~M h+ye maM gshin dzes yA ma ni hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM sa hA hU~M pad bar dad pad+ma naid+haM shwa rA hU~M hU~M phaT sa hA/ A~M hriM maM mo ha ni mongs ched mAM gr-i hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM bau shad he he ru ka zhag krung hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM hri tra~M sa~M tsa la ni sbed kyang ma druM hU~M phaT swA hA/

123b7(rnying rgyud): ma// dmags rangasams dpa nga bzhinagashegs pathams ca dpang dag nyid dang galag lung ngo // phung po lnga dang thams cad kun// dpa' bo drug la yang dag gnas// thig gnyis ga mug rdo rdzal men/ rna ba de sdang rdo rdza bag po/ rdza ser 'jo rje phrag byed pa/ Sha'adod chags ngo rdo nga
124a1(rnying rgyud): reg tha phrag dag rdo rje gtum po/ rtse mched thams cad dbang phyug rnga rdzas pyod byer pa'o// dbang po dpa' mor gnas pa yin// lus rnas dang rdo rje dang ngang / dngag med rdo rje yid mi 'khrugs pa zhes so rdo rjer gnas// de nas ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor bsgrung
124a2(rnying rgyud): par bya ba 'di gsungs so// zhi ba'i tshogs mchod pas mnyes par bya ba dag ni// yan lag mchod pa'i las la mkhas pas dbul bar bya/ pa'o// chos su yul/ dmigs pa med pa'i dpe ni mkha' ltar dag pas 'khor 'das kun la khyab pa'i sku/ 'das pa'i thugs dang sems
124a3(rnying rgyud): can gyi sems dbyer med pa chos su las/ nub 'byod par // spyan 'dren pa dang ye zhes kyi lha gshegs su gsol bar gnyis su mi dmigs kyang / chos tu de'i// thugs rje'i ma 'gags pa dang nyid chos sgra dag pa las/ gdul ba'i dod la// ye shes sgyu masa'i bu spangs rang bdin med pa rol cing

124a5(rnying rgyud): sgrog pho nyis ta mthur dam du bsgom bltar bsdams nas gnas stobs la// btang snyoms tshad med pa'i dril bus rnam grol/ rgyal po ta zhon pa la dga' gtam zer bltar dgyes pa bskyed/ de// chos nyid zhe ba// rang snang ba dang dbyer medapas na dkyil 'khor la// thugs rjes ma 'gags
124a6(rnying rgyud): tsho rlabs dadrang las mgon gyur ma lus rnams/ chos nyid dang ye shes dbyer med pa'i dang du dgongs la// mi phyed dbyings la dgod mdzad pa'i// bdag rnal 'gyod pa ladam tshig gis dgongs pa lus ngag 'di la dgyes shing them par bzhugs// rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas kyi skul bzhengs pa
124a7(rnying rgyud): dang bsregs pa mi mnga' yang // ye shes dang du yegs nya dang dag dang chon nyid rnams dper bad pa gyung gcig pa yin pas na/ mi gnyis gcig pas na// thabs yab dang rang bzhi me dnga'i shes rabu yum pa 'gags pa'i ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor 'dir/ chos nyid kyi las// mi g.yo ba
124b1(rnying rgyud): dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol/ sumatha' dang bralab// dbyings kun rang bzhin dbang pa mas ci nyis can rnam par dag pa las/ sa 'gags pasasems can don la/ thugs rje'i dbang gis sprul ba'i skur bzhengs pa/ rdo rje dbyangs kyi lha tshogs bzhi pacu gnyis/
124b2(rnying rgyud): nad de yang glo byar du byas pa ni ma yin no// srib med// rang snang gi lha tshogs mang po rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// bde bar gshegs so gdul bya'i yul las sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i ye shes kyis// srid pa chu mtshe dbral bya'i rdzas mtha' yas kun//
124b3(rnying rgyud): bul chags// kun bzang mchod sprin mchog tu rol/ phyi nyar dri cha ba nang bdud ci/ snang zhing // srid pa'i rtsa mthos kyi dbyings su shar ba'i phyir ma 'gags par mchod rdzas te/ ljang srid// de nyid ma bcos pa'i ngang las gsal bstar/ yum gyi thig ler 'drar rta skad shar// chags
124b4(rnying rgyud): yul bde ba'i 'od phung nang ltar thugs rje chags pa'i rtags suraH/ dmar po la 'khyil/ 'gro ba'i// nyon mongs pa rnams rgyal gyi dbyings su bstim phyir bye bdud rtsi'i nang rak+ta gas 'a byung sems a d+haM ba zhes/ zhes so// 'byung ba yum lnga nyid kyi dang las dbyings nas ye shes pa rA
124b5(rnying rgyud): shar ba/ ni gsang ba rnam shes tshogs brgyad ye shes su gsal lo// snang srid kyi mdangs ldan rang rig/ pa'i me tog na rang sems mi rtog pa te na rang rig blta su gsal// gnyis su med pa'i ngang las sa 'gags pa'i phyi mo tog/ kha dog cir yang gsal/ pa'o// me tog/ 'bras bu'i
124b6(rnying rgyud): bcud dang ldan me tog kha dog 'od phung dang 'an bar 'bul/ chos nyid// ma bcos ma'i dang bas sa 'gags par ga ba'i rang byung ngam rdzas spos mchog 'di/ dud pa'i// kha dag chos dbyings dam pa 'a gsal rjes sna'i dbang po tshams par byed pa// stong gsum du
124b7(rnying rgyud): bsrung nang nyar gzur chen gyi drud pas/ gsang ba byang sems bdud ci'i dris/ gang ba'i bdud rtsi 'di// 'drab gnas pa shes// 'bar ba'i stare shangs la mchod pas mnyes gyur cig/ snod yum bcud yab gnyis med yab yum dag pa la/ yid gi tha ba gas pa'i mang pe/ nad ltar

125a2(rnying rgyud): par mum pang zab gzham phyir ba zhes su gsol gsang ngag pa bca pa ma da/ y-i// gnyis med mkha' dbyings dag pa'i bzang du/ nas/ nyen mongs pan ya da sa spon bral dag pa ga yangs nas bang chu nga / byang chub sems
125a3(rnying rgyud): ther yang cir bang rjem 'du byung 'phrus// zhas kya sa ma na shA/ na sngams rdzog mas// namam ban yang byeng pa ya 'gyu @
125a4(rnying rgyud): nga khri ninang bya sa ma// bang cags ca // 'byung ba'i 'bras bu ra kyar 'dod pa'i yan tan sa/ rang da sa// lba ba shas rin chen yide bzhin langs grod 'di bag sa// sun nga po gsung dang sa lang thugs kyi dang dra thob par
125a5(rnying rgyud): bsam/ rangs cas// sgra yi dngos por snang ba yang / rma das nga maH// yod pa ma yin na par shin tu grags// ska yas rtsa than ces 'di rab tu chom gyur kyang // skra nyid rang bzhin gang yang med// na ra bla nga ba ma mas/
125a6(rnying rgyud): 'byung gang tshang ba sa nga nan shesasas rang bzhin mtshang par 'bul/ 6/ zla nang gsung gas sa thugs kyi dngos grub tshul/ ya dang tha ba thas / rang byung de ngas gangangs nas dag par rdzas/ 'a //
125a7(rnying rgyud): byang por las sbyang ba smo// yi mas sa na kyig sa// ras yan la lags rdzas// rigs lnga rdza la pa sa ma 'as na da gas cad sa/ dam tshig la ga dang /
125b1(rnying rgyud): gnag nyi nga / ga grub pa rdzas// rgyung drug ma da sog kyang sa dpal/ gaman ta/ tam/ ji chus ta men dang mi dgas/ sems can kun grol ba'o// drug lngas la gzugs pa dang dathurang ba'i bdud pa' de/ sas byas rnams pa bar ni// 'acom da
125b2(rnying rgyud): yab yum dang / dzal bas byang ba dang 'byung ba lnga dag par mdzad// byang chub sems dpa' lham dral dang // rnams pa phral ba dang blang dag par mdzad// kun bzang yab yid dang yum tshas dag thub drug dang / nyan mangs rgyag/ sgo slong yab yam bya 'i ra sa da sa
125b3(rnying rgyud): 'gro mdas cas brtan pa dang 'khor bcas la/ dzas sa // rnam dag bdud rtse mardzas mnyes mtshad 'bul/ ngan stanas// thugs rjes bzhes te kun tu dgyes mdzod la// dag lags na ma ma mas rnams// tshangs pa nas 'phral dang
125b4(rnying rgyud): grub stsal du gsol// lce yi dam dang bung len pa'ing ma tshig kyi rdo rje ba ma/ tshig rdo rje la// rdo rje long seng can gyi nang du 'dzin pa'i hU~M bskams te/ thabs/ mthe bong dang ni shes rab srin lag byas// thabs yab dkyil dang shes rab yu dpal 'bral ba yas @
125b5(rnying rgyud): rang gsal 'a'as// bdud rtsi rnam lnga sbyar ba la/ kye 'jom cho tshor ba/ myangs na sugasung thugs kyi dang byas rdo rje gsum 'thob 'gyur/ chos das// dri ma med cing rnam par dag ba'i dpe nam mkha'i rang bzhin las/ 'jal da thang ba dgi// lag rtog mtshan ma mang
125b6(rnying rgyud): phung bzhin/ dzin zung gis gtor nga dngas/ ye shes nyi zer 'od kyis rab srin dang jal ba tam gar das sa ga gas dag pa'i lags dar/ bsal phyir/ sleb/ dag pa'i don du gang da pa la rtags nas mtshang par bgyi/ sa ga ngam// rmang du byung ba'i gtong ma dang /
125b7(rnying rgyud): gtong ba// 'dod pa'i yon tan gyi nyapo rnam pa lnga// chos nyid skye ba med dbyings las/ yogs pa gags par char ngas/ rang gang da pa'i gas ba bdang ce tha' bas// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin grub 'bul// ya dang ma chung medapapa// mnyam nyid rtag pa'i dung gis mi g.yo
126a1(rnying rgyud): mang bdus// mnyam nyi mchog nas nyid man can/ bang / zugs pa'i bdag tad 'a sa thug pazlam tham sadasal bar mad/ bags pa// yan tanamatha 'a lus pa du susags pa dang sathapa thams cadas nga /
126a2(rnying rgyud): pa/ ga ga 'a// dri ma med sa nyid las mi g.yo ba ma bar mi byed sa mnyam med dam pa'i 'angos tha mchog chos can/ nyid ste 'angam/ 'ongs 'i// yon tan shin tu gag ga na phra ba'i chal yang tshad bzung nga med de// dpeni dam mkha'
126a3(rnying rgyud): mtha' las bsta dang yang yon tan mtha' yas pa 'gran du ma nyang ba yod ma yin/ mchog thun myong gi/ dngos grub rnam gnyis gzhan dang mnyam pa med pa de yid bzhin no tha dgas 'dod 'byung ba'i dpe bas rnyag pa dang bral ba rnams/ dngo chub de dang pa rgyanan// sems can 'ams/
126a4(rnying rgyud): ya can la mngo ni/ dngos grub mchog rnams seMs nyid ngos thar ga la ba ta nges par stsol/ rus/ rtag tu gang 'dod pa dri ma med pa phyi mi dmigs pa las thugs rje'i shugs las byung / zin nyi ma ga pas sems cad pa byung bag 'o// dzan lam gang ta yang grub
126a5(rnying rgyud): pa gza ga yang 'gag pa med pa'i rnams pa'i chos nyid can/ thangs sung bang mad na gang yang sa gas par dang nga // 'gro ba'i don mang mamang ba legs grub rab tu brtson pa ni mtha' yas pa/ 'dan thab ga/ nyan pas nag// thugs kyi chen po'i bdag cid dang
126a6(rnying rgyud): rtag tu rnam mdza' ltang shur ba med par du rtag tu cugs rnam par snang / 'jig rten na yon tan// tshad med pas tshad gzung ba dang bral ba/ chos nyid shin tu yongs su rdzogs pa'i/ rnam tog gi zug du dang zal nas// bde bar chos srung gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa'i go 'phang dam pa
126a7(rnying rgyud): brti'i khyer kyang / ba gdung bya dzin mdza tu mad bye byertog pa pa ma mang / 'ad 'angs gzugs 'as sa dazugs men// khams gsum rnams la/ phyag tu rna mam chogs/ dngos grub mchog sgrolu zhi nyes mdzad dang bam chos rdza mad du gnas pa dan rtogs par/ mdzad pa yi// thug
126b1(rnying rgyud): rgyan pas sems can tus dan mdzad pa spyod pa mi g.yo 'gag par yongs mi 'gyur// zhing mi 'gag nye yi bzhin gyi nor bu gang nga tha~Md na 'gag ma dadu ma dad// e ma ho zhing ma ning mtshor bang // rba bar rtogs par sa na kya rgyam bya dang ngag sa can nyad ma tan dang na/ shin tu bzang ba'i tsha ba nyid
126b2(rnying rgyud): mchog dang ldan/ pa'o// mchog sbyin pas sgrub pa po la dngos dub rnams kyi nang nas su stegs kyi dngos srung las tud byas pas na go 'phang ma chag chos sra brnyes pa/ 'o// khams 'dod khams gnas rigs te bu gzugs khams bcu bdun/ gcags med rje ma med ga nga dra bab zed 'aso
126b3(rnying rgyud): papo/ gsum kun la rtag tu dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad/ 'gro ba'i// mgon po dus gsum sgrib pa med par me lang dag pa'i byad ltar gas lab rab mkhyen pa'o// dam tshig mchog lha'i dam tshig su ma za dpa rgyan gyi 'khor yar mtshon nas de bzhin bu gsung bags pa par byor/ ga da
126b4(rnying rgyud): lus dam pa bdag la stsol/ cig/ bstod pa// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ spyir bstod pa ste// yang dag ma ye shes kyi sgonas yon tan rgya chen te/ bo la bstod pa/ bstod pa 'dis// lan cig tsam ni brjod pas kyang // sangs rgyas thams cad 'grub gas dngos bubartsol pa
126b5(rnying rgyud): 'gyur/ namang du bstod kyi rdzo shes so// de nas rgyal ba thams cad gnyis su med par sgrub pa 'di gsungs so// le zhes te// bsnyen pa'i don du bzlas pa 'di dag bya// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ gdon dang// rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs
126b6(rnying rgyud): nyid/ bdag don sems dper gsal ba'i thugs le shes kyi gzhal las 'a nga / nyid kyir bya yod tsam cig bas / da steng dudu nas hU~M zhes pas ma shes sems dpa' dkar ba can gang pa la ba thor tshugs can cig bskos/ de'i thugs gang thad grol gyi steng du rjenas tsam tha thas pa la kyang 'a cho cig bskos/ de
126b7(rnying rgyud): rjen ces pas bskor bar bsas// gsang ba'i sngags don bsgom par bya// de bzhin yum la'ang yun kyi mas ma na 'i ga bye lung byed dzin pa rtog/ de'i dra bar mye d+hiH ris bkod par bsgos/ bsgom pa dang // rigs bzhi yab yum bsgom pa dang / de bzhin rigs// ni nga
127a1(rnying rgyud): yum la rang rang gi phyag mtshan mabon sngags kyis bskor bar bsgom// sems dpa' zla ba'i 'od dang bcas// sems dpa' thams cad kyi thugs kar zla dkyil re de'i nye du 'od dkar po tshan gang ba re'i rtsel rang rangadage bsred sngags ca sngags kyis bskor bar bsgom// kun bzang ya ba yu ma sngags don
127a2(rnying rgyud): bsgom// nal rjes mdapa dang man// thub pa rnangs thag shar pad+ma'izhi ngas so sa ma ca ma khye 'thor ba dang gser gyi 'od// sgo ba rnams pa nyi ma'i dpa'a' bor yod mthing ga'i 'od/ mang pa 'a jags kyi bad pa dang / 'a mam the nga ba dang tha pa/
127a3(rnying rgyud): dadang sngags steng du pat+pal AHste/ thugs kar hUM sogs god ltar ro bcas/ bdag dam chog sems dpa' dang lha ye zhes sems dpa' gnyis med le long nang gi gzugs dang zad 'dra ba'o// dkyil 'khor gnyis kyis tshul bzung ba sgom/ ye shes za// oM po d+hi tset+ta ma hA su kha dz+nyA na d+hA tra AH/
127a4(rnying rgyud): nub kyi sems bde ba chen po yanas kyi dbyings/ de rngas hU~M pi thA'i bu b+he la 'a dza gas brjod de/ de las mar me gcig las gnyis su bye ba kar mdun gyi nam mnga' la dkyil 'khor gnyis su kye las 'phro 'dra ba zhing bzlas pa bya tog tshogs spang / skra gsung bugs mi zad can gyi 'khor lo// mchog dang grub chen brgyad la sogs pa/ thu
127a5(rnying rgyud): slong gang 'dod pa/ nub 'byor bas 'dod pa 'dod la// smon lam rab tu gdab par bya// ye gdadaman nas gakhor 'das mnyam nyid chos spu'i ding du dag par gnas pa la// de gar dra/ ma rig pa'i dbang gis yod pal sgo dang med pa la slar btab ste// de bzlog don
127a6(rnying rgyud): phyir rgyal ba'i dam mnos nas// bro ba rag rtswa 'dzinam gang sags pa'i lub dag 'di la gnang 'i phre ba na thas bzlog par tha dadu rgyal ba'inakyi bar du thugs nam dam kyogs nas palas// bzhin rgya mnyis// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gachos kyi thugs dang tsa 'gal pa/ bces pa rnams/
127a7(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas thugs rje'i bdag nyid yin pas// thugs rje che mngar khyed la rba ba dang yan lagag mchog dang 'ga' la rnams/ bzod par gsol// ye shes rgyal po sangs rgyas sru rnam thang gsung snang mdza' thugs/ me bgro pa/ ran 'brug/ yon tan phrin las don gru ba der re la yang
127b1(rnying rgyud): charas / rmad po che// de nyid du ni mnyam sbyar ba// rngas dag nyed sa ga na gsum thag su nas dang ma/ ma par thong // de nyid du ni drugs gyun kyis/ bdag la stsal// zhes sangs rgyas thams cad kyis chad du gsungs so// sags pa thal dam kyang banam dugapa pa
127b2(rnying rgyud): sa gnang bdag gis dam pa'i rigs can lnga la gsungs so// de nas gsungs so zhes spel gang gis gsung maH/ phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa/ 'das pa ma lus shing mthon pa lus pa med pa dkar ba thams cad kyis/ gang gi don du gsungs na// rnal 'gror gyi dbang phyag ngas
127b3(rnying rgyud): rnams mdod la gsungs so// gang gsungs na/ yang dag pa rgyun gyi rnal 'byor bsgom pa 'di gsungs so// de tang bsgom pa stong pa nyid de chos thams cad de kho na nyid stong pa nyid do// de gang zhe na// mi dmigs chos dbyings de bzhin nyid// rang bzhin 'od gsal kun tu sdang //
127b4(rnying rgyud): skang zhing khya pa'i snying rje'i 'od kyi kun tu gdal ba'o// kun la snang ba snying rje lha ma'o// a nyid chu las dkyil 'khor 'gyur // chu'i ting nge 'dzin a dkar por bsgom mo// gzhal yas khang gzhung dang lha tshogs 'byung ba'i chu'o// nam mkha'/ e yi zung paM chu sraM sa laM ri rab ra me hUM// rang pa'o// hUM
127b5(rnying rgyud): las rin chen gzhal yas khang / dbus 'khor lo chubs bzhig cang sror bur bar byams sgo dang bcas pa bskyed do// gdan na rdor sems// seng ge rnam sdang glad rin 'thung rta mtha' das rma bya te'u/ don grub shad dang // dkyil 'khor bas ma yas ldan gyis grub/ sangs rgyas zhe gnyis rang reng
127b6(rnying rgyud): lags gong nas 'byung ba ltar brjod la bskol par bya// lugs kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog ji laT// phyag rgya bzhi yis spyan drangs nas// rang snang bzhi bcu phyag 'tshal zhing // phyag 'tshal ba'i segol dkol la brda dang bcas pas/ dam tshig dkyil 'khor gyil shes mi dpa 'dor pan 'gags pa'i nan
127b7(rnying rgyud): 'tshal zhing ma skyes pa'i sgo nas gnyis su med par bya'o// sems can don phyir nan tan mchog bskyed cing / sman drangs pa rnams/ sangs rgyas kyi phyogs// ye shes thugs rjes chen po bdag la dgongs nas kyang / chom nyid// mi dmigs pa bslab pa'i don du mchog gi dngos grub
128a1(rnying rgyud): rnams/ mas thub pa pa byab// bdag la stsal zhis dang thabs pang ba nga brtan par bzhugs su gsol// sum doga' la ni rnam par bsgyur/ rang shA bar ba zhing // dza d+mo pas gapa na sa da gapa' shong narnapa yang
128a2(rnying rgyud): pags pa // spya na gar thabs klog 'grub// ma'i gnig sa ga shes nas// phyag rgya 'ang gar gyi mchod pa 'bul// mchod pa bzhes dbang dang dngos grub krol// spos kyi rtom par dang me tog 'tsho mar me tha dbang dri/ tshang pa
128a3(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsis mchod la dngos grub blang // rang kyang gdod nas dag pa // rtsa brgyad stong 'a phrar ba'i phrad// rigs lnga be shes lnga yi dngos// tag rdza sel ba'i bdung kyi di// bcob dun rigs lngab ba yul dang // byang chu khyam tha' thab ba dug/ bran babad par s+yan 'thang bcas la// tha med bdud/
128a4(rnying rgyud): pa chod pa 'brub// thugs rjes tshing dgong sa dang dang ngas bub rtsos// a r+g+ha me tog bdug spos dang // mar me dri chab bshos dang sba// ting de dzid kyis dri la gang rngu ba dang pa'i// phyi nang gsang bar sbyar ba rnams// bdag gi zung gi 'a cha kyi ched/ dang mnyam pa'i rtsa chod/
128a5(rnying rgyud): la 'bul// rgyal ba'i rigs pa'i sram sems dpa' rnams kyi dang thugs kyi dpal be'u nas/ ye shes nyal/ dngos grub stsol ba dang dang stsol bar sgrub pa pas med pa don das par mi dmigs kyang // sngon gyi sems cad dngos gru basbyin par thugs dmu ru bzhes pa'i dbang
128a6(rnying rgyud): gis dngos grub krol/ ga/ tshogs 'dod po sa/ dang gtor ma rang rje badz+ra a mri ta/ dang // ha ma spob dang gaN la sogs ci 'byor pa/ sa parjod do// ting 'dzin yid kyis mthong ba mang ba rdzos nas/ dmigs pa'i mchod pa 'di/ 'phong ba las// rgyal ba das
128a7(rnying rgyud): sa rnams byas bzhes sa gsol/ kyi skye ba sa dpa' rang bzhin mas/ dag/ gdugs bu thus gyin da das bye ba'i dung ston pa/ #/ zugs rjes pa 'ang kun la
128b1(rnying rgyud): don byed pa// rgyal ba bya'i bcu rtsa gnyis sarbA sa la phyag 'tshal bstod// de nas gnyis med srub don du// lpags brlab cag gos papa di gang ltar byas pa/ ba ba ta ga dang // spyi dang khyad par ba rdzog pa sogs pa bsnyen 'dzab dbul// de nas zhugs par ga
128b2(rnying rgyud): pa yi// sgrub pa zab mo yang dag bshad// de bzhin nyid dang 'di oM bang dag thub pa gcig pa nyid// dang por chos kyi dbyings nyid las// dmigs pa med pa'i don gyis bsngos// dmigs med chos dbyings de bzhin nyid// oMs hA sa// / zhes pas chos nyid stong par bgangs te/ chu de nyid na mcho
128b3(rnying rgyud): bzhos so/ kun tu ldang // oM sangs rgyas pade chen kud 'dus pa/ cho byed byings kyi be shes kyis// thams rdung kun 'das khyab par bya// rang bzhin dod gas la kun tu snang // tsi d+ha ba be sha swa ra Na phaT/ lang 'di nas bsus rting rje sum bsgom mo// N+ya yi ting 'dzin rab ldan pas/ na sa yor dang mo sgra gsu rdzogs/
128b4(rnying rgyud): da pa rgya bas ma ni gsal ba'i// sems kyi rang bzhin le zhes gsa'// su pi yi ge yang kar gsapa// zhes paskon mo// e baM be buM li sa las bskyed// yi ge 'bru lnga'i 'phro 'du las/ e yaka sham/ la zhes bas nam mkha' cu gsus bso/ yon mam ni/ rlung rdza ma/ bi lA ma seM la zhes pa
128b5(rnying rgyud): 'i rgya mtsho bgos// nam mkha' rlung dang bdud rtsi mtsho/ l-in tra ga sngal zhes pas// rin chen sa gzhi suM su me buM ches rin po ci'i/ ri rab steng / tan rdzob can la zhes pas// ye shes me 'od kun tu gsal// hU~M ra yang gyur pa'i mig 'babs ma shes marjod de gags pas 'ab ngas bya
128b6(rnying rgyud): gcig pa sunar gyi sgo nga // 'gro 'dus rin chen gzhal yas khang / dbum rje'i rtse// seng ge sang tegs pa nyi ma zla ba pad+ma'i gad kyi lteng / gnal bas dang // yid bzhin rin chen gyis cad dang gdan chen po che'i 'ad rgyan gsal// nam mapa'i dkyil la zhes
128b7(rnying rgyud): ses dpa' drung gis brdegs dbab/ nas ye shes shar// 'phros mgru bdon byas 'dus gsal brtsa chog gsung gyis babyed do/ sbar pa las// rdo rje sems dpa' phab she' gsum phyag drug yum zhal gcig phyag gnyis rgo kyar/ bsgopa// ye shes lce yi dbang #
129a1(rnying rgyud): ta// bdu da sa// thug sang thugasas phyi gyis brlab/ du / ting yang na gsum pa kAl dang/ rtan byas shing // rtags mas na / ku /
129a2(rnying rgyud): phyagasum bcings nas/ gachos kyi phra phyag rgya chen pon bcag bsgom/ rjerjes ma dang 'du bcom / lam kun ma nor pa gas ga se kun pasgom yin / pa sa sogasapas cangs// steng nyid la shes me long yang // ngas yang // 'a
129a3(rnying rgyud): bas gnadas pa/ mi 'gag par gzugs kyang sdang ba/ dbang sa nyid nan/ mkha' la thogs 'ja' co 'dabar sdang ba ji bzhin du/ chos kyi gdabyings nas man gyi rje/ phyag rgyar spyan dung sangs gshegs su gsol/ dkyis nyid dpa darnas par dag pangs// the dang /
129a4(rnying rgyud): gis blang byas nasapa// des gos bdags// sa ris rgyas kun 'dus mo bgrod yang yum gtso// rang snang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo// legs par mangs da kyir natan chog byung cing/ nas/ bzhugs su gsol nas ni// mi rtsod pa ga ra dag// rdza ngas
129a5(rnying rgyud): min na las// ri brda 'jigayon// des 'go' no// yab yum gnyis su med pa la// gar dbyangs mchod pa 'di 'bul gyis// ye shes dang las dngos grub rtsol// bdud rtsis mchod rang kyang gapong nas rnam par dag/ brgyad tong nga tha ba'i dzin// reshes 'jogs su 'ja
129a6(rnying rgyud): 'di/ la dngos grub blang // gsang dri song rdzam dan gi rngan ljongs la sngags kyis gtor ma dbul// bdag shegs byas pa yab stsas pa// bdag ca gdang ngas 'brul lags kyis// thugs rjes dgongs ter shes su gsol// bzhes nas kun tu dgyes mdzang la// 'phu gyi dngos grang kyal rgya gsor// zhes bya'o//
129a7(rnying rgyud): bu myo med pa'i nga 'dinapas// gzugs du su ma'i byas bu'i bu banyid das// zugs rjes pa dag khyab pa'i don mdzad pa// mi ra mthal ba'i slam lhag 'tshal ba stor// bstod cing 'dzub bdu da bzlas bshags pa bya// tshogs mchod dang dang chog bskang bshags nyid pas pa dgung tshig dacigs
129b1(rnying rgyud): mamyong / ba'o// ra na nga ma sutha // sngon lam yongs su gdab par bya'o// zhes gsungs so// dpal khrag 'thung gi gal po las/ chos nyid zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor te/ brtag pa dgu pa'o// / de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnga'
129b2(rnying rgyud): bdag gis khro bo 'byung ba'i rU rnga chen po 'di dag gsungs so// rtag pa rang rgyud d+hu tra ni// mos pa rjes su bzhag shes la// skyes bu yul gyi 'dod pas gdungs/ brta 'o// log pa'i dbang gis nyon mongs lnga// dang po log pa'i dab gis nyon mongs pa yar brtadas
129b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i rang chud pa ni/ dngos po thams cad rang gi ngo bo phyogs dang bral ba la/ rig pa'i rkyen dang bral bas don mamathor zhing / dngos med la dngos por bzung bas rig pa la dngos por zhen cing brtags pas rang rgyud par lnga ba 'o// brtags pa'i dbang gis gzung 'dzin du// brtags pa'i rang chud pa'i/ gang ba de dag med pa la/
129b4(rnying rgyud): bzung dang rkang ba sbyin byin pa drug pa'i phyir brtags pa'o// brtags pas ji bzhin dza bdin pa ni banas cad du zab par gdas kya / rgya mtshongs grub pa'am/ ldang ba dang sa shes pa mabyas panya gag nangs byung ba ma med do/ do na la ba spobs/ sa dbang gang ma bzlas pa chags pas 'do'o// nyon mongs 'dod dang /
129b5(rnying rgyud): gzung 'dzin stoni// bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pas na// khams gsum 'khor ba'i grong khyer brgyad// nas gabang dang la ngom por nen pa nyar/ rig pas skyes pa'i ra zhin nga/ da bdag tsas tshan phyir ba dag tu mthong ba'o// rdo dbang gis byung tho gi dang // yang dang /
129b6(rnying rgyud): dang / longs spyod la bdag zhen mngon par brtags so// de dag kyang chu las rlabs bzhin no// ji skad bshad pa yang bdag tu 'dzin ci brtags te/ mngon par zhen pas bdag gis khams gsum du yang 'khor ba'i grong khyer bcud pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i 'gro ba rnams/ khams gsum du rtse zhing grong zer du btud do//
130a1(rnying rgyud): na// lams 'das pa 'a na/ / med pa tha~M na / nas pa / pa/ / dan na ga/
130a2(rnying rgyud): da cig/ stong ba/ nyid nge 'din/ dbang / srid las/ mtha' drug bstan pa las/ gabang dag la po'i// don de gdeng du ma gyur cing / mgo ba/ thog codang kyid ben pa tshang rjod du ni dang zhi tsu nga // log pa'i lung du spyad pa yis// dpral ba bzad po dgas pa dang drubapas
130a3(rnying rgyud): 'khor ta// tha mar las kyi srin po ma chang lces// 'ams gsum 'khrugs pa'i bdud du gyur// dang po gang las thung ba med// tham gang du 'gag med la// ni sasang mal ba dang ba dang las trar bcas pa de dag nga bzhid rig pazhen/ gang ci 'i nga ting par 'od nyid padang /
130a4(rnying rgyud): bang med pa'i sags yin pa de'i phyir/ de la byung ba'i bra' ba dang 'a 'drab pa'i bu dang bras tha bcam dang tsho de nas ral ta dang gang las cang da bad/ bar dag 'ang gdas pa med/ ba ma gang bu nga gag cing 'dzi dpa ma pa'i rtsa dang mang ban do// da'i phyir 'jal pa'i bu dang po dang zas thadas la 'dod ltang dadag nga

136a1(rnying rgyud): gyis// gtso bo dbang bskur/ su bum pa/ gsung gsang ba/ thugs shes rab ye shes/ nam gsum thob// de ring lus dag yid gtum dbyer med pa/ rnam pa bzhi po yang // gtso bos bdag la bka' drin rtsol// ye shes 'di ni srog gis
136a2(rnying rgyud): gam rang kya ga'i me shes 'di di drizhi srabs za ba te/ ra mo ho zla bar dka' bas so/ ches phra zhing // rdo rje nam mkha'i dkyil rnamathab nyon gyi rtogapa dadaga' ba lta bu/ ne ma tog de// rdul dang bral ba dzi du mthar ste zhi ba nyid/ do// rung // khyod nyid kyang ni de la 'gyes
136a3(rnying rgyud): khyod kyi la/ yang de yin no// zhes pas lus ngag yid dang ni// gsum ka'i dri ma drag par rig/ bras dbang lus kyi dri mdag/ gsang dbang gise dgag drim dag/ shes rab la shes kyis sems kyi rje ma dag/ bde ba chen pos gas paka dag go// de phan chad ti dang 'dzin ye shes su 'bar pa'i bu dza/
136a4(rnying rgyud): rig pa rnal 'jog rngu dza ni// rang gsal phyogs dang bral ba shes pa// skyes bu rang gi mtshan dpe la blta/ babazhi no// rang zhal rang gis mthong bar 'dod/ pa'o// rtogs nas rang bzhin ma bcos te// lung chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin sems nyid len
136a5(rnying rgyud): phyogs len med pa lamangs pa rnams kyis sungal brten pa'i man dag gis nying gi mud pa bsal nas/ snang ba dang ngad rtog thams ca khon nyid du rtogs nas/ rig pa ma skyes pa'i rang bzhin la rmos bcos par gzhag par// chu yi rlabs ltar tha dad med// de nyams kyi dpe bstan pa'i phyir/ dper na rtsa mtsho chen po
136a6(rnying rgyud): tshogs kyang yang / ngo bo cung gcig pa skar/ mthong ba dag pa dang ma dag pa'i khyad par gyis/ nyams dang snang tshul ji ltar snang yang / rig pa'i ye shes mtha' dbus med par gcig cing gsal lo// cir snang rang sems skye med nyid// nal 'byor pa yi dgangs pa la skyon dang yon tan dang / mamang pa dang / drong rtags
136a7(rnying rgyud): se nang yang / de'idabos pas nyid du gas mabs nya mas la dgag bcu ba med de gcig tu gas la ba'o// ngo bo mi 'gyur bcos su med/ dbaded bya'i rabs dang kha dog ra'i khyad par dag rang bzhin dang rkyen gyi stobs kyis ngo bo mi' gyur zhing bcos su med pa ltar/ rig ma gyes par tog ma'i dang lam mtshan ma dang /
136b1(rnying rgyud): rjod ga dag pa yang / de nyid du gcig pa sang / nyams la dgan brtsub med de gcig tu gsal 'o// mthun dang mi mthun byung tshor ni// ma ltos par rnal du 'jog par brtan pa ni/ rig pa'i mtshan nyid rgya rkyen lam ltos shing / gnyed po med par gsal bas rig pa sa gyes pa nyid/ rig pa la mthun deng dga' ba dang /
136b2(rnying rgyud): yi dga' ba gnyis ka rig pa ma skyes pa'i ngo bo gsal pa'o// rgyu rkyen gnyis po dang bral bar// de'i phyir dngos po gang la 'dus pa'i rkyen med par de la ni 'jig pa'i gnyen po med de/ ma gyes zhing ngo bo med pa'i phyir ro// gang la ngo bo med par mthong zhing gsal ba la gnyen po brten mi dgos par na
136b3(rnying rgyud): mthong bas ye shes gas la// de ltar chos thams cad rig pa ma skyes par 'dus la/ de nyid ji lta bar nga por gsal bas/ de las ci byung ba thams cad kyang ye shes su gsal ba'o// de las bcos 'dzin thams cad la rnam par grol ba'o// snga phyi khyad med de bzhin nyid// ma bcos lha mgu sa
136b4(rnying rgyud): dang po rtogs pa la dus na gyi med de/ chu la ri mo bris kyang rang zhig pa ltar/ dus la 'dzin pa med par de bzhin nyid rang gsal bas/ ye zhes dus thams cad dpa'o// des na chos thams cad de bzhin par rang gsal bar dus gsum dang rnam par rtog pa gang yang ngos rtse brje dang rang badzin gsapa pa'o// rigs da
136b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i rdza // klong yangs snying por chub shes pa/ thams cad nam mkha'i dang tu gnas shing 'byud 'jug byed/ ba rta bu'o// dang po de'ibyung tha mar thim// rig pa ji ltar gang gsal kyang // nyan la med par rang bzhin gnas// dang pa dngos song ra gnas pa 'dan ni mar bcu
136b6(rnying rgyud): man dag gis rtogs nas/ de'i don la byin ci ma log par rnal du 'azhag pas/ g.yos nas mthar phyin pa'i dus na rig pa'i gzugs brtan na tshogs pa nam mkha'i tshe 'phral dang rtsa mtsho'i gzugs brtan ltar dngos po sna tshogs ji ltar shar zhing gang ltar gsal yang ga yab med par rang bzhin gnas pa'o// rang kyang dang spang de bzhin
136b7(rnying rgyud): nyid// de nyid rig pa mang cos par snang bas/ sdang tshulas bcos par kun gyis grub pa ni bshad pa star yang ye nas yin pa la/ thabs kyis mnar bar rig pa la/ sgo gsum dang spyod lam bzhi dang rig pa dang byang zhing dang sdang ba yang ngo bo de bzhin nyid las ma g.yos pa'o// mthong rtags goms pa'i skyes bu la// ma
137a1(rnying rgyud): sa na sa nas pa thom pas dpapa las ston da du chu na na du rgyad du sus shA / sagasum mdzad brdzogs des med/ thas gangs cangs das mam
137a2(rnying rgyud): mas pa dang den tog mi 'byung ba dang / sgo gsum gyi mdzad pa la phyogs ris med pa ste/ de'i phyir na dang don du yang nyamang ba dang / mi mthun pa'i ri dogs kyi chos med la/ gzhan don du yang mos pa mtha' yas pa la/ gnang bkag med par ched du ma byas par gang ltar yang 'char ba la/ gang ltar yang tshogs rim dzad pa'o//
137a3(rnying rgyud): des na lung thob byin rlabs ldan// gang du btags pa'i zhen pa za dang / mi gnas pas de bden gshegs pa'i srang mngon du yod cing / su gsung thugs de bzhin nyid du/ rdo rje dkyar med par byin gyis 'ardabs pa dang nyid kyang byin gyis sums la gzhan dag pa rnams pa byin gyis brlabs shing grol bar mdzad do// de phyir gdug byed Ta tra yi/
137a4(rnying rgyud): srub pa gyi rabs rnams don bshad// gru gsum rtsangs thod ma dpung 'bar// thod pa'i nang du ling+ga gzhugs/ dang podakyil 'bor byang ni/ l+r-ir shi ba'i sal su gsum sum bcugs byas la/ 'og sa la cangs/ ba dam 'thod pa/ steng lal me dpung bri/ phug sus nang du zad pa mchen dan kyi dang dre pa
137a5(rnying rgyud): gzug/ stang nas 'khor yos pa gang pa bya'o// ngas rnams kyis mtha' ma legs par skor ro// bka' rgyang gi ces so// dbus pa// gru gsum nag po la rin zla gam la dpa'i lha/ dza// mu khud la yab yum gyi thag gling drug 'khor/ gyi sngags/ grwa lung sdig// nyer bzhi sa las sngags kyis/
137a6(rnying rgyud): 'khodang zeng ngo // pad gri thod pas mdzes !/ gang gims bsrub sa lha rere yi lto bar 'khor/ rta lug bya khyi nag po ya ba/ cings// mon dang nal snying lnga yum gyi rdzas gta'/ gtso ba'i// gtor ma dpal bshos dang nag mnga'// bdud rtsi ni
137a7(rnying rgyud): nagasung ba'i nas/ gri mda' ba shos bu nag/ srog bdag rgyal ba 'ad tu dkang po'i jas pa shos bu mda' dang dkar// ma mo rdo rje da chen gyings spo sha 'bru dru gdug/ thugatan nag po srogs tshod// klu sman sna tshogs dkar gter gru// btsan pa marjed dmang po ga
137b1(rnying rgyud): la bri mda' ba shos bu dmar// za dag mda' dang gang can rdo rje logs/ sa jas sa// mgon po gdas pang gsan thod sa mngonanan sa skrag la bcibs/ pa'o// maso/ nag mo dru lu la zhon mthong pa thags pa can// bdud nag mogangs kham ga na khags
137b2(rnying rgyud): ha na ge mo la bcibs/ pa'o// srog bdag dgang rigams 'khor lo g.yon gr-i rta dkar/ zhon 'o// mamakhang don nag mo rje'u rta gapas kha T+wAM gdod thod// zhwa ljang nagag sa spel zhe na sbal sa chu srin zhon// btsan dmar dar rdzamang pogapas byung dang
137b3(rnying rgyud): dmar/ nga la k+sha/ dzo rigs pa dalas// rdor gsod snying mngon ldad ser dgra tha yim/ oM badz+ra hrI la rngubs ra can 'a gaN+Da'apo'i da kyi yongs na gi/ nI li byas oM na yun hr-i da ma/ badz+ra yak+ka kA lA/ dang pa ma na nag pade/ ma hA g+ha Na Tu tre wa da ya/
137b4(rnying rgyud): gi kurarA rAg kA li/ mum+b+ha s+ya ma la lags ste ga zang / d+hun dreng du me Sh+TaH/ ga tsa pa 'i ba pas cad ma dz+rag pa mtheg na reg mod pa dag/ te lin dz+ha/ ga zung rjen dun/
137b5(rnying rgyud): mranan kyi/ sh+'u la ra dza tI shrI dza ya~M/ badza dmang po ga dang / badz+ra tr-i na sA d+h+ya rba b+h+r-i te/ rdong ba rdo dza lags pa'i/ srog la thu ma rim/ gong sa rnams pa nga gas su mi gdags pa/ rtsa la thang dge/ cot+ta bruM na mug/ khrag thibs rbang / ling zhag zad/ TI zur thum dzA khwa zad/
137b6(rnying rgyud): na dArba nya'i sto mtshon rgya dang // gri rgod 'dodon pacan gyi ma nga rjeb ba'i rim pa dang // mdze nad 'du ni ts+tsho mi lto bar gnas// rims nad da la yangs khrag gi mdzem 'debs// 'jib nad kyi tsus par 'an drag pa bdud yin la// skyo 'dzin
137b7(rnying rgyud): bas na rgyal po nga'i tobang nga nga shes pa nyid// de dzin por sa kyi nga na shing 'gas pa na kyid ngabang ga na// kun gyi rtsa ba dru nyid// yab dang yum la yang dag gnas// mun dag dmag 'dren yang sum na kye+e gdas/ grub can 'od/ mnanan tad kya sa// @
138a1(rnying rgyud): g.yag dre'u mon nag bdud/ bdud mgon gyi rtags// skyes pa s+ya shar seng ge ging / rgyal mgon// bud med ma sring ma mo nyid/ ma mgon// sbrul ldong mtsho dang sbrul ni k+Sha/ mgon// ta dmar khra 'u ga gyes pa btson/ mgon// zhang
138a2(rnying rgyud): blon s+yAM skrag srang ku shing 'dod rang legs// snying po gang yin rtags dang byung des las byed pa lab la chad/ brda dang sbyar/ !/ dang dan pa dag po 'alum ta na de cang du gnas pa'i gnas/ sram pa shAg pa'i na sam dang bcad // dur khrod pho brang lcags mkhar nus// rA tra
138a3(rnying rgyud): sa sa/ nga sa cing pa nyid sa na mas pas sa/ du mi pal ba shA dz+ha sa// 'dungs ma nga ga sungs pa'o// du chags gas sa/
138a4(rnying rgyud): mdod che// rgyal yul nam mkha' phyed phyod nas// rgyal yid mgon ngod lha dkar po yi// shel mkhar nang nas pas skyo 'beg bdag/ ma mamo'i mgon po'i yul byang shar mtsho gling nas// ma mgon sing rdo rje bde chen gyis/ las// rims dang dal yams
138a5(rnying rgyud): bdag mor gnas// lung mgon gyi yul nar gsing sngon na// khru gnyan ming srog gcod mgon po nag/ las/ mdze dang shu ba pho 'bras mkhyen// btsan gyi mgon po'i yul zangs thang dmar po nas// btsan+da mgon ming btsan rje lag rings kyis// gang
138a6(rnying rgyud): thabs las gri rgod las rnams yin// shar ging mgon po'i phul lhor rin chen thang dkyil nas// ging ying mgo ni rdo rje legs pa is// nad kyang las gzer thabs pho lkog mkhyen// dpal ldan ma hA kA la ni/ gtso bo 'od lta 'khor ging rje bcad do// de'i nang na yum bzhugs
138a7(rnying rgyud): g.yas seng gson ljang mdzin ga dpung // rta dis gang na kyad cingagang de sa ru btu nas// g.yas kyi dang po bing chen la/ bug rdo gyis dbang bzung bas// bar ma rdo rjetsa mo lnga// bas ma 'du gsolangs// tha ma gnam lpags phrar pa 'dril/ bdu kyi kyi tu dag nas das
138b1(rnying rgyud): sas// g.yon gyi dang ba dung dmar gsol/ dzin po pa gshi rjes tha bas// bad mA dbyug spos myos par byed// rnam drug thA sa TIs gyi ngas sbrul zhags pa 'phen// A~M swA d+ma rdorje'i 'das badz+ra pA Ni arti pa ta ma~M/ badz+ra me sA dang 'dod padas kA
138b2(rnying rgyud): dran mi/ keng ker tro ni rje/ sbyini rba ti pa trangam/ bidz+ra la na'in nyi/ zas sa // pi maN+Da ga nyid nag yo sa/ b+hakI'i tsa mr-id te/ yin na namaHs+t+rai sham/ bas byu / rdo rje zing srog la zeng shag nati srung dkanams cang/
138b3(rnying rgyud): chags/ tsi la thang thung thum ri la rbad/ rtsa tshan bzhig cad pa/ nr-i hi thums dza dun du na shag/ srog rang dbang med par 'thon pa/ sro ga rtsa dr-in rmugs myags khram rbang/ tsa phran brgyad bcang ba/ tsi ti ro lcags leng shag nad/ dngas mas bcad pa/ snyi khrag tshal pa yau ling rbad/ tsal dbugs kyi jig le
138b4(rnying rgyud): dngur/ thu ma ri li li dun g+ho kyo/ song gyi dus su gdadas// g+h+nAM b+ha dza na na/ mnan pa'i dus sugadagag// 'bru bdun nyin dril mtshan gtong yab yum sngags/ rdo dang napas zhe dang// rab tu gsang par byaba'o// de na chad byas pado// nu tra rnam pa bzhi 'dod de// gnas lugs rgya yi ru tra dang // gas pa'i
138b5(rnying rgyud): sgras gas sngags nang pa la gnas pa ltar thabs lam gang dag 'ga'i spyod yul du byung bar gnas so// go la rkyen lam gyi rU tra dang / ngo bo nyid kyi sku ni lam je ltar snang yang ngo bo sangs rgyas kyis ra 'pho 'dod tu 'ji skar srung yang martogs pa'i sgo las yin// gol ba sngon byungad rU tra dang // ni 'ongs bu ste du ma gyis dus na gsang sngag
138b6(rnying rgyud): sa kyar ta/ gas thags yongs tha pa yin pa'o// go la 'gro rjes 'jug rngu tra yin// pra ra s+ya te sbrul bung brtanapa la chos mgol bar rdzogs ris med ba bas pa dgos pa yin pas so// rgyu yaM sutra rnam pa gnyis// grol lam blte ba dang snar ba dang / thabs lam dbang / dang byung ba 'o// de yang
138b7(rnying rgyud): gang dgadabang por a ta btogs nas ngang rgyab dang / 'bring danyang dang dbang gnyis gas brten pa // thangs la grol lam dbang po bring gis zung du 'brel bar byed pa'o// dang po kun kyang rlu trar gyis// pha ma bla ma g.yog dang bcas// rang nyid du trar skyes pa'i lus// dolal mchos pa dang /
139a1(rnying rgyud): spang na rang gi ban slob dpon rgyal ba'i 'khor lo// legs pa thob pa'o// ma nig pag pa ste byams par byed pas so// rang nyid drung dge slong nag po ste/ pha ma gnyis ka bsdang ba'o// sras tung gyes pa dang 'awa ste// dge ba bangs kyang mi byed pa/ jig pam pa 'bas kyang byed pas so// de bas na tu
139a2(rnying rgyud): do// mi dge bcu srung ngan song gsum khyon pa dathas/ cazhan da na po samyong / dgage dun pa ma na kya rtso rje/ pad byed sems na nga/ dpa rgya ba sa sa po mas so// las smin thams cad rgyal bas
139a3(rnying rgyud): 'dzin/ mi ge nga nas/ dge gnams kyi ni sangs rgyas kyi na pa'ags pa mi/ rba nga namang gilas pa das rgyang byes padapa nga/ skyes nu rgya pa gang dag brgya thugs so// dbang 'askur sangs rgya sngasar 'dren no// bang babur byams dang bskyang nas theg pa lartags nas/
139a4(rnying rgyud): bskyed rdzogs bsgom pa ni nAH dkyil 'khong du bcug te sangs rgya bar lung bstan pa lta bu'o// grol las bsdus nas zhar la bstan pa'o// thabs lam gnyis po steng 'og spro// thangs la cha gas pa'i su dang sbyar ba la gnyis te/ steng skol pa dang lhung ba ste/ snying gsor gyi 'phor lo dang kun tu babang po/ 'og sgo bu ma
139a5(rnying rgyud): sa/ ma cas na/ na tan pa ga sa pa smra//
139a6(rnying rgyud): po rgyal 'khor nyid// dbus kyi ma khag cig 'dus pa'i nang na kyang sems chos skur gnas pa ni/ slong dpon rgyal ba'i 'bor ba dang phyir ro// zhar byung dpon g.yog nyon mongs sgo// dag pa chos lung ma rtogs pa'i gar 'byung ba ni/ nyon mongs pacan gyi yid ni dge slong dag po byed pon no// de las nyon pa
139a7(rnying rgyud): kyi yi phung ba ni de'i g.yog go// rtsa bzhi gdams ngag gol ba yis// ye shes kyi rtsa dang / chos nyid kyi/ yon tan gyi/ rang rgyad kyi rtse bzhi ni gdams ngag ste/ rtsa bzhi la yid rnam 'gyu yang kun gzhi'i ngang du smin dengs pa ltar gnas so// lta ba rtogs na dngos po bzhi la gnas bcas kyang nam mkha' la smin
139b1(rnying rgyud): dngas bskur 'gyur ro// rigs drug sa bon lus la 'khyams// a rbi khri pre du drug ni dge slong nyab ma rtogs te dakhor ba ha gro drug tu 'gro ba'i bag chags de drug la bsags nas 'bor bar la btud pas so// rang gnas bde gshegs phung po lnga// rdzang chul das 'dul ba ltar rang la gnas pa'i
139b2(rnying rgyud): chos kyi dbyings su phung po lnga rigs lngar 'dus pas/ 'byung ba lnga yum lngar 'dus/ rnam zhes sems dpar 'dus so// bka' bgros rtog/ tshogs sangs rgyas bcad// bkang bgros pa ni phung po sangs rgyas yin min du bzos/ bka' ba thos pa cad can rtog tshogs ye nas sangs rgyas yang bcad pa'o// dag lnga
139b3(rnying rgyud): ye shes rang du bsad// d+hu Ta bra' ba ni thabs shem sa grol btang bas bza' bas ma thus/ thas shes kyar/ shiganas lhag thong zung du lang ba'i bras byes ma rig par rang sa bsad do// rang gnas dkyil 'khor dbang thob ste// ma rig pasangs pa dang / rang 'am gas pa'i dgang bcwang to ba pa ni ru
139b4(rnying rgyud): bcug ste dbang bsrung ba dang sbyang ngo ro// bde gshegs yi ge 'bru gsum po// mi du mi zad brgyan gyi 'khod mo// tra gsung / hU~M thugs su gnas te lu gdam kyis rigs drug gi yi gas dan pa ni/ rlung bstan pa bsungs nas sangs rgyas so// mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lor mthong // ba ni dardzas sangs rgyas na mtho
139b5(rnying rgyud): de sa ting bul nas bstan lung du las blangs so// steng sgo dang sngar nas kun d+ha babang po bsgom pa'i nan dag go// nir ma tsa kra'i pho brang na/ nye bsngal ba'i 'khod la ma/ phyi'i dbyibs yang gnas pa chos kyi dbyings na na yi ge rnams smranas pa chos kyi dbyangs gnas kyi nangan 'khor 'das dang dam nas gnas so// dang
139b6(rnying rgyud): gzhod ye ge rnams badrad do// snying po a ni rgyal 'khor nyid// slong dpon rgyal ba'i 'khor lo dang 'dra bar/ thams cad nas thams cad du pa bcos pa'i nab 'byor du gnas pa'o// k+Sha ni dge slong nag po ste// nye na gan chen po'i yi ge rdza gnas pani du rnga'i mabon te/ slob mdage slong nan po'o// de yi dze
139b7(rnying rgyud): g.yog por 'gyur// Sha 'drod ni nye da medang mnyam pa'i drung mod de/ des pi ge Sha rig pog byed pas gapog po dang gyur ro// bde ba bzhi ni brtan pa'i lam// chung 'thams gdam sa ga gsungs pa nyir/ bdeb/ mchog pade/ bde bal cing dab/ nyan gyis kyi dang ba'i gsungs pa'as/ mdo
140a1(rnying rgyud): thanan ma/ banas/ dran/ mas da sa pang nyog khyod pa dang tha // martags rigs drug yi ge 'khor// nyan nyangs pa yang // lhan tha sa/ mdzan/ yadags dam/ bya yang mad dpa badzid ga nam ra du ma kyas sa//
140a2(rnying rgyud): tha de dan song gsum du ltung ba dang srin po dang lha dbang du bskus pa dang sbyar ro// bsam gtan I dang gzugs med a/ yum gyi lhag na oM gnas pa ni bsam gtan mi au ste gzugs khams kyi nya'i sa bod no// lte bskul pa'i rtag na a gnas pa ni/ gzugs med lce mched mu bzhi gnas pa'o// rdo rje pad+ma'i sangs rgyas
140a3(rnying rgyud): gsasmras
140a4(rnying rgyud): bzher bachu/ drob me/ g.yo ba rlung gi thig le bebs pa'o// bde ba mchog bde bral ba de dang // rnam rtog che la bde ba chung ba bde ba/ bde ba che la rnam rtog chung ba mchog bde/ de nyid rnamal dang 'jig rten pa la yod pas na 'khor ba'i mtha' yin no// 'khor ba nas 'dren pa dkyil 'khor du 'dug pa'o// bral ba de ni rtog pa med la
140a5(rnying rgyud): ma
140a6(rnying rgyud): sems gnyis 'byangs na rdo rje btu zung 'jug bde bas/ yul ba d+ha chos kyi dbyings/ yul can rdo rje ye shes kyis zhugs pa ni/ dbyings ye shes gnyis su med pa'i don rtogs pas gnas mir gnas kyang sangs rgyas par lung bstan pa ni/ ku tra lung bstan pa lta bu'o// go la rkyen lam gyi rU tra ni// ngo bo nyid kyi sku dang gyur te/ gti mug kun
140a7(rnying rgyud): la thab dang drug can po/ 'dod gas dang du bu ba dub nag go/ zhe ldang grong bas ma dza pa// de gsum su stegs ngag// phyi ba mu stegs lam song ba// rdzadas kyi nya rtog sa na yang su stegs par byung bas cu yin rngu 'o na gsang sngags dbyung ba'i chu'o// mtshan nyid kyi lta ba ma rtogs na yang sra steg kyi
140b1(rnying rgyud): ma gas nam sa nyid ma bcug/ sngags dang mtshan nyid martogs pas// thams cad dru drur grol bar 'gro// sanamam na nyid ngas dang ga su pa phy-i te/ lhan ting sa/ da pa mnas kya na// lha chen la sogs rung ba dang // 'do chags sa chen/ da /
140b2(rnying rgyud): chu gadzangs pa/ zhe sdang drag po zhe l+r-ing ni lpags kyi ba la snang ba ste/ bgegs dang 'on 'dren tsha du skang ba pas/ bdag cod zin med du b+ha te/ gtwor ba cagasum byin na krung ma'o// dum ni ni kyi ral// lha sbyin la sog pa dang zhing ldang // 'bring po dang // gsang lags nang bal// rU tra thar banag po la sogs mang snang bas nas ngas rgyas pa'i
140b3(rnying rgyud): gapa kun la gol rkyen lam gyi khru re snang ngo // gnas so/ rab tu bshad// gol ba sngon gyung rU tra la// longs su dang gyur ro// 'dod lugs rang byung dag par 'dod/ yul bar 'dod/ gnyis dang bshad thabs gnyis// nyams su blang lugs rnam pa gnyis// mthar phyin dbyer med lan cig cha rab
140b4(rnying rgyud): ma gyis ba/ de thams cad sems shes ma shes dang / rtogs ma rtogs yin te sems gcig tu gnas/ gcig tu gnas// dam pa'i rigs can lnga la sogs pa khyer la phyag dor gyis gsal bar bshad/ 8/ rang rgyud phyi yi dU tra 'di// bden pa yin nam hU tra la phyir lugs gnyis su bzhed de/ gsar
140b5(rnying rgyud): sngags pra ji brten par myong bas rgyung zas mi bsru ba la dgongs te rang rgyu dang ma/ phyi'i rdu ba dang / bdag tu 'dzin pa la dgongs te phul ba'am nang gi chu rje'o// gal te de ltar min te gang rung gcig bden na/ srul par bden na/ sems can dmyal brjod don sdigs ri yid/ yang dag par mi bden par 'gyur ro// rang chud par
140b6(rnying rgyud): 'dren na/ mdo sde las/ de'i tshen ta sbyin ni gzhan yin snyam bu ma rtogs shig/ ces bas sangs rgyas kyi che ba 'byung ba'i phyir sprul ba'o// 'di nyid nas kyang 'gro ba'i tshul du sngon 'byung ba zhes pa dang / dgongs dadus las/ de nyid bdag rtogs yin pas na// zhes pa dang / nya srin sde brgyad pa'i 'khor/ rgyal chen rigs
140b7(rnying rgyud): bzhi dran/ gsang du mchog gi bdag nipas/ zhes pas natha dang gapa'o// da kyi gnyis gakar ro// gzung di lta ba med pa ni/ klo pa dang lhar nas yul bar blang / chung ba rang byung bar sna ste/ don 'or ba yang mi bden paltar ro// bden pa min// srul pa nang gi n+ya tra 'di// bden

141b6(rnying rgyud): zhes cas kyi na pa rdzog/ pad+ma'i yul ba la bangs// di ga yo pa das// srin po'i bral po dbang byas da nga sa// nye ba'i na A pheMg da po gtum mo spong/ bded dang bya // lce yi de dpon
142a1(rnying rgyud): de bzhin bya ra so pa ni/ rtam then par sol btang bab de la// mthong lam du lags mazad pas shes rab skyes pa'o// sras khrums su bzhag pa bzhi pa banom lam sras bltams 'dam 'thung ba/ ba rnam lamatog pa zung ba// sbal pa dngos po nam rtog
142a2(rnying rgyud): yeshes su langs pa/ bdud rtsir rol/ rnam shes bcad// bu mo brgyad dgral brgyad mgo brtan brgyad/ la sogs log par bsgyur// tshogs mamo brgyad yul phra men brgyad phyin ci log/ bzhi sgom/ gsang pa'i yum bzhin dag/ chags bdag/ 'dzin dang nga rgyal dang bdag tu rmongs pa

142a4(rnying rgyud): de ltar bstan pa'i dU tra des// btsan thabs dag tu sangs rgyas sam// 'on te rim 'jug sangs rgyas yin/ ji ltar yin pa nges shes byos// longs rtog ched phul nga lta bu'o// blo chung ba rnams rim gyis sangs rgyas pa yang yod/ dkyil 'khor du bcug dbang bskur sgrib pa phyangs lung bstan pas so// rgyud 'di

142b1(rnying rgyud): ga sa na// rA tra'i sri yi gdams par gsungs/ lus dag 'i da gsum bad tu 'dzin pa 'angoms pa Tu 'a phyi'i nan dang bshad dag/ de nas lus ngag yid gsum la// bdag tu blta ba'i rlu dza gzhom// de nas dur khrod bdag po dag/ gan mdzan// phrag mtshe dang ldan par
142b2(rnying rgyud): ni/ rnal 'byor dpal du bskyed pas/ stabs men napa/ ting nge 'dzin gyis mnan pa/ sdod pas mnanapa// ci rigs su ni las rnams bya// de bang sa shin ma tog bdag 'dzin las gyu ba/ thar ba kyang 'das kyi gags/ las kyi rlu rnam pa gsum yang / rang gi sras ngag yid gsum pa gnas te/ bgags zam ched kyi bdag po'o/
142b3(rnying rgyud): lta bas gzung 'dzin rtog pa 'joms/ blta bas mnan pa ni gzung 'dzin gyi rnam rton ste/ gnyis med kyi ye shes chen po gro dran cing yid la gnas par bya'o// matrika d+hA tri ni/ de yang phyi'i yul dang lus dngos por 'dzin pa byang chub kyi sems su rtogs te/ chos thams cad byang chub kyi sems su rtogs pas snod dang lug la rang bzhin med par
142b4(rnying rgyud): gnasaso// des lus la bdag tu 'dzin pa ma hA rU tra mnan pa'o// yul du snang ba chos kyi dbyings// sems su snang ba ye shes nyid// ngag gi bdag 'dzin ba rde ga zung ni/ nang gi sems la bdag tu 'dzin pa yang / sems nyid rang byung gi ye shes snang ba chen por rtogs par byas nas/ mnyam pa chen po'i dad la dang
142b5(rnying rgyud): bdag med pa'i chos nyid la gnas par byas la mnan pa'o// snang dang ma skyes phyogs ris med// sems la bdag tu 'dzin pa akarmA d+ha dza ni/ sdang ba dang ma skyes pa thams cad gnyis su med pa'i byang chub sems/ phyogs ris med par rtogs par bya ba ni/ chos kyi dbyings ye shes su hA da/ mi snang na ni sems dngos po dang mtshan
142b6(rnying rgyud): mar ma skyes/ gnyis su med pa ni lus sems rang bzhin med par chos nyid stong pa'i 'ang las mi g.yo bar gnas pa 'o// des na yul du snang ba dang sems ma skyes pa yang / yul phyogs su dang / sems ris su bcad pa med pas mnan no// stegs bu'i steng na chos 'byung na// stegs pa'i steng du e gu gsum bris pa'i nang
142b7(rnying rgyud): du mdzang shi gzugs bral chen gyis byas la che ba bskyed pa dang // thal bas gdong gsum sna yon po// kha T+wAM bya rog spyad ku g.yas/ g.yonan// sdigs mdzub khra dang 'ug pa can// bdag nyid phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan// bdag gtso bo'i sku phyag rgya chen po// g.yon du yum dam tshig gi phyag ca

143a2(rnying rgyud): bu zod kyi bdag po traM ka gdong gsum pa/ thal ba'i mdog sngo rgya rtswa g.yas su yo ba/ phyag g.yas gsum na rim pa bzhin/ kha b+h+rUM/ bya rog/ s+yang ki/ g.yon gsum sdigs mdzub khwa thug pa thogs pa/ lus ri rab tsam du che ba gcig bkug te/ bdag gi mdun na e 'u gsum/ mtha' dbus med pa'i nang du chud par bas
143a3(rnying rgyud): pa/ gzugs pa pa 'o// de ni 'jig rngunga'o// 'jig tu du sa thu ba mo'o// makan du ni de'i sems de dang bdag tu 'dzin na no// sras dag 'di gsum ra bdag tu blta ba de gnos na gyi nang gas raba'i dun 'drus par gyur ba yin no// phyag tus dngag pa// lpags ka'i phyag rgyas bkug la bstim//

145a2(rnying rgyud): las kyi mkhan pos mnga' dbul gdab// de nas lang mkhan gyis slob dpon pa dpal kyi chas brgyad mad 'a dbul po// ma nas 'khor brtags sa dang 'o// glang po'i rgyan gyi// bdud 'dul stobs chen theg pa mchog gi rgyan/ 'joms byed// stobs bcus pha rol bdud dpung 'joms/

145a4(rnying rgyud): dbang phyug spu la thab de kyang chen gyi go blon no// phul ba yis// mi 'khor byang chub sems kyi rgyan du bzhes// zhing chen g.yang gzhi rlon pa'i stod g.yogs 'di/ dpe nyan thos la chos gos yod pa ltar khro bo'i chos gos ni// tshul khrims gos chen g.yang gzhir brjod
145a5(rnying rgyud): pa ste// yan lag rnam lnga snod lnga yum gyi dbang // mgo bo sangs rgyas stan/ lagag pas dbyings phyag ma/ g.yon swa ma k+ti/ rkang gapas gos dkar mo// g.yon sgrol ma'o// mi 'khor byang chub sems kyi rgyan du bstan// tshul khrims zhing gi g.yang gzhi'o// dpa' brtul ba byed stag gi sang
145a6(rnying rgyud): g.yogs 'di// bsgrengs pa mi mnga' mtha' gnyis rtag chad 'dom pa pa/ brjod las 'das// gdul ba'i don// yal bar mi gtong par ye shes dang thugs rjes dbyings su srung / po'o// gdong mtha' med par sgrol zhing lhag dpa' ba dang / tu 'bod pa dang / zab ste/
145a7(rnying rgyud): thugs rje dpang / ye shes rtal dbyings su za ba'o// za bar byed// rnal 'byor dbang phyug su la/ dpa' tul stag gi gams zas so/ sham thabs bsdams// dpa' brjod mnyen lkug sbrul gyi chun po 'di// rgyal rigs che zhing brjid pas dbul brgyan/ bram ze drag sngags no bas mgur chu
145b1(rnying rgyud): rig nga babang ba lags yang cagag pa/ dmangs rigs tu matabs nang sha sa/ gdapa bzhig nag pas lus gyi tshangs srung byas so// dpa' brjid che bas bdud dpung zil gyis non// gnyen 'u ga yan lag 'khyil pas sbrul gyi tshul// dug lnga dbang bskur 'jigs tshul
145b2(rnying rgyud): 'ojo tsam par byed pas rba'i rgyan du bstan// rnal 'byor dbang phyug su la brgyan par bya// thod pa skam sgron ra ri'i phreng ba 'di// bod nas dbul brgyan pas chos su ste gti mug can gnas su 'dzin/ gsang sngags nang pa'i dzig pa gsupa ba dpar mtshon/ re ros nyan po yongs su ste'i sang
145b3(rnying rgyud): gdas 'dzin/ gsang gas kyi 'i mig gsas yin pa rtso/ rlon pa na thum yo mas da / da gsum dpa cho// / khro bo su gsum thob pa'i dbang rtags yin// theg pa gsum gyi chags pa'i dbang rtags te// dug gsum sems cad da
145b4(rnying rgyud): ba'i dbang / ra pa// nal sal na gyis 'byor bar byug yo rna sa som pag me pa/ chen po'i sba lo rgyan// chags pa'i du bya semasaca ngas thags rje cags pa gas/ raTa'i thig le 'di/ ti sems das sa pa// sbal rol pas don du
145b5(rnying rgyud): tas/ sprul yi bzhag/ ma chags patu can gyis man ste// de byer thugs rje chags pa'i kun du bstam dzu da 'thag cag pa 'o sa kyi rgya kyi gas ma dod do// ral 'byor dbang phyug lnga'i brgyan par bya
145b6(rnying rgyud): byang sa / shing 'dis pa la sa da sag pa sus/ 'dul byeng sbyin mi sa nyin gyis brted pas ni// 'jigs par byed pa'i sprin las can dubastan// ga da chog tho 'tha ra
145b7(rnying rgyud): man na la// yig labang mtshogs cenas panan te// 'khong po tsho brel gcod pa'is yang yang // rnal 'byung dbang phyug can po'i thub byan// brjo dngas brgyad kyi can 'ad // bdud du bla rabs yon tan gzi brje 'bang/
146a1(rnying rgyud): thas dad ma pa ba na gags pa pas sangs/ dang du na yang ba dathar dzadas sa// rgyan du bkrabs sul rgyan duH/ lala'asas sa par mnal mang spang ras 'byor b.radu kyad du bya dngag lang sa / dbang yang sa pad ma dang /
146a2(rnying rgyud): drug mdze sru la rgyan du bzhes// kr-i trI ni la ka a b+hi Deny+dza ma hA ya/ thang ched kyi thig 'ani// bla mas mched la rtag gsum gdab// tshogs bcu pa lpags// he ru ka yi gnas bcu dang // thogs satshams brgyad sa// dur khrongs brgyad mnan pa dang // de dag tu 'ayo de// rdzu 'gyur
146a3(rnying rgyud): thabs kyis sbub pa dang // rang sems nyid te ru kang shes par byas nas// dpal chen thabs kyis bsu bar bya// tha' chen chos su babod pas// he ru ka dang gcig pa'i phyir/ dpral ngas// thal ba'i thig les zong khrag sung kyi mtshan pa 'di/ tags// 'di yang ldan gyi tha tshig la/ dam tshig sa/
146a4(rnying rgyud): dka'i dang mtshan// 'di yang rtags kyi phyag rgya ste// 'di yang ra shed har shes pa'i bdag nyid chen po'i gya'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ badz+ra garba sta~M pa sai ho// rak+ta'i thig le dang thal chen po tshigaganyis ga badrug gnyis mthun pas// de bzhin tshul mchog gdab pa yang //
146a5(rnying rgyud): mkha' 'gro kun dang gcig pa'i phyir// gyi nang gapa' 'bru ma dang mched sum gcigang ba pa'i dgas ni// rak+ta'i thig les 'azung rtsos la gdang po// mtshan pa 'di// oM sarba ta thA ga ta rak+ta si ho// gang chen co su dang byed ma jal/ kun dang ngamachog gcig pa'i phyir/ na// nas
146a6(rnying rgyud): gi zo res kha 'bram dug dang dzi don dam cang kyi kyad no// mtshon pa 'di// oM na ma sarba ta thA ga ta staM ba si ho// mched lca ma kun la rtags gsur cis mtshan pa yis/ mkha' 'brog// lha dang rnal 'byor gnyis su med/ dper na// dmag gi khrom du ba dang nam// ru da ra/
146a7(rnying rgyud): rang gi rigs shes pa'o// lug gi gru mtshan bdag / bas sreg rgya nas ngo zhes pa/ lta bu ra tags gdang ngas/ gsal/ // slob dpon la dpal kye chas bcad dang ldan// slob ma rnams la khor gyi rtags/ rnam gsum gyi rtags kyis mtshan/ te gdang go// 'jig rten khengs pa'i
146b1(rnying rgyud): rag// bskal ba'i me dpung 'khregs pa bzhin/ klag/ 'bar ba'i tshogs ni rnam par bsam// banas las chub bdal ba 'ashad nas ban pa na// grub pas bstan pa'i lung bzhin du// t-i ga tshogs // su mdog so so'i phyag mtshan dang // thung byes// phyag
146b2(rnying rgyud): rgya dang bu'i rgyan dang cha lugs dag/ bskyed pa'i phu rdzogs par thubar ni chos su gachags su dbyer med do// bskyed rdzogs grub pa'i lha dge bsgom// niH/ rdo rje dbyings kyi rngo mo dpal gyi skur gyur pa// sa twa thA ga ti'i rdzogs brjod pas ni pa'i dkyil khor 'od 'u dang spyilas rlong 'i dacing 'a
146b3(rnying rgyud): de bzhin par stug gis bskyed de/ na rdzangs mchod pa'i rim pabya'o// de ni rnal 'byor bad+mor dbye sngon zur te/ lung mdu yo ga di kyi'i 'khor ba byed dalugs mnor pang rin pa'i cho gnas pa stir gyi cing yang yin no// zhi ba'i ba ni// dngas pa'i mtsho lu khro ba'i ste/ rlabs chen 'khrugs pa'am// zh-i // mkha'
146b4(rnying rgyud): la kho bo / dbyar gyi sprin dge mched pa ltar/ bu'i rgyan// rdul dang thod phreng nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor dang // kun kyang mi bzad la rtogadan/ rdo rje'i brag steng gnon// bskal pa'i me ri srid pa'i rtse mor 'bar// mi bskyod spyan gzigs thugs kyi hUM reng las// 'das
146b5(rnying rgyud): ngom ldan 'das mi bskyod par gas da 'i zhes thugs de'i ldan gyis srid pa gzu pa 'ang cig garigs pas gtag cu ba dang dug rdzaji ltar 'bar ba de zhings ji 'dul ba dam khyen nas/ thugs gnas hUM ring po bzhi dbugs dang drangs te/ rdzi bo gas la gams 'phrul don gnyis byas nas sngar 'dus pa las/ a she si d+he'i sngags kyis 'od
146b6(rnying rgyud): zhub las sngags rjod dpa la te ru ga'i skur bsgom/ de'i thugs karnang log hU~Mgacig 'dros pa las/ zhiba'i sngags kyi gzhal las pa kod du sunas/ hU~M big po bu klo'i nga rjo mni pa'i gzhal pas khang dung khrod chen po'i gzhal las khang du gyur par bas ma/ thugs ka nas trig to Tacas brjod pas dri las
146b7(rnying rgyud): tha zus rgya kyi/ byas sa da' bcad nga cung ngu ma/ sheb mas sa na cing drungs sa/ sdugs rnapa rab ba sa nga 'angs thatha'ag pas nal 'ad dam/ dra pa yang tham thadas shes rab pan senas rabs
147a1(rnying rgyud): yus pa nis/ shes rab byings 'dus pa chos cing byings rbabs na/ dbang po rnams rang bzhin gyid kyis 'khor du 'dus/ thub pa rnams 'gro ba'i don la gshegs/ yang nam san go brim pas 'tho don 'a cing yang snang / sgo ba bzhi yab su ma byor ba mdzad pa'o// zhi ba'i las ni kho bor rim

147b3(rnying rgyud): brgyan// phyi nang med par kun tu snang // hUM me dpung steng du gnas pa las s+pha ra Na phaT gyis hUM grangs med pa spos/ don mdod 'dus nas dur khrod chen po'i gzhal yas khang dbang ngag tshul du phrug nag/ kham sgo gcig brtan tshor gsum las phub pa bu chad dang sgo bzhi rdo lung dang ldan pa du khrod kyi rgyan snga tshogs kyis che ba'i yon tan du

147b5(rnying rgyud): ushi ma'i steng du dbang phyug chen po yab lus bsnol zhing khyu mchog gis badzis pa'o// de'i nye du ti rma badz+ra'i gdan no// phyogs kyi kos re bzhil// zhing chen bsgo la dang mtshams kyi ko bzhis zhing rgyad pa'i gdan// rdo rje sems dpa' thugs ka'i hU~M/ gsal bar byas te// he ru ka yi sdang bu ni/
