147b7(rnying rgyud): gnyiso gnas bu'i rlung gi thu dkar po/ gnyis gnas pa'i drung thang du chu ba'i hU~M ser po te/ dbugs dang lpags nas pra'i ci gas pa pa las hUM dang po 'od ba ngang cas te tshogs btud dgos te drag gsum gtan nas kyang / srid pa'i grong 'phrog/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'ams thams cad 'o du thur nang thams cad rdzo gas go//
148a1(rnying rgyud): da tib ngasazhe pas cing dang ba'in ba bams cad di byi po // 'asram ngas thams cad blang bye ba'i 'dra ste/ da ngo kyi batham pas nyes 'thamangs sa khye pa nga thom pa// sdeb nas kyad bdag 'des pa dang dag nya 'a dra bab b.las sogasas pas dang dab ba dun du
148a2(rnying rgyud): gdan steng du ba ba ste 'od du zhubs khro bo 'byung ba'i gle dag ni brjod do// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// de 'a drag po chen po byung ba'i lo rgyas pa bzhi ste/ dus nam byung ba dang / de byung bar khungs gang gis bstan pa dang / tshul ji ltar bstan pa dang / don kyo bo gang bstan pa'o// del dang po ni/ de la 'das pa zhes pa ni/ da ltar gyi dus la ltos
148a3(rnying rgyud): na'adas pang ma 'gags par gyur pa'i dus te/ de la yang gsum ste/ dus 'das pa/ sems can 'das pa/ bstan pa 'das pa'o// dang po ni/ de ring je ring gyur pa las/ de yang snga ma sngam 'das shing gyi ma phyi ma 'byung bas phod btags nas/ bar du rdzas mang pos bcad pa'i/ tha ma'i mtshams nas bzung ba phan chad de/ de yang mi

148a6(rnying rgyud): ba rnams rten 'brel yan lag brta gnyis kyis bskyed cing / shing rta'i 'asang 'o bzhin du bar mtshams dang / gdod mthab med par 'khor bas dang po dang tram 'di zhes 'khor ba spyi'i dbang du tshad nges par gzung bar mi nus kyang / khyang par kyi dbang byabyas na nyin du'o zhing gdug par gyur pa'i sems can 'byung bar gyur pa'i dris de nas mtshams nye bar bzang na/

148b1(rnying rgyud): sbyin pa'i 'dzig rten gyi blon me dag/ dga' rdzan gyi gan nas gshegs pa dang / 'das mi 'di nyin du rtse ba ba shes pa dang / gnon nung bar mdzang byed pa bzhes pa dang / khab nas bdon par byung nas sangs rgyas pa'i tshung brtan pa dang / chos kyi nanor po bskor ba dang / myang na las 'das dang rang bsres bgag pa dang / brtan pa gan 'a
148b2(rnying rgyud): sems can 'dus pa dang / brtan brtsung ba dang / de bzhin du sangs rgyas rim par byung ba yang grangs 'di tsam zhes tshad dang du med badrams par dra bca pa ni brtan pa 'da' // de ga tha'i dres na sems can dang bstan pagrang sa med pa dag 'dag pa'i dres kyi sngon du byung ba'i gtam chung brjod pa pa ni/ 'das pa'i dras na sngon blangs sa //
148b3(rnying rgyud): de tan dus dang sems can dang rtan pagrangs me dpa 'das pa'i sngon rol tu byung bayin na/ skad cig ma la sogs pa'i ngas ma ngos par bcad pa de'i ga mar nyar gas pa ba brjod par 'dod pa de ga shen/ bdag nyid kyis brjod pa'o// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yis// tshul pam thasas gang gis mi gcing shes par ma
148b4(rnying rgyud): de mdon drug te/ 'dor 'das thams cad kyi bdag nyid chen por bzugs ngas/ rang bzhin gzhan du mi 'thar bar rtag pa dang / gnyis par byings pa zhes gnyis su med pa'i bdag nyid chen por bkrugs pas phyagasan kyir ba rtag pa dang / gsum pa zabs zhes kyang 'brel gyi bdag nyid chen por dkrugs pas bdag rten dang 'ag rtenas
148b5(rnying rgyud): 'das pa'i yon tan phun su ma tshogs pas mang 'a mdzad pas rtag pa dang / bzhi pa mtshan ma dang mtshan ma med pa gnyis su med pa'i bdag nyid chen por bzhugs pas sunam pa bzhi dang ldan pa'i ngo bor bzhugs pas rtag pa dang / lnga pa cu gsung brags rdo rje ltar 'dus mabyas zhing dbyer med pa'i bdag nyid chen por bzhugs kyang / sgo gsus nas spong ba su ma ta Ta

149a4(rnying rgyud): 'byung na/ dang khrag byung gi gsung dang gyis bras ba de'i dzid/ sems can thams cad kun zer yang 'gro ba ni de'i bstan pas bdul ba'i 'thob rnams so// 'gro ba de'i bra la ni don la 'jug pa' mdon gyi thog tu khebs pa te/ 'gro ba de dag gis lta ba ji lta bu'i mtha' ba zhen pa dang / spong 'dis bu 'bang zhing rjod pa

149b2(rnying rgyud): dag zhin ro bdeg bu'i sems can dang tshul ran ba de dag ni// zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te// rdo rje sems dpa 'a dang nam sngang la sogs pa'i chu phyag rgya chen po zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor du brtan pa'i blon sa don mdzad kyang gdul ma tho po rnams mtha' phran 'dul zhing byor bar mang dkyang 'grub par mi bku bas so// shes rab thabs kyin

149b5(rnying rgyud): can nu nug po chos pa de cang ba/ de yang 'dig rten pa'i rdo rngo'i chus can rdzo pas kyang te/ drang srong chen ngo ser bya'i tho mthar bangs thos pa cang // 'jig rten gsum dag sreg byed na/ khams gsu' jam/ srid pa gsum kyi sems cad rnams kyi sras dag 'i ba gram theg par byed nas sras panang kyis 'debs/ dag pa

149b7(rnying rgyud): tham cu nyon mongs pa byor ding bras kyi bu ba 'a dems pa byed pa/ smos ci dgos/ nye 'des so// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// dang rdo rjes sas dang do ba de thar das sogs kyi spas bya ma na gra nga bladas pa da so// dam tshig la sdang nam srung phyir// tha ba dang na lagag dang /

150a4(rnying rgyud): 'de thong bas yum gyi phul 'khril/ gangs// rdo rje gadzod kyis ra k+ta dgug cing 'dren// dang tsogs cu cu gcu kyisang cas thams pad cagatu pa'i bdag po te/ bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i bdag/ kho rgyal po nga ba cas pa
150a5(rnying rgyud): yid ni chung ji sri su 'aze bag/ dang / brtan par yang dag gzung // rtswa yi dbugs ring 'gro ba las// rlung rnganams par rdzo dang rigs rnanas mang byud nga // rgyal ba'i sbyor ba'i phyag rgyags la// bdaga' de zhes sas dpang zur ba dang tagang rigs byung dbang // thugs
150a6(rnying rgyud): nga las sA yi drug dang nga bye dang / rlung 'khro bas// rgyal ba'i 'khor yang gsal ba dang // yab yum mkha' gsang bsnol ma ru// byin kyis brlabs nas brjed pa dang // byin brlab na gyi b+ha gar yab kyi ling+ga gzhag/ byang sems pas so// ha brkyad las
150b1(rnying rgyud): ni shar dkar mo dang / nyor// rkun mo dang ni ru tu rmongs mo dang / thangs// thal byedu ma dang sha surma spos mo dang / ho la// mtshogs zung cang sle sha kya shar+Na gtum mo mu 'dan cag cag ca gsal/ ma// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i khro gsang ge
150b2(rnying rgyud): 'khor 'di phyung ngo // ma hA su kha hU~M/ de bdi nyid/ tse d+ha s+pha ra Na phaT/ lan padang / badz+ra tsid+b+ha b+h+rU~M/ mye'i ting din/ oM badz+ra satwa hU~M/ 'azhes sems dang nas ma khar bzlob/ b+h+rUM skA ra Na phaT/ saM he ra Na dz+dza/ sr-in ma tshams pa kyi las thob khyab/ oM yaM ra d+hi ka ri/ 'byu nga sod/
150b3(rnying rgyud): ka sha maN+Da la/ nas pakhang / yaM karma rak+Sha haM/ rlung na/ ra ra ka dz+wa la sa mu dra// Thag ma / ba~M sIn+ni dz+wa la maN+Da la/ gcenas gni/ kau ni ri ti dz+wa la maN+Da la/ nus pa'i ri ba/ raM dz+wa la man+ta le/ bzhal pa'i mi dung / b+h+rUM bi shwa bi shud+d+he badz+ra d+ha k+Sha dz+nyA na maN+Da la hUM/ gnasangs dang / ma hA de
150b4(rnying rgyud): ga na yang/ u ma de pI/ gang na sum/ ti ra bi/ chags kyo drug gi gdan/ ma wA r+ya ma hA la/ nyi ma'i gdan/ a tsan+d+ra ma N+Da la/ tra ba'i gdan/ paM pad+ma maN+Da la/ sab me tog ni bdag/ ting paM/ r-i'i gdan/ hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/ ga nga // snro na miHsa rba tathA ga tA mAM de man nga a haM
150b5(rnying rgyud): rAM/ yang dag bu pa'i dbang / sarba tA dz+nyA nAM/ thams ca rdzing por dbang bgyur/ sarba shud+d+hA nAM/ thams cad dag par dbang bsrung / tAM s+t+waM b+hA ba nAM/ yon tan 'thung ba nas kyi dadang / sa ma ya ba tI nAM/ dmatshig gi dang gi 'gro don pa sems dpa'i da ngang / oM ma hA shri he ru ki/ gtso bong byed pa/ ma hA kro d+hi shwa rI sa ma lA/ yul
150b6(rnying rgyud): bskyed pa/ de bI ta na sho d+ha ya ta na hU~M phaT/ hUM bi shwa bi shud+d+he padra d+ha ra tsan+ta AM/ sr-i kyi 'kha' dbyings byin gyis parlab ba/ hU~M ti Sh+Tha badz+ra/ yab kyi gas dan byin gyi brla ba/ rat+na sUr+ya au/ yab bram thong ba'i 'das bskul ba/ sa ma ya daM/ dam cho 'od/ sa ma ya ho/ dam tshig sa rjes pa/ ra ho haM/ dam
150b7(rnying rgyud): padag pa/ rA ga pA ma/ byeg papas shes/ dzaHd+hU ba toH/ yun na shi yong/ hU~M d+h+r-i d+h+waM/ mang do ba dag kya pa 'o// sngag ga she pa/ badz+ra gau rI ha/ gang dgang ba/ badz+ra tsau rI hA/ yor drad po/ badz+ra pra yo he ha/ zung tshong po/ badz+ra be tA lI ha/ kyang dbang byed / badz+ra
151a1(rnying rgyud): snga/ badzags naH/ 'adz+ra\u0f89\u0fa4 shar+b+hAH/ nas/ 4691/ rmad+hU ba ta/ naka ma badz+ra/ da na nga / a gtams gad+hAl/ babad
151a2(rnying rgyud): pra be sha ya/ b+han+d+ha ya b+han+d+ha ya/ to sha ya to sha ya/ bkasan/ badz+ra DA kin+di hr-i da ya/ hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ btus thos/ traH/ oM badz+ra shrI he ru ka ma hA badz+ra sarba duSh+TAM/ rdo rje dang la khrag zung chen po'i rdo rjes madrangs pa thams ca/ sa ma ya mu dra/ dang tshag phyag Na/ pra b+ha Na kra hU~M phaH/ rnamapa
151a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i ngor los/ oM badz+ra e h+ye hi b+ha ga bAn/ tshung sngon tshur sngon bcom ldan 'das/ dzaHhU~M baM hoH/ ru lu ru lu dpa' chen pa'i su/ dr-i sh+ya ho/ gzigs shig/ sa ma ya ti/ dmachog dgyes/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ dmatshig gi dus labab/ dzaHhU~M baM hoH/ lcags kyu zhags pa grags spod rje la Ta/ shI he ru /
151a4(rnying rgyud): e h+ye hi dr-i byA ho/ sa ma ya ho/ dmachogs dgangs/ sa ma ya sI/ dmachi gnas la pas/ oM e drag pa badz+ra dzadza A ra li ho/ 'das pa'i mnga' yod pa la chen pamanyes par mdza/ b+hU shwA thAM/ thang ma gsum padab te bod/ rdzaHhU~M saM hoH/ badz+dza shI he d+ha ka/ du lu ru lu/ srag nas drang /
151a5(rnying rgyud): be sha ya phaT/ 'byed pa byed/ A be sha ya a/ bzugs par bti ma/ ma hA kro d+hi shwa rI he ru ka ha ha/ yu chen ma ma myong bar byug khrag rdung ma/ ru lu ru lu tsheganas drang pra be sha phaT/ yigs pa bta pomo/ A be sha ya a/ yeshes pa banyin mo/ A~M badz+ra shrI ha ru ka/ ma hA badz+ra sarba dat+ti/ ma
151a6(rnying rgyud): drangs par ma ldang ba/ sa ma ya mu dra/ h+yagaH/ sgo dbye 'amathob ceg/ pra be sha ya phaT/ shI he ru ka hU~M phaT/ dzaHb+h+rU~M baM hoH/ shrI he ru ka ma hA badz+ra/ sarba duSh+TAM/ sa ma ya lu dra/ pra b+har+ya kra hU~M phaT/ rnam par 'jigs pa'i 'khor lo/ oM badz+ra shrI he ru ka/ ma hA badz+ra sa ma ya
151a7(rnying rgyud): sarba duSh+TA na sa ma ya mu dra/ pra b+hat+yakra rdo rje dpang / khrag 'byung chen po rdo rje dmachig la dgyes pas sdang ba thams cad/ dam chog phyagaH/ rnam par 'jigs pa'i 'khor los/ hU~M phaT/ kA ya bAka tsit+ta/ su gtung thugs/ tiSh+Tha badz+ra/ brtan 'i rdo rje/ A~M badz+ra shrI he ru ka/ ma hA badz+ra sarba duSh+Ta na/

151b3(rnying rgyud): phaT/ oM shrI badz+ra kAr mu ka shA rA yA ya na maH/ dpa' byen mom da ngag su gengs pas me rtid pa'i bum des kyag kya/ oM shrI badz+ra rAg sa ma yA ya na maH/ dpa' kyi nya mthugs rje chags pas mi gto pa'i yum ces cab/ aM shrI badz+ra kha T+wAM ga pra tsa la yA ya na maHdang 'arje ba dang 'dus pas med
151b4(rnying rgyud): pA'i rkyes zhes bya pa/ oM shrI badz+ra g+haSh+mi pra tsa la yA ya na maH/ gtsang rang ca ma grogs pam mi gtang pa'i bum zhes kya 'des phyag 'tshal la/ sarba ta thA ge ta/ bar+hanAM ka ro yA mi/ mag tsa' po ma hA yo bA m+bin pa kyar ma/ a ti pu ti// shin tu kyims ma/ pra k+tsir+Nu no/ mchong bas shes/ a la la ha/
151b5(rnying rgyud): dr-i zo kha ri ra 'adz+ra 'o kha ra~M spyi duro kha ni 'ab ba so// badz+ra brI he ru ka/ badz+ra kro d+hI shwA tI/ tham dbang byug ma/ a g+haM pra tI ts+ya ho/ a mchod yon/ kha ri khA he/ gsolags pa cig/ ya~M sarba ta thA ga ta ar+g+haM pra tI ts+tsha ho// mdzad pas dbyings// oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya sid+d+hi aM/ dzu dngo nga
151b6(rnying rgyud): oM sa rba ta thA ga ta bA ka sit+ti AH/ gsung gi ngos drug/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta si d+hi hU~M/ thugs kyi dngos du ba/ dzaHhU~M baM hoHshrI he ru ka/ i dan/ pur+the/ me tog// d+hU pe/ thos/ dI pa/ mang se/ gar+b+he/ dza~M chab/ ba li na/ gto ra ma/ pra d+hIts+tsha no/ mchod par rol/ shrI pany+tsa/ bdud rtsi/

154a1(rnying rgyud): gan yo na ma ma ldan nam pa dang mdang dod pas/ gan 'ad da dang sa dang nam mtsham pa/ nga bye mo te/ byed bdang thar na ba do pa sa ra// dang dgang srud pa ca ma tshal thog la tsam// dbu dang
154a2(rnying rgyud): kyi dngas ma me lod nyi ma'i drod// thig le chen po gser ldan 'dra ba dang // gcig pa rang shin medangs cad dkar gyi spad pa nga ba tsam tsam lam na mthog pa ma 'id dus ma gnas pa pa de chen po char bar byed pa yid te/ de nod du 'ab bas de la dathags kyi dang pas gseng pa 'og na gnas pa ngas tsam dag gnas ni/
154a3(rnying rgyud): ba chen po g.yo bar byed pa ste/ de 'od du 'bar/ de 'arjod kyi dngas ma masong nyi ma la bzhag pa'i da tsam gnas te bde chen po'i dbyings su bapyod pa'i rang bzhin no// de'i dkyi na drig 'a kyang sems theg pa chen po'i ye shes sum kun tu bzang por snang ste/ de yang thig le gsi thun ma 'ad ni shes rab ste/ yum thams cad kyi po yin no// de
154a4(rnying rgyud): na'athung ba Sha'i dang ma sum tha'i rang bzhin gyis gdong sa nas phung po babyed par byed par gnas so// de la// rin chen ze'u bcug pa 'dra ba'i/ ni// thabs kyi rgyal po kun tu bzang / bo sogs pa yab rnams kyang dran// de yang // rin chen ke ke ru gdang btags/ ma 'drab ni mo sor nya bu'i ye shes/

154a6(rnying rgyud): kun du// de ga la 'od na thig le la yod de/ dngas mchen po nyid kyang rang bzhin med par song ste nam mkha'i gzugs su gyes rtsom nas khams gsum thams cad so so ma yin pa/ ye shes su chun gyis grub pa nam mkha'i gzugs su byung ba la/ de ltar nam mkha'i gzugs su gyes pa nyid thig le byang sems yin te chos kyi chu'o// snying ga chos kyi ngo

154b3(rnying rgyud): byung ba yin te/ srung ba de dmas dani rkyed kyim da dus gyur ba med do// dkyis gtor bsar pa de mas cad ca mar ciga'i chos kyi bying sa 'i dngas kun kya 'dang po// del/ ye shes lnga ni lhan gyis grub// nye gdasang la le shes sa pa parta zhing bgos so// chos 'khor dngas ma'i rjod pa nas/
154b4(rnying rgyud): kun tu bzang mo thung du 'gro/ ma ma da nyen 'ang dam sbyin ma dri pathar nga bzhesas/ ban// bzang ma da kyi bani kyis jig le gyen du'angar/ ti shi dam ma 'drim pa pame pa nga shes bya/ rga bad pa mamen no mdong pa nga byar nas// dang sam gser
154b5(rnying rgyud): dri med// dang dngas bache po ga'i da sa po daso ba'i spa ba ma gnas pa nga dul na dzin modo can tu byang dang thag kyin da de de ga de na dus tu sade seng du 'i zhus brgya me de/ bde na por gnas pa'as/ bde ban po ma med shesasa'o// bde ba mched bapral theg pa ma nya pa//
154b6(rnying rgyud): song gnyid 'i 'drim bab me 'ong spang bya ba bamang rjin pa mang byor so// mgrin pa longs spyod bcucug dkyis// mnyam gror rkyong kun pa'i 'ad do// na nga sa 'bri pa ma mthong ba sa nyam par byos/ gang tha na da ngong tu
154b7(rnying rgyud): dbang chag ga kyil na panga'i ges ra ba thugs pa'i thig ma// na nan na tshwa kyis 'bral bas 'od du nga de de chen po gnas par/ bde can do nang nas co'o// dgyes stobs bde ba'i phrin las 'phro// shes bya byung zad gzigs mor rol// de 'de dong ldan gyis thub ti de ras kyi
155a1(rnying rgyud): g.yo bab dgyes brtson pa stob pa ngaH zhes bya/ shes ca yul rnams 'thungs rtogs pa yin te pa dang thig 'od can yin te 'od dang thig le de la rnam par rtogs pa za pa'i ye shes zhes bya/ zin 'di nyid rang bzhin med de bde chen po nyid snang ste/ bde brgya pa namam da' ram mo zhes bya/ rim ma la gzigs sa
155a2(rnying rgyud): zhes des bde chen po'i gnas dang thiga'i dazhugs pa la phog go// spyi bo bde ba chen po na// sum cu rtsa gnyis nam mkhar song // chos su phyogs dus sku gsung thugs// gnyis 'dres kun dngos bdag gyur pa// slar gyur zhal mthong dbang bsgyur grub// mgrin pa nas nam
155a3(rnying rgyud): mnga' song ba su sum du rtsa gnyis kyi dbyel na thab 'a theg le kyang sems gnas so// jig med de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos po yang yin/ de ni tsho kyi grwa ste gtsong ni phyogs btu ngus pa'i dkyis 'khor dardzogs sangs rgyas yang thig pa de nyid yin/ thu gsung thun pa nakan min las kyang sdig pa de nyid yin/ 'di dang maben pa'i thig ma 'od das bdeb
155a4(rnying rgyud): ma na pa srog pa thong an gyi thugs su byu das bder bya pa nga zhin tu thar nag nga ma dpam thams cad sos ma yin pa zu ge/ le gas nam mang 'a gzugs sa kyid nye cos gyur byung dab/ kun gyi dus por bdag byung nga shes tsa// ye shes ting 'dzin tshogs gnyis rgya na// des po bcos thung thur nas
155a5(rnying rgyud): mas kyi dang bra ti tu mtho Te la sngo ba ga 'as sa drar byin mang thong dab nga po po bla dang ngada'ab 'a dadang 'gyur/ de nyar thung ba de yang gzhan ma yin/ bdag nyid mnas kyi phyil 'dod du gdas pa del rtag ting 'don dalta bar kyil grodor du byung ba'o// de chogs gnyis su rdzogs pa satham sa ldan gyis bu bang rje/
155a6(rnying rgyud): thAHsa da kyi dbor gyi dang bdi nad tu ngas de'i 'ongs kyod du ma tshu ba ngam can dum gyur pa med ngas rgyan du che shes 'o// ro rgyang kun 'dar 'khor 'das rtsa// srog shing rnam pa gsum po la// sems ca gyi don pang mdzad pa ni gal sa 'o ma gsung ba'i rtsa g.yon kyang ma 'dzin pa'i sa ste/ de gnyis 'khod pa'o// dbyas ngan 'ad ma bzung /
155a7(rnying rgyud): don grangs nyi ma na las 'das pa'i chang rjeg le tsu pas so// gnyis rdzogs sangs rgyas thugs rje yis// thig le las su ngung na chos sur gyur pa de ni/ chos rnam pa gnyis rdzogs pa las kyang ba ste ye shes tshogs las chos sur byang bsod nams tshogasangs dbugs sur dbyang nas deg zing rnal 'byor pa des ni// sgyu ma'i

155b2(rnying rgyud): san// thig le 'di la bsgom par bya// dang 'jig byed sems gnas pa la gnas nga shes pa kyas nas pa sgoms na rang rig pa'i don mngon du gyur nas sadag cas te/ sems can kyi don byed par 'gyur ro// des ni sgrub pa po de 'dus gas sangs sras thams cad dang / de'i wag/ byang chub sems dpas #/
155b3(rnying rgyud): ci/ byin gyis rlob/ pa' 'gros pa// dpa' bo dpa' mo mkha' 'gro ma yum kun/ gyi lus la// bde ba chen po zhi babyed par byed mchob thun mong gi/ dngos grub ster/ yar 'gyur ro// de nas phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi khro bo ma lus pa thams cad rnams/ dpal badz+ra he ru ka'i tshogs su gyur pas
155b4(rnying rgyud): na bye na po tan mas ga pas ba dang rung bdang / 'khor ba yod / rlung la krogs pa dang po dang / gnas pa dang / ngang khrod pa da yang dang bang / yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor du ma gyur pa med pa 'di gsungs so// dbus kyi khrag 'thung chen po ni// g.yas dkar rnam pa 'a' na rna
155b5(rnying rgyud): nyid rtson/ g.yon dam la mabyon ma med pa tshon mthing ga'i zhalta/ sngon pa med pa// dang po rdo rje rtse dgu g.yas/ 'ams gsums dpa'i brib pa malus pa joms pas// bar martse lnga gas rdzas rgyad pa ton mongs pa 'dems pas/ tham zhi / dpag gi ma mo dbang du nyud// dang po dril bu zos na rdzos

157b1(rnying rgyud): gdon lcags kyu dang / g.yas// gzhu dang gnon Sha T+wAM ga yang bsdams/ g.yas// mda' ni gsor zhing garan rdo ba 'dzan/ g.yas/ 'khor lo bsnams dang g.yon skyabs byin mi 'jigs phyag/ sems can thams cad// 'chi ba slong bar byed par 'i las ma dngas bshad/
157b2(rnying rgyud): de dag bka' yi las mkhan ni// dbang phyug nyi shu rtsa brgyad yin/ shar gyi dug ni/ srin po'i chung ma'i ming// srin mo skrag nag g.yas rdo rje g.yon thod rlon 'chang / 1/ tshangs pa'i chung ma'i ming / sku mdog dmar ser g.yas rdo rje gdon pad+ma bsnams// lha chen si
157b3(rnying rgyud): dkar ldang rdo rje tri shU la// gtogs 'dod kyi chung ma sngon mo rdo rje 'khor lo 'chang // gzhon nu dmar ser g.yas rdo rje mdung thung 'phen// brgya byin dkar mo g.yas rdo rje g.yon in dra nI la'i rdo rje gdengs/ lho \u0f7f// rdo rje ser mo rdo rje tsan+da gyi chung 'thung / 1/ bdud

157b5(rnying rgyud): rdo rje ka tar mdan na 'chang // stobs chen dkar mo rdo rje gshol 'dzin ma// rdo rje ser mo rdo rje spu gris gcod// 'dod pa dmar mo rdo rje mda' gzhu 'gengs// nor srungs dmar mo rdo rje bum pa 'dzin/ rlung lha sngon mo rdo rje ba dan 'gyur/ giH/ gsong byed nag

158b5(rnying rgyud): dad ge slongs du so nyagatade nas/ bdag gi mthon du gshegs 'tshal lo zhes stan gas na pab cing bu ba gsol dgos so// de tsam gyis kyang gyon pa ma yin pas de'i rjes la gyan 'dren gyi po nyas yang dang yang du 'phrul la gshegs su gsol zhing byan 'dren dgos so// der bzhugs su gsolang ma len gyis rang gi mdun du gshegs pa
158b6(rnying rgyud): gsol dgon/ der gshegs nas bdag la gzug pa yang / bdag gi khyim du gshegs nas kyang bzhugs su gsol ba yang phal pa stang 'greng nas bzhugs pa ma yin pa dgan pa dang zug su gsol dgos so// de ltar bzhugs kyang yun thang bas bya ba mi 'grub pa thugs rings kyang bya ba ma zung bar du sku gsung thugs gzhan du mi g.yo bar bzhug
158b7(rnying rgyud): su gsol po'o// bzhugs nas kyang thugs yal bar me 'dor bar gdul bya'i 'dod pa'i thugs gtad nas le lo yal yol byad gyod ma mdzad par thugs la dgongs nas bzhugs pa te/ spyan drangs pa'i dmachog la dgongs pa dang / go skabs kyi rim pa mkhyen pas gzhan ji ltar 'dul ba la dgongs pa nye bar 'dog par mdzad
159a1(rnying rgyud): bran phyir bas kyi phyag rgya bstan no// dam tshig zil gnon phyug byed dang // de kar bathubs grags pathaM yang / dang byen mang kyang go skangs mim khyen pa ma yin te/ gar byi na nga sanapas nigazha ba thos nam nga go skangs kyi rim pa mkhyen pas ni/ gzhan ji lta bu 'dul ba'i gongs
159a2(rnying rgyud): bar 'jog par mdzad pa'i phyir las kyi phyag rgya bstan no// de nas phrin las kyi go skabs bstan pa de yang phab pa'i bsam pa ltar chad med mi mdzad pa'am/ mdzad na yang yun thung ngur mdzad pa ma yin/ ji ltar 'dod pa'i don rje bzhin du zhus pa'i don de mi mdzad du mi rung zhes nan tan bskyed pa'o// de lta nan tan bskyed nas/ gang lan
159a3(rnying rgyud): lam du mi mdzes pa dang / gdul dka' ba'i 'gro ba thabs kyis 'dul ba'i dgongs pa 'dzag cing phrin las brtsam par mdzad pa dang / ji ltar mdzad pa'i dgongs pa nye bar mdzad pa'i rjes la/ gdod gus pa bskyed nas phyag 'tshal ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba'i rjes la// mchod dang zhal zas la sogs pa gyi nang gsang ba'i yo byad ma
159a4(rnying rgyud): lus pas sra gsung zhugs la mtsha ba 'bral ba dang / de yang zas kyi rim pa mang du 'bul bar byed pa ni mnyes par bya ba'i phyir ro/ stob dang mchod pa de nyid kyang / thugs tshims par bya ba'i phyir yang nas yang du drangs te// de nyid zhal du thob par bya ba dang / de yang bri zhung dad gus pas zas chung ma zos par gnas su stob par bya'o//
159a5(rnying rgyud): za ba dang // ji ltad rgyal po la mchod nas mchod pa zhal du stob pa de bzhin du 'khor rnams kyang gcig la gcig zar gzhug dgos pas na chos thams cad la mnga' mdzad pa'i chos kyi rgyal po chen po la mchod nas/ 'khor rnams la yang ster bar byed pas na za ba'o// tshul rig de ltar rgyal po'i chos dargyad kyis kyang po la sngon
159a6(rnying rgyud): thung khyod dgos pa'i po rgyas sam/ dngos su mthong ba'i tshul yang rig pa/ goms pa'i blo dag gis// ra gi thams nyams su drang ba'i san gagadon la lag tu byung bya'i chog 'o pa la goms par bya ba'i thaM dag gis// ci rigs su ni bstan par bya// don 'ang drung bar byas nas mchod ba rgyas pa dang l+r-ing dang /
159a7(rnying rgyud): brkus pa rnams 'grong gang pa gang 'dung du rigs par / snyan par byed // dam tshig mchog ge mchod pa dang // dbang gyis tsun rdzo gyings tshigag sod bapa yin/ bcod gi da pa 'du ci yod do// phrul tshig dbyangs kyis de dag mnyes/ dgas dang phrab tshogang god pa dang / gu bang sa stan pas lha da ga
159b1(rnying rgyud): par byad di phyir gus bstod par bya'o// rdo rje'i se gol gtogs pa yis// yangab yum thabs shes gnyis med ro ba mdzad pa'i gsang ba'i rdo rje se gob kyi sgra dang lag pa gnyis kar bskur la dpung 'gog pas g.yan gnyis dbus dang gsum du se gong la na ga sum brdab par skam phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas yang phun pras bcang kho bo jo mo'i
159b2(rnying rgyud): tshogs thams cad chos su mtshan med kyi dang la gnas pa las gzug su mtshan ma'i rnam par gas pa par zhes su gsol zhing gsas par bya ba ste/ dpe nas mkha' la spen 'dus bltar dus gsun sangs rgyas rnams chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo brang du 'dus nas bzhengs par bsam mo// sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya// thal mo legs par
159b3(rnying rgyud): sbyar ba yis// thal mo lan gsum brdab par bya// gang nas rgyan drangs na// ye shes can gyi spyod yul nas// lhag pa byang chub sems kyi 'od zer las lha mo lcags kyu can gyi tshogs mang po dang / lag pa se gong gtogs pa'i srin lag dang / mthe bo go bar nas rdzong dang groso sogs palags thogs pas
159b4(rnying rgyud): labazung nas/ chos su rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i spyod yul nas sman drang ba'o// gong ltar spyan drangs na// dpal chen khrag 'thung 'khor dang bcas// thun mong gi dpal sems can gyi don mdzad/ khyad par gyi dang lan pa dbyod pa la dngos bu ba ltar/ zab mo'i dpal lha mo brgyad pa longs spyod pas chen no//
159b5(rnying rgyud): dug gsum na khrag rus bzhal du gsol bas khrag 'thung / 'bor lha mo brgyad dang bcas pa'o// gang gi phyir spyan drangs na// sems can don slad dam tshig dgongs// khams gsum srid gsum na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad sdug bsngal las grol bar bya ba'i don du 'khor ba las bsngal bar bya ba sngon gyi dam tshig de
159b6(rnying rgyud): gang du sman drangs na// gnas 'dir ma lus gshegs su gsol// phyir snod kyi lo ka gzhal yas khang khyad par du ting nge 'dzin ci gnas 'dir/ 'khor bcas ma lus pa rnams rang bzhin grang pa'i gnas 'og chen gyi gnas nas gshegs su gsol lo// de yang thun mong gi gnas 'jig rten gyi khams// Tha dpa' can gyi gnas 'og
159b7(rnying rgyud): ni/ phrin las kyi gnas dur khrod/ gsang ba'i gnas sum gyi mamang ngo // dang pa dang ni dam tshig gis// bdag dade ba dang ldan pas spyan 'dren na/ lha thugs dam la gnas pa ni gshegs su gsol zhes pa ni/ rngon gyi thugs dam dang phral gyi rkyen gyis spyan drang ba'o// tshur gshags tshur gshegs he ru
160a1(rnying rgyud): ka/ rab ni thang ba gas nas sags can cipa 'das pa'asatha dang 'di tshu zhegs/ bad mcho pa nom pa gdapa 'di par gshegs/ te the ba pa/ dra tha 'das pa/ kapa' thag lu na// chos su zhi ba'i ngang las kyang / cos drabs srung bani/ thob theb
160a2(rnying rgyud): gyur ba ma rtsas pa dang bral bas na zhib/ de yang theg pa kun chos su thob par 'dra yang theg pa 'di'i lugs kyis nyon spongs pa ye shes su zhi ba'i ngang nas// gzugs sku 'jigs tshul bstan du gsol// gzugs skur bzhengs par bskul ba ni gzugs su la gnyis te/ longs sku dang sbrul spu'o// de la gnyis te zhi ba dang khro bo'o// de
160a3(rnying rgyud): la 'jigs byed chen po khro bo'i tshul du su bstan du gsol ba'o// thugs rje chen po thabs mkhas pa// de yang gzugs sku 'jigs byed chen po'i tshul du bstan kyang de'i so la gnas par mi mdzad de/ mi dmigs pa'i thugs rje chen po'i yon tan gyis 'gro ba ji ltar 'dul ba'i thabs la mkhas pa'i phrin las kyis// gdug pa 'dul phyir
160a4(rnying rgyud): gshegs su gsol// nyon mongs pa gdug padug dang dgra bo lta bu ste/ rang gzhan gyi lus sems la gang gcing ma tshungs par byed pa ste/ de gdul zhing zhi bar bya ba dang / ru tra 'dul phyir gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol// tshogs rje tshogs bdag dpal dang ldan/ tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi ched du dgongs nas spyan drang
160a5(rnying rgyud): naM/ mi'i srin po la sogs pa'i tshogs kyi rje/ go rI la sogs pa'i tshogs kyi bdag/ 'jig rten dang 'das pa'i lha mo rnams la nye bar spyod pas na dngal dang ldan no// tshogs kyi slob dpon gshegs su gsol/ 'jig rten pa'i nya mo dbang po'i tshogs dang / 'das pa'i lha so go dI'i tshogs kyi kha dpon du sbar ba ste/
160a6(rnying rgyud): 'khor ba dang ngan song du rang cu da mi bdag pa'i dpon mdzad pas na'o// ye shes rtogs pa'i khyad par las// 'jig rten pa'i rgyal pos 'gro ba rang dbang med par dmag tu bsdus pa lta bu ma yin te/ dbyings ye shes rtogs pa'i skabs nas 'bras bu sra bzhi ye shes rnga thob pa'i khyad par las// sprul pa mang po'i tshogs dang ga shes
160a7(rnying rgyud): gsol// de'i kyang ba las yishis kyi sprul ba dang / sprul ba'i tshe 'phrul mang po ni zhar la rang bzhin gyis 'byung bar 'gyur te/ ye ges kyi sprul ba sram dang rol pa las/ sras mang po cig yang srul zhing gshegs su gsol// bde gshegs pho brang dkyil 'khor 'dir// gzhal las khang du spyan drang ba ni/ rig pa'i ye zhes/

160b2(rnying rgyud): phrag ma sa
160b3(rnying rgyud): ma byu bar tshul la sa da ma da sa 'a sa
160b4(rnying rgyud): da ma na pa sa// gdag pa 'dus ma dza dartags tshe thos pa yin/ smra kyi nas mang sa mnan gag ngasan sagag pa dang / dngas ga ga /

160b6(rnying rgyud): su su na pa
161a1(rnying rgyud): g.yon pa pa dbas cadang tha ma yod sa car byed pang ba ba dmams da nga sa ga na cig pa des pa nas // dpal zin khrag 'thung 'khor dang brngas/ yang ga da bdadang/ rag dan das thanas ca mang ba thag cag /
161a2(rnying rgyud): dang bzhis chen pong dran pa'i dpas chen/ sems can gyi drag gsum gyi nyon mongs pa doms shing zad par bzhes pan zag 'byung / 'khor mkha' 'gro dang bcas pa// dam tshig tshul bzhin ma gshegs sam/ rngon ji ltar dam cas pa'i tshul pazhin du gnas 'dir ma gzhags papa/ gangs tsa cu dal zhugs pa dmadzan
161a3(rnying rgyud): bye pa gshegasas pa/ sems nakyi srung nga rgyan gyis dra yang dbang bsrang du sa gshegs sa pa// dngos grub mchog dag ma stsal na// gang dag da pa das thu kun pa dang tsag ga das kya dag thub pa po sas mad rnon ma thag sa da ngab rtan du gsung cagang kyi gnas rlos cub gnyis byin pa na sa sa // dra
161a4(rnying rgyud): gsung zugs dang 'gal bar ra// ga sa yapa'i grags m-i ga dang gas pa pas/ da 'as kya/ bdag smra ma chog ldan gas sa pa rdza ma pardzam dranam/ nas // sku gsung thugs dang bdag tshur bas// sa kya
161a5(rnying rgyud): sas na gad ma ga mi dgang pa dal par myo sa// po brang dkyil 'khor rang las sprul// rtsod papar byar ba bams ca cad beshes pa dang gnas ga cad mad da nyid gnasasas dang yod pas dang ga dngas thul so// nga ni bdud kyi bdag po ste// dag nyes
161a6(rnying rgyud): dbagan mas pa rbas rgobs dang ldan pas dasems can gyi badrang dru / de bdung bdag nyid du gyur ba'o// badred kyi bdag por kur bas na kyang stonas kyim bris kyis banan no// mkha' 'gro'i tshogs bcas ngas bsdus so// bad byas te dbang po dmas zung mar byas shir tho kyi mabang 'ag dang sa pas te
161a7(rnying rgyud): gang sa dang du bkrus dang // bdag med phyogs bral don dam thugs chud cing // chos pa bdag me dang rtogs pas gzung ba'i yul sa skyes pas ni ba dag na tshugs dang thal la/ gang zag bdag med pa dogs pas 'dzin pa'i sems med pas ni gzhan gyi phyogs dang brams/ des chos thams pad gong nyid du man ma nga
161b1(rnying rgyud): shes caca do// byams dang snying rje dgra zin mi mnga' yang // chu'i dus na byams ster rjes gni zung ba'i chad med noms pas dang thun med par byams pas phyor/ snying rjes grol te/ byamasangs bdag gi sum babyor/ gzhan dugs rjes kyang nas rjod/ ta nga rtogs pas dad ga krol thags rnaMs gnan sngo langs dang /
161b2(rnying rgyud): ba med do// gdug pa 'dul phyir dus las mi 'da' ba'i// ni bas mi 'dral ba'i gdug pa can rnams yongs su gdus bar bya ni phyi nga'adigs byed chen po'i cha grags su brtan// khro bos 'dul ba'i dus mkhyen pas blo bor sprul pa las mi 'dara' ba'o// 'jigs byed he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// mdangs dpas
161b3(rnying rgyud): chad 'digs ning kyi bung bar byed pas 'jigs byed/ he ni dgyes pa'am rol pa/ ru ru b+hi gnyis ni thag/ ka ka pA la ni thod pa ste/ dgyes pachen pos thod par bcas pa'i khrag la rol pa'o// mi gnas mi dmigs chos skur dag pa las// dbya'i rigs lnga la phyag 'tshal ba ni/ mtha' la mi gnas/ kun rdzob tu mi dmigs/
161b4(rnying rgyud): rjes med par dag pa'i dang nas gdul byal shar ba ni// bdud rkyarnga 'dul ba'i phyir 'jigs byed khro bo mchog tu thur pa ye shes kyi khro bor gi skur sprul pa// gzhan las byed par du gyur pa bstan te// thugs rje gzi ldan gdug pa bdud bsdig rba tra la sogs pags sngags thabs kyis 'dul// bar mdza da pas
161b5(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan khro rgyal la yang phyag 'tshal lo// dpral bkod pa rigs lnga khrag 'thung rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'as/ yang na gong ma dang don du phyag bya ba/ 'di gzhan don du phyag 'tshal ba'o// khro mo dbang phyug sku la nyer gnas shing // yum la phyag 'tshal ba ni/ yum khro mo dbang phyug pa ni yang dag pa na chos kyi da'ing
161b6(rnying rgyud): bye ba med pa yin la/ kun rdzob tu ni khro mo'i srung bstan nas sbal 'khril ba ste// thabs snying rje chen po las phab dang shes rab stong pa nyid yum de gnyis ni stong nyid snying rje'i bdag nyid du 'brel pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// mkha' 'gro mi bzad 'bar ba'i sprin 'phro ma// non chos nyid skye ba med pa nin ma
161b7(rnying rgyud): 'dral// rig pa rten med 'gro ni nyi bla radra ste/ yon tan khyad par du gyur pas na mi bzad pa ste/ dbyings stong nyid las nying rjes bzhengs pas gnas dang bdag po'i bar nas 'khor gyi tshogs spo ba ni/ dper na me 'bar ba las dud pa 'phro ba'am nam mkha' stong pa'i dang nas sprin tshogs mang pos byung zhing phyogs bcur 'gro ba ltar ro// gdung /
162a1(rnying rgyud): pa 'dul mdzad sum la phyag 'tshal la// gag mas mang satha nas/ rmangasan pa ga napa na dub sa da mags lab // rnam mkha'i lus can gang yang thogs med cing // ma mab ma la ga kyas/
162a2(rnying rgyud): rApa sogs phyag 'tshal ba/ dper na nam mkha'i rang bzhin gyi ni ma bya ba med pa ltar / mos nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i gdul kyal khyab pa/ bzod mi dgam par gang yang phyin pa'o// 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can 'phrul mo che// nam mkha' la rang bzhin med kyang sprin dang char kyis sems cad pa 'dod pa
162a3(rnying rgyud): dru ba sbyar mda' 'grom nam mnga' zas nal thong ba la dang ma bu 'ji ltar 'dod pa ca ra babs par// ma sring byams ma'i tshul gyis grogs mdzad pa// nab nga babalta dang na pa rnams pa/ masbyar byams pa/ tshul nis shing gardung bas ni thong dag sanam shing yon mdzad pas na// phyi nang ma 'ang
162a4(rnying rgyud): 'gro'i rdzogs la phyag 'tshal lo// tsa ni 'jig rten pa'i mkha' 'gro ma te/ dbang mo nyer brgyad/ nang ni 'das pa ste/ dkar mo ma sogs pa'o// cagani gas lakyagarten po'i phyag sus d+hisaH/ dbyang sartan gdung ba'i rtsag gnyis \u0f7f/ rtogs pa don gyi phyag yid kyis tsang bar byo'o// rang byung gdod na
162a5(rnying rgyud): dag pa yi// gra pa nga gisas makyang da 'das di// dzeg/ ra/ yangs sapa dang rje gang gad pa dpa dgang mig 'bang me // zabargyad snying las sbyar ba'i ldan// 'ang bya thong rab sa yan na te/ mngon nyi da/ dang bya pad ma dang can pan sham
162a6(rnying rgyud): nyid tu meng dang gyur bas// rigs lnga dam tshig lnga yi dngos// rdongo sems dpa tshig dadom na kyang ses nas rna nan chen dang yal rba ha/ rin 'byung gig can don thubagyid mchog dang dziH// ye shes lnga rdzogs sgrub pa'i rdzas// zi chen chos byed kyings kyi yi zhes rdzogs pas rnam thang gi srub rdzas yin/
162a7(rnying rgyud): sa par 'ad / sha nyid/ 'ang tas pa gas tha brji pa'i 'ige jogs pa padod pa ca'o// rgyud lnga sems can kun sgrol ba'i// ji can dun kyam mang thob/ kyang bas she dbyung ba/ gcin med na 'dags/ rashang dang gas pa/ dri ca than dag dang
162b1(rnying rgyud): dug lnga sel ba'i bdud rtsi 'di// gte na rtsod kyis chos dbying seshes byas pa/ zhe sdang byang sems kyis me 'ong / dargyal gachen gyis bta nyid/ 'dad chags pa/ mas stog/ thag don dri rdzas bza' pa'i yegs pa shel lo// ji snyed sangs rgyas thams cad dang // bya tshan nyid dang ma tha ga /
162b2(rnying rgyud): dad ti rdud ma donas sangs rgyas pa phyogs bcu drang ba nis bsdus pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen gyis// byi bar byed las byes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang / nang gro log le gas las byes pa dang / gas sa ba bras kyi byeng sems las byis pa'i ba dang / bu mong snang ngo // thugs ma dbyings te
162b3(rnying rgyud): lul pa'i mchog lnga gsung thugs kyi dmachog ye shes dang thags rjes sems cad dang chos nyid la dgongs pa yang gzhan du mi 'da' 'dzin pa kyi dbyig sa thar san dag pades re ba bskang bas nasems can don pa bskul lo// 'di ni sngon gyi tha tshig go// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dbang thams da sems bsred pa ngas na
162b4(rnying rgyud): yang dab cang rje thog tu bdag par dam tshig go// sku gsung thugs kyi ngang nyid 'di// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' bangs cad kyi rdza gsung thugs kyi dang nyid dam dam par blar ba'i lu kyi 'di'i shes rgyal dang pa'i dang bas 'thal/ bram la 'dod pa'i dad pas/ chos la yid ces pa'i dad bas ba des kyang // da
162b5(rnying rgyud): de sa dang nom nal 'byor ba// bdag cag les kyis 'thung dang byang sa dad pas 'bral lags kyis// bzhes te kun tu dgyes mdzod la// ra zhin spyan gyis grub pa legs kyid dkyi 'khor gyi nyal ga bris par bzhes pa sde gsung thogs dgyes par mdzod/ mnyes nid tshol par mdzod/
162b6(rnying rgyud): dran mong ni dus pa'i dngos bur thams cad ci rang sa phub dug rab sngags rtsagapa 'i ba dang can gyi ra po snga drugs pa shes slor 'dra' ba'o// 'phrul gyi dngos grang stsal du gsol// bdud pas por 'thal bas papa' 'bral ba// dpal chen badz+ra he ru dang // sras la 'dul ba// yum chen kro d+hI shwa rI la/

164a1(rnying rgyud): par yang dmigs su med// nam pa khang gong nyid mi napas mi dmigs ma snyam du yang bsam du med pa'o// des na chos thams cad byed pon nyid rtogs pa // rang bzhin ye shes dbyings kun tu snang ga ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa ni ye shes kyi dang bzhin 'dad mar sdug gar yang chos byed kyings la
164a2(rnying rgyud): g.yos/ las ma g.yos kyang // stong khams yongs la khyab pa'i thugs rje 'byung // ye shes de nyid snying rje sgyu ma'i 'od kyi sems can kun la khyab pa'o// sa le gsal zhing phyogs med mtha' dang bras// 'od dmar sdug pa las nying rje rgya mar gsal yang phyogs char 'dzin pa med pas na mazang zab lo//
164a3(rnying rgyud): dbyi bas med dang kha dog med dngos po med pa'i ye shes 'od// gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid dag pa la/ klu'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ rang sems gzhis thal mi chen po'i de la yi gdod ma nas sangs rgyas kyi dgongs par gas pa// sems kyi rang bzhin yi ge/ sangs rgyas rnams cad kyi thugs hUM du gsal/
164a4(rnying rgyud): bzung bas mi zin de bzhin chu zla'i tshul// hU~M ya gas papa du med pa de bcu dang gi zla bskur ro// thig le'i dbyings nas rang byung s+phu ru shar// chos su thig 'i chen po las lha bu nga bo yi shes sems dpang gsal lo// 'byung ba chen po lnga ni bcom ldan 'das// rigs 'i samabyaganas pa
164a5(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas so// 'gro ba kun la ye nas rang bzhin gnas// 'gro ba sems can gyi lus sems byung ba spar lenas gnas pa'o// phyin ci log tu de ltar rtogs par rnam par brtags par gyur kyang // 'gro ba rang grol rang byung gzharda las min// sangs rgyas nas 'byung ba rdza sangs rgyas kyi lus du yang
164a6(rnying rgyud): thos bapas gzhan nas byung babad do// 'ang sems/ kun gzhi byang chub kyi sems ni yang sa rgyas sems ca/ thams cad kun gyi gnas/ sau// da'i nyi slong// dpag cing zad gzhal du med pas rig pa byang chub kyi sems/ nama'o// mam nan chos kyi rnam par dag pa ngas du
164a7(rnying rgyud): gsum bde gshegs bzhugs pa'i gan yos pho brang ngathar pa ste/ khrisems nyid nga padag gigs sus rtseg danams/ 'du 'bral med do yum gyi mkha' la rdzogs// bad gshegs sengs nyid pa sa rgyas lung / dang gis rang tu gsal ba'i bzung nga// thabs kyi 'o
164b1(rnying rgyud): brag mang po gdus byarnams pa cir bstan kyang // gnyis med 'bras bu khams gsum rgyas btab nas/ sangs rgyas thams cad thugs le shes chen po drag le chos kyi skur gci// sems can thams cad sems nyid du gcig/ sems dang ye shes gnyis sems la ye shes kyi cas btab/ 'khor ba ung 'das kyi byas btag/
164b2(rnying rgyud): mi 'gyur yum gyi klong na rdzogs pa che// chos nyid 'gyur ba med pa'i dang du srar rdzogs// thig le'i chos su dbyings nas rang byung mngon sangs rgyas// sems nyid rang thung la zhes lhar mngon sangs rgyas// snang sred ma bcos dpal chen he ru ka/ he ni yul du snang brjod pasrung babani yang nye sa// ya
164b3(rnying rgyud): la dgyes pa'o// dra ni srid pa bcud du snang ba yang he ru ka ste chags pa'o// ka ni yul sems gnyis med rtogs pa'o// snod bcud// kun la khyab pas gzugs sku dpal chen te// zhal phyag can du snang / don la// kun tu bzang po thugs kyis 'gags pa'i/ rol pas spos med chos kyi sku// thugs chos su'i rang bzhin
164b4(rnying rgyud): ye shes chen po/ hu~M wa/ hUM lnga bskos pa ye shes/ lnga'i dbang bskur/ gsang dbang // sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brla pa/ ba'o// de bzhin nyid sgom pa'i ljags// oM sarba d+harmA bi shud+d+he sarba bi shud+d+he haM/ kun tu sbyang ye shes sgra mnya bur zhom pa'i sngags/ oM swa b+ha ba shu d+haHpra k+Sha ba ma hA sh+tsa
164b5(rnying rgyud): tA dz+nyA na swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ rgya'i ting nge 'dzin lege hUM bsgom pa'i sngags traM sarba kra staM ma hA su kha hU~M/ tsu las ye shes sems dpa' dam mkhar zhom pa dz+nyA na satwa kro d+ha hU~M ye/ gzhal yas khang gdan dang bcas pa'i// b+h+rUM bi shwa bi shud+d+he d+harma d+hA tu a a gdan nyid du me zhes sems dpa
164b6(rnying rgyud): bcug/ dz+nyA na satwa kro d+ha trA~M a a/ hod+ya ka'i zlarab da pa/ oM badz+ra shrI he ru ka hU~M phaT/ yu tsho ma dbyings phyug sa 'i/ oM badz+ra ma hA kro hrI shwa rI lAM/ ra bzhin gyi gnas nas be shes kyi dkyil 'khor brnal mas 'dang can rdzang tsha/ oM badz+ra ma hA shA ha ru ka dz+nyA na ga d+ha sA khaM si ha ra na dzAM dam tshod /
164b7(rnying rgyud): las zhesas panyams nas bzhugs su gsol dang / au shrI he ru ka d+harma d+hA tu pra thA ba ma hA su kha nAM/ ye shes dkyil 'khor stan drangs te/ sa gyes bcos dbying sa nas ngos te lhan drang ba'o// hi ni bod pa dang po'i swa// dza ne sems pa dan lasangs rgyas chos kyi dbyings su 'dus pa / dbyings
165a1(rnying rgyud): su srung ba'i don// ka ni byang chub sems chen po/ snang 'dang bzhin me par su rgyab tu dgas par// zla ba gsal bar shar ba la/ rdang tod dbyer med kyi su mtshan ma las thal ba na// mkhang la mtshon du med pa bzhin// sems nyid ye nas ma /
165a2(rnying rgyud): nanas sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid la he ru ka'i/ skur gsal bas/ zhal 'byor bas// spyan 'dren pa dang sangs rgyas gshegs su gsol bar mi dmigs te/ kyes kyang tshas nyid du skyes pa shi yang chos nyid dang du shi bar shes pa ni// skye she med pa'i lam zhes bya// sangs rgyas pas cang/ yang sangs rgyas
165a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i sa la phyin// bas ma du med de myang da badzin pa chos spyan mamapar 'dra// brjod du mdang rnam pa gas shing ma sa yang dums ma bsugs pas thangs rdzo pa nga/ rnam shes gzugs dang bral/ bam kyang tudag/ 'du 'thal mdang yum gyi mkhang pa tag sa
165a4(rnying rgyud): rdzogs// rig brtogs pa'i dus na gar phyes kyang gnas las 'pho ba med/ mtshan ma 'dus byas kyi// spros pa med parnam rtog dang bral ba yum gyi mkha' chos kyi dbyings dag pa la// skye med de las 'gyur med rdo rje'i sku snang ba/ rdo rje'i sku gsung thugs mnga' ba// 'gro ba
165a5(rnying rgyud): sems can rnams kyi/ mgon po rang byung bcom ldan thugs rje'i lha/ rtogs pa'i dus na// 'du 'bral med pa'i chos nyid kyi klong du thol pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ chos kyi/ sku gcig gis 'khor 'das kun la khyab pas gad la ba'i chen po sku// zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa ste/
165a6(rnying rgyud): cho sa dri ma med pas// g.yas dkar sbal bu thugs rje chags pas/ g.yon dmar chos su mi 'gyur rdodza'i mu/ dbus mthing nab// rdo rje mamong yi zhes kha b+h+r-i gsor rtog ga/ rnge'u chung mnyam nyid g.yas// dung dmar tshas dbyings rgyu zhags bya grub// khyed kha/ 'dar gzugs kyi ye shes g.yon//
165a7(rnying rgyud): yum ni lus dang gribs tar 'du' la gnyis su med par 'khril/ btags pa'i// ming dang bsam pa'i rtog pa la ming dang tha snyad las 'das pas mi gnas pa'i/ sku phyag rgya chen po chos sru las dgongs pa/ mi g.yo ba ni sku yi rgya/ mchod pa lha gang la bul bar byan// dus gsum bani
165b1(rnying rgyud): gnags rgyal ba dmyal 'bar bya// ma da lam// dngas tha byang blangs dang pa kyis ta 'dzi ba stsal ba mas// mdzad pa tha maHsa nga nad napa dang ma macas pa// 'ad pa dag/ ma pa// mchags nga
165b2(rnying rgyud): ti dzin sa mig pa ma ba/ stobs dang rnanab kyis mdzang bar dbral/ banan// dpal chen he dra zas yab gas dang yum pa/ na/ rnam par dag pa cing cag ga ga bdu bye mdzasas nyis mchod nga// thugs rjes bkyo den gangs dbang
165b3(rnying rgyud): dngangangs grub krol// bdag shegs thams cad mnyam nyid thags pas ng+ya na nga kyi med ci dang / mdu ga/ sa kyis da dra tu ba nang nga / me/ rabs ti rnga pa na 'as mi ca dang sa pa
165b4(rnying rgyud): ga/ blar bstan pa// sas rnas bams 'a sa me pa na ma sams // kun pa rba ha rukal phyag 'tshal bstod// rnam dag phyel zam mtshan sa mang / nga dang chags mi me dang yang// dkyus byang rigs
165b5(rnying rgyud): chags pas dang pa chen srul 'khril// yab yum gnyis mang bde chen rdzogs pa'i sgra// ra bri de bsum pa shang / bramagyi dpa pa panangs rba rje drag ri // bram zen dpapa bar ma chu'i dus tu shes rab sa kyi nathas das la phyag
165b6(rnying rgyud): brtod // so/ tsa can dang sa sa srid pa ni// rtsa srog cit+ta lus ngag yid gsum po// bu rgya gsang chen sku gsung thugs kyi mdzod// phyagatu thugs gas nga srod ni ma gtsang // kun gzhi rje cho nyid kyi klong nas yid rang byung ye shes shar// shes rabazhan
165b7(rnying rgyud): dacir matags te/ bde na 'ad brgyan // dad mthig le gnyis dbang bdedapa// me dkyil dang dug/ sto bam dngas rang
166a1(rnying rgyud): ga da ma sa ca sa nga/ thams cad rdzogs pa'i tshul// na tsa nyid dang yang nga byu gi sags pa nyis// dbyer mdamam nyid kyi skur gyur cig/ thabs la sgru bas pas 'ad tu gnyis su med par togs par ngan/
166a2(rnying rgyud): bshags// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rim pa lnga'i dgongs pa 'di dag gsungs so// oM aH// rdo rje'i bizla swA dang sems la dmigs// rang bram ci sems dang sems las byung ba// bdag byin brlab ltar bzhom pa/ dang 'od gsal mengs te pa
166a3(rnying rgyud): dang / nang byong 'dres pa// gling du 'drug dang 'di wal/ thag/ de re la yang tham la pa/ pam du bye sa/ sa/ gsam gsum yin// thi mi la sems canacan ma mad/ ngang ni lam du' gyur/ rnal tshar ba layod// 'bri drung ba ba la'ad/ 'khyer ba dam gsum la/
166a4(rnying rgyud): yang wa lngar bshad/ de gsum ri mapa lnga por ra la yang khyab par gnas so// thi ma la rdo rje'i bzlas pa ni// 'gro ba rnams kyi dbugs 'di ni// dayo ba mtha' dag la rlung rigs lngar gnas pa las/ phyir 'grob oM ste lus gnas/ nang du bor ba rgya ste thugs yid du gnas/ khong du gnas pa snga ste gtu gnas
166a5(rnying rgyud): ra ts+tsha kyig tung ga nga tu sa dang sus to drug kyar zhes de sags pas sa bgang ga// phyir 'gro nang 'ong gnas pa dang // lus ngag yid du gnas pa na// rdo rdo'i bzlas parnams te// duni mchags zhes su bya// rgong ma nga gas sa las snre bti/ 'jug sa
166a6(rnying rgyud): lam du 'khyer ba'i bzlas pa ni// 'jug dang gnas dang ldang ba la// yan lag drug tu tshad bsgom pa// rdo rje'i bzlas pa lam du 'khyer// phyir rdang batshal slob su gnyis nang du 'dug bstsol slo ba cwaganyis nang dug na pa yAHla slobadu gnyid po// 'bris bu rdo rje'i bzlas pa
166a7(rnying rgyud): yi ge gsum po rnam dag nas// sku gsung thugs su gnas pra'o/ oM su mi zad brgyan gyi 'khor ro// sde gzung / skyi thugs sugs mo// thi ma la sems la dmigs pa ni// 'dod bdab shang chags zhe sdang rgas la ba shar gti mung / ni tog par gang ba/ dang // rnam ni
166b1(rnying rgyud): na/ sagyu gas shi sa kyi gas na/ bag ma/ 'a shes pas/ kyad mas dang ldan pa' bag// rang bzhin brgyad dur shar ba dang / bangasadog// pha dang shes btong pa mo dang thab sha byu med mnod na// tham pa sems pa dmigs par
166b2(rnying rgyud): rgom pa'i dmigs pa ni// lus zung bad/ ngag ga tung du se mas thugs sa// bde ba gsum dang dga' mchog dag dag pa phre gar bstan gyis te/ dga' bab ni// 'od kyi snang ba gsum mdor 'od kyi snang bzhal rgyag mo song na rung te/ nyi ma 'od ce srung dathugs de nyel bab ta/ mang mo 'od ce
166b3(rnying rgyud): mar mel bste/ me bong nang gi bzhin d+ha gzugs gas pa mar me rtapa dgongs pags pa nyi ma ltar thugs rdzogs pa/ bcas pa// de ltar bsgom pa la ma yin no// 'bras bu'i sems la dmigs pa ni/ rnal 'byor pa gang zhig/ lha ye nga rgyal 'chang byed bde la zas byar gsal pa mas bdud byed pa de grags

166b5(rnying rgyud): lugs sems can lus// khams gsum kyi sems can rnams kyi snang ba la dang lugs su 'gyur ba rnga'i rigs rnarang bzhid kyis gnas pa'o// mi lus grub sogs tha ma la pa// de'i nang nas mi lus chad par can thob ni rdo theg pa'i chos dang phrad pas so// de li sa la ma du khyer tsam na// rdo rje
166b6(rnying rgyud): nyid dag pa ni// dang por bskye bas nga sras rdon sngags kyi theg pas sangs rgyas su gtan la deb pas yenas dag pa'o// rang nyid dmigs shing yid 'jog pa// de yang zung po sems kyi mched rnams mi pa mi snyed dmigs she bskam pa pas 'jog pa // spyod lam nyid kyang sku mang baH/
166b7(rnying rgyud): kya tu bla ma rab sta ba'o// de ni rab tu bsgom pa // par du bsgom pa yi ga 'jog spyod pa dang mthal ba / 'bras bu 'i bdag byin brlab pa ni// sgyu ma dang lha sus don ma kyi ste lung dang par sgyu ma dang 'dza ba // ni chu zla dang // snang pa rang badzin me pa gre la/ gsas bto pa sa
167a1(rnying rgyud): rgan bzhin du dngos med pa// de ltar dag ta da 'bras bu'i bur snang ba// mthan/ gdas dang dang byang rnams dang rgyad kyis brgyan// ngan gsaca kya na pa/ 'bras bu'i dam pad// sang pa shan mas dgas

167a3(rnying rgyud): nyid// pa ses ma pas pan stong// 'bras bu yang ni rang gas pa 'o// ma tham nga ga sa pa // ni ben pa thun rang tham can byung / sangs rgyas pa 'dongs so// thams thang du 'jug pa ni// zlog ma dras dang pa ma dus// sa

168a3(rnying rgyud): pa'o// ra snang ba/ de ltar// sngags kyi byin rlabs bstan pa ni// 'gru brgyad las yang dag rta dbu'i dkyil 'khor dugs pa zhing byin rlabs ni// mi 'jigs seng ge'i sgra dang mtshungs// seng ge dang chos mtshungs pa ni seng ges wa bsgrags na de dwags dran rnams skrag bltad du sras rbarda thag go// gzi byed rje
168a4(rnying rgyud): bas nyi zla dang rgyan mi 'chad pas rgya mtsho'i rgyan/ dang 'dra ba// nam mkha'i dang chos mtshungs te/ smen bzhin mkha' las cho 'phrul sbrul// oM ni sgra dang ye shes nyid// dpal chen 'bar ba seng gis brjid// ru lu/ nyi zla dang mtshungs te nyi dras ngor gzhan zed gyis gnon// nam mkhar dang mtshungs te nangos por

168b1(rnying rgyud): gsum gzugs pa dri'i rtags gsum 'byung // phyi badzod lus yod du mchod/ nang gadrod dbugs rgyab mchod/ gsang ba'i drod dang bde bsams la 'bar ba/ ldan/ dang bang / mar me ltar gsas pags pa'i tshad bang du/ rgya mtsho gar mig pa bsgom pa'i tshad narar/ shing ba la star yang brjod pa sa tshang/

169a3(rnying rgyud): grod pa blang ma chu cung thadang com pa mo Ta stong da'i phyo du dang / blangs pas// 'khun cing gdung ba'i sgra dbyin gyis// gnod byed ma lus dbang du sdud// breng nge ba yi gru gyu gnas thar pa don du grangs/ tho rabs/ blangs pas// sngags kyi yi ge'i sgra sgrogs pas// des ni dkyil
169a4(rnying rgyud): 'khor lha rnams pa skyed// thugs ye shes kyi dkyil 'dir rang bzhin med par gsal// dung nge ba yi b+hu d+h+yaH'i gnas su byas te/ blangs pas/ rjes 'dug tho rangs grang // tshangs pa dbyangs kyi 'dren zhi ba'i skad gdangs lang dril thugs kyi de du dang bcas par glang / tshul gyis/ dam can bsnyen par shes pas// 'a/ khor
169a5(rnying rgyud): sa thams cad dbang du sdud// ru lu'i dkyil 'khor dag tu shes/ yum gyi b+hag/ gsang ba'i mkha' la lha dbu'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs/ dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin// kun bzang mkha' dbyings yangs pa'i gzhal yas pyid sram kun tu bzang no 'i d+ha ka su/ bye brag tu// 'bya

169b1(rnying rgyud): mo'i gzang chan ta la la// ka ba du yod na mchog brgyad ldan pa'i re'u cha dgu/ gyan gang dang zhan// rab 'jigs dur khrod chen po'i rgyan dang bcas/ 'od gang 'bon// bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba'i 'od zer 'gro// chags bcas da kyi kyis gcos regan/ g+ha la
169b2(rnying rgyud): pad+ma dbang gi tshul/ 'bod kyi bcugs gnas// rin chen 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad rgyas pa'i dbus/ gdanagapa// pad+ma 'dab brgyad dbus kyi dkyil 'khor du/ gdus pa gang // dregs pa khyo shug bsnol zhing gad nag nye zhing rkyang btid// rab gsapa te rdza 'bar 'ji gdan
169b3(rnying rgyud): bshams pa/ nya gang babyed na// bsod nams mthus grub ye shes kyi lha dang ting 'dzin stobs kyis bskyed/ bdam tshig ha// ye shes rang snga nga yul du snang ba 'di kho na/ dkyil 'khor dam pa las// bdag / dam tshig dkyil 'khor gi rnam sprul yenas kyi dkyil dor nyid kyi mthus bzhengs shi
169b4(rnying rgyud): dpa ba'i mchod sprin gsal ba'i nam mkha' bzhin/ don ngos pa'i// mtshan ma gtan spangs rnam dag / dri ma med pa'i thugs mnga' ba// thugs rje car tshul// ye shes chos kyi dbyings gros su/ las mi g.yo yang // thugs rje byung tshul/ smon lam dbang dang 'phral gyi dus mtshan pa
169b5(rnying rgyud): mtshalas rjes da pa/ rlabs dang mkha' las shang sa nyan ma ga/ nyi zla bzhin/ zla nga na na// lus dang phyag zhabs stong khams rdul snyed kye/ skun ni// 'jigs byed khro rgyal 'bar ba'i skur ston pa/ \u0f89\u0fa4 sa na// zhi thol sogs dz+wal dang rngom pad
169b6(rnying rgyud): sod can cas ni// thod srul g.yang gzhi la sogs rgyan chas ldan/ byag mtshan// rdo rje dung chen kha T+wAM la sogs bsdams/ gnas ni// rab 'jigs dur khrod bskal pa'i me kyil na/ 'bod // dkar mo la sogs tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mdzes/ dbang so la sogs// bka'
169b7(rnying rgyud): nyan mngag gzhug pho nya g.yog 'khor bcas// ga ma cas na shi la/ du sa ngan tha ma'i gdul bya'i chud skyong ba'i// dpal chen dpa' bo yab yum 'khor bcas la/ bdus byed kyi sngags ni// gsang tshig 'bru brgyad legs pa'i mchod pa 'bul// byes dang gyes len gyi thul
170a1(rnying rgyud): sa// bdag la dgongs shing byin rlabs dngos grub stsol// gnas gdas yas bang dang brten nya du bcas pa yi// 'bar chen klong gi nya'i dkyil 'khor du rdzogs// ru lu ltar ni shes pa yang // 'bru brgyad lha ma mag nye hug dang bu rnams
170a2(rnying rgyud): phyag rgyar gsal// rtag chen g.yung drung nam mkha'i rang bzhin las/ do bo nyid kyis rtag pa// thugs mchog ye nas gsung rig bu hU~M las shugs byag mtshan rdo rjer gsal/ gru dngos ni/ kun tu 'od chos su badra can mongs su yi ga 'khor lo skul su// su gsums non yon tan phrin las
170a3(rnying rgyud): rdzogs// zad med ye shes no bu rin chen 'dra ba'i chos su las dbyings kyi gter// de nyid las ni rgya dngos yongs su dpal chen sku ru bskyed/ lu'i malugs// rab 'jigs khro bo'i cha lugs cir yang ston/ rgyan brtan pa ni// nyi zla thod phreng yul nag g.yang gzhis rgyan/
170a4(rnying rgyud): kun bzang chos nyid rnam dang / chos kyi dbyings yangs pa las// gzungs ma chos kyi dbyings mtshon shes rab yum gyi skur bstan nas/ gdul thal nang tshus// gang yang thogs med cha lugs tha dad cing // gtso mchog thabs kyi sku la dgyes par 'khril// zhi khro'i tha la 'i
170a5(rnying rgyud): ba'i dus dang khro bo'i dus na/ tshul ston spyod pa bas ma yas kyang // rang bzhin chos kyi dbyings las gzhan du mi g.yo bar// gsang ba'i yum gyi rtag/ dkyil 'khor de ltar 'don pa'i 'byung gnas mdzad/ gras ston pa yang ma mo brgyad la/ sogs pa// mkha' 'gro'i tshogs kyis
170a6(rnying rgyud): skor ba'i yum rnams la/ mchod pa gang gis 'bul ba na// sngags tshig 'bru brgyad rags pa'i mchod pa 'bul// rtog pa'i skyon bral mtshan ma gtan spangs kyang // gzung 'dzin gyi chags pa med// yab// ye shes yum chos kyi dbyings las mi 'bral zhing / yag/ thabs
170a7(rnying rgyud): kyi sku la bum shes rab dgyes par 'khril// rnam thar brgyad ldan pad+ma yum gyi rta ga pad+ma 'dab brgyad du gsal ba'i/ ge sar la// chags med ye shes yab kyi rdo rje ye shes sngar mnyam gzhag nos// nyi ma dmar ro yum gyi byar sems// zla bdakar po yab kyi byang sems/ dkar dmar
170b1(rnying rgyud): 'khrugs par can thar ces// gzung bdan byin pa sreg 'gral ga 'a dbang 'thar zhing // thal ba dkyis gamar ba sa namams lags pa par brgyad ma dpa/ dang ga da// sngags chog 'tha cad dag / mangs cad pa 'tham/

170b6(rnying rgyud): sbal te/ gang mang // ye shes rang snang ni khro'i dkyil 'khor la/ gshesapa sa// 'thu ba cad 'gro 'dus 'bral na mchod par bzhes/ zang yod nga// gru mchog gang 'did gzugs su de bzhin sdang / gcang ba med // gsung mchog nam dag sngags kyi da /
170b7(rnying rgyud): 'brung gas pa/ za / brag+sa mtshag ye shes dmachog cag rgyar gsas/ ya // yon ta bdag gzhan dgos 'dang bgang / ngan pa // phran las rnam bzhis 'gro drug rnas par blam/ gyod // legs pa ma chog rnams yin tan mngang mdzadas//

171a2(rnying rgyud): dang ldan/ bag// gtso bo chos sgra phyag rgya chen por gnas// dmachog she phyag rgya yum ni sbal 'khril// las kyi phyag rgya ni mkha' gsang 'khor rnams bskyed// zhi bachos nyid phyag rgyas rang bzhin med// phyag rgyab zhi dang ldan dang gisong
171a3(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sgra/ tham gas te// rnal 'byor rdzas la 'di ched de/ rgyu thus rgyas btab gas la// ru la phrin las shes par bya ba ni// thugs kyi 'od zer phrin pas mchog/ rdzags sa thaM pas shing ma ba// stong gsum gyogs bzhi'i 'jig rten na// ga shi tsa

171a6(rnying rgyud): zhang / je bzhin pas// gdul bya rab chu ngab tsags dag pa pa/ 'bring rgya la rjo/ tha mar mang ba/ gyur pa rnams/ rta dang shes 'a ga/ bzang ngan phan gnod rtse gcig sems pa ye// rta bgags dang po banag da gang yi// legs nya nyes bganas byed pa
171a7(rnying rgyud): gang yang rung // sbyor ba dan pa'i bag chags de'i sa pa ltar gzhon na/ gtan spangs nas/ tha mar gnapa 'godan// byang chung sems mchog skye bar bsgrub pa dang // thugs che'i zhing byar 'gro drug sems can rnams// 'khor ba'i bramatsho mtha' ring mtsho las bsngal
171b1(rnying rgyud): sradang / ga la dan// bzlas brjod nga gro dus bskul nas phred las mdzod/ dbya ngas seM pa dang dod cag ka/ rak+ta 'a rgya mtsho chen po 'khyil pa'i dbus/ 'a ker dus rtsen pa'i re rab brtsegs pa'i steng / ga // na rje'i brag chen gtams padzes gzhal
171b2(rnying rgyud): rab 'jigs rdo rje 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang // bskal pa maM ltar 'bar ba'i klong dkyil na/ rta'i mya dngo ni// dpal chen 'khor tshogs mtha' yas bzhugs pa ni// ye shes tshad med nga bugs rje'i mdod pa/ bral ba'i thabs mnga' bas/ gdulab// gang mos ngag la de bzhin

171b4(rnying rgyud): zhal gdangs mche gtsigs dug gsum/ gti cag// de rnga da pas/ 'dod chags rbaH/ zhal du rngub// 'khor gying du la thabs ni// mngag pa'i pho nya mgyogs byed glog stong 'gyu/ mchod tshul ni// bdud rtsi dmar gyi a d+hi rgyan gyis mchod/ bapral rtso la ni// 'dzab dbyangs sngags kyi phreng bas gyur
171b5(rnying rgyud): bskul nas/ gnal cag yinan// 'dul 'os pa sbal pa'i zhing du 'gyur ro 'tshal// prin las dngos gang gis dbul na// byin rlabs chom rngams drag pos gdug pa ba lbal du gsol// thugs kyi phrin las bzhis bdud bzhi 'joms/ nga'o// dang por rdzogs dam bya ma// ba yul dang da
171b6(rnying rgyud): Na las bzhi pa la bal/ drag pos bcol// ru lu slar ni shes pa ni/ sag// r+tha dbyangs sha dkyil 'khor lta bang 'phro cang 'dugs la// I ni dpal chen po 'as be tha pa la jog dzadang/ bru gsung thugs// ru lu mdzab rgya rgya ngon thog rdzags/ gnas kyi phyag rgya yid/

172a1(rnying rgyud): na nadza rtes rtsi 'bru gcig gsal/ dang lub cad kyi/ sngags kyi 'phro 'dus bcol bskul mchod// oM ni su mchog gau rI ma/ dgang po// ru ni yon tan tsau rI ma/ can mo// lu ni gsung nyid phra mo he/ mos so// ru ni phrin las be tA li/ shab byed pa// lu ni
172a2(rnying rgyud): zhi byed puk+ka sI/ thos so// hU~M ni rgyas mdzad g+ha sma rI/ sregs// b+h+yo ni dbang sdud swa sha nI/ drang khrod sa// hU~M ni drag po tsaN+Da lI/ gtur ro// phig dbu brgyan no// kun 'dus dpal chen nyid kyi ngang // dkyil 'khor dbang ma brgyad dpapa yab sum dang / lha dgu nyid du gsang // dug lnga rnam

174b7(rnying rgyud): gang // dngos grub mchog gi gter du 'gyur// rnam shes dbang po gan sa rgya na khro mo'i sgrar snang ba// phyag rgya spa'i chu lugs gcig tu mnges kyang / sbrul tshwa ni// gdul bya'i dbang gis cir yang sprul pa yi/ rnamapa zin// ko rI la sogs khro mo brkyad
175a1(rnying rgyud): 6/ rnams la/ na san tha da ste/ dpal bzhur na can bur 'byung la// rulu 'bru brgyad gyo rapa la/ 'gro zhing zung 'dra/ 'ong te// phar 'gros pas ni thugs dam bsgral// ya shas ska la bstan pa 'dul// slar 'jus pa 'di brags kyi dpa la
175a2(rnying rgyud): jug// thos srab mchog ga gtar drang gyur/ sbya sajug/ 1 das ba kyil 'khod ltar// tshul btsog yin nam tha na/ banal bzhin gyur// yul la zhings bzhi gan can phra men du snang ba// mgo ka rdzogs kyis ma da na
175a3(rnying rgyud): dra khrod pa nga byeng / / rjemachag shog zu na mag brtan tshogs// sin la sogs rnams dang phram na brgyad rnams pa// dngul 'arjod kyi tshulam tshig // kun la ga/ sbyar ba'o// ga ma la // rkyen sa log bzhag nas sa
175a4(rnying rgyud): dag 'byung ste/ tre'i sa 'ang sa nga// tshad med pasra ba bzhi yi dang tshul can/ kha ba // 'gugs byed 'ching sdom byeng ba'i las mkhanam/ 'ab pon pa las// dkyil 'khor bsrung ba'i sgo ma bzhi rnams la/ 5/ ga ca ra sa ma bya// dpal gyi bka' nyan
175a5(rnying rgyud): dam tshig gnyen bsrung zhing / namatsha ba yo sa de// ma sring rgya mtsho'i tshul chis brtse dgongs te/ phrin pas na mya // grogs la bsgra zhing 'gal ba tshar gcod pa// mchogs dbang phyug thams he shus 'argyang la/ dag/ cha lugs khro 'jigs spyod pa
175a6(rnying rgyud): mangs pa/ mad / gzhan gzeg mang dag col mnyis stob ma// nga she/ mdzong ba dang dag pa rol grol badzangs// dkyis 'drod stong ba'i srang gi dpas sa bzhirnams sa// gzugs bzugs mi mnga' ba na gang
175a7(rnying rgyud): yang rdzogs pa cing / ngaso mas/ rtog pa kun bral thams cangs ma mkhyen// rgyas pa med pa na yi san/ gzhan dag pa'i gcod ma dzang/ nga/ bka nyan dag gzhug po nya dul stang sa/ gdan// phyogs bcu'i sa dang rnam mkha'i 'jig tanan/

175b2(rnying rgyud): mchog yab// ma gyes pa nyid shes rab yum/ rang she sa gra bas// gnyis med gcig la zung du 'brel/ bangs she 'a bya rgya tshul// ji snyed brjod pa'i chos rnams kun// thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin te/ mchod sngags// ye shes lha dang dbyer med cing // 'gru brgyad
175b3(rnying rgyud): sngags kyi yi ge gsung / spo thabs// spros pas bla med mchod pa 'bul// bsdus pas dngos bub ba su lugs/ byang chub sems su gnas// dngos grub mchog gi gter du 'gyur// yab yu ma gsang ba'i gan gang nas blangs ma mkha' dbyings la/ 'gro 'a du gis na// 'gu
175b4(rnying rgyud): brgyad dkyil 'khor 'phro 'du ni/ thathabs gang gis ma// phyi nang gsang ba'i dbyibs brgyud de// dngos grub 'bras bug rdzogs pa gsang ba'i mkha' la rdzogs// pad+ma rA ga/ yus gyi nyag drag 'i mdog 'od kyi ma d+hal nas// byi ru dmar po dbang gi maN+Dal la/ gsang ba sri kyis /

181a2(rnying rgyud): Shadu dang ma das dam gri ga nam sa// 'du bya byung ba sha dang / rdul mchod pa'i rdzas/ gas nang / gling bus mas masems zod cing mnapa dpa yin phung bas zadag ni da nas bskal/
181a3(rnying rgyud): yin no// pags pa zhing gi g.yang gzhis ti jig me pa byas pa ni// bla rer dbub cing khrus pa rkang la lhag byas pa ni/ nyu le bzlo// / zhal tshig la dbang mo mnyes pa'i sbyin bsregs byas pa// thal ba spu gdung dge bar tshatshang gdab/ steng gab kyi ltar ba zhenges pa'o// dge ba'i chang nang ltang ba nangs pa nig rnams kyis
181a4(rnying rgyud): dpal ched 'khor bcas la mthongs pa'o// bde bar gshegs pa mchod par bya// gadrag dus pa mchong ngas bu bsod nams ci// tshogs sems nyid na dang byed nas gnas thar bas dbras bu ye shes kyi tshogs gnyis rdzogs sangs rgyas thob 'gyur/ desan chad rdon pa ma grub pa'i tshig bstan no// bcom ldan steng
181a5(rnying rgyud): gi gnas mchog na/ thog nin gnas na krugs nas// nyon mongs 'dod ba'i sems can rnams/ byang chub sangs rnasas la 'god mdzad pa'i/ grol ba gnas mi// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// thugs dam sems can tshe zad pa ngan song gsum nas 'don par mdzad pa'i/ phrin las 'di
181a6(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// yun sum tshogs pa bzhir ldan nas/ dang bun mtshogs pa padi sgrung ba'i gni byung ban/ sbron pam khyen pa sun sum cho sa pa na thos 'di shes pa dang / 'khong phun su mtshogs par de'i bas la mangs pa dang / 'o byad can mtshogs brdas rnams tshang ba dang / dus phu su ma chogs pa gnas dag gsul lasas
181a7(rnying rgyud): danang dang / de bzhi dang ldan // dang por brtags pa'i gnas chen du// blang sbyang byin rlabs kun byas te/ gnyes pama'i kyog bya ba ni/ dang bongs tag ni gnas dben pang mashi gnas na nyid dang / sa spa dang mi dang / mi sna bas bdag grul 'thang ba dang / sa ldang ba dang / bas dang byang ting nge 'dzin gyis rung ba dang /
181b1(rnying rgyud): nga ga ga'i gan sas thams thas mthagadas bya gzhi dang / bas 'a nam bcan namags pa gnang su mchis bang par byang // ba ma ba tsam bang ni/ songs gnang su ga pa sren papa dang byangs/ rabab chadapalas su mtha yang sru pa byang nas zugs mamams ma dus par thang thams tudas myong pa
181b2(rnying rgyud): lo ba ba de ban rabs dpung // khro bo mang po bkram nas ni// bgegs rnams rdul bzhin brlags shing khyer/ sa bya dang ste/ mung pa'i 'phor po mtshams bsad pa'i mnag gis bgegs rnams chang gcang bar bya'o// sngags mkhan bya ba kun byas te// rdzags mkhan gyis dang gi ma sa
181b3(rnying rgyud): lu ban yon ta kyi thon pa mnacags dang rjon pa pa ma tang te/ gdungag/ phyogs myong ba deper dacadas kyi to ba bdang bami lan chags gtang bar bya// bskang so tshangs pa nod phyir bod/ sab bdags snga / datshod mas cadas kyi 'byor ba da nga / ngasangs
181b4(rnying rgyud): yig goso rnying kyangs pa nod// rdo rje 'i thal du bo pa'i bung bya'o// dkyir 'khor bri ba ni gsum te/ dang po rdzardzabacu rtson gyi kyi la dor ni/ dbus 'azor po cigs bcwa cu chad ni dang lcags ri bcas pa dris pacwon lha bu dag po// dkyil 'khor brgyad pa tshul bzhin gzhag/ gsang mtshan ci shing de'i mi dam pa nyid ma nor bar byar
181b5(rnying rgyud): pa bris pa rko rgong gsug/ ma nor lha ni gAsnyen byas la// gsang mtshan ma shes na slob dpon gyi khri bor nam ldang ba zhom/ mgrin par snang 'thang / snying gar mi brtsod pa lta bar rin 'byung gsang bar don nub sgoms la de la bsnyen pa zhag gsum bya/ yang na brgya rtsa brgyad byas pa der ro bdag gis me tog 'phangs la/ shi ba der bsgoms pa me chogs
181b6(rnying rgyud): gas ka'i sang mtsha bris par rdzi lang tshod du dgod do// cha med sangs rgyas kun zhus nas// 'phangs la bsgom gtor gang po ga bri// bum pa byin rlabs bum ba ban tu yang mod byin rlangs/ rdzas thar bzhom/ tham rdzas dang rgyan gyis brgyan na/ bzang mos dargyan// rdzas la dbya ba'i
181b7(rnying rgyud): gnyi gcing // las kyi bya bas bskyed cing dgod/ dung ngor ras ka bA lar rdzas dri n+ya ba thug pa legs nyi sngags mdug yangan song gsum myong ba las sngabs btabs te 'bras/ klongs tshe 'das dgug/ zhi babum pa'i nas slob pa myong bar bas ma te/ rnga ma dar rlu dra gA bas lha gnyis do gcig pa bya ni khur bskar ba byed kyi kyil
182a1(rnying rgyud): dang dadod do// ga ku min gyis nas sangs rgyas zhinga'i blam thong bar bya ba'i phyi na dpe kho kyi rgyan ma de ba sted drang brjes pa ni// mthong phyir rgyan du bre ba ni// dpal zhibar yanga' yang bta' dgag gnas gnas sang mngal gzugs partan dung chen gyi bang nas tha nga dubal dgang go// ri mo bres
182a2(rnying rgyud): 'i gzhal med dang // dar gyi ldeng bu la sogs bre// gnas lnga dang chom bu'i dkyil 'dzor ngangal yig madris pa shi 'i dkyil 'khor ter du rje bur gdu 'byad du gzhug go// ting dkyil 'khos/ gsal bar rdzogs pa dang byin phab la rdzas rnams la legs kyi phyir brdag/ nga stim mchod la/ rdzas dang ca
182a3(rnying rgyud): padang byas// dam tshig dang thugs rjes shes ni nya bkug/ ya na tshig ka'i sring pa dral ye shes/ ba stim/ pha la dam tshig pa dang le shes pa gnyisas med pa dang slab par bya'o// de nas dul tshon dang rdo'o// bsgrub pa dang mchod ma dang 'phags pa'i tshogs// yung bzhin las rnams mthar phyin
182a4(rnying rgyud): bya/ rab kyi rtsu slab pa dang chos wa a'i ldid ba stabs bsrung ba rgya gas kyi stong tshig mchod pa dang daphags pa'i tshogs mchod pa lung 'di'i yan man nas 'bra ba skar mthar byin par bya'o// !/ pa sbo ma ba dang dag dbyangs dang mchod ma dang bstod bskul nas ni/ kyi thun pa rnams bu tshe 'das de yang // khrud lnga'i
182a5(rnying rgyud): lam nas 'byangs da 'o do / btsal du sa ngas drag rtsa dgug/ snyam na ga na nga panas 'od // kod na banas nas dadas yang nasangs dang // de na tham pa 'i// sras su gyur par lam ya nas pa dang bstan yang dang yang // hud drug lam nas dgas rdzun na ma dang mar
182a6(rnying rgyud): dang / dzun nas po nyas drug tu dazung / drag por dgug/ gsal bas thugs rje'i sems la gzud/ gshin gyi sras grags la bar byas la ye shes lha'i thugs rdzas sems nyid mtshan byed la gzung do// lta bas nga sgral du med lung dpong/ lta bas thag bcang pa ni sems nyid kyi gi yed pa la yang dag par ngathal
182a7(rnying rgyud): mi 'dor ba sa bas yang dpog go// sangs kyas/ gang yin yid pa ta'i sras su lu la gas na tshan gis bskyed/ ti nga dzin pa nyi nga gis bgra' dang thang la// tsid+ha la ni lhan ne dos// batha' nga 'i dengs cad nyid nyis pa yi dang nya dang gnyis su med pang byas la// rang nyi pa'i a!/ thabs dang shes rang kyis nga
182b1(rnying rgyud): masam[]mag sa// thug sa yas pas gyul ba// dang mthags ga /
182b2(rnying rgyud): la tad do/ gnas su phaT gyis 'phang // bad+ha d+hA la sogs dbang // bral bkod yongs spyod smon lam dbul// pas de nga yang sa/ gas da nga bur 'gas ga nga 'du da gas ca sa ngas 'a 'ad pa da da
182b3(rnying rgyud): gdab/ 'do don pa 'bul bar bya'o// rkyen pa theg tu pa'i dgong ba// las kyi bag chags gtan spyad phyir// ye shes kyi mo bang 'bar ba'i ting 'dzin la// tshad med ba na thugs rje'i sangs rgyas che sgra bzhugs nas// rang byung sogs kyi me yis/ nyon thong pa'i gcags 'dreg
182b4(rnying rgyud): ma dad phyir/ na byi bsre byab nye// mtha' dbus med pa'i dkyir 'a'od tshong byed bye ga nyid drugasas tha'angs srung ra 'o bas bca dang gracad blo dang sas pa'o// gzhal yas khang // rim pa'i snod dang dkyis ga kyi can da la phrin na po dang rgyal mtshan bre/ dang ba dang dang na pa nga dang gogs papa/ dbe par
182b5(rnying rgyud): stob pa gcod par 'khor lo rtsabs bgyid nang / nga// zhal nyid hom khung 'bar 'du/ nyeb ba ma nyig nga khegasas/ rkyen gshi shi mas te// lha dmas yem shing nyid du spangs/ so sa/ dngos dang thogs kyi yo byad mchod pa da ci ngam
182b6(rnying rgyud): 'dod pa// ba shal thag byed pa 'i gegaganams stangs stabs kyis mtshams/ gang pa ba dang // mchod rdzas dang cir 'khod rgyan bkod parnams byin gyis brlabs te/ thag gnas pas dang // rdzogs pa'i byan pa lung gis dma' te/ bskyed pa dang mam ga nyar nga tha sa ra nga
182b7(rnying rgyud): ngabastan byas la// mchod rdzas dang gangasas nyid du 'gul ba 'am/ ma sa dngos kyi nya ba 'dus pa bas mas pa da// mthun pa'i lha tshe dang kyi yang pa gang na pa'i dkyil pa'o la bkram rnyed ma par byas nas/ dani ngas byar pa brtson ngog kyang ni// ting 'dzin da bang rim bzhin
183a1(rnying rgyud): bskyed pa dang // las la 'jug par tshul na snga ma gang slal 'am/ bzhin/ mngang can ca/ khrus byas san sa tham/ pang na mngasas bya mas ca kyangasas byed pas sa lang / dbang bskur ldan btang nas/ padung zang
183a2(rnying rgyud): shing pas byas pa'i yam shing me sbar te/ bsreg rdzas rnams la bar chad 'byung bas na'am yang na// las kyi sgrib pa tan bas par du gcod pa'am bgegs la yang / mtshams bcad la// bsreg/ khang gi nya dang gsal/ gdab pa rdzogs par bya rang bzhin pa bya na dzangs bsti ma la sogs/ dkyi 'khod kyi lha tshogs brtan
183a3(rnying rgyud): ba pa che'o// mchod rdzas bu ma ril bya/ cig car bar ba sreg khang du bzhag la 'bul lugs/ rim gyis mchod pa ni/ gnyis 'bul lo// sta so so'i bsreg rdzas la mtshan bya du bris la 'byal ba'o// bsregs rdzas dang ming byang bris la dbul te/ so sa'i tha dad pa lung mthun dza sa dang 'byor pa la rnams 'bu la// rdzas kyis
183a4(rnying rgyud): sgrib gcod 'dun kar kyis sgrib ba rgyunab cad/ lta so so'i sngags kyis thib da bcad/ lha sos 'i nang gzung ba rtse ba'i smon lam gdab/ par bya'o// de yan cha dag zung don no// tshogs mchod bras la chog na zan gzhin bzas rgal \u0f7f/ gtad ba'i phyir na rdo rje'i gralaHpo ga dung / ba ni/ lung a d+ha'i/ lam 'phar nas sa
183a5(rnying rgyud): kyi rdzogs pa chen po'i tshig gis ba yul nas mtharachos su phye ba med cing dri ma med pa la byin par khron lam btab phyur la// lhag ma gtar ma cha gsum la cha gcig la bshags sbyang bu bya cha gcig smon lam gdab cing gte du wa/ da mod bcol cha gcig mal la brom ba myang / 4/ gtang dag gsol zhing mi zad pa'i gter sa 'o
183a6(rnying rgyud): sgo nga'i phyir/ gter du s+dza/ sems can gyi don du/ bsod nams spel smon lam gdab cing slob ma rnams kyi tshe byin bsrung / dan tshig gi/ dkyil 'khor ba sdu zhing chu la'i brtag pa ltar lus bsrung go ba go// sems can thams cad kyi don du// las kyi 'bras bu/ bla rta med pa'i byang chub bsngo ba bya/
183a7(rnying rgyud): dus gnas pa ga'i gang zag dang bdag dang slong ma rnams gsum du mi thal bang 'grogs pa'i smon lam gdab/ de ltar du// gdung dang rdzas rtags bsdus nas kyang // dris pa dang thal ba brtags pa/ gtu byung na// rgyal mtshan gyi rtser mo btags la mchod pa dang bstod la// rus ba na zab/
183b1(rnying rgyud): rba phyag rgya byas pa 'gro don baphrul/ bar// zhes gsungs so// dpa khrag 'thung chen pa'i gal po las bapral bar bya ba'i brtag pa ste bcugasum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das langs spyod char pos/
183b2(rnying rgyud): bos rtsod pas na// rgyal po sbyin pa'i rgyal srid la longs spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin pa zhugs nas rim par bgrod pa 'di gsungs so// dper na rgyal po rgyab mar bton na sa cu srid laganyer gtang ngas rin po che sna bdun la longs spong ba ltar thob ma yang rna mas gad nasar 'a 'a ngA rang sus ma gso po/
183b3(rnying rgyud): dad la bsung lags gnyid te 'a sub dbang dang srur ba dang / dbang gzhu ba'o// dang po ni/ rdza ma dang mched kun gyis bsrubs nas grung ba'i dub thams dbang bsrung pa dang dngos grub len pa'o// gnyis pa ni zhag gsum ste/ dang pos chod par marta gon tha ma dbang ba phrar ro// rtogs pa'i blo can de dag gis/ bA ma mnyam par bya ba'i don tu/ shes
183b4(rnying rgyud): ma ngo da nga meda'i rgya ma ngas sadas byed par 'byaba'o// de de ngam kyad kyi 'de pa nye byar bya bas dpong g.ye ba mi'o// dri ga zhing gdog dpa tha na lam se bcang bca pa/ grangs kyi gas su sa dang zag mas kyis shes tho pa pa'i ru byed na po dpa
183b5(rnying rgyud): ci thon / rtad thang po ba logs do// srog lus man ched rdzas kyi rnam// de yang mtha sel gi rgyas zed dang / thang cud man gyi rkyen dang / nod bye byeg dang ga ba dang / tha ba'i mas dang nga rnams dpa' 'o// bla ma mnyes par bya phyir dbul// dag bas yang shesas kyi nye
183b6(rnying rgyud): rab byan chod ni lus pa shes pas/ sems can ma lus pa'i bla mar 'gyur bas shes rab ga tso che ba dang / dbring dang lus kyi nyes par bya ste 'u ma'i byang ma lus par 'bru bar bya ba dang / bla na rked na pa kyi mnyes te dang pagaces pa dang / bla ma'i thugs dang 'dra dang rnams dngul lo// dngos gub 'dod par gsol ba ga dang // dado gra mas
183b7(rnying rgyud): kyi pa ba srung bdabs dang dub yang tsam sgo nga gi byed pa 'id pa/ de drad da 'a byad pa dang ma ngon su rang dang dang podang dang gal bgad// shar nas rdo rje thugs kyis 'degs// dang por rnal 'byor dbang phyug 'jug/ dpa pa dang ldan pa'i b+harta mchog
184a1(rnying rgyud): nga nad / na / dun / sa sa sus sa/ na sa nas s+ho// na na ngas
184a2(rnying rgyud): ngas pa mi gzhes dang / de nyid du bdag pa byam// dkyi 'thar med mamamachad nas// thug su rnams kyadang ni brab com/ den slob mar gsal bdapa// dring bo gsang ba mchogag kyil 'i / nga seM yang
184a3(rnying rgyud): sa sa nA~M/ mang mi nga byeng drud pa dngam// mi byedas pa ni gis ma da zla // mtshan ldan gal ga na// thabya sa shAgs ngas gyu' ba jam pa // bdag ga ga nangs
184a4(rnying rgyud): zhes brjod par gyi blo yis pa dor// drang tho dgas ba mchog gi bdag byoni// le nas lhamachog rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor pa// rig pa byang chub sems kyi mi tog 'di// gnyis med rig pa'i dbyings su tham nas kyang // bdag su them po dus 'di
184a5(rnying rgyud): ba dang // dpa' chen spar bur dngos rgyab sbrul du gsol// du rjod kas dbu mchog gi dkyil 'khor nga// du thod rdzas ci ma tag tsar nas kyang // al ldan na la 'byor 'di du 'dus pa la// sku gsung thags kyi dngas byang stsal du nam mi/
184a6(rnying rgyud): bar gas bang du byung po'i dkyil 'a khor 'dzir// dung thong dul kyi ma tog 'dodor bas// sngon rdzo rgyas pa'i sbyini gang yin pa'i// sdug sung thugs kyi dngos sub sngal dru gsol// drar klod gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'a'adzod// byang chu rdo

184b1(rnying rgyud): na / ngas sa // rnabyas su kyang sems maHlaH// shar dudu rkyen ma/ rnam// sa can bya ni nyid// n+ya ta / zlab mal// nga tug gsusaH// slob dpon na mad ta nga su/ sa pa ga gas
184b2(rnying rgyud): btugs pa'o// dgos ni/ stangan bden ma pa de sems pade/ des na slog kyi bya ba'i tha ga ci so/ ji bzhin snyan bder gnas// thibangs kya ga rdo tshul du dang srung ba dang / yog nga mong mos gyu 'i tshung du dang mthur ba dang / gsapa gsanang ba sa kyi ga de 'i tsa da
184b3(rnying rgyud): rdo rje'i tshul du dbang dag sbyin// chos dbyings yum gyi bum pa na/ rdza bum pa/ nyas sacas pa 'o byub/ bkra ga na cing ste/ sa gnas sus bye tin/ thus ga zugs 'dus pa 'jus byed do// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor po brang brtsegs// gnyis ri rang chung
184b4(rnying rgyud): sems brtags chus// b+hi nas bstim zhing dbang bskur bas// lus la sangs rgyas gtams par shog/ ka la sha a d+hi ti A.a// sangs rgyas kun gyi rin chen tshe/ rdzas dpa can/ brgya gnas ma'o// btes gan ldanag 'i zu pa shes pad sa zhes so// dbang tu
184b5(rnying rgyud): med pa'i 'od dang ldan// rigs mchog phyag rgya lnga ldan pas// khams gsum bdag por dbang bskur ro// oM rat+na mya kuT a b+hi'i ny+tsamA n+ta trA&tAM/ rdzas da rgya dag sugad man dang rdzu tsongs kyi ma/ btin gnas dga'i pa legs so// dbu can mi 'a
184b6(rnying rgyud): mnga' brnyes pas// chos kyi rgyal srid chen po'i dbang // khams gsum kun gyi dbang phyug che// chos kyi rgyal por da'ang bskur ro// oM ma~M nr-irba te thA ga ta ma hA gya hA rAt+na mya kuT a b+hi She ka hU~M/ rdo rje dril bu rig pa 'dzin/ rdzas dan hrilaH/ wa gnas lag pa/ !maud
184b7(rnying rgyud): dkyis ma kyi ga can ci dang / nus par dbye pa sa zhe rtogs chen// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med pas// thugs mchog rtogs pa'i rig pa'i dbang // mya ngan 'das pa'i chos la spyod// thabs lam bas pas sprul pa'i sras// tshogs gnyis rdzogs par dang /
