185b1(rnying rgyud): d+ha'i sas mchog pa snyan pathad pa 'o dang pa/ gang ba nyam pa'i ma Sha dang yam tsha / mas sa 'ad thas pa ga na san/ don gyi skyes 'jog 'aslab pa'i rdzas mchog 'ang// zhal ldan ngal 'byor 'angs dang
185b2(rnying rgyud): hU~M rabs// dpal chen sra gsung dngos grub thob par shog/ oM badz+ra shrI he ru ka/ badz+ra kr-i d+hI shwa rI NAM/ badz+ra ka pA la/ d+harma kA ya/ nirma Na kA ya/ sa ma b+ho gA kA ya/ a d+hi Shi ny+tsa a/ bag chags nyes pa'i gyon dril zhing // 'khor ba'i nyes pa
185b3(rnying rgyud): mi gos pa'i// dza sa da nga dbar po dang mthing ga/ gnas pa so// mtshungs rgan pa lanA dang ngasaT/ sta rdo rje sems dpa' dang lda mthab/ brnyem gnas bran gzhi/ nus sa chos kyi rgyal brid thob pabo// ye shes lnga ldan cod pan 'di// khyod la dbang mchog bskur bar bya// oM badz+ra paT le len ya rti
185b4(rnying rgyud): mdzi na zung pa 'thas cas pa/ 'du gnas ce// bum du ba nas byas pa/ btis gnas gcag/ bus chos byed kyi shes// bde bar gshegs pa'i sgrub rdzas dri chen 'das// skal ldan sgrub pa po la dbang bsrung bas// chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes rtogs gyu nas// de
185b5(rnying rgyud): rigs kyi dngos grub 'phrob gyur cig/ dzas kyang sems pag bye dang nga bu byam pa/ bkur gnas kye/ lha rdo rje sems dpab/ btim gnas khams gsulags byed dam des la/ rngus pa ma med legs so// skye med byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin 'di// dkar la dag pas gnyis med byang chub
185b6(rnying rgyud): sems// skal ldan rnal 'byor 'di la dbang ba skur bas// rdo rje rigs kyi dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// rdzas ga chen kar dang phyar nas btags pa'am/ lkog ga dang bca skra dang gyur nas ril bu zas pa/ bskur gnas rtse/ bstim gnas lus kyi tshor ba/ b+ha rin 'byung rus pa mnyam pa nyid kyi shes
185b7(rnying rgyud): ma rig khams gsum 'khor ba'i sems can rnams// dug gsum bskal ba'i rdzas mchog sha chen 'di// skal ldan rnal 'byor 'di la dbang bskur bas// rin chen rigs kyi dngos grub 'thob gyur cig/ gsung mchog dbang gi rdzas mchog
186a1(rnying rgyud): rat+na dang // ya pa gtas sa sa ga pa/ bta da 'a/ ma/ sa mas bya// chags med pa par byed pa'i rangab nin ces// kal ldan nal 'byor 'dis dbang bslar bas// badra rigs kyi dngas thab rdza/
186a2(rnying rgyud): gyur cig/ rab brgya theb/ bye dang / bti gan da/ mal ma ngi ni rten so// las mchog bslab pa'i das rjes bdud rtse 'di// phyi nang gsos sur bdud rtse'i rang bzhin 'dis// la ldan rnal 'thor 'dil dbang baphrar
186a3(rnying rgyud): bas/ las kyi rigs kyi dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// oM sarba pa wA.a mr-i tA a b+hi ShiHmAM/ ngas pa TIg zod ba hU~M la cug pas nams pa/ ldan sa gangs su TIgagason ring ba/ bting gnas 'dab/ dan sa zhe gnyis su me par btu chu so// kha T+wAMg ni thabs kyi hUM// shes rab rnam
186a4(rnying rgyud): ru yi // thabs dang shes rab dbang bskur bas// stong nyid snying rje'i dbang thob shog/ au tA tu ka ru Na a b+hi'i ma/ rdzam gtso ba'i dadang / bzu ldadapa/ bte gnas pan ga'i/ badzangs can nyingad 'ayod// ye shes dbang de ba/ bris pa'i shes dang blang bapa' ro// dpe
186a5(rnying rgyud): chen yab yul gtsang ba'i thugs bsdus pa// bye med dbyings las ye shes me gsal bas// sku gsung lhan rdzogs dag pa'i mar me 'di// kun gzhi gnas 'gyur rgyan dgu'i ye shes sbyin// lus ngag yid la gnas pa'i bag chags rnams// sgrib
186a6(rnying rgyud): rtsing bas pa ye skyes gsang ba shog/ ma dI pa A lo ka yA tiSh+Ti Thatra~M// bdud ci 'tshul pa'i du sa ya 'du ma 'azung / brji gas la ga sa pa / pa/ tham byam mas pa/ yin no// sring gas pa
186a7(rnying rgyud): nga drang gos spyod med ci'i rkyen// rang byung dag pa'i drung rdzas brjed rtsi 'o// rlung rje thang gcod kyi shi med pa'i dbang // thung nas ye shes rje yi rang bzhin 'dis// rigs mchog kyal ba lnga du dbang bcur byin// oM A tshwa snga sbas na pa mas br-i sde re na
186b1(rnying rgyud): na/ brag+sa rje'i nga nyid zhi ba ni rang bzhin pas// ngas gyur/ bzung gan lags/ nyaspang pa rdzun bti grang/ mtshus rnan pa gsus shang bya da nga/ zu ba dang ga nga mdza// ma g.yos zas kyi skam chag grugasung zugs ya dang/ ga snga
186b2(rnying rgyud): pa byams pa'i sems can rnams// zugs rje mi phyed dbyings su grol mdzad pa// ngar chad byed pa'i bgegs chen bshig pa'i phyir// khro rgyal 'bar ba'i byin rlabs dbang 'askur ro// oM badz+ra kI la ya d+ha red d+ya ba a d+hi ShAn sde/ jo rgyam pa lung gsang
186b3(rnying rgyud): thugs ka nas/ rdzam nyung dbar / bzur gnas ma thu du byang dkang se lus pagadags/ zhwa khrul ba mang po srung/ brtes gnas ba spu'i breg bstis/ nus dgo te bgegs pa pos dzin gyis mi chags par ngagyur ro// bral byed sa d+hU pa yi mtshon char ldan// bar chad dgegs kyi tshogs 'jo sa grub nas dang /
186b4(rnying rgyud): 'gyur bsrungs pas mi tshugs go char ldan// nyung dkar rgyal pos byin rlabs sha rI ram// skal ldan rnal 'byor 'di la dbang bsrung skyen// oM a sU ba ta sar pa a b+hiShi Shu ku ru raShA haM// dza ro ga pa'i na/ rgyan gyi dang rjes da/ ga pa
186b5(rnying rgyud): 'di pa kyir thags pa dang / u ning na po kyang nga po zung so// lhag pa'i thal chen mtshan ma 'di// he ru ka yi gnas bcu dang // dramagrod chen po'i gnas brgyad du// gang chen kun dang gcig pa dang // rdzu 'phral chen po bgyid pa dang // dang rtser
186b6(rnying rgyud): thabs kyis bsdu ba'i phyir// 'di ni bdag nyid chen po'i rtags// 'di ni sngon gyi dmatshig ste// grub pa'i ngan rdzas chen po'i dbang // rtags kyi dbang rdzas chen po sbyin// oM hUM b+ha sI sid+d+hi a b+hi Shi l+la ku ru hUM// rdzas pa chin drangs gas rje chags par rji nga/ gnas me nga
186b7(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f/ nus pan no 'ang blo thams cad dbang du bla nga gyu mo// thugs rje'i dbang gis chags pa'irak+ta ni// pad+ma ra sna dpa' mo rnal 'byor ma'i// dur khrod mda' mdzad ma dang mkha' 'jo rnams// ma lus dbang du srung ba'i dbang thob shog/ oM DA kaM na
187a1(rnying rgyud): ra ta sa na/ !mA r+d+ha \u0f7f/ kun rdzab snang bdun dam bzung kyis khyab// ma nas/ can na dang ma thams sa ma 'a / dan pa khrag zang dang ma tug pa// bcung len zhag gis nyan mongs tha ba dngul// rtags cad 'jal ba
187a2(rnying rgyud): na dang gcig/ chos nyid dbyings la gnas pa'i dbang thob shog/ oM d+harma d+hA tu ga te ma hA mAM sa a b+he Shi k+Shu a/ dbyings las ye shes rdzogs bya dga' ba'i gsung // dzas rbe chung/ bsra dag da ga bye rje ma cing sa gas pa wa thungs byed kyis badz+ra/ rdzas
187a3(rnying rgyud): cing bdud dang mu tegs kyi bar rjod ni bgyi gnon cing grang ba tshol bar 'gems so// dmal sdud cing pha rol zil gyis gnon// ye shes dbyings su gros mdzad mchod pa'i gter// skal ldan rnal 'gyor 'di la dbang bskur sbyin// oM ka pa lA g+hi De hoHa b+hi Shi ny+tsa a/ 'jig rten 'dzi
187a4(rnying rgyud): sring ba'i zhal zas la// ngas ras ten rtse rdzogs nga/ garda ched/ rte / nga gas pa da ga 'a solas can dpa dang na bar byang // 'dod pa'i yang tan da pa lnga ma zang gtar// dus gsum 'ang bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi// yang bzhin 'dod dbu
187a5(rnying rgyud): dbang sbyin no// oM lo ka a yi u li a d+hi She ny+tsanAM// rnga ni 'das de zhe na/ brkyang gan rtse/ brten gnas sus can gan// rdzas cung la nig nas 'char ro// mar ni byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin te// skal ldan sgrub pa po la dbang bsrung bas// dgra bgegs thams
187a6(rnying rgyud): zhi bar gyur nas kyang // byang chub sems kyi don ngam rtogs par zhog/ A sa rjes ma b+hi She shwa mAM/ ldan ga pa/ 'brang gdas kyi/ btis dngas ca ga na/ rlung sa sa 'tho kya sa rjod ma pa po // rdul 'thong dang sug gal gyis dbang bsrung
187a7(rnying rgyud): ngas// khams gsum thams cad dbang du byeng ba dang // 'gro ba'i sems can nyon dngas gangs su 'joms// rnal 'amyong bang phrag che ba des na la dog/ oMrta ga sa // sa sa
187b1(rnying rgyud): lags// 'bru bdud kun kya gang dbang ba las// zhal dzan srung ba pa lang bang bsrung bas// 'grob thams da bang nga srung ba dang / thams cang ban bzhan dbang nga lung ba dan// ma smras maH/ ma/ khams gsum dbang thung khas dbang
187b2(rnying rgyud): gzas// rab 'ar/ babyu gas te/ jus pa' mas gas mdzu pa dang du 'a ba 'o// 'gangs tha'as/ rba nas gas/ gas gsas cang chu sa 'a sa ca tha yongs tu da // rgal ldan sgrub pa po la dbang bskur bas/ bsod nams ye shes rdzogs chen gnyi
187b3(rnying rgyud): longs spyod chen po'i rten du dbyung bar shog/ A ki lA Da oM ti shi wa ts+tsha/ ngad dang da / nya'ang yon ta ma san da / dbang nga das na ldan pa dang pa rnas pa // gzugs sogs bud med lha rmang tshogs/
187b4(rnying rgyud): lnga yi yon tan dang // chos nyid dbyings kyi rgyan yin pas// dga' mabur spong bde dbang bskur ro// na mo ha ra na gu Na pany+tsa a rti Sha~M rma.a/ phyi shi med pa rdo rje che yi dbang // ngas rtsonan/ bzur gnas so// dacom gnas nyid/ ma ga gas yang tham sa
187b5(rnying rgyud): thasar gnas cad rnangs kyang // rdus pa tshar yang gyur mo// skal ldan sgrub pa po la dbang bskur bas// tshe ring nang med phun sum tshogs nas kyang // dus gsum rgyal ba kun kyang 'das// su gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo gyen// de nyid rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes bya/
187b6(rnying rgyud): 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal bral bar shog// sngo badz+ra A yu She a d+hai Shi ny+tsa tAM/ de nas gzungs ma mtshan ldan te// sum bye bdag par rgyad kyi gas pa sa kyai 'apar gas pa dang / byang ngas dag cos de shing nga 'jo nas ldang mongs pa/ zags kyas 'ab rdo rje ba ngan par tha ma pa kyi na ga na
187b7(rnying rgyud): nga bshes ma tha mi chu da she 'das lam su mad de/ rlobs 'dams ca tho sha dang pha / mams ca yangs/ 'ang nga sa gang tshang sa dang sung rungs su sa slob po
188a1(rnying rgyud): gnas pa tshul bzhin du// gsang dbang shes rab bde chen po// ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du thang // de'ing byid kyis brlab pa yang // gang mkhan tshul 'dra su ma'i \u0f7f// dab ga ga na kyi sa ci pa gang rdzos kyang ba sa/ sug pa ma da
188a2(rnying rgyud): mang duyul ba dang 'drar// yum lnga gnas lngar gsal ba yang // de la 'ang 'tshon bzhin du gsal// sun gyi gyi bo dang ma than/ mdzin pa sa da/ ngam// nying ga nga kyi chug pa/ nye sa ma we/ gang nga thob ma rdzabs mas pabyed mas dmas pa nga lta ga 'a bar bzhon mo// 'dog pa 'dre yang ba ga
188a3(rnying rgyud): la// de bzhin du ga kyis rang kyi gnas spa sa rigs lnga'i yang lda zhom par bya'o// yab yum rol pa'i byang chub sems// des na tha ma dang dang mag nyes byongab bya/ sran kyi rigs rnga dang rab kyi rigs rdza yang byar bar byang// 'dod chags ye shes gsal ba'i phyir// yang tham gror ba byas pa'i byeng sems kyi 'dod can
188a4(rnying rgyud): sems can chos par bya / sang 'argyas bcod ngas/ regs pa yinas kyi grags 'bar byan ngas pa// 'bar ba sna tshogs 'khregs pa'i 'on// dge pa rdza rbad cis dpa pa 'a tha' thong mdzad sa kya chub da nga rdzogs patha~Mn nga gas dang // thim pa'i rgyal mor byin gyis brlabs// bdag ra
188a5(rnying rgyud): yus 'dis ngas gcags spangs cas kyi rigs thal ba zu 'od su nang grib pa dag / nam 'di gas lngal jim pas/ lus pro hrI Ta d+de po'i chal mor kyid dkyis brlang po// yab yum bsngol mar 'phrul bya ba// dang po yang kyi nga 'phral/ de nas sum gyi dang 'du lang rba te/ 'dor sa spong bani rige bas na gsang ngo // ye shes dam cho
188a6(rnying rgyud): chen po yis/ ge chen po nga 'di dang ci sring gas pa sa grang chag pa dig jig pa mi par gral bring te// bde mchog sku ma'i brdas mtshon te/ dang / kyings mar to/ zhes rjod pa dang chod pa byes pa deb bdas 'arjod/ phrabacigasams te des 'arjod pas dam cho ga dub dazang ba zhan 'dul das/ rab

188b1(rnying rgyud): ma mas// sbyor ba'i byang sems pabs pam maca man sa 'ag tus nas sa mas thas/ cad dgranas sa tsa spang sa sa dang / ban 'das man pa gas 'dras pa nga/

189a1(rnying rgyud): na su dgapa kyas gas sa ga pa dang bad tham pal ga sadas pan ran can papas dam gas gsam pasams // ske med byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin 'di/ kyang bsas yang sa // bas gnas ba ca shag dag sa ngab

189a3(rnying rgyud): mchod pa 'dis// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' mnyes// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' mchod pas mnyes pas thabs che bas thabs lam yin pa dang sems nin gyi// sdug bsngal du gyur pa lam du byas pas sug bsngal/ las grol gas lam du gyur te thabs che ba dang ldan// theg pa chen po din
189a4(rnying rgyud): na par go sags pa rab dga' bas// 'dod chags dmis mdong pa byang chub lam du mdzad/ cing byung dang // sbyor ba'i mchod pa thabs lam tshang / don don nanang dag ga rnangab/ spong ba ji gcod par du / mchog/ dbang thob mdzes pa slob po yon na ldan pas/ tshab pa dod lan
189a5(rnying rgyud): sadag byed pa gyig tha la na cidang cad pa dang 'dras sho ba yon nangs nar gyu nga pa na ngo pa'o// de dag gis// dul ba'i sems su bzhag nas ni/ dang phran sa ga'i dag sum du tu myang babang sa di rdeng 'jam mar gyur ro// dam tshig chen po bde bar gnas// bsnyen pa phrang kyi drabs su yang dam chod dang /
189a6(rnying rgyud): thub pa de mchog ste sung pa 'ad sa tshig na/ la bo gnyid bang du mi gtang ba dang / spong dadon gyi dkang byed par dugatan dang tha ba dang / gyod lam yangs pa mchad lham du tshig gin tshon mgo da dang / dam dzas kro'i khu 'phrig med par spang ba dang / lhags sa pa d+ma zhing snying po bar chad med par bya ba dang / khanas gsum yongs spo sring gsun bang du yus te chos nyid kyi sa
189a7(rnying rgyud): cin po la gan ya // dbang don bsgom pagrub nyams su thag/ rnam pa dang do rgong dang / ga' ba zhed do 'dros pa dang / shes pas sa byed 'dan rmos pa dang / 'de ba na pa dang dang nom par bya // de yang byang pa 'i nga ga pa'i dang rjong// gabang gang 'ang no dang gamam mo// bum dbang
189b1(rnying rgyud): byed de dbyings kyi lam/ ngas byed pa ya sa byas te/ gas sacan dang can sa rung bar brtsam nas dadang / nya su sa byab sa can kyang tus tho sa dang / nyan ma tha nyis 'a'ang sesadapa pas ma 'a dang/ sasems rgyam bya bsams sa
189b2(rnying rgyud): dgo ba dang / rkyod da po da 'bor du bsnang bab sur bsgos pa dang / de sa ca' banang du bdun pas su mi mgasang ba dang // gams kyi gan du rdzun pa rnam pa bde ba dang / yig dbul gnang du spun pa pa ba din stong pa dang / lbang gA nang u na ba byung la sha pa dang / srang nyan mang sa 'am mang bar 'ong ba nga
189b3(rnying rgyud): sang ra rdzas papa tsun pang // gsang lha snying mgrin spyi ba ru// las rin rdor chos rnam pa dang // yum dang bcas su dbyibs rnams bde rang bzhin stong ngabardzang 'jug/ ngo bo nyid gsum blta ba ni// snang dang ltong dang zung du 'jug/ log bral dngagacag pa dang /
189b4(rnying rgyud): nga nyid bu bas par/ nying cig kyang shid ngasangs dpa/ bya ga ga nga nyid bes papa cam/ de gdum rab pa gams dan pa gan te/ thos mas ge pa'i ba las log pa dang / chos nyid pa ba gas dmang ba dang / dbang sa pag rgya rtsi yad do// snad to tad parta ba da gang sathang du gaga'as dam ma ngang // batho ba dang /
189b5(rnying rgyud): danod pam dang sa nga na ba 'a gyur ro// grub mtha' 'khor 'das dbye ba med// sa drug rtags dang ldan pa'o// jig ma das pa'i ma sangan pa nyo gsus kyang kyang tud papar gyu med/ kyang nga cag pa ri chogs par gas mad/ zub ba 'arjog/ nye na gte ba na/ gcig las mang ba srung / ma'o ga
189b6(rnying rgyud): par tshad 'ad ka rnam pa gsum// blang ba ldang pa'i da gang ni/ 'das rgya dang nga badran cin pa 'ang gyud dpa/ nga nyid tu chos las bya kyimam dang rgyan dras pa des ba dang pangs pa rjon du gang/ me na padam mnal/ dam tshamanyams can bdags/ de sa mngan rdzas ga ba'i rdzang byung dang / ra had

190b2(rnying rgyud): gzhi rigs dug skad kyang shes// 9 du 'i rgyu 'brags ma so sor shes pade dgen chos ston/ A li kA mi la dbang po/ tshig mcho ga sung ba stad pas radas so so rang dag par rig bzhi la dbang thob/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs su thur ba mamigs de'i yon tan chu dang 'chad do// grub mtha' me ltogs 'da' ka ma// rang ni dbu mar
190b3(rnying rgyud): thim pa'o// su ma thar pa tog ma dar/ ma 'od gsapa pa ni/ 'chi namar rung gi rkyen byas nas chung tha smra rbad dbum dkrugs te stong gsal mchog gi ting 'don gyi/ sralan gyi bung thams cad pa'o thang bzhir 'dus te/ de tshe yang tu tse bog sum du 'dus/ de gnyis dbu ma 'dzim te/ bskom nyams dang byung gting nge 'don dang dres nas/ 'do me pa dgra bka 'thog
190b4(rnying rgyud): ga 'don tho ro// 'bras bu lus kyi yi ge nyid// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku grub thob/ rang gi sus pa sngags me ger gnas nyid senas yongs kyo rdzogs pa'i byar gnas pal/ de nyi thob bsan thas sa mongs khor ro// mang gage na kyis zin pa // shes rab ye shes dba' don bsgom
190b5(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'khor lo thabs kyi lam// laman dkyil dakhor 'dor lo bangs kyil ma yin no// de la ra he lus ngag mnyam pa dang / 'dod pa mnyam pa dang / byin drabs mnyam pa dang / rig la dge pa dang / man ga gnad kyis zin pa'o// lus dang / lus dag gnyam pa ni yab kram gnyis ka lta banom pa dang sngags pa bras pa'o// 'dod pa

191a1(rnying rgyud): da // dod du ni thos dang mde sanam// glang po can dang ni byi bu kyigaci ning ban la gtu stongs tshanang cig rung ba/ dag rib/ su bya bco thon lam na na cela'ang yang / khyangs sum tshad ldang so/ dang ri mo can// bzhin mapa dam// nya rtam ngas chags yongs/
191a2(rnying rgyud): mchod can mo phreng bugacig yod pa/ phur gong de ma ba gnyi na dang yod lta bu 'ang mo yod pa kyid tsigs thams cad ring ba di ni byed par du bsngags so// sna tshogs ma ni de dag pa ni ga'i yon tan dang ldan pa'am gsum na ma yang na gnyis kyi yon tan dang ldan 'o// dang sbyangs pas dag/ bani thos ba ma dang bslab bas kyad yongs su dag pa dang / dbang gis dag
191a3(rnying rgyud): dang / rnal khyon kyi ting 'dod kyis dgapa'o// de ma byengs dgangs mtshan dang ldan pa/ byangs bas dgang snod du rung bar byas 'o// bsten pa skad cig dang po la// dga' ba'i ye shes phye ba ni// gzugs dang dri las bde ba bsgom// dang por de ba/ de nas cang / de na rjo// de nas kyang bar bya/ mthar me nyams pang
191a4(rnying rgyud): bsdud do// de la dang ngo ni/ rnyed yongs su dag pa'i sram de nyer bang na par byas la/ de'i gzugs sadri ro gastsal ba nya zhing / des 'dod chags kyi me 'bar bas thig le dab ba/ bde ba bsgom/ ngawagra pa'i mthas bsrung / bka ba'i 'gyur bas bsrung / gsang thub bar bya/ de thams cad la bde ba dang / mi rtog pa'i nyams ci skyes pathams cad nyung rgyal du bsdung/
191a5(rnying rgyud): thikade dbab cing / sril zhing bcad/ bzung zhing rim gyis bzlog ces bya ba gsum 'brel ba can du 'gyud/ da ni byab sang 'ang de brkyang bas na phrad cigs dang ro la dga' ba'i ye shes zhes pa'o// de yang skad cig ma dang pol bsten pabya ba'o// nye ba'i bsnyen pa bya ba yang // b+ho la ka ko la sbyang zhing // skad cig gnyis pa mchod/
191a6(rnying rgyud): dka' yi// ye shes thig le 'bar ba'i drod/ de nas nye ba'i brten pa la/ rtol dang / kor mnyes par byar zhing / yang 'ad chags kyi mes thig 'di sa/ bde ba bsgom/ bgrad pa'i mtha' dang blta ba'i 'gyur bas bsrung / gsang thub paraH/ rnam pa sna rtogs pa'i skad cig ma banyis pa la bya ba chung bde bachu dbas mchog dga'i ye shes so// dag
191a7(rnying rgyud): mchog dag da/ di 'das cing de cag shi jig pa ma da 'o// deng brten pa zhes kyang bya'o// sgrub pa bsrungs pas skad cig gsum// dga' bral bde ba g.yo ba'i drong // zin rtags byung nas rtsa btsal la// rdo rje pad+ma rtsa dang na// thig le rlung dang bad
191b1(rnying rgyud): stong chud/ srang ba ni nas rdo rjes brla bsrungs pas/ bdeb ma rtog pa dang ldan par 'gyur te/ snga ma bzhin cig le dbab pa'i bde ba dang mi tog pa bzhom/ bgrad pa'i mtha' bsrung / gsang thub par bya ba gces/ 'di'i dus su bde bami rtog pa dang ldan pas/ skad cig ma gsas pa padag zab kyi dga' ba/ thig le cung ga /
191b2(rnying rgyud): g.yosas jig leg ro nga'i drod ces kyang bya'o// de tsam na theg la bdud dga' bar gyur na/ steng chung rnam par 'gog bcol ba bkag nas srog nas dang ba'am/ 'gyur ba rnam pa drug la sogs pas 'dide thig le bsrung / bsrung ba sman skad cig ma bzhi pa bsrad/ de tsam na srin po'i lam bes bem rtse yor yod byed// phu ba tsu dang / dri chen dri rtsa yadape mi
191b3(rnying rgyud): bon/ res mi thos sam/ bde ba brjod pas swa mra sangasang byed pa/ galal dang mchi ma 'byung / ci ri gla ba 'thung ba'i tshe thig le zin pa yin no// de tsan rten yongs su dag pa'i bud med lan gtad pa la sogs pas rtsa btsal la/ byin gyis rlabs pa gsu ma sngon du song bas/ rdo rje dang bad+ma gnyes kha byor/ rtsa gnyis brjod/ mig leg nyis pa byor
191b4(rnying rgyud): gnyis la sbyar du gyur pas pade stod bung du chud cing bde ba ngos bzung dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ste/ 'dir yang ting nge 'dzin de brgyad/ bzad pa'i mtha' la sogs pas bsrung / gsang thub par bya ba gnas pa gces so// bde ba brtag par bya ba gces// de la mi mkhas pa ni ster bzhis sa// dbab pa dag la ma mkhas na// thig
191b5(rnying rgyud): le myur du nyams par 'gyur// de'i gnyen por phyir mkhas pa bzhilas// dbab pa la mkhas pa ni rus sbrul 'gros// rgya mtshor ri rab log la ska ma// ko bzhal ba la gyur// gling bzhi dbang du bsdu ba dang // yan sa gas na las ma mol bkram// ro 'dzin rang ga gnas su spar//
191b6(rnying rgyud): dganal gyur// dbang po'i mchog ni steng du bzhag/ mig gnyis gyen 'bazlog te thod pa'i nang du sdig/ dag stobs hUM drag tu ring du drang // ting 'dzin thig le hU~M drag gzul phaT gyis 'dul ba'i mda' brdeg nye drug po dus gcigs 'ong / gzhu 'phang // yang na 'di// lus kyi spyod lam ldan byas nas/
191b7(rnying rgyud): lag g.yas nyi ma g.yon pa zla// pus mo gnyis la bsnol mar gdab// hUM zung hUM ring mdun du dgug/ g.yas g.yon dag tu gsum gsum ste// bud pa gsum bcud ma/ dang rngub pa gsum// 'khor ba dag tu sbar bar bya// nyi ma dag ni gsum pa la//
192a1(rnying rgyud): chung de cig dzidi// sbab sbubs su nub par 'gyur// yang na// byin gyis brlab rte/ rigs byin gyis brlab pa dang yus nganag 'gyurangaH/ sogs byas nas ni// srin po'i lam ni cung zad bsdam// bzang zhi gang gang bas brdab// gung mdzub gnyis ni
192a2(rnying rgyud): drag tu khang gzhi bas// mig gnyis steng du bgrad par bya// thod pa'i nang du bsrib ba// 'dis ni thig le 'dzin par 'gyur// yang na ha la ha la/ drag tu 'dzin bzhi drag las drag tu drang ba'o// drag tu brjod// lus kyi 'khrul 'khor gzhan yang bya// labs bdud ci thig le nyed dung dang 'dres nas gangs
192a3(rnying rgyud): bas rlung bzhin thig le yang 'dzin pa ste lus gnad do// 'dis kyang thig le 'dzin par 'gyur// gzung ba'i man ngag ma mkhas na// thamal ba'i chags dang mthun par 'gyur ba'o// bde ba yun ni thung ba yin// gzung ba dag la mkhas pa la// lus dag 'gyur ba gsum dang gcig/ grub pa
192a4(rnying rgyud): na ba skad cig bzhi pa la// thig le brtan pa'i tshod yin no// si sa pa shi babang de// glang chen nyidang dang stag marje tshangs ngur// gcan gzan lhag pa na na go ba/ dang wa ltar bsgom/ dad ya// skye teg ting rtag mgrin ga can pa ste gzug
192a5(rnying rgyud): ltar brnom/ drang // bzlog pa ma mkhas na b+higa'i chu dang bsdongs/ nas da // bzlag mkhas dud 'gro'i 'gyur ba bzhi// de nas lus ci byar 'bya ba ni rlung gi ske rags lag pa skadabal bcing // de bzhin dulag zhags pa 'phang ba ltar bya ba dang // lus kyang gtun shing shi
192a6(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo/ har bskor// bu chung nyar mgog yas g.yon du 'jog 'dogaH/ lhod lam byas pas ni// lum la dgram pa rba sa deg gyi tshugs su 'dug bkaraH/ byas pas khyab// rnam grol rgya seng ge gangs kyi stod du 'gro ba ltar 'gyod par bya/ yi lus la dgram/ was pathig le// dgram
192a7(rnying rgyud): ma mkhas rga nad du 'gyur// khyab par mkhas pa rnam grol rtsa// bde ba skyes nas gang bas 'dzag/ bani 'brur bdug dang / ngag rjen pazhi ga dang // khyad par stobs kyi hU~Mgs bsrung // gdon dang bag chags rmi lam 'dzag/ thathal nag po/ ming zad pa/ bung dkar bsreg

192b3(rnying rgyud): dang shi da ma 'dapa 'a/ rig sa da pa'i me na/ phyi dang gnas kyi dga' ba ba'i napag ga gas sa sam med yus bca da / sa 'ad
192b4(rnying rgyud): ba na das ya ca nan ci kyis dgang // dang 'gos / phyiban pa 'dzin pa'i da dag ba madri das ste gang ba nga bco dag / ting da ba nga rba dang / nye'asagapang gnas nga dbyad byas so// bde bas spang bya grong ba bzhi// das pang ba da pa
192b5(rnying rgyud): mtshan pa btog ga ri ma gog ni dag ba/ bdag gin pargog dpa pa rim sa 'dog par cog dga'/ thag tu zhes rtog gag pa dag 'bral/ dag grabs pa ni bton dog pa can sabyu 'dzin pa'o// rang gi ngo bo shar ba'o// gas da pa dang/ 'dab ma mtshang bang dag ba bde
192b6(rnying rgyud): ya gdan / 'ad rtog da da bdag yar ba shing gnyisas med pan gabyes pa'i dgang pa // grub mtha' bde stong rgya chung zhing // bcu gcig bcu gnyis ma pa'o// dang rigs pa na me 'a gas la yang te/ pa dang bye kyi

193a1(rnying rgyud): bcon kyi te/ dodzin rtong ba/ sems dang ni bdeg/ deng gyi ba kong gi pa dang dras nas dam par bya mtha' gogs pa'o// lus khams bdud rtsi chos su zugan patad ton nas thang ba / thob// bde ba chen po'i dbang bsgoman// bde bcan pa'i yang te// lam ni rdo rje'i rwa
193a2(rnying rgyud): rlabs te// ba dang nya ba da 'ab dang / 'ad sa dang / 'as / de'ang mo sa byu ba gas pa dan gung sa/ bsam tan gyi na gdams tshang ba byaste/ brag ca ladzags pa can du'o nam/ rog dus bye da nga bras ci nas/ de da ga de nga sems kyi banab bshas pa/ yang gsams can sa sam/ de
193a3(rnying rgyud): gas kyi phyag tu pang rten nas las spang bangs/ de 'gasu mad mo thabs cad dag par byab/ de nas shes rab rgyung dag par bya ba/ de nas gnyis ka'i chud so sor dag par bya'o// de yang lus dag mnyam pa la sogs pa gsum shes rab ye shes kyi lam dang 'dra bar byas pa/ de nas nad cig gis thabs shes rab la rnams par zhugs pa las yab yum gnyi
193a4(rnying rgyud): mas dang sa ma mchog gi zebar gyon/ thig po 'od/ dgyi khro bo'i rnam par 'gyur/ cag yas kyi ngom nas sor lte bang byon// lte ba'i 'khor yonam langs pa bzhin yal yal/ nyi ma shar ba bzhinas las la/ glo ba bus pa bzhin du ltar ltar/ yang g.yas rom nas song nas snying gar gyon/ chos gsum ldan du dran yang ngomanas song // na bgayas na
193a5(rnying rgyud): 'od zer rnam par dbros/ 'od zer gyi snang ba las lhag pa'i lha'i dkyil 'khor lo/ sems can thams cad kyi rgyud la dbang bzhi bsur/ sems can rnams lhag pa'i lhar byas/ gnyis 'dres bdud rtsi'i bcud du gyur/ bdag gi chud wa lngar bskur nus pas tshangs pa'i sgor zhugs/ lci bor chos gsum ldan du dran/ mgrin par byon
193a6(rnying rgyud): rartag tso bas nyo ma stong gi gzi brji dang ldan/ snying gar bdud ci tho bas 'od ladog lngar gyur/ su dag pa'i lam lta ba nas kyang das/ lte bcam du pa des pa nas yum gyi mthar snga ma bzhin du gnas so// de ni g.yas bzang ba'o cha rlabs rengs pa/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma mod pa zhes bya ba 'bras bu dang po'o// de bzhin du g.yon du yang bya ste/ 'dzin pa'i mnabs
193a7(rnying rgyud): rirenges pa/ rnam par thar ba'i zho sbron pa med pa ste 'bras bu gnyis pa'o// de bzhin du dbu mar yang bya ste/ gyon pa'i dus su thig le nyung dkar tsam du dbab bo// gzung 'dzin gnyis ka'i rba rlabs rengs pa/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid de 'bras bu gsum pa'o// thabs chud dag par bya ba bstan no// de bzhin du shes rab kyi rgyud la yang rtsa
193b1(rnying rgyud): gsas ga so ti na de/ rnang ga ti kyang byon pa tsam las phyir nga tho nam do/ dbu mangs sang ste/ tshangs tha granas spa ba dang cur byas kyang rung ma byas kyang rung ste dra bar bzhed do// ba rbabs gsum ngas pa dang / nam thar gro gsum dang spor ba yang sngam bzhin gas par byar// rab gror ba ring ba su yang yang
193b2(rnying rgyud): pa dbyar la/ sran ladas 'tha'o// de nas thabs shes kyi chud seM sa dag par bya ba rjer/ yab nyid kyi dbu ma nas sems dang sa ma 'od zer gyi rnam par song nas gtsug ton mchog thim/ yum gyi yang de bzhin du ma te/ gnyis ka pa wA nga sun gyis bub par dran pa tsam \u0f7f/ nyam mda'a'
193b3(rnying rgyud): bamed do// sa zung rgyas du gtad do// pad+ma can la lus ngag yid// thabs shes gnyis ka'i rgyud dag pas// srog shing gsum las rnam thar sgo// chos rnams shin tu rnam dag pa'i// de kho na nyid blta ba na// mas brtan pa yi dga' ba bzhi//
193b4(rnying rgyud): rgyu mthun pas ni skra dkar 'joms// de nyams su myong 'jus kyi rtag pa ni/ lung sems gnyis ka gang byung gi rtags ni/ lte ba'i dbar ga langs pas 'grob thams cad kyi snying dumug cing yid du 'ong bar nga gyur/ de yang se mas 'ang shig la zhad pa'i rtag ni/ dang po 'ang nyid gting ngo ngo na nas mu te/ lte ba'i ma
193b5(rnying rgyud): rtags so// nying ga ri 'bor lo khengs pas mngon shes kyang zad tsam 'char ro// gnyis pa snying ga bde stong dazing ngo // rnam par smin pas stobs ster byed// skyes bu byed pas rnam par 'phel/ mazin pa'i 'bod po/ khengs pas dpung pa dang lce dang l+yahu chung daphel te/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi ri thams cad lalo
193b6(rnying rgyud): spo dus pa'o// bsum bas mazin par 'de nyid chen po'o// dri ma med pas ni 'chi med 'gyur/ bya 'i thor lo khengs pa tshe nyin dang mnyam/ chu 'acu ba rgyang cang nyon no// ngan kyir ni da po bang che por gyur ro// grub mthas ma lhogs 'da' ka ma// phyag rgya chen por 'pho bar bya/
193b7(rnying rgyud): nyer gcig khug pa bcu bdun la// phye dang 'bribs rlung rnams sbyang / mra des byang bani/ spa sal te/ gang rang rung ba nyi ma dang po la cag cang kyi drung lug pa bcu rdzun zun pa ning ngas ngas pa/ de bzhin du ni ma ring 'jug pa de de brel la/ zhag te gcig gi bar du gyur te/ nyi ma tham pa sro gcol kyi cung drag pa sa tu
194a1(rnying rgyud): ma nas byas// ma nyas dpa lag she sa/ dngan tum sa pa na te ga gan nga saca sa ma// tang gis caganyis dra sa ngasagasas dag nas drang tu na dang/ ma mnas tum ma nasas dan pangs pa gyu// sbal gams par rab byas
194a2(rnying rgyud): nas/ gams la ti te/ blan nams par da / bzhi go sa par bya to// rnam gsas par byed sras gan yang nyig nyid da sa nga/ tig nyi gcigashes pad pa/ dastang na dem lam pazhag su'o// yi ge goms par byed 'ad/ ga gosapa gte
194a3(rnying rgyud): can gyi ma du dbya yang ban // ba man rnaM ldan pa/ dri chen gnas su sngon po dmyal// g+h+raM// byol song gzho shegs pa'i klung brko po/ ser po dri chu'i lam// mAM// lte bar hU~M sngon po 'dod lha na ga pa nyid/ bal na// swA~M// yaM dgas mgo skad sde 'u zang /

196a4(rnying rgyud): nga tab dab srong rtsu pa phyug bad ba par drus pa chen po 'di// bdag cag rnams lachos kyi ston pa'o// zhes gsungs pas/ tha na pa rba/ dAm bcwa byan pa kyis na rdo rje slob dpon dgos padas cis na dam pu rje 'angs na pa yan rje tagazhananas pachis na btson phan par gyi
196a5(rnying rgyud): na sa na lha rjes kun la thugs kyis dgongs par gyur to// dpal te ru ka'i gal po las/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por dbang ba skur ba'i brtag pa ste brgya bzhi pa'o// / de nas 'jug gnas phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i la gnags pa sangs rgyas 'dal
196a6(rnying rgyud): ma lus da pa mi lus sras ma ngong ba med pa thams cad kyis/ sdug su mngol pa// mchog dang grub chen ba byad nga sogs pa thun mong gi dngos grub de dag bskub ba'i rnal 'byor pa la bar du gcod pa'i bdud thos 'du shing 'dul ba 'di dag rnal 'byor sgrub pa po'i ched du gsungs so// bar
196a7(rnying rgyud): chang byed dpa ning sro ni'i se seM te da pam papa'i no na 'a shigs te byad nga du su ga su mim ga yi no// 'gegs chen yang // 'jigs pa med pa'i sems kyis brjod bye med pa'i kyisangs cag tu ma pa'i buM gas papar brko da

196b2(rnying rgyud): yi dogs pa'i sems med par bya ste/ re dogs gnyis kyi blo dang bral ba'o// ngan pa'i don gyis sems me dbyung / re dogs dang bcos pa ni sems ngan pa yin pas na/ sems de lta bu mi 'byung bas nad na sems dang bral ba'o// nor bu rin chen rkun ma mang / de yang ni yang dag pa'i dngos subal bar dugacod mang ste/ dper
196b3(rnying rgyud): ride chen la ru nam mang ba lta bu'o// bdud dang bar chod ngos bzung ba glob/ !bAdza ti Tu ka'i brags kyi bsrub ba'i bsrub pa phyed pa'i rnal 'byor pa la bdud dang bar chod dbyung bam/ dngos bzung zhing bzlog par bya'o// !/ des bdud ni di nye phung po'i ngang nyon mongs pa'i dang 'chi bdag dang lha'i drad do// rnam par rtog pa phung po'i
196b4(rnying rgyud): bdud// lus sems las su mi rung byed/ phung po'i bdud ni lus sems las su mi rung ba ste/ rnam tog thams cad do// tog pas dngos grubs par chad byed pas so// de sa dus sems las su rung ba'i sman dang yo byad bsnyen pa dang / gnyis med kyi blo dang ldan par byaba'o// nyon mongs bdud ni dug lnga nyid/ 8nyon
196b5(rnying rgyud): ba'i bdud ni/ zhe sdang pa sogs da'i dug rdzas dngos grub la par chad du 'gyur ba te/ de la nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po sten pab zhe sdang la byams pa brten pa/ bya'o// nyon mongs pa lam du 'byer ba'i sa na ga ni dug sman du btul ba lta bu'o// nyon mongs pa'i rang ba deni shes par bya ste/ de ni ngag gi rang bzhin shes pa sta bu nyon mongs pa'i dang du migatad /
196b6(rnying rgyud): nyon mongs pa'i dang du 'gro ba ni/ gti drug gis stong pa nyid la chungs byung nas ci yang mi 'gal zer ba dang / zhelung gi dang gas bla ma dang thun rdzogs kyi srog pa rgol ba dang / 'dod chags kyi dbang gis bla ma'i gzungs mal gzung ba'o// dag tu tra'i gnas su ltung bas ldang bar bya ba'o// rang sar grol bar bya ba'o//
196b7(rnying rgyud): bdag bdud rna cha srog 'phro // 'ching dag gi bdud ni/ 'ching dag gi gzugs kyis rnal tsor nga ngog la gnod pa mdzad dan te/ gnas pas mi zhes pa dang / gdon drug po dang / dug dang ngagra la sogs pa ste/ de dag spang zhing bsrang ba dang / tshol ba na pa'i bcung len dang / tshe glar la sogs pa bya'o// tshe srub srob
197a1(rnying rgyud): bslab par bya// sgra bdud gzhan 'phrul dbang byed de// nga bram po dag sa yang thug badz+ra bdang thang ngas sa tha papa dang yong mdud nga nyon rnams nya du bya gas rnams so// dga' ra ba dbang phyug bdud kyi rigs// de gag nyi da zhes
197a2(rnying rgyud): spring du jugs te sems can thams cad can du 'bor te/ bdun gyi rigs na pa kyis bran med kyi sa do nga 'o nga tod kyis dogs nas pa du gcod pa te// 'khor zad bde ba thob kyis dogs/ gsang sngags za tsho'i bkar bzhin du bsrub pas sems can rnams thar pal bkod kyis dogs par chang lnga tshags 'a rtsam 'o// bu gcig 'chi
197a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i mya ngan tsam// gang sa kyang chung du sems byed pa thong na bung de gan gcig tu ni tsam du byung na sa rnam par du shor ba'o// des ba dab ba ning brang nan pa ga nga nye su do dang ngo // bur chad dngos dang skal ba 'byung // dados su 'byung bdang na gyis brlabs na 'byung ngo // de sa dam pa dngo 'dzo/ dmapa
197a4(rnying rgyud): pabarjod kyis brlabs nas nga ngo // de dado ni nyis te da kying bags dngos po pa myal pa rjo 'od mi// de sa dzi dang da dzig // pha ma gling dpon cha byad can// dan pa tong nge 'dzin thong pa par du spong po dang pam thad byas ta dzad// rang gi lha stong des pa cad bye phra dang ni tod dpa
197a5(rnying rgyud): das/ 'dapang yong dus rgyas yi yongs yo pas ma panyid pas// ngos su chud na ba zlog pa / dang nyid ga/ be sa sa sa/ rdzos kyi ma nyid dang phrus kya / nga sus// 'angs sa rdzu
197a6(rnying rgyud): ngos du phyir rlobs pa// brgyan mo sa te/ nga yin/ she dran dbang sa dadapa rtson pang la ba / 'a bapa dbadzod pa 'gas pa dang khrel lo// de ltang phre na mengs 'dod cag 'ang dade/ rgyo 'di dang rtsod pa dag sa par kyi zi kyis nga ga rjong ngo // pad

198a3(rnying rgyud): bdadug med ngo te/ sngags kyi li reg sum sri gong chu byed bu'ong gyi/ rtags nu po rje zhing tshig pa ze/ tsho bul 'od 'byung / de ga ten bes bzlog go// gser mig bu mo spyan gcig ma// des ni nyam chung byeng batho// tim ga ka'i zing pa nas da'ang lding gse cig can gyi bumo khro gros kyi spyan gcig par ngong nub 'brog tu'o te/ tags

198b2(rnying rgyud): pag 'dra// ral pa ser smin 'khrigs pa bzhin// ral pab sngags pa'i sbags pa nas// gza' gong mig dmar char du 'babs// a la la yi phyag mtshan ni// gnam lpags zhun mdze khro chu bskal// thos nas pabanyen por zad pa' tshe// rdo rgya khol ma'i sbyin zang 'bebs/
198b3(rnying rgyud): srid pa'i gnam ma dkrug pa skad// srin po'i 'jig rten nga la g.yeng // dam las 'das la bco bsreg byed// khyod kyi phrin las skal phog pa// dgongs ka'i bar chad byed pa yi// bdud byed thams cad thal bar rdzogs/ 3// srod kya ting 'dzin mo gsal na// ga
198b4(rnying rgyud): sngon gyi nyams len chen mo ni// phyogs spyod bra ma marungs pa/ 'a / de yi 'dul skal chen moni// thogs med rlung ltar khyab mo// srid pa'i rgyal ma srog gi bdag/ sred bdag chen mo kun gyi rje// ye shes 'od 'bar rdzu 'phrul can// rtse gcig bslab pa'i grogs

198b6(rnying rgyud): rkang lag glog/ rul pa ser srin 'khrigs pa 'dra// sngags pas gdungs shing dbos pa'i tshe// mtsho mo thul thul char du 'bebs// thul thul thigs pa re res kyang // dkar po'i bu bra na mang ba kun// gzhob ng+ge ga dog pas brdzis pa bzhin// gsogrags mang
198b7(rnying rgyud): par dmyal bag gcod// rgyal ba'i ngag nyan dmatshig can// khyod kyi phrin las skal phog pa// dam byed par chad byed pa'i bgegs// thal ba bzhin du brlag par mdzod/ ga ma tshan// tho rangs par chad byed pa'i bgags// hor ston bu mo gdug pa can//
199a1(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f/ la sa zad 'dul skal chan man// mgo na sa go'i mgo bo la// zur mo sang ga' dar sgra sgrogs// sred ba'i gnams grum pa skad// ral pa sar sgrar 'khrigs pa 'dra// sngon gyi bskal ba dang pol// rgyal ba'i bka' nyan

199a3(rnying rgyud): skal 'acu zed chen mo ni// dung gi mgo la shel gyi che// ral ba ser smin 'phrigs pa 'dra// gnam lcags thog gi ser chen 'bebs// sngon gyi bskal pa dang po la// rgyal ba'i ba/ 'a nyan tha tshig can// khyod kyi phrin las dus la bab// shar ka'i rtsel bar
199a4(rnying rgyud): gcod pa'i// bdu pagags thams cad thal ga rdzogs/ rten byed par chad byed pa m+bu sha ma// thing 'brab slab pa'i na kye+e dag/ de 'i 'dul skal chen mon/ 2 // sma ni drang gi 'khor ro la// dkar nag tsun pa'i ma mtshan can// srid pa'i gnam nags

199b2(rnying rgyud): nus pa dril ba gsungs/ bsnyen kya tan// don la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas// khro rgyal 'bar ba'i slar bsgoms la// bar du gcod pa'i bgegs byung na/ las gyur bani// bdag nyid lha dpal chen he ru bsgom// sngo bor gshin rje gshed po rdo rdzogs med nga

199b4(rnying rgyud): thogs sakyi// de las ye shes ma yi brod / thags kyi grong drub stan// rdo rje'i rang bzhin phra mo yis// gang la bya ba'i bgegs rnams kun// bye sgo mo yis bcum bzhin bsam// rdo rje srin po'i ngur sgra yis// drag tu bras shing gdug pa bzlog/ tha sa cha rtan// brgya las

200b2(rnying rgyud): bsgo mas la/ tha ma nyin/ rmongs mo yin te las la mdags par bya/ dab na/ mda' gzhus brdeg pa ltar de 'dra'i chu srin 'phrin/ sa yin sa// oM badz+ra pra mo ha ya/ de mo ha ya/ a ka ri sha ya/ sarba duShA na/ hr-i da ya/ pra mo ha na hU~M phaT/ sngags 'di gang gis bri bzlas na/

200b4(rnying rgyud): spyod pa nga sa/ nya yi ma sa ga ma nga dzonas/ de'ing sa cag shas dang / ga pa dang / bu 'dzi gas panasu ga gapa pa'o// rnam pa gsum po byung bar/ 'ad nga/ rigs pa dang nya dadus nag pa'i sergyas spangs te/ ra ga sa bya cigs pa pa thams ca

200b6(rnying rgyud): mtshan ldang 'o// sgra ni sman dang mi sman dang // tsaM lcang bung ba rda ye sgra// thab ts+li nga bar zang ni nga bdi gas nga ni sta nang yi dgas kyin de/ be cad sgra / bung 'i blad/ da tha dang / 'bya rna la sa dra ma snang 'o// rje phung mo ba ba cad ni / dri ni grwa gas pa lkog pa

201b1(rnying rgyud): zhes bya'o// stong par shes pas ni shes rab po// de gnyis ni pha masang dus pa pa dang la 'ong ngo // sems brtan pa ni ting nge 'dzin// ngam shes pa'i bar chod do// ni ste stog k+Sha yig tu nga sems brtan par 'dus pas rlung srin po dang ga ldeg pa la sogs pa mi 'tshams pa'i ltas du ma byung ban ting nge 'dzin dges pas bsab tan
201b2(rnying rgyud): sad bang chad don debs bdud kyigags sel gyon yon tan du l+r-ing shes par chad dadong gu su le na ges bas nga cad ni lte ba chad med do// khams 'du thams dong ngo // shes rab mos nyams gzugs sgra lci// ting 'dzin sdi gis lci nyenya ma si kyi sa / shes rab kyi bar chad bsrang nga ni/ ho men pa mas pa dang 'jug ngas shes rab kyi phyogs su lha dang /
201b3(rnying rgyud): sto nyams kyi shes rab kyi phyogs su ltung ngo'o// de gnyis kal bar chad bzhi ste/ sems nyams lus kyi sdug bsngal ba byed pa'i bar khams 'dus pa dang po la 'jub/ gzugs dang par ston pa'i bar chad dang / rwa brjod pa'i bar chad gnyis khams 'dus pa bar ba la yod/ lha gus gyur gnas pa'i bar chad khams 'dus pa tha ma'o// bsrang bas dpe bzhi
201b4(rnying rgyud): nyams kyis sad/ ting nge 'od kyis sad/ sngags kyis sad/ lha grub kyis sa dang // gzugs kyi phyi nang bdud yin la// gyi'i d+ya dang pon pa dag po'i phyogs par chad 'bang shig byed pa'o// nang gi bdud phan 'dogs gnod pa la tshar gcod rjes bzung bya ba'o// gzugs de la nyams kyi bas pa dang / lha grub kyis sad pa gnyis kyis bsung ngo // nyi mi
201b5(rnying rgyud): dang balci bas sad pa gnyis// sl-i ni ka la sha i dang // rma brjod pa'i bar chad la rang / 'das bsrung ste/ ka da sha a bum dbang gi bang ngo // ya ra la wa zhes pa dang / gsang ba'i dbang ga brda'o// 6'khor lo bzhi'i yig 'bru'o// gtum mo bsgom pa'o// IM dang AHhU~M 'bru gsum dang // babru gsum shes rang ye shes kyi dang gi
201b6(rnying rgyud): lung dag yid gsum mnyam par gnas ngo // AM bzhi rnam par shes pas bsrung // bdeb chen po dang brda te/ dbang bani pong mthong bye ba dang stan/ lha yinan thob/ 'dra yin namathob // tha dang mar gnan pa'o// lus pa ni/ sor mog lung pa// lji bsdus rtse mo g.yon pas de ma ni ni ba dag ni bu dbang rig po dang rdzo bam zhes
201b7(rnying rgyud): nga // mtheb srin rtse smad bas phrugasum e yub kyi rtag te/ gsang dbang dngos drangs sa ma zhes bya'o// la rig byed gcig/ chang bar mdzu mo brlag pa nam sna // byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya ste/ yum la ro ba byangs zhes bya'o// mdzub mo nam mkha' mtshon pa'o// bdid chen pa'i dang bde stor nam mabar ta
202a1(rnying rgyud): sa ca// na ga pa ma// mar pa ldan bral ta bstan mtha da mas na/ gabang sangs sa// rdorje sa cu gyu dang ma byed pa la no// 'gyur// rdorje cagasum zas te bstan// mas dgags ro pa gas nga gas dang // da
202a2(rnying rgyud): bob ces pa'i brda phyag rgya bstan pa'o// mdzub mo nam mkha' mtshon pa'o// bde stong mtshon pa bde ba chen po'i dbang ngo // phyag rgya stan pas rta dang gegs gan 'byed do/ 0/ thabs dang shes rab thun mong ni// grib ma drug tu gnas pa dang // dzi ba mjug ni dang do ma tshig gi grib ma chen po ste/ srog 'phrog pas
202a3(rnying rgyud): dbang gis ser lo// gdon gyi grib ma dang / bregs dan pa'i gling ma/ zas kyi grib ma/ gnas kyi grib ma dang bzhi 'bring po ste/ lus sems la phug bsngal bskyed pas tshogs kyis sel lo// ro'i bib ma ni/ mi thang ba'i blangs pa grib me chung ngu te/ ting nge 'dzin 'phrog pas na khrus kyis sel lo// jib mjug go// gdon gyi grib ma chen po drag 'o'i byin 'jig
202a4(rnying rgyud): gis sel/ 'bri byas pas sem/ zam zhi ba'i byin sreg gis sel lo// thig le 'dzag pa drug yang bsrungadra// shes rab ro shes kyi dbang gi skabs sra bshad zin to// sgrib gnyis bsrung bar bya ba yangadra// sgring pa gnyis ni nyon mongs pa dang // shes bya sgrib pa'o// dang po ni nam rtog tunachags so// de ni ga 'phel ba la
202a5(rnying rgyud): sogs pas bsrung ngo // shes sgrib ni/ yid ting nge 'dzin yin yang nyams gyon bzhud de/ dbang gi lta ba rnams so// de dag byung rgyal gyi gnad kyis skyon med gsum gyis bsrung ngo // gyon med ma gyes na/ bsam gtan gyi drug shes bya'i sgrib pa ste/ skyon med skye bar bya ba'i phyir/ yur snang stong zung 'jug phye bar bya ba'i phyir/ sngar rjes khyod
202a6(rnying rgyud): pad ny-id spong bde na dang gi gasngags brtan nam/ mthong gi gzugs brtan pa 'odas pa pathod dang mas pa byas shis byang dang ngas smon med sa spyor srid do// shes pags pa tong du ma gyur na/ gnas dang drung ngas sadzo dang / lub la sogs pa gnang la phang la/ mig byang nga dra bang dbar byas tegasas ba sengs kyi 'tshan nyi

206a7(rnying rgyud): mthun b+h+yo b+h+yo/ 1/ yul gyi ming ni kha che'i lul// rgya mtsho'i ming ni mag do// dur khrod ming ni nye chen brdal// mchod rten ming ni da ni ka/ ma mo 'ang 'dus shad ka ta// gnas ni dur khrod he chen bajal// bsrung ni mchod rten ka ni bsrung // dmar nag 'ab nga'i ral ba can
206b1(rnying rgyud): skad ni mi gcig khu cha' skad// gzugs ni mi ston lag brgya mo// brda ni mi phad lto ba la mo// mched la gdung zhing dam la gnas// gdung ba'i mchi ma khrag tu 'dzag/ zhing chen g.yang gzhi'i dkyil 'khor du// dmar chen dmal
206b2(rnying rgyud): gshegs su gsol// dus 'dir sgrub pa stsal du gsol// bka' dang dam las 'das gyur na// dpal chen he ru thugs khros nas// dmar sgra gnad du tshig ga re// oM badz+ra pra mo ha ba li ta pra ti ts+tsha khar lo gi ni kha raM DA ki ni ShA hi khA hi/ ma
206b3(rnying rgyud): hA mAM sa ra k+Sha A mr-i ta khA hi khA hi ho// sangs rgyas bstan pa gnas 'dod na// rnal 'byor ma gsum brten par bya// skyes pa grir shi'i ka pA lar// grid gsum nang du bsag pa ni/ gnam gyi ye d+har chen mo // gla da nag snyang dang lum gyi 2k+ka 'i khrag
206b4(rnying rgyud): ngang 'i grog mdzinas// 'ug pa'i mig 'bras sbrul nag snying / sa'i bud d+he dmal// byan lag snying dang ra rog snying // phag pa rog po'i snying dang ni// bud med krir shi'i klung khrag bsag/ g.yas dkar g.yon dmar mthid nag dbus// gser gyi rdo rje n+ya gram
206b5(rnying rgyud): g.yas// shes rab dril bu g.yon pa na/ gangs// bar ma ti ra zhing dang / tham/ kha T+wA~M ga/ g.yon pha bar zod trag/ rak+ta g.yon nam chu zhags bskams// oM badz+ra shrI he ru ka/ ma hA tsan d+ha sarba duShan ta ka ha nA da ha pa tsah+na/ sngon du bdun 'bum rang lus bsrar/
206b6(rnying rgyud): gnas ci t+tar// bud med dpung dbu khu skon nag/ bar gyi ga mtshan// dmar mo kle'u gdong drug zhon/ sa'i phud byed nag mo// nag mo kang kad mgo dbu zhon// mda' gzhu zhing dbyug nad kyil ni// gsum ka'i phyag bzhi dgan 'dzin/ 1/ srog la srub pa'i
206b7(rnying rgyud): dag sngag sa dang / ngodangs bso ga ba badz+ra/ rang nyid dang mdzo ga tu pa nga bar dzadan yo dang ldan padas so// mtshon cha 'bar ba'i drag sngags bzlas/ 'og la rtsub pa'i rdzags// du ni dran ting du la ya dzaH/ du ru dza la naM ha na dzaH/ dra ma ra ha te tsa ts+tsha dzaH/ mdzen /
207a1(rnying rgyud): 'dag g+sa// dza du ra dzaHsa ma yang \u0f7f/ dza a du la sa ma ya dzaH/ dzar banyes ma pa pa// dbye ba'i sngags ni rnam pa gsum/ rta dang / dbye bstod dang l+ya dgug brjod dang bskrad pa'o// nga mas// d+h+r-i du lta par gsas/ 4
207a2(rnying rgyud): pra be shag/ dgra 'grags pa'i sngags/ du ri bra ba chu ma ra la/ hrI mA ra ya bskrad du na phaT/ rnam zhes 'i rnal bzhim pa stong/ gzugs la bsti ma zhing yin 'i/ gzugs la dbab/ pa stong // gsang ba rab tu bshad pa'o// gzugs la bstim pa'i sngags/ ma hA ti ru na shag/ du na tshal
207a3(rnying rgyud): pa dzaH/ gzugs la dbab pa'i sngags/ hu ra tu hu ra tu sha ba// sha ga tshal pa tshal pa dzaH/ pra ma ku sa ta pra ma ku sa ti he da he da dzaH/ 8/ bsad pa srog la dbab pa dang / zhag bdun// las bcol bas na mi ldang ba'i sngags/ zhag lnga// dgrags sngags gnad la dbab pa
207a4(rnying rgyud): byol gyi sa gdab pa dang / zhag gsum bya'o// tho ga dang ser ba dbab pa'o/ 'i sngags nyud dkar la bzlas/ bsad bsrog la dbang pa'i sngags// shang ka da ri du na ti na shag/ kang kang ri dur mi tsi ta sad/ sha ma pa ri na tsad ka re hed/ las bco pa'i sngags mi ldang ba'o// ma du ni shag he ra ni sha /
207a5(rnying rgyud): ku la du ma he ra ma her shag/ he ra ma thu ma ril mug ta shag shag/ du na du na tshal pa tshal pa/ srog nas dgugs pa'i sngags// du ni dza la ha de na dza/ dun ting du ru ha na ni dza/ du la ma b+h+yo du mA ra ya/ dgugs sngags kyi dgra yul du ba dbas na lung ba'i las sna tshogs 'ong ngo // du ni rtsol
207a6(rnying rgyud): gyi gdab pa'i sngags so ti la la ni ha na ha de b+h+yo// thog ser dbang pa'i sngags so// ya ma sha sho phob/ mu sha pho ba/ pra ma sha ni pho ba/ phro ma shwar hri la drag tu pho ba/ 4/ 'grub khung ling+ga gnas pa la// dug sna khrag sna thun sngags nyung dkar la bzlas la thun gyi thabs na// dgra/
207a7(rnying rgyud): po gang yin gtan nas brlag/ thog ser 'beldan sngags thun// lha gru rten la dbab na lo nad thog ser 'byung / 5// gsang ba'i drag sngags rab bshad bya// rten dang dus dang sgrub pa yi// khyad par kun gyis shes bya ste// rten ni sgrub pa'i rna la
207b1(rnying rgyud): 'byor pas// dus ngan 'di la gnas 'gyur na// bstan pa gnyan po 'jig pa dang // bla ma'i sba la bsngo ba kun// dus ni gza' slar ngan la 'jug/ bsrub pa'i khyad par gang yin pa// grwa gsum thur du brkos byas la/ 'anang sram bcags pa// a par
207b2(rnying rgyud): yi mgo bo dang / g.yag gi mgo ba rwa dang bcas pa// sha ba re yi zhal bu'i rkang lag dang // khru khu'i gzugs nal bu'i nang sor gsum dang lag sor gsam ni rnam gsum dang // bcu drug sor gyis/ rta nag po'i lag meg nang dang bcas pas/ brdeg par bya// ma mo'i sngags ni yong+ka
207b3(rnying rgyud): dang 'i gang rdzi ba zlas pa/ 'bul du bya// lhag ma ya~M badz+ra la rang la bzhi khri'o// te sa ka'i thags/ A~M badz+ra rbi he ru ka/ ma hA tsan d+ha sarba duSh+TA ne ta ka ha nA da ha pa tsa hU~M phaT/ lha mo zhi ba'i lags/ oM bA re tut+tA re tu re sarba bu khA re swA hA/ bod pa'i sngags 'dig nyis ma
207b4(rnying rgyud): bar 'bum mo// rta tshom mo'i grags/ e ka dza taM ru lu ru lu hU~M b+ho/ her shog/ las sbor bsad pa'i sngags/ ha ra ma shog/ her mthu ma ril shog/ she 'dir bu ma tsot+ta rbad/ za ma ril snying kha pa rag+ha phrag phrig dun d+ho/ tsat+ta rbad yam/ shig tsat+ta rbad/ tse
207b5(rnying rgyud): rmugs rbang / hUM b+ho rbad/ tha ma dz+wa la grar pa tri zad// bslabo bya'i khyad par bstan pa la// grub pa'i rtags na mngon sum 'ong ba dang // ba wa ljang dang chu la 'od// rmi lam bud med legs ma dang // me tog ut+pal 'ong ba dang // zhag lnga
207b6(rnying rgyud): dgan dngos su 'ong // nag po dang ni dmar por 'ong / grub kyang las mi byed pa ni// gong ma bzhin du rtags byung nas// zhag bzhi pa nas med de 'gro// me ro lhag ma rnams g.yab mgo nang der ni thugs la ta sug gis brdung // ma grub pa de ni
207b7(rnying rgyud): mo 'ong // ma grub las kyang byed pa re// rlab bzhi pa nas 'ong ba'o// ma grab dban du 'dus pa ni// dang po nyid nas 'ong ba ste// nyi ma lnga'am zhag lnga'am// zhag lnga la ni brdeg pa'o// grub rung de ni mthub rung // las ni
208a1(rnying rgyud): med par gyur pa// / rtags mthang yang das pa / mtha bad nam ma ma smras/ gta maHlanyal ba yod/ sa na ba gas pa 'a sa ga
208a2(rnying rgyud): mgad ga/ skye mo la pa gcig ma yi// 'gal ba cham la 'bebs pa ni// sgrol byed chen mos g.yag mgor bsad// rta nag lag pas brdung bar bya// drA tra'i sa bon rgyan yang 'argyad// chos kyi 'khor lo rgyas par 'gyur/
208a3(rnying rgyud): srin mo lug nag khros ma yis// thog dang ser ba dbab pa ni// dkyil 'khor smugasum dbus dag tu/ rnams dang khrag thun la bslab/ btad pa sar pa'i rna tsa pa / sa// oM ma hA tsa te kha la yaM mun shAr phe sha shal mung pa
208a4(rnying rgyud): saH/ mam galas / byu ba sa// gtsun zhugs pa pa rnams par gan ma/ car rnamags sa// man dus zuga'i rgya dzul rgyags/ / rtag gtung lag la'i b+h+yaH/ rgyas kyini nga
208a5(rnying rgyud): rba ba rnamagasas pa/ gas na la dang pan sha dmyas // dbang thug nyi bca ca kyis/ dang par ba 'jug kyad 'babs/ dag ga nyid thug pa nga ma /
208a6(rnying rgyud): na mo sa l+yang 'bral/ blom gar la gar thobs/ gan la 'bebs nam mo yi// kyid la sngags 'dis dgragapa ciro// mams sa/ so/ nang nan/ gdug byed can ma sa pa// tshig dang me pa 'breg cing 'bangs//
208a7(rnying rgyud): 'thab tshogs kyi bdag pas ga ngas sa// nyes ma' bcan pa'is/ gsang ba san dag go bdag pa te bcu du pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das darje tshong can pas chos kyi 'i bu mtha can pa 'di gsasapa/ 'a
208b1(rnying rgyud): lha gdung ring bsrel ni// rnal 'byor kun gyi grub pa'i rten// dngos med me la sbyangs pa yis// dngos can gdung du 'byung bar 'gyur// / dang por lha klu zhi byas nas// snang dang mi sdang sa blangs la// dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus nyid du// mchod
208b2(rnying rgyud): rten rin chen snga bzhis byas// 'og khang rmang gzhir gnas pa la// bar khang bar rim sgo bzhi pa// steng khang bum pa ro yi gnas// mkhas pas rab tu mdzes par bya// / bzang drug dri ldan ras spangs nas// ro la rab tu dril bar bya// sangs
208b3(rnying rgyud): rgyas dpa' bo 'bu lnga dang // 'gro ba'i sa bon drug po dang // dug lnga dug gsum la sogs pa'i// 'khor 'das sngags rnams gdags par bya// sbyang bya re dang spyod byed res// ro la rab tu brgyan byas nas// lha dang rtog pa brang spad la/ 1/ rdo rje
208b4(rnying rgyud): sa 'dzin bla ma dang // dkar byang bsngo dang nig byang bsreg/ las mkhan la sogs gzungs thA ga bzung // gsang ba'i sngags kyis gdab par bya/ dmyal bgyod pa// oM da ha da ha sarba na ra ka ga te he tu hUM phaT/ yi dgas spyo dag/ oM pa tsa pa tsa sarba pre ta ka ga te he
208b5(rnying rgyud): tuM hU~M phaT/ dung 'gro myong ba/ oM ma tha ma tha sarba ti ra ya ka ga te he huM hUM phaT/ rigs dug phyir spyod pa/ A~M a nr-i su tri phre du hU phaT/ !/ zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor shar du bya/ ho ma ni// 'o ma can nam rtse mo'i shing / ting re/ dang pa'i sems dang rab ldan pas/ yum gdapa
208b6(rnying rgyud): thag/ nyu ga phran ma yi bu mo la// phu pa gang gis kya ga/ dngul lam dkar po'i phur pas gdab// chung gang rgyu ba'i dus sa byab// chu rlung rgyu ba'i dus su sbyar // gdul ba gang gi don du bya ga// gti mug can gyi sems can rnams/ 'bras bu gang 'grub pa// nad dang gdon bgegs
208b7(rnying rgyud): zhi bar 'gyur// a mu ka s+ya/ chog mo zhig pa/ sarba gra ta bi b+ha nAn/ gdon dgegs thams cad/ sarba dzA ra nAn/ rims thams cad/ sarba b+ha d+hi nan/ nad thams cad/ sarba baSha nan/ drag thams cad/ sarba du rdi mi ta na na/ lhas ngan pa thams cad/ sarba a mang+ga la nan/ de ba laM shis
209a1(rnying rgyud): batha sa/ sarnamapa mtshan yang dag pas cadag gardata par tanan/ bar pa dag// \u0f7f gadra swAhA/ rgyas pasar ba gyim bya// yalag shing dam gsar shang dang // dga' ba' sems ldan pan klung can/ dadang /
209a2(rnying rgyud): ram ser po'i phur bu la// pra yaM khAng ba'i gtor ma dang // sa rlung chu ba'i dus nyid du// ngargyal can gyi gdul zla rnams// cha dang bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur// a mu ka su/ tshig tsha zhog gi/ pu N+ya swa/ bsod nams dag dz+nyA na mye/ legs dang / bre yagad
209a3(rnying rgyud): dang / te dzama?/ ga rkyen dang / A pra She/ tse dang / ba la s+ya/ mtha dang / sarba sa ma b+hog sa/ longs slod thams cad/ brar+d+he ku ru swA hA/ rgyas par mdzod ce// dbang ni rlab tu blag ma dmar// sdong po'i shing ngam seng ldeng can// chags pa'i sems kyis spong
209a4(rnying rgyud): gcig ma'i// nya gar zangs kyi phra rabs gdab// ram bu'i gtor ma dmar po 'thal// 'dod chags can gyi bud med dang // yul khams rgyal blon dbang du 'gyur// me rlung chu ba'i dus dang bstan// a mu ka s+ya/ che ge mo gag gi/ sarba gra ha baM g+ha
209a5(rnying rgyud): nan/ gdon gams cid/ sarba dar nan/ ral ma nga/ sarba biSha nan/ dug thams cad/ sarba pA pa kaN NA par NA nan/ lang kyi sleb pa'i rjeg pa mas pa/ ya ka tsa taM/ gas la nga / rata bye ba/ ma gag pang / tshal ba/ // pi la gzon cig/ A ka
209a6(rnying rgyud): ya/ rmongs te/ u mra ka draSh+Ta She rnan/ bdag pa dang pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sarba gra ha baM g+ha na ma?/ gdon pasheg sa thams ca/ sa rbadza ra ri mas na mas cad ga yo ga ta bi b+ha nAn/ gdon degs ma sral pa nams/ a kra ma ti Sh+Tha ga ts+tsha gadz+dza/ 'din ma gnas par song shig/ dwe Sha Na sarba
209a7(rnying rgyud): gra ha bi g+ha na na/ gnod byed bye de bgegs thams cad/ u tsa ta ya/ skrod cig// a mu ka s+ya/ che ge song / kA ya tsit+ta/ lus dang sems dang A yuHshaM/ che dang / dpapa dang / te dzaH/ gtsi byin/ sarba rak+Sha/ thams cad srung / a mu ka/ cheg mo zhig la/ pe ta ya na te/ gnod pa byed pa
209a8(rnying rgyud): yin nam//
209b1(rnying rgyud): sa pa ba stan/ gdan gad / A r+N+Na pa/ nas/ rta rdza na/ a haH/ na/ bar+d+habat+ta// 'a mA ban tu ma sa / da / bang grang khal na ban+d+ha la/ rangs gsam na/ mataya ma ta la/ rang na du
209b2(rnying rgyud): d-i/ gzub shi barba hU~M swAH/ da / byang du dag pa zugs pa dang/ sa ba'i gli ma tshar ma can// chagasas drang gi drung rje 'jas// rgyas pa'i sems can phyogs phrang shing ga// shing zhing dag po zugags// drag gig
209b3(rnying rgyud): men zag/ yeng+ga mag gis thos pa dang // brtsam zhing thos pa gsad par byed// a \u0f89\u0fa4 bya/ chag pa/ da man pa/ do / mat+ta dA+e / ze dang/ dat+tem/ dgasas/ tata pa/ pa/
209b4(rnying rgyud): dab+h+yaH/ byab 'dzag pa / ha ra ha na/ rgya sa khyob yi/ Shad+ha paT/ don cho dag/ rnyed la/ cod pa/ da hA na/ begs shes/ mang ye/ da/ mahA krod/ can po/ dz+wa lan/ yas la ba ba/ datang te/ senas dag gas na/ thA kradra/ thab 'ardzogs
209b5(rnying rgyud): ra ba dun cod la/ kAn ga da / man+ta/ ga ngag/ N+Da Shakho denan pa mog ca za pa la migs pa'i bamam pa dang / draSh+Ta/ bdug pa/ bstsu / rnas pa'i ya nga/ sarba ta dzan/ ga cin ba rnam mang/ thab rta la/ a mraka d+ha/
209b6(rnying rgyud): zhig pa/ sarba grata da N+ya nAM/ gdod par byed pa gdan shegs thams cad/ kI la yA me/ sa bras ga pag/ swa maHlA maM/ mnanang/ a d+ha me/ gdan popa/ ba shang kA ru/ bdag she kyis shes/ gr-iH/ zang na/ sa nA la ta ha tan/ grogs dang gau niH/ dz+wa pa
209b7(rnying rgyud): yang / sa 'tshas tshan ca ta ba tam/ can// / sata pra na zhe/ ba mthab/ dam// rdzas/ a tham pa/ ga nga/
210a1(rnying rgyud): A kaR+Sha pa/ dza zhig/ nAd la/ sa// sA drA ya/ cig/ tshon d+hu ya/ gtabyas nas/ snum b+ha nam// ar+than/ ma ga gags/ a la tra te/ gnod pa byang par/ sarba graha ba g+hanA/ gdon gags thams cad/ ba la
210a2(rnying rgyud): me be ka/ mthu dang dpung dang / sarba mo s+pho ta ya/ thams cad shig ci ge/ kro d+ha kro tI/ khro go Na mos/ sarba du ti nAM/ lo nya mo thams cad kyis/ a tsi re na karma ku ru/ phrin las myur du mdzod cig/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ sod cig sod/ !/ zhi ba'i ma ni 'bar zhing dkar// rgyas
210a3(rnying rgyud): pa 'od 'phro rab tu gsal// dbang la dmar la dr-i yang zhim// drag po 'ur sgra che ba yin// 'bar du mi nyan 'chi ba dang // tseg sgra 'gro dang du bas 'tshubs// brtul zhugs bskyed la blo ldan pas// las dang mthun par las la sbyar// me
210a4(rnying rgyud): lhar skyes zhon pa la// drang srong phyag bzhi bgrang phreng dang // me zab zhugs shing sbyin pa gtong / me lha'i// lto bar bgyid pa gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor ram/ lha mchod pa dang / mnya/ dbang por gnas la lha mchod pa dbul ba ni// phrin las rnam
210a5(rnying rgyud): bzhi'i dgang gzar nang // blugs gzar bdun nam gsum shong bas// sbyin sreg bdun nam nyi shu gcig/ brgya rtsa brgyad du dbul bar bya// las dang rim par ldan pa yin/ chos nyid rnam dag hom khung nang // chos can mtshan ma'i
210a6(rnying rgyud): sbyin bsreg thim// sdang srid snang ba'i hom khung du// bcud kyi sems can sbyin bsreg thim// rig ma yum gyi b+ha ga'i klong // byang sems sa bon sbyin bsreg thim/ kun gzhi srid pa'i hom khung du// yid kyi rnam shes rkyen bsreg
210a7(rnying rgyud): za ma// yi ge e ni drag po'i las// baM gyes dbang du sdud par 'gyur/ ma zhes bya ba rgyas par byed// yA ni zhi ba chen por gnas// lkog ma gru gsum drag po la// ro stod gru bzhi rgyas pa ste// lte ba zlum po zhi ba nyid// gsang pad+ma
210b1(rnying rgyud): kham dbang du byed// thal ba bsdus te sku gdung gdab// chos nyid don gyi sku gdung las/ 'gyur ba med pa gnas pas// 'byung ba rtags kyi sku gdung shar/ bag she na// phyi ni dbus kyi ri rab ldan por grub/ rin po che sna bzhi ba// nang ni gzugs kyi phung por shar/ rang lus
210b2(rnying rgyud): mchod rten gyi dkyingasas// gsang ba b+ha ga ra'i na dus bon 'byung ba chags/ mchod rten du// de nyid kun gzhi rnam zhes tshogs brgyad klong / dang bca' pa'i// rtogs nas tshogs chen bsag par bya/ bar dod dugadang/ gnan den du gdapab// phrin las rnam bzhi sgrub pa dang /
210b3(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten thun mor ge dag mnan pa sogs pa/ las rnams ma lus 'grub// tshe 'das kyi don du sgrib pa myong bar byed/ tsha tsha'i rgya ni// srog chags bral ba'i sa dang chu// rin chen lba ba dar dri sna tshogs pa dang rab ldan pas/ gad thabs kyi zab// kya ra bdos bor du gzhug
210b4(rnying rgyud): brdung zhing dbyung ba dang // bzhugs la rab tu gnas pa dang / gshegs nas tshogs bsag bzod par gsol// thams cad gsang sngags bshad par bya// oM d+harma d+hA tra gar+b+he swA ha/ rgyar gzhug pa'i sngags/ A~M badz+ra mud+ha ra a ko Ta ya swA hA/ brlang ba'i lags
210b5(rnying rgyud): oM d+harma d+hA tu swA hA/ gya nas dpung pa'i/ oM a pra ti tiSh+Tha badz+ra swA hA/ b.lugs su gso ba'i/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma Ni sha ta dI pa te dz+wa la dz+wa la d+harma d+hA tu gar+b+he swA hA/ rab tu gnas pa'i sngags nas la bzlas la gtor// gshegs su gsol pa/ oM mA b+hA wa bi shud+ha A ha ra A ha ra A ga ts+tsha ya A
210b6(rnying rgyud): kadz+ha ya d+harma d+hA tu ga b+he swA hA/ bskor dbya 'i sngags/ na mo phyag 'tshal lo/ b+ha ga wa te rat+na ke tu rA dzA ya/ bcom ldan 'das rin chen tog gi rgyal po pa/ ta thA ga tA ya/ de bzhin gshegs pa la/ a d+ha te b+h+yaH/ dgra bcom pa rnams la/ saM myaka sa~M bu d+hA ya/ yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la/ nga d+ya
210b7(rnying rgyud): TA/ 'dita to/ ai rat+na rat+na/ rjenas car po \u0f7f/ ma hA raH/ chen pa na mi/ rat+na chen pa \u0f7f bai dza yI rnam par la sA hA/ cod par gsor ba stegs/ AM a ga b+h+re lA hA/ !/ mchod pa rnam pa lnga yang dbul// nas \u0f7fla rten we gyi gsang sngags
211a1(rnying rgyud): bzlas byas nas/ btag par nang cag shang sa// nang du grags la rtag pa sa shes sngam 'ad pa zhang na/ yaM dam wa// gzhal yas khang na bzhugs par bsam/ !/ mthar thug 'bras bu'i wag dung ni// srag sums la gnas pa
211a2(rnying rgyud): ni// ye shes rnam lnga sar rgyan par 'gyur/ bcu gcig kun du 'od la chos su/ bcu gnyis ma chags pa d+ma can longs su/ bcugasam yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen sbru lasgra// chos kyi spu la rab tu bzhugs// zhes gsungs so// he ru ka'i gal po las/ gdung bseg phri
211a3(rnying rgyud): las kyis sgra gdung bzhengs su gsol ba'i brtag pa ste bco brgyad pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos gsang ba tshe'i las 'di 'gro ba'i ched du gsungs so// rang dan du tshe la stong drug bcu thub pa la gzhan don du bzar nas
211a4(rnying rgyud): bzhugs pa'o// tshe dbang rig 'dzin bsrub pa'i phyir// rdo rje g.yung drung gsang ba'i mkhar// 'gyur ba ma dpa' tshe na rdo rje pa las lta bu'o// sku tshe ring ba'i dpa'o// nyi zla bzhan du rab gnas pa// tshe mchog gsang ba 'chi med 'gru ba/ dpal tshangs pa'i cha la!
211a5(rnying rgyud): thub ba'am/ lha'i dbang po'i tshe ltar thub pa'o// chos stong drug brgyar gnas pa'i reg 'dzin no/ !/ gsang sngags gsang ba bsgrub pa'i gang zag gis/ !dang po che'i dngos grub kyis dang skal gyi tsha las khyad par du 'phags pa 'grub ste/ cha lo brgya pa yin na nyis bcar gnas pa'am/
211a6(rnying rgyud): la dug cub lan na brgyar gnas pa lta bu'o// dang por tshe yi dngos grub ma thob na// bgegs kyi rkyen gyis tshe srog par bcad nas// bla na med pa'i byang chub ma 'thob pas/ 1/ dang por bdag don tshe yi bskyab pa bya// hA zhes brjod pas phyi nang sdong
211a7(rnying rgyud): brgyad dang was ngag yid/ gsam// bsregs nas stong pa'i ngang las gnyis bam pa sngags 'di brjod pa/ gabadz+ra shrI he ru ka hU~M/ zhes brtse/ dur khrod kyi gzhal yas khang nang 'khor lo'i rtsibs brgyad ltar 'og gnyis te/ bcu pa/ khrob
211b1(rnying rgyud): 'dab 'byor// sgo nga'i sbabs lta za'i rang na khro bo brtsam pa me bang 'bar/ ba'o// de'i dbus sa hIHzhes pas sde las dpal rta mgrin zhal gsal pa/ sra mdog// dmar po phyag drug pa 'jigs pa/ dbyug pa g.yu 'jug bsdams/ da2/ thugs
211b2(rnying rgyud): kar a gra gsam las chos wa 'byung gnas bsgom de'i dkyil du nya/ la// gzhal yas khang de'il nang du dpal chen he ru ka/ zhal gsum phyag drab/ ba bsgom de yi thugs nad du/ bdag/ khag 'thung zhal gcig phyag gnyis ba bcom/ rdor dril
211b3(rnying rgyud): 'chad// de yi sting gi dkyi la bu pa zla 'ad ba brgyad pa 'a// de'i dkyil du yi ge a dang ni bsam/ 'dab ma brgyad la a dang dza A yu She ba A zhes pa brgyad bsam/ da la/ na ljangad gu gnas pa ni tho ga ma med pa nas nyon mongs pas bcings pas 'khor ba'i ra h+ya ba dang
211b4(rnying rgyud): lag par 'khad pa/ rgya/ dal ad+ya kar po ni mtho ris thar par 'gro ba'i gzhi/ yin na// de la/ nra spyod pa'i phyir/ pad+ma nas yig 'bru rnams yang la gsal bar dgang / brgyad par gnas// A b+ha badz+ra A yu Sha hA A/ a las drangs pa'i/ gsang sngags ba6
211b5(rnying rgyud): brgyad kyis gti mug s+tha da// hr-I las drangs pa brgya rtsa brgyad kyis ni zhe sdang sang tr-i las drangs pa brgya rtsa brgyad kyis nang rgyal kyang la// 'dod chags hr-i las drangs pa brgya rtsa brgyad kyis 'dod chags skad las phrag dog hA las drangs pa brgya rtsa brgyad kyis phrag dag sbyang zhes bya
211b6(rnying rgyud): 'ad lnga dkadang mad ser mthing lnga ba las 'od 'phos te/ ni la phog pas dug lnga sbyangs// ye shes lnga dang ldan pa' ni yang kha dag lnga/ 'i rang bzhin du gnas pa de/ par// 'phos nas don gnyis byas tshur 'dus ta na la thim pas hUM du gyur// a las 'od
211b7(rnying rgyud): 'pho sa 'du sabs zla ba 'gab sa kha sbyor du gyur pa dang hAM/ du gyar rgya las 'od 'gas/ ba yul de na gnyis byas 'od phreng chen por gnas par 'gyur/ sngags 'di brjod pas ye shes sems dpa' su chan gang bar gyur par bsam/ s+pho Ta badz+ra ma twa a A/ ye
212a1(rnying rgyud): shes sems dpa' chen gang / parda la dbang bkrar babyin pa rnasaH/ dbang byin nas// zla ba ga rtsa'anang na pad+ma'i yig 'brugs la/ @\u0f7f/ da las// 'od 'gros pas bad gshegs kyu sra dang ye shes
212a2(rnying rgyud): dang // khams gsum rtse 'gro ba'i bkrag dang gzi mdangs dang // rtsi bcud thams cad bsdus nas ye shes sems dpa' zla bar bcas/ pal/ bub 'ug// 'dus te thim par bsam mo// ma gsal bar du bzlas pa bya/ 'o// 'di ni yang dag
212a3(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi tshe sgrub yin// rdzas dang yo byad dag la rag ma lus thugs le shes kyi man dag gi bgrub pa'o// bsrub pa'i dus na grang sangs nas nyi ma ma shar ba'i bar dang / nyi ma/ nub nas sa ni ma sros pa'i bar du bya/ ste/ 'dis ni// tshe la dang
212a4(rnying rgyud): ba'i rig 'dzin 'thob par byed pa'i// ye shes thags kyi man ngag bsgrub pa'o// / gzhan don byed par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas// ling tshe dgu pa'i dbus su gtso bo le'u tshe bcad la lha mo bcad dkyil 'khor bar thams 'kho bo brtsa/ sgo dang
212a5(rnying rgyud): bcas// bum pa tshe chang zan la mda' dar dmar// dkyil 'khor yang na ci reg bkod pa dang // mtshams bcad dpal gyi dkyil 'khor bsgred byas nas// sma sha nag mo tshe yi pho nya mngags// tshe bdag chen mo he ru ka/ thugs mchog
212a6(rnying rgyud): dbang du sbrang mdzad tsho'i srang ma rta mgrin dpal// gza' skar 'joms pa'i steng phyogs nyi blag pa' gang lag nas tshe 'bugs pa'i rtsa/ hUM kA ra/ shar tshogs// dri za'i lag nas tshe 'grags pa'i lha 'dul ba rnam par rgyal/ shar gyo drang srong me lha'i lag nas tshe 'dug
212a7(rnying rgyud): ga/ dbyug sngon drang song me lha 'joms/ !/ 'che bdag gal ga nang jog 'brog pa tshar gcod gshin rje gshed/ rto // srin po'i 'ganas thag 'thabs pa/ 'dul ba mi g.yo mgon/ nu thobs// klu rnams kyi rag nas dpa' 'phrog pa'i
212b1(rnying rgyud): bsrung mdzad rta mchog dpal/ rbab kyang // rlung lta 'a lag nas dngags 'brog par 'joms pa'i gzhan mi thub/ byang thogs// gnang sbyin cing gdan pa nga pyod 'khrugs par \u0f7f/ dbang bskur bdud rtsa 'khyil// bgegs rnams kyi gnas srog 'phrog pa bsnga
212b2(rnying rgyud): mdzad khams gsam rgyal// stobs chen gyis klaganyanas bdag gi gnas tsho 'dren/ 'dul// mkha' 'grom bcad bral ba// shar nas dkar mo'i mdzad ma// lho nas rkun mo rgyas mdzad ma// nub nas mongs mo dbang skad ma// byang nas thal
212b3(rnying rgyud): byed gsong la brtson// spos mo dang ni sde mo dang // gtum mo chen mo mtshogs ma// sma sha nag mo tshe yi pho nya bdag/ tshe bdag chen mos tshe drongs la// 'chi med rdo rje dpal gyi be'u ru// mi 'gyur brtan par mdzad dedu gsol/ lha rang cang gi
212b4(rnying rgyud): to ngo nabs la drags 'dis sanan// sA yudz+nyA na dz+nyAn dzaH/ dus gsum bde bar gshegs pa mchod// sgra gsung thugs kyi dngos grub paste// 'gro ba rigs drug gi sgrib pa spang // wa dang ye shes mthu dang byin thabs dang // @
212b5(rnying rgyud): dang gzi mdangs thams cad nas te/ thugs kyi ga'ung bsdu// bzlas pa/ khro bcas srid pa'i rlung gis yang mi thar bar bsung / stebazlas brjod pa'o// de nas dkyil 'khor brdza bar 'dod na// snang grags chos rnams thams cad gzhal yas bang pa
212b6(rnying rgyud): rta mgrin 'ab/ gzhal yas 'dus/ tam grin yang // khrig 'thung thags kyi lhal he san la bsdu ya la zhes sems dpar 'dus/ deyang kyil nga// d+h+waM ga/ de yang nges pa/ zag la spyi gtsug tshangs par 'thag zam/ bas ba'i gtsug kor thab pa'o//
212b7(rnying rgyud): bdag bdud bcom dbu yi gtsug tor 'grub// thugs kyi glu nyid lu yi gtso bor gyur// mo yi rig 'dzin nyi zla'i tshe dang mnyam// zhes gsungs so// he ru ka'i gal po las/ rdo rje cho bsgrub pa ste btag pa bcu dgu pa'o//
213a1(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'grob ngan sang nas dang pa'i dgangs pa 'di ga gsangs sa/ gangagag tso 'das nus zhug gsus pa ma latad rang lags pa gnas/ ba// nganas 'das pa

213a3(rnying rgyud): dbang dra 'thobs na bdun tshigs shes bya'o// / bar do'i gnas nas thugs rjes drang ba'i phyir// rtsu ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i lho phyogs su// dmyal ba grugasum sgo gcig dbus ni rje// yi dgas bla ga ma sgo gcig bre dmar dbus//
213a4(rnying rgyud): 'gro zlum po du ni rgya mtsho'i dbus// sog ka sga gcig nr-i dbus gleng bzhi'i mi// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi lha min su ser po// pad+ma 'dab brgyad a dkar lha yi gnas// bum pa rdzas dang gzungs thag kha rgyan bcas/ khyad pa
213a5(rnying rgyud): mchod pa// s+phan ra ka gtor ma gsam dang thun mong mchod pa lnga/ 'phags pa// lcags kyu bgegs bslang ba gu gu la nyung dkar sngags kyi mda'// rtsabarten dang bral ba'i gshed 'bral lo// mtshan// lha yi thub pa brtson 'grus chos nyon phyag mtshan

213a7(rnying rgyud): grub pa bsam gtan me dang rgya/ dmyal khams rdo rje gdan gyi 'og nas 'dren// gnas gang na gnas na// dmyal ba'i srog snying sa bon yi ge hri nag po// yi dag sa gnas grong khyer ser lha'i gnas na madrongs// bkres hom srog gi
213b1(rnying rgyud): snying po ze dmar po// dud 'gro gyi li rgya mtsho chen po'i nang // sgren lpags srog snying du ni dud kar gnas// mi yi gnas ni gleng bzhi gling phran bcas// 'gyur byed ni ljang mi yi thab snying yin// re rab khong sang nang na lha min gnas//
213b2(rnying rgyud): rtsod lha min srog snying ser po su// lha yi gnas ni ri rab rtsel gnas// de yi srog rnying a dkar 'dod yon chags// / lha yi yon tan ni mngon par shes pa mnga'// lha ma yin gyi yon tan ni mgo bcad 'byang bar 'gyur// mi
213b3(rnying rgyud): dam chog sdom pas lam sna 'dren// byol song rnams ni lto gos btsal bar sla// yi dgas zas skom bsngos pas tshims par 'gyur// dmyal ba sngon gyi las dran snga phyi shes// / tshe rang lha yin lha mi ni rtag tu 'thab bden/
213b4(rnying rgyud): ba mi la lto gos gnyis kyis byangs// sdug bsngal gyi sdug brdal brtseg mar spyod pa'i byol song dang // bkres skom yi dgas tsha grang dmyal ba'i gnas// rang bzhin gnas pa'i bar do / gnas lugs kyi don rtogs par bya/ gzhi ru gan

213b6(rnying rgyud): bzlas theg par ma 'gyur yang / gdang chen de/ lteng ka'i chud+ha gnas twa mdzub mo reg tsam 'dren/ sri sag 'dod// gsan po 'das na dge 'chen pa byas pa las gzhin pa'i dus su dge bachung nga lan pa tshang/ mi brgyas mi thab lam log kyang //
213b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i dpe// ting 'dzin phra mos rang gi gnas su 'gugs// kye ba nam bzhinas dkrugs thabs// sgong skyes bcag nas mngal gyi nang nas 'jal// skye ba blangs nas khro bor sprul nas bskal// rdzas sdes de ma thag tu 'grags pa dang /
214a1(rnying rgyud): mas mamam da// lcags kyi gtan bcung yang tha gting du 'gro// de nyid thabs la mkhas na ad+hASh+Ta 6a na mkha' la'/ drug na ma dga' gas pa pa byas// rnam shes rags kyingamags sa/ phung po rnam
214a2(rnying rgyud): dag pa'i/ dang porjes rgya 'asogs la ma long gis byas gsol den mi cang la thasaH/ cud nu bong mgatsang sar bathal lo// me long ye shes su khrus kyis// zhe sdang nyon mongs bag chags bkrus// maM bskyod rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur// gzugs kyi phung po
214a3(rnying rgyud): rnam dag pa'i// chos dbyings ye shes khrus gsol bas/ ma rig gti mug bag chags spang // rnam par snang mdzad su thob shog/ yon tan gyi// tshor ba'i phung po rnam dag pa'i// mnyam nyid ye shes khrus gsol bas//

216b5(rnying rgyud): mar me dmar me btang snyoms tri/ chang ma wang bu'o// ye shes bzhi las shar ba yi// me lo ngas ye shes las sgeg mo/ mnyam nyid ye shes las/ phreng ba ma dang so sor rtog pa las/ gleng bu ma dang bya bgrub pa las gar/ mkhan mo// gzugs kyi nya mo dkar ro// ni rnam par/

216b7(rnying rgyud): thabs gsum gyis gzung 'don gyi da'i gas sosor bya'o/ tshogs bsla la spro bar bya// dza 'iny+dza/ dzu le hA/ s+pha ra Na tsasa?/ dngod po slob/ au nAM 'khor lo nam dang / hUM thAM/ rdo rje mi rtsod/ sA tAM/ rin chen kon mchog dpa pa/ a d+h+waM/ brda blang mtha'/ hA tAM/ ral gri don drang// dang po phrar
217a1(rnying rgyud): 'ad yon drug gis nyamo sams pa mchod// gnyis pa dam rdzas bdud cas 'a bsam pa bshags/ pa \u0f7f// gsum pa zam pa dgra bgegs pa gzugs phung byams bsgrub/ ba / chags 'dzin pa por thod pa
217a2(rnying rgyud): sa kyi dal zas pa// gzigs shig mdzes pa dam pa'i chos// 'di lang bdus rje'i rgyalas byas pa yin zhes gtsang migang gi/ be tsom bya mi nad // bram ze gapadas la khyi dang zag gdol pa A Na mig med pa gsum// rang bzhin gcig la dgongs la
217a3(rnying rgyud): gsol/ len po brjod pa bde par gshegs so chos kyi mchog/ gzung 'dzin dri ma med pa yi/ bamal gyi zhin pa dag pas// 'dod chags dri ma dang bral bas// de kho na nyid la bdag phyag 'tshal/ 8/ de nas smon lam gdab par bya/ 8// rtag ma
217a4(rnying rgyud): chas gzug pa ni rtag tor ba grus te ga gsum ga ga zus pa'i nga ba na sa yod pon chogs dang ldan par byin pa 'o// lhag ma'i dkyil 'kho rtsa chas su gzug pa ni byang shar mtshams// zhing lpags mapo lus mnyams pa la nang pa'i bar du med ma r+thag bdun rtsi/ rakas zla ga ma e// rnal
217a5(rnying rgyud): 'byor bcas su gzhug pa ni dpal gyi chas brgyad gsol// gtor ma chas phug zhug pa ni/ bru~M hi laT bye'i sngags kyis dpal gyi gtor ma la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed par bya/ ste las kyi bzlas pa rgya zhing mchod bstab rgya'o// hU~M ha he phaT Sh+yo// dang po// dbyings
217a6(rnying rgyud): nas rnam par bskul ba ri gnas ni// byin gyis yang dag par brlab pa 'iganas dang / gsumaH// thabs chen yab kyiganas tu bstan pa dang / bzhin/ shes rab yum gyi gnas du gnas pa dang / wa/ khro mo gau rI ba chung rgyag nas rnams dang / dras za// yul
217a7(rnying rgyud): pra me na ciganas chen mo dang / ban/ ye shes sgom bzhi po driganas rnams// yang gri gnas 'dun dkyil labor stedang/ !/ ma hA rA tra phaT phaT/ a li brdangs u li mdza sa tA li praH ba ta pa li/ do / daMSh+Ta mche can go nA yon tan ro'u hri/ drag go// kha ra ro zhig yo gi Sh+Tha
217b1(rnying rgyud): 'a gas rba/ mang mas nas/ mju / gcan/ kA da / mas can/ / maSh+Ta / su// thugs sa ma thab ma drug ta// gtang ba ldan pathag
217b2(rnying rgyud): dam pa / dpal kyi snrel tam zin hU~M/ de na zhags ti mdapa' kyinams/ ga nyi te/ 'dage sa da pa bad nag ta me 'jam zhon zhe ba med na ma ga ma ba
217b3(rnying rgyud): mkhang dbyings phyag sa rab ldan pas// sma nga sa ga bas da pa rnas pa gtogs grags pa kyis pa bcu su rgya sa cas/ mabamacan me sku bangar mdza

217b5(rnying rgyud): A ga tA yA a ga tA ya/ rang lag na sngags rgya tshogs pa mang po tho te/ dz+rakaM 'dzas lhag ma la dbang ba dpag pa'i sngags so// pra ba sha ya pra pa sha ye/ bin d+ha sa ba na d+ha ya~M/ to nA ya to sha ya/ mo ha ya mo ha ya/ badz+ranA tA ts+tsha dza dza/ tha
217b6(rnying rgyud): jig/ pa ga ya 'o/ a kardza ya A kar+sa// za ba sha ya pra ba sha ya/ ban d+ha ma ban d+ha ya/ bar+b+banA na na/ ha / pa/ da pa' nalags sa dkrug

218b1(rnying rgyud): ya ma AH// grangs da lags/ mahA par+dz+dza a rba ta ar+d+ha bad+d+hi dz+nyAsarba// zhes gsungs sa// he ru ka gal ba can pa las/ chags kyi 'khar las mnyes par bya ba dang / lhag mas mnyes par bya ba'i brtag pargya ta
