218b3(rnying rgyud): bsgom// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// bdag gi lus la snang mdzad gzhag/ snying gar yi ge oM bsams pas// sngags kyi rnam par shes pa bsgom// 'gog pa'i rdo rje sems nyid du// nam
218b4(rnying rgyud): zhig de la rab tu 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi mdzod 'dzin pa// yid bzhin dpal ldan 'dra bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// bdag gi lus la mtha' yas gzhag/ snying ga'i a la rnam shes gtang //
218b5(rnying rgyud): 'gog pa sems nyid sangs rgyas mchog/ nam mkha' dbus su sangs rgyas rnams// bdag lus rdo rje sems dpa' nyid// hUM gi 'gog pa reg gyur ma// sangs rgyas mchog 'dzin dpal ldan 'gyur// 'di ni 'gog pa'i rnal
218b6(rnying rgyud): 'byor pa// sku dang gsung thugs sgrub pa'o// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rnam par sdang mdzad rab tu bsgom// snying gar yi ge oM bsams nas// sems nyid thig ler gyur pa gzhag/ sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus
218b7(rnying rgyud): gnas par// tshe dpag med pa rab tu bsgom// snying gar yi ge AM basnrums te// sems ni theg le dakhyer par gzhag/ sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rdo rje ma bapyod rab tu bsgom// snying gang yig hUM bsams nas// sems ni thig
219a1(rnying rgyud): yar gyur par gzhag/ 'dun thog pa'i rnal 'byor// / sru dang gsang thugs thub pa'o// rdo rje nam mkha'i dbyings gnas par// gsapa pa'i dkyil 'khor ba sgom par \u0f7f// sras dag sems la phos
219a2(rnying rgyud): su
219a3(rnying rgyud): d+haM// bsams na de ni bskal par gnas// de ni bskal bar gnas pa yi// tshwa yi reg 'dzin gsum pa grub po// dur kyi khyod la sogs pa'i gnas// bsam gtan bsdus pa 'di dag bzlum// maM bapyod le gas dag la sogs// rdo rje nam mkha'i dkyil du
219a4(rnying rgyud): bsam// mngon shes lnga po'i sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas mchog gi gnas su bsgom// rdo rje chen po rtse lnga pa// 'bar ba lnga la sogs pas brgyan// gnas lnga dag tu sbyor ba yis// rdo rje mngon shes 'dra bar 'gyur// ga bur tsan+dan sbyar ba yi// r-i lu lcags
219a5(rnying rgyud): gsum gyis dkris pa// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo // glang po a ga ru sbyar ba'i// ril bu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// rdo rje stobs po che 'i gyur ro// rdo rje 'dzin pa gang
219a6(rnying rgyud): yang rung // phyag rgya chen por byin brlabs nas// de ni dpal dang ldan pa yi// sangs rgyas 'od dang 'dra bar 'gyur// 'dod khams gnas pa'i bu mo ni// lha yi longs spyod brtul zhugs ma'am// yang na gzugs khams gnas pa la// stobs
219a7(rnying rgyud): chen gyis ni 'dod pa phud// gal te byang chub mchog 'dod na// lag pa'i phyag rgya mi bcing ngo // mchod rten dag gi las mi bya// glegs pa ma bklag par mi bya zhing // dkyil 'khor dag kyang yongs mi bri// rdo rje gsum mchog phyag mi bya// sangs
219b1(rnying rgyud): sa kya chub sems dpa' dang // dang rgyal nyan thas dbazhin// / sku gsung thugs sa sbyar bAn// phyag 'tshal na nam dung 'gyur// sems can nams lam ngan// bsam gtan dang bskul bar bya// rdo rje gsum kyi rgyag tu la na
219b2(rnying rgyud): rdo rje'i thig de gdab pa dang // tshon rtsi rnams ni 'gyed pa dang // ljags ni sems dpas mi bya ste// b+h+yas na byang chub rnyed par dka'// skra dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i// rnal 'byu 'di ltar phyin chad ni// bklag gam yang na sems cad
219b3(rnying rgyud): nga // rdo rje 'dzin par de yang 'gyur// gtar sra bzod gsol dkyil 'khor bsra// smon lam bkra shes tho brdungs te// dge ba tham dag bshags pa dang // rgyun gyi ting 'dzin nan tan bya// bkang gso' las la rab 'bar nas/
219b4(rnying rgyud): gos mdas brgya dang rtsa brgyad kyis// bka' mi phung ma bsang ba dang // h+ye ts+tsha ke ye thugs mangs kyi// kun kyang sems can don du 'tsho// byang chub mchog ni zab par 'gyur// zhipa gsungs sa// he ru ga gang tsho man po las
219b5(rnying rgyud): bsam gtan gyi brtag pa ste nyi shu gsum pa'o// / de nas dam pa'i rigs can rnam pa lngas mchod pas mchod de/ pad+ma raka ni rgal/ ka ma la mu ka ni/ lo ka ban d+ha na/ sarbakarma pra tsam/ chos la chags pa chags pa ste/
219b6(rnying rgyud): yul la chags pa chags pa'i mchog/ 'gro ba'i gtsal phyag 'tshal lo// las rnams thams cad rdzogs gyur te// ga yang dam nyams chag bkang gyur cig/ dpa' gi khyo la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag cag lung 'di gzung ba
219b7(rnying rgyud): pa rtsi// zhes brjod pas/ gsang ba'i bdag pa chos kyi srung napa/ dam pa'i rigs can rnams kyis rjes su babyung ngo // he r+tha 'i gal po zhas bya ba sung bams ca kyi rgyal brdzags// pa na yang ta 'du/ dbas kya la zhes kyi /
220a1(rnying rgyud): nag+sa nas sa / rUb/ bdan na da bag nga 'dus pa chu sa na/ dpas tha la sa pablo// 'dog dgagis byas pa sa tagan/ bcom pan 'dub bzhi gshegs pa ma
220a2(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin/ sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i rtag la bde ba chen po'i dbyings/ gsang ba mchog gi gzhal yas khang / zab mo 'dus pa'i bdag nyid/ nyams bzhi byed pa'i gnas/ rtse mo thig le chen pos mngon par bstan pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang ni
220a3(rnying rgyud): b+hA/ thig la chen po kyang chung kyi sems rdo/ ma lus pa 'dus pa'i nying pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi steng pos byin gyis brlabs pa/ yid bzhin na nor bu rin pa'i/ khams gsum gyi dbang brnyes pa/ bajarnam par dag pa gsung gi dbyangs mnga' ba/ 'thob ma lus pa
220a4(rnying rgyud): phrin las kyis 'jal bar mdzad pa tAM/ 'di ltar rnamamapa'i dbyings dang mnyam pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po/ btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa dang / sa bcu'i dbang phyug rgyal ba'i sras su gyur pa/ btsun mo tshogs dang bcas pa dang / gdug pa 'jub zhing kyi
220a5(rnying rgyud): tsi log tshang gtsad par mdzad pa'i pi TIg kr-i ta la sogs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa dang / gzhan yang 'khor gling gi rdul snyed dang bcas par thabs cig datu bzhugs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen po de nyid kyis/ phyogs thams cad du rnam par gan
220a6(rnying rgyud): ta gas brgya dang stod bcu dang rtsi nang dpa dmas gsum dang / zhing khams dngas dang lam du bcas pa rnam par gzigs so// de ltar khyab pa chen po dang / chags pa chen po dang / mdzes pa chen po dang / zil gnon pa rjing pa'i tshul gyis gzigs pas/ malus
220a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i thig le chen po'i rang bzhin dmigs pa med par thugs su chud par gyur to// dgyes pa'i byin rlabs las/ thugs ka dang ljags dang lci bo las 'od sna tshogs byung ste/ khyab pa dang gsal ba dang 'joms pa dang / nyams bskyed par gyur nas/ phyogs bcu'i zhing
220b1(rnying rgyud): yangs su kyangs te/ rgyal ba'i sras su gyur te/ rgyal ba'i nying khams rdul phra mo skad kyi sangs cas byed kyil 'khor dang bcas pa 'dus par gyur te/ de dag la phyag 'tshal zhing 'di ska rjes brjod par gyur te// e ma 'o sangs rgyas thams cad ni// rgya chen gdod nas
220b2(rnying rgyud): sde med de// 'dul ba'i thabs kyi khyad par gyis// mdzad pa sna tshogs bstan pa legs// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlabs kyis/ sku gsung thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la/ dus gsum du nyams bzhi'i
220b3(rnying rgyud): tshul gyis dga' bar mdzad de/ rdo rje snying po'i tshul gyis pad+ma'i snying po la zhugs par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sras dang bcas pas 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi phyin chubs kyis// brtul
220b4(rnying rgyud): zhugs gsum la gnas bya'i phyir// dbang bskur bdag la gnang ba rtsol// zhes gsol pa las/ de ma thag tu zhal bstan pa dang / thig le chen po dang bde ba chen po dang / ye shes par chad med pa'i dbang ba lung nas/ ma lus pa'i thig le chen po'i rang bzhin
220b5(rnying rgyud): du gsal bar gyur te/ skra dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i rang bzhin du dbyer med par gyur to// de nas nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa'i rdul ba rgya mtsho rnams kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dam tshig gsum la gnas pa yis// bar chad med pa'i sa phyogs
220b6(rnying rgyud): su// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed de// ma lus dag pa gsum bsgoms nas// rgyal ba'i pho brang dag par bsgom// rang bzhin ji lta bzhin bsgoms la// rgyal ba yab yum sras dang bcas// sko bar bcas te bsam par bya// dbyer med mchod
220b7(rnying rgyud): bzlas brtan thob nas// brtul lugs gsum ni brtag par bya// shin tu yid dga'is phyogs dang // sa yi bya ba kun byas nas// tshad dang ldan pa'i steg pu brtsam// nyi shu lnga ldan dag pa der// bla ma yum dang ldan pa yis// brgyal gsal bar byin brlabs/
221a1(rnying rgyud): u// ras pa gangs nyis ldan na// ma thag tha// dngage slo zhen par// migags rdzus / mig par ba can da// nam pa 'a la la ba ba ngas da// dam pa
221a2(rnying rgyud): brgya zung // ma byung byung bar byen pa rna sa// rang nga gnas rtsams pa gnyug/ dung na pa'i thab pa dag// masangs tham thas sengs pa skyed de// lhag par gdas pa ba // rin can dzadang 'brus lnga dang // dgram ngam rje
221a3(rnying rgyud): dgapa// tshigasam thabs pa n+d+ha // tham pa ga khyo m+b+ha// gro bzhi ldan pa coM TIg// rgyan dang na bzung zung ba dang // yid rang skye pa 'byor pas brjod// mdag pa ni mtshams gardad cid// dag pa'i hU~M na
221a4(rnying rgyud): dgan// Sh+Ta 'dzin lnga bskyed gsapa 'i sgoms pa// bzlas dang 'gro'ang thun mi gcad// rjes pa ldan pa'i lhas tho nas// nul 'byor bdag nyid 'dug par ste// de nas tha ma mnyes rgyas la// tshe gnas par shes pa yis// lus ldan pa nyig 'dzin pa

221a6(rnying rgyud): rang rtog pa las bstan pa'i// cho ga'i rim pa la brten pas// brtson 'grum ting 'dzin ldan pa yis/ !tshe 'di nyid la 'thub par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// dpal ho r+tha/ 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ gled gzhi dang / dpa 'a do rje 'dzin pa'i co ga'i ris pa brtan 'i/

221b1(rnying rgyud): ngags/ bal dag cig na byung/ la nag dgun gyu // rtson srog gyu bas/ 'khor ba dongs pa lta thos Na ci na pas/ log pa pa bangan du btas pas/ rmed pa gdum kyi bdag par brtags par bya /
221b2(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten cad dbang du bzlas nas/ rgyu rdzam mag par rjin pa dig thigs nas/ dkyil li kyi la la mas 'di da ces bzlapa to// \u0f7f// ma bcos blan med kyang chub zhing ni// mi 'ag mi byar zig pa stong ba te// mardzogs tham rtan pa
221b3(rnying rgyud): 'di// thag sa pa sa du la// dang bde ca rgyas btsugs // grag sang thugs pa na rdul pa'i yul sa// gcag pam sus kya nas// ma bca m+ha ba la pa gcwol/ ma
221b4(rnying rgyud): 'drub bas/ ma ldan 'dus dekyis pachen po sa 'phrul pa nyin nas gnas pas/ ma pa ba bcas pa nyid kyi skul rim par dzig par to// / 'di sa dang babadag zhes pa zhing // gnyis pa ga ma ba
221b5(rnying rgyud): brjong ma// stong gsu rim pas sgra rla grags// de las phyags rten gyi dab ste// tha ma du gas nges par blta// g.yas dkar ga yon dmar dbus mthing shal// rdo rje sa nr-i tshwa g.yas// rjel du drang dmar ldazhigs zla na// yu yang yang dang
221b6(rnying rgyud): dzin papa// gams kyi pa pa la ti/ gangan ba dung po ni kyi phyog// drang rgyad parang kyidang // brjengs tshul brjed pa'i tshum gyis pazugs// dkris pa zhi la pa tham 'bar rlom te/ pa'i dgral dang // @
221b7(rnying rgyud): ya ma rnams// bkrim pas dang ras grol du bzhugs// gas pa' bram khri mab rgyad// rnga mad brgyad dang klas pa bzhi// 'bar ma brgyad dang bcas pa yi// bkang tan nyi cu rtsa brgyad ldan// mkhang mdza tshags dang mame dun// slong mau
222a1(rnying rgyud): gang chen dang // pho nya yang srul sum brgya dang // drug tunyi khri bdun byung chags// rdorje rig 'dzin la sogs pa// 'khor mo'i tshul du thabs cig bzhugs// de nas gsang bdag rdorje 'dzin// ma lus gsang ba'i mdzod 'dzin pa// dbye//
222a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i gar dang dbyangs dang bcas// lus dang mdzes pas spyan sngar 'jug/ brtag pa'i chog legs par dris// dpal chen he ru ka yi don// rang bzhin thabs dang 'bras bu gang // he zhes bya ba gang ci zhig/ Ta zhes bya ba gang gi don// gzhes bstan pa
222a3(rnying rgyud): zhig/ blta ba'i don ni ji lta bu// spyod pa'i khyad par gang dag lags// rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gang dag lags// ting nge 'dzin ni ji lta bu// dag pa gsum zhes ji lta bu// dbang gi khyad par ji ltar bskur// spyod dang khyad par dam tshig gang //
222a4(rnying rgyud): thun mong ma yin pa'i// bsrub pa'i khyad par ji lta bu/ phrin las rim pa gang zhig lags// he ru ka ru bdag sbyor ba'i// lam gyi rim pa gang dag lags// dpa' bo chen pos bshad du gsol// dpa' bos bskul ba gsan nas kyang // cho 'phrul chen po can
222a5(rnying rgyud): bstan nas// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'khrigs pa can// bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba yis// ma dag pa ni mtshams bcad nas// gang zag dam par byin brlabs nas// gsang ba'i bstan pa bsngags par mdzad// e ma ho sangs rgyas thams cad ces/
222a6(rnying rgyud): dri med ye shes he ru ka/ nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor sna tshogs ston// rang bzhin kun gyi rang bzhin te// thabs ni phyi nang sbas pa gsum// 'bras bu rang bzhin mthar phyin pas// he ni dgyes bachen po nyid// rbani chags pa pade chen po// ka ne phrin pas
222a7(rnying rgyud): mdzad par shang // blta ba ma bcos chos nyid ma// spyod 'asgo gsum tha 'dor med// lha dang dngos phub dbang la sogs// snying po byung bani ldan rdzogs pas// 'byung bzhi dkyil ba'i dkyil 'khor te// gang dang gang drugasal ba'i yid/
222b1(rnying rgyud): yengs pa nyid ting 'dzin te// dag pas dag pa gsum du brjod// gang gis gang la gang bskur ba// rgyud dag nus pa thob kyir dbang // ma lus sgo gsum khyab par dag/ bdag dang gzhan gyir mi 'gal ba// spyi dang khyad par dam chag mchog/ rab
222b2(rnying rgyud): 'don pam dang 'bras bu dang // tshe dang pra dang ro langs dang // rkang mthogs mkha' 'grol sogs pa// bsgrub pas bslab pa nyid du bshad// ni dang rgyas dang dbang drag nyid// mdzad pa ldan las nyid du brjod// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes ni/
222b3(rnying rgyud): bsam gyis mi khyabar 'byung ste// ma lus nam dag byang chub sems// thig le chen por byas gcig rdzogs// chos kun rang sems me long la// kun gyi gzugs brtan rang shar ba// de dag de yi rang bzhin te// ma lus bde gshegs snang ba nyid//
222b4(rnying rgyud): rlabs sna tshogs bsam yas pa// rdo rje 'dzin nas rtsi shing sogs// rang rang nus pa sna tshogs kyis// ma lus kun gyi bsam pa ltar// dpag med che ba sna tshogs ston// stong la stong min he ru ka/ bde chen rnam 'phrul sna tshogs gzugs// zhi ba zhi dang
222b5(rnying rgyud): khrol khro// chags la chags dang rmongs la mongs// dregs la ri bo mnyam la mnyam// 'byung la 'byung ba 'dod la 'dod// le lo ser sna de bzhin te// thabs mkhas 'dul ba sna tshogs pa// ji ltar 'tshams par rnam par gnas// zhes gsungs so//
222b6(rnying rgyud): dpal he ru ka 'dus pa'i tan+da las gleng gzhi dang / rgyud kyi snying po 'byung ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas gsang ba'i bdag pa yis// malus drag pos 'dul ba'i phyir// thabs mkhas rol pa'i brda' yis ni// kun mkhyed khyod la gsopa na
222b7(rnying rgyud): 'debs// kun mkhyen rgyal pos mnyes gzigs nas// 'bar zhing rngam pa'i mdangs kyis ni// 'jig rten khams kun sbas bkang nas// bskal pa'i me ltar drag cing 'bar// phyi nang bgegs rnams thams cad 'byer// oM ba hu be d+ha/ ro hu ti/ @
223a1(rnying rgyud): ti/ a sha Sha/ ni she Sha bA da bi na ya/ bi d+ya ga ta/ tsa le pra tsa le/ gurba bu tha/ bi gu rba sarba badz+ra shaM ba le/ tsa le tsa le/ oM ru lu ru l+ya hUM b+h+yo hUM// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor sna tshogs 'phros// cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/
223a2(rnying rgyud): rjod bdud bcas pa dang // grangs las 'das pa'i lha rnams ni// rig pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dbus med// phyogs bcu dus bzhi khyab par snang // dngos su'i glan gyi rtsu ba ni// bsnyen pa dang ni las lpags te// 'di dag yid bzhin no wA/
223a3(rnying rgyud): lus da ltar 'grub par 'gyur// bsnyen pa'i yi ge 'bru brgyad la// rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs pas na// yan lag ma lus rang rdzogs pas// dngos grub ma lus rdzogs te gnas// gang du bsnyen pa gsum rdzogs nas// rab 'bring tha ma'i rtags
223a4(rnying rgyud): thob na// brgyud pa'i yul dang bral bas na// tshe 'dir sangs rgyas nyid thob na// dngos grub gzhan lha smos ci dgos// sgrub pa po dang gzungs ma dang // rdzas dang grogs dag bzhi pa ste// dag pa'i rgyud la snang ba ni// me long bzhin la snang ba yin//
223a5(rnying rgyud): bsnyen pa'i dkyil 'khor gsal bsgoms shing // 'od gsal byin rlabs gnas thob nas// sbyor ba'am thig ler thob pas bzlas// tshe 'dir sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur// dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// tshe dang lha bzhi dmar ser ba// bkra shis
223a6(rnying rgyud): dag pa'i zhal zas la// rtags thob bar du bzlas bskyed na// mi 'chi tshe yi dngos grub 'thob// drag po'i sbyor pa gsal pe yis// bdun 'bum sngon du song pa yis// ku gul sbyar ma bsreg bya zhing // stong rtsa bkyad du bzlas byas na// grong dang
223a7(rnying rgyud): yul phyogs thams cad du// bgegs ni ma lus 'thos par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor steng po ldan bkod nas// mu khyun rdo rjer ba la// las sngags bkod de byin brlabs nas// 'dun 'bum grangs tshang ga bur bcug/ grong dang sgo dang zhing srang dang /
223b1(rnying rgyud): rirtsal sogs gar bzhag pa// ser pa dang ni nad dang gdon// ma lus pa ni zhi bar 'gyur// gro ga ras dang dar sogs la// bris shing byin brlab bsnyen rdzogs nas// lus sam gtsug phud mgul btags na// tshe ring nad mad bde ba dang // dgrang
223b2(rnying rgyud): bgegs kyis 'tshe ba med// thal chen mu zi nyung dkar la// bye ba'am bdun 'bum bzlas byas te// rdzang dang 'ba' chur dor byas na// lo legs 'bru ni 'phel bar 'gyur// gu gul nag pos byugs pa yi// zang phrom pa dang tshi chen pa// bzlas shing 'chag
223b3(rnying rgyud): bdug byung na// skyo ba ma lus zhi bar 'gyur// thag dang nyung nag tshil chen la// bdun 'bum ze ba bzlas nas ni// chu mig 'gram du bsreg byas na// dmigs pa nad kyis 'ji bar 'gyur// tsan+dan dkar po mar mar dang // srang pos bachi phyir bya
223b4(rnying rgyud): zhad gzar sar brdzus byugs na// gzer nad ma lus zhi bar 'gyur// bdud ci lnga la ling+ga byas// drag po'i phur ba lnga nyid la// bsnyen rdzogs nyi shu gcig bzlas nas// gnas rdzar btab na 'chi bar 'grul// drag po'i hom khung nag po Ta// mtshan mar bcas
223b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i ling+ga la// bsnyen rdzogs nyi shu gcig bzlas te// gnanan g.yo ba med par 'gyur// rabs chad rdza'amathod pa la// sngon bzhin 'khor lo sngags bcas bri// byin brlabs kha srab gar bzhag sar// ser ba chen po gcod par 'gyur// ga byar shes
223b6(rnying rgyud): dad tsan+dan dkar// bzlas shing rang la gang 'chad pa// rimA dang gnod pas mi tshugs shing // lus yang nad med byed par 'gyur// til dang tsan+dan dkar po dang // zho dang mar dang 'o ma la// bzlas shing sbyin bsreg byas ni ni// 'dus dang nad bgegs zhi bar
223b7(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// gang du las rnams kun byed pa// de nyid rten 'brel las byung ste// gang la gang brten 'bras byung // 'don rten cing 'jal 'gyur ba'i// chos nyid sa dang rtsog dang // thabs kyis rten cing 'brel dzin// gad ngag ci dgar thub pa na// rgya
224a1(rnying rgyud): byas sdang ni bsngags pa ste/ dag dang ma dag khyad par dang // lag dang ma lag cad par las// bde dang thug bsngal sna tshogs 'phrul// gsang sngags thabs kyi byin nabs bris// mapas tshe 'phrul snang ba bya// dza ba rgyan rlabs
224a2(rnying rgyud): khyad par can// sna tshogs ngo bo nyid du snang // de bzhin chos rnams thams cad kyang // ngo bo nyid kyi khyad par can// gang gi byin rlabs sna tshogs pa// mthun pa nyid du de ltar snang // chos kun ngo bo nyid snang ba// phyogs dang bral ba'i byang chu sems//
224a3(rnying rgyud): du snang zhing snying po med// ma lus mkha' ltar khyab pa'i sems// rtag tu rang gi ngo bos stong // mtha' dbus gzhi n+da las 'das pa// thabs chen gsang sngags dang bral ba'i// che ba'i che ba zab mod de// lung dang rigs me la sogs pa'i// rtog ge de spyod
224a4(rnying rgyud): yul rnams kyang min// gdod nas dbyer med snying po la// rtog ge'i rig pas gang bltas pa// gsal ba'i 'od zer snying po la// dmus long brgya yis bltas pa ltar// snying po'i don ni mi mthong ste// rang nyid tshe chad bzlog par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so//
224a5(rnying rgyud): dpal he ru ka 'dus pa'i hud la sa cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas gsang bar chog gi bdag pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// e maH// 'bar ba'i rgyal po byin rlabs bdag// ma lus swA
224a6(rnying rgyud): srid dkyil 'khor gnas pa la// spring pa gsum gyis 'bar ba'i zhal ma mdzang // de phyir 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po he ru kas// bdag nyid dkyil 'khor 'di skad do// hUM stong gsum
224a7(rnying rgyud): ma lus gzhal yas khang // 'byu nga rdza po rim bzhin brtsegs// kur khrod can chas lhun gyis krung // dbang po lnga yi 'od gser can// nyi zla pad+ma rang bzhin gnas// phung po lnga dang 'byung ba lnga// rnam shes yul dang yan lag dang // nyon mongs yin
224b1(rnying rgyud): chos de bzhin te// rgya ba'i lam dang mtshan dag dang // nang gro ba'i dril rten rtse ba ma dang // sha dang sgra dang ba spu dang // rang byung 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor te// lnga phung phra gas 'byung ba bzhi// smras pa'i don du shes par bya// 'di ni dur khrod dkyil 'khor
224b2(rnying rgyud): te// lus can kun la gnas pa yin// lus can tsit+ta'i pho brang ni// rgyal ba kun gyi rang bzhin te// rten can lnga ni phung po ste// rags pa'i phra ba smras par brjod// dang sa ma lnga 'dus yum gyi gtso// snyigs ma lnga ni gsang ba'i yum// thig le gsang
224b3(rnying rgyud): 'a ngas pan/ pa dag rbag nam 'a pasasu/ rdzab
224b4(rnying rgyud): bshad// bde ba'i 'khor ngo mkha' la 'gro// yum chu rtsa gnyis mtshan dang ldan// lus bzud \u0f7fyi mdud pa ni// sram bcu drug rgya khyab gnas te// bya ba 'dzin 'grags pas las byed cing // sra ni thig les khyab byed cing // pra spri'i theg rdzag
224b5(rnying rgyud): yang sbrul 'phro zhing nyid la skud// thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin las// lnga phung chags ldang wAr snang ba// rig pa'i rgyal po lnga yi gzugs// gsang ba'i 'byung ba dngas snyigs las// yum gyi rang bzhin shes par bya// phung po'i snyigs ma he ru ka/ bde
224b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i rnam shes khro mo ste// yul nyid bder chags pa men nyid// sbyor ba'i phyag rgya 'jug pa nyid// spor byed bde bar 'bar mar 'dod// gang du chu ba bran mo ste// rgyu ba'i 'khor lor mkha' 'gro ma// rtsa mdud kun khyab lo ha ste// hUM spos stor sgrol thabs mkha
224b7(rnying rgyud): nyid// gsang ba'i drung du'ang shes par bya// phyi dang nang zags mkha' 'gro ma// skra rtseb spu 'bum gyi cha// thabs dang thig ler gang 'thos pa// rtog pa gang skyes der smad pa// yang sprul phyag rgya'i tshogs su brjod// kun gyi rang bzhin 'dir 'dus
225a1(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin gnas pas rang bzhin yin// zhes gzungs sa// dpa' sa/ 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ rang bzhin skye dkyil 'khor ba skrun pa'i la dra zhi bzhed na// de nas yang gsang pa'i bdag zas/ bcom ldan dadas
225a2(rnying rgyud): la 'di skad ces gsom to// phyogs bgra dus gsum de bzhin gshegs pa me// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin tes// 'bar ba'i rgyal po mdzes pa'i tha mchog gis// nyid mi rang bzhin bdag la bstan drags la// zhes gsol ba las/ bcom ldan 'das ye
225a3(rnying rgyud): shes dam pa'i rgyal po des 'dig ces bka' stsal to// chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin no// ma bcos 'de ba chen po'i dbyings// thig le chen po'i rang bzhin la// chos rnams malus rdzogs par ldan// nyin thab gad la stong pa'i dang // rgan gnyis med pades

225a7(rnying rgyud): lugs ma spyan gra btsal ba med// chos nyid smon la ma thugs rje'is// dang khro shugs dang bcas pa ni// thugs rje byin rlabs bcas pa nyid// thams dang ldang dang tshigs sod// yul dang bcas pa de bzhin 'gyur// gang du gang lagang snang //

225b2(rnying rgyud): rnams myed// gsang na rjod pa can de// dran gas ma cing med / ma zlag sang thugs pa jogs// nigyi rang bzhin de nyid de// rgyu 'bam mtshan pa can gyis stong // gang 'a di ny-id dang byu / ba nga 'drar// ma
225b3(rnying rgyud): na po gnas/ tshogs can can / deting thabs mchogs tshan pa'i tshul// zhal ldan rna lams nal 'byol// man ga nabus kyipa 'grub byu gyur// mas dang tan brten ga pa dang // 'angs dang ma 'das bsas cad pa /

225b5(rnying rgyud): dang ting mngon pa shes dang // yid kyi rnam par 'phrul ba mchog/ ji srid rna ma rtog gnas se bar// de thaMd rgyag tu rdzogs mchog ce// gang dang 'artsams par gang // phyag ma dpe pa 'khong mangs las 'das// kun gyi ga stong banyid// na
225b6(rnying rgyud): thams/ ma jig pa cig/ phraldang ba bum// thabs can gas dpa nga banan no// mig pa mdzang na byed pa// byas gi thang par ma bdun pad// dbum pa bdag nan pa bzhin// ma bangam dang
225b7(rnying rgyud): shegs 'du / sa sa
226a1(rnying rgyud): pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// a maho rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i sku gsung thugs// thams cad ma skyes dang la gnyis med kyang // dman pas dam pa'i blta ba rtogs dka' bas// bdag cag rnams la cha cher bshad du gsor
226a2(rnying rgyud): zhes gsol pa las/ bcom ldan 'das ye zhes thams cad kyi rgyal po des 'di skad ces gsungs so// chos rnams ma lus sems nyid rang bzhin te// de nyid brtag cing dpyad pa las 'das pas// kun gyi yul las 'das shing brjod dka' bas// gang du yangs man
226a3(rnying rgyud): !pa'i yul las 'das// grwa dang 'bras bu'i nams ji snyeng pa// gzhin med pa'i dang du rang bzhin 'dus// dbyings dang ye shes thabs dang shes rab kyang // de nyid chen po'i dang du dbyer med pas// ma bcos chos dbyings brdal ba chen po la// dz+ha g+har yin sa nang mo
226a4(rnying rgyud): rtog pa med// dam pa'i rang bzhin thabs kyis gang rtogs pa// chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin dus gcig togs// gzhi na kun 'das nam mkha'i rang bzhin la// blun pos bltas pas rang nyid tshe chad ltar// sems nyid mtha' dbus 'das pa'i rang bzhin la// mtshan mas
226a5(rnying rgyud): bltas kyang chos dbyings don mi mthong // mA gyes stong chen nam mkha'i rang bzhin la// rnam rtog grangs las 'das pa'i phyag na de sha ra// mkha' la gza' skar rgyayi chu bung ltar// ji ltar sna yang skye bamed par gcig/ sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan mji snyed pa// sems can
226a6(rnying rgyud): sa pa'i 'a bya du sa/ 'dzin pa pa pa na pa du ni ma na dag kyi zhi banas pad/ dag N+DI du myed // bu bdag ga ma par brje sbed/
226a7(rnying rgyud): lus snang ba'i rig pa stong par gcig/ sems nyid dngos po mtshan ma gang shar kyang // sgyum smig rgya rgya zla khrag mdar// sems nyid stong pa'i gzugs brtan ga 'as// ma nam 'azhi ma bas gcig tu 'dus// rtag pa rang chu zad pa'i sems nyid ni// ji nar chu
226b1(rnying rgyud): yang de ltar mi gnas te// phyogs 'das spyod med mkha' ltar dag pa la// ye shes sgyu ma dgag bsgrub can dang bral// sgyu ma bde mchog rang bzhin thig le cher// brtag pa zad pa'i bde ba rang 'byung bas// bde bas bde ba mtshon par rtogs thabs kyis// srung
226b2(rnying rgyud): srid ma lus bde ba chen por mthong // khrus dang gtsang sbra dka' thub mi dgos te// thabs dang shes rab snying rjes gang bstan pas// 'dod chags bde ba mchog tu nges par mthong // mthong dang ma mthong rtsod pa chad dus na// dam pa'i dgongs pa lhun gyis grub nges pa'o//
226b3(rnying rgyud): gang gis gang la nges pa'i don gsal nas// dam pa yin pa'i rtags ni gsal bar 'gyur// zhen pa chung dang tha mal las rgyun chad// gzungs na rigs can 'du zhing byin rlabs che// lam dang bsam pa 'grub cing glang dor med// ting 'dzin chu bo'i lhun gyi klung ru chu
226b4(rnying rgyud): bsngags pa thob cing rtsod pa'i 'dzags dang bral// 'du shes mtshan ma 'gag cing bya ba nyung // rang bzhin la zhing 'du byed mtshan ma ma// gang zhig dam pa'i don de togs phyin chad// rgyal ba'i sras po rig pa 'dzin pa de// 'khor ba'i 'jigs bral rtse ngan 'das
226b5(rnying rgyud): gdod nas dag pa nam mkha'i rang bzhin la// mthong dang ma mthong glo bur rtog pa'i chos// dam pa'i don la mthong zhing gsal rtogs na// mthong dang ma mthong rtsod pa rnam par 'chad// glan po mkha' la rtsod pa ji bzhin du// byis pa mtha' yi tshi ga la cod pa byed//
226b6(rnying rgyud): sems gnyis med rtsod pa'i yul las 'das// mtha' dang dbus med nam mkha' stong pa'i blong // bdag dang gzhan med rig pa gcig gi dang // phyi dang nang med chos dbyings brdal ba'i gnas// che chung rgyu 'bras med pas 'bras bu'i lam// ma bcos don dam rtogs pa'i don
226b7(rnying rgyud): gsalan// mtshan ma'i zhen pas rtsol ba byam dgos// zhes gsungs sa// dpal he ru ka 'dus pa'i rgyud chen po las/ blta bde kho na nyid bstan pa 'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas yang gsang pa'i bdag po des/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
227a1(rnying rgyud): e ma ho dpa pa chen che mchog he rug/ nyi ma stong ltar 'bar ba'i gzi rjid can// sku gsung brags la mos pas gsol 'debs na// spyod pa'i khyad par bdag la bstan du gsol// zhes gsol bas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang ba das
227a2(rnying rgyud): ye shes rngas pa'i rgyal po des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// e ma 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs// spyod pa'i khyad par ji snyed pa// rang rang thabs tshul mtha' yas pas// nam mkha'i khams ni mtha' yas pas// rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshul gyis byed// 'dul ba'i byo 'o rje snyed pa
227a3(rnying rgyud): rang rang thabs ni sna tshogs kyis// so so'i gar thabs sprin phung gis// ma nges 'dul ba'i don du snang // khyod kyis srog chags gsang mi b+ha// ma byin par yang ma blang ngo // gzhan gyi bud med sbyang mi bya// rdzun gyi tshig ni brjod pa min// rang gi lha yi rna la 'byor kyis//
227a4(rnying rgyud): dka' thub dka' ba thal bzhin du// thabs mkhas 'dod pa bsten bzhin du// bdag dang gzhan don spyad par bya// snying po byang chub bar du ni// dam rdzas chen po lnga spyad cing // 'jigs pa med pa'i longs spyod bya// cis kyang gdung ba med pa yi// bde ba yid ngong rtag tu
227a5(rnying rgyud): bsnyen// dmar chen po dang ga pung dang // dri chen mAM sa chur bcas pa// dogs pa med par rtag bza' zhing // chos kyi 'khor lo rtag tu bskor// khyod kyis srog chags gsad par gyis// ma byin par yang blang bar bya// gzhan gyi bud med spyad par gyis// rtag tu rdzun du
227a6(rnying rgyud): par bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang ba'i sbyang ba bla na med// thun po gang zhig spong byed pa// de la mchog gi dngos grub med// sems nyid sbyangs shing dag bya'i phyir// mtshan ldan bud med rtag tu bsten// rang lus rgyud kyis rgyas byas la// bde ba'i thig
227a7(rnying rgyud): le rtag tu gzung // dus tshod khyad par nges bzung la// tshogs kyi 'khor lo spyad par bya// gtong dang 'dzin dang 'dren pa dag/ skabs kyi khyad par shes bya zhing // spang zhing dam tshig nyams pa min/ gang gis bud med bsten bya zhing // 'don pa'i cho ga rgyas pa yis// rang
227b1(rnying rgyud): sa// pagasas na// sras da mi nga // dom par ba' ga tu da // ma 'gyu nas // / // gas pa da pa dang // bdang nan
227b2(rnying rgyud): sached nas// de bdam parjin sa thub med// rang mun rnog sumam nyam byur zhing // 'dod pa'i gan tan ldanams la// rang nyid ba rten ci gzhan la mchod// dka' dru ba byung bami ba zhing // grong mosa'i tshing tha badzin// rang gi gra ngas la /
227b3(rnying rgyud): bsra bsnyen bya zhing // dogs pa med par rtag tu skrod// sna tshogs rig pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// byi nang snod bcud nam mkha'i khams// lha yi su gsung thugs nyid rjes// til 'gro bzhin tu gang bar gsal// klung dgar dang stod pa cas// rgyal ba'i ma
227b4(rnying rgyud): 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// do gsum gyi spyod pa nyi// phun grogang zhig 'da' byed pa// dngos stong rje chen gang yang med// dbang po ma'i btags pa bzhig/ ma lus de zhing longs goms na// 'ongags dpa ben pa thab nas// dbang po 'ad
227b5(rnying rgyud): de// stag lags pa srog pa gnanas ni// ni la thogs ni ni// de dgas med pa'i mthang go// gal te 'jigs pa'i sems byung // dam ci gnyams ted myal bar rtse// 'dil bu dang mi med// dang dogs pacang ba med// gtsang mnyid
227b6(rnying rgyud): tog med// yin dang pa yin chos med de// batham dang sbed pa'i dka' thub med// dman dang dam pa'i sde med cing // grong ba'i chosazhinam par srung // sngags dang phyag rgyang zlas 'ching med// sbyin pa breg mchod nga dkyil 'khor med// 'dod pa bsten cing cags
227b7(rnying rgyud): dang gagal las bdog med// deni dbyings lamanyam byung shing // masras dan pa'i spod par yad// 'dus pa rgyas thams cad kyi/ ts+li ste// byung bang zheg dang byed pa// de'i 'chog sa dngas srung med// gas nga'i thad pa dang bdang /
227b8(rnying rgyud): 'byid med kyang /
228a1(rnying rgyud): ba cags pa dang // dadamangam mnams medapas// tshag spang satshang ma byed cing // dumachog gtan das thang zadag// debad mapa 'du gnas pa dang// rdo rje dmyal ba ga sa da// 'dus surgyas thangs na// spyod pa tu
228a2(rnying rgyud): nas gyu // dayang sno na kyi mang dpa // spyod pa 'di ni brtan pa yin// zhes gsung so// dpa' ga du/ 'das pa byed cin poms/ gsang ba'i spyod pa pasnyen pa'i me sa bye bdun pa // de nas yang gas pa'i dag po dang / bcom pan ma

229a2(rnying rgyud): gang so ston ba/ bcab tsa/ hoH/ go d+hA bi hrIhU~M/ ma me sh+tsang tAM/ pho ta sum pacu drug tus+ho// khyo dun 'bras te ze'o// myo hU~M/ oMs ta ta sgru pa bajas / ko& hU~M/ oM sa tatathA ta gag parjes sgrub / sa catagag 'dzil
229a3(rnying rgyud): At+ma nyaM ha~M/ oM AHhUM swA hU~M/ ka bA la b+h+rUM/ oM shUn+ya tA dz+nyAn badz+ra swab+hA ba At+ma ko&ho/ oM ma hA Ad d+hA dz+nyAn badz+ra swab+hA ba sA t+ma ko&haM/ oM mahA sa ma tadz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ad+h+r-i ko&ha~M/ oM ma hA prA d+ha be k+kha dz+nyAn badz+ra swa b+hA ba sA t+ma ko&haM/ oM ma hA kr-i d+ha d+haSh+TA na don sraM thAhU~M

229a5(rnying rgyud): maing+ga d+hA tI ba bran pa ci/ \u0f7f/ sa/ Sh+NI na shi/ bsdu rgo can ba ThA ti/ zhes gsungs pas/ gang bar gyu/ thim par gyur/ 'byu bar gyur/ 'dres shing byin gyis pargyangs par gyur/ mnyes par byur to// dpal ta ga 'as pa
229a6(rnying rgyud): rgyud chen po las/ gsung gi dkyil 'khor chen po mngon du phyung ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos/ bcom ldan 'das pa 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma'o// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba kun gyi sku// 'bar ba'i gar dgus zil gyis
229a7(rnying rgyud): gnon mdzad pa// dpa' bo 'bar ba'i rgyal po'i thugs rje yis// sku 'i dkyil 'khor bdag pa bstan du gsol// zhes gdol ba dang / btsang ldan 'das dpa' ye shes ngas pa'i rgyal pos sgra'i dkying 'khor 'di bshad do// ma bcos mi gnas dmigs dang thag/
229b1(rnying rgyud): ma pyod pa do galas 'das/ che bar 'dushes mi 'dagug// de bzhi da pating 'gro bathos// khyong shidu 'i shes dgas sa pa'o// tshogs med dadapapa nga 'drin ka pa na nanas byab bapos// btu dpa 'aspor ba bya// da
229b2(rnying rgyud): rig sar rang snang ba'i// ma lus N+ye n+ya hU~M bsgom bya// de las byung ba'i dpe waM// mdag pa rnams bsreg sbyang dalus// stong pa nyid du bsam par bya// a las nam mkha' yangs pa'i steng // rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsam pa'i ltar// ralas khrag gi cha mtsho khrugs/
229b3(rnying rgyud): 'a kyi che pang rgyas nyid// tshad dang ldan pa'i steng du ste// phreng khyod 'byung ba'i gzhal las dang // r-i las brnal ba'i nid bang shi ga migs// theg pa ni d+ha rlabs da pa// bu mad do pa ni thabs pacad sa// rdzogs gan das dzan/
229b4(rnying rgyud): du 'bigs par bsgom// dpal chen bu r+b+ha he ru// debu dgu phyag ni bco brgya dad ma// yang na zhal gsum phyag drug ste// zhal gcig rgyag gnyis de bzhin te// rig pa rang snang mangs pas// spyi mdog phyag mtshan cing yang 'gyur// de bzhin dngos med phyag da
229b5(rnying rgyud): las byung ba'i phyag mtshon rnams// nges pa med par dpa' bos bshad// mkhas pas ci dgrar bsgoms pas 'grub// yab gram gnyis med sbyor b.las// khro de bzhin pazugs pa rnams// rig pa'i kyil 'khor phyogs med pas// ji ltar mos pa bzhin du phrum
229b6(rnying rgyud): nag sor nag dmar nag dang // lhung nag sdug sar da ma ser dang // dam ltung nga ldang 'jibus pa'i sgra// thabs ni rdo rjen rten dang/ pang rgyam ma de bzhin du// dbug tog der 'gri dang // brtson g.yod kyis drig du 'dzin// pro hrI bAni mram napas ni// spri mdo sa
229b7(rnying rgyud): dang mthun pa la// g.yas pa shes dbathabs pa brten// g.yon pa cing ba// tsho gal shes par bya// de tha~Mng tshwa ri rgyang gyi khyams// gnyis pa tha me ngagad de// gsum pa na dbar rab// spo ba ni dang ldan par bsar// ngan pa dang rtsu

233a7(rnying rgyud): dmar pos ngo bkab la// gsol gdab dam dpog lha ngaphyed cing // mig dbye lha bstan cho ga dag/ ji ltar 'dzad pa'i cho ga bya// de nas dbang thod bya ba'i phyir// rta dang glang po gser dngul dang // bu dang chung ma bu mo dang // rgyal srid rang lus la sogs pa//
233b1(rnying rgyud): la' ba// shu rnangs phral na/ thar ba badrang byang pa bsho// dab dang nga tha / thab mags pa pa 'dang/ da dam pa'i bu gtad pas/ 'gas ngan pa bdag na dang//

233b3(rnying rgyud): 'phel// tshe dang longs spyong 'phel ba dang // gzungs ma mkha' 'gro 'du ba dang // byin rlabs mngon du snang ba dang // byin rlabs dbang thob lam rtags yin// zhes gsungs so// dpal he ru ka 'dus pa'i rgyud pas/ gzugs tan gyi bya bar brten pa
233b4(rnying rgyud): laSh+Ta ste rgya gcig pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal dgyes pa chen po dzem pa'i tshul po ye shes he rugs/ dkyil 'khor thams cad mtshad pa'i sprin 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'di sku dang gsung dang thugs las mngon du phung ba // oM shrI he Ta ka
233b5(rnying rgyud): bauN+Di mum ny+dzud+hAH/ o badz+rag rdzonyis mar hU~M/ badz+ram d+ha 'i hU~Ms mamang tshaM/ oM brda me bu gang rgya// dza rjenang lag mangs pa'i gar// rnamamapa'i dul snyed rab sgral te// 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor mnyes pa'i phyir// dkyil 'a'or skye 'jug
233b6(rnying rgyud): nas ba'i brjod kyi gtor ldan pas// sngags dang phyag rgya'i byin rlabs kyis// ji ltar 'dod cing yid 'ong bye // yo byad nam mkhar khyab par srul// mos pa dag pa'i khyad par bzhin// 'khor gsum dag pa'i stobs kyis 'bub// rdo rje thal mo kha rtse zhing //
233b7(rnying rgyud): ra phre ba'i tshul gyis ni// phyag zhabs zhal bsi pa dmyal paraH// thugs rje chags pas dag don gsol/ oM gr-I he ru ka ma hA bod+d+hi thA rni/ sa ma ya ha he phaT/ ru lu ru lu ma hA ra stA mad+hi pra hrI n+ya ho khA hi// rdo rje bu tshur 'gyings byas pas// mdzes par bsgyur ba'i tshul gyis ni/
234a1(rnying rgyud): dus zha / / na / / sa// ngas/ /
234a2(rnying rgyud): da yos smra / sas
234a3(rnying rgyud): 'byur/ oM hrIs/ te/ nyes/ bral TaH/ mad+hab rgyam ched ngas pan// / gyig chogs ga/ 'dag ga du ci rgyangs zas banadzidas// des pa 'jam pas gtugs sug sung thugs// da
234a4(rnying rgyud): bstan pa nyid du 'byor// bang da da da 'o// 'dod pa'i yon nan nga sa rnapas// dam san rje rnyed pa tigs spangs nas// dkyil 'do nyid dkyi'i 'khor ba// myos byed dang na ter// tshedang tshas kyid nga byu // / dang de gan pa
234a5(rnying rgyud): skye rdul grang sa blangs// malus ca ci gyes par // de drag pam yin te// thams pa ting rjes brji sa// can ldan pa pa bying dag// 'das gsum ma lus zla 'i bya// rdzog rgyags rgya
234a6(rnying rgyud): bad brtsin pa ldan byas nas// margyas gdug 'i 'ad ngas// song ba 'i rtsod / 'a bar du 'der bye/ thug des rje 'dzini// dmangs 'dug pa gas/ bang mi spang 'dra
234b1(rnying rgyud): rgya do dbang bskur tu// zangs dang skad dang ldan pa las// bde che nas la the tshom med// chags pas chags pa 'dul ba dang // bde ba chen po'i gang thabs kyis// nam mkha'i rnams ni kun bkang ste// dkyil ga'ong ma nyed par bya ba'i Sh+Tha/ dzu
234b2(rnying rgyud): sogs pa'i// na chod yod med gang rung la// zabs dang cho ga'i khyad par gyis// sbyor ba'i lam ni rtsam par bya// ye shes ting 'dzin las grub pa'i// khyad par sbyor ba'i yum du brtag/ skyong ba'i chog sna tshogs kyis// lha yi 'jor lo gyi
234b3(rnying rgyud): mdzad// nyi zla byang chub sems kyi tshogs// bde ba chen po'i thig le nyid// rdo rje pad+ma'i stobs las byung // zhing khams phyi nang ma lus pa// bde ba'i mchod pas gang bar 'gyur// gang du dgyes pa'i gnas gsum nas// dgyes pa'i lha mo rdul
234b4(rnying rgyud): chog sa// rang gi la gcang bcas thogs nas// rgyal ba 'khor bcas mnyes par 'gyur// sha pa ta la sogs pa yi// brdud dang dkrol ba la sogs pa'i// rol mo'i zla brag mnang yas pa'i// blo rang tshig tu bcas pa ris// mchod
234b5(rnying rgyud): sna tshogs bya// rdo rje rol mo'i tshogs mchod ni// khyad par gnyis dang lnga la sogs// tshe dang bran mo g.yon can ma// rdzas dpa' bo NA rgyas dang // zla zom tshim byed gzi brjid mchog/ zangs me tog dri zhis pa// yid 'ong bde byed mo bya
234b6(rnying rgyud): dag cing byin brlab ma nyams pa'i// yo byad nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa// bshams shing sprul pa'i rgya mtsho'i tshogs// mchod pa'i lha mos gang byas te// bde mchog ro yis brgyan byas te// dkyil 'khor tshogs la mchod par dbul// rdo rje
234b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i stabs ldan zhing // lag gnyis 'gying bcas gang byas nas// thal mo'i snyim dgyen 'akrol nas// tshogs kyi mchod pa dbul 'ang bya// gang gis 'di dag sbyor ba yis// rgyal bsras bcas rdo rje 'dzin// rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro dang bcas pa'i//
235a1(rnying rgyud): dgyes pa'i tshul gyis byin brlabs shing // mthu dang rdzu 'phrul ci yod pas// rang gi 'dod pa de lta bar// dgyes par dngos grub bstsal ba dang // dbang dang byen rlabs sun sum chags// kun gyi bdag pa nyid du 'byung// zhes
235a2(rnying rgyud): gsungs na/ dpal dngas pa'i byed pas/ mtshad pa 'grom nyid gel pab mnas 'i bab nyib rgya sa/ denas pa gas 'i bdan pad cos na das pa 'dis kyi na // / mam
235a3(rnying rgyud): thams cad Te// dam pa drim med pa'i thugs// be 'di'i rang bzhin gang lags pa// dam pa'i don dubashad du gsol// nas gsol to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid ye shes rna ma pa'i rnam po des 'di skad ces bkar stsal to// @
235a4(rnying rgyud): bran gyi dang bsnyen no// 'da' nga med pa'i nga bzhin te// nilang byed dmas su bdag dag phyir// demi tshig byed pa ba shad du rtse// dus gsums rgyam thams cad pa// srog nga thugs kyi dang 'din de// mi 'di 'das pa mchog sbya sa/ 'a
235a5(rnying rgyud): par gyur na 'tshig par bshad// rang bzhin pa 'dzang na pa dang // mos shing dgel batshan padag// 'phang sa 'jigs gang steng la // de ladamachog sbyin pa bya// sangs rgyas kun kye rang bzhin che// byang chub sems nyid dag pa te// ma lus/
235a6(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin kun tu bzang // don dam pan rdo ba dbyer med ste// mgon pas pa dang nam gnas nang// skyeb med ba gnas par bya// gzhan du bsal pa grangs med pa na// dka'a'ang ste dang tshul khrims dang // dkar ba'i don la gang gnas kyang /
235a7(rnying rgyud): sa bon med pa'i 'bras bu bzhin// de yang gzhan las ma yin te// rlab mtshad las shes par bya// rgyal btsun gyi phrug sung sdug// rgyang la 'jug cing dbang 'phu dang // gsang bsdigs shing 'dzin pa dang // thang po 'dron gyi lam ldan pa/

235b3(rnying rgyud): dam pas gnang ba'i grogs mchog rnams// rdo rje gsang bas gcig bsdus pa'i// snying po gnang ba'i 'od bzhin pas// nam yang 'bral ba ma yin phyir// dam pas dam pa rdzogs par ru// bsrur zhing brnyas par ma bya'o// rdon dmapa byed
235b4(rnying rgyud): bdag gzhan gnyis ka 'phung ba dang // rdo rje 'dzin rgyal khros gyur nas// bdun rgyud tshun chang ba rlag par 'gyur// de nas rigs dman log par 'gyur// dam pa rnams kyis smad pa dang // bskal pab tu phrag du ma du// gsang ba'i don pa

239b7(rnying rgyud): bde ba chen po 'phel 'grib med// shes pa 'dus pa'i rim pa yis// bdud rtsithig leng 'jug pa dang // re dgas bcas pa'i yidamin pas// 'chi 'bo'i dus dang mtshams sur yin// de la gang du rtsi byis pa// me lces l+h+wa mar skang na ni// sgyu ma'i mi
240a1(rnying rgyud): shes bde chen te// 'di dang bar mar dbyer med pas// skye 'chi 'pho 'gyur gnas dang bral// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor bkod pa la// mthong dang mos pa mchod pas kyang // rdo rje 'dzin dang mnyam 'gyur nas/
240a2(rnying rgyud): tshe 'di'i bde ba thob 'gyur na// bcug cing dbang bskur thob pa dang // bsgoms dang nyams la gnas pa dang // brtan zhing yongs su rdzogs pa nyid// dka' thub 'bad med bde ba yis// lo zla dus tshod bral ba yi// da lta nyid du bde mchog 'grub
240a3(rnying rgyud): dka' dang 'bral ba med pa ni// thun mong dngos grub smos ci dgos// bde zhing shes rab ldan pa dang // mkhas dang longs spyod kun rdzogs kyang // dbang bskur gnang ba ma thob par// dngos grub gang yang mi 'byung ste// skye bo nyid du 'gyur phyir ro//
240a4(rnying rgyud): de bas gang zag dman pa des// dbang dang man ngag bral ba yis// gsang ba'i don la ci spyad kyang // blun pos ral gri bskor ba ltar// 'dod pa'i don dang bral nas kyang // rang nyid brlag cing 'chi bar 'gyur// dbang ni nus pa zhes bshad cing // nu
240a5(rnying rgyud): ka rim pa gang 'phel ba// lam dang ting 'dzin khyad par te// spyod pa dag kyang shes par bya// gang la gang ni nus med na// de la de bsrur nus pa med// de bas de yang nus med pas// dbang thob ma yin dman pa yin// zhes gsungs so// dang
240a6(rnying rgyud): he ru ka 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ dbang bskur ba'i cho ga bstan pa'i le'u sti brdo lnga pa'o// / de nas gsang ba'i bdag pa yis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi
240a7(rnying rgyud): rdo nyid// 'bar ba'i rgyal po he ru ka/ ye shes gcol phyag 'tshal lo// 'bar ba'i sgra gsung thugs bstan phyir// phyag rgya gcig pa bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pa las bcom ldan 'das/ ye shes rngam pa'i rgyal po yis// 'di skad ces
240b1(rnying rgyud): ni bka' stsal to// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba'i ngo bo ni// ma skyes bde chen he ru ka gnyis med thig ler 'od gsal ba/ phyag rgya gcig pa zhes bshad do// dang por dur khrod chen po ni// rab dben yid 'thad gnas chen por// sdang dang ni
240b2(rnying rgyud): bdag po la// bslang dang byin brlab bgegs bcom la// cho ga rgyas par brtsam par bya// bar chad kun bral bdag po'i sems// lhan cig bdag nyid gnas par bya// 'jigs dang ro dogs rnam par spang // gtsang dang drad ldan da
240b3(rnying rgyud): bral// brtul zhugs che zhing sbyor ba yis// dbang dang dam tshig ldan pa dang // khu 'phrig chung zhing brtan pa dang // ga deng ldan par chad bsam pa med// snying rjer ldan zhing le lo med// ting 'dzin sngags dang cho gar ldan// gang zhig mi bstan gang
240b4(rnying rgyud): ni// gsang chung le lo ser sna tshe/ blo slar grogs po'i nyams len cing // phyi nad can dang dka' thub can// gtsang spu can dang 'dzin rtog can// sgro sgur can dang brkam chags can// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // nga rgyal phrag dog ldan pa spang /
240b5(rnying rgyud): drar khrod rdzas la brten pa yi// mchod pa lnga dang bsgrub pa'i rdzas// sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga la sogs// brta zhing chen rkang gling dang // nang dang gsang ba'i mchod pa dang // mad du byung ba'i rdzas dag bsham// dus ni bkra shis 'byor pa dang// ha dang chos
240b6(rnying rgyud): la sogs la// sngon dran bkun rdzogs nas// sgrub pa'i bar chad bsalwa bar bya// dkyil 'khor tshad dang ldan pa la// dur khrod mdzes pa'i rdzas byugs la// dmar chen chag chag btab pa la// sta gon bya ba ji bzhin brtsam// drar khrod rgyas pa kha dog babyur/
240b7(rnying rgyud): legs par 'ju mdung med pa yis// yab sum gnyis med las byung ba'i/ byin brlabs thig ni gdab par la// / dra khrod pal ba las byung ba // tshon sa ye shes lngar ldan pa'i// rdza da kyil 'khor 'jigs par ni// sgra me dkyil ldan pas /
241a1(rnying rgyud): dbus su rlag ma kha spyod ni/ byang chub sems dang chags pa'i mdog/ phyi rim blag ma dmang po la// thod zeng du gcig ldan pab+hi// phyi ral du gzod rdzas rnams dang // rmad du byung ba'i mchod pas dacan/
241a2(rnying rgyud): me mar dgu yis mdzes par brgyan// bkra shis zhal gra kha sbyor la// yab yum mtshan mar bcas pa gzhag/ dngos grub zhal bu rten dang bcas// bdud rtsi sha lnga dpa' bo lnga// dngos grub yi gar bcas pa dag/ rnal 'byor skyes bu'i g.yas su gzhag
241a3(rnying rgyud): ngang gdan la 'khod nas ni// sngon 'gro'i cho ga rdzogs nas ni/ thun mong spyod pa ring spangs la// spong yul sbyar ba'i chog bya// dpa' bo chen po'i rdul 'byor pas// ma bcos chos kyi dbyings nyid la// gnas pa med pa'i don gyis bsgom
241a4(rnying rgyud): snying rje chen po'i ting nge 'dzin/ dmigs pa med pa'i gnas thob nas// sa bon snying po 'phro 'du yis// bsreg sbyang stong par gnas pa las// rang gi rig pa rang snang ba'i// sa bon las ni 'byung lnga bsgom// ri dab steng du gzhal yas khang //
241a5(rnying rgyud): khrod 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// zlab mthong sbeng sgo gcig bsgom// cho ga rdzogs pa'i spong ba las// 'bar ba'i rgyal po he ru ka/ yab yum zhal spar gnas bzhin bsgom// dbang dang byin rlab snying por bcas// dur khrod can chas ldan pa
241a6(rnying rgyud): phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i sangs rgyas kun// dur khrod dkyil 'khod lhun gyis grub// 'bras shi dkyil 'khor rdul snyed kyang // rig pa'i rgyal pos gzugs su 'gyur// phyag rgya bzhi yis gnyis med par// thim par byin rlabs ldan par bsam/
241a7(rnying rgyud): de nas phyag rgya cher byas la// yang yum brtan pa shing 'dzin sgom// phyag 'tshal brtan dkrugs mchod pa dang // 'bras pa'i bye zag srog ldan pas// 'od dang slad dril sogs// mtshan me rtan pothung ba'i bar// stong tshigs mthod dang brjod pa dang
241b1(rnying rgyud): goms pa'i blo ni 'bad par bya// de nas dkyil 'khor zhal bsgyur nas// dang por pang chad bzlog pa dang // dkyil 'khor bskyed dang dbub bstim dang // mtshad bskyod bzlas shing dngos thab gus ma// slob ma 'jug dang dbang bskur dang // s+phung
241b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i gnang ba sbyin par bya// de nas ci la'ang thogs pa med// dkyil 'khor rgyas dang bsdus pa dang // dkyil 'khor kun gyi snying po'o// dngos grub bcud bsdus 'gru brgyad de// de las gzhan pa'i snying po med// de bas bzlas pa'i snying po sbyin
241b3(rnying rgyud): ru lu tsa wa hUM b+h+yo hUM/ oM ni rgyal ba yab yum bu rtse// ru lu gong ma khro mo brgyad// ru lu 'og ma phra men brgyad// hU~M ni phyag rgya sgom bzhi// b+ho ni bran mo nyi shu brgyad// hU~M ni byang chub sems kyi dang // 'bar 'i'i dkyil 'khor ma lus pa'i// bas
241b4(rnying rgyud): mchog ni 'di las med// dang por 'dun pas bag chags srung // gnyis su dga' bas snod du rung // gsum pa dbang gi dngos grub brlang // tha ma 'grub par dngos grub blang // gnas gsum 'gro 'du 'od phreng gis// phyi nang bdag gzhan 'ag chags
241b5(rnying rgyud): ma lus bdag nyid snod du rung // ma lus sku gsung thugs nyid ni// bdag gam dngos grub rdzas la dbab// de yang phyag rgya bzhi nyid kyis// bdag gis bsdus mchod rol par bya// sgra ni 'ja' tshon chu zla bzhin// gsung ni sgra brnyan brag sa ste/ gzugs
241b6(rnying rgyud): ni sprin med nam mkha' bzhin// 'di ni zlos bcas man dag yin// 'bar ba'i rgyal po he ru ka/ khams gsum bya ba zil gyis gnan// 'dod chags dbang mo man ngag gis// bde chen skyon dang bral bar bya// gnyis med nyi kra bsgod gyis// sa
241b7(rnying rgyud): gsum gru gsum dus gcig non// yang yum gnyis med rang bzhin gyis// brtag pa rnam pa gsum du gsungs// dang po gnyis pa gsum pa ni// pho mo lha dang lha mor ni// rig pa stong pa'i rang bzhin gyis// yab yum chags dang mdzes pa yis/
242a1(rnying rgyud): brtag dang goms pa'i stobs las byung // rigs pa'i dkyil 'khor 'od 'dus pas/ thig pa 'on gyi gong bur gsal// de las rang gi sbyang bskyed cing // sun dang mdzod pa shAn ngaH// rang nyi dang rtan pa dang
242a2(rnying rgyud): pas// dges shing tha ma la spyod pas min// tshogs kyi yo byad 'di dag ni// dang por lha la mchod pa ste// bar ba rtul 'byor mnyes byas nas// thams lhag ma'i mchod pa nyid// dang por dong ring bskyed pa dang // gnyis pas gdon steng gan
242a3(rnying rgyud): nas dgug/ gsum pa zil mnan dam tshig bsre// bzhi pa rang sngags rdzas kyis mchod// lnga pa da ma bdar phrin las bcol// drag pa kha chus dbang du thun// bdun pa dang por sbyin bsreg bya// bcad pas gter wA cha yis gdab// tha mtha'
242a4(rnying rgyud): bstan nas kyang // ma lus khyab pa'i tshul du bsngo// dkyil 'khor bsdu zhing spyod lam bya'o// 'gro la sbyin gtad bla ma la// 'khor gsum yongs dag mchod par 'bul// 'di ltar bskyabs shing bsgoms pas na// nyi zla 'od la 'dug nas kyang //
242a5(rnying rgyud): lus la cho 'phrul bzhis bstan nas// sma dang 'od kyis gang byas nas// ma lus sgrog bskyed byas nas// yang dag bsgrub pa'i zhing khams su// ro dogs med par sangs rgyas so// zhes gsungs so// dpal he ru ka 'dus pa'i rgyud chen po las/
242a6(rnying rgyud): dpal he ru ka yab yum slab pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// / de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// phyogs brgya'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rang d+had 'bar ba'i rgyal po khyod/
242a7(rnying rgyud): dur khrod 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams// bdag la legs par bshad du gsol// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ro bo dpal ye shes rngam pa'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// dung khrod chen por dab dben pas// skye bo 'dus dang rnam
242b1(rnying rgyud): bral zhing // skyon bral yon tan kun rdzogs pa'i// bdag dbang bar chad med pa'i sar// sngon pa'i chog rdzogs pa dang // sa ni dag par gzung bya ste// dkyil 'khor chad dang ldan par bya// mthu chen rgyal baN+Di bAzhi pa// bar cad bsal ba'i las
242b2(rnying rgyud): nas// phyogs bcu khro bo'i byin rlabs kyis// phyogs myong so sor gzir nas kyang // gnas kyi srung mar bsgo ba dang // rang rang 'khor du gtogs pa rnams// bskrad cing bar chad pas la bar bya// de nas phyag rgya chen po pis// baN+Dal nag po gra gas maH/
242b3(rnying rgyud): chad dam srig nan bya ste// bag yangs bde ba'i nan tan bya// bur khrod chen po'i bdag po dag/ bskyed cing zil gyis gnan byas te// gnas kyi srung mar bkol pa dang // dur khrod gzhal yas khang du brlab// dkyil 'khor drar khrod chen po pi// bdud rtsi lnga
242b4(rnying rgyud): skyang dul bya// dbang gi dak+ta pho brang du// dur khrod thig sud gsum bsgril gyis// byin brlab mkha' gseng sbyor ba yis// byang chub sems su byin gyis brlab// dpal ldan rngam pa'i rgyal po dang // gzungs ma 'dod pa'i dbang mo yis// byin na
242b5(rnying rgyud): thig btab pas// pho thang so sor bgo bar bya// dur khrod bdud rtsi lnga yi tshon// sngags mchog dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa bri// dkyil 'khor zla kham 'dra ba la// thig bzhi btang bas le tshe dgu// dbus su zla kham kha sprod la// dpal chen yab kram bcas pa
242b6(rnying rgyud): dgod// phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad zla kham brgyad// nang du kha bltas me ri can// 'jigs pa'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// dur khrod chen po'i rta babs can// sna tshogs dur khrod rgyan bcas pa// rnal 'byor mnyam par gzhag pas bri// go'u rim sogs dpal
242b7(rnying rgyud): bar ma// so so'i mtshan mas dgram par bya// dur khrod rgyan ma rdzogs par dgram// dpal gyi snang ba chen po dgra// drang khrod rdzas la byas pa gzhag/ gal te mi gsal bar chad ni// bgegs bslad bshags la thal du dgod// gzhan yang mchod dang
243a1(rnying rgyud): dngas thu'adus// mas 'thams par mgus gzhug/ rnal 'gyur can rgyas nal drung 'ong// dang ngagasam ba ti 'a gyis// drang thod bgags ni kya byas pa da// rna'adran byu// nga
243a2(rnying rgyud): byung ba mchen ro blangs te// bkra shis rdzas kyigalus phyogs nas// dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyogs bzhi ru// rol pa'i blo yis skyed par bya// bkra shis rdzas su byin brlabs nas// gyad rgya lnga yis spros byas nas// dkyil 'a'or so so kyi rigs par/
243a3(rnying rgyud): rang rang phyug rgya brkos sug dang // 'di dag nga dag sgrub pa'i rdzas// mchog dang thun mong brten pa'i gzhi// ngur khod chen po'i di cil 'khor 'dir// sgra la ldan 'dus pa kun rdzogs nas// brgya tshugs rol pas su 'jug pa// dngos grang mchog
243a4(rnying rgyud): sbyor bar des// brda dang gnang pa'i dbang rje nas/ gtso bo yang yum bskyed pa dang / byin rlabs cho 'phrul kun rdzogs nas// blo bo brgyad po ji bzhin bskyed// ye shes dam tshig la drim nas// dam zin pa spyod dang brtan par bzhugs/
243a5(rnying rgyud): mchod pa gyi nang gsanga' dang // rab tu mnyes par bskyod par bya// gsang chen 'bar ba'i yig 'bru brgyang // rtsaba'i dkyil 'khor rab rdzogs pa// pang cha meng pa'i brtson 'grus kyis// mtshan ma thob 'bye bar du 'azlas// bus du gatshogs ni btsod
243a6(rnying rgyud): pa dang // dus bzhir bar chad bsal ba dang // stong tshig mdzod pa stong bzlas pa ni// rang chung med pa chu bo bzhin// gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ngo // rnal 'byor yum dang mchid ldam la// gsang ba'i dngos chub mtshan thong nas// rdzas la brten
243a7(rnying rgyud): dngos grong gang // rnga malas ni gnas 'gyur te// rang rang gaji bzhin kyang // mchod pa stod de bzhin ba rdzogs nas// dngos sleb bdag la 'asgrubar bya// dang po bag chags drangs rgyas te// gnyis pas rgyal ba'i mas rbaH// gsum pa
243b1(rnying rgyud): dngos bu brdzas la gdab// bzhi pas dngos gru thung bar bya// dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug pa dang // dbang bsgyur cho ga'i rim pa bzhin// de nas dngos grub rim pas thang // lhag ma'i cho ga rim pa dang // mtshams mi ris pa dgol ba //
243b2(rnying rgyud): rgyas so// dpal te n+ta/ 'dus pa'i chung rkyen polas// rtag sa dkrupa sgru gas kyi la bye ba cu bdun pas// nas tsam 'di dang pal mi ngas pam/ 'od cher ngo bathud dang / dkyis
243b3(rnying rgyud): bco brgyad pa 'di gsungs so// 'brar ba'i rgyal po bsrub 'dod pas// rI bo nag 'dabs rgya glang dang // ngur khrod gsang phrag nyams pa bI// phrin sum tshogs pa bzhing ldan nas// re deng dogs pa'i rnams / ji ltar dkyu
243b4(rnying rgyud): pas bgrub// sngon du dbang rnams thob pa dang // dam chog snying rjer ldan pa yis// dran pa'i sa rnams dag byas la// dur khong sa ni sbyin gyis drub// de nas sa gzhi na mnyam la// rmad byed gas shA'i dkyil 'khor bya// bdud rtsi ldang
243b5(rnying rgyud): bcas// dbang gi dkyil 'khor byug par bya// de nas dur khrod srad bu yis// bdud rtsi dang ni tshen bsres pa'i// byin brlabs ldan pa'i thig gdab cing // rang dang po brang 'gro bar bya// dud kod 'gar ba'i dkyil 'a'ong la// gsang ba'i dkyil
243b6(rnying rgyud): 'khor zhig 'debs shing // yang dag gsang ba'i don 'grub kyis// dpa' chem 'khor tshug snga gshegs su gsol// dpal chen 'khor tshogs gshegs nas kyang // dur khrod rdzas la byin da cing // bdag la dngos gung du la du gsol/ @
243b7(rnying rgyud): lo rtsigs brgyad 'bar ba la// rtsi shes mtshan thod pa'i mu khyud la// 'jigs shing gsal ba'i me ri 'phro// 'jigs shing ya mtshan skye bzhi gnas// dbus su zla ga ya dkar dmar gnyis// kha skrod dpal gyi mtshan dang gzhag/ bla ga mnang du kha ba las
244a1(rnying rgyud): bcad// 'amar ma'i rtsi bas la bri bar bya// rjebs nacan nang du thag ma bcad/ gan kyang dbang dang chags pa'i phyir// ba dag dmang ba thib dag// drung thod ka ba gdung dag dang / 'od phreng sbag dang ga zlas pacan
244a2(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba'i rgyan cha sna tshogs brgyan// dur khrod mchod pa sna tshogs dang // zhal bu bdud rtsi rak+ta dang // dpal gyi zhal zas longs spyod rgyan// dngos grub rten du bcas pa gzhag/ dpal gyi ban d+ha snying po can// thabs dang shes rab ldan par dgod// reg
244a3(rnying rgyud): ma bcu drug mtshan ma ni// rigs bzang tshul du mtshan ldan la// gsal ba'i rtags gsum bcangs pa'am// yang na dur khrod rdzas su dgod// rol mo ha sta'i g.yab mor bcas// ji bzhin pa yi gnas su gzhag/ gzi brjid me mar snang ba dgu//
244a4(rnying rgyud): ye shes dgu yi rtags su gzhag/ rdo rje slob dpon 'brel bcas pas// dang rang mtshan ma'i gral bkod de// lhag pa'i rtags dang rgyan ldan pas// ma dag pa ni mtshams gcad cing // dgab thams cad byin gyis brlab// gsang bar gsang ba'i
244a5(rnying rgyud): dbang thob nas// rang rang gsang pa'i las la 'jug/ sku gsums la goms bya'i phyir// ting 'dzin gsum po tshul bzhin bsgom// brten pa 'byung ba'i rim stengs su// ban d+ha dbang po dang ldan pa'i// rlon rtsig rang gi dbyibs bzhin du// po
244a6(rnying rgyud): nyams dga' gdan bcas bsgom// cho ga gsum gyis srur bskyed nas// yan lag rdzogs par nan tan bya// 'khor gyi lha mo bcu drug ni// rang rang gdan dang phyag mtshan dang // sku mdog bzhugs tshul mtshan ma dag/ ji ltar rigs par sras bskyed
244a7(rnying rgyud): la// yan lag lha dang bcas pa dag/ rang rang gnas su dgod par bya// ye shes dkyil 'khor sman drangs te// dam tshig mchog la thim par bya// de nas cho ga'i go rim dag/ mchod bstod mnyes pa'i don du bya// dngos grub 'byung ba'i snying po
244b1(rnying rgyud): brgyad pasma pa 'dab na ga ga/ gas btsun ca dang ldan pa sa// dag da gang ba namam // mdzag ca du byag/ na nga ga sa sa nan 'ang dbya la na da /
244b2(rnying rgyud): rdzagaso la ba min// du khrod chen po'i dkyil 'khrong 'drer// gseng ba'i rjes la rten bcas nas// dngos grub mtshanas 'di bsgrub pas// bdag la dngos gru bstsol ba dang // dri zod brgyad kyi mkha' 'tsho phyis// dngos thab ma med 'o sa
244b3(rnying rgyud): don rdzogs dngo 'grub mdzod// 'brubargyad rtsapa'i dngos dubakrol// ba byed pas la nas nyams btag la// bsnyen nas bslab pa las bsdu he// zhing thams dul dang myengs pa yi// 'bar ba'i gyenan pas rtsod bzlas pas// ma thus ci pa'i rna ba
244b4(rnying rgyud): dngos grabams la dbab par bya// da'ang bskur 'jug dang dmatshig dpog/ dngos bub 'dod par gsol ba gad ba// dang por dpal gyi longs spyod de// gnyis pa slob dpon nyid du bzhed// gsum pa rnal 'byod bu mi ste// blangs te thogs pa med par shAn/
244b5(rnying rgyud): lcagasa'i las kyi chog dag/ dang por smin pa sreg chog rtse// bar ma mi zung gter du sgra// za ma mkha' 'gro yongs la btang // las kyi lhag ma sdu byas la// slob dpon mnyes pa'i chog bya// thabs dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byod kyis// 'di ltar bar cad
244b6(rnying rgyud): bsrubs na// mo 'phrul bzhi dang rdzun pa yis// yang dag bslang pa'i dngos grur 'jong// ces gsungs so// dpal he ru ka 'dus pa'i spyod chen po las blag ma bcobargyad pa sgrub pa'i le'u ste co brgyad pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das ma
244b7(rnying rgyud): rgyal po des/ du dzod chen po'i dkyil 'khor blag na drug curtsa brgyad pa'i cho ga 'di gsungs so// dang por dang rdob byin ldan pa'i// las dang bya ba ma las pa dang // par chad 'jigs bral sprul pa pos// ri ci dgon pa du thod dang // rab tu dben padis phyogs
245a1(rnying rgyud): pa// sagazhi legs par brtag pa dang // brlang dang byung du byen brngub pa// rdzog bzhin du byas na sani// dkyil 'angar mang dang ldan par bya// dmardzas padz+ra rtsi byugs thus nas// du thong zadang ma ldan pas//
245a2(rnying rgyud): rdzas rmang byung 'bar ba'i tshogs// byin rlabs ldan pas thig gdab la// babrang rmad byung so sor bgo// pho brang brum po me tshangs// thod pa'i rabs yang dag bskor// phyi rim 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad ldan// ci bas mtshan dzad pa'i dbras bskor// rab
245a3(rnying rgyud): skyobazhi rnam par brgyan// phyi ri mthod rnam gzhal yas 'ang // ma mo'i gnas su ldan pa de// de yi sgo dang ldan par bya// pri rim rdo rje me ri phreng // bar mtshams med par bskor bar bya// dbus su zla gamazhal sgor la// dpal gyi mtshan ma bcas pakri/
245a4(rnying rgyud): phyogs bzhir zla gam kha sprod bri// rigs bzhi khrag 'thung thugs mtshan dgod// phyi ma 'khor lo rtsi bas brgyad la// zla ga ma nang du kha bltas brkyang // ma mo brgyad kyi mtshan ma gzhag/ rtsi bas mtshan brgyad la phyir blta brgyad// phra men brgyad kyi mtshan pa
245a5(rnying rgyud): gzhag/ sgo bzhir phyir blta'i zla gam pa// sgo bzhi'i mtshan ma gzhag par bya// phyi rim gyir blta nyi shu brgyad // dbang phyug sgal tsheg bcas par dgod// phyi ma bskal pa'i me ri la// bla gam gying balnga bcu po la// khro bo brgya yi mtshan ma gdab// dzang
245a6(rnying rgyud): khrod dkyil 'khor chen po ste// 'bar ma chen po bzhugs pa'i gnas// mkha' 'gro sprin phung 'dra ba'i rten// 'jigs pa'i rgyan chas gtibs pa yi// pho brang lhun rdzogs ka pA la// dbang po lnga ldan 'phrul gyi rdzas// cho 'phrul sna tshogs bsgrub pa'i
245a7(rnying rgyud): rten// cho 'thu mkha la sbyor nga'i spobs// thod pa gsum du ldang ba ni/ dug gsum zhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// skrag sum smad kyis grub pa'i rtags// dung tha~Md can cas rdzogs pas dgod// rbang byung gtor ma mchod par bcas// dngos
245b1(rnying rgyud): grubardag cu bcas par dgram// rdo rdul 'brong 'dus pa yis// malus dag par byin parlabs pa// rtags dang can rdzas mangs par bya// dang po bden nyid bsgom pa la// den pa mtshams sto ting 'dzin pasgom// rgyags 'bras par rang spang bas// dab khyer
245b2(rnying rgyud): 'byung lngajis par bcig/ dung khrod dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya// rang gi dbyings kyi gdan byings su// rang rab d+ha men byang bzhin// dang po gtso bo byed par bya// de nas des 'khor gyi tshogs// drug cu drug bsrid par bya// yan leg yogs rdzo
245b3(rnying rgyud): nas// ye shes spyan drang ba stim byas la// mchod pa stod mnyes pa'i cho ga bya// ye shes snying po 'bru brgyad po// ye shes byin rlabs 'od zer ltar// dbang dang byin rlangs tho byas nas// dngos slab dang gi gnas bya 'asbyor// rtags dang mtshan ma dbang rdzong
245b4(rnying rgyud): tha ma las ni rgyal bsgyur nas// dang gi tsog rdzogs pa'o// dngos byab dod par gsol gad ba cing // gsang ba'i mchod pa rdzogs pa dang // dud khrong dbang pa'i dkyil 'khor du// 'dug cing dam phog dpangang sbyar la// dngos phre dam bzang ba
245b5(rnying rgyud): lhag ma // 'a 'i las dang ldan pa // zhes gsungs so// dpal ten ka 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ theg mjug d+hardza brgyad pa'i zlab wag te le brgyang ba ba'o// / de na pa yang gsang pa'i bdag dang / @
245b6(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das la 'di pa ces gsolato// du gcims ngas rgya rnam pa kyai/ sregs thugs kyi nga bzhin gyis// 'khor ba'i byed rdzi grol ba'i nga gi/ dA baphral pa'i drung po nyid// dkyil 'tsho chen gsol// des gsol bya mas
245b7(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'dang dpal le zhes rnam pa'i rgyal pos/ 'di skad ces gsungang so// chos rnams sul sems gnyis med la// bdag dang bdag gi 'dzin pa yis// rA tre gsum gyis ngo bor brtags// de nyid ma skyer rtogs pas bsgral// drang srong phrag dang
246a1(rnying rgyud): na na/ su pas// / gang pa/ /
246a2(rnying rgyud): su mtshogs pa kran 'dus pa// tshogs b.lag gtod dang sbyin byas la// bas mngon par chad bsal byas te// phyi rol tha ba'i tshe rdzogs nas// bar gyi tshig rim bzhin bya// maN+Dal tsang dang ldan pa la// bdud tu dmar gyis rmugs pa de/

246a4(rnying rgyud): ma reg mun pa'i sgo ts+tsha sa// rnam shes rmugs sngags la bsdum pate/ thog padung po dgazhal las kyang // rang nga mngon pa can gyis brgyan// dzatsA ba ha~M/ pa gas
246a5(rnying rgyud): dmar po'i dkyil// madz+re hU~M ga po gang nyed// mgo pa zlab mtshams su bstan// rkang pa byang shar thug pa med// steng gar kugasu maris gsum la// rol grab gi mab+hid gang rtsa// snying du mthang du gsor bzhi'i tshad// de 'i ting du song ba
246a6(rnying rgyud): nga // de ma snyed du rnags mar// so ga su ma tshang du legs par bya// nang lag pag dang rtags dang // mkhal sa gnyis tegan badz+ra nga// dkyil 'khor mtho gang song bani brgyad// b+hag ma~M phy-ir ba me ra klong // tan d+ha bang po lnga ldan pa// ya
246a7(rnying rgyud): nga po yang dgapa na/ mthong dag zugasra pa bskal par me// dang po rjem bu 'di pa/ gas rig stong por bangs/ rdzogs pad ngem par tham pa // yang nga kyi dkyil 'ar la/ ma
246b1(rnying rgyud): lag pa g.yas g.yon rkang pa gnyis// mgo dang mkha' ma g.yas g.yon gnyis// gsang bgor ri nas brtsams nas// gtum mo rab tu dgod par bya// dpung pa gnyis dang gung mo gnyid// brda gnyis bus ma~M gnyis dka la// seng ge stag dang
246b2(rnying rgyud): da dang // kang kawa spung 'ug pa dang // bya rog zab pa'i tshul du gnas// sha khrag mig dang rna ba dang // rkang dang tshil bu srog rtsa dang // klad pa brgyad kyi rdzas su dgod// sgo bzhi yan lag mtshan meste// phyi re brags skal tshegs dang // da
246b3(rnying rgyud): ga me yi mtshan mar dgod// dgos pa'i yo byad kun bkram nas// bar chad bsal zhing byin brlabs te// dag pa gsum gyis byin brlabs nas// b+h+rUM las khog pa gzhal yas khang // dur khrod can dang ldan pa yi// dbang dag gzhal pas me 'bar la/
246b4(rnying rgyud): lha dang bcas pa kun bskyed la// dgug dang pa stim mchod bzlas rdzogs nas// mchod bstod dngos grub gsol ba gdab// dus dang mtshan mar byung bar du// mkhas pas rtag tu brtson par bya// dur khrod rdzas la rten bcas nas// 'khor ba yo sa
246b5(rnying rgyud): sgrol dkyil 'khor du// 'jug dang dam tshig phog pa la// dur khrod mtshan mas dbang bskur la// sbyin bsreg mnyes pa'i las bya ma la// lhag mas mkha' 'gro sa nyes byas la// chag sram rim pas bgos nas ni// rdzogs nas ci rigs las la dang
246b6(rnying rgyud): ces gsungs so// dpal he ru ka 'dras pa'i cung las/ mthang gtsun pa sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
246b7(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i 'khor lo gter gyi bdag/ byin rlabs rmang byung gsang ba'i thugs// dug gsum sku gsung thugs spang ba'i// sgrub pa'i lam mchog dam pa dag/ bdag la rgya cher bshad du gsol// zhes gsungs pa las// bcom ldan 'das
247a1(rnying rgyud): ye shes dam pa'i rgyal pos 'di skad rjes gsungs so// dang da dmachog dbang thob ting// brtul thugs ldan pa'i rnal 'byor mas/ ban tu dbang po lnga ldan dang // bral bu rang rang snying po can// des brang don/
247a2(rnying rgyud): du dkor par bya// 'jigs pa'i rdzas dang snang ba'i me// dngos grub mchod pa'i rdzas dag dgram// yid 'od 'dus dang rnam bral zhing // rab dben par chad kun bral la// brtag cing blang bzung bstan pa ste// byin gyis brlab par brtsam par bya// dkyil
247a3(rnying rgyud): gas byu dul nga/ ga so byu byu gas da / sa la sa bslad pa ga tu ga du da napa/ maman/ grangs kyi thag
247a4(rnying rgyud): dur khrod chen por byin gyis brlab// dur khrod rdzas kyi tshon lnga yis// he ru ka yi don mtshon phyed// zod pa'i mtshan mas gsal byas pa'i// dur khrod dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa bri// tha ma zla ga ma dmar po ni// gru bzhi'i steng du mdzub gang 'phang // de
247a5(rnying rgyud): steng mgu gsum ni// sor bzhi'i 'phang dang ldan par bya// dur khrod sol bas thug par bya// dang po der ster dmar nag ni// zla ga ma 'phang du sor gsum tshad// tshil dang sha khrag gsur chen dang // rgyan chas gsol zhing gangadan brtsoms nas// dmar
247a6(rnying rgyud): dang ban d+ha'i bzed por dgram// thun mong bya ba kun rdzogs nas// chos skyong bral po sde bzhi la// bar chad bsal bar mnga' gsol te// khro bo mang po phyogs bcu dgram// 'byung po d+hA rnga tshar bcad nas// rgyan chas gsol shing gad na bkod nas/
247a7(rnying rgyud): byin brlab bar cad bsrung ba'i phyir// mtshon chas gtibs nas ni// gsang ba'i brda yis kun mtshan nas// ji ltar rigs pas nan tan bya// gtso ba'i snying po ldan pa'i mtshan// yang rtag drugs ster du gsol// tshal bu sring por bcas pani//
247b1(rnying rgyud): tha mar rim bzhin dgod par bya// tha ma dmar po sgo bzhir ldan// glo bzhi'i rjes su dgrod par bya// phyi rol bskal pa'i le ri la// khro bo bcu yi mtshan ma dgod// zhi ba las ni gnas bsgyur te// dag pa gsum pa gams pa las// 'brang ba
247b2(rnying rgyud): rim pa las// dur khrod 'jigs pa'i gzhal yas khang // ji ltar bsgyur ba bzhin du bsgom// lha dgu gsal nas bzhi dgod de// b+h+rUM las pho mo tshang bar bsam// mtha' zug med pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// 'jigs byed do gor byod nang /
247b3(rnying rgyud): dur khro de 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// phyag rgya sngags kyis bkug bstims te// bzhugs dang brtan dang mi g.yo dang // zil mnan mnyes pa'i las byas te// bzlas dang mchod bstod bsnyen pa dag/ mtshan ma thob kyi bar du bya// nyams
247b4(rnying rgyud): rtags dang mngon sum du// yid ches mdzes pa'i rtags thob nas// bar gcod nyes pa kun bsal te// dur khrod gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor du// rmad byung rdzas la rten bcas nas// 'khor ba'i dur khrod gzhom pa'i phyir// 'jigs byed 'ad
247b5(rnying rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor la// dga' dgu rang ba'i bsam pa yis// rtse gcig bsam pas gsol 'debs nas// 'khor dang banas pa gshegs nas kyang // ya mtshan rmad kyi dngos grub stsol// dad pas 'jug dang dbang bskur dang // bla ma mnyes
247b6(rnying rgyud): bar byas nas ni// 'jigs pa kun las thar pa yis// lhag ma'i las rnams kun rdzogs nas// las kyi mtha' rnams bsdu bar bya// bsrung dang rgyan gyi ting 'dzin dang // ji ltar rigs pas nan tan bya// zhes gsungs so// dpal he ru ka 'dus
247b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i rgyud chen po las/ dug gsum sku gsung thugs su bsgral ba'i le'u ste nyi shu gcig pa'o// / de nas gsang ba'i bdag pos// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rang
248a1(rnying rgyud): bdud bya ras byed// mthas nadas la thugs rog// bang tu 'jug pa shang dugs pa// zhes gsal ba las// danam bcom ldan 'das dpal la zhes rnam pa 'thalangs// 'dan mas gangs na/
248a2(rnying rgyud): l+r-ings lus bdud rtsi lnga// mig le ngadabung bcom ldan 'das// ma bcos thabs kyis bsgruban// 'chi med pacud ci dang byung 'thab// gzhan gang mtshan pas bsgrub zan// gangs zag kun ljong ba nags 'dabs sam// rgya klung rgya mtsho'i dal so
248a3(rnying rgyud): dgon par bar chad med par du// phun sum tshogs pa kun ldan nas// dbyor dang dus tshogs bzang po la// bkra shis kun nas ci 'tshams pa// bdag gzhan don phyir bsgrub par bya// sa bzhi brtag dang bsrung ba dang // spang dang bar chad bsal byas
248a4(rnying rgyud): nas// rang gi dkyil 'khor tshad bzhin bcig/ bdud rtsi lnga yis byug par bya// phyi nang bar gyi bgegs bsal nas// bskang gso tshogs rnams bsag par bya// rdo rje byin rlabs las byung ba// so sor cha las byung ba ltar// rdo rje dbyings
248a5(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor nyid// rdo rje'i pho brang gdab par bya// dkyil 'khor thig bzhi le tse dgu// khyams dang sgor bcas bri bar bya// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kun bkod la// so sor gyan dang rol mo dag/ phyogs cha kun nas brgyan par bya// dri chen rtsa ba yan
248a6(rnying rgyud): lag bcas// ji snyed dbus kyi banad+ha ste// bskyed dang byin brgyab blong du las// rnam par snang mdzad nga por byur// byang chub sems kyi bon// rtsab yan lag mi spod pa// 'gro 'du byin brlab bcas pa nyid// rdo rje'i rigs su ldan gyis grub
248a7(rnying rgyud): mAM sa rtsa ba yan lag bcas// lha yi ban d+ha b+hagan ru// 'gro 'du byin brlab bcas pa chis// 'byur ldan pang ldan gyis thub// drug ngagra chags pa dngos// rtsa ba yan lag banas pa nyid// d+hin 'arlab 'arjo 'drar bcas pa yi// snang ba

248b5(rnying rgyud): dbyings rang bzhin la// snying rje nam mkha'i rang bzhin shar// b+ha las rten byas gzhal yas 'ang // rigs lnga yab yum thun dang bcas// bdud rtsi nyid lagabyed byas te// ye shes dba' skyi mdzod byas nas// mtshan mthob par bzlas par /

250a1(rnying rgyud): nas bstim// rdzas rnams dngos grub bla byas pa// bdag nyid skra gsung thags la bstim// las kyi lhag mamachog rnams// ci rigs su ni byin par \u0f7f// dpal he druka 'dus pa'i gyud can pa

250a3(rnying rgyud): pa 'dul la phyag 'tshal lo// spol ba'i tshig bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pa las/ bcom ldan 'das ye shes rngam pa'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// rnal 'byor mchog gi gang zag gis// bar chod gdug pa bsal ba'i phyir// drang
250a4(rnying rgyud): khrod zug gam shing gcig gram// dam grog lam chen nu mdo rgya// sa po cho ga legs byas la// dkyil 'khor bdud rtsi lngas byugs la// dur khrod 'bar ba'i thig btab nas// bu gsum zla ga ma gsum ldan lo// thod pa'i rabs kun nus

250b1(rnying rgyud): cadad cag ga/ denas dang sas rnas pa/ 'ad dang pa drug dag// gas gsum par sa \u0f7f// rdzu gyu pa/ gags ma sa pas// ga zhes pa ga/
250b2(rnying rgyud): lags nas gus la ldan pas// ga ba'i thar pa zhi la brdeg/ skyeg ma gnas brgyad dag 'gyur// bcud pa zlas pa ga chags gang ma 'ag // 'og yon gnas gyis // slong po cho ca bskal ci dang /

250b4(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i bdag pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsal te// shin sumo zhing gtum pa 'o// zhibs phan par mi 'gyur te// blang sa dang gas dadang gzir ba yi// ladra ni bdag la bshad dra gsol// zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan
