250b6(rnying rgyud): chen gyis byugs la// dbus su phyag sum bur byas la// khrag che mi rir sol byas byug// tha ma zlag ma khrag gi byug/ thod pa'i rabs kun nas bskor// dbus pa thod pa nag po la// lpags tshogs dang drag sna dang // cid da
250b7(rnying rgyud): nag nag dang bcas// sngags mngan rgya ba gnas brgyad du// than byed brgyad pa ga// dbus pa 'jigs byed 'bar ba bsas// rdzam phyogs kyis btur bar bas // spyan rba pagyis mi da bzlas pa dag/ rtags thob par
251a1(rnying rgyud): bzlas shing bsam// oM sid+d+hamrakha ha r+thas nas dgral d+ha// dang po bstan pa 'grub rgyad D+ha// bar du las pa gzung bar bya// tha mthun gyi bsnyen pa bzlas// rang dang byang dkar 'thes pa dang // 'ang
251a2(rnying rgyud): dang lung pa'i rtags byung na// rten nam rang dam phyogs su 'phang // bsgral nas yang dag 'grub par phyar// dngos grub blang ba la sogs pa// ji ltar rig par sbyar bar bya// zhes gsungs so// dpal he ru ka 'dus pa'i rgyud chen po las/
251a3(rnying rgyud): drag po las kyis yan lag bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu lnga pa'o// / de nas yang gsung ba'i bdag pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs// 'bar ba'i rgyal po he ru ka/ dngos grub
251a4(rnying rgyud): kun gyi snying po nyid// bdag cag rnams la bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pa las/ bcom ldan 'das ye shes rngam pa'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// rab tu dben pa'i gnas mchog tu// skye gnas dag pa'i rnal 'byor pas/
251a5(rnying rgyud): dbang dang dam tshig sngon song ba'i// mchog gi rnal 'byor brtsam par bya// chos rnams ma lus thams cad la// sems kyi thig le phyogs cha med// dang po bar dang tha mar yang // skye med thig ler rgya ba sbyang // rang byung ye shes rgyu med pa//
251a6(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i thig le snying por rdzogs// yul dang dbang po rnam shes rnams// brtags pas byang chub sems nyid de// mthong dang brjod sogs yul 'das pa'i// stong nyid ma gyes klod la thim// dang po de bzhin nyid thob nas// de nas lha dang
251a7(rnying rgyud): po dang // dkyil 'khor phyag rgya 'dra 'gro dang // mchod dang bde ba la sogs pa// ji snyed sgro gsum dran tog rnams// nam mkha'i tshe 'phrul rang bzhin rnams// mthun par snang zhing dngos po med// gar pas gang du ci sprul pa// sem
251b1(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor rgya khron med// mtha' thug med par rang snang ba// rang gi sems dang ngas med gu zhi// sems kyi dkyil 'bar don mthong na// ma lus sems las gzhan ma byud// ma skyes dngas popo tshom can// ji skang dang grag zung ba
251b2(rnying rgyud): glan// byang chub snying po gsal bar snang // blas med chos phur kun gas la phyir// dkyil 'khor thugs dang phyag tu med// sbyin bu theg dngas grub rdzas med cing // ro dogs 'chi po ro'i med// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis byed
251b3(rnying rgyud): blang dor dge sdig chalas 'das// gtsang sde bde lhag las grol bas// lam dang 'thus bu'i spyad par bral// gang la'ang gnas par mi byed pa// thabs chen gas pa'i lam gnas par// tog ge pa yi yul min ta// yang dag gung ga /
251b4(rnying rgyud): nyid// the bre thung pa'i sdug bsngal zal// zhes gsungs so// dpal te drag 'dus pa'i rgyad chen pa las/ thos pa med par bstan pa'i len nyin drug pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu zung po ma zhes ngom de'i rtsamathong/
251b5(rnying rgyud): ma lo gas kyi 'i 'byor gis kyang rtog pa 'di gsungs so// dpal ldan cig mi dngas// thamasangs rgyas kun gyi dang sa// song sa myong bu dang thung ma dang // rgyal sri tham ma nyas byas nas/ don tha mtshogs pa'i spyod pa yis// man ga da
251b6(rnying rgyud): bai dag sopa gdab// de nas srung ldan bla ma des// de srid snang srid chos rnams kun// sgran 'ang 'tshan dus dang // thag mas brnyan du thung dang // mgul me lta bur bdag gzhan rtag/ bdag gzhan yul sems rangab rtogs pas// bsrang mas
251b7(rnying rgyud): maphrin nga // dgrapa pa'i 'du shes byud// gangal gags pa na// da kyis bdun pa bdag gi slos ga gsuman// rkyen can nam na/ rkyen pas dang gis gas 'a rdza / sa
252a1(rnying rgyud): mngon du byung // rnal 'byor thabs dang shes rab ni// dpa' bo dpa' mo'i rang bzhin te// lnga dang lngal rigs bsdus pas// bde bsgyu ma'i rnal 'byor bsgom// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil ra
252a2(rnying rgyud): nag ba bdas/ thab pa'i pa nga tha pa ga/ ga chen pa bar saya duzung bdes// gas tham na/
252a3(rnying rgyud): bzhin gzugs dang bde chen dang // 'dus ma byas pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// thabs chen la gnas rnal 'byor kyis// sku gsung thugs ni gsad par bya// ji srid 'khor dang mya ngan 'das// ma lus ming ge phung po ste// de ltar brtag pa'i don mthong na//
252a4(rnying rgyud): thabs chen phye med nal 'byor mthong // rtog pa'i bag chags zad pa dang // sgo gsum las rgyun chad pa dang // spyod la ma sgyu mar gsal gyur na// gnad kyis chags dang sdug bsngal thal// bdud kyi tshogs rnams par gcod pa'o// nga bo de bzhin
252a5(rnying rgyud): gshegs pas bsal// 'chi ba'i rgya bzhi rnam spangs pas// kye gnas brgyad pa'i sdug bsngal med// ma lus skyo mar mngon sngam la// chags dang 'jig pa'i chos dang bral// phung po rlung dang sems su bcas// yid tshim zas su gang mthong ba//
252a6(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor thabs kyi spyod pa yi// bdud kyi 'tshe ba stong par log/ dang por brtag par shes par bya// tha mar 'phen pa'i sbyor ba yis// de bzhin brtag cing gnas pa la// snang ba rig pa'i thig ler bsdus// rgya ba nam mkha' stong par 'char// shes
252a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i 'od gsal thig lar thim// yul dang shes pa ma mthong bas// phung po nyid mtshams sbyor dang bral// ma bcos 'od gsal thig le la// rol pa rang ljang kun 'chang yang // rgya mtsho'i thabs lter 'gro 'ong med// ces gsungs so// dpa
252b1(rnying rgyud): na kyig sa / ma / sa
252b2(rnying rgyud): sus / du byug kyi na
252b3(rnying rgyud): nga / / / ga kyi
252b4(rnying rgyud): rlig med// gsang tha 'ad tshigs che da// 'dzin pa ni gyu ba'i las 'daga'o// dka padam ma da / pas // zhag sa da ga na da ga dzi du
252b5(rnying rgyud): brgya byis te// gus pa'i them dra bas kyis byung // nges pa 'arjird thab gyur ban// khams pa'i drud dang zas dang gas/ mthun pa 'i spong pas bsnyen byas te// thab pa dang nis phyi rang nyid kyi// de med kyi'i kyi de sring
252b6(rnying rgyud): du smra / gyu// la pa /
252b7(rnying rgyud): ga kyi ci med/ sa rung ba/ sums su//
253a1(rnying rgyud): g.yas bkag nas kyang // dngos grub pad rten zhing drubyag+sa// gang du bsdus pas don mthang ba// thamal pa dang dkyil 'khar dang // chos kyi dbyings sug mthong ba// 'amang ba mang byed rnam par 'ang byas
253a2(rnying rgyud): gang gis gdul bltas mthong ba// srud dang srangs dadang kyil 'khor dang // bde chen nyid dang stong nyid du// mthong dang nges 'dzin 'du shes zang // sprad dang 'khyud dang bkang pa dang // sbyar dang klu blang blta ba dang // dmigs dang dran pa tsam gyis ni//
253a3(rnying rgyud): babaskyed pa'i thad par min// srin dang mnyas pa ma yin pa// thig skye zhing na ma cho gnyim sa// ma myong ba nga rgyun cad dang // das phyung gnas da dngas gru ma // dpal dang ldan po'i rjes// 'ad pa dbang ma rgyan za'am// thamal pa da
253a4(rnying rgyud): chad dang // 'pho ba rlung gi 'jigs pa bral// mthong ba'i bdud ni dang log pas// gnad kyi rgyu bzhi gnas lngas grol// gnas pa'i stobs zang chung 'gags na// brtag dang 'phang dang dmigs pa dag/ thabs dang ldan pas pha rol phyin// thog ma
253a5(rnying rgyud): 'tha' dbus med pa yi// rlung ni ma bcos de bzhin nyid// chu yi chu bur ri bzhin du// ma bcos mthong bas kye shi zal// phung po sgyu ma ming med la// zhen pas brtags pas 'chi ba mthong // rang sems thog mtha' dbus med pas// phyi nang bdag
253a6(rnying rgyud): gzhan med pa la// 'gro ba'i dngos po kun bral bas// sems la gyi shing du 'bral med// ma bcos rang byung phyogs bral ba// ma bcos 'dzin yi ye shes bzhag/ yengs med 'khrul pa rnam par gcad// zhen pa med pas mngon sangs rgyas/
253a7(rnying rgyud): dogs med pas bcud pazhi choms// ri na dgyes pa chen po nyid// drini thabs chen chags pa'i yum// kau ni bskyod pas phrin las mchog/ ka ni mdzes pas gnyis med bya// ru ni chags pa'i gsung nyid de// nyeni bde pa'i thig pa nyid// da
253b1(rnying rgyud): 'dod pa'i dbang mche// ru ni zhig pa te bya// he ni theg sde bde chen pa// he ni yab yum 'brel ba ste// dran sbyor ba'i phyag r+b+ha baT+Ti// kA ni theg pa 'babs pa'i las// rten rdzun thal ba la// dran yab sum mdzes par snang / gti
253b2(rnying rgyud): med thig le bde ba che// rang la gang mos tshul du snang // ka ni yab yum phyag rgya che// ma ni bskyed pa lha yi tshogs// la ni sbyor ba'i dngos grub mchog/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// nyi zla'i 'od kyi gang bu la// bskyod pa rlung gi dbang bskur
253b3(rnying rgyud): pas// ma lus bde ba chen por snang // la lar chags pas chags bral 'gyur// chags pas chags pa 'joms byed pa// thabs chen ldan pa'i skyes bu ni// dug gis dug nad sel ba'o// dngos grub zhing gyur rnalnga 'byor pa// nyon pos
253b4(rnying rgyud): bar chod bdud lnga po// thabs chen thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas// de nyid de yis rnam par grol// dug nyid bdud rtsir gyur pa la// rigs min thabs kyis rnam par 'joms// de ni ma rtogs nyon mongs drug/ thabs kyis bdud rtsi 'bar bar byed//
253b5(rnying rgyud): ces gsungs so// dpal he ru ka 'dus pa'i rgyud chen po las/ bde ba chen por byin gyis rlabs pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o// / de nas gsang ba'i bdag pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dus gsums pa
253b6(rnying rgyud): rgyas thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin khyod// yid bzhin nor bu chen po ltar// 'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa bskang // dngos grub kun gyi gter du gyur// dngos grub sgrub thabs bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pa las// de nas bcom
253b7(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang po pa zhes ram pa'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// sgrub pa mchag gin pa 'byor pa// dang dang dmachog brgya la thugs dpo // nges par thob pa'i rgyal po yis// 'jigs pa bag makun grang // dra khrod laso

254b1(rnying rgyud): gta zlab bya// bdag cad gsal ba'i sgramanams nas// nyi gu pashA jugasas pasas// bslus tsodagasapa pasgom nas// 'dasas phyog sa nga nga // bcang mang ba 'dras pa las/ tud ma du

254b3(rnying rgyud): ming 'dras dus min 'gro// tshenyams pa yi b+harba bshad// gzi rkyen med dang sras nyams bral// mdog nyams byab dong ba dang // yid me de zhing sras stobs rjong // tshanyams pa yi rtags su bshad// gang zhig ro langs brdung 'dod pa /
254b4(rnying rgyud): rgyal po ji tha bram pa'i rigs// tsho rigs brtson zhing dngal bab// bzhin pags ma med pa tsas byas nas// legs par 'akres ning rjes byugs nas// rtags zung steng dru ga zhag pa \u0f7f// tsa b.las sngags snang na// jug par la
254b5(rnying rgyud): kyis dkrug/ phyag rgya bzhi yis dbab par bya// rdum dang bkrag dang man byung na// 'og tu gzum zhing drag sngags bzas// 'dar dang 'phar dang na byung na// rdo na mangs grub pa ste// badrad rtsis dam 'og gtam dris ni// bden par spang ma ru
254b6(rnying rgyud): bskyang la mnar bgag dam phog la// las bcol ro langs dang mtshogs 'gyur// kha nas b+h+rUM byung sos gcad de// rol banabs na gser du 'gyur// skye gcong thod pa la mi d+he// mgo bcad gi mtshon g.yul ba zlog ste// sde ba rgya dadamig cang
254b7(rnying rgyud): 'angams 'gyur // mongs pas chos kyi dgos// bdag nyid las kyi sems dang / ga tu 'i kyi'i 'khor ba pa// dag zung gi dkyis padzi te// drug danas thod ma gas tsung rlung gags pams// phyogs /
255a1(rnying rgyud): 6/ bsam pas phyin par 'gyur// sbyi ni shrI bathim par bsam// de steng rdorje rgya grum bsam// mngon du gsal bar gyur pa na// ting 'dzin ma yengs stobs kyis bgrod// rgya mtsho 'bab chul sogs par// thogs
255a2(rnying rgyud): pa med par 'gro bar 'gyur// bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' ste// thugs ka'i hU~M ni grangs med pa// nam mkha'i rdo rje'i skas kyis gtams// gang dga' sa phyogs bgrod pa ni// sems kyi spyod yul yangs par 'gyur// bdag nyid gang rung lhar
255a3(rnying rgyud): bsgoms la// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor steng gnas te// de 'og rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsam// rlung la zung gis bskyod bsgoms pas// gang la dga' ba'i sa phyogs su// mkha' la thogs pa med par 'gro// thugs rjes 'gro ba'i don byed na// ba dag /
255a4(rnying rgyud): nyid drag po'i lhar gsal 'bar// rol pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon bsam ste// bar chod bgegs ni bsal bar bya// ro la nges pa'i khrus byas zhing // shes pa bstims byug rgyan btags la// 'khor ba'i rtog pa sbyar byas la// dkyil 'khor nyid du
255a5(rnying rgyud): bsam bya zhing // rang rang lha yi snying po dag/ ras chen dag la bris te gdags// yang na de nyid me yi lha// rigs dang mthun par gsal bsgoms nas// rang gi mchod pa gang rigs pas// dkyil 'khor lha la mchod par bsam// yang na
255a6(rnying rgyud): rol pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi// thugs rje 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor te// drag shul sgrol ba'i gling chen des// gdug pa mu lus bkug bstims nas// drug po stobs kyis bsgral nas ni// 'khor ba'i sa bon bsregs nas ni// cho ga gsum gyis lha

256b5(rnying rgyud): rgyas thams cad kyi// thabs chen dri ma med pa'i lam// dka' thub dka' spyod 'bad pa med// nyon mongs gzir dang zhen pa med// 'dod pa lnga la spyod byed cing // bde bas byang chub 'grub par 'gyur// dang po tha mal zhen bsal nas// byin

256b7(rnying rgyud): me smig rgya ltar snang ba'i// ma lus sgyu ma'i rnal 'byor bsgom// dngos po gsang ba gsum gyi dngos// gdan stengs gsal ba de nyid kyis// ma lus zhen pa gsum dag nas// phra mo 'am phyag rgya chen por bsgom// de nas rim par
257a1(rnying rgyud): gsal bsgoms la// rtsa ba'i lha ni tshad 'gyur la// yan lag dgu sogs kun tshang nas// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor grangs med snang // spyod lam ye shes lhar gsal nas// dur khrod rab dben
257a2(rnying rgyud): bas mtha' ru// dur khrod rgyan dang mchod par bcas// dur khrod gsang ba'i rol mor bcas// rnal 'byor pho mo grangs ldan pas// mos dang spyod pa'i brtul zhugs bcas// 'bar ba lnga yi bro glar bcas// lo Sha ma zla ba'i grangs bzhin

257a4(rnying rgyud): pa bye ba grangs med du// yengs med ye shes phyag rgya che// he ru ka yi rdul phran ni// stong gsum khyab par gsal ba la// spyod lam log dang ma log med// goms pa mthar phyin mthar thugs// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul cher grags shing // mngon
257a5(rnying rgyud): shes rdzu 'phrul ye shes ldan// yon tan lhan grub ngo mtshar che// rang byung ye shes 'bar pa ni// gsang ba mthar phyin gsum gyi bdag/ rang byung rtsal 'chang bdud 'dul zhing // dpa' bo bdud 'dul bdud kyi gnyen// skad cig tsam la thogs pa med// dang po med pas ma byung ba/
257a6(rnying rgyud): thog ma tha ma dngos med pa'i// rang byung mtha' dbus med pa yi// de bzhin chos nyid chos kyi sku// nam mkha'i mtha' la longs spyod pa// rang byung 'khor lo 'od kyis bskor// rol pa'i longs spyod bad dang ldan// 'khor lo sangs rgyas mngon
257a7(rnying rgyud): thob nas// cho 'phrul nam mkha'i mthar zug pa// sprul pa 'gro 'ong med pa yis// nam mkha'i skar tshogs bkram pa ltar// 'phel 'grib phyogs char yongs las 'das// rgya mtsho chu yi na rlabs ltar// grangs las 'das kyang nyid la
257b1(rnying rgyud): rdzogs// ye shes lha ma dpag med pa'i// zhal phyag bde ba'i dbang thob pa'i// ye shes nam mkha'i mthar thug pa'i// bded chen po nyid du gsal// ye shes chen po 'dod chags te// lham ya shes rol pa las// bdi chen nam
257b2(rnying rgyud): mkha' mtha' dbus med// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin ni// thog ma tha ma med pa yis// ye shes rgya mtsho tshad dang bral// che ba'i yon tan grangs med pa// rdul dang mnyam pa'i rang bzhin shang // chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i rdza/
257b3(rnying rgyud): thAgs de'i thug su khyab tshad med// gang du sangs rgyas rnams ni sku gsung thugs// phyogs bcun ma mkha' khyab par gang gnas pa// rang byung gA shes thugs rje chags dbang gis// de srid 'khor ba'i bar du rgyun mi 'chad// smon lam ye shes par cheg/
257b4(rnying rgyud): mr-i mang rag// ngo ma dang khor ba tun chad par du ni// mi bste' thags rje'i dbang gyes 'khor bar bzhugs// nam mkha'i nor dbu bas ma pa yongs rdzogs shing // dpag pas ma shing ltar 'dod pa skong mdzad pa// ma reg san se'i 'gro ba'i sdug brdal
257b5(rnying rgyud): brem// gre sa thos bsnyed na rnam pad+ma la/ de rtson pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i ste// mtshan dang dpe byad 'od 'bar mdzes ldan ni// ye shes lha mo khrul sbyar ngam 'gyur cing // kye 'di ba sen 'debs chags pa'i grwang skabs kyi pa/
257b6(rnying rgyud): shrIs drig pa'i gyur gyis rab rgyas 'ad pa'i sgra// rtswa tshogs nan dmyal dkyis pa'i gar thabs ni// dag dang mdzas dang chags dang sa pa dang // 'byar dang bsdigs dang 'phred deng mnyes pa dang // dz+wal pa'i gar dgras 'gying skya pa yis/
257b7(rnying rgyud): 'pho 'bribasam pa yong sardzogs su kyis bu / cis gsungs so// dpal te dag 'dus pa'i rgyud chen po las// rnal 'byor babru'i bu'i ma du skye mo gcig pa'o// de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pas dgos pachen po
258a1(rnying rgyud): ngadang chags gsad pa 'ang ba can pa bzang pa sa shes dum pa rgyal pos 'des nas gsangasaso// dpyas nyan ka'angs par chad dag na phyog ga sa pazhing sangs thas gsus pa sgra dang gsung /
258a2(rnying rgyud): thugs rna rang ra ma yin pas// de la gnas par gyis shing // sangs rgyas can gying brogacag par bslab par gyis shig/ tshig ma chen pordzogs med par bam pas kyin shi// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams cad dang / ma
258a3(rnying rgyud): thams cad dang // gyi nang gi dngos po thams cad sems nyid do// sems nyid ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa ro// rngom nyid ldag 'byed pa ni stong pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rang ba zhe na/ dpag tu med pa'i ye shes pa rkyen rlabs can/ @
258a4(rnying rgyud): gsum 'dus ma byas pa la yengs pa med pa'i tshul du gnas par byar// stong las stong min ye shes he ru ka/ ma bcos chos nyid 'byor pa sna tshogs gzugs// gang yang ma yin pade dang mi bde min// zags min bral min bde mag
258a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i chud// gsang bdag khyod kyis legs par nan tan gyis// 'dri 'chang klog dang 'dzin bsams la// bdud dang log 'dren bgegs kyis mi tshugs la// bsam pa yid bzhin nor bu lta grwar dpel// dus min 'chi dang nad dang lhag bam la
258a6(rnying rgyud): ste rgas na 'chi'i rba klong 'khrugs pa dang // mi mthun phyogs bzhi'i bdud pas rnam par rgyal// dad dang gus dang mos pas 'chang ba dang // nyan dang 'dzin pa rdo rje 'dzin pa yin// de bzhin pade gshegs rgyal pa'i sras po ste// thogs med
258a7(rnying rgyud): 'khor ba rgya mtsha pha rol phyin// mkha' 'gro shulas 'gro rig 'dzin bka' nyan rnams// bran bzhin bka' nyan rjes su 'brang bar byed// de phyir gsang ba'i bstan pa bzung bar gyis// zhes gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus pa thams cad dkyis
258b1(rnying rgyud): bar gyur te/ dkyil 'khor chen po ma lus pa thams cad nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje la zhug nas/ dus gsum gyi chos thams cad skad cig ma gcig la bde ba chen po nyid/ dbyings thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i thig ler thim nas mi snang bar gyur to// ta thA ga ta thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs
258b2(rnying rgyud): rdo rje'i rang bzhin/ dpal he ru ka 'dus pa'i rgyud chen po las/ rgyud gtad pa'i le'u ste so gnyis pa rtsa rgyud rdzogs so// // zhus chen gyi lo tsA ba po ro tsa nas bsgyur ba'o// nam mkha'i snying pos bsgyur ba yang yod do// // rdo rje rigs kyi sgrub lugs/ khro bo pran Na ti ka'i
258b3(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// he ru ka yi sgrub lugs 'di// phun sum tshogs pa bzhi ldan pas// gnas dang sa gzhi brtag par bya// 'jig rten sa bdag lha klu la// sa rin byin te sa bslang ngo // sa gzhi de yi phyi mtshams su// sa las byas pa'i mtho bzhi brtsig
258b4(rnying rgyud): mthu chen rgyal po sde bzhi ru// spyan drangs byin gyis brlabs la gzhag/ de nas dam sri gnan par bya// sgo nas 'dom gang phyi rol du// mkha' 'dra'i hom khung khru gang pa// gru gsum pa la zlum por bri// dur khrong mnan pa'i thod pa la// nang du dam sri bris nas ni// dur khrod rkang gi phur bu la
258b5(rnying rgyud): bo Ar+ya a co lang / bskyed nas sgrub pa po rnams kyis// dur khrod phur bu bzhi blangs la// phyogs nas 'dril zhing gdab pa'i tshul// bstan cing gan na pa'i las bya'o// dkyil 'khor bkra shis par bya'i phyir// bkra shis pa yis smon lam gdang / bsgrub pa che chung gang bskyab pa//
258b6(rnying rgyud): mtshan dang ldan pa'i b+han+da la// gsol byad bris la shar du gzhag/ bskyed pa'i sa bon 'byung ba lnga// dkyil 'khor bskyed cing bsgom par bya// de ltar dbang chen bskyed nas ni// gsal bar gyur pa de steng du// rin po che yi gzhal yas khang / ta la'i skyed shing cod cing dril//
258b7(rnying rgyud): nang dur khrod gzhal yas khang // rgya khyon dpag tu med pa'i nang / che mchog he ru ka dgu dgu// phyag nyi shu rtsa gcig/ spyan nyi shu rtsa bdun 'bar ba/ zha bas brgyad du gtams pa'o// hUM hUM// de nas zhal zas la sogs la// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar bskyed// de ster tshon bu'i dkyil
259a1(rnying rgyud): 'ju// 'khor ba rnam// de ltar gsal bar bsgoms nas ni// dkyil 'khar du mi dzad drupa/ byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa dang / thang skang zag pa dang / mcho gdub pa la sogs pa dge ba'i rtsabartsi zer bablan/ de nas pa

259a4(rnying rgyud): ba mi sa 'i rnas sa / ga sa sa
259a5(rnying rgyud): nas gzungs ma mtshan dang ldan pa gcig la/ las kyi rdo rje mor dbang bskur la/ thig smang 'khol du gzhug go// de nas thig skad spyi bor bzhag la/ gnas lngar dpa' bo 'bru lnga dgod do// 'bru lnga spos bsdus pas/ sku gsung thugs
259a6(rnying rgyud): yon tan phrin las lngar dbang bskur la/ ye shes lngar byin gyis brlab bo// mo har ti dza zhes brjod pas/ yum kun tu bzang mor byin gyis brlab po// de nas yab yum gyi mkha' rdo rje padz+ra byin gyis brlab bo// byang chub kyi sems 'ong thung
259b1(rnying rgyud): gyur pas dkyil 'khor gyi thog tu dkar mar gyis gyur par bsam mo// de nas dz+nyAn nr-i zhes brjod pas gnam thig gdab/ badz+ra su tra ma ti kra ma thu zhes brjod pas sa thig gdab/ stegs bu 'dom gang gru bzhi pa// dbus su rmu gaH
259b2(rnying rgyud): zlum por bya// mtha' ma rdo rje'i rabs bskor// sgo bzhi pa dang ldan par bya// de lta bu yi dkyil 'khor la// dbus su b+har+tha mtshan ldan la// yab yum snying po bres la gzhag/ dbus kyi b+han+da'i mdun drang du// b+han+da shIng po'i 'dab ma la/
259b3(rnying rgyud): brgyad snying po bris la gzhag/ b+han+ta tshal bu bzhi la/ bsgrub pa'i gsang mtshan dang gsol byang bris la gzhag/ gzhan yang zhing chen gyi ras gos/ sha chen gyi lang ling / rgyan gyis brgyan par gzhag/ tshil chen gyi me mar la/ zung khrod
259b4(rnying rgyud): zhing ras kyis sdong bu byas la btang ngo // de nas lha bshos zla ga ma la rak+ta'i thig le dgu byas pa dang / dam rdzas tshong pa'i gtor ma la tshil chen gyi zhal khebs can dang / sgrub pa po rnams kyi mdun du b+han+da'i bzed por dang / dmar gyi ar+g+ha dang bzlas
259b5(rnying rgyud): drang ngo // de nas sgrub pa po rnams kyis rak+ta'i thig le dang // zhag gi zo ris/ thal chen gyi tshom bu gdab po// rtags dang mtshan mas btab nas rgyan smras te bzhugs so// de nas zhi khro'i las gzhung bzhin byas la/ lha re re la bstan pa
259b6(rnying rgyud): rtsa brgyad dbul lo// 'dzab rdzogs pa dang thugs dam bskul phrin las bcol lo// stong tshigs kyi mchod pa tshogs dbul/ yang na stong tshigs kyi mchod pa dang zhal zas mchod pa dbul/ yang bsnyen pa yang nyin mtshan gcig la zug stol
259b7(rnying rgyud): bgrang // dgongs dang tho rangs gtor ma gtang / gtor ma spad ma yang de'i rjes su gtang / de lan re la yang mtshams bcad pa dang / zhi khro'i dkyil 'khor bskyed do// stan mi spug/ gral mi bstod/ yangs pa'i tshe stan byin gyis brlab //

260a2(rnying rgyud): su ma bang drug zhug cing dbang brdzur/ dngas grub pas shes gas rtagasaH/ de nas dkyil ba bam/ thab dpan sa yin jam/ pa bad pa gsos/ denapag to mchag la tshang ba pag+sa/ ma
260a3(rnying rgyud): rdoni rigs kyi grub lag Sh+kaM pAT+TA n+te/ rgyud pas/ thugs pa'i zlab sa m+bu gcigapa'o// / de nas dpal zhenags/ skyug thAs m+b+ha phrin las phyag rgya chen po da n+d+ha / thAgs d+hA pa'i thum 'dig bangs kyi/ ldan pa mchags pa bzhi
260a4(rnying rgyud): nan// ni nga gzhi ga nyi // 'dig rtenas dag m+b+ha // pa na cas kyis ga/ natshams rnams// khyo pa'i / ma po shrIg+sas// rgyam chen zhin ma gsal ma// dunas shes rab mtshan du stan pa ga cig zig kyad sa
260a5(rnying rgyud): dpe bo drus labyin gyis rlag shi gas byu ba/ 'am dzi rtsigs brgyad pa dbyas sa// klag ma dam dag byang bstan pa/ rtsi bas brgyad la zlog/ pa'i ma la na nga bstan pakri/ de kyi mdun rjer bas 'khor / sgo bzhidang ldan pa

260b1(rnying rgyud): gsum gyi dang // de lta bu yi dkyil 'khor ni// 'dra 'bral med pa'i ngang du rdzogs// rdzas dang mchod pa'i yo byad kyang // mtshan ma'i dngos po kun bral te// kun tu bzang po'i rol pa'o// zhes dpal he ru kas nyid la nyid thugs nga
260b2(rnying rgyud): nas ngom mo// de wA bu ya~M dkyil 'khor du/ mchod pa bkram pa yang / lte bshos tha ga ma la ra k+ta'i thig le dgu byas pa dang / dam rdzas tshang pa'i gtor ma dang / grub pa po re ri'i mdun du b+ha zla'i bzang por dang / dmar kyi yad+hi dIng ngo //

260b6(rnying rgyud): rdo rje he ru kas skugasung thugs yon tan phrin las kyi sgrub lugs gsungs nas/ thug ma bco brgyad pa'i sgrub lugs phrin las kyi go rim 'di ga spangs so// phun sum tshogs pa bzhir ldan nas// rdzas dngas gzhi brtag par bya// sa bdagra rnams
260b7(rnying rgyud): las rin gzhal// bslang dang thud pa tshul bzhin bya// phyogs bzhi dag tu mtho bzhi patsug/ bsrung dang mtshams kyi las rnams bya// gzungs ma mtshan dang ldan pa la// byin gyis brla cing thig skud laphel du bcug/ tsar d+ha ra hi zhes
261a1(rnying rgyud): theg gdab/ dbus thag ma dkar dmar kha grod byas la bri/ 'amar lo cabs brkyang la kla ga ma kha stod du bri// sgo bzhi dang ldan pa/ mtha' rdo rje'i rabs bskor ba/ da'i phyi ma bskal padi me res bskor
261a2(rnying rgyud): pa zi/ dbus su b+han+da mtshan dang ldan pa gcig la/ dpal chen po yab yum bri'o// shar du tshal bu la badz+ra he ru ka dang / yum badz+ra kro tI bris la gzhag/ lho ra rat+na he ru ka bris la gzhag/ nub tu pad+ma he ru ka bris la gzhag/ byang du karma he ru
261a3(rnying rgyud): kwa yab yum bris la gzhag/ byang shar du b+ha n+da mtshan dang ldan pa la gsol byang zil gzhag/ sgo bzhir dza bzhi bris la gzhag/ de nas shi lho'i 'khor lo la/ tshal bu la rak+Sha he ru ka yab yum bris la gzhag/ lho nub tu sa nu he ru kA yab yAm
261a4(rnying rgyud): bris la gzhag/ nub byang du gu h+ya he ru ka bris la gzhag/ byang shar du yak+ka he ru ka yab yum bris la gzhag/ de nas mchog phur ngar gyi cod pan can bcu/ khro bo bcur mdang gsol nas mtshams gcad do/ snang srid sgyu ma'i rang bzhin
261a5(rnying rgyud): la// ye nas dag pa'i mchog lur 'dis// gdeng dang ldan pa'i sngags 'chang gis// byin chen dbab par mnga' gsol lo// yo byad dbang mdzad gzhan gyis mi thub rgyal// oM AHhUM/ skye la dbang mdzad bran tshul mi g.yo mgon// oM AHhUM/

261b1(rnying rgyud): de nas dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la// drar khrod rdzas kyis chag chag gdab// bdud rtsi dri chen ye shes bcud ldan 'das// de bzhin gsang mchog rigs kyi dang sra bslab pa'i// bka' gsang bslab pa'i dkyil 'khor nga // dmadzas
261b2(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i chag chag 'dabs// oM ma hA ba su maN+Dal tAM/ de ma rdzas dag pa'i bdud rtsi dri chu 'dis// ye shes rang byung bdud rtsi bsrub pa'i phyir// gsang ba'i bdud rtsi ldan pa'i chag zag 'dengs/ ma hA sa ma la ma ma gu bu la maN+Dal
261b3(rnying rgyud): bka ga sung med da byung ba 'idadakyil 'khor 'd-i// 'aShA ba rdzun pa da chub sems kyi da // mkha' dbye sa nam dag rnam gyi gzhal yas pa// dab+hagasang pa'i dkyi 'byor zag cig 'dabs// ma hA nga ma ma ng+gem

261b5(rnying rgyud): rab chung gcod pa'i bro brdung ngo // drar khrod gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// dug gsum rabs chud gcod pa'i blo// grwa gsung thugs su lhun gyis grub// dbang po 'azos pa'i sgo dag ru// su dgu bkod pa'i bro brdungs pas// lenas

262b1(rnying rgyud): chen po'i gnas 'di na// ye shes lnga yi klong dkyil du// gzi ldan yum gyi bro byung ngo // drug lnga dbyings su lhun gyis grub// dbang po lnga yi yul lnga la// yum chen lnga yis bro brdungs pas// dbyangs su rgyan kyis thub/
262b2(rnying rgyud): mno 'i yul la bro byung ngo // buN+Da kro tI'i blo byung ngo // chags pa dbyings su sdud pa'i bro// gti mug gnas su dag pa'i bro// bro brdung byol song snying la brdung // gti mug gtso bo thal bar rtog/ byol song 'jig rten thams cad kra
262b3(rnying rgyud): dbyings su bsdu zhing klong du bsgral// mthong byed yul la bro byung ngo // pad+ma kro tI'i bro byung ngo // 'dod chags dbyings su dag pa'i zo// rdo brdung mi yi snying la brdung // 'dod chags gtso bo thal bar rnyog/ mi yi 'jig rten thams cad ldan/

262b7(rnying rgyud): zhing klong du bsgral// kro hI shwa rI ba de klong mkha' la 'dus// nub tu gsang ba'i he ru ka bzhi'i bro byung ste// nyan byed yul gyi dbang po la// gsang ba yab kyi bro byung ngo // rak+ta he ru ka yi bro byung ngo // rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes kyis// bdud dang
263a1(rnying rgyud): mu stegs dbang du sdud// rtsar byed lce yi dbang po la// sa rba he ru ze byung ngo // 'da' dka' thugs kyi ye shes kyis// bdud dang mu stegs dbang du sprad// chags par byed pa'i gsang gnas la// gsang
263a2(rnying rgyud): ba yab kyi bro byung ngo // g+ha h+ya he ru'i zo byung ngo // klong du gyur pa'i ye shes kyis// bdud dang mu stegs dbang du sdud// reg bya yul gyi dbang po la// gsang ba yab kyi bro byung ngo // yak+sha ha ru'i blo byung ngo // dbyings su slob ba'i ye shes kyis/
263a3(rnying rgyud): bdud dang mu stegs dbang du sdud// oM su ma b+ha ni sum b+ha hUM/ g+h+r-ih+Na b+h+r-ih+Na hUM/ g+h+r-ih+NA pA ya g+h+r-i h+NA ba ya hU~M/ A na ya to/ b+ha ga wAn/ bid+yA rA dza hU~M badz+ra s+pho Ta baM/ byung sbyor gsang ba yum gyi bro byung ngo // nyan pa'i yul la bro byung ngo // raH/
263a4(rnying rgyud): gro tAM'i bro byung ngo // drod las skyes pa'i gnas bcom nas// kye bzhi phyug mas btab nas ni// phyag rgya bzhi yi dang du rdzogs// tshor byed yul la bro byung ba// sa nu kro tA'i blo byung ngo // 'dod chags phye ba'i gnas bcom nas// skye bzhi phyag mas
263a5(rnying rgyud): bta bA nas ni// phyag rgya bzhi yi dang du rdzogs// skye gnas yul la dro byung ba// gu h+ya kro tI'i blo byung ngo // banus nas skyes pa'i gnas bcom nas// skye bzhi phyag mas btab nas ni// phyag rgya bzhi yi ngang du rdzogs// reg bya'i yul la bro byung ngo // yar+tha kro tI'i bro byung ngo // sbrul te
263a6(rnying rgyud): skye ba'i gnas bcom nas// skye bzhi phyag mas btab nas ni// phyag rgya bzhi yi ngang du rdzogs// gsang chen bzhi yi phyag rgya yis// btab pas thig le'i ngang du rdzogs// de nas byang shar mtshams su spo bar bya'o// thig sud bcu tshal gdab par
263a7(rnying rgyud): mgo lus yan lag lnga po la// mtshon bya lnga yis spro bar bya'o// de nas bskos gdab bo// bskos la spyan drang ngo // 'og min chos kyi pho brang nas// dbu klong 'bar ba'i bskos la skyon// dbang po dgu ni yab kyis brkos//
263b1(rnying rgyud): de yi yul dgu yum gyis brkos// dpal chen 'khor tshogs bzlas pa spyon// de nus smon lam gdab// ho dgongs su gsol po// stong gi rab 'byan 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad/ lang rab dang ngan song las thugs rdzas
263b2(rnying rgyud): bsgral/ gru gsung thugs su sbyar nas/ gdal ba chen po'i ngang du lhun gyis grub par gyur cig/ de nas byang shar mtshams su phung po bshig go// ma traM gi dbang po lnga rigs lnga'i he ru ka'i rdzas su dbul/ dbus nas rang byang grub pa'i
263b3(rnying rgyud): lha// sku mchog tsu d+ha he ru ka/ dur khrod chen po'i gnas mchog 'dir// ye shes 'bar ba'i klong dkyil du// dug gsum bskal pa'i dkyil 'khor du// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// oM bud+d+ha shrI he ru ka Tu/ shar
263b4(rnying rgyud): nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// thugs mchog badz+ra he ru ka/ dur khrod chen po'i gnas chen 'dir// ye shes 'bar ba'i klong dkyil du// dug gsum bsgral ba'i dkyil 'khor du// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// oM badz+ra shrI he
263b5(rnying rgyud): ru ka hUM/ lho nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// yon tan rat+na he ru ka/ dur khrod cher po'i gnas chen 'dir// ye shes 'bar ba'i klong dkyil du// dug gsum bsgral ba'i dkyil 'khor du// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol//
263b6(rnying rgyud): rat+na shrI he ru ka hUM/ nub nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// gsung mchog pad+ma he ru ka/ dur khrod chen po'i gnas chen 'dir// ye shes 'bar ba'i klong dkyil du// dug gsum bsgral ba'i dkyil 'khor du// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su
263b7(rnying rgyud): gsol// oM pad+ma shrI he ru ka hUM/ byang nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// phrin las karma hi ru ka/ dur khrod chen po'i gnas chen 'dir// ye shes 'bar ba'i klong dkyil du// dug gsum bskal ba'i dkyil 'khor du// dgyes shing brtan par
264a1(rnying rgyud): bzhugs su gsol// makAn skri m+b+ha/ shAt+yA skyom rnams nas dang byung sgrub pa ste// / dza nI'i si / sku// du snod ston pa gnas ched 'byed// khru zhes bang byu med dan
264a2(rnying rgyud): zugag/ sum bskul ba'i dkyil 'khor du// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// oMd na shrI ti krAN+DaM/ dz+nyAnab mtshams nas dang byung bus pa'i lha// skr-i d+hi ba ya nate ru ka/ du zod chen po gnas chen 'dir// lde shis
264a3(rnying rgyud): 'bang ba'i grong dkyil rba// drug gsum bsngal ba'i dkyil 'khyod du// dgyes shing brtan par btsugs kyi gsol// oM ya.A shrI t+te ra kA N+yai/ nub byang dang byung grub pa'i lha// gsang ba tAh+Na te d+haka/ dru zong chen po'i gnas chen dadir/
264a4(rnying rgyud): ye shes 'bang ba'i grong dkyil dra// drug gsum bskal ba'i dkyil khong du// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// oM hrIts+tsha b+hI hi ru ka b+h+rU~M/ byung shir rang byung grub pa'i rtsa// sgro la ba yaH te ru kaM/ ye shes 'bar ba'i grod dkyi
264a5(rnying rgyud): d+hU// drung phreng can po gnas mchog 'dir// drug gsum bskul ba'i dkyil 'khor du// dgyes shing brtan par bzugs sngags la/ oM yak+sha hrIta dukadz+haiM/ dbus kyi skam ched mi byed ma/ gcol brten pa'i bdag rjid ma// b+h+yaH/
264a6(rnying rgyud): gr-id+d+hi shwa d+hi sgra// dgyes pa chen po'i bdag nyid ni// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// shar gyi yum tshon mi byed ma// gcol brten pa'i 'dag nyid ma// badz+ra krod+d+hi shwa skam// dkris pa chen po'i rnakhas kyis ni/
264a7(rnying rgyud): shing brten par bzhugs su gsol// g+ho yi yum chen mi byed ma// gcal brten po'i bdag nyid ma// ran bod+d+hi tha d+hi s+thAm// dgyes pa chen po'i tshul gyis ni// dgyes shing brten par bzhugs su gsol// rngub kyi yumatshan mi byed pa//

265a1(rnying rgyud): ba'i don lang bzhin gshegs// rnagam gyi ni dbus sdu gzhag/ bskul ba'i rdo rje aM kra sha/ rta gdong dkar mo gshegs su gsal// bskul ba'i rdo rje pa thAn+d+he// phag gdong sngon mo gshegs
265a2(rnying rgyud): gtsul// sprul ba'i dod sproTag// skom byed rten mo sngags thog ma// rmongs byed chen ma ga shegs ste gsol// rdul ba'i dadzi ny+tsa hUM hoH// ljang du thal byed b+ha t+te hoH// thal byed yang nag gshegs su gso pa// 'di ba ge
265a3(rnying rgyud): dgod// rdo dril rig pa dzin// rdo rje thabs kyi drang bzhin dang // dril Ta shes rab rang bzhin ni// dkyil 'khor dbus su brtan pa dgod// de nas mchod pa dbam pa ni// ska ba gos skragam la dak+ta'i thig le dgra rdzas la dmardzas
265a4(rnying rgyud): tshang ba'i gtor ma latshil chen gyi zhal bkab drang ngo // de nas srub pa po kun gyi mdun du/ b+han+da'i bzeng phor dang / dmar gyi ar+d+ha drang ngo // til chen gyi me mar dgu gtang / de nas srub pa po la rtags dang mtshan gdab ste/ zhig blangs la/
265a5(rnying rgyud): don dam bcud kyi rgyas btab pas// kun tu rod kyis mnan nas// dpral tshon dgu dang mnyam par spyod// thal chen gadrug po 'dul ba'i rgyan// sprul pa'i bu dang ldan pa yis// 'khod mo tshogs chenas mnan nas// mtshogs pa
265a6(rnying rgyud): ljon tshogs dang sbyar/ ho// dkyu thugs rje chags pa'i rgyan// pad+ma can gyis mnan+da nas// yum chen dgu dang mnyam par sbyor// nAd mi dam par mdzad du gsol// kyan spel te bzhugs snga gsol// de nas brdang sgo dbye// dung thong bcad
265a7(rnying rgyud): kyi gzhal yas khang // ye shes brgyad kyi sgo phye zhing // mkha' dbyings dag pa'i gzhal yas khang // mi gnas ye shes chen pa'i sgo phye zhig/ de nas dngos grub gsol te// kye shi med pa tshe yi dngos thub dang // 'du 'bal med pa
265b1(rnying rgyud): gdus kyangangs thub dang // rabar gyur med pa gnas kyi nga pa thab te// gsum pa 'di rnams bus 'dir tha 'dugasol// de lta dngos thung bsal nas// darjedras panang rta/ dung pong gnas pade pal dug rtog mab
265b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i 'byung po ze byed cing // rngam pa'i tshul gyis srin po'i tshul ston pa// mkha' mnyam dbyings nas nyams pa rdul tsam med// rmi thugs rje chen po'i ngang las ma 'da' zhig/ rgya mtsho chen po'i rlabs las ma 'khrugs shig/ dpal chen te
265b3(rnying rgyud): rgyal yab yum rnams// nyon mongs 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal stongs par mdzod// hUM oM/ mi srid srid pa'i gnyen rnams dgrar gyur te// bdag gi lus 'di dum bu stong gtubs kyang // 'phags pa'i spyad sdang bdag gis dam bcas pa//
265b4(rnying rgyud): sun par mi bgyid mgon khyod sku mi bsku// hU~M/ de ltar dam bcas nas/ ting 'dzin rnam gsum rim gyis bsgoms nas/ zhe khro gzhung bzhin bskyed nas/ spyan drang phyag bya brtan par bzhugs su gsol/ lha re re la bsnyen pa stong
265b5(rnying rgyud): rtsa brgyad dbul lo// 'dzab rtogs nas stong tshigs kyi mchod pa 'bul/ thugs dam bskul zhing phrin las bcol ba dang / gtor ma dgod dang tho rangs btang / lhag ma yang rjes la drang bar bya'o// bsgrub pa 'di'i lugs kyis/ thub par
265b6(rnying rgyud): bya ba'i dam tshig bdun bsrung ba dang / nyam+ba su len pa'i bar chod lnga bzlog par bya'o// dam tshig la yang bsrung bar bya ba gsum dang / khyad par gyi dam tshig bzhi ste bdun bsrung ngo // bsrung bar bya ba'i dam tshig gsum ni/ rdo rje slob dpon yi dam gyi lha
265b7(rnying rgyud): bzhin du dran par bya ba dang / bsgrub pa'i dus su rkyen ces 'das kyang / tshig gi mtshon mi shor bar bya ba dang / bsgrub pa'i dus su gnyid chang gi dbang du mi gtong ngo // khyad par gyi dam tshig gi bzhi ni/ srid pa pho bsngal nas dur khrod chen
266a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i dkyil la ba du shes par bya ba dang / khams gsum du byung dra ba zlas nas drug gsum marjod par byung ba dang / das tha rjes pa snol thang phrag meng bang dadung blangs pa'i dam cha gardum/ de lathungs
266a2(rnying rgyud): tri dang kyad/ bcos nyid byang chub semaska las pa gsos par bya ba'i dam tshig drang bzhi/ nas len pa ca dpa pa sog te/ de'i 'dus skes ci man// dgongs kyi 'dzin migs lan// khyod gyi nyams pan can pa
266a3(rnying rgyud): theb mo snang pa'i dbang blo// chu phral ba gas byu // 'dums la chen pani// ba dgud+hA pa ka/ dza~M ngas thag ng+gA// la po phri nad ma dang khrig phreng bzhin// dam bathug pa'i skrags ldanas// gza rgod mig dmar char byung
266a4(rnying rgyud): yul la 'i phyag man / gan ma chags rgan mo lo rtsa bas+ho// thos nas gnyed pa dag dpa // rgyamal pa'i byin pang bu so// srid pa'i gnams dbugs pa da // min pa ni 'jig can thal ga yod// dmalas ma

266b7(rnying rgyud): gang bamabacas pa'i byed de nag/ gtis chog sum dubarkyang do/ gabyen bsrid kyi/ cho gcig sa mtha' tham bgyud/ gcig ma zad pa'i gti / sa dga'i phyin drug tung / 'brid ces kyis

267a6(rnying rgyud): rgyas kyi bang gis 'a ba'i mtha' bzhin pathams cad 'jus te thal bsam pa kyim zhes pa pa / bye pa ngasanas dang du zung cad// lhag mamongags pa pas badrim pas cig/ 'dang rtag cwas

267b2(rnying rgyud): klong na drug pa ji rgyal po bad+hU he ru bzhugs pa la ma rtogs pa'i sems can nyon mongs pa 'dod chags kyi dbang gis 'khor ba'i zhen pa thams cad 'a jus te thal bas so sor rtog pa'i lo shrI dang lda par gyur te// sri pas rgya rdzas 'am ra
267b3(rnying rgyud): mdzad cing // shes bya thogs med bskal pa'i rlung gis bgyod// phrag dog rdul gyis zag dog 'doms mdzad pa// zag dog dpal chen ka ma he d+haka/ ye shes kyang yangs 'khyil pa'i ho ma thang du// dam rdzas bdud rtsing bar pa'i
267b4(rnying rgyud): bsreg 'di// kam he ruka la mchod pa 'bul/ mi gnas pa'i ye shes chen po'i spyod na dpal kAm he rba kra bzhug pa la sems can nyon mongs pa phrag dag gi dbang gis 'khor ba'i mtha' 'a zhen pa thams cad bsdus te phul bas kyi b.ran tan ma
267b5(rnying rgyud): gyur to// de nas yum khrag 'thung gi dbang mo lngal mchod pa 'bul te// thugs kyi longs spyod rna tshogs mi dmigs kyang // ting rje mthar byin rje rnam par dag// rtogs pa'i dag bya'i mchod pas mnyes mang dbus// sa brtan la ba dbang

267b7(rnying rgyud): sa drabs ba sa// ba khyod mgros gas shes pa sabang ci / chub da mi shes su 'du'o// sa 'a nga sa ma ma 'bas
268a1(rnying rgyud): ye shes klong yangs 'khyil pa'i hom khung du// dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i sbyin bsreg 'di// bud+d+ha kro tI'i chu la mchod pa 'bul// mi gnas ye shes chen po'i klong na bud+d+ha kro ti shwa d+hI zhugs pa la sems can nyon mongs
268a2(rnying rgyud): pasas bslad pa thams cad bsdus te phul bas ye shes chen por thim mo// yon tan yongs spyod sna tshogs mi dmigs kyang // sbyin pa mthar phyin nga rgyal rnam par dag/ longs spyod dri yi mchod pas mnyes mdzad ma// mnyam nyid gnas la dbang

268b3(rnying rgyud): mchod pa 'bul// bcom ldan raka he ru ka la snang skyid phyin ci log tu bsdus pa bsdus te phul bas 'khor ba thams cad bde ba chen po'i snong du thim par gyur to// myod byed tog pa 'joms mdzod nga // dam tshig dpal chen sa rba he d+haka
268b4(rnying rgyud): lhod thugs dam zab mo yis// tsaM ba nyams la sor 'dzung pa// ye shes klor yangs 'khyil pa'i ho ma khrang du// dam rdzas bdud ci 'bor ba'i sbyin pa sreg 'di// sar+b+ba de dru ka la mchod pa 'bral// bcom ldan sa n+ya he ru ka la dang srid rtsab
268b5(rnying rgyud): pas 'khrul 'khor thams cad bsdus te phul bas/ dam tshig nyams pa thams cad bskang bar gyur to// mtshan ma'i phye gnas tog pa 'joms mdzad pa// gsang ba kyu d+ya dpal chen te ruka/ nyon mongs kyi gnas thams cad 'jolas mang rib// mameng
268b6(rnying rgyud): gnas dpal chen he ru karA// ye shes klong yang 'khyil pa'i hom khung du// dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i gyen bsreg 'di// b+hu h+ya he ru ka la mchod pa 'bul/ bcom ldan gu h+ya he ru ka la skye gnas kyi mtshan ma thams cad bsdus te phul bas/ 'khor ba'i nyid
268b7(rnying rgyud): phyir nas sman gyis grub ba'i dbying sa semamo// dag byang rtog par ngoms mad pa// themed dpal tshan sa nga // reg pagazugs ma rtog pa man pa ni// bde bzan par dbyangs su stsol ba dang // ye shes kyang yangs dkyil ba'i tsam thar du/
269a1(rnying rgyud): dam rdzas bdud ci 'brar ba'i sbyin bsreg 'di// yaH hwe ru ka la mchod pa 'bul// bcom ldan 'das yaka he ru ka la gzugs su snang ba'i rig bya thams cad bsdus te phul bas rag bya'i rnam par rtag thams cad ga taHa
269a2(rnying rgyud): gang dgas chud byed kyis kyi rgya dis grubathob bo// dadags pa'i mam can na zhil 'arjod pa dpa' ste/ tharnams rteg pa ngoms pa da/ ma nyid kyi// drod las skyes pa'i gnas dam pa ngam// bye bani gyis
269a3(rnying rgyud): mdzad ma// ye shes klong yangs 'khyil pa'i homakhung du// dmardzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i sbyin bsreg 'di// ra t+na kro tI sku la mchod pa 'bul// yum dag po tI la sgra'i yul du snang ba thams cad bsdus te phul bas chos kyi gsung rnam par dag par gyur to//

269a5(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba'i sbyin bsreg 'di// sa rba bo tI'i gru la mchod pa 'bul// yums nu kro tI la tshor ba'i yul du sdang ba thams cad bsdus te phul bas zla gam gyi ljags rnam par dag pa'i dngos grub thob bo// kye gnas yul rnams 'joms mdzad ma// g+hA h+ya gro dz+dza hA
269a6(rnying rgyud): rI'i sgra// brdzus pa'i skye gnas thams cad 'joms mdzad ma// skye bzhi mkha' bzhir phyags mas 'debs// b+ha ga bzhi yi ngang du rdzogs// ye shes klong yangs dkyil pa'i ho ma khung du// dam rdzas bdud ci 'bar ba'i sbyin bsreg dang //
269a7(rnying rgyud): gau t+yA'i skul mchod pa 'bul// yum d+ha rba lo tI shwa rI la skyes gnas yul du snang ba thams cad bsdus te phul bas mkhang bzhi'i grong du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur to// rag bya'i yul rnams 'joms mdzad ma// ya na kro tre sha rA
269b1(rnying rgyud): sprul te rtse ba'i gnas bcom nas// kye bzhi mkha' bzhir phyags mas 'debs// b+ha ga bzhi 'i rang du rdzogs// ye shes klong yangs 'khyil pa'i hom khung du// dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i sbyin bsreg 'di// yaT gro ti'i sgral mchod pa
269b2(rnying rgyud): yum rak+Sha kro tI shwa rI la kyes gnas mtshan ma'i yul du snang ba thams cad bsdus te phul bas dus gsum 'gyur ba med pa'i spu thob par gyur to// don gyis mchod pa slo ba bzhi la dbul lo// de ltar cho gcig la sbyin bsreg bya/ tsha gcig gzhang /
269b3(rnying rgyud): khang gi phyi rol du khyer te/ lhag ma'i gnas bdun bya/ gom pa bcu gsum bor zhing gnas re re byas shing las bcol lo// gom pa bdun cu rtsa gsum tsam du phyin pa dang / hom khung zla gam du brkos la/ dbang phyug ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi
269b4(rnying rgyud): bsreg bya/ de nas slar log nas/ b+han+ta la ripA lnga'i mtshan byang bris pa slob dpon gyis blangs la/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su seng ge'i gdan la 'dug la/ slob mas ru lu gar gyi zos bskor la dngos grub gsol lo// dung khrod gsang ba ma
269b5(rnying rgyud): gi dkyil 'khor 'dir// ngang rim dmar po dag la rten bcas shing // bla ga ma dmar po'i steng du dbang nod nas// me mar dgu pa dag la mdangs byung nas// b+han+t+ra mtshan ldan dag la tha tshig bsgos// sgyu gsung thugs kyi dngos grub rab 'byams rnam
269b6(rnying rgyud): bdag cag pa srub mchog rnams la stsal du gsol// oM ru lu ru lu hU~M d+ho h+la/ dpon slob kun gyis bzlas/ de nas slob dpon gyis rim bzhin dbang bskur ro// bdag nyid dngos grub blang ba 'di skad do// dpal dang ldan pa'i b+han+d+ha mchog
269b7(rnying rgyud): bzhin gnas pa'i lcang lo can// bdud rtsis bkang bas tshe mchog ste// thams cad dbang gi rang bzhin pa// bdag nyid dbus su 'dug nas ni// rang bzhin 'byung ye shes lha rnams pa// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub mchog
270a1(rnying rgyud): phyi ma'i dus la mi bzhed par// da lta bdag la stsal drug sol// zhes brjod la dang la bdag nyid kyis dngos grub blang ngo // de nas slob ma ri ma bzhin du dbang bskur ro// slob ma rnams kyis kyang / du
270a2(rnying rgyud): me tog thal mo'i bar du bcug la/ 'di skad brjod do// dur khrong gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor du// drung khrong rdzas kyi me tog bor nas kyang // sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub stsal du gsol// de skad brjod nas dkyil 'khor la 'bul lo// de
270a3(rnying rgyud): slob dpon gyis slob ma lag cung rje ljin nam/ drang stong gsang ba mchog gi dkyi la mod du// byang chub de ji ri la ma la dra das nas ni// sgrag sung thugs kyi dngos grub rgyal du gsol// dkyil 'khor kyi dbus su bzhag la dbang bskur ro// dang sa me pa
270a4(rnying rgyud): dang bskur ba 'di skad do// ye shes gnyis med 'khyil ba'i rtsa// sna tshogs tshogs chen 'byung ba'i rtsa// skal ldan 'di la dbang chen bsrung ba'i phyir// bdud rtsi mchog bsrub dam rdzas ka pA la// gsang rdzogs thugs kyi dngos grub 'phel gyin// badz+ra dA yu
270a5(rnying rgyud): da nas mu lngas dbang bsrung te 'di skad do// mthing nag su gsum dbur med su// rtag tu tu chen grong na 'khyil ba'i sa// bde chen byang chub sems su mngon rdzogs pa// badz+ra hi drA ka yi dbang bsrung ngo ro// chags pas mi gtang dbang giHla rdo ste// byang chung gter
270a6(rnying rgyud): ldan lnga dang rtag tu dakhyil pa'i sa// 'khor ba ma lus mya ngan las 'das pa// pad+ma he ru ka yi dbang bsrud do// dkar bas chos nyid cir yang gsal ba'i sku// mkhar mnyam dbyings phyag brgyad dang rtag tu rol pa'i sa// srid pa'i chos la yid kyis dbang phyu dang /
270a7(rnying rgyud): bud+d+ha he ru ka yi dbang bskur ro// ser po yid bzhin yon tan rgyas pa'i sku// ri rab chen po spyi skor brgyad dang rol ba'i sa// 'dod dgu yid bzhin re bskod mdzad pa// rat+na he ru ka yi dbang bskur ro// ljang ku srin las sna tshogs cing yang 'gyur ba'i sku/
270b1(rnying rgyud): bsnyen pas drangs pa'i gdan dang ma pangs// 'grob ma lus byung chub ba de la bkang// kam te drA/ yi dbang bskur ra// badz+ra ha drag yi che ba dang // pad+h+yate dug/ yi dbang 'dra dang // !/ tes/ yang ngos thub dang // dat+te drag le brtan pa dang // kaN te da?hA yi na
270b2(rnying rgyud): rlabs dang // he rba/ lnga'i thub pa mi 'gyur ba ba gnas so// da ni gsang ba'i he rug bzhi'i dbang bsrung te/ 'khor ba dbyings su sbyor bas dbang gi rgyal po ste// 'khor ba'i sems can ma chags klong du sbyor// chags med pad+ma bde chen lakhyil ba'is// dak+Sha he ruka yi dbang ba
270b3(rnying rgyud): ro// thugs nes mi bsgyel 'khor ba'i mtha' la dgongs// thugs dam gzugs kyis 'brel pas rtag tu dgongs// dam tshig rdzogs chen bla med 'khyil ba'i sa// sa rba he ru ka yi dbang bskur ro// gsang ba'i thugs rje gzungs kyi byin rlabs kyis// nyon mongs
270b4(rnying rgyud): zab klod du bzan mdzad cing // gsang ba 'khyil ba bde chen yum gyi mkha'// guh+ya he ru ka yi dbang bskur ro// nyon mongs 'khor ba ma lus rtsad gcod cing // thugs rjes ma lus bde chen dbyings su grol// drag shul rngamra pas srin po tsha dgacod de// don dam
270b5(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems la gsal bar mdzod// yak+Sha te drag yi dbang bsrung ngo ro// daltar rdo rje dbyings rgyug ma ni che ba yab kyi mkha'// pad+ma'i dbyings phyag ma ni gsang pa yum gyi dbang // rin chen dbyings thug ma ni yon tan rdzogs pa'i dbang // las kyi dbyings rgyags
270b6(rnying rgyud): ni phrin las gya mtsho'i dbadra// mkha' la dbyings phyug ma ni gyi 'byams rgyal me'i dbang // dbyings lhag tshul mo lnga yi dbang bsrung ro// 'byud lngas bsdus pas kun gyi rgyal por 'gyur// dag gro rje chags med gyon bral dbang // sa nu kro dId mchog rdzogs pa'i
270b7(rnying rgyud): dbang // g+huH po trisde gi med pa'i dngang // yan le tI po bcang gtsad dbang // gsang ba yum chen bzhi yis dbang bskur bas// 'dra 'bral med pa'i spyod du spun gyis grub// de nas dang la b+harnyas dbang bskur te// mtshan ma'i skyon thal d+haD+ha'i rdzas mchog 'dis/
271a1(rnying rgyud): skul ldan rnal 'byor 'di la dbang bskur bas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// b+hAn+tas dbang bskur bas chos skye ba med pa'i don rtogs nas// chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes dang ldan par gyur can
271a2(rnying rgyud): nas byang sems kyi dbang bskur te// skye med byang chub sems kyi rdzas mchog 'dis// skal ldan rnal 'byor 'di la dbang bsrur bas// rdo rje rigs kyi dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// byang chub sems kyi dbang bskur bas ma 'gags pa ma long
271a3(rnying rgyud): shes dang ldan par gyur cig/ de nas sha chen gyis dbang bskur te// khams gsum bskal ba'i rdzas mchog sha chen 'dis// skal ldan rnal 'byor 'di la dbang bskur bas// rin chen rigs mchog dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// sha chen gyis dbang bkur
271a4(rnying rgyud): pas rin po che'i rigs kyi dngos grub thob nas/ mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang ldan par gyur cig/ de nas rAk+Shas dbang bskur te// gsang ba mchog gi rak+ta da ma rdzas 'dis// skal ldan rnal 'byor 'di la dbang bskur bas// gsung mchog pad+ma rigs
271a5(rnying rgyud): dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// pad+ma rak+tas dbang bsur bas pad+ma'i rigs kyi dngos grub thob nas/ so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang ldan par gyur cig/ de nas dri chus dbang bskur te/ las mchog grub pa'i rdzas mchog dri chu 'dis// skal ldan rnal 'byor 'di la
271a6(rnying rgyud): dbang bskur bas// las kyi rigs kyi dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// dri chus dbang ba srung bas las kyi rigs kyi dngos grub thob nas/ bya ba nan tan ye shes dang ldan par gyur cig/ grub pa'i rdzas dang yon tan la// dang du mi len po dru de na// 'di ni spang
271a7(rnying rgyud): dedi dbyung bar bya// zhes bka' stsal to// de nas bkra shes pA'i b+h+yas dang / rdo rje'i tshe gsol bas 'dod pa'i yon tan dang ldan par gyur cig/ smon lam btab nas/ dkyil 'khor nas dbyung sgrub pa po rim pa nas dbang bskur ro// de nas las thams
271b1(rnying rgyud): cad dngos grub tu bya/ dngos grub dbang du bya ba ni// zla gam dbang gi ska ba shos dang / spyan gzigs sna tshogs pas drangs te// dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor bskyed/ dbang gi dngos grub ni/ zla gam gyi lha bshos la bsnyam mo// bshos cang skabs
271b2(rnying rgyud): la gsol lo// de nas grub pa phyen pa dang / slob dpon la yon dbul gtang rag gtong / de nas dkyil 'khor bsdu/ dkyil 'khor mtha' nas mi bsdu rgya// sdang srid 'khor ba'i sems can rnams// bde chen grong du dril pa'i don// da ni dkyil
271b3(rnying rgyud): 'khor mtha' nas bsdu/ dkyil 'khor lha tshogs dbus kyi gtso bo'i thugs kar bsdu/ dbus kyi gtso bo phyag mtshan rdo rjer bsdu/ phyag mtshan rdo rje yi ge hUM la bsdu/ yi ge hUM ni kye shi med pa'i don/ mtha' yi pho brang dbus kyi 'khor lo'i lte bar bsdu// 'khor/
271b4(rnying rgyud): lo'i lte bar spros pa med pa'i ngang // spros med kye shi med pa bde ba chen po'i klong // da ni sdang srid mtha' nas bsdu// sdang sred mtha' nas mi bsdu rgyu// sdang srid thams cad sangs rgyas rgyu// dug gsum sku gsung thugs su bsdu// nyon mongs lnga ni ye shes lnga ru
271b5(rnying rgyud): bsdu// smad cing bshung ba'i dam rdzas bdud rtsi lnga ru bsdu// snang srid thams cad kun bzang klong du bsdu// phyi nang sdod bcud thig le'i dbyings su bsdu// zhes bka' stsal to// de nas gter sbas te/ dur khrod gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor du// grub
271b6(rnying rgyud): mchog byang chub lam du zhugs pa'am// snang srid thams cad mi rtag dus byung na// zad med mi 'dzad gter gyis mdun nas bsu// skye shi med pa'i tshe dang 'phrad par shog/ dug gsum su gsung thugs su gter du sbas// dug gsum rnam par dag pas
271b7(rnying rgyud): 'khor gsum dang // sku gsum 'du 'bral med pa'i ngang du wa// 'gyur ba med pa thig le'i gter du sra// rdzogs pa chen po thig le bde chen klong // thig le bde chen klong du gter sbas pas// snang srid thams cad bde chen lam la dgod// lam gyi nang nas nye
272a1(rnying rgyud): lam pa der rdzogs pa// thabs kyi nang nas mno ngas pa ste// zag med byang chub sems kyis gter sbas pas// dus gsum sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med de// si lang dag ter zla dngos gru bzo par
272a2(rnying rgyud): zhes bka' rnam / yod gas ba tshan gi kyil 'dzi // 'phrul zhal me bzhin tana'i rdzas mchog dang // ma rig rgan sa la mem dgra pa dang // thugs bcob cad ge sang ba gnas 'dziH// nga la na
272a3(rnying rgyud): bsgral lags la// dus gsum rgyal ba rnams kyang mchod lags shing // dpal chen he ru ka yang bsgrub lags te// ma sring rgya mtsho rnams kyang bsgrubs lags la// dngos grub byin rlabs mchog rnams blang lags shing // mi gnas ye
272a4(rnying rgyud): shes thugs kyang bslubla lags kyis// dang po'i gnas mchog chos kyi dbyings su gshegs// de nas slob dpon gyis smon lam btab ste/ mi gnas ye shes chen po thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// 'gyur ba med par lhun gyis grub pa dang /
272a5(rnying rgyud): rab 'byams rgyal ba'i bka' la dbang thob nas// 'gro ba yongs kyi dpal du 'gyur bar shog/ 'di lta bu yi man ngag lung ston pa'i// bka' drin che ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang // srog gi lu gu rgyud kyis spel pa rnams// 'og min lhun gyis
272a6(rnying rgyud): grub pa'i gnas mchog tu// / dus gsu ma 'dra 'bral med par dgrogs pa dang // gsang ba chen po thogs kyi dkyil 'khor d+ha// bla med grags thugs su su par shog/ de nas phyir bcod pan bkrolali// gtor ma gcig bshams la// rgyal
272a7(rnying rgyud): chen dang phyogs skyong la bsngos pa// mtshams glod lus bsrung / bzod par gsol/ rdo rje rigs kyi sbub lugs khro bo muN+Da rI ka'i rgyud las/ zla gam bco brgyad pa'i dkyil 'khor srub lugs te gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom
272b1(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das dpal gachags/ skragasung thugs yon tan ldan las las sbyang ste/ mdzezhal kye dmyal 'khor gyi sgrub lpags 'di gsangs sa// phun sum tshogs pa bzhinar ldan na// rdzas dang sagazhi btag par bya// sa bdag rnams las dan
272b2(rnying rgyud): gzhal// blang dang srung ba tshul bzhin bya// phyogs bzhi dag tu mtho bzhi cig/ bgrang dang marnams kyi las rnams na// mtshams kyi drus thar bud da kyi cod pan btags // oM ba po r+d+ha Sh+NI li kI lA la tha~Ms Ta/ bzlab hrI Ta/ gardzag rda rje ma
272b3(rnying rgyud): han tan rje phaT/ da ha ha bre laT/ bcab kyi hU~M phaT/ b+hid+hi nyi laT/ hu lu hu su bruM pa Ta/ tiH tiSh+Tha braM Ta/ lan/ thon+ya tho paT/ glegs bu 'dom gang pa brgyal gdab/ de nas ma thiganan par byate/ mdza rdzig can ldad/ rngon
272b4(rnying rgyud): yang dpal chen he ru kas// bskal nas dur khrod chen por mdzad// de yang rnal 'byor dbang phyug gis// bskal nas dkyil 'khor chen por mdzad// dzaHhUM ba~M hoH/ ma hA shri he ruH/ mthi D+ha / hA na ha na/ ha ha haH/ pra bi sha ya d+hi phaT/ bcom ldan 'a
272b5(rnying rgyud): kyis bka' stsal pa// mig yo phyag rgya chen po yis// rluthu chen po baphral nas ni// mgo ni lho nub mtshams su bstan// rkang pa byang shar mtshams sa bstan// mthi mgo sras yan lagal// dkyil 'khor btsa gcig zi bar bya// dkyil du mthing nan
272b6(rnying rgyud): gsumaH// yam shing dag gis badrangs nas ni// hrIn byeg nam gas ma tshal bzhin b+ha// snying gar grags ma sum bcig la// dkyil 'khor bang rimags ma pathA// phur bu'i thu rtsa bdun dgong// lte bar gra gsum mthing nag la// tshal bud tum
272b7(rnying rgyud): rang bab ca dang thugs pa gzhag// steng 'ag bya ba mtshams brgyad du gzhag/ gnas brgyad dag tung kyil mdor bri// bskal pa'i me ri 'bang bas nan// gzhung bzhin rdzas kyang dgad par bya// thathA mtshan dang ldan pa la// dpa' chen la
273a1(rnying rgyud): yum mtshan bris te// bang rim dang po'i steng du gzhag// bar ma me mar dgra po dgod// tha ma b+hanA mtshan ldan bzhir// rigs bzhi yab yum dgod par bya// dkyil 'khod chen po bzung po la// sa mtshan
273a2(rnying rgyud): dgod do// dbus nas rang byad grub pa'i lha// thugs mchog badz+ra he ru ka/ dud khrod chen po'i gnas chen 'dir// ye shes 'bar bde klong dkyil du// ma tri bsnol ba'i gzhal yas la// bgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// ra nas ngang
273a3(rnying rgyud): byud grub pa'i lha// sku mchog bud+d+ha he ru ka/ dur khrod chen po'i gnas chen 'dir// ye shes 'bar ba'i klong dkyil du// ma tri bsgrol ba'i gzhal yas la// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// lho nas rang nyung grub pa'i lha// yon ta na da~M ny+dza he ru
273a4(rnying rgyud): dudu khrod chen po'i gnas chen 'dir// ye shes 'bar ba'i klong dkyil du// ma traM bsnol ba'i gzhal yas la// dgyes shing brten par bzhugs su gsol// nub nas rang byang grub pa'i lha// gsung mchog pad+ma he ru ka/ dur zod chen po'i gnas chen
273a5(rnying rgyud): 'dir// ye shes 'bar ba'i klong dkyil du// ma traM gi ni gzhal yas la// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// byang nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// phrin las karma he ru ka/ dur khrod chen po'i gnas chen 'dir// ye shes 'bar ba'i klong dkyil
273a6(rnying rgyud): mu hUM gi ni gzhal yas la// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// rgya gar yul nas grub pa mo// ma mo chen mo rgo rI'i gnas// dur khrod chen po'i gnas chen 'dir// 'di yi lag pa g.yas pa la// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol/
273a7(rnying rgyud): li yi yul nas grub pa mo// ma mo chen mo tse'u rI ma// dur khrod chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// 'di yi lag pa g.yon pa la// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// phal po'i yul nas grub pa mo// ma mo chen mo pra mo ha// dur khrod chen po'i gnas

274a1(rnying rgyud): sa nye tha ca bdun dgang // mad thun pa'ang bangs kyi dang // rang bzhin spya ces thub pa'i slod // de las sems kyi bras pa byed// ga nas makyis spyan ces zag/ delas gzhal las rung rna ma / da
274a2(rnying rgyud): chu 'bras ma bkag chos// de nas phur bu byang chub sems// chu 'bras gnyis ka mya ngan 'das// de nas bdag gi byang chub sems// srid pa gsum la dbang 'gyur zhing // bcom ldan 'das dang spel pa gcig/ gsang ba byang chub sems ca brtan
274a3(rnying rgyud): khams gsum ye shes bskyed pa'i phyir// grub pa'i ye shes tshon gang pa// gsang ba sngags kyis btab nas ni// su dang ldan par rab bstan te// khams gsum khro bos gang bar mdzad// mnyam nyid rig pa'i rtsal 'phang gis// bskal nas b+ha ga rang bzhin te/
274a4(rnying rgyud): phung pos chos su thob par 'gyur// srugasum rgyal ba'i sras su rtse// khams gsum kun gyi don byas nas// smospros pas stong gsum lhun gyis grub// snang srid srog ste sangs rgyas thugs// su gsung thugs kyi sa bon te// ljang srid he ru ka yi thugs// thams
274a5(rnying rgyud): cad rab tu brjid bskal bas// de nas sems nyid mya ngan 'das// khams gsum dur khrod khrag yin te// thugs rje chags pas bskal phyir ru// snang srid gdar sha bcad nas kyang // spyod pa rnam pa bcu dang ldan// mdzad spyod thams cad kun bzang srong // thams
274a6(rnying rgyud): da yi ge hUM ni skal pa bzang // snang srid dbang dung ngus nas kyang // snang srid kun las nges par bsgom// gzung 'dzin rnam gnyis gtan srad nas// rig pa'i ye shes skad cig la// snang srid gnyis 'dzin rtogs pa rnams// bsad pa las kyang mya ngan
274a7(rnying rgyud): 'das// snang srid mya ngan las 'das pas// kun bzang klong dung gis sbyor// srid pa gsum yang mya ngan 'das// sna srid 'khor ba'i byi thun bcad// byang chub sems kyi golas bcad// de ni byang chub sems kyi don// byang chub sems kyi phur bu 'di/
274b1(rnying rgyud): gri bas 'khor bcad nas brdud// spung med zur bus thebs zhes bya// snang srid cig pa'i dang dgas// nye bzhug sum mthing nagal// zur mthod pa zhal gsum ze// gzung bdun dgra sa brgyad kyang dgad// zur zang gA dang 'ab+h+rid bu// cadang ma dru
274b2(rnying rgyud): rtsa brgya dang dod// dbus rdo d+ha n+ya gram mo// ske tsha sha khrag len tshwa rnams// dug dang bsres la gtor ma bya// thugs rje chen po'i zhi ba las// gdug pa'i las rnams gtan grangs te// shin tu gdug pa'i gtum po la// zhibs 'dril bar mi 'gyur te/
274b3(rnying rgyud): rab thabs kyi sbyor ba yis// khros pa'i sku mchog 'bar ba dang // sprul pa'i khro bo mang po yis// gdug byed ma lus btul nas ni// dug gsum rtsa ba bcad nas ni// gtan du 'pho ba'i las rnams bya// 'byung ba'i dgongs pa gtan 'pho'i las bya'o// de nas ting
274b4(rnying rgyud): 'dzin nam gsam babyed/ 'ang bdag pa 'bres pa dang / dngos thab gastsopa/ zin pas brjod/ gtor ma dag dang mo rangs gtad/ sbyin theg gnang ba / 'grub ba mthar byin pa dang / gtir mig gargyal chen pani daphyogs rkyong la 'asngos pa
274b5(rnying rgyud): gtang dag gtang / rdo rje rigs kyi sbu bzhugs tho ba t+t+ra d+hig skyed las/ mthigs kyi gru bzhugs te bzhi po'o// / de nas dpal thugs su gsung thugs yon tan zhen las drug gsamagyi dkyil 'khor bang rim gsum pa 'di gsungs so// can
274b6(rnying rgyud): sum tshogs pa bzhir ldan nas// gnas dngas gzhi btag par bya// 'jig te nas bdag nya gyul// sa ri na gzhal nas sa bslang ngo // sa gzhi de 'i phyi'i mthu// so gzhi dag kyang gzug par bya// spyan drangs byin gyis brlabs la ba dag/ bsrung dang mtshams kyi
274b7(rnying rgyud): las rnams bya// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed la// phyi yi srang gong gzung bzhin bya// gzungs mabyin brla thig pud bkal// rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po la// bsrub lugs chen po bco brgyad do// yang dag thabs mchog rdzogs pa yis// sangs rgyas
275a1(rnying rgyud): 'ang can gcig pa nyid// 'bras pa'i 'dun na kun 'das pas/ nang byung ba'am smras mdzags/ nges par btags pa'i saganas// pa smra ba thang 'de tan// chu bathabs can na//
275a2(rnying rgyud): man ngag gtan tshigs so// blta 'di las ma 'das na// bsrub pa rnams kyang de bzhin bsgrub// stegs bu dom gang gru bzhi la// par ma mthing nag gru gsum pa// ya rbad mar nag zug ma mo// b+ha rA mtshan dang ldan pa la// dpal chen ha rtsi lab
275a3(rnying rgyud): la bzhag/ chom bu brgyad la gau rI ma brgyad rtsis la ba zhag/ tshil chen gyi me mar dgu btang / bar ma la sha chen dang zhing ras/ tha ma la phyag rgya bzhi dgod/ phur bu dar gyi cod pan can brgya khro bo bcu'i rdzas su dgod de/ thub par bya ba'i dang tshig dang / ga
275a4(rnying rgyud): 'jigs pa 'i brtul thugs can/ de dag goms nas nyams su blang // blo zhan shes rab chung bas ni// badz+ra ba kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur te// phung byed gnyis ka bsreg byas nas// dbas gzhan du khrel ba med// phun sum tshogs pa bzhir ldan nas/
275a5(rnying rgyud): rdzas dngas gzhi brtags nas ni// dkyil 'khor dmar nag gru bzhi la// dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad b+ha// de yi dbus du ro bzhag nas// snang mdzad lu ru bsgoms nas ni// de la rtsa ba'i sngags kyis gdab// rdzogs pa'i blta ba'i rang du bzhugs/

275a7(rnying rgyud): phrin lis kyi sbub pa thag mjug turtsa bcad pa'i sbub lugs 'di gsungs so// phun sum tshogs pa bzhir ldan nas// gnas dang sa gzhi brtag par bya// sa bdag rnams pas ni gzhal// bsla dang kyang ba rlung bzhinabya// phyogs pa ni dag bumatho ba ni bcug/ ba
275b1(rnying rgyud): dang mthams kyi sanams/ babyung nga chub sems ca bskyed/ 'is gangs dang kun bya// dkyi la dpa 'dapa gang pa shi/ gzung sa byen nabs gsad gtu/ ma sa na ga gdu 'du
275b2(rnying rgyud): sgo bzhi dag dang ldan par bya// de yi ci marnam bran// dmar pa sloba'i ldan par bya// demi gyir ma ma la// lag cu da dang ldan par bya// dbus su dpal chen 'ab phram la// da'i phyi mi khrag thung yab phrang mo// khribs la rdo ma ba rgyad dgag/
275b3(rnying rgyud): maldan la sing ha ma brgyad dgod// sgo bzhi dag tu phyag rgya ma// de yi bye ma dmar nag la// dbang phyug nyi shurtsa brgyad dgod// de yi phyir me lag nu hA// khro ba chen po bcu rnams dgod// ba su ta yi rgya 'phreng gis// dkyil 'khor chen po bskor bar bya// dge
275b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i g.yang gzhi zhi po ni// de de dag tu dribar bya// dbu' ma drug curtsa brgyad dpyod// de nas grub pa po rgyan pa zhi dang dbang yang bskur ro// de lta bu yid kyil 'khor la/ dzas das ma pa ni/ lta bzhos drugs pa/ ngasha'i thig le dbu byas pa dang / dam rdzas tshang ba
275b5(rnying rgyud): gtor ma la/ sprin chen gyi zhal kheb can dngango / b+haH bzed mor tshal chen dri me mar/ dmar kyi ar+g+ha dang bcas pa dgram mo// de nas zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed/ 'angab rdzogs pa dang / stong tshigs kyi mchod pa 'bral/ dngos pa ba gsol/ gtor ma na
275b6(rnying rgyud): dang tho rangs gtong / spang ma yang drang / lha bskyed mchod pa dbul/ rang bgrangs/ de nas bslab pa phyin pa dang / gtor mchog sum du bcad la/ cho gcig la sbyin sreg g+ha/ cho gcig mi zad pa'i gter dul/ de nas pra we shas rgod byed dkyil 'khor nas srung /
275b7(rnying rgyud): dang bskur yon phul/ gtang dag btang / de nas phyi rol du gtor mcha gcig sung ma la mthong / sgrar gshegs su gsol/ rdo rje rigs kyi sru ba sngags tho bo sun hrI/ 'i rgyud las/ zlag ma drug cu rtsa brgyad pa te drug pa'o// / de nas dpal
