281a1(rnying rgyud): phyogs pad+ma dbang gi zheng khams nas// dmar mo dbang srud 'od zer 'phro ba'i tshogs// cha dang ye shes dgug pa'i las mdzad ma// rdo rje'i tshe mchog dgug pa'i las mdzod cig/ byang phyogs in+d+ra nI la'i zhing khams nas//
281a2(rnying rgyud): phyogs byed ldang dgu 'od ster 'gro ba'i tshogs// tshe dang ye shes dgug pa'i las mdzad ma// rdo rje'i tshe mchog dgug pa'i las mdzod cig/ ting nge 'dzin gyis bsdus nas ni// 'od du gyur te dkyil 'khor dbus su bstim// zhes brjod do// rnal 'byor byang
281a3(rnying rgyud): ba sems kyi A y+ra dmar po 'di// chos nyid bye ba med pa'i dbyings su bslu// de la phyag rgya badran gyis gdab// dang por sku gsung thugs kyi rtsa// gnyis pa rdo rje rgyas ma rgya// gsum pa rta mchog dbang gi rgya// bzhi pa gser gyi zor ba'i cha// lnga pa ga
281a4(rnying rgyud): mkhan mchog gi rgya// drug pa zla gam dbang gi rgya// bdun pa chos nyid dbyings kyi rgya// chos nyid dbyings su tshe sbas pas// dus gsum rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas kyang // de la gzung zhing gtad du med// de lta bu'i bsgrub pa mthar phyin nas// gtor mtsho gsum
281a5(rnying rgyud): du bcad la/ cho gcig sbyin bsreg bya/ tsho gcig gis mkha' 'gro ma bskyang / tshe gcig mi zad gter du sba/ sgo dbye dbang bskur/ bkra shis dbul/ rdo rje rigs kyi grub lugs khro bo pu N+Da rI ka'i rgyud las/ rdzas dang dkyil 'khor la tshe sgrub pa ste bcu
281a6(rnying rgyud): gcig pa'o// / de nas dpal he ru kas/ sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas/ tshe'i khro bo'i smra ba lugs 'di gsungs so// phun sum tshogs pa bzhir ldan nas// gnas dang sa gzhi brtag pa dang // dbus kyi gtso bo dpal pad+ma he ru ka
281a7(rnying rgyud): ba sum gyi b+hang ba tha/ d+ha ga cig che skyems dang / tshe 'bras kyis bkang nas/ thum pa blong du byas la/ gzungs thag gis btags la/ dbus kyi gtso ba la yang 'gasol/ de'i phyi ma padra'i te blams la/ bah+la tshal bu bzhil/ gsang ba'i sram bzhi thos pa
281b1(rnying rgyud): gzhag/ bar du dpal rdo rje he ru ka bris la gzhag/ go Na m+baka sI/ sing ha kri d+ha ma dang bzhi/ sto nga/ he // gang Ta ni/ g+ham+mA d+hi b+hUk+te ma/ kang ka ma dang bzhi/ nub tu tuH he ru ka/ 'khor bu pa ta/ swa sha te/ pra pral ma/ kA ka ma dang pa ne/ mang du laka
281b2(rnying rgyud): ru/ pe tA lI/ tsan+ta lI/ shwa na ma/ u lU ma dang bzhi/ rdzas la khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bskyed/ de nas tsha bsul dgrag pa dang / tshe baspu keng gnas bya ba la sogs pa bya/ rdo rje rigs kyi grwab lugs la bo puSh+Ta rI ka'i rgyud las/ rngam tsho grub pa ste 'adz+raganyis pa/
281b3(rnying rgyud): de nas dpal rdo rje he ru kas/ sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas/ phrin las kyi dkyil 'khor la tshe grub pa 'di gsungs so// phun sum tshogs pa bzhir ldan nas// gnas dang sa gzhi brtag par bya// skyed dang bsrung dang bslang bar bya// matraM he yi dkyil 'khor du/
281b4(rnying rgyud): sa su 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa// de dbus 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad dgod// drug cu rtsa brgyad don bsgoms nas// yig 'brus phyogs bcur gang bar gnas// b+h+rUM dzaHhUM baM hoHyis dgug/ sku gsung thugs kyi snying po'i mchog/ lus ngag sems la bstim par bya'o//
281b5(rnying rgyud): de nyid dngos sam yid bzhin mchod// bum pa'i mchog ni bzang po yi// tshe gzhag gnas ni de yin te// yang nas yang du bkug byas nas// mngon sum smin par gyur pa dang // dbyings su yang ni sba bar bya// rdo rje tsho gas bsrung ba yin// brtan zhing 'khor los brgyan par
281b6(rnying rgyud): bya// snying po 'bru lnga nang du bstim// sangs rgyas ma lus thams cad kun// rgyal ba tshe dpag med par bsgom// su mdog gangs ri 'tsher ba la// rgyan phreng sna tshogs rnams kyis brgyan// yid bzhin rin chen phreng ba dang / rin chen rgyan dang za ma tog/ gzhan
281b7(rnying rgyud): yang 'gro ba'i don bya ba// bsam gyis mi khyab mtha' yas mchog/ bgegs kyis nr-i rnams mi ster na// tshe dpag med kyang khro bo ste// phyogs bcu nam mkha'i khams bkang nas// skra skad drag po bton nas ni// thams cad ma lus gdul bar bya// dbang du tshe
282a1(rnying rgyud): dpag med pa bsgom/ tshe bsnyen dang ni nye bsnyen dang // tshe bslab dang ni bsgrub chen dang // thabs dang shes rab 'byor pa yis// ci 'dod las rnams bslab par gsungs// tshe dbang mo ni rgyud 'beb lo// dkar ma mdog la 'ang
282a2(rnying rgyud): 'gro 'bar// phyag mtshan sna tshogs cer yang 'gyur// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu ni// gnas pa'i 'gro drug ma lus kun// phan pa'i tshe dbang 'dir sbyin no// de las lhag pa'i rgyud 'phel med// de yi bzlas pa'i chen po 'di// rnam gsum tshul gyi me 'khrul
282a3(rnying rgyud): bar// sngags bzlas tshag rgyan ma gcad// oM hUM swA AM hUM baM b+h+rUM badz+ra A yu She hUM swAHoM/ tshe rnams dbang du mya gyur na// bde gshegs lnga dang tshe dpag med// sra gsung thugs kyi gzungs kyis ni// phyogs bcu nam mkha'i khams bkang nas// phyag rgya
282a4(rnying rgyud): tshogs chen sna tshogs kyis// 'jig rten phyogs bcu'i bdud bcom nas// 'gro lnga'i tshogs rnams dbang du bsdus// phyag rgya'i gshol la sogs pa yis// 'og gi 'jig rten khams dgugs nas// gshin rje'i gnas nas tshe bkug ste// snying po lnga la bstim par
282a5(rnying rgyud): bya// phyag rgya'i 'khor lo chen po yis// steng gi 'jig rten khams bskor te// dbang phyug lha chen la sogs dang // bar snang khams rnams rgyu ba las// nr-i'i tshe rab tu dgug par bya// 'khor lo'i dbus la bstims nas ni// de nas yi ge 'bru lnga ste// nr-i ni
282a6(rnying rgyud): nam mkhar bstim par bya// oM oM oM/ badz+ra ka ba tsa rak+Sha haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra a b+hi tiSh+Tha swA hA/ phyag rgya spang ba'i cho ga ste// 'bru la yi ge 'brugacig ste// 'bru ga cig mi dmig dbyings su thim// a ying bzhin bum pa rin po che// rgyan dang rin chen phreng
282a7(rnying rgyud): bas brgyan// rin chen lnga dang sman lnga dang // 'bru lnga spos lnga yungs kar bcas// sngags mkhan rab ldan blo brtan pas// yan lag ma nyams sngags bzlas bsgom// rgyan cha lnga dang ldan byas nas// mchod yon rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// mnyes mchod
282b1(rnying rgyud): dngos sra ba thob par 'gyur// de lta bu ma dan rtogs nas// bsrub pa zin nas/ gtor mcha gsum du bcad nas/ cho gcig sbyin bsreg bya/ tshe gcig gis mkha' 'grob sngar/ chogacag mi za dbang gtar dus/ prAng bya/ dbang bskur/ rdo rje rigs kyi srub grags/
282b2(rnying rgyud): khro bo buN+Da rI ka'i rgyud las/ phrin las kyi dkyil 'khor la tshe sgrub pa ste bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas dpal he ru kas/ sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las kyi sgo nas/ gsang ba chen po 'di gsungs so// ye shes chen po bde ba che// ye nas rnam
282b3(rnying rgyud): dag kun bzang klong // rnam dag lam chen bskal ba'i dang // ma skyes pas na 'gag pa med// chen po lnga nyid bde chen klong // chen po lnga yi dang nyid du// thams cad ma lus sangs rgyas so// thams cad thig le'i rang bzhin te// snang srid thams cad mya ngan 'das// /
282b4(rnying rgyud): thams cad hUM gi rang bzhin te// yi ge hUM yang dngos gzhi kun dang bral// ye nas dag pas bde chen byang chub sems// chen po lnga yi ngang du snang srid thams cad sbyor// thig le gcig gi ngang du sbyar bas dus gsum lhun gyis grub// rdo rje rigs kyi sgrub yugs khro bo puN+Da rI
282b5(rnying rgyud): ka'i rgyud las/ spyir btang ba'i man ngag srub lugs te bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas dpal he ru kas/ su gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas/ bskal ba'i lung 'di gsungs so// phun sum tshogs pa bzhir ldan nas// rdzas dang sa gzhi brtag par bya// sa
282b6(rnying rgyud): bdag lha klu thams cad la// sa rin btsal te sa bslang ngo // srung dang bsrung ba tshul bzhin bya// de nas bsgrub pa gzhung bzhin bya'o// sngang srid thams cad skye med dbyings su bsgral// yi ge b+h+rUM ni byang chub sems kyi ngang // khrag dang rus pa sems dang dbug la sogs//
282b7(rnying rgyud): bsrel ba'i rgyul dpa' bo 'bru lnga dgod// khro chen bcu ni rngam pa'i stangs stabs can// de ltar bskal na don gyi snying po yin// rdo rje rigs kyi srub lugs khro bo puN+Da rI ka'i rgyud las/ ta na bskal pa'i lung gi sgrub lugs ste bco lnga pa'o// / de nas dpal
283a1(rnying rgyud): hacags/ phrags thogs nyi kyil la bar na// gti'i thabasgrags pa nigasungasaso// mu byos dkyangasas ma 'gags// kun tha ba na da dadang baphrang rnams sus // bcwacan dung du can dang / thar mig sa
283a2(rnying rgyud): zhes bya'o// blagasang dkar dmar rlung dkar gyi// sngon phran da ni lkug phran dang // ri mo can dang sdong gcig ma// me re ka dang ni rigs ngan mo// mtshams gcad byin brlab dbang bskur nas// de la sbyor ba'i cho ga ni// ting nge 'dzin gyis gsal bar brkom// de nas
283a3(rnying rgyud): ma zini shurtsa lnga dgod// rdo rigs kyi sgrub lug sa khro bo kro n+ti ka'i rgyud las/ ga Na chen po'i slab lpags te bcu drug pa'o// / de nas dpal he rbakas/ sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas/ mthe bzhi bcwo la gsang ba gter gyi drab lugs
283a4(rnying rgyud): 'di gsungs so// phun sum tshogs pa bzhid ldan nas// rdzas dang sa gzhi brtag par bya// sa bdag lha klu thams cad la// sa rin gzhal nas sa bslang ngo // sbyang dang bsrung ba gzhung bzhin bya// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi bya// gra yi stegs bram rnyed de bya/
283a5(rnying rgyud): de steng ma tre bzhi bsnol bya// mtha' mardo rje'i rabs bskor// de yi phyi rim me ri dgod// de yi phyi ri mthong ba bri// de yi phyi rim stegs bul// me yi spu gri 'bar babri// de yi phyi rim gro bzhi bri// de yi phyi rim gro byud la// zhing gi zar tshags bri'o// de nas b+han mtshan
283a6(rnying rgyud): ldan la// dpal chen yab yum snying po bre/ tshal bu la ral pa can brgyad bri/ de'i phyi mtshal bu la phra men ma brgyad bri/ tshul bu bzhi la sgom bzhi bri// thar pa gnas kyi dkyil 'khor du/ gdol pa 'byung po dmyal can// zhe sdang rnams kyis 'phrad pa'i rtsa// demi
283a7(rnying rgyud): dus gsum gzhig pa'i phyir// don gyi bslab pa chen po bshad// bgegs ni mi tog sems las byung // mdag nam gsum rgya yi rtsa ba yin// thugs rje 'byung ba bcom ldan 'das// grub padon gyi dkyil 'khor rtsa ba yin// dug gsum bskrad pa rnams kyi rtse ba yin//
283b1(rnying rgyud): drung khrod chen po'i gnas kyang yin// brjid ldan phu brnyes dpal chen nyes// bdag gzhan 'joms pa'i ting 'don gyis// stong gsum na trag 'og skabs su// du bzod padag po spyan rdungs te// ma reg skabs kyi 'phye nas// drug ga sum 'byung ba'i gro rtsenas// dma?
283b2(rnying rgyud): tog gzung 'dzin mtshams bcad de// ngan song gsum du dug gsum gyi// nyon mongs sems can sdang byed pa// zhe sdang dang ni gti mug dang // nga rgyal phrag dog lnga po yang // che ba'i ye shes chen po yis// bsdus nas sems can nam mkha' che// bde ba sbyin pa'i
283b3(rnying rgyud): da pa smras mardzo byin pa ma phyod / smranas tsa pa / ngamapa sasum gnas dag mnA cis sa
283b4(rnying rgyud): nyas paphrul ba bya// man rnapa mthams spya sa/ rka ba kyang shA rna rnams sa sal// yan lag kyang ba'i sa// lag pa gams pa'i du ste// rgyag su cwa n+d+haH// de bdag maug cis// mthang na 'a'ab ba la ba cas
283b5(rnying rgyud): mche gtsigs rkan brdeb dur khrod sgrol// dur khrod lag pa g.yon pa ni// li yi yul du bsgral bar bya// de yi bdag mo tse'u dri ma// ser mo 'bar ba'i ral pa can// mche gtsigs rkan brdeb dur khrod sgrol// dur khrod rkang pa g.yas pa ni// bal po'i yul du bskal bar
283b6(rnying rgyud): bya// de yi bdag mo pra mo ha// dmar mo 'bar ba'i ral ba can// mche gtsigs rkan brde 'a dur khrod sgrol// dur khrod rkang pa g.yon pa ni// tho gar yul du bskal bar bya// de yi bdag mo be tA lI// nag mo 'bar ba'i ral ba can// mche gtsigs rkan brjeb dur khrod klos//
283b7(rnying rgyud): dur khrod 'di yi mgo bo ni// za hor yul du bskal par bya// de yi bdag mo puk+ka sI// dmar ser 'bar ba'i ral pa can// mche gtsigs rkan brdeb dur khrod grol// dur khrod mkhal ma g.yon pa ni// u rgyan yul du bskal bar bya// de yi bdag mo g+ha sma rI/
284a1(rnying rgyud): na dkang thang 'ab ba'i dasapas/ mcho gtsogs nan 'de bangasadzang byo'o// drag dra 'das ba mamanan// song ga'i stsayang batha' drung ga/ snru gsong ga// myong naga'ad lab ca/
284a2(rnying rgyud): brda badrung thong srol// du zod mkhal ma g.yas pa ni// gling dgu'i yul du bsgral bar bya// de yi bdag mo tA 'aM// ldang se 'bar ba'i ral ba can// mche gtsigs rgan pa de ba du zod rgol// rba krod dbang mgo g.yas g.yon ni// tha men ta ga dang
284a3(rnying rgyud): drung khyod pa ni gas sa dang g.yon// tha men ma spyad pa rog zug/ mo ho'i rgyal mo de yengs// du gathod nar pa'i gang lag bani// lonya 'brug ma 'u ni'i ngas// drang zod bdag mi sun drungs te// bgegs kyi ma la pon baphral// bde byen pa'i da mi ba
284a4(rnying rgyud): bu khrod dbang phyug ste// sangs rgyas zhu ste ye shes yin// 'jam dpal rnon po'i mtshon cha yin// log tog 'khor ba'i rgyan gcad do// oM ma hA shri he h+ya ka/ gsum dza mahA lo d+ha hU~M phaT/ stong gsum d+ha tA'i Shog spangs la// 'byed lnga dang 'jigs byed pa/
284a5(rnying rgyud): thung da gnas su bkod byas nas// rdzogs pa'i ting 'dzin dbyings su tho ba zhes bya// khro bo dbu lnga ho ma ma'i dkyil 'khor d+ha// khro khrag 'thung yam shing brdungs pa la// ye shes rdza ye mye sar la// nyon mongs lnga yi rdzas bsreg pas// zhe sdang khro ba zhal hUM hom
284a6(rnying rgyud): khrung du// don khrag 'thung yam shing brdzangs pa la// me long lta bu'i me thar la// zhe sdang ngas nis bsreg byas pas// rdo rje'i rigs kyang mnyes gyur nas// thugs kyi dngos sub rgyal du gsol// gti lug khro bo zhal gyi ho mthung du// bung khrag 'thung sam shing ba dang /
284a7(rnying rgyud): pa la/ chos dbyings me shes me sbang zhing // gti mug ngas rnams pasreg byas pas// bde gshegs rnams kyang mnyes gyur nas// gru yi dngos grub yul du gsol// dmyal khro bo zhal gyi hom khung du// rin chen khrag 'phrang yam shing brdangs pa la// mnyam
284b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i ye shes me sbar zhing // nga rgyal rdzas rnams bsregs byas pas// rin chen rigs kyang mnyes gyur nas// yon tan dngos grub stsal du gsol// 'dod chags khro bo zhal gyi ho ma khung du// pad+ma khrag 'thung ya ma shing brdzangs pa la// rtog pa'i ye shes me spar bas//
284b2(rnying rgyud): 'dod chags rdzas rnams bsregs byas pas// pad+ma'i rigs kyang mnyes gyur nas// gsung gi dngos grub stsal du gsol// phrag dog khro bo zhal gyi ho ma khung du// karma khrag 'thung yam shing brdzangs pa la// nan tan ye shes me spa bas// phrag dong rdzas rnams
284b3(rnying rgyud): bsreg byas pas// las kyi rigs kyang mnyes gyur nas// phrin las dngos grwa bstsal dug sol// babyed khro bo'i nyom thang du/ phud dang lhag ma'i rdzas rnams bsregs// khrag 'thung dag mnyes gyur nas// bstan bsrung ba'i dngos grub byor// chog phyi ma gzhanas
284b4(rnying rgyud): mthun// dor rigs kyi sku ga lugs slob // 'i hud las/ mdza ba ni bcwo la gsang pa gter mi gru ba zhugs te ci tud da / // des dpa sa shenags/ sug sung thugs kyi zin las las// mchog 'grub chen po gsungs so// phan
284b5(rnying rgyud): sna mtshogs pa bzhir ldan nas// rdzas dngas gzhib rtag pa \u0f7f// sabadag rta tha thams cadas// sa rin ba tsal tas bsgrung // d+hang dang gsung ba tshul bzhinaH// de nas bgrub pa gzung bzhin \u0f7f// jig snang blang chub sems bskyed do// bshags
284b6(rnying rgyud): so da gad+ma// chos kyi 'khor mo brgya grod// gi rgyas byin pa theg zum bzhin bya// rgyas par dang 'bring dazung bzhin 'don// hrIn pan chenangs bzhin rtsa// de nus bslab pa gsung bzhin gyi'o// dkyil mkhor 'don gang grang zheH// phyogs pazhi dzi
284b7(rnying rgyud): 'ang kyi // dbus sa kyi // seM kyi thams cad // tshigs ga 'dzid/ kyis ma das kyi mi 'o// za zhipa la na zhi da // dbupa sa na/
285a1(rnying rgyud): pamathong pobs lagadang / dem mamams/ mtshanaman da mang tshus banon da// nagasas pa'i sa 'dang/ seng nga lan bdabs gangadu/ dmang drin du gartson gag na 'dud da /
285a2(rnying rgyud): sgo khyud la ni dbang phrag ma// de nas sgrub pa po'i mdun du/ b+hak+Sha'i bzed po ra dang / dmar gyi ar+g+ha yang drang ngo // khro bo'i phrin las gzhung bzhin bya// stod tshigs mchod pa gzhung bzhin dbul// 'jigs byed bskal pa'i dkyil 'khor du// pa byed lnga yi dkyil 'khor
285a3(rnying rgyud): bcas// thod pa tshad gnyis bskal ba'i phyir// drod tshad gsum gyis gtan la dbab// dag pa gsum gyis bskal bar bya// mtshan bzang po ni yod pa rnams// de nyid bsgrub pa'i rgyu yin te// za byed lnga yi dkyil 'khor du// 'jigs byed lnga yi cho 'phrul
285a4(rnying rgyud): gyis// bu ku sgo lnga'i dkyil 'khor du// bdud rtsi lnga yi zil dngar gyis// bu gu lnga yi thig btab po// da ni za byed tshogs bkod de// dbus nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// thugs mchog pud+d+ha he ru ka/ rgyud dug gnas su grol ba'i lha// dug gsum dbyings su
285a5(rnying rgyud): sdud pa'i mchog/ thugs mchog rak+kha he rU ka/ dbus kyi pho brang zlum po la// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// shar nas rang byang grub pa'i lha// sku mchog badz+ra he ru ka/ chung drug gnas su grol ba'i lha// dug gsum dbyings su sdud pa'i
285a6(rnying rgyud): mchog/ sku mchog dgra he ruka/ shar gyi dkyil 'khor chen po ru// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// lho nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// yon tan rat+na he ru ka/ rgyud drug gnas su grol ba'i lha// dug gsum dbyings su sdud pa'i mchog
285a7(rnying rgyud): yon tan ran he ru ka/ lho phyogs dkyil 'khor chen po ru// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// nub nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// gsung mchog pad+ma he ru ka/ rgyud drug gnas su sgrol ba'i lha// dug gsum dbyings su sdud pa'i mchog/ gsung
285b1(rnying rgyud): mchog na stes// na kyi sa pa nga can po// / dkris gang brtan par bklags su gas la// byang nas rang byung grub pa // zin las ka mas// mung drug gnas su thol pa'i // drug gsum byings su thud par 'am// rab
285b2(rnying rgyud): mchog dak+sha he ru ka/ byang phyogs dkyil 'khor chen po chu// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// ma mo chen mog tu mtho'i gzugs// mthing nag k+ta'i ral ba can// klud drug gnas su grol ba'i sgra// dug gsum dbyings su spyad pa'i mchog/ shar
285b3(rnying rgyud): gyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs sted \u0f7f// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs sgra gsol// ma mo chen mo gtum tho'i gzugs// ser nag 'bar ba'i ngal pa can// s+yAd drug gnas su grol ba'i rtsa// dug gsum dbyings su spad pa'i 'arkyod// dz+haiM le 'khor po'i rtsibs
285b4(rnying rgyud): ste dra// dgyes shing brtan par bzugs su gsol// mamo chen mo gtum tho'i gzugs// dmar nig 'bar ba'i ral pa can// rgyud drug gnas su grol ba'i \u0f7f// hwagag sum dbyings su spyad pa'i mchog/ rlab kyi 'dod lo'i rtsibs steng // dbye
285b5(rnying rgyud): shing rtun par bzhugs su gsol// ma mo chen mog tam tho'i gzugs// snang nagar lta'i nga la ba can// ud drug gnas su grol ba'i rtsa// phrag gsum dbyings su sdud pa'i mchog/ byung gri 'khong mo'i rtsibs ten d+ha// dgyes shing brtan pa dadi zhugs
285b6(rnying rgyud): sra ga 'o// tha men rdzogs mjam pa'i gzugs// gse ma dgas gar bya'i dal pa tsan// s+yAng drug gnas sa la ba snyen// thagags ma dbyings sa byud pabes s+ho// / gang kyi khong mi rtsigs bye \u0f7f// dkris shing brtan pa da ngabazugs gsol/
285b7(rnying rgyud): mamen gyogs mang ma pa'i gzugs// dam nas shAng sa lapa can// rlung drug gnas thong ba 'aM// ngag gisam dbyis pa srung ba'i mchog/ hU~M nr-i mang pa'i tshings bye // dgram shing brtan par grags sugs sa// tha menam cigapas
286a1(rnying rgyud): na'ags pa smrag// mnanas gnas na// na ldan 'a/ snal na / // sa/ pa sa
286a2(rnying rgyud): chen rdzogs sas de gcugs/ denang nag krol pa/ 'a la san// rgyung drug gnas bste// ga rnam sa na / byang ga yang ma ldab skye sa// dkyis ni dzi pa zugs pa /
286a3(rnying rgyud): gtum mo'i gzugs// dmang seng dga'i ngal pa can// rgyud drugaganas su kro bahrIs// dgagasu ma byings su srung ba'i mchog/ sher gyi 'khor po'i rtsibs ste du// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su ga sol// mem chen mog tum po'i gzug //

286a5(rnying rgyud): nga drug gnasas thos pa'i // gags ma stengs gyud pa'i 'jog/ chu kye 'ami ma'i phyim sa sted du// dgyes shing btan par bzhugs su gsol// ma mo chen mog ma khro'i gzugs// seng nag k+ta'i ngal btsun// b+hung drugaganas 'thus pa'i rna
286a6(rnying rgyud): ga me byings su dang pa / rdzu g-is ya ma du// dkris shi rgyan bzugs sa gsog// rna ldan thogs mngam pa'i gzugs// dka shi nga/ na// rlung gnas pa po 'aM/ gagapas sa kyi
286a7(rnying rgyud): chog// gang sbyi nga mo rtsibs tha~Mng du// dkyis shi na ni pang nga thugs phrag sa// sra men mchogs mangs pa gzugs// sgra rna pa mamabacan// rlung dru ga gnas sa sgo 'i'i \u0f7f// dragags sa byings drad pa chog/
286b1(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo'i rtsibs skyeng du// dgyes shing btan par bzhugs su gsol// phra men chen mo ga tu mtho'i gzugs// mthing nag 'bar ba'i ral ba can// gud drug gnas su grol ba'i lha// dug gsum dbyings su chud pa'i mchog/ nu'abrang 'khor mong rtsigs steng /
286b2(rnying rgyud): du// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// phra men mgyogs ma jam pa'i gzugs// sna tshogs rak+ta'i ral pa can// rgyud drug gnas su grol ba'i lha// dug gsum dbyings su sdud pa'i mchog/ byang shar 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng du// dgyes shig
286b3(rnying rgyud): brtan par bzhugs sgra gsol// bskul ba rdo rje aM ku sha/ dkar ldang 'bar ba'i ril pa can// rgyud drug gnas su grol ba'i lha// dug gsum dbyings su sdud pa'i mchog/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i shar sgo ru// dgyes nying brtan par bzhugs su gsol/
286b4(rnying rgyud): 'ching byed rdo rje lA sha traM// seng naga'abar ba'i ril pa can// mud drug gnas su grol ba'i lha// dug gsum dbyings su sdud pa'i mchog/ dkyil 'khor chen pa'i lto gong // dgyes shing brtan pa ngalcags su gsol// sbom byed rdo rje khro Ta'i// dmar nag 'bar
286b5(rnying rgyud): ba'i ral ba can// rgyud drug gnas su grol ba'i lha// dug gsum dbyings su sdud pa'i mchog/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i nub sgo ru// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// thal byed rdo rje g+haN+Te hoH// ljang nag 'bar ba'i ral pa can// rgyud drug gnas su

286b7(rnying rgyud): chen 'bar ba'i lte ba la// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// khro bo chen po gshin je gshed// dbu gsum phyag drug rdo rje'i gshog pa can// mthing nag rak+ta'i ral pagyen du 'khyil// rin chen 'bar pa'i lte ba la// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs/
287a1(rnying rgyud): su gsol// da chen po rta mchog dpal// dbu gsum phyag drug rdo rje'i gshog pa can// dmang nag ra k+ta'i ral pa rjes 'byeb// rin chen 'babyung ba stabang // dgyes shing brtan par bzugs du gsopa/
287a2(rnying rgyud): na ci rji// dbu gsum b+hag drug rdo rje'i gshog pa can// ldang nag gA'i ngal pa gyen du dbyil// rin chen 'bad pa'i lte ba la// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs pa gsod// rje chen mo nyams chen no// dbu gcig phyag kyang gnyi
287a3(rnying rgyud): g.yas pa ga ba'i sbrul 'brel// g.yon pa d+hi gtsal stong// dka'i rapa 'ang ma nag rkyen du 'khyil// gcol brten pa'i bdag nyid kyis// rin chen 'bar 'di sgrubang // dezhes shing brtan par bzhugs sug s+ho/ ni du klod bdag na/
287a4(rnying rgyud): gcig phyag kyang gnyis pa ste// g.yas pa gtso ba'i su la 'thil// g.yon nga b+han+ta gcol stob// rak+ta'i ngal ba kham nag gyen du'ibyil// gtsol brten pa'i bdag nyid kyis// rin chen 'bad ba'i lte ba pa// dgyes shing brtan pa bzhugs su gsol//

287a6(rnying rgyud): bzhugs su gsol// rdo khrom tha 'byin ma// dbu gcig phyag kyang gnyis pa ste// g.yas pa gtso bo'i sbrul 'khril// g.yon pa b+tan+ta ga col stog/ ral pa lam nag gyen du 'khyil// gcol brten pa'i bdag nyid kyis// rin chen 'bang ba

287b1(rnying rgyud): dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsopa// lho nas rang byar grub pa'i sgra// dam tshigs na he ru ka/ ser lngar 'bar ba'i ral pa can// spyan cha bstan cang bkrub pa'i sgra// sngon gyi thugs dam dbyings su gcig/ blag ma dbang gang bya pa dadzen du
287b2(rnying rgyud): dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// nub nas rang byung grub pade lha// gsang ba k+sha h+ya he ru ka/ dmar nag 'bar ba'i ral pa can// sngon tshe ya nas bsten pa'i lha// sngon gyi thugs dam bdag dang gcig/ bla ga ma dbang gi gzhal yas su/
287b3(rnying rgyud): de gyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// byung nas rang byung grub pa'i ste// stor bar ga nye ru ka/ sdang nag rak+ta rab pa can// sngon tshwa yi nas bsnyen pa'i lha// sngon gyi thugs dam bdag dang gcig/ blag ma dbang gi bzhal las sra// @
287b4(rnying rgyud): shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// yum bzhi yang dgod/ byang gi dkyil 'khor du dbang phyug nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyang dgod// byams zla gam du bri/ de nas dpal gyi sprin bsreg bya/ de nas gtor mtsho gsum du bcang la/ mchod pa bgyi/ phur ba dang

288a2(rnying rgyud): gyi rim me ri bya// de yi phyi'i ma rdo rje'i ra bas bskor// de yi phyi rim sgo bzhi bri/ steng nas 'gebs pa'i g.yang gzhi/ 'og thar pa'i rkang lag/ bar bAn+d+ha myung lo can// phyi ma b+har+b+ba'i bzed phor/ dmar gyi ar+tha/ rak+ta'i thig le dgu byas pa drang / de na
288a3(rnying rgyud): dgod/ dur khrod 'bar ba'i pho brang du/ lad ka'i khog srubs su/ ral pa rnams sbyangs nas/ rdzas dang bya ba gzhung bzhin bya/ rak+ta 'joms pa'i pho ta ni// babyed lnga yid la ba can// dbang mo rdza ni rdzas la dbang // mgyogs ma brgyad ni dud khrod 'joms//

288b2(rnying rgyud): cho dguH/ dbus su rnag ma dkarang mang gnyis/ phyogs mdzums su nags the/ der gyi rim du ba nang du bstan pabri/ de'i phyi rim du phyir bstan badri/ de'i phyi rim du bzhinang du bstan dad+hi/ de'i rnyim du drug ma bzhing nang du brten pabri/ de'i phyir mdun
288b3(rnying rgyud): gam brgya ba phyir bstan pa bri/ de'i phyi rim du bla ga ma nyi shu rtsa drug 'a phyir bstan pa bri/ de'i phyi rim du blag ma bzhi kha nang du bstan pa bri/ de nas rdzas dgod pa dang / las la bya ba kun dbel sdud la ltos/ b+hat+ta gzhal yas khang du/ lha gzhung bzhin bskyed/
288b4(rnying rgyud): shes rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor du// dbang chen ma gram thags gtams pa la// dang ye shes mi phyed dgu 'bang ba// che bdagra yi khyad par bye brag las// dpal chen dgu ni sra dzags// yum chen dgunani dbyings su ngos// rje dgun thugs pa 'bar/
288b5(rnying rgyud): chen dgu ni klong na 'khyil// che ba dgu ni skang du rdzogs// d+han+ta dgu ni dpal gyi grwa// zla gam dgu ni yum gyi dbyings// thig le dgu ni byang chub sems// me mar dgu ni ye shes dang // de ltar dgu dgu dgu byung ba// dgu klo babar ba gcig gi dang // dgu bkag

291a2(rnying rgyud): badz+ra bod+hI sha dzi/ lho yi za byed dbang mon// ma chags mdangs kyis gcol 'khril// ra dra kro d+hI shwa rIH/ nub kyi rba byed dbang ma ni// ma chags mdangs kyis gtsol 'khril// par+b+ba krod+hI d+hi ro/ byang gi za byed dang // mtshugs ma

291a4(rnying rgyud): mda' 'gengs tse rI // dbyings nas bskul ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// bsnyen bsrub dbang gi dngos grub stsol// dmar mo chu srin pra mo hA// tshangs me'i tshul gyis dbang mdzad ma// bsnyen bsrub dbang gi dngos grub myong // nag mo rdo rje be tA hi/

291a6(rnying rgyud): thugs rje chags pa'i dkyil 'khor du// bsnyen bsrub dbang gi dngos grub stsol// mthing nag snying zan swa sha nI// tsit+ta thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// bsnyen bslab dbang gi dngos grub stsol// dkar ser mgo gcod tsaN+Da lI// ya mtshan che ba'i dkyil
291a7(rnying rgyud): 'khor du// bsnyen bslab dbang gi dngos gru bsnol// seng gdong phra men tha byed seng ge'i mgo// mi 'jigs dbang po zil gnod dngos grub rtsol// stag gdong dmar mo dpa btul rtag gi mgo// dpe btul rigs byed dngos rngub rtsol// dmar mo dag
291b1(rnying rgyud): chen wa mgo sring gA li// g.yeng med las mdzod dngos grub stsol// mthing nag rngams khro sha zan srung ki'i mgo// smin byed rngam pa'i dngos grub stsol// dmar ser mkha' la rgyu ba'i byagod mgo// skes byed kun tusgrub pa'i dngos grub spol// drung dzad
291b2(rnying rgyud): kun tu nyul byed dur dbya'i mgo// dur khrod tshogs kyi dngos grub stsol// nag mo bya rog rnam dag chos kyi sra// dug gsum skyon bral dngos grub stsol// sna tshogs spyan ldan zag pa'i mgo// thug rje rnam dag spyan gyi dngos grub stsol// dkyil 'khor de yi
291b3(rnying rgyud): na// dkrir ma 'grags pa ma mag// stan na lag mag 'grus pa can// dmi ma sngags thog sa// rdzus byung mig N+DI za // dkang tan pa byed smra gyu// gzhan pa khrong chen no// dang rnags pa yi
291b4(rnying rgyud): dbang mdzad mthu yi dngos grub stsol// bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor bya ba'i phyir// rdzas kyi khyad par bstan par bya// sgrub pa'i gnas rab dam pa ni// bkra shis rtags can dben pa'i ri bos bskod// gsang ba'i bsgrabazla gzungs ma de// dug rnams med cing dad pa che//
291b5(rnying rgyud): zab mo thub pa'i yul la bsgrub// mtshams med phyir yang mtshams bcad de// 'byung po'i gtor ma btang nas kyang // sgrub pa nang gi don la zhugs// dkyil 'khor stegs bu brtsigs nas ni// dmar dang dkar gyi thig gdab po// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la//
291b6(rnying rgyud): rak+ta'i byang chub byug nas kyang // del bar bu brko bar bya// rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i cho ga mdzes// steng 'og dang gyi pho brang dgod// de nas bsnyen pa gzhung bzhin bgrang // de ltar dkyil 'khor rdzogs nas kyang // ting 'dzin yang dag chen po dbab// gsang
291b7(rnying rgyud): ba me dpung gi rgyud las/ grub pa'i gleng gzhi'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / da ni bde ba rang byung ba grub bshad de// ma spangs pas ni bsgrub pa'i 'bras bu nyid// rang la rdzogs par shes na dngos grub mchog/ bsgrub med bsrub na bsnyen bgrub yin//
292a1(rnying rgyud): rdzas dang yan pag gzhi pa dzang// 'ad cang btsal ba mad pa'i mchog/ 'dotshan kun tu byang chub kun gyigatad// dpa sa tshan pa da dngangs chag sam las 'das/ munya ga dmigs da gralangs sa rang ma
292a2(rnying rgyud): dmigs pa snang ba shar dpyir byung ba'i dkyil khod btsam// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang ku bzhil// dbus su byin rlangs gni ma thig gdab// dkyil 'khor yum gyi mkhang 'jig btang bas// mi mngon rnam dag dbyings na tha rdza byed// jigags
292a3(rnying rgyud): dkyilas 'dzi dri// dbus su dus da na can tshul// ma dang shAtsi bus swA gzhag/ den kyi nga kyis rgyan/ ma sa sa dang/ drug ra byang chu thams ca// ca /
292a4(rnying rgyud): yon tan dong mardzogs// brjod 'i kyil lam byed pa yang // brtson pa 'i sa// mchags ma bshad pa sa nya che / dbatid thub pa lag su pa'i kyilang po la// rjod rtsa
292a5(rnying rgyud): rung ba'i dkyil 'khor bsdus// g+ha rgya gas chen thugs kyi klong // thugs chen thugs kyi bslab pa ste// kun bzang bde chen dbyings su 'dus// gsang ba med dpung gi rgyud lam/ thugs kyi sgrub pa'i le'u ste gsum pa // las
292a6(rnying rgyud): lta ba'i mdong ba gan to// srid gsumathugs rdo'i dbyings su bsgom// khams gsum le bums dkyil 'khor chen po la// stong gsum yum gyi klong 'thams la// ci shing nags tshal D+yan gri drab ste// ri brag lha yi sur gsal mchog/ rang byung le nas
292a7(rnying rgyud): gsal ba'i dkyi 'bang du// 'chi ma rdo rje'i skugasung zhugs// mthis gdod nas gas pa pa'i gnas// gsang ba'i po brang rdzogs par bsgom// bsgru pa chen po'i dus nyid du// ni sa dbang ga rgyas btab la// lugs grangs dngul gyis spang bar gyi
292b1(rnying rgyud): mtsholas kyi rkang pan// 'byung ba lnga yis bslab pa bya// 'bras k+Sha la khrab yang // bcud dgyur pas thams cad bgrub// thams cad dang byung bdud kyang 'khyil// byin pa lnga dang rgyas pa jug/ ma spangs la nas kun tu bzung // de ba babral po rnam nga/
292b2(rnying rgyud): pa// don dam rnal 'byor sems kyi snying po ni// theg pa kun gyi rgyal po yin// 'di nyid rig pa'i rgyal po rang dbang rdzogs// stong gsum kun gzhi'i klong du 'dus// srid gsum sku gsung thugs sugs la// sems kyi rgyal po sangs rgyas la// sangs rgyas
292b3(rnying rgyud): gzhan du bcol mi dgos// dmyal ba'i khams nyid bla med la// yegs dathugs kyi sgrub pa ste// ro dag col dang bral bas bsrub pa nyid// gsang ba me dpung gi rgyud las/ g+hu h+ya gsang mdzod kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas me dpung
292b4(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbyings 'byung ste// grub pa chen po brtsam pa'i phyir// gnas dang sa gzhi brtag nas ni// sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas par byed// de nas dkyil 'khor brtsam pa ni// sgrub pa'i rgyal po dbang gis gzhi la// rdo rje rgya gram brag chen 'bar bas gtams/
292b5(rnying rgyud): thugs rje yum gyi dkyil 'khor bsam pa'i phyir// thig skud rgyu ni man dag bka' brgyad la// shes rab mtshan dang ldan pas bkal ba yi// thig skud byang chub sems dang ldan pas gdab// gnod byed bgegs bskrad drag pos mtshams bcad do// phaT/ na maHsa
292b6(rnying rgyud): man+ta/ tad+ya bar sha nod pakla gaH// ku shwar kA s+phar ya phaT/ rma byung rol pa chen po'i ngang nyid kyis// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dbyings nas bskyed nas chag chag 'debs// ti berak+ta maN+Da la hU~M/ kye med rnam bshad bdud rtsi'i mchog/ ye shes gsal don me
292b7(rnying rgyud): long ye shes te// gsang ba'i tshem bu dgu yi dkyil 'khor dgod// stong gsum brdal ba yum gyi dkyil 'khor du// thugs rje 'gyur ba med pa'i theg gdab pas// srid pa'i pho brang rab 'thams dbyings sugs la// stong gsums gzhi yum gyi dkyil 'khor du//
293a1(rnying rgyud): mid pa rbag sang rnags kyi ga ga sapas// ngabru ga thungs sgrapa khyad par byas// 'ad sa gzha' can ma shes sa rdzogs// dag cang dum da' bras smra sa ma/ ban/ nga du/ rgyun dun/ dgam/
293a2(rnying rgyud): srid pa'i pho brang rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor du// sems kyi bdog rnams kyi bye brag ste// mi zad rin chen lnga yi tshon du gsal// stong gsum 'jig rten bams rnams su// pho brang nga byung 'jigs pa'i gzugs// rtsi shing mang po'i tshogs rnams kyang // dargyal
293a3(rnying rgyud): khro bo 'bar ba'i gzugs// 'jig rten khams kun dbang du spyad// drag po gzer gyi mtshams bcad do// kI li k+ShI la yaSh+TAM/ 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po yang // dur khrod kyin gyis chas su bzhugs/ de nas rnal 'byor med pa yas//
293a4(rnying rgyud): las rnams kun byas nas// mtha' mad mod bcol bshags sbyang bya// gsang ba med dpung gi rgyud las/ dkyil 'khor las kyi dang po'i le'u skye lnga ba'o// bcom ldan 'das dpal bde mchog chen po'i gtsol phyag 'tshal lo// tha pyibyed mal
293a5(rnying rgyud): tshul po sbyin sreg gtso// mchod pa'i sbyin sreg bshad phyir me yi mun dag bstan// dur khrod dkyil 'khor brtsegs pa ste// zlag ma dmar po dbang gau tom// stong gsum yum gyi gzhal yas brtsig/ zur gsum mthing nag drag po'i hom// dur khrod cher po'i grong
293a6(rnying rgyud): dkyil brtsig/ zlum po zhi ba'i ho ma khung ste// ma skyes thig le chen por bcig/ gru bzhi byas pa'i hom khung ste// 'jig rten dur khror khyad par du// 'bar pa'i ho ma khung brtsig par bya// sa gzhi gzhal yas brtsig pa ru// khro bo 'bar ba'i hom khung bcig
293a7(rnying rgyud): stong gsum stong gi dkyil 'khor du// 'byung ba lnga yi hom khung bcig/ kun bzhi 'bar ba'i gzhal yas su// ye shes mchog gi hom/ khung bcig/ kun tu bzang mo'i mkha' dbyings su// rtog pa chen po'i hom khrang brtsig/ blags yum gyi mkha' la brtsig
293b1(rnying rgyud): gra na pa // chags lags gas // napa can / nyam tha pa klu // gags // de khas pa shAs // ba /
293b2(rnying rgyud): lu migaH// dbyings dang 'i shes rgyas gdab bo// rdo rje sems dang 'thugs kyigaH// me lang ye shes rgyas gdabag// rin can 'thung ldan yon tanagaH// mnyam nyid ye shes kyis gdab bo// rdzang mtha' las gsung gig // mer rtog pa shes byags
293b3(rnying rgyud): don ya thub pa phrin las gtso// tha thub pa zhes rgyas gdapa bo// phyi la ba dag dbyings kyi to mdzang du// lo ga rtag mtshan ma med pa'i lam shing sa// rtog pa ma shes 'od kyi ma b+har bas// gsod mig po rjod brgyad pa 'thugs hU~M// nganam byin rdzo gas las
293b4(rnying rgyud): byang chub ga tir// ma zhes kyang ba da ba ba nyim dza / bad chen pa'i bral mtshang par jam/ cho nyid smos pa med pa'i ma nga nga// da mi sul du rjong pa'i las shing // rtogs pa la shes rjo kyi ma thA bas// mi galas kyi drug sngal bathags paH/
293b5(rnying rgyud): shes slong yangs bkyil pa'i nyom krung du// bde ba chen po'i skul mchod pa 'bral// stong gsum brdal ba phram gyi ta mkhung du// srid gsum skye bar byung ba'i lam shing la// gnyis mngon ma dag mchog gi masbar te// ye shes klong yangs dkyil pa'i hom khung du// 'dab ca/
293b6(rnying rgyud): po'i bral mchod pa 'bul// snod gi 'jig rten yum lnga'i mkha' klong to ma khrung du// bcud kyi 'jig rten bdag 'dzin lam shing la// rtogs pa gnyis mi snying po'i mi sbar te// ye shes slong yang sa 'khyil ba'i hom khung du// pad pachen po'i grub mchod pa 'bul// mkhyes rnas
293b7(rnying rgyud): dag gyis kyi mdzang du// byi rdzal zang po'i lam shing pa// rtobla la shas kyi'i wa nas// legs slong langs dbying pa'i com krung dri// bde chen po'i tshul mtshad pa 'bral// klong yangs rnams 'dapal ba to mthang d+ha// sre nga can pa na
294a1(rnying rgyud): yam shing la// rtogs pa ye shes 'od kyi me sbar nas// ye shes klong yangs 'khyil pa'i ho ma khung du// nam mkha'i dbang mo'i skul mchod par 'bul// thugs rjes 'degs byed sa yi zhom khung du// srid gsum skye bar snang ba'i dam
294a2(rnying rgyud): shing la// rtogs pa ye shes 'od kyi me sbar nas// ye shes klong yangs 'khyil pa'i ho ma khung du// rdo rje dbang mo'i sku la mchod par 'bul// thugs kyi ting 'dzin rgya mtsho'i ho ma khung du// sdug bsngal skyon gyis sbags pa'i yam shing la// rtogs pa ye shes 'od ci me sbar nas/
294a3(rnying rgyud): ye shes klong yangs 'khyil pa'i ho ma khung du// rin chen dbang mo'i sku la mchod par 'bul// thugs rje sreg slong me yi ho ma khung du// mtshan ma bud pa'i yam shing mang 'bul bas// rtogs pa ye shes 'od kyi me sbar nas// ye shes klong yangs 'khyil pa'i ho ma khung du// pad+ma dbang mo'i mu ba mchod par 'bya
294a4(rnying rgyud): thug rje g.yo med rlung gi hom khung du// sdug bsngal bag chag bud pa'i yam shing la// rtogs pa ye shes 'od kyi ma sbyar nas// ye shes klong yangs 'khyil pa'i ho ma khung du// las kyi dbang mo'i sku la mchod par 'bul// thug rje 'byung ba lnga yi ho ma khung du// srid pa'i sdug bsngal tshogs pa'i yam shing la//
294a5(rnying rgyud): rtogs pa ye shes 'od kyi me sbar nas// ye shes klong yangs 'khyil ba'i nyom khung du// 'dod pa'i dbang mo lnga yi sbrul mchod par 'bul// b+ha g.yum gyi ho ma khung du// dam rdzas bdud rtsi'i yam shing la// rtogs pa ye shes 'od kyi me sbar nas// ye shes klong yangs 'khyal pa'i hom khung bya//
294a6(rnying rgyud): bde chen yab yum skul mchod par 'bul// zla ga ma dmar po nam mkha ho ma khrung du// rang byung rgyal po'i sku mchog bud+d+ha'i dpal// phung po gnas gyur bud+d+ha he ru la// dam rdzas bdud rtsi'i mchod pa 'di 'bul gyi// mi 'gyur sku yi dngos grub stsal du gsol// rang byung rgyal po'i
294a7(rnying rgyud): thug mchog he su dpa la// rnam shes gnas gyur dpal chen rdo rje la// dmardzas bdud rtsi'i mchod pa 'di 'bul gyi// skye me dbug kyi dngos grub stsal dugs la// byung rgyal po yon tan bal// tshor ba gnas gyur dpal chen shA la// dam rdzas bdud rtsi'i mchod pa 'di 'bul gyi// yon tan
294b1(rnying rgyud): lhun grub dngos grub stsal du gsol// rang byung rgyal po gsung mchog pad+ma dpal// 'du shes gnas gyur pad+ma he ru la// dam rdzas bdud rtsi'i mchod pa 'di 'bul gyi// mchags gsung gi dngos grub stsal du gsol// rang byung rgyal po drin las kanA dpa'/
294b2(rnying rgyud): 'du byed gnas byung dpal chen ka rmal// dmadzes bdud rtsi lnga yi mchod ba 'bul// las rnams rdzogs pa'i dngos grubasbrul dugasol// thugs rjen ma dag rgyal po'i pho brang du// srid gsum dbang srung hU~M lo sbyor ba co// chags pa'i rgyal mo dud+ha drod+hi la/
294b3(rnying rgyud): rdzas bdud rtsi lnga yi mchod pa 'bral// gnyis med byang chub mchog gi dngos grub stsal dugasol// skye med rnam dgazugs kyi sto ba mo// chags pa'i thugs rjes khams gsum byas 'de bas ma// khrug 'thung ni sdang brjo rtul// dam rdzas bdud rtsis mo mchod pang dru
294b4(rnying rgyud): gnyis med byang chub mchog gi dngos grub stsal du gsol// mi zad rin chen lta bu'i gte mang zhing / yon tan bang gis 'og rtog rdul du rdog/ khrag 'thung ruH badz+ra wo d+hil// dam rdzas bdud rtsi lnga yi mchod pa 'bul// gnyis med byang chub mchog gi dngos thub stsal du gsong/
294b5(rnying rgyud): ma chags pad+ma lha bu'i rdzu mnga' zhing // 'dod chags dbang gis khams gsum kun la sbyor// chags med skyong mdzad pad+ma kro d+hi la// dam rdzas bdud rtsi lnga yi mchod pa 'bul// gnyis med byang chub mchog gi dngos grub stsal du gsol// las rnams rdzogs byed thugs rje drang
294b6(rnying rgyud): ldan// phrin las rdzogs pas rgyud drug rtsad nas gcod// thugs rje thabs ldan ka ma kro tI la// dam rdzas bdud rtsi lnga yi mchod pa 'bul// gnyis med byang chub mchog gi dngos grub stsal du gsol// za byed sreg pa me'i hom khung du// chags pa'i yum du bcas pa'i
294b7(rnying rgyud): sbyi theg gi// chags lnga bya ba dbyings sde lhun gyis drug// sbyin sreg rdza la mchod pa 'di yul gyi// bdud rtsi mchog gi satshong pa dngos dru bstsal drugasol// dmanyams dam spong mthu dang ngo thung stsol// ga byed nga rjong ma'i homadrung du// ma' /
295a1(rnying rgyud): mtho mapa 'a can kyad rnam pa// ts+tsha ga gi mdzad pa sa// ga tu pa rnam rnags nga// thaM ga sgyu pa gas mas/ sang sas malas rdzun ma du// dmangs
295a2(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi mchog gi mchod pa 'bral// thugs rjebabs dang ldan pa'i sgra mngadab// 'ogatsog las kyi skyon rnams dbug smang du// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa'i mda' 'dzin cing // dbyings kyi dang pas sbyong ba'i ser mo dzo d+him// dmadzes bdud rtsi mchog sa mchod pa rda
295a3(rnying rgyud): 'khor bya mang po thugs rjes bsgral skad du// mi nu ba rgya rin m+b+ha la mtshan phyug na bskams// sangs rgyas rgyal srid gcom dzad dmar mo ba mo he// dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i mchod pa 'phrul// sa dgu 'joms pa'i rdo rtse dgu 'phyar// d+hang sgrol mdzad ye shes dbyings la sbyor/
295a4(rnying rgyud): nag mo 'jigs tshal ston mdza ba N+Dik+ki// dus rdzas bdud rtsi ba pa'i mdzad pa 'brem// rlud drugu yo ba gnas nas drang sku nga // dras tha~M zhing kyi rgyagags kyigan pa rnams// chos kyi kyi sa la myong ba'i dam mi dug ste// dang rjes bdud byed per ba ri mchod pa 'dum/
295a5(rnying rgyud): shes lnga dang ldan par mdad skad du// dbang po lnga ldan rjod pa phrag na bsnams// ye shes sdel sbyor ba'i rdo rdzas dkrug/ thugs rjethabs mkhas d+mo ldeng gras ni// dam rdzas bdud rtsi bar ba'i mchod pa 'phrul// zhe sdang chen po gtan nas 'joms mdzad pa// zhing mchog can
295a6(rnying rgyud): pocoms kyis 'dren// dbul sems lastor ba'i mthing nag sa sha nA~M// dam rdzas bdud kyi 'ab ba'i mchod pa 'dzum// log rtog smon rnams so song bsal skad du// rdugs thabs kyis mgo lus so so thal// ser sbya rigs pa'i tshul can nan+ta n+te/ dmangs bdu kyi
295a7(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba mched pa 'brus// babyed bang pa'i mo mo hom thang du// mchin yar mchen mi brgya rnams la// dmangs bad rje 'ab ba'i mchod pa 'bral// dran thong byeg bying ma'i hom thang du// rol pa'i tha med brgyad la mchod pa 'phrul// tha byed zin pa dkang seng se na/
295b1(rnying rgyud): mA// ma N+Das dbrog sod don pa'i phags sa tag// dbang ma mags cad dpa' la gaganag// 'phyi dag bdu su tha mas d+hak+Sha// dmang pa khrag drug sbyinam pa nan// zhing can 'ang das 'du byung dang ga pam// sa cang mdzag/
295b2(rnying rgyud): g.yeng ba'i glang rimag// gzugs phrang rlig mad thag ldag shAn ma// gding tshad dkor mo dkun drug tu nong pa // 'o drugacang nas 'byin pa 'otsho t+tam// drang srong zhing na hUM chags sung bya'i mdo// nyon mongs kyi tshig 'drang ba'i kang ga na/
295b3(rnying rgyud): thog rnam dag d+hA rog mgo/ 58/ u lu sun mthong sa tshogs drug pa'i mgo// nyon medas blo snying byin pa'i u m+b+ha mad// tha byed theg pa me'i ho ma khung du// da d+has bdud rtsi bang bde mkhyod pang bung // bla meng bu gsung thugs kyi dngong bur sgrol// dkar po rtags
295b4(rnying rgyud): 'gugs pa rta yi mgo// sngon mo zhags chen 'chid byed phag gi mgro// dmar mo lcags klog sbom byed rim gyi mag/ sdod mo dril thigs thal bye dang d+ha ki'i mgo// thar pa'i sgo/ babyed sgom bzhi rnams pa// dam rdzas bdud ci mchog gi mchod pa 'bral/
295b5(rnying rgyud): med spu gsung thugs kyi dngos grub stsol// na byeng drung khrad me yi ho ma khung du// dpung mo mgo brnyan mi khrugs nyi shu brgyad // dam rdzas bdud rtsing bar 'i'i mchod pa 'bul// dbang phyug mkha' bgro nyid du brgyad// le pa sgrag nAg rdzi rdul thogs pa ga yag gis //
295b6(rnying rgyud): la la dmar skya rtse snga thogs pa sbal gyi mgo// la la sor nag dbyug sdig 'byin pa gzig gi mgo// pa la dkar dmar rgyu zhags thogs pasre mo'i mgo// phal ser na gang khor po thogs pa phawang mgo// lal dmar sbyang dbyug to thogs pa drid kyi mgo// pa wa dam
295b7(rnying rgyud): rgyunags rdzogs pa dom gyimago// lal sngon ga rin chen bum pa rdzogs pa rgya srin mgo/ lal mya 'og spang thogs pa sdig pa'i mgo// la ldang nag zangs tho thogs pa kha'i mgo// lal dmang nag rmu nags rdzogs pa wal mag/ la la mthing nag snying thogs sun te/
296a1(rnying rgyud): mgo/ la la dmar nag mar lathogs pa than mag/ la la mar ma rje thogs pa rta li mgo/ la la da mar mo zangs gli thogs pa lhung gimag/ lal dmangs pog sung thogs pa byal mag/ pa la dkar dam pa
296a2(rnying rgyud): zhags pa thogs pa pu shud mgo// lal ljang ser ro thogs sha ba'i mgo// la la dmar nag rde'u chung ral gri thogs pa srung ki'i mgo// la la dmar ser gsal shing thogs pa sbyin gyi mgo// la la nag mo mche zhags thogs pa pag gi mgo// la la ljang nag rde'u chung thogs khral
296a3(rnying rgyud): mgo// la la ljang nag bam chen thogs pa glang gi mgo// lal ldang nag bdud rtsi thogs pa rta yi mgo/ la la nag mo lcags su thogs pa khu zug mgo// la la sngon mo chu zhags thogs par yi mgo// lal dmar mo lcags sgrog thogs pa seng ge'i mgo// la lang mar nag
296a4(rnying rgyud): dril chen thogs pa skye ka'i mgo// dbang phyug mkha' 'gro nyi shu rtsa brgyad la// dam rdzas bdud rtsi lnga yi mchod pa 'bul// bla med sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub stsal du gsol// gsang ba med dpung gi rgyud las// sbyin sreg gi le'u ste drug pa'o// / bcom ldan
296a5(rnying rgyud): zhi khro bar ba'i tshogs// me dpung 'bar 'a phyag 'tshal lo// rdzas dngas gzhi btagla nas ni// ma dag pa ni mtshams bcad de// grub pa nang gi don la 'jug/ stong gsum me ris bskor ba'i dbus// srid pa'i ngo bo bzhi yi bar// rgya mtsho chen po'i 'jing dkyil du// gsang ba'i
296a6(rnying rgyud): sgrub pa chen po brtsam// khro bdag srin mo lnga 'dul dpal// gsang ba'i chas kyis rnam par brgyan// phyag na sreg pa'i me dpung bsnams// de nyid 'thor drung rgyas pas 'brud// mtshams bcad bgegs kyi tshogs 'drogs nas// de nas grub gnas gnas rab skul// de yi gnas/
296a7(rnying rgyud): rabangs pa ni// srid pa'i gzhal las khang chen du// srid pa'i yum ljags la mchod nas// des po zang dam pa ru// 'gro drug dpal gyi rgyas btab la// ci shing nags tshal rgyan du bsam// bkal ba'i me dpung bathugs dkyil dra/ srid pa'i 'du 'dzi med par bya/
296b1(rnying rgyud): khams gsum bgegs chen stong par brje// stong gsum na dbyings sum nan// mtshams kyi rgyal po me yi tho bdag gis// srid pa'i mtshams ni de ltar bcad// gzugs kyi phung po 'dzam gling la// sdug bsngal bag chags gyen gyi rnams// thugs rje me yis ma
296b2(rnying rgyud): bcad pas// me yi rgyal po chen po bsgom// rnam shes khams kyi dkyil 'khor du// nyon mongs lnga las bde ba yang // rtog pa ye shes me pung rgyas// khams gsum sreg pa'i dbang phyug gis// nyon mongs lnga mtshams gcad par bya// ci shing ri zag ma lus kyang // med sur
296b3(rnying rgyud): rgyal po khro bo'i sku// 'ur 'ur chem chem 'bar ba'i 'od// bskal pa sreg byed rgyal pos mtsham bcad do// r-i kro d+ha raM/ ha la raM/ to sha ya raM/ raM raM/ raM ti shaM/ kro d+hi kha naM yog raM phaT/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po ni// zlum po zla gam gru gsum ste// de yi dbus su 'drud
296b4(rnying rgyud): dpa 'durnam pa dgod// deyi kyi jam kyi mi// nga po byeng med do/ da sa ma dang // zhing gi sa la TIs gling // dem phyi me kyis ba sa/ kyimam dgang // de'i kyi dkyi dungab//
296b5(rnying rgyud): dgong // mig nas mere zhags pas drang // de yi phyi ri ma dkyil 'khor la// yi ge raM gyi phreng bas bsdom// yi las rlung gi zhags pas drang // de yi phyi rim dkyil 'khor la// rdo rje rtse gcig phreng chen la// yi ge hUM gi zhags pas drang // de yi phyi rim dkyil 'khor la//
296b6(rnying rgyud): rje phreng chen phyogs mad la// yi ge yaM gi zhag pas drang // de yi phyi rim dkyil 'khor la// gzi chen me mar kha dgu gtams// de yi phyi rim dkyil 'khor la// thod pa rak+tas bkang ba dgod// de yi phyi rim dkyil 'khor la// zla ga ma dgu yi dkyil 'khor dgod// de yirtsi
296b7(rnying rgyud): rim dkyil 'khor la// ba su ta yi zhags pas drang // de yi phyi ri ma dkyil 'khor la// mtshon cha lnga yi gur dbub po// de ltar dkyil 'khor gsal bkod nas// de la phyag rgya rdzog par dgod// gsang ba me dpung gi rgyud las/ dkyil 'khor gsal bar bstan pa'i le'u ste 'dun pa'o// // me
297a1(rnying rgyud): dpung 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// khra bo jigs byed spyan 'dren na// ma dpung dab 'drar gdan la gshegs// d+he/ nam mkha' gtos dang 'dra ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// 'jigs byang 'bar bar rgyal ba gshegs sugs la// mer 'ab
297a2(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor nas// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rab bkod nas// zhing kyang bkram pa'i gdan la bzhugs// srid pa'i ri bo dbus kyi dkyil// chen po lnga yi dur khrod klong // cha mcho ga ting dpag yangs pa'i nang // mi pung gsang ba'i gnas mchog tu// 'bor nu rdo rje byagra ma gtums/
297a3(rnying rgyud): chags pa'i rak+ta na klong 'khrugs// zhing gi ri rab brtsegs pa'i sa// dur khrod keng dus ka bar brtsag/ dregs pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs dang ldan// thod rlon rnam gsum gzhal yas 'bar// kha dang lcang lo 'khyil bas brgyan// gnam lcags gzer chen dbyings yu 'debs// dung khrod pa
297a4(rnying rgyud): yas de nang du// dbang phyug chen po gdan du bting // um de wa sti bsno la khAr// shar du dri za'i rgyal po mnan// lho drug shin dzaM ya mAn ta// nub tu klu bdag sbal mgo can// byang du gnod sbyin 'bod sgrogs mnan// dbang phyug lnga yi gang ni steng du
297a5(rnying rgyud): zhing gi gdan chen re re gding // de sted nyi zla 'bar ba'i gdan// de yi dbus su khro bdag bsgom// yi ge 'bru tshogs 'od 'phros 'dus// cho ga gsum gyi byin rlabs las// me dpung khro bo phyag rgya dgasal// hU~M kro d+hI shwa rI he ru ka pA la sha phaT// dbus kyi me dpung
297a6(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor nas// khro bdag b+hut+tha'i rgyal po'i sku// ser nag ral pas me dpung 'thor// 'bar ba'i gdan la spyan 'dren gshegs// shar gyi me dpung dkyil 'khor nas// khro bo badz+ra he ru ka/ mthid nag ngal pas me dpung 'thor// 'bar ba'i gdan la spyan 'dren gshegs//
297a7(rnying rgyud): lho yi me dpung dkyil 'khor nas// khro bdag rat+na rgyas pa'i sku// ser nag ral pa me dpung 'bar// 'bar ba'i gdan la spyan 'dren gshegs// nub kyi me dpung dkyil 'khor nas// khro bdag pad+ma rgyas pa'i sku// dmar nag nag pas me dpung 'thor// 'bar ba'i gdan la spyan 'dren
297b1(rnying rgyud): gshegs// byang gi me dadu dkyil 'khor nas// khro bdag las kyi rgyal po'i sgra// ljang nag ral pa me dpung 'thor// 'bar ba'i gdan la spyan 'dren gshegs// dbyings kyi yum chen dpal 'bar ma// khrag dathung rgyal mo dpal gyi yum// me dpung gdan la ldan 'dren
297b2(rnying rgyud): gshegs// hrI shA hrI~M s+t+wa~M// dbyings kyis ma chen pal 'bar ma// khrag 'dring rgyal mod pal gyi sum// med drung gdan la kun 'dren gshegs// brda hU~M sha d+hi ste// dbyings kyi sum chen dpal 'brang ma// khrag 'byung thal mdapal gyi bum// med pang gdun
297b3(rnying rgyud): spyan 'dren gshegs// rat+na krod+d+hi shwa rI s+t+waM// dbyings kyi yum chen dpal 'bar ma// khrag 'thung rgyal mo dpal gyi yum// me dpung gdan la stan 'dren gshegs// pad+ma kroSh+NI shA rI s+t+waM// dbyings kyi yum chen dpal 'bar ma// khrag 'thung rgyal mo dpal
297b4(rnying rgyud): ma// go rI brgyad rnams spyan 'dun na// rol pa'i stabs kyis gshegasasu gsol// dur khrod chen pa'i gnas brgyad nas// ye shes ma brgyad spyan 'dren na// me dpung rab 'bar gdan la gshegs// dur khrod gling gi mtha' shed nas// ya mtshon chen po bsil ba'i tshal// ye
297b5(rnying rgyud): shes ma rme nA gau rI ma// sngon mo dbyug thogs mche ba can// me dpung gdan la spyan 'dren gshegs// dur khrod gling gi mtha' shed nas// ye shes ma chen tsau rI ma// ser mo mda' 'phrin mche ba can// me dpung gdun la stan 'dren gshegs/
297b6(rnying rgyud): dur khrod ming gi mtha' shed nas// ye shes ma chen bu mo he// bdud rgyal chu srin rgyal mtshan phyar// mi dpung gdan la spyan 'dren gshegs// dur khrod gling gi mtha' shed nas// ye shes ma chen be tA lI// mthing nag zhing za rdo rje 'phyar/
298a1(rnying rgyud): na la gyu thugasas// ma ts+tsha ya nas/ sas sa// / rtags ma// DU shA smras gagags/ ma danas/ d+ha

298a3(rnying rgyud): na/
298a4(rnying rgyud): lI ha ru lu b+h+yo \u0f7f/ rgyagar yul gyi mtha' shed nas// phra men chen mo spyan 'dren na// dbu brnyan brgyad rnams spyan 'dren gshegs su gsol// rgya gar yul gyi mtha' shad nas// ze byed phra men ral pa can// ser mo rngam pa seng ge'i mgo// me pung gdan la spyan 'dren gshegs//
298a5(rnying rgyud): rgya gar yul gyi mtha' shed nas// za byed phra men ngal pa can// dmar mo stag mgo 'bru tshugs blta// me dpung gdan la spyan 'dren gshegs// rgya gar yul gyi mtha' shed nas// za byed phra men ral ba can// nag mo wa mgo rkang ldag ma// me dpung gdan la spyan 'dren
298a6(rnying rgyud): gdan la spyan 'dren gshegs// rgya gar yul gyi mtha' shed nas// za byed phra men ral pa can// snar mo dur bya zhing bur ma// me dpung gdan la spyan 'dren gshegs// rgya gar yul gyi mtha' shed nas// za byed phra men ral pa can// nag mo bya rog rgyu tshil rol// me dpung
298b1(rnying rgyud): sna nanan / da// pa sa na// gyu/ gan na ga/ mun/
298b2(rnying rgyud): brjor// 'dzam/ badzad// thamra 'ar// nga da tho gig nas// thob tu rtam ga sa bcan// med du pa yang ba gdan pa bgag// tha~M drugamadag
298b3(rnying rgyud): gi mgo// me dpung gdan la spyan 'dzin gshegs// drang rjod steng gau nA bzlo nas// dmang po lpags sgrog sdom byed ma// me dpung gdan la spyan 'dren gshegs// drang khrod gling gi byung sgro nus// thogatum sbyang mgo pa bcan// ljang du rjes dakhrol rdu la du ga/ /

298b5(rnying rgyud): ser nag khrag 'thung tshangs pa'i gzugs// pad+ma 'dab brgyad phyag na bsdams// me dpung gdan la spyan 'dren gshegs// dkar lngang khrag 'thung lha 'i gzugs// rdo rdo rje shUl phyag na bsnams// me dpung 'bar ba'i gdan la gshegs// sngon mo khrag 'thung khyab 'jug
298b6(rnying rgyud): gzugs// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad phyag na bsnams// ma dpung 'bar pa'i gdan la gshegs// dmar mo khrag 'thung gzhon nu'i gzugs// ye shes mdung thung phyag na bsnams// me dpung 'bar ba'i gdan la gshegs// dkar mo khrag 'thung brgya byin gzugs/
298b7(rnying rgyud): oM rje phyag na bsnams// ma dbu pa bang pa'i gdan la gshegs// ser mo khrag 'thung rdo rje'i gzugs// b+han+d+ha k+ta phyag na bsnams// me dpung gdan la sman 'dren gshegs// dmar mo khrag 'thung nyi ma'i gzugs// bdud rtsi bum pa phyag na bsdams// me dngu/
299a1(rnying rgyud): kun ldan ga gags// da/ byung nab gzugs// bras ga rgyag ta rnams// sadang gdun bstan zhugs// nga rgyag durnams// chos dang dang //
299a2(rnying rgyud): gang dang smra dren gshegs// ldang gra zlab 'thung rdo gzugs// brtson sngon mo byug napa snams// med ga la spyan gagags// dmang po nga nga smin pa gzugs// b+h+yad+hA th+ya na spang // kyi dan pa stan chen gshegs/
299a3(rnying rgyud): ljang nag khrag 'drung za ba'i gzugs// rdo rjeb su phyag na bsnams// me dpung 'bar ba'i gdan la gshegs// dmar rdo khrag 'thung 'jigs pa'i gzugs// rdo rje zangs kyi phyagan bsdams// me dpung gdan la spyan 'dren gshegs// dkar mo 'ag drung stobs bzang /
299a4(rnying rgyud): gzugs// rdo rjeg shol mad ba phyag na bsdams// me dpung gdan la spya 'dren gshegs// ser mo khrag 'thung rdo rje'i gzugs// rdo rje su bri phyag na brnams// me dpung gdan la spyan 'dren gshegs// dmang po khrag 'byung gzhon nu gzug+sa// ye she mdu thung
299a5(rnying rgyud): phyag na bsnams// me dpung 'bar ba'i gdan pa gshegs// dkaran mo byug 'thung 'jigs pa'i gzugs// rdo rje bum baphyag na bsnams// mo dpung 'bar ba'i gdan la gshegs// sdang mo khrag 'thung 'jigs pa'i gzugs// bdan ljang bu phyag na bsnam sa//
299a6(rnying rgyud): me dpung gdan la stan 'dren gshegs// sngon mo khrag 'byung glang gi mgo// rdo rjeb+har+N+Nab+h+ya na ba snams// me dpung gdan pa phywa ni tsan gshegs// dmar mo khrog 'brung 'jigs pa'i gzugs// dza rje ral the byag na bsnams// med pung gdan la spyod 'arjid gi shes
299a7(rnying rgyud): dmar mo thag 'thung mo lha'i gzugs// rdo rje gsal shing phyag na bsnams// me pung gdon la spyan 'dren gshegs// sku mdog sdug nag pag gi gzugs// rdo rje zhags pa phyag na bsnams// me dpung 'bar ba'i gdan la gshegs// dmar mo khrog 'thung chu lta
299b1(rnying rgyud): na na sa/ na rdzu/ nga na shA smra nga/
299b2(rnying rgyud): gangad dang kyim rje gshin / rnyed pa margyags s+ho// dbang bsus byed pa gasbyin no/ med du myed patha mchug shugs/ sbyin da byung smranas// tshigs rdza thung ngathob bya// nad bu dab shi da kyang ngo// smang dag /

299b6(rnying rgyud): pra men sha za brgyad rnams dgod// bskal ba'i me ris 'khrig pa bri// de yi phyi la dkyil 'khor dra // khrag gi rgyamatsho'i gzugs bris la// de yi zhabs su drus chen dgod// tha ma me'i dmar po dgod// dkyil 'khor de yi yang bag tu// khro bdag me yi rgya
299b7(rnying rgyud): de lta da ky-i bra 'khor bris nas ni// grub pa chen po brtsam pa'i phyir// dmigs kyi rgyal po dz+haH bsgral// nga 'i chog chen po bstan// thar lam gnas brtan dpal gyi dkyil 'khor du// 'byung po gtum po gdol pa can// mthar byeng sgrub pa 'dil bsrub// dug lnga gtan
299b8(rnying rgyud): du ba 'di// mtshon cha lnga yis skyeng bar bya// da yi drag pa'i gro thogs nas// shin rje ba shungs te s+thi sngags 'ad na// thugs rje'i bdag po'i zhabs drung dri// gleng ba'i tshul gyis 'di skad gsol// babangs su mchi ngo ba bangs sun gyi// 'bangs sun
300a1(rnying rgyud): bgyis na// bdag cag rnams kyi mgo sus snyid// dum du brgyar ni gtub par 'gyur// rdul rtswa gzug nas nyams par byed// phung po khams dang bye mched rnams// rngon med pung 'bar ba yis// rab tu bsregs shing rdul
300a2(rnying rgyud): de phyir dpal chen zhabs drung du// bdag cag rnams ni skyabs su mchi// zhes smre sngags 'don no// de nas dpal chen me yi rgyal po yis// rngam pa'i skad kyis sdug bsngal sbyangs// rdo rje'i zhabs kyi 'og tu brdzis// 'gyur bzlog med par rab tu bsdus//
300a3(rnying rgyud): bsgrub chen brtsam phyir rU tra bsgral// gtum khro gdug pa'i tshogs bcas gzhom pa'i phyir// khams gsum sreg byed me dpung dpal gyi sku// 'jigs pa'i tsham rngam+ba glog ltar 'gyu// bdud 'dul khro rgyal dpal chen he ru ka/ rU thab sbal phyir che ba'i nga rgyal bskyed//
300a4(rnying rgyud): ma gling lho yi gling khams nas// dbang phyug bdud kyi bsgral thabs 'di// mgo ni lho nub mtshams su bstan// rkang pa byang shar mtshams su bstan// lag brkyang rkang brkyang pho brang bskyed// tho ba lcags kyu spu gri yis// dug gsum bsgral phyir 'jigs
300a5(rnying rgyud): tshul bstan// bdud ma traM thal kha sngo skya la// lus po ri rab kyi gtos tsam de mgo lho nub mtha' thug pa med pa/ rkang pa byang shar mtha' thug pa med pa der bsgyel to// snying ni dur khrod bsil ba'i chal// rgya gar yul nas grub pa mo// ma mo chen
300a6(rnying rgyud): mo gau rI ma// sngon mo dbyug to thod pas bskyengs// me dpung zla gam dkyil 'khor du// rol pa'i stabs kyis gshegs su gsol// lag pa g.yas ni li yul grub pa'i tshal// li yi yul du grub pa mo// ma mo chen mo tsau rI ma// tsau rI mda' 'gengs ral
300a7(rnying rgyud): pas bsgyings// me dpung blag ma dkyil 'khor du// rol pa'i stabs kyis gshegs su gsol// lag g.yon pal yul grub pa'i tshal// ma mo chen mo bre mo he// phra mo chu srin rgyal mtshan bsdams// me dpung zla gam dkyil 'khor du// rol pa'i stabs kyis
300b1(rnying rgyud): gshegs sug pa// rlu zod tshal// thog la nas thub bum// ma mnan ma ba 'aM// bye ban gyur nag// med mung 'bar pa'i dkyis 'khod// rnam par skabs kyis gshegs sgra gsal// dang g.yon pa hor grub pa rkyen/
300b2(rnying rgyud): mamatshan mo phyeg sI// dmar ser rgyu 'dren ral pa can// me dpung 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du// rol pa'i stabs kyis gshegs su gsol// lte ga oMd+h+yan grub pa'i tshal// oM D+yan yul nas grub pa mo// ma mo chen mo g+ham+ba d+hi// g+haswA drung dam khrag 'thung ldang // me
300b3(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du// rol pa'i skyabs kyis gshegs su gsol// pho mtshan sring+ga grub pa'i tshal// sing+ga'i yul nas grub pa mo// ma mo chen mo spa shan+di// sma sha mthing nag byis snying za// me dpung zlag ma dkyil 'khor du// rol ba'i stabs kyis gshegs su
300b4(rnying rgyud): gsol// mkhal ma dur khrod gling dgu'i tshal// gling dgu'i yul nas grub pa mo// ma mo chen mo tsaN+Da lI// tsaN+Da ser skya mgo lus 'dral// me dpung zlag ma dkyil 'khor du// rol pa'i stabs kyis gshegs su gsol// d+hU tra'i gzugs kyi phung po la// phra men dur khrod
300b5(rnying rgyud): gnas grub pa'i// ma mo spyan 'dren gshegs su gsol// bu mo g.yas g.yon ma khrig/ mar bsnol// rkang pa g.yas g.yon gling mo bsnol// thar pa chen po'i gnas brgyad las// bla gam dmar po'i dkyil 'khor la// me dpung mang po'i phreng du bskor// sha za khrag 'thung mgo brtan
300b6(rnying rgyud): sogs// la la seng ga rngams pa'i tshogs// lal dpa' brtul stag gi tshogs// lca la sgrol byed khrag ldag wa// la la rjes 'joms rnam pa'i gzugs// lal lding tshogs bya rgod gzugs// la la dur bya zhing khur tshogs// la lajam stabs bya rog gzugs//
300b7(rnying rgyud): la lanang khrol 'joms pa thug pa'i gzugs// drang khrod me yi dkyil 'khor du// mgyogs tshogs tha men spyan 'dzinan// rngams pa'i stabs kyis gshegs su gsol// sher blo blagam me dpu dkyil gakhor du// 'gugs pa'i rol tshogs spyan 'dzin na// rngams pa'i skabs
301a1(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f/ kyis gshegs su gsol// b+ha klo blag ma med bu dkyil 'khor du// 'ching nga ma 'i tshogs sun 'dren na// rngams pa'i sbubs kyis gshegs su gsol// nub sgo zlag ma med du dkyil 'khor du/ sdom byed do pa tshogs ldan dzin na//
301a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i stabs kyis gshegs su gsol// byang sgo zla gam me dpung dkyil 'khor du// rlog byed rol tshogs spyan 'dren na// rngams pa'i stabs kyis gshegs su gsol// sngo skya thal skya dru tra'i gzugs// gdol pa drag po mi bzad pa// gsod la 'jigs pa gzugs kyi
301a3(rnying rgyud): sgrol// kha T+wA~M 'bar ba'i phyag rgya yis// rol pa'i stabs kyis rU tra bsgral// 'dzam bu'i gling gi dkyil 'khor na// stong gsum thar pa rU tra'i gzugs// 'byung ba lnga yi cha las skyes// gzugs kyi phung po'i sdug bsngal 'di// sa me chu rlung nam mkha' lngas// 'thor byed chen
301a4(rnying rgyud): pos dbyings su sbyor// zhe sdang 'dus pa'i phung po la// yi ge gas bzhu btul nas// gnas 'gyur rdo rje sems dpa' gtso// sa gzhi yum gyi dang du sbyor// de ltar rdzogs te mtha' yas mchog/ nyon mongs lnga yi phung po la// 'byung lnga gnas 'gyur thar pa'i grwa// 'barab
301a5(rnying rgyud): gnas su gsal bkod nas// phung po lnga gnas dkyil 'khor du// gnas 'gyur dbang mo lnga yi sku// srid pa'i ma lngas thugs rjes bsgral// ma tri gzugs kyi phung po ni// dur khrod me yi gnas brgyad dang // dur khrod phyed dang gsum du snang // mnyam gzhag phung po'i dkyil 'khor du//
301a6(rnying rgyud): lnga bcu rtsa brgyad dbyings su gsal// lhag mthong las kyi dkyil 'khor du// thugs rjes rma byung rol pa las// sbar ba'i las mchog chen po brtsam// gsang ba me dpung gi rgyud las/ bdud brtul ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// / de nas las bzhi bsrub pa'i phyir/
301a7(rnying rgyud): dbus su dkyil 'khor zlum po bri// shar du zhi ba bru ma po bri// drag po zung gsum lho ru 'i// 'dod chags zlag ma nub tu bri// rgyas pa chen po byeng du bri// phung po lnga dang tshon lnga dang // sman lnga dang ni rdzas lnga dang // yum lnga dang ni rgyu yang lnga// zhi tu bas gas la phrin las brtsam/
301b1(rnying rgyud): nas mya ting gsal ba dang // 'gro 'dugs la la phrin las sol// rdzogs pa'i las ni dam bzhi rnam// de nas 'i rnal bskyed// grub pa'i ting dzin rtson par bsgom// gang nga med pu rju dpas/ las rnam than 'dun brdu du/
301b2(rnying rgyud): de nas pasgrub pa brtsam pa'i phyir// me yi dkyil 'khor bzhengs pa ni// dbu dag brtags pa'i gnas su brtsam// mdag pa yi mtshams bcad brtag/ ngom gru gnas rab btsa bar bya// c-i ga nags tshul rgyas pa 'am// bkra shis dben pa'i sa phyogs su/
301b3(rnying rgyud): bslab pa chen po brtsam pa'i phyir// de yi lag cha mchog tu bsngags// mtshon cha lda dang rdzas lnga dang // sman lnga dang ni 'bras bu lta// khrag lnga dang ni 'om lnga// sha m+b+ha chu la dug lnga dang // de'i drug rjod dam pa ni/ rus bral mgo'am zhal bu'am// spang rtsi bum mgo
301b4(rnying rgyud): la rigs sago/ dngas lam mangs pa dgang yang ri // gang yang sra bar ba ti badrug/ dbus pa ni can rlu rgya g+sa/ shang nga chul bzhis rna / shi de da// skye ga dri ma rtsegs pa'o// bai yi bu mi 'gyud// nu zlas
301b5(rnying rgyud): gcig pazi// rdo rje rgya gram 'bar bas bskor// byang du gru bzhi byas pabri// 'dra 'tshon snga lngas de la bskor// de yi phyi me dkyil 'khong du// thod pa'i phreng bas bskor bar bya// de yi phyi ri ma dkyil 'khor la// mar me dgu yang bribar bya// de yi phyi mi dkyil 'khor du// zla
301b6(rnying rgyud): gam bdu gzis pa la// me dpung bar bas paskyor babri// de yi bya'i mi dkyil khor nga// sgo bzhi zug sa hU~M ba dbya// me y-i phreng bas bskor bar bya// de yi ni'i sa dkyil khong la// mtshon na lnga yis bskong ba la// bsuta mi na phreng bri// de ltar bris pa'i dkyil 'khor
301b7(rnying rgyud): dbus sun// byang chub sems pa spyan gyis bskor// mi gzugs bzla rdul bya// shang rje chen ngas kyis bskor// mig mi gyis brla brtsal gyi// lho drug chen rdzas kyis bskod // migs mos pazhu ba tra Ta// rlub tu dkya rjes kyis bad// yig zhugs pacwa
302a1(rnying rgyud): gal // thung ngas kyis zod// rag tu bcwa la bya// AN+Da la bru rdzogs nas rtan rnags nga // danas ga btungs// mtham mdzad so//
302a2(rnying rgyud): nye ba'i bsnyen pa de rdzogs nas// bkrus nas bdud rtsi ga/ btsag bya// 'grong dras dkyil 'khor du// dgu pa'i 'dzab kyis basbyin pa bya// btags nus t+yA nang du rtul// tsam dun 'i rgyas brta dbus su drub// thubartags nas lngag cung yang // dngas thab
302a3(rnying rgyud): bzung mtshad pa 'phrul// bdir gshegs ste la gti ga gtung // thub pa po yang bag shis gsol// thub ba'i t-i dzin \u0f7fga cig bsgos// nan tan gyis ni mi chog tu bcug// bsgrib pa 'bras chud mig// gsang ba mi zung gi rgyud las// bdud mdzub pa'i ma
302a4(rnying rgyud): ste cugacig pa'o// / dzam pa'i thugs rje ma yi dkyil gakhor na// dbang thug ched pa lta tshogs kun gyi rang bzhin te// 'dod spyong b+h+ri rje dran rjes snga bsgrub// bcom ldan mo'i skal dngos cung byung // zhal bu kra shis phra men bdud rtsi mchog gi spyan rgyal bar// @
302a5(rnying rgyud): lpags la bkod 'phros pa'i byin rlabs las// sbom po dbang mo'i rtse lam+b+hi bsgom ste// dug gsum gyon pas la bdud rtsi lnga yi dang // bsnyen pa nyi bsnyen bsgrub pa dang // bcub pa chen po'i rab bsgruzla shing // bsnyen pa'i dngos grubasbrul du gsol// gsang ma chog bad+ma 'dab brgyad
302a6(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor du// grubapa pa ying ngos sub zla srogasul dugasol// dbus kyi zhal bum tshan ldan pa// 'chi med bdung rtsi byung dru ba sems// bye ba'i bsnyen pas rab spangs te// bcom ldan la tshon te ga'i// gnyis med rol pa'i dngos su brtsom// shar kyi zham bu dpal ldan du/
302a7(rnying rgyud): 'di med bdud ci dri chen ldan// nye ba'i bsnyen pas rab sbyangs te// bcom ldan dpal chen nye pa'i// gnyis med ngal pa'i dngos su bstsol// blo la na lathub sa shis la// 'aco me du rtsig cen ldan// zhi ba'i bsnyen pas basbyang hU~M/ bcom ldan dpa' chen na /
302b1(rnying rgyud): gnyis med rol pa'i dngos gru byol// nub kyi zhal bu dbang ldan la// 'chi mad bdud rtsi k+ta sman// nye ba'i bsnyen pas rabasrungs te// bcom ldan dpal chen pat+ma he dra ka'i// gnyis medongol pa'i dngos su bsnol// byang gi zhal bu rtags ldan la// me chi med bdud kyi chu sman//
302b2(rnying rgyud): nye ba'i bsnyen pas rab sbyangs te// bcom ldan dpal chen karma he ru ka'i// gnyis med rol pa'i dngos grub stsol// 'dzam bu bkra shis dkyil 'khor du// ma chen gau rI brgyad tshogs la// nye bar bsgrubs pa'i dngos grub stsol// gsal ba'i me mar dbu bltams la// nye bar bsku
302b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i dngos grub stsol// rol pa'i phra men brgyad rnams la// nye bar bsrubs pa'i dngos grub stsol// zla ga ma dmar po'i sgo bzhi la// 'joms pa'i khro mo brgyad rnams la// nye bar bsrubs pa'i dngos grub stsol// phyi rol drug ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad la// dbang phyug mkha'
302b4(rnying rgyud): brgyad// dbang mdzad mthu yi dngos phrabacos// dus gsum rgyal ba khrag 'brur rol pa'i 'khor// phyagag rtan 'jig tshogs bka' yi dngos thub stsol// pho nya ma ngag pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// 'gugs pa las kyi dngos grub rtsol// nyi bar bsgrub pa dam tshig la// yi dam
302b5(rnying rgyud): lha yi dngos grub stsol// mthol bshags mchod stobs dngos grub stsol// byin brlab dbang mchog bskur du gsol// nan tan mchog tu bskyed par gsungs// lnga bcu rtsa brgyad dbyings kyi lha// bsdu ba'i gnas ni sku gsung thugs// sku gsung thug na rdo rdorje che// rdo
302b6(rnying rgyud): bu'i dngos grub stsol// gsang ba me dpung gi rgyud las/ me dpung dngos grub kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / da ni sbyor ba rgyan gyi le'u 'byung ste/ ga Na sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor du// gsang mchog sbyor ba'i lung bstan te// mtshan ldan bkra shis gsang ba'i yum/
302b7(rnying rgyud): sprin khrug ring ba lag gor pra// tshigs mde zlum zhing phra zhes bshad// mig ni zur gsum gdong mdog phyed// kha nas ut+pal nga ldang zhing // lus lag pud tsan dan dri// dri zhim mtshan ldan snyed skabs phyed// bla 'jam nag po'i mthon mthing 'khyil// skad ni ngang pa gzhon
303a1(rnying rgyud): rgya'i skad// snyan par sgrog shing mdzes tshul stabs dang ldan// 'di ni ba shis mtshan ldan pa'i// ma ma mdzes pa'i blagros na// dal sbyor ba'i chog na// yum gzugs kyi phung po la// bad bar gshegs pa'i sapon rdza// 'thong du rdza byan drangs pa /
303a2(rnying rgyud): spyi bor zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la// oM ldan 'bar ba'i tshogs bcas bsgom// rgyas btab byin brlab dbang bskur nas// snang mdzad chen po'i sku mchog bsgom// snying ga'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du// hUM ldan gsal ba'i tshogs su bsgom// rgyas btab kyi dang rlab
303a3(rnying rgyud): dbang bskur nas// rdo rje sems dpa'i sku mchog bsgom// lte bar rin chen dkyil 'khor la// sgra ldan gsal ba'i tshogs su bsgom// rgyas btab byin brlab dbang bskur nas// rin chen sems dpa'i sku mchog bsgom// ljags kyi pad+ma 'dab brgyad la//
303a4(rnying rgyud): ldan gsal ba'i tshogs su bsgom// rgyas btab byin brlab dbang bskur nas// pad+ma sems dpa'i sku mchog bsgom// gsang gnas rgya gram dkyil 'khor du// hA ldan gsal ba'i tshogs su bsgom// rgyas btab byin brlab dbang bsrung nas// las kyi sems
303a5(rnying rgyud): dpe'i sku mchog bsgom// de ltar gsal bar rab bkod nas// yum gyi mkha' la me ri bsgom// de yi dbus kyi zla ga ma la// byang chub sems kyi sgo ba bru bya// dbang bskur rgyal ba'i sku ru bsgom// de ltar gsal na sbyor ba'i mchog/ byang chub mchog tu de snang la// bsrub
303a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i dkyil 'khor thig chen 'debs// cho ga rdzogs nas dkyil 'khor dgod// rtogs pa'i ting 'dzin rtsar 'phang can// de dag goms pas nyams su blangs// mi 'bral gzugs kyi ting 'dzin te// de ltar rtag tu sbyar ba dge// gsang ba me dpung gi rgyud las/ sbyor ba'i le'u
303a7(rnying rgyud): lte bcu gsum pa'o// / da ni thugs rje sgrol byed kyi le'u 'byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya che// khrag 'thung rgyal po sbyor bcas la// mi phyed dad pas phyag 'tshal nas// de nas bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor brtsam// sgrub pa'i gnas rab dam pa ni//
303b1(rnying rgyud): ri bo dben pa'i sa phyogs su// rdul rnams bsal nas mtshan brtag pa// rtsi shing 'dab rgyas klu mi gnas// gzugs rdo srin bag med pa'i sar// sa yi lha mo brtan mal// sa gzhi basbyangs la byin gyis brlab// bgegs bskrad mchod sbyin chen pa
303b2(rnying rgyud): dgyed// 'byung po'i gtong ma der btang nas// rdzogs pa'i las ni rnam bzhi brtsam// dbang rgyas zhi ba mngon spyod dadrung // mnang ba zlog dang rdzogs las bya// phun sum tshogs pa bzhi ldan pas// de gzhung bsgrub pa chen po brtsam par bya// mgo la zhugs nas rgyal yang byung // de nas
303b3(rnying rgyud): bsrub pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad dbus su bri// 'khor lo'i rtsibs la srul mgo bri// 'khor lo nga yi phyi rim yang // thod pa'i phreng bas bskor bar bya// de'i phyi rim ma thu la// bskal pa'i me de'i slong dubri// de yi phyi rim snam bu la// sgo bzhi khro bo'i blag ma shrI/
303b4(rnying rgyud): de la me'i dmang pos bskor// de yi phyi rim snam bul// de la zlag ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad la// dbang thug nyi shu rtsa brgyad dgod// bskal pa'i mo 'barabs bskor// de 'i phyi rim mtshon chas bskor// deltar dkyil 'khor gsal bkod nas// khro bo bcu yis mtshams bcad la// rgyun
303b5(rnying rgyud): thar pa'i lam du drang // de la dgra bgegs sgrib pa sbyangs// raM yaM khaM gis bsreg sbyang bya// ging chen slob ma dbang bsur la// mi bzad 'jigs pa'i chas kyis brgyan// de nas thar lam sgo phye nas// skol ba'i cho ga chen po bya// bsgral 'ar 'ba' zhig las kyi mchog/ zar lam rngam pa'i khro
303b6(rnying rgyud): ste// kha T+wAM mang po'i rngam tshul can// thugs rje gnas kyi sgo 'di phye// 'dod chags zhe sdang sna lngal// lhag mthong thugs rje'i byin rlabs kyis// snang ba chen po lnga ru bsgral// rgya mchog gzugs kyi phung po la// snod kyi 'jig rten rnal 'byor bsgom// thams cad che mchog phyag rgya che// nar
303b7(rnying rgyud): khro badz+rad kyi 'jig rten la// skab ldan las kye ma mi bsgom// byi na gzugs kyi rten 'brel la// rdzi bcurgya brgyad dad par bya// rgyu yi phung ba'i skye ba'i srid pa lnga// 'byung ba chen po lnga las bskyed// de nas brten pa'i gzugs phung sbyin// phyag rgya chen po dang sgral dpal// me
304a1(rnying rgyud): kha sa ma gabagag ste// dang 'byo ya sa su dag // zangs mkhas dpa' kyi byed rlangs kyis// drag pang las kyis bskul ba bya// dgugs ma cad nas gcad pa' byed// lags bla ldananapa parnams rgyud nga thams
304a2(rnying rgyud): slong dkyil nas// zam chog rgyal po gshegs su gsol// sgrol byed chen po'i dus lababs// mthang byed dam pa'i dkyil 'khor du// dug gsumang bar ba'i phung po bskal// tshad ming mamachog dpal// dang da byang ci// dbyang rgyal chen dug dang rdzogs// za
304a3(rnying rgyud): gsum dang mnyam pa gsum// thugs rje dam tshig rmang po che// cha mchog rgyal pos bskal ba'o// lho yi 'dzam gling phung po pa// srid dpa gsum gyi phra bkod pa// thig pa chen po'i slong du bsgral// gzugs kyi phung po rnam lnga yang // 'dod pa'i dbang mo lnga rung sbal/
304a4(rnying rgyud): par shes pa tshogs brgyad kyang // ye shes chen po brgyad du bsgral// dregs pa'i sdug bsngal phung po yang // rtog med chos kyi rnam pa dang sbal// sdug bsngal las kyi rang bzhin yang // bde ba chen po'i klong du bskal// phung po khams dang skye mched kyang // byang chub sems su
304a5(rnying rgyud): bsgom par bya// de ltar rab tu rtogs pas gsungs// snying rje'i dam tshig chen por gsungs// spyad dang mi spyad dang du blang // bsrub dang bsgom dang thugs rje yi// dam tshig chen po mang po che// spyod pa'i dmatshig lhun mnyam la// mi 'da' bsrung ba chen po gsungs//
304a6(rnying rgyud): yaM gis rnam shas sems sbar nas// hUM gis bsdus te mkha' la gzhag/ bde ba chen pa'i rtsa la rdzogs pas// dus gsum 'gyur med dbang phyug su// byang chub sems su bsgom par bya// khams gsum thugs rje'i gdang sha bcang // skyes bu'i sems kyis nan tan
304a7(rnying rgyud): dpyod// gsang ba me dpung gi rgyud las/ spel ba'i le'u ste zu zhi pa'o// / rdorje zhing chen bsgrub 'dod pas// s+ya ni kun las 'das pa ni// mnyas nyid dag pa nyid du bsgom// khre chen bdud rtsi dakhyil pa yi// dza rbu hoHsa dgug byas nas/
304b1(rnying rgyud): 'dag dang thu ga gnyis med pa// tang 'angan star tam rnam par byug// nga bang na gsal bar gyur pa dang // dru zad shi gA 'ogatug zhug/ wa rgya brgyad thogs bkad nas// gza pa 'i thugs kyis bsgrus pa shA// // zlam ma la dgul 'bang bsgrum// gdag nanan Na
304b2(rnying rgyud): phyogs btung btang // thams cad ma lus dbang du sbed// chomabu'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar gzhag/ pho nyi mang pas sems bkug nas// rol yang nas yang du gzhug/ mnar dang sems dang mdog smrig 'byung // de nas ting 'dzin rtse gcig gis// na
304b3(rnying rgyud): 'bram phrag mang du bzlas// bzlas nas ting 'dzin rnam gsum dang // rdo rnga'i sngags ni rnam gsum la// de lci bar nas sngags 'byung ba// 'od zer bdun dang ldan par bya// nyen zhing bsnyen par gyur pa dang // bdud rtsi lnga yis bsla bar bya// de nas yi ge 'bru bkod las//
304b4(rnying rgyud): gsal zhi 'cha ba bsgom par bya// yul dang dbang po langs pa'i tshul// yan lag sngal rigs sdang ldan// rdo Ta shing 'a na gas la bar bsgom// ngan pa da 'phrul bung nas// lan la gzhags da'i phyag rgyas bajam// tIng lag rnams kyang gnasas gzung /
304b5(rnying rgyud): bzhi dag tu phyag rgya bsdam// de nas nub tu phyag rgyas bstan// ta mgrin dbang gi srung bsgoms shing // sngags ni 'bum phrag mang du bzlas// phyogs brgyang 'a gro zhing rol bstim// de nas da drag 'gul na// rdo snyeng 'dzin gsel ba yis// mi g.yo bar ni bsgom par bya/
304b6(rnying rgyud): de nas kyang srir byed pa dang // ma'i br-ing rje gang yin// rdo rnga drugatugadapa par bya// TIg tu'i khanas sti byung na// rdong 'i ting 'dzin ma yis brjod// rdonga'i sngags bzlas yong du bstim/ bdug dang gnyis su med par bsgom// de nas da langs pa dang // rdod byin na ma das
304b7(rnying rgyud): bsrung // das tshig tu yang zu ba bya// las rnams thams cad byed du gzhug/ da snying bsgrub pa'i rang tshog gis// thal thams cad sos par 'byung // bskub pa'i dung rjod dang / ji brag gtan pa'i bigags gnas dang // nags thod stong ba car macan// gnad
