305b1(rnying rgyud): byung ba rnam// de bzhin nyid du gyur pa dang // rdo rje rigs byeg rtsab ni// dbug sum drugadrug tid du ba sgom// gzhan yang rjong gsum pa ni// tshe 'phrul rnga tshogs 'gro bar bsgom// blo dang shes rab rje drung gis// rim pa bzhin du rgon par bya// da ltar ba sngal bar byu
305b2(rnying rgyud): ti gza' skar dus gcig tu// rgya mtsho'i 'ding na snang bltar// de ltar goms stobs rigs 'dzin des// di zhwa dang deng ba bzhin du 'grub// mkhar la 'phyo dang rig 'dzin rnams// chu brad glog dang rlung mig yo// ri brag la sogs thogs med 'dzul// chu ru mi b+h+ring mes
305b3(rnying rgyud): dzag dang mtshon gyis 'jig mi 'gyur// mi snang ba dang mang po sprul// gzhan yang ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin// gnyis po de la dbang yang bskur// dus dang chos la bsrid zung dang // stong gsum nyung 'brur shong ba dang // yungs 'jus stong gsum bskyed pa dang // ji ltar dacig
305b4(rnying rgyud): bzhin du 'grub// sbrul dang gcan gzan gdug pa rnams// khyi bzhin gyi na 'brang bar 'gyur// bdud dang mu stegs la sogs pas// tshugs par mi 'gyur dran bzhin byed // lus ma spangs par rig 'dzin 'thob// ye shes bsod nams longs spyod kyis// 'khor po tshogs
305b5(rnying rgyud): sal 'god// thugs rje sprul pa'i byin rlabs kyis// so sor thar pa'i chal 'god// sems can kun gyi don yang byed// las rnams thams cad kun byas te// skye 'chi med pa'i tshe yang thob// mtshan dang dpe byad kun gyis brgyan// bsod nams ye shes tshogs chen ldan//
305b6(rnying rgyud): mthur phyin byab med par 'grub// 'brus bu mngon du 'grub par 'gyur// las ngan kun tu bskyed mi 'gyur// theg pa dman la lhung mi 'gyur// rig 'dzin grub thob par 'gyur// rdo rje sa mo'i ting nge 'dzin// 'od 'phro dbyings su slar bsdus nas// ye shes yi ge b+h+ya gnas pa
305b7(rnying rgyud): mthing ga 'od zer rags la ba yi// 'od bar mang po 'phro bar bsgom// dbyings su yang ni sla la bsgom// de las yi ge oM 'phros pas// 'dzin pa dpal gyi phur gyur te// rnal 'byor ma rnams mabu yis// bdag nyid la ni mthod par 'gyur// lha mo tshigs da
306a1(rnying rgyud): bar 'gyur// lham kun kya bdag por 'thung// sprul ba 'drad me dgang po yis// 'ong na pasu zhing 'thob sgral// lha ma mang pa dbus mang jun/ dpas pa'i dngas kyis mthal 'byud cing // pad+ma mdzad pa 'bral bar 'gyu
306a2(rnying rgyud): gsang ba me dpung gi rgyud las/ rdo rje phra mo'i ting nge 'dzin dang rig 'dzin mang po bsgrub pa'i le'u bcu drug pa'o// / dkyil 'khor chen po de dbus su// rgyal po chen po nyid gnas de// bdag po'i ting 'dzin gsal rdzogs nas// rdebs dang shes rab ga
306a3(rnying rgyud): med pas// rdo rje pad+mar 'khyil pa las// rtse nas bstims shing dkyil 'khor spos// zhwa thos yul gyi 'khor lo la// gsal ba'i thig le ngo bo nyid// rin chen gsal ba'i tshogs mchog las// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor tshogs btsas tham// gsang ba gsang rten gsang pa'i
306a4(rnying rgyud): dbang // gsang ba kun la mnyam par bya// gsang bkun gyi don rtogs nas// gzhan la mi gla don lags la// gsang ba yum gyi 'khor la la// gsal ba'i thig ga nga ba nyid// de bzhin rigs mchog chen po las// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gzhal 'gro'i ma// sku yis/
306a5(rnying rgyud): mchog chen po ste// sgra yi rdo rje'i gsang thob nas// rgyal ba thams cad mnyes mchod la// rgyal ba'i sku rnams ston par 'gyur// g.yas g.yon thabs dang shes rab las// gsal ba'i ngo bo thig le nyid// rdo rje rigs kyi tshogs bcas bsam// de las rnal 'byor he
306a6(rnying rgyud): gsal// las kyi dkyil 'khor gsal blo thim// oM khyed ni rdo rje las yin gyi// sgrub pa'i las rnams kun byed cing // pho nya mang po spob spu kun// thub pa'i las rnams byed par 'gyur// sgra byed yul gyi 'khor lo la// rdo rje smra ba'i tshogs mchog gsal// chos kyi 'khong lo
306a7(rnying rgyud): sa sus// tha nga rjod// man tan sris nams dzid pa'is// da rten ma ga mas gyis// na nams// da mas pa byed pa'i// da su gyi'i gling pon// gas 'ad ga 'ang /
306b1(rnying rgyud): kyi tshogs mchogs// dus gsum byas pa'i bdag so// drug dang thugs dang bad dgazangs// rgyal bkun dang nya pa par gyu// A tAM hAH/ phyog brgya ngas bzhi thams cadang// grags thags pad dngam// minang gsang bang byed pa pa// rgyanang gas thang sbyin pa stod// dan nga/
306b2(rnying rgyud): dpal rnon po des// rgyan dang cha lug kun bkrol te// spyi dpal mchog la mngon par gtor// gsang ba chen po btsan pa'i phyed// snying dang snying gi grog mo de// spyi dpel mchog la yon du phul// dbu rgyan go cha phreng ba dang // go cha rgyal mtshan phyag rgya dang // gdug dang bum/ bza' btung dang // rting po lnga yis dang ba
306b3(rnying rgyud): bAs// ding man chad du yi sras// ngan song gnas rnam sa stongs pa dang // tshe dang bsod nams phran sum chog// 'dzor pos rnye 'i la pos sur// ga sangs rgyas thams cad la// gsang dbang 'di las mi mang 'bas// gas 'idi dang chen gsang pa'i bdag/ gsang par tshon gaslod
306b4(rnying rgyud): 'di// 'ang ma dpa'i rnan pa khyod la gtang // rnal 'byor kun la snyed babye'i phyir// nga 'i smod pa mtha' dag dang // mu la byin rlabs chen po dag/ 'jam dpal non po khyod kyis zung // deng nas 'ang sa dpal non pa thong // gsang bkun gyi byed pag// gsang ba'i gsang can
306b5(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i bdag/ gas ba skuli'ang bzhin te// gas pa'i dpal du dbang bslang ngo ro// gsang ba med pa gi rgyud las// dang ba spar pa'i ma' skye ba du bdun pa 'o/ / da ni gas pa po ni dkyil mdzo ba spuna'i le wa byung ste// drar rjod ma yid kyil 'kho pa/
306b6(rnying rgyud): chags pa'i zug pa gang dadakyil dra// ma la la gzurnam pa slong ba// de sa sag ngas dang bzlas// lha mardzogs par bsas panye// dani kyil 'khod pathang nas pad+ha// sred pa rjod kyi 'jig tan la// gsang pa'i dkyil 'ang rdzogs pa// rgyas su dring tshul kyis /
306b7(rnying rgyud): bdud ze 'jig rten dbyings su bcwa// bcud kyi 'jig rten ma mas kun// gnyis su med pa 'id dngas su badz+ra// 'thung ba lnga ni yum gyi grong dub wa// 'gro ba drug ga nga'i yang // srel drug dbang 'a drug tu badz+ra// rams dang byem med nas grangs kyang // ma~M snang ba me dbye
307a1(rnying rgyud): badz+ra/ portsi shing nags tshal yang // phyag tu can pa 'dabyings su rdzu// dkyil 'khor la yangs rnams kyang // 'bar gyi phyag tu na po nga bya/ bsu sa cu dren yang // thugs rdzo rtog pa'i gags pas
307a2(rnying rgyud): mchog gi srung ba chen po yang // dam tho'ab pa'i sbrul bste// dak+ta yum gyimapa' labadz+ra// dri can rnam par gang mdzad sngal badz+ra// sha chen rin chem byung ldan sbrul bkra// dri ni yod chub pa'i tshul bahA// byang chub sems ni nga sems dpa'i rdza
307a3(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor lnga yang yum lnga'i sprul bsdu// s+'u m+b+ha ye shes lngal ba s+dza// me yi lag tu ni su gsung thugs su stsu/ marar chen po dgu ni ye shes dku nu bcoM// rdzing bcu gsum dbyings su cu// dbang po ldani ye shes rnga rung dz+ra// dmangs bdu rtsi chen po
307a4(rnying rgyud): khye pa di 'a'u 'dur/ la kyi ni byin pasarnas ban tsho bzhis / pa'i migs / gsadas pa'i myuhA
307a5(rnying rgyud): grang rnam na// spyad ni dadabying su cu// rjod kyi 'jig rgyun cu // bdud kyi 'jig byung por // ti chos kyi smra dz+ra// chos byung drug sems cwa/ byang chub sems ni rnaMs dang thal// slos thal rig po chen 'i badz+ra/ nga
307a6(rnying rgyud): chub sems ni cig so ste// TIg 'i zlus po rjong ni 'dus/ kun pa sa 'i b+h+ri sa thu stsu// rang gi sems ni chos nyid bye ba med pa'i byang / ba dz+ra// dri mchog me yi rtul ba'i blani ba sgrubs lags so// babyed dum can 'ang bathubs lags te// dam
307a7(rnying rgyud): rnams kyang pa rigs so// das sun tan nams kyi sa gas kyi// dus thubs rnams yang hrun pa gsas// brkyen rgyab na ga shes mas gyisas// mas zug suMng gas pa nga zla gas sa/
307b1(rnying rgyud): rdo rje'i sgra yang bsgoms lags so// bzlas brjod bsten pa'i grangs kyang tshang lags so// byams pa'i ma srin rnams kyang gdung ba'i tshul gyis bos lags so// ting 'dzin rnam gsum khyad par yang // de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings su bsdus lags kyis// skye med chos kyi
307b2(rnying rgyud): dbyings su gshegs su gsol// gsang ba me dpung gi rgyud las/ dkyil 'khor bsdu ba'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// / da ni mi 'dzad pa yi gter sba ste// thugs rje rang byung me yi sba thabs ni// snang srid me yi byaM brag kun// snod kyi 'jig rten dbyings/
307b3(rnying rgyud): snod kyang bcud kyi dbyings su sba// snod bcud skye ba med par sba// srid pa'i za byed gzhal yas khang // rtsi shing thams cad rang byung ste// las kyi dbang mo'i dbyings rum du// 'thor byed rlung gi rgyal po sba// bya ba nan tan ye shes rgyas btab po// pad+ma dang
307b4(rnying rgyud): mo'i dbyings rum du// sreg byed me yi rgyal po sba// so sor rtog pa'i ye shes rgyas btab po// rin chen dbang mo'i dbyings dum du// rlan byed chu yi rgyal po sba// mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rgyas btab po// rdo rje dbang mo'i dbyings dum du// sra byed sa yi rgyal po swa//
307b5(rnying rgyud): me long lta bu'i ye shes rgyas gdab po// rdzas kyang dkyil 'khor dbyings su sba// phyag rgya sku yi dbyings su sba// sku ni chos kyi sku ru swa// sred pa 'byung ba lnga ru sba// sa chu me rlung 'byung ba bzhi// nam mkha' stong pa'i dbyings su sba// phyag rgya chen po'i rgya yas btab// sa gaN+DI yAm
307b6(rnying rgyud): kyi dbyings su sra// rdzas rnams byang chub sems su bsgom// sngags mkhan thabs mchog rgyal por bsgom// gnyis med gter du sba bar bya// nyon mongs rkyen gyi ngo bo lnga// ye shes lnga yi dbyings su sba// ma rig 'khrul pa'i log rtog kyang // mnyam snang chen po'i dbyings pu sba//
307b7(rnying rgyud): de ltar sbas pa'i dkyil 'khor du// yab lnga yum lnga lag sbrel la// lu gu rgyud kyi bro brdung ngo // sus+tha ni yis steng du mnan// gsang ba me dpung gi rgyud las/ gter sba ba'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// / dpal pad+ma chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// dang por bsgrub
308a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i ban ga// rdzas dang sa ga rtag pa bya// drod rjod rnam thas gtan la dbab// bdud na chen po'i dkyil 'gyur rdugs// ma byung ba shes rdzogs par bslab// btu bu chen pa'i gnas thar nas// dang dbangs nga
308a2(rnying rgyud): du bsdu// rtsab brgyad dang yan laka stor// bsrub pa dang ni bsrub chen po// bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen po// dam tshig chen po'i gnas chen po// bdud rtsi chen po'i drod tshad ni// 'byung ba lnga yi mtshan nyid do// bsrub pa'i don gyi dkyil 'khor du// 'bras bu chen po dkyil
308a3(rnying rgyud): sa/ bas nA / sa hU~M rdzu gas// ma sa / ga me pa gas padzunas ma nga pang/ // yig tham gad pa rnams
308a4(rnying rgyud): 'du med pa'i gsung la rdzogs// sngags tshig bzlas brjod mang po yang // 'bru brgyad bsnyen pa'i don la rdzogs// lnga bcu rtsa lnga'i phyag rgya yang // phyag rgya chen po gsum du rdzogs// sku mdog phyag mtshan mang po rnams// su gsung thugs kyi dngadu rdzogs// du rdzos
308a5(rnying rgyud): da pa rnam gnyis kyang // srud pa bral ba'i dang du rdzogs// skrod cing bshung ba'i rdzas mang yang // bdud rtsi chen po lnga la rdzogs// sdom pa'i rtsa ba yan lag kyang // sdom pa chen po gsum la rdzogs// sku gsung thugs kyi sdom pa yang // bsrung du med pa'i ngang du rdzogs/
308a6(rnying rgyud): ma ma / na 'de pa'i spyi 'jugs/ theg brjen de rnyed nga/ ga pan pa gam du sa// ga can dgas ma myod/ sa can pa'i brig pa byungs// ci pa ban seM rnas grangs te// sa ba
308a7(rnying rgyud): dug/ byedapa bye tsu to// kyi nga la / sa kyi nibyed ga/ rdzi ga na gi slong / khyi dung la sa sus
308b1(rnying rgyud): mra tsam pa/ gas pa bcugs sanams/ banan pa grus kya pa' 'jug/ zad par nas namasasangs sungs// nga ba nan mnams na tamagadang na pa 'dagasangs// bdu 'dugs pas 'angam nas /
308b2(rnying rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor ni// dbus su yang thog zugs ste// dkar dmar gnyis kyi rang bzhin no// dkyil 'bor da yi gyi'i mdu// me yi lag tu bskor nas// de la sgo bzhenas par dgod// dbus su me du rtsal po ste// dbang gi kyil dakhong bar nga la// reg pa'i rtsa'ajo /
308b3(rnying rgyud): bzhi// me dbung dbus na brjid par bzhugs// dbang gi yang pog zam la// gnas yul phyag rgyabacu drug kyang // me dpung dbus na rngam par daspyod// sgrol mtha byed chen po babyed// med bung dbus ni rol par dgod// dkyim mdzad chen po 'don rnams ni// gsang
308b4(rnying rgyud): da 'ab shid la 'das// rkyen gsang bathams cad cang // yang thog kyil ba dag sum la 'das/ m+b+hi d+hA ba ma lus kyang // med rnaMm 'i bring nga dus// lhagasu rnags cing du sa// bud pa gas drugs ma gnas kyang // gsang pa'i dkyil
308b5(rnying rgyud): bang gas// zhes stornapas pa ma dang nan pa 'ag gyu s+ho// gsang pa med pa zud pas// gas pa'i kyi'i 'bod ma ba rgyu gcig pas/ bcom ldan das chen po la rkyeg 'tshal la// napa dan pa su bzang po pas//
308b6(rnying rgyud): bser rnags kyi / 'angs dpa'i na pa dang / rigs pa'i sangs rgyam dag/ gas pa'i yum pa zhi dang / byang chubasams dpa'adang / sems pa rdzogs dang / gsang ba med pa ga dkyil ba / zas pacig dam pa ba po marnas pa rnas
308b7(rnying rgyud): dang / tshangs pa dang / 'drog pa dang / drang sring dang / sranams dang / mi byeng du ba sems dpa' mi ba byi dri ma med pa la sogs pa gabang mang pon zla la rgyang nalas 'das pa cas kyi stong sa pashing sa te bkang sngal to// zhal nas gsung ba rnams ca dang / theg paris pa da ma
309a1(rnying rgyud): na na sa su na sa nga/ sa sa na
309a2(rnying rgyud): 'di pang tsan 'grus nan tan gyis// gsang byud 'di yi rang bzhin ni// yan lagadrug rnams smos dang bral// rang byung thugs rjes gangal ba'i klong // dmachog kun bzang su gsung thugs// byang chub mngon sum togs nges pa'i// srid pa gsum kyi bugasung sngags/
309a3(rnying rgyud): stong gsum chos nyid dbyings su bsgom// khams gsum byang chub sems su bsgom// yum sde'i mkha' dbyings bde klod du// yab ma don gyi rgyas gdab po// thig le brtsegs pa'i grong // yang thog dag brtsegs su// mang me dgu brtsegs kyang / srid bsnang ba ma/
309a4(rnying rgyud): t-i la~M/ byang chu sems rkyerten/ dz+nyA na~M dz+ha la// ya shas d+hIH/ gargyang rgyad kyang / lung can tha ma ga kyang / s+ya srin mo 'i dgu ci gsan/ nor byi na can 'bar ba zas/ gsan ma she nas 'byub pa'i thod / tan bsgral ba gnas ni/ ga bya
309a5(rnying rgyud): rmod/ zlos 'das pagan/ ba bar sho tu dpa pa nan pa la gtad / 'dam dpa la nanapas cang // gsang ba med nga shid tsamamam sa gyu dang ma bong thal brgyam ston las ma 'ad ma dang/ stong paldan pang med pa 'angs kyi dpa la/ dras gsupa 'dab dgas
309a6(rnying rgyud): bdam pa'i stegapa// dgongs mtha ga rnams kyi bdag pa ste/ byang chub sa shes theg pas/ 'ad pa gshegs bachen pa'i// cha gdang ma ga ma can du med// byon pa'i dgongs pani rtsom tsho chen pa 'dran/ mas nyid kyimatshan tid stong nas dmigs su medas/
309a7(rnying rgyud): kunagazhe ga ting dang ga med pa tsam tsho chen po'i byings// sems kyi nga bzhin ltar 'dags papas// bdi cin byang chub sams ni byung med nam mkha' bzhin// chos dang byang chub sengs ni bde bkun pa khyab// cas 'khor rnams la sbas sa// de nas 'khor rnams kyis lags sa/
309b1(rnying rgyud): lagasas// malal ha zhas b.rad nas rtags ta dbang bkrol bar byu // da nas pa khong rnams kyis ston pal 'dib da// thugs kyi dkyil la bar yang ldan zhing // snang srad thams cad langs su gas pa// dang 'thun rnams kun gag nas// tshas rnams 'dzus
309b2(rnying rgyud): sangs zas par// ston pas bstan pa nyid du rdzogs// zhes gsol te/ bsngo ba med pa'i mchod pa/ 'dod pa la yi yon tan/ nam mkha' ltar kun la khyab par sprul te/ ston pa la mchod nas 'di ga dgasol to// ji la 'angam bkag chos kyi dgyis// blta bdur chen nam
309b3(rnying rgyud): mkha' lding / spyod pa ma bkag rgya mtsho'i 'jing // dam tshig ma bkag bsrung du med// bsgrub pa pa bkag yongs su rdzogs// phrin las ma bkag kun la rol// zhes ston pa la gsol to// ston pas rdo rje dbyings kyis 'khor rnams la gsang brtson po byin pa// gsang bachen
309b4(rnying rgyud): po de kho na nyid// 'khor ba'i gyad rten 'byung ba lnga// 'khor gnas bstan pa byang chub min/ 'khor ba gnas su bskal nas byang chub sems// sa rbu me drung 'byung ba la// byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor te// smon pa med pa'i yab lnga dang // zags pa med pa'i yum lnga dang // gsang ba'i
309b5(rnying rgyud): gsang sa chag kyang chub sems// 'jib med pa'i srog kyang min// gol bzad pa'i lam yang yin// ri dgra med pa'i gnas grang yid// srin gyis grub pa'i ltag yin// 'da' bar dka' ba'i dam rtog sen// che bar byung bcom ldan 'das// nyan thos rang thal jig can la
309b6(rnying rgyud): nus rdzogs// rtogs pa'i rgyal po nang du shar// mabyung ma skyes snying po'i mchog/ sun gyis grub pa thig le'i blong // spos med brjod bral pad+ma che// rang byung ye shes gzhal dang bral// chos rnams nam mkha'i rang bzhin 'dra// rdzogs chen bla mang byang chub sems//
309b7(rnying rgyud): chog nyid gsang ba'i don 'di ni// na dbang brgyad pa'i brdegs pa ste// gtogs pa'i man dgagater du bcang // zhes 'khor rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams la gtad do// de nas sdud pa pos 'ang ma dpal ma sogs pa/ gsang ba me dpung gi dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyis/ thams cad med pung gi
310a1(rnying rgyud): bzhin du tugs te/ rtags 'bum ma// nga gsus pa bdal dbul 'bar // du blang can pa'i byang ba cang // rtags can mnyam stor thugs kyi mdzad// gas bas mnyam pa'i snang sa na// sa smrams gzhan nas dran pa drad
310a2(rnying rgyud): ladu jonas gnal las 'ang // dngos bu gzhan dugyi slong ba// dub pa'i dkyil 'thor nga las shang // de ldan med pang yinas gnas// gzhan du mi slong nyid la rdzogs// sa bcwa byed par rdzogs pa'i lung // yangs pa'i dkyil 'bang nyid 'dzags// mnyamad
310a3(rnying rgyud): myang de // zhes brjodado// shinatungams dang dus tshar skyes te// ston pa la na bang blags nas mnyan// de nas ston pa kun banang pas/ rigs la bde pa gshegs pa rnams dang // 'bag pa 'angam dpal la bka' phul te// du bye sems dpa bachen
310a4(rnying rgyud): bdag po byed la dngas kyi sa 'di sa sus la bzhed do// 'jam dpal non pa/ chos 'di kyi che zhing zab pa yin te/ khyod kyis zin par gyis shig/ rtogs shig ba srub pachen pa'i don 'di ni/ dper na me dang dzu ste/ zung ngu'i du la nas ze 'i di ra ba kyang bsreg go// theg pa chen po
310a5(rnying rgyud): nyi ma'i ring nga rje ste/ 'jam du meng dang / ri rgyal po rnams dang / lor lug dang / gangs rgyu dang / g.ya thog dang / debul mo tha pa thams cad gsol bar byed de/ thang dor dang dbri bsad du'i rnyed/ ston pa bdag gi thugs rje dang / nyis 'dra sang bri bka
310a6(rnying rgyud): da/ nas 'du sa
310a7(rnying rgyud): 'a ba'i ma byes mi ba pa la yang / nyes bzhin du gad/ denas bcom cad du gyis/ 'ad ngas pa dang / klu da thod / mi'i byang sas pas dpang drad cing babadag nyid/ khyo rgyalalasu bu sogs pa rnamapa la/ dam dang bad du che te/ sre dad pa

310b4(rnying rgyud): na das kyis nga ba pa ga pa // sems seM cos cang du 'as// zhi na kyad // sman du rnamapa pa / shrImad+hA sems la ga // babyung dri mdapa mag sa// da chog 'digs pa sam das/

310b6(rnying rgyud): 'das dang gsang rgyad chen po 'di la 'jam dpal gyis bstod pa/ nam mkha'i mtshan nyid kun stong ste// dngos po med pas nam mkha' 'dra// bya ba med pas grol ba ste// man ngag mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// chu zla bzhin du dri bral bas// thams cad rtogs pa yongs su spangs
310b7(rnying rgyud): gzung dzin nam go nyis rnam par dag/ skyon bral yul phyag 'tshal lo// dus gsum thoga'i chen po'i dang // lnga bzhi 'khor ba'i gnas las thar// thib med cing 'phral medangapa// spyan rdzogs sprul phyag 'tshal lo// dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi dpal// khams gsum

311b1(rnying rgyud): bka' yi dam pa mchog gi lung // nges par byung ste gsungs pa 'anam// srub dang bsrub par bya ba dang // 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir// gsang sngags gsang ba'i man ngag 'di// bdud rtsi dam pa mchog gi lung // snying pa

311b3(rnying rgyud): bstan pa dang // brgyad khri bzhi stong rnam grangs kyang // theg pa'i sgo ni gsum du gsungs// gsang nyid theg par bsdus dang bzhi// ldem por dgongs dang don dam yang // bkri ba'i don de sangs rgyas yin// rna brgyud bstan pas thugs brtol te//
311b4(rnying rgyud): thig le chos skus khyab pa'i phyir// nges pa'i lung yang sangs rgyas so// sangs rgyas mnyam dang dbyings su 'gro// nges pa'i lung yang rnam gcig tu// gsang sngags gsang bas sangs rgyas te// byang chub sems 'di kun tu dag/ rdzogs pa'i ye shes pa
311b5(rnying rgyud): chen nyid// ma lus mtha' dag nyid kyi rgya// ye nas bya med bya mi dgos// rgyu dang 'bras bu 'khrul pa'i sgra// mi rtog sbyong ba'i yul min no// de lta'i yul du rtog 'dzin gyis// 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor gyur pa yin// des 'byung chos sku
311b6(rnying rgyud): chen po la// b+ha gang ji bzhin bzhag pas na// byang chub nyid de ltung gnas med// bu gcig ma rtsol bde bar gnos// rgyud dang lung dang man ngag kyang // dmangs dang rje'u dang rgyal po'i tshul// khyad par rtsal 'phang thag
311b7(rnying rgyud): ring yang // gcig la gcig rten gcig gi dang // dbyer med tshul gcig rang bzhin pas// cig ste rnam grangs yongs kyis med// dbyer med dang du rtogs pa la// bdud rtsi zhes ni de la bya'o// de bas sku gsung thugs kyi bdag/ spu dang rgyan dang 'khor
312a1(rnying rgyud): pa ya // lung can zapa sa nang nags pa// zla ba zhin du 'khor pa yang // lags sungs rgyas dgas dang// dkyus su gyur byas mnyam gnas pas// ma nas sangs cas dadu ldan nyid// nus na nan nanam
312a2(rnying rgyud): dbyings su gyur// dbyings 'gyur dag mnyam lhan grub pas// lta ba 'di la gnas pa yi// rnal 'byor 'di ni skal ba bzang // ci spyad ci bsgoms ci bsgrubs kyang // bdud rtsi nyid de sman gyi mchog/ bdar gshegs nyid kyi thugs dri ma tod// rkyen bzla
312a3(rnying rgyud): ngo mtshar rgya cher 'byung // rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams kyi gsos// sangs rgyas bde chen nyid las byung // thams cad ma lus bdud rtsi 'di// spros med thig ler gnas pa las// mtha' yas sems can don gyi phyir// rang la mchod cing rang gis bza
312a4(rnying rgyud): sgrub pa pos ni nan tan byos// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang pos/ ye shes chen po'i thugs nas dgongs te bka' stsal pa'o// bdud rtsi chen po mchog gi lung las byang chub sems de 'o na nyid lta bar ngabastan pa'i man ngag chen po gsang ba'i
312a5(rnying rgyud): don dang po ste/ thugs kyi rgya mtsho'i nang nas gsang pa'i mdzod chen po las bam po chen po brgyad pa'i dang ngo // @##// rgya gar skad du/ a mr-i ta ra sa ya na/ tran dz+nyA ya/ pra shas+t+ra pra mAn shrI kra nA pra shasta ya na mo/ bod skad du
312a6(rnying rgyud): tshangs pa la sogs pa drang srong dang / lha dang klu dang pi'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas tshangs pa'i gtso bo mchog/ dung gi thor tshugs khong sang can// tshangs pa kun grol chen po dang // drang srong chen po ljang sngon dang // tsA ra ka dang na pa po
312a7(rnying rgyud): skyes// tha skar bu dang lha skabs dang // rgyun shes pa dang g.yon phyogs lha// thang la gnas dang me bzhin 'jug/ dka' gnyis spyod dang ka la yan// shing khyer dang ni ljang sngon bu// nyi ma zla ba klu ru bcas// shing gi lha mo 'oda'i chang ma// sman gyi lha lo nor gyi
312b1(rnying rgyud): 'di kun 'khor dang bcas pa yis// kun bzang lhal phyag 'tshal nas// sman gyi dbang dang dam chog mnos// drang srong rnams la rjes su gnang // de nas kun bzang bder gshegs kyis// sman gyi rgyal po bdud rtsi mchog/ nges pa'i lung 'di bka' stsal to// de nas thugs
312b2(rnying rgyud): 'phrul gyis// sa rnams rab tu g.yos nas ni// stong gsum 'jig rten sa stengs su// thams cad sman chen ra sa yan// skye ba med las thams cad skyes// de ltar smin par byed pa yang // thugs rje rgya mtsho chen po las// thugs rje sprin ni khyab pa yis// sprin chen glog gi phreng bcan
312b3(rnying rgyud): yud tsam sgra dang bcas pa yis// sa stengs khengs par char phab nas// de nyid thugs rje snyoms pa'i mgon// chu yi phung po bdud rtsi yis// ma lus par ni ngoms par byas// bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho thigs chen gyis// sa dang sman rnams kun gyi gsos// ri rab rtse dang ri sul
312b4(rnying rgyud): dang // sman ljongs dang ni nags tshal dang // lcang lo can gyi 'khor kun du// sprin chen bdud rtsi char gyis brlan// chu de thams cad ro gcig ste// chu yi bcud las skyes pa ni// dpag bsam shing dang gel pa'i shing // ljon shing dang ni tsu ta'i shing // sa stengs khebs
312b5(rnying rgyud): par skyes pa ste// bdud rtsir gyur te thams cad rgyas// sdong po dang ni sdong chen dang // rtsa ba sdong po shun lpags dang // snying po yal ga lo ma dang // 'dab ma mo tog 'bras bur bcas// de bzhin 'bru yi rnam grangs kun// thams cad bangs shing smin par mdzad// /
312b6(rnying rgyud): 'thungs na ngoms te rgyas par gyur// so so'i yul dang gnas dag dang // mdog dang ro dang dri dang mthu// gang gi sa bon de nyid las// de dag rang rung 'byin par byed// de bzhin srog chags thams cad kun// ra sa ya na'i rdzas la spyod// 'gro ba drug gi gsos su
312b7(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// bdud rtsi sgo ni rnam par phye// 'jig rten mgon pos bka' stsal to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal rnon pos bsdus te bka' stsal pa/ lha dang klu dang drang srong dang / mi'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge bsnyen chen po dri ma
313a1(rnying rgyud): // med par grags pa li tsA p+na la sogs pa la bdud rtsi ra sA yan tanAn dz+ha ya 'di dag bstan na// dang por bsgrub pa'i yul dang gnas ni/ u hu sI ti pa tsa zhes bya ste/ da rjes zhes kyang bya ba/ ro'i rgyal po gser mdog can gyi rtse mo rtan ra zhes bya ba
313a2(rnying rgyud): dA sa ya na zhes bya ba drang srong rnams kyis bsgrubs so// de yang thang cig yud kyis 'grub// la la nyin zhag gcig gis 'grub// la la nyin zhag bdun gyis 'grub// mtha' ma nyi shu gcig gis 'grub// de la the tshom med pas 'grub// de dag kun
313a3(rnying rgyud): ni// rdza ba sdong bu yal ga dang // lo ma 'dab ma me tog dang // shun lpags 'bras bu snying por bcas// ro dang mthu dang mdog dang las// rtsa ba gcig la yan lag brgyad// yan lag brgyan las yon tan stong // 'di dag kun gyi yon tan yang // bzhi ba
313a4(rnying rgyud): bzhi'i nad sil zhing // bdud bzhi nges par 'joms par byed// sman gyi rgyal po bdud rtsi'i mchog/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to// drang srong chen po 'di kun kyang // mngon shes lnga dang ldan 'gyur zhing // rig pa'i gnas mchog bcwa brgyad
313a5(rnying rgyud): de nas sman ni bsgrub par bya// stegs bu khru gang ba gcig la// maN+Dal gtsang ma'i dris byugs la// de yi dbus su sman gyi mchog/ bdud rtsi tsong zi rnam gdum dang // ser skya ba las byung ba yi// 'o ma bre gang btsags nang du// a sho kan da'i phye ma dang // bsres
313a6(rnying rgyud): nas bskol ba'i nang du gdab// lcags las byas pa'i snod du blugs// stegs bu'i dbus su bzhag nas ni// byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags 'di dag/ stong ngam brgya ni rtsa brgyad bzlas// oM badz+ra a mr-i ta/ pa la lIg/ pe la lig tsan da leka sta
313a7(rnying rgyud): dngos grub blang ba'i sngags 'di'o// a mr-i ta sid+d+hi byi tsu rna ya swA hA/ pu tsi lha ha ka na/ byin gyis brlab cing bza' ba yang // nyi ma'i gung la bza' bar bya// don dam thig le bden pa las// snying po med las snying po blang // rnam smin 'bra
313b1(rnying rgyud): rig 'dzin 'grub// nad med lo brgya 'tsho bar byed// de nas drang srong nyi shu gcig/ grub pa'i rig 'dzin mchog tu gyur// de yi 'og tu drang srong mchog/ bcwa lnga yis ni bdud rtsi sman// ra sa yan dam pa 'di// tshe yi rig 'dzin 'dod pa'i phyir// gzhon nu sred
313b2(rnying rgyud): ces bya ba dang // 'dron skyob ces ni bya ba dang // rtsibs kyi mu khyud la sogs pas// chu bo gang gA'i 'gram du bsgrubs// lha rdzas dge ba a ru ra// rigs bdun sa la lhung ba ni// brgya byin bdud rtsi 'thung ba'i tshe// thigs pa bdun ni kha nas ltung // rlung gis khyer te sa las
313b3(rnying rgyud): skyes// bdud rtsi'i gtso bor rab tu grags// rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan dang // 'dus pa'i nad dang dus kyi nad// dus min 'chi las thar bar byed// rlung mkhris bde kan 'di kun yang // gcig la'ang lnga lnga yod par bshad// de kun rab tu bsal ba'i phyir// phung
313b4(rnying rgyud): po'i bdud dang nyon mongs bdud// lha bu bdud dang 'chi bdag bcom// bdud rtsi 'di yis sel bar byed// shar lho nub byang gadra yang rung // brag phug stong pa yod pa las// bdud rtsi 'dzag pa'i khu ba ni// rin chen sna lnga 'byung ba'o// ming ni shi la mdza' du zhes// ra sa ya
313b5(rnying rgyud): nA bdud rtsi'i mchog/ a rur brgya rtsa brgyad dam// yang na nyi shum+b+ha gcig gam// sul bu zlum por gyur bcis te// de dag rab tu bcas pa dang // lcags zangs 'khar ba'i snod nang du// bka ste stegs b+he god+hA ma yi// dbus sna bdud rtsi sman de gzhag/ byin
313b6(rnying rgyud): gyis brlab pa snga ma bzhin// 'od drang dri dang bro ba'ang med// rtags 'di rnam gsum gang byung yang // lag pa g.yon pa bkan te phyar// mthe bong srin lag mthil du dgug/ blangs te btung ba'i sngags 'di'o// oM a mr-i ta si ti bi ts+tsha n+da ya// g+ha ha kAn zhes
313b7(rnying rgyud): brjod do// de yi yon tan brjod mi lang // rdo rje brag dang 'drar 'gyur te// nad med rtag tu dar la bab// grub pa'i rig 'dzin dam par 'gyur// srid pa chags nas srubs shing gis// bsrubs pa'i 'bras bu rin po che// me she la chu shelaM gnyis byung ba/
314a1(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f// de yang thabs dang shes rab ste// nyin mtshan gnyis la dbang byed pa'o// de ny-id zung yang 'khor dru bcas// de nas bdud rtsi chags pa ni// sa dman dag tu mi skye ste// a la be tA sa sar ka la ba// lha dang dri Ta gnod sbyin dang // rin zen sna tshogs 'byung khung /
314a2(rnying rgyud): gnas// legs ldan gangs ri gnyen gyi shod// ri brag chu klung bgegs gnas su// lhung nas babs te skyes pa ni// oM li ka dang bris ci ka/ nyi ma gzi brjid ldan pa'i chu// A la be ta sa ra sra ka la ba br-ik+ta 'bru// de bzhin zla ba gzi ldan chu// de yi sa bon lgang
314a3(rnying rgyud): pa ni// gser mdog bdud rtsi 'dra bar gsal// dmar ba mer blugs pus bus zer// gzugs bzang mdzes pa phun sum tshogs// tsher ma rno ba dpal dang ldan// bdud rtsi shing dang 'bras bur ldan// drug rnams 'joms shing slar yang blo// sna tshog
314a4(rnying rgyud): nad rnams sel bar byed// nyi ma'i 'od dang zla ba'i mdog/ ro yid rnam pa sna tshogs ldan// dkyu'i gtso bor 'di sbyor cig/ tshangs pa tshe dang ldan par 'gyur// nyi ma zla ba'i dngos grub thob// ra sa ya na'i gtso bo yin// de nas drang srong gzhon nu srid// khyab
314a5(rnying rgyud): 'jug spang gnyis bya ba yi// rwa yi gzhu thogs mi srun pa// lag na mtshoni cha sna lnga thogs// de yis srid pa chags pa'i bcud// bdud kyi rnam lnga bsdus pa lngas// kha nas thigs gnyis sa la lhung // de nas bdud rtsi dam pa'i mchog/ re sa ya na phyi ma'i
314a6(rnying rgyud): rgya// bu mo bzang mo gcig tu gyur// chu klung gang gA'i bye ma la// yod de skye ba bstan pa ni// nye'u shing ngam nye'u zhes bya'o// 'gan ta ku le pad pa ta// gnad pre ya ku ma ha go na sig ha ma kha// tshe ra ma yar lha mar lta ba'o// de la lha bran tshogs kun
314a7(rnying rgyud): gyis// bskor zhing mchod pa byed pa yin// skyon zla ze chungs dpying rnga 'bring // nya yi tshon btsal bar bya'o// btsal ba'i thabs ni 'di ltar ro// byis pa lo zug lo bdun pa// khrus byas dang ldan gos bskon nas// shar phyogs ngos su kha bsdus te//
314b1(rnying rgyud): lha phyag lan gsum byas nas na// de dag rtswa nas dbyung ba'i sngags// tad+ya thA sho tod ga te da re swA hA// phyag 'tshalnga bdud rdzi mchog khyod la// phyag 'tshal bdud rtse las 'byung ba// stobs dang gzi brjid 'brel mdzad ma// rang 'byung ston pa'i bka' bzhin te// lha mo /
314b2(rnying rgyud): ni dbang gyur cig/ khu bA ra sa ya na'i mchog/ dngos grub mchog tu nye ba khyod// tshe dang stobs ni bdag stsol cig/ ye shes thams cad gsal bar mdzod// shun lpags dang ni rgyus pa bsal// zo to bsnyil te slar la sba'o// snying po brdungs la khu ba yang //
314b3(rnying rgyud): ras ni sar pa'i nang du btsir// bdag nyid lus kyang khrus byas te// dar ldan gos bzangs gyon nas ni// sman du bsgrub pa'i 'jab la 'jud // bsnyen dang 'dzab bsgom byas nas ni// stong ngam 'bum mam ci nus bzlas// bza' ba'am yang na 'thung ba'i tshe//
314b4(rnying rgyud): nyug chu ba yi 'o ma btung // yang na phye ma mchog tu bgam// bza' zhing btung ba'i sngags 'di'o// na ma dzA ra a ga dz+r-i tu swA hA// zhag gram za ma ri re yang // srang re'i cha nas bskyed de bza'// zos pa'i yon tan 'di rnams so// lus ngag yid gsum
314b5(rnying rgyud): dbang po gsal// bdud rtsi 'di dag su 'thung ba// ji ltar lha rnams 'chi med ltar// klu rnams la ni sman bzhin no// shing rnams la ni chu bzhin no// me tog la ni zla ba bzhin// lo ni lnga brgya lon par du// bcu drug mdog ni gzhon nu 'dra// nad med rtag tu dang la bab/
314b6(rnying rgyud): stobs kyang glang po che dang 'dra// mngon shes lnga dang ldan par 'gyur// 'o ma dag dang babyud ba'am// mar khwa'am sbrang rtsi dgra dang btang // zhag gcig zos na yon tan bcu// zhag bdun zos na yon tan bad+ya// n+ti shwa b+ha gcing zos ni ni// brgya rtsa brgyad 'dis thob par
314b7(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// bud med stong la khyab par sbyor// sa bon mi zad 'bras bu yang // bu phor 'phel zhing dpa' dang ldan// mi rnams kyiseM na mo sod do// zla gcig zos na yon tan ni// ngo yang zla btab bzhin// gnod sbyin srin pos mi sod do// lha rnams kun dang mnyam par 'gyur//
315a1(rnying rgyud): // zag pa zad nas nam mkhar 'phur// rdo rje 'gros kyis nam mkhar 'gro// rigs 'dzin go 'phang 'dir thob bo// 'dres pa gang zag mi yi zas// zos na dngos grub mi thob nges zhes lung du bka' stsal to// de nas drang srong drag sha na// rgyal po shes nyen can zhes
315a2(rnying rgyud): bya// lha dang drang srong thams cad la// mchod sbyin rgya chen byas pa las// ma hA de ba lha chen po// kun gyi 'jug tu spyan drangs pas// lha chen drag po de khros te// lha chen de yi dpral ba las// mig gcig lhag par byung ba ste// lha dang drang srong thams cad la// chang ma dring
315a3(rnying rgyud): bdakan sna tshogs dang // de bzhin mi la rims nad dag/ rlung lha'i lug par bskur nas gtor// lha dang drang srong mang pos kyang // mi shes mtshor myos par 'gyur// phye ma'i rgyal po 'dab ma 'di// sa stangs khyab par skyes pa la// drang srong rnams kyang mchod pa
315a4(rnying rgyud): byed// lugri mig me tog chen po 'di// ra sA ya na'i rgyal mo ste// ba yi 'o ma dag dang bskol// rngubs gcig 'thungs pas ba spu langs// rngubs gnyis 'thungs pa'i yon tan nI// rims nad thams cad byung bar byed// rngubs gsum 'azungs pa'i yon tan+da ni// mig
315a5(rnying rgyud): rtswa dmar zhing mdog kyang gzhon// phyi ma grib mar bskams pa dang // ma to la yi khu bar sbyar// blu na dgra rnams myos par 'gyur// lha yis bsrungs kyang 'chi bar 'gyur// byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags 'di'o// stong ngam brgya ni rtsa brgyad bzlas// oM se 'u gri bA ha na han/
315a6(rnying rgyud): hU~M/ ma ra yA mA ru ya/ tsi ta ya tse ta ya su gri ba phaT/ bdud rtsi ra sa ya na'i gtso// shu dag dang ni rurta dang // phye myur byas te suM thud pa// rgyal po bud med dbang du 'gyur// 'gri ha 'gro lo ki dang sbyar// dgra la blud na rna ba 'on// lug mig grib mar bskam
315a7(rnying rgyud): paM dang // su ti'i 'o mar sbyar ba ni// dgra le blud na 'chi bar 'gyur// lha chen drag pos bskyed pa 'od// 'jam dpal gzhon nus mkhyen pa las// lha dang drang srong gzhin mo shes// de skad ces bcom ldan 'das 'jim dpal gzhon nus/ mi mdzad kyi 'dad
315b1(rnying rgyud): sgra tshangs pa dang / drang srong dang / klu'i rgyal po 'jog po dang / skul pa bzang po'i ma'i byang chub sems dpa' lits+tsha bI la sogs pa rnams la bka' stsal to// de yang tshe phyi ma 'am dus phyi mar mi sdod par/ skal ba bzang po'i 'bras bu mngon du thob pa dang / 'bras bu mo 'di
315b2(rnying rgyud): nyid la sprin to// de nas ci yi lha mo mchog/ ming ni grub pa'i blo gros ma// bu mo mu la zhes bya ba// de yi sa bon lhung ba ni// 'dzum gling shing gi nags las skyes// rak+ta zhes ni 'dir grags pa// ra sa ya na'i gtso mo ste// rtsa ba rak+ta mu la kha// rtsa ba me to/
315b3(rnying rgyud): bu rnams// mthun par zad par dmar ba ste// 'bras bu sran ma ma sha tsam// gyen du zug pa de brko ba// ston zla ra ba'i nya la brko'o// srid pa'i na dang nags las skyes// khrag gi nyungs ma zhes ni grags// rlon pa'i khu ba btsir ba dang // pad+ma'i rak+ta cha mnyam bsres/
315b4(rnying rgyud): de dag bsgrub pa'i sngags 'di'o// oMn mo rag raH/ mu la pran+de swA hA/ 'gro ba dbang byed dam pa yin// yi lha mos bka' stsal to// ming gis med du mi rlung ngo // rgyal bu don grub pa ba de// mya ngan 'das pa'i sku gdung ni// sha ri rAm zhes grags pa yin// de yi sa ngon
315b5(rnying rgyud): 'phel ba ni// 'dzam glengs stengs khyab par skyes// ma hA ne li zhes bye ba// ming ni tha skar rdo rje yin// me tog tha skar gzhon nu ste// ste mthur gsumi ti la ganga' // rdo rje breg kyang 'joms par nus// sha ri rAm dang rus pa yi// sbyar ba'i 'drad kyi dam par rung //
315b6(rnying rgyud): ming gis med du mi rung ngo // de yi yon tan thams cad kyang // nus pa sra ma khregs rdo rjer 'gyur// phyag na rdo rje'i mthu yang mnyam// ra sa ya na'i mchog tu gsungs// de nas lha yi dbang po mchog/ brgya byin bu yi lag pa ru// gnod sbyin rgyal pos mda' 'a dzub pa// de
315b7(rnying rgyud): yi dum bu lag sor yang // sa stengs khyab par skyes pa ni// li byi tse lag dbang po lag/ sdong bu yal ga mdzer pa med// me tog zung gsum mda' sgro 'dra// rtsa ba lag sor lnga pa ste// dbyar zla tha chungs nyal brko// bsgrub pa'i lag mthil g.yon du bzhad // 8
316a1(rnying rgyud): sa ya na thams cad ste// dngas grub blang ba'i sdug rgya yin// da med du ma rung // mang du 'bral 'gyur bzlab rdzas yin// lus la 'byung ba'i dri chen dang // bskal pa'i dri chen yungs kar gsam// Na saHmra 'thungs na drag rnams thug// 'dri byed drug rje
316a2(rnying rgyud): sel ba'i phyir// bdud rtsi zhes ni de la bya'o// ming gis med du mi rung ngo // 'chi bdag bdud kyang des bcom mo// purna zhes bya'i rna ba yang // srin po pu rna'i rna ba ste// bskal ba'i rna ba dag dang sbyar// rna ba'i mngon shes thob par byed// ming gis med du mi rung
316a3(rnying rgyud): ngongo// b+ha hu lug mig me tog dang // mkha' lding bya yi mig dang sbyar// A la bi gshang shang de'u// rma bya dang pa ko ki la// 'di rnams bsgral ba'i mig dang sbyar// mig gi mngon shes der thob ste// stobs ldan gyi ni mig yin no// ming gis med du mi rung ngo //
316a4(rnying rgyud): tse tra ka dang snying zho sha// thams cad gnod sbyin snying gi brla// bsgral ba'i tsit+ta dag dang sbyar// mngon shes lnga yi dngos grub thob// ming gis med du mi rung ngo // bud med gong bshad 'dra ba yi// klad pa go ro tsa na 'byung // de ni ban glang rigs can yin// bskal ba'i
316a5(rnying rgyud): klad pa thams cad dang // thang ba la hA yi rtsa bar sbyar// mdangs kyi dngos grub des thob 'gyur// ha l+ye ki ya kha 'bar ma'i// lce yin pas na lce dang sbyar// dbang ngo lcags kyi dngos grub dang // spyan ras gzigs kyi dngos grub thob// ming gis med du mi rung ngo // srid pa'i bdag
316a6(rnying rgyud): po tshangs pa'i gtso// ming ni mgon btsun phywa zhes bya'o// nAl gyi bu ni dzi hA zhes// skad ma phyung gi lce zhes bya'o// skad phyung ba ni tshangs pa ste// skad ma phyung gi grubs par gcad// de dang sbyar ba'i 'phrad du ni// me tog ma lo kril kril te// ming ni ba ya sa ya'o// rtsa ba ma hA go na
316a7(rnying rgyud): sig/ me tog gser gyi mdun zhu can// sher phyogs su ni kha lta ba// 'di'i kun ha l+ye ki ya ste// cha mnyam btags te phye mar bya// zla ba gza' yis zin pa'i tshe// yi dam lha la mchod bya zhing // phye ma rgya chang nang du gdab// zang cig yud kyis 'grub pa ste// rta mgrin dbang
316b1(rnying rgyud): gi dngos grub thob// bskal ba'i lce ni thams cad dang // sbyar ba 'phrad kyi dam par rung// ming dgis med du mi rung ngo // sgra dang snga ma'i 'bras bur sbyar// tshangs pa'i gsung dbyangs sgrogs nus 'gyur// bsgral ba'i sgra ni thams cad sbar// ming gis med du mi rung // dung dang 'dru /
316b2(rnying rgyud): sras gdung dngo // bsgral pa'i rnas pa thams cad byer// sras kyi ni mngon zhes thob// ming gis maud du ma d+ha ri// rtse mdzad du pa 'dus pa'i \u0f88\u0f90// tshogs chu dang gangs kyi rtse// lan tshigs dri sbyinam// ngapral ba'i tshun thams cad slar// rdo rje rgyal pa
316b3(rnying rgyud): rtag tu 'gro ba'i don ci nas// ming gis med du ma rung ngo // dgongs pa 'don du sems can mthanga' dag la snang ba dang / dus mtha'i yon tan gyis sems can bran la phan 'dogs par nus so// 'grob yongs kyigs sa mdzad par dgongs nas/ btsam ldan 'ad
316b4(rnying rgyud): kun du bzang pos ye shes kyi thugs nas dgongs nas mgur gyi bum par dril te/ ljags kyi dbang po la bkram ste/ zhal 'dzum pa mdzad nas/ mkhyen rab kyi dang po 'jam dpal rnon po dang / rdo rje chos la bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal gyis dkyil 'khor gyi
316b5(rnying rgyud): sras michog nye ba dang / tshangs pa dang drang srong dang / lha dang klu dang / mi'i byang chub sems dpa' ba mal g+hi ra ti rnams la bka' stsal to// bdud rtsi chen po mchog gi lung gi sde las/ sman ra sA ya na bsgrub pa'i lung 'bum sde las bcas pa/ bam po
316b6(rnying rgyud): chen po gnyis pa// / rgya grar skad du/ pradz+nye b+hag ba na ma hA d+ha NAM/ bod skad du/ bcom ldan 'das gnyis med kyi rgyal po chen po lnga phyag 'tshal lo// de nas spyad pa bstan te/ wang i n+da yo ga pa rdzogs pa'i rnang
316b7(rnying rgyud): 'byor du bstan te/ lta ba dang ni spyod pa dang // gzungs kyi mtshan nyid 'di gsungs so// de bzhin dam tshig chen po'ang bsten// las 'di lung gis bsgrub byi na// mi spong ba ni deng du byung // spyod pa dam tshig bcwo lnga bsrung // zhes pa lnga dang bsrung ba ga
317a1(rnying rgyud): stong rtsa brgyad du bsrungs pas ni// rtsa brgyad stong zhes de la bya'o// de yang ma hA sa ma ya// bzhi po rdzogs na kun du bzang // zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod dang // mnan bzlog drug ni gcig tu'o// dang lag ni lung bshad de// khwa tshad bzhi dang ldan pa
317a2(rnying rgyud): yon tan bcu gcig dang yang ldan// bzhin pazangs mig gi dgus ring ba// stod skad byed la rnyed pa phra// tshigs pa rnam la sod mo ring// yon tan 'di can bcu gcig lo// ye shes rigs can yin par bshad// bcu gsum dang rigs su 'jug/ @
317a3(rnying rgyud): sngags pas 'grub nges pa'o// rin chen rigs mchog yin par bstan// nyi shu gcig pa pad+ma'i rigs// spyan ras gzigs dbang rta mchog 'grub// nyi shu rtsa lnga lon pas ni// thogs med byang chub sems kyang 'dren// thams cad las kye rigs mchog 'ang
317a4(rnying rgyud): sum cu rtsa gcig phan chad kyis// sems phebs tshun chad kun du dge'o// yid du 'ong ba dam pa yin// bder gshegs rigs su 'grub par bshad// bde chen 'du 'bral med pa'i gzungs// de dag ma lus gang rnyed pa// lus kyang khrus byas gtsang mar bya/
317a5(rnying rgyud): tI zhi ma tsan+dan go pan dang // dzA ti pa la ku ru tshe// ka ko la dang ga bur dang // a ka ru dang du ru ska// gi bang glang po'i spos rnams kyis// byugs nas rgyan dang phreng ba gdags// dar dang ras bal 'jam po dang // gos rgyan chas bklubs bskon nas ni// gse
317a6(rnying rgyud): kyi rna cha gdub kor dang // do shil dpung rgyan se mo do// rin chen sna tshogs rgyan du gdags// ji bzhin bde ba'i stan dgra la// g.yon phyogs su ni gzhag par bya// bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen dang // bsgrub drang bsgrub chen bya ba ni// dkyil 'khor lo
317a7(rnying rgyud): gang gru bzhi pa// 'phang du sor bzhi'i tshad du bya// rdo rje dri chus maN+Dal byugs// sha chen gu gul pog gis bdug/ dkyil 'khor de la bskor te 'dug/ g.yon du de phyi bzhag nas ni// b+ha ga de nyid byin gyis brlab// spyi bor oM dkar 'od ldan
317b1(rnying rgyud): las dam nga bas// shA na byub su pa// rdzun 'du gyub// dpang ta nan pa/ zlas nas sul sgyu ma pa bar babadas// skamangs ldanas sa byung bang// ga na ga pad bye //
317b2(rnying rgyud): gangs gzhan gyis mi thub ma// g.yon pa ro lang po chen ni ts+tsha// do la/ khal khro gnyer ma// das pa gcig mi bad+mala'o// gas dzum lnga dang bla ma bani// byin gyis brlabs te sngags parnas / d+haH/ ti ga bzhin nyid ci ka'o// gad+hAng na
317b3(rnying rgyud): dA dag gyur bas// gnyis su med par mnyam sbyar nas// lha yi bdud dam phung po'i bdud// nyon mongs bdud dang 'chi bdag bcom// phyag rgya chen po bzhi dang ldan// mkha' la sdoms pa bas 'jos pa'i tshe// byang du 'bar ba mya ngan 'das// gnyis su me /
317b4(rnying rgyud): byin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to// sangs rgyas sems can thams cad dang // mtshan mar btags pa thams cad kun// bde chen nyid las gzhan ma yin// bde chen nyid las gzhan pa'i chos// sangs rgyas nyid kyis mi mkhyen to// phyi nang
317b5(rnying rgyud): ma lus snod bcud kyang // byang chub sems su rnam dag pas// skye med ye shes yum gyi dbyings// gnyis med bdud rtsi chen po ste// yab yum bde ba'i ngang du gsal// 'di ni snying po byang chub sems// badrer gshegs kun gyis bka' stsal to// lus kun yongs su
317b6(rnying rgyud): 'khyud pi yis// rdo rje pad+mar ldan byas nas// rang 'byung rnams ni bde mchog sems// phul bas myur du grub pa ni// oM ra ga pU dza ho// dngos grub blang zhing 'di brjod do// byang chub sems kyis dbang bskur te// dngos grub bsgrub pa la gzung ngo // 'du
317b7(rnying rgyud): po mchog gi lung gi nang nas/ bsgrub pa chen po'i lung dang / gzungs kyi mtshan nyid dang / sbyor ba'i man ngag dang / gA na bsgrub pa'i lung dang / byang chub kyi sems kyi yon tan dang / a mri ta grub pa'i lung ste/ bam po chen po gsum pa/
318a1(rnying rgyud): rgya garA skad du/ stan ma hA dar paH/ bod skad du/ 'bras bu chen po lnga bsgral ba'o// dpal chen khro rgyal 'khor dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// mI phred dang bas phyag 'tshal na// de nas sta na'i lung bshad de// lce nas rgyu nyid dag pa las/
318a2(rnying rgyud): dang bdag tu 'dzin pa yis// khams gsum 'khor ba'i rgyu gyur// khams gsum de dag bsgral ba'i zhing // A sa ma tsa la d+hArma d+hAH/ swa b+hA ba AHko&ha~M/ ra~M ya~M kha~M ta thA phaT/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to// mi g.yo phyag rgya chen pa dang /
318a3(rnying rgyud): dbang phyug chen po'i bsgral thabs ni// 'tsho ba'i bdag po'i tshe dang srog/ thugs rje'i ngang dang shes rab dang // thabs la mkhas pa'i byin brlabs kyis// 'gro ba thams cad sbyong bar mdzad// bdud dang gshin rje 'khor bcas kun// gnyis med ga k+Shar rol
318a4(rnying rgyud): sa / su ga// / nas nga / da
318a5(rnying rgyud): khams gsum ma lus bskal pa'i zhing // stan chen po bya ba'i phyir// bder gshegs mang po can 'dus shing // byams dang snying rje ldan pa yis// nyon mongs 'khor ba'i rgya thal te// gnas kyi sgo 'di su yis bcad// sems kyi bdug pas bcad dum /
318a6(rnying rgyud): gzung 'dzin rkang pa bsnol ba yis// yul las 'das pa'i sgo hUM shig zhes brjod de/ spyod bya'o// ka ta ri ka na pra be sha/ g.yon pa'i zhabs kyis chu tra'i gzugs// gnas kyi sgo 'di bcud bzhin du// badra bar gshegs pa'i stabs su gsol// shaM/
318a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i sdug bsngal 'dir byung ngo // zhes kyi chen po brgyad kyis du gcig tu tshig da smras so// ka~M brgyad kyis bka' stsal pa// rdzogs pa marungs lha chen khyod// sems kyi sgo kun dang bye yis// rdo rje 'bar ba'i spru zla yis// gnas kyi sgo kun das phye nas/
318b1(rnying rgyud): sems kyi bdag pos gzung bar bya// ston pas gsungs pa/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis 'chi ba yin// sdig pa'i gyen gyis bcom pas 'chi// bdag kyang dngas por stabs 'jog/ da yi bstan pa 'di la gzung // 'on kyang 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal bal// gzugs
318b2(rnying rgyud): 'dzin gang lag yul las bzlas// pa myo ba snol te mnan pa yang // phyug ni ston ma N+Dam sa bstan// nga ba byung shar marnams su brgyang // Ta kA Shi gabs ni g.yas pa yis// ru \u0f7f mi ga'i steng du mnan// de ltar leng gi mnan byas nas/
318b3(rnying rgyud): byed chen po'i 'gyed skyabs kyis// rngom brjid chen pos 'di skad do// sa ma ya ke shA tsi ta dz+wa laM hU~M phaT/ zhes mnan no// ma hA de barba d+hU dza zhes pa dang / khams gsum nas 'byung sems can rnams// rdo rje suM yi khyad par gyis// 'd-i zer
318b4(rnying rgyud): tshul du bsdus nas ni// de dag bdag gis gzugs la gzung // spro ba rdo rje thams cad kyis// sku dang ye shes mchog gis bya'o// thar pa'i lam 'byed dkyil 'khor 'dir// khrod pa can rnams 'ong ba ltar// skal dang ldan pa rigs kyi bu//
318b5(rnying rgyud): bde bar 'ongs pa legs te 'ongs// rnal 'byod dbang phyug chen po yis// tsai rgya la bstan pa'i gnas chen de re// bo d+ha mo'i dbyings nyid du// khams gsum 'khor ba klan bsdu'o// chos nyid skye 'gag med pa la// bde bar gshegs dang 'gro ba zhes// dbyings su
318b6(rnying rgyud): gcig dus gnyis su med// kun kyang dbu mnyam ny-id de// thams cad snying po cing chub sems// ma skyes pas ni 'gug pa 'jig/ bdag nyid medun mnyam pa'i sgra// rdegs rten par ma mdzad// ye nas de ltar gnas bzhin nu// sems can ma rig/
318b7(rnying rgyud): rmongs pa'i spos// bdag dang bdag gi na masar 'dzin// ga cha mtha' gnyis ma spangs // norabs btags pa'i phung po // ga sbyin pa log panas // nyin mongs sdug bsngal chu bsags te// mdzi ba'i rgyud lnga kha khrims pas/
319a1(rnying rgyud): ngan mi 'dar yun rings te// phung po khams dang skye mched la// 'khrul pa'i brag chags bag la nyal// bde 'gro'i lam la bsgribs pa'i rnams// 'khor ba'i lam su d+h+yan gcad byer// ngan song rnam par stong po'o// mtha ma b+ha sa rba pre tag ti te rje bra ba dra// @
319a2(rnying rgyud): sa / /
319a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i sems can de// las la bab pa'i rnal 'byor pas// rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir// thugs rje lcags kyus bkug nas ni// skal dang ldan pa'i rnam shes de// thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs kyis// sra yi sprul pa phyogs bcu rabartse// gsung gis
319a4(rnying rgyud): na batha' dag gros// thugs ni tshad med pa dang ldan N+Di gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor du// cong dag med par dbang bkur // yang ga nyid la yang dag sbal/ yang dag bskal na 'di can hU~Mb// mi lcogs la ngas par bye// glen pa la seMs dang bab nas/
319a5(rnying rgyud): ba'i zhing khams dbyings nyid mthong // rgyu drug gnas su mi sne byir// dpa' bo 'bru lngas lam lnga dgag/ oM oM hrI swA hA/ 'og min dga' ldan lha yul du// ye shes rlung gis btegs nas ni// sbyor ba'i lhums su phaT kyis 'phang // a r+thi swa tri pre tra/ gang yang
319a6(rnying rgyud): rung ba'i rnam shes de// gsang bya'i dbyings swA hUM gis bsngo// myur bsted ye shrIs su ru spros te// dbyings dang ye shes spun grub pas// sangs rgyas zhing sa rab 'byams dang // bde gshegs pho brang dkyil 'khor du// rdzu 'phrul zhabs dang ldan pa yas// 'phags
319a7(rnying rgyud): ba na lam du rung zhugs nas// thos kyi 'khor lo sker zhing gshegs// 'jig rten sgro ma gau Na ba dang // nyan zas dgra bco ma rang rgyal dang // sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' yis// 'jig rten 'das pa'i mchod pas mchod// smug pos brtson pa'i sa 'das nas/
319b1(rnying rgyud): pad+ma sman gyis la bzhag/ 'ardzi ba med pa'i chos smra thob// spyod gsum ma lus bton pabs// 'bram gyi chad yang mi yod de// rang sems ma bcos ye nas rlub// skyes bu chen pon la 'byor gyis// bskul ba 'ba' zhing snying rje'i mchog/ de nas ma dzang du dza de sgra/
319b2(rnying rgyud): te/ sngon 'byung ba yi gleng gzhi dang // gtan tshigs su dgongs nas/ phyi rabs kyi sngags 'chang rnams yid ches par bya ba dang / dad pa can gyi rnal 'byor pa rnams drang ba'i phyir/ dur khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad dang / ma mo chen mo brgyad dang / rang 'byung gi
319b3(rnying rgyud): mdzod rten chen po brgyad/ 'di man chad gtan tshigs dang bcas te bstan to// gong du bskal ba'i bsam rgyad ni 'og nas zhim rje bstan no// 'di yang bstod te lung dkyus nas bstan no// bad dang dbang phyug gshin rje de// thugs rje tshad med bzhis bsgral nas
319b4(rnying rgyud): ro yi nyal thabs gan rgyal te// 'dzam bu'i gling mo'i gling khams su// bo nas sa gzhir gyur pa ni// dung khrod chen po brgyad du gyur// mag ni skyon bu ma thoms su bstan// rkang pa byung shar mtshams su bstan// lag pa gnyis ni g.yas g.yon babyung //
319b5(rnying rgyud): dang sras stong yan lag kun// gnas kyi drung khrod chen po brgyad// de ni dpal chen bzhugs gnas yin// thigs chen po'i rkyen pa rmengs kyi ste// de yi srung ma chen man// ma mo chen mo ban 'azhag go// de lo gnas rten chen por lung // mdzod rten chen
319b6(rnying rgyud): byin can// rang 'byung re re bzhag pa yin// de ltar sa gzhi 'di kun yang // bkra shrIs ya mtshan thugs rje can// chos dang dngos grub 'byung ba'i gnas// cho 'phrul 'byung bar bka' stsal to// de yi lus sgying ma ga ta// dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal// ma mo
319b7(rnying rgyud): chen mo ke rba ri gnas// mkhas shing snyid stobs che ba'i sa'o// mchod rten mang ni bde byed rten// de yi meg po lho phyogs kyi// rngar khrod chen po bzhag pa ni// sing g.yul gyi gling ldan yin// ma mo tshon mo tse su gnas// mdzang thos rnam pa'i 'phrul bag ca
320a1(rnying rgyud): mchod rten ri bo ta la la// lag pa g.yas pa shar lho'i mtshams// dur khrod chen po bal yul yin// ma mo chen mo buska sa// lkug par zas kyi longs spyod che// mchod rten kha sho b+hA g+h+r-i kha'o// lag pa g.yon na lho nam mtshams// dur khrod cha
320a2(rnying rgyud): la'i yul// ma mo chen mo le ta li// phyag na rdo rje dbang gi gnas// de na mthu dang dbang yang che// gyad yul chen po'i sa las ni// mchod rten ma la sa gan da// rkang pa g.yas pa byang shar mtshams// dur khrod chen po yaM yi yul// ma mo chen mo tsan li//
320a3(rnying rgyud): ste/ gas/ na pa pan ga/ na na
320a4(rnying rgyud): po mtshan steng gi zung phyogs na// du ru khyod chen po u rgyan yul// ma me chen mo kAswa s+tha 'i// dbyor pa'i longs spyod lnga dang ldan// dngos grub can yang de na mang // gze yi mchod rten chen po ste// ming yang rnam cir ngo // de yi nang grol thams cad ldan/
320a5(rnying rgyud): dur khrod chen po za hor yul// rgya mtsho'i sgo gling ma ha do// lang ka pu rangs srin po'i gnas// ma mo chen mo sma sho ni// mngon shas rdzu 'phrul bsam mi khyab// srin po srin mo sha za rnams// de dag kun la dbang sbyar zhing // rin chen nor dang dpag
320a6(rnying rgyud): bsam shing // 'byor pa po khyod kun dang ldan// mchod rten bye byed gzhon 'o// 'jig rten bran du bstan pa yI// dra ljang chen po'i gnas brje ngo // de skar stan dkyil 'khor 'dir// 'das pa'i dus na sngon 'byung ba'i// sangs cas nags byin gyis brlang pa/
320a7(rnying rgyud): de ltar gyur pa'i 'dzam gling du// skye shi gnas pa'i yul yin pas// phyi rabs sngags kyi sgrub pa pas// 'jigs byed chen po khrag dathung gi// dus gsum rgyal pa'i bka' bzhin du// bskyed nas byin gyis brlabs pa ni// sngags mchog bdud rtsir bslab pa'i
320b1(rnying rgyud): da dus sgru sa ba nga // da tsho gdam par / sgyu ba / sa su sa ts+tsha bas spyan su na na// dan
320b2(rnying rgyud): byed chen po'i dkyil latsho kyis ng+yas gcig tu c+doMm pa'i phyi/ bdudu sa sa sh+tsa rba \u0f7f zhes bya ba zhig// ngas der dgra pa zhing gnas pang // de la bdag nyid kA ni sngag nag bar/ rgyag nam tsha chos tshogs parnams// ga ga te ma
320b3(rnying rgyud): rbAd ra t-i gabyung / A ma dA ra ma badz+ra mA mas/ rmamakha'i zhes bsgral te/ e tsi hi ma hA sa/ sha tu ma kA / badz+radi b+h+yab+h+yaH/ sa rbA da ba dz+ra tra hU~M d+ha zhes 'dod de/ sbyin dang can mang por zas/ rnam par shes pa byang chubasems su dbang bgyur hU~M//
320b4(rnying rgyud): na spyan dkyil 'khor 'dir// drar khrod bdag po brtul nas ni// 'khor bcas mu lus dbang du bzlas// 'jig rten gtso bo ga brgyad dang // srin mo bzang dang bri ma bachad// dbang phyuganyi shA rtsa bcu kyis// 'di skad ces ni khrus blangs te// mgrin+ta/
320b5(rnying rgyud): gcig tu ni rab spras pa// ho rdo rje 'bar ba'i me dpung gis// bskal pa bas kyang sreg mdzad pa// nga gis tshul rngam pa'i khyad par can// dbu mang rtsub pa'i tshig sgrogs shi // phyug mang 'jigs pa'i mtshon cha bsdams// zhi ba'i phyag stong snyan rtsang
320b6(rnying rgyud): yang // 'jig rten khyams kun sra gong d+ha// zlo ga nyid byug sbyong spyan skyong gis// dpa' bo zhig dang 'jigs su rlung // nod dang gshe dang 'jigs par byed// snying rje rjem dang zhi bar ston// 'bar ba'i tshogs chen sna tshogs can// khams bsam lha dz+nyAn
320b7(rnying rgyud): thams cang // 'jig rkye thal bar drug nga pa// ma hU~M kyi mi chog tu phyo// rdod+hal khyod sa skyengs rgya'o// nas canan tan bdag drug nga// gros ti zhin pa bathos na// bdag cag rnams kyi ma gsus skyeng // dum thu
321a1(rnying rgyud): lnga// gtungs 'gyur bgyid// de phyir 'bar bas bdag ma gtad// zhes mthun par smras so// khams gsum thams cad bskal ba'i zhig/ rgyu drug gnas pa'i sems can rnams// brgya pa thar bas can 'as nas/ 'ag gyis su yang dag tan
321a2(rnying rgyud): thig le chen pos dbang bskur te// zla gsang dbus na byang chub sems// rdzogs sangs rgyas la som nyi med// sha chen bshad gce khu ba khrag/ bde gshegs lnga yi sa bon te// rnam par dri chen snang bar mdzad// phyi rol chen po lnga dag la// nang gi chu 'a
321a3(rnying rgyud): ye nas dag/ mi bskyod byang chub sems nyid de// dmigs su med pas dag pa yin// mes rin chen 'brung ldan po// mnyam dang mi mnyam dbyed med do// sdug pa da mtha' yas thugs// skye 'gag med de ye nas dang // dan yod che chu las grub pa/
321a4(rnying rgyud): med rgyu nas rnam par dag/ kun kyang gtsang zhing dri med pas// thams cad ma lus sangs rgyas lnga// lus pa med pas ye shes dang // ma bcos ye nas de nyid do// de phyir sman chen bcud kyi mchog/ bdud rtsi zhes ni de la bya'o// rtogs pa'i klod du su 'dres
321a5(rnying rgyud): me zhes bya ba sangs rgyas yin// bcom ldan 'das ni gud na med// 'byung ba lnga las gyur pa'i rgyu// stsal pas rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas yin// rang gi lus la bsdu ba'i phyir// sku gsum rdo rje dbang thob 'gyur// de phyir bsgrub pa'i rdzas su gsungs//
321a6(rnying rgyud): de skad ces sman spyod pa'i lung du bka' stsal to// bdud rtsi chen po mchog gi lung 'bum sder bzhugs pa'i nang nas/ lung A nu yo ga'i spyod pa bA na med pa bstan pa ste/ bam po chen po bzhi pa//
321a7(rnying rgyud): #// rgya gar skad du/ ku la pany+tsa bud+d+hA na maH/ bod skad du/ rigs lnga bde bar gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// ma hA yo ge'i don du bsgrub pa'i thabs 'di bstan to// di ni nyams dga' mdangs bzang pa'i// yid 'ong gnas su 'dug nas ni/
321b1(rnying rgyud): byin brlabs mtshams bcad brtan byas nas// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi pa// dri sA lU yis maN+Dal bya'o// thig bzhi btab pas dkyil 'khor brgyad// maN+Dal brgyad pa'i gzhung bzhin bri// de yi rtse mo brgyad la yang // yid bzhin nor bu 'thar
321b2(rnying rgyud): babri// de yi dbus su bsam pa yang // srid gsum b+han+d+ha bzang kong yug/ ye nas ma bitsos rang 'byung stong // dpal dang ldan pa'i snod bzhag la// de yi nang du thugs pa'i spyan// ye nas rang 'byung bdu kyi lnga// shwa chen bshang gci khu ba
321b3(rnying rgyud): khrag// dag pa'i lha ste bdud rtsi'i dngos// stong las sbyar bas ye nas dag/ btag dang btsag dang gzhal ba yi// nyi zla gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor du// 'bru lnga ye shes 'phro 'dulas// snying khams khyab par don byas te// bcud kyi dam pa kun bsdus nas/
321b4(rnying rgyud): dus gsum sangs rgyas mchod pa'i phyir// bkra' bzhin bstan pa'i dngos grub blung // mu tig dkar po dri med ltar// sgrub pa pos ni nan tan bya'o// 'ag ya lag pa'i phyag rgya yis// gzhung bzhin brtan nas 'phro 'du bya// de dbus klu bdag sa bon
321b5(rnying rgyud): gyis// dngos grub dam pa blang bar bya// dgu pa'i sngags kyis btab nas ni// le lo med pa'i brtson 'grus kyis// bar tshad med pa'i 'phro 'du bya'o// oM gyis ye shes 'od phyung zhing // AHyis mes bsregs thal par 'gyur// hUMgs bdud rtsi rnam
321b6(rnying rgyud): par dag/ gasngal la 'byung 'jug lhan na byos// rtags dang mtshan ma bdun gyis 'byung // 'od dang du ba dri dang sgra// lha mo'i gzugs kyang ston par 'gyur// mang du 'phel na bsgrub rdzas yin// de la ya mtshan bskyed mi bya// mtshan ma'i rtags dag ma byung
321b7(rnying rgyud): na// bskang gso'i cho ga rgya bskyed cig/ spogs thags bsgyur la rtsal shugs dbyung // dam tshig chen po bskang ba'i phyir// bsgrub rdzas rnams kyang bstar nas gzhag/ de nas mchod cing dngos grub blang // slob ma la yang dbang bskur ro// bla ma lung ldan
322a1(rnying rgyud): des kyang ni// tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag brjod do// gdod nas ma skyes rnam dag chos kyi dbyings// dag dang ma dag mi rtog rtog las 'das// sgyu ma 'das dang da ltar phyis 'byung ba// dus gsum gcig la sgra bstan phyi ba shol med// dngos khyab
322a2(rnying rgyud): tshogs rlabs chen 'bar ba can// su 'dod sbyin gyis da lta 'di la long // skal par slebs dang gti mug mun nag la// sprin mthongs nyi shar khud par dro ba bzhin// bdud rtsi rgyal po dbang chen 'di byin pas// rig 'dzin rgyal po gtso ba'i go 'phang thog// tshe
322a3(rnying rgyud): slongs dang yid du 'ong // bgegs rnams zhi ba la sogs te// nad dang bral nas ci 'dod pa'i// yon tan rtsa brgyad 'di yis thob// zhes bka' stsal nas/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rigs lnga bde bar gshegs pas bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'ang
322a4(rnying rgyud): kyis lung 'di las// dbang bskur gnang ba gang yin pa// 'khor rnams kun gyis thob par shog/ zhes bka' stsal to// yang 'khor nye ba'i sras mchog dam pa 'jam dpal la sogs pas dbang mnos nas/ yang rigs lnga dang rigs rgya mtsho'i gtso
322a5(rnying rgyud): la lung gi don zhus pa/ rtog pa dang mi rtog pa'i don ji ltar blta/ don gyi 'bras bu gang lags zhes gsol pa las// kun du bzang po dang rigs lnga bde bar gshegs pas bka' stsal pa/ tshangs dang drang srong gtsang ma za// de dag grol bar ngas ma
322a6(rnying rgyud): bshad// kwadang bram ze gtsang ma za// de dag grol bar nges ma bshad// byol song rje mchog za ba yang // ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du za// de dag grol ba re ngas ma bshad// yang dag don gyi lung 'di nyon// rnal 'byor thabs dang ldan pas ni// chos su gci
322a7(rnying rgyud): las tha dad pa'i// rigs lnga'i kha dog 'di bshad do// 'di ltar rtogs na grol zhes bshad// rang bzhin ye nas dag pa'i rdzas// mnyam pa'i dbyings su rab rtogs na// gnyis med don gyis zin pa yin// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// dngas dang
322b1(rnying rgyud): med rtog pa'i mtshan// gtsang dang mi gtsang rtog pa'i mtshan// mkhas pas dbus la gnas mi 'gyur// ye shes sku lnga bstan pa'i phyir// byang chub sems ni dkar bas na// dri med dkar bas ye shes skya'o// rak+ta chags med dmar ba sa na// chags med/
322b2(rnying rgyud): rnam dag chos kyi sku'o// mAM sa yid bzhin rin chen sngo// sna tshogs 'byung gnas mnyam nyid sgra'o// rin chen gser mdog skad mdzad de// mngon 'byung sprul pa chos kyi sku'o// dri chu dag byed ljang gu'i mdog/ bun du don grub las rab su'o// sku lnga su
322b3(rnying rgyud): grub bdud ci 'dra// so so'i lus la gnas pa yin// dri min dri chu dang // maM sa sems chu 'di rnams kun// sems can rtog pa bzlog pa'i phyir// gtso ru dang du blang bar bya'o// gtsang blo med par kun gyis spyod// 'di dag grol ba ra ngas
322b4(rnying rgyud): bshad do// the tshom med pas dngos grub thob// spyod pa'i skyes bu rnal 'byor pas// tshe 'di nyid la grub par 'gyur// ces bcom ldan 'das rigs lnga bde bar gshegs pas bka' stsal to// 'di yan chad ma hA yo ga'i don gyi lung dang grub thabs
322b5(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi chen po 'bum sde las btus pa'i/ bam po chen po lnga pa/ @##// rgya gar skad du/ a mr-i ta kuN+Da li na maHbod skad du/ bdud rtsi 'khyil pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bdud ci rgyal la phyag 'tshal nas// bdud rtsi
322b6(rnying rgyud): sbyor ba'i thabs bstan ti/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis bdud rtsi bsgrub pa'i dgongs pa la zhugs te/ de nas bdud rtsi rgyal po yis/ bdud rtsi sbyor ba'i thabs 'di bstan te bka' stsal to// dang por phun sum tshogs pa'i yul/ dga' zhing
322b7(rnying rgyud): bag chad med pa'i gnas// btsal nas nyid kyi dbang du bya'o// de nas rang lus bsrung ba'i phyir// lag cha phun sum tshogs pa yis// bar chad byed pa'i dgra bgegs bzlog/ de nas bsgrub pa'i yo byad rnams// 'tsho ba zas kyi yo byad dang //
323a1(rnying rgyud): bsgrub pa das sa da dadu// zlob spyan ga kyang dang // byung ngan sam chogasan nus// nga bzhin bar 'dug nas no// sagan rab tu sbya byas te/ sa rnangs yang gyi brtad la bcas// rnga'angs nas kyis pang /
323a2(rnying rgyud): la 'das gang ba sa bre// bsgrub pa chen po zlaba'i b+hai / d+hi d+hi ts+tshi hU~Mm n+d+he // du thong cod pa spya nga // rnaMm tshan mo ma re re yang // mye ma sdong du lnga bcu bya'o// mA ma lnga brgya gtams nas ni// de nas brlab pa #
323a3(rnying rgyud): bya zhing // rdzogs pa'i las ni nam bzhi b+ha// zhi ba'i tshen byang du blta'o// gna'i tshon nub tu blta'o// stan chen po b+h+yo dra blta'o// rgyas pa'i tshen shar du bsto// yang ni phrin las rnam pa bzhi// sa so'i phyogs phyogs dag nas blta'o// de ltar
323a4(rnying rgyud): 'dug stangs bstan nas ni// shar gyi dkyil 'khor steng du ni// bsgrub rdzas thams cad gzhag par bya'o// lho yi dkyil 'khor steng du ni// me mar lnga brgya smos pa bzhag/ nub kyi dkyil 'khor steng du ni// srub pa yab yum gnas par
323a5(rnying rgyud): bya// byang gi dkyil 'khor skyed du ni// rgyu mchog chen po gzhag par bya// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor steng du ni// bram ze bkra shes gtsang mya'i rigs// bkra shis rjong pa gzhag par bya'o// yang na b+han+ta dngul ldan rdzogs// zlum zhing 'khyil pa pad+ma
323a6(rnying rgyud): 'dra// dbus na thu ga gcig yod pa// de yi nang dud+d+he zhes bri'o// de'i nang du grags pa ni// snying po chem byed bcud kyi mjog/ gtso bo lnga dang 'bras bu wa// dri zhim bdud ldan thams cad kun// 'di dge rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir// mang po
323a7(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa man byin tshe// yang na rtsa ba brgyad dang sbyar// gtsang dang yid long hA// gau rba wang tse'u ting ras yan// ga zur mu tig lan tshwa rnams// 'di rnams rtsa ba brgyad dang sbyar// yung na gtso bo lngar sbyar ba// e 'bras chun 'bum pa
323b1(rnying rgyud): si// gor N+ya A rAr dang lha// 'ad na nang gi 'bras bu lnga'o// sha lnga dag dang sbyar ba yang // dbang po lnga yi gzugs dang sbyar// de yi thang du dgos pa yang // mig dang na bas+t+ra dang lte// gcam tsan nyid dang lnga'o// shang rtag chun 'brus ka kro pra// u 'bras pa/
323b2(rnying rgyud): bum sha lnga'o// dri ni chen po sna lnga dang // cha yi grangs dang mnyam ste sbyar// nA ga ge sar shing tsha dang // sug smel gan+d+ho pa tra dang // kun du rA dang dri sna lnga'o// yang na dri yi rgyal po lnga// r+ya s+phos dzA ti pha la dang // ga bur tsan+dan li shi lnga'o// de bzhin
323b3(rnying rgyud): spos lnga'i dam pa yang // a kA ru dang du ru ska// bog dang sbrang rtsi lce pog dang // gser dngul zangs lcags g.yu dang lnga// bdar ram zhib tu btags te blugs// 'di dag rab tu mnyam zhing bsog/ 'di dag sbyar zhing bteg pa'i sdigs// oM
323b4(rnying rgyud): mr-i ta mu sa la/ gra he ha na hA na hU~M phaT/ 'di rnams sbyar ba'i bdud rtsi mchog/ dngos grub 'bras bu des thob bo// 'bras bu rnam lnga bsgral ba'i phyir// byang gi phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// me lce gla gri snying la sogs// gsang ba'i brda tshig dag gis ni// de dag rang
323b5(rnying rgyud): sba zhing bsgrub// phyogs bzhi dbus dang lnga ru gzhag/ rgya mchog chen po khrus byas nas// mngon spyod mngon spyod ya mtshan gyi// 'jig byed 'jigs byed chen po yi// e yi dkyil 'khor sum brtsegs kyi// steng du bzhag nas dbang bskur ro// de nas
323b6(rnying rgyud): dpal chen he ru ka/ dur khrod bdag po chen po ni// che mchog shrIn tu mi bzad pa// dbu mang phyog cha rtsub po bsnams// sdug nag spu ni 'bar ba can// zhal ni nyi shu rtsa gcig ste// phyag kyang bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis so// oM badz+ra ma hA shrI ha~M ru kra/
323b7(rnying rgyud): ye hUM/ gsang ba'i sum yang yab dang mthun// ma hA kro d+b+ha shwa ri/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta mu d+hA a b+hi n+d+ra trA~M/ zhes yum dbang bsgyur nas/ gzhan yang rigs dang mthun pa ru// phyogs bzhi dag tu dgod par bya'o// nga yang tshum phrinan rkyen gyi
324a1(rnying rgyud): bAdz+rag// a h+ye ti ma hA dra tra hU~M paT/ sarba da a a zhes brjod pas/ tset+ta drang ngo // yang nas yang d+has+phar byas te// drug gsum rtsa ba dang gcad do// rgyu 'bras mthun zhing sbyar ba yang // yangs shing rkad la gsus pa dang // chos glu
324a2(rnying rgyud): zhi ba'i ting 'dzin yod// yon tan brgyad dang ldan pa la// nges pa'i don dbang thos par bya'o// 'byung ba bzhi las skyed pa'i yum// rgyal bzhi dag dang ldan pa 'am// yang na mdzan bzang sum cu ni// lus la rdzogs par yod pa la// bla gas
324a3(rnying rgyud): dkarA da mar rlung dkar lI// de bzhin sring mo rnal 'byor ma// btsal nas bsgrub pa chen po bya'o// 'o ma spos chus mgo lus bkru// dkyil 'khor nang du gzhag par bya// 'dzag pa'i dus su sbyar ba yi// khrag chen po ni sems dang bcas// ras
324a4(rnying rgyud): yana'i gtso bor bya'o// bdud ci dam pa'i snod bstan pa// kun byed thams cad za ba yi// slob ma dpa' brtul gtsang sbra can// skyon drug rnam par spangs pa yi// mi phyed pa ni dgu dang ldan// dam tshig thams cad ma nyams shing // srog lus pra
324a5(rnying rgyud): dang chung ma dang // rin chen sna tshogs 'phrul byed pa// sring mo shin tu brgyan pa yang // slob dpon bla ma de la dbul// de ltar 'bul ba'i slob ma'i mchog/ yud yang palha yan chad kyis// rab tu 'bru ni gdams pas bya'o// thugs kyi dngos grub dam pa
324a6(rnying rgyud): 'di// rang byung nga yis bstan pa'i phyir// re ba med pas blang bar bya// ma dag pa ni mtshams gcad do// las kyi gtsor ni bskang ba dang // srung dang mtshams dang gsal bar bya'o// ho zla pad+ma yang dag gnas// bdag nyid dpa' bo 'bru lnga yis//
324a7(rnying rgyud): gnas lnga dag tu bsam par bya'o// dngos grub rab 'bring tha ma gsum// ma thob bar du me gtang zhing // gtang na bar chad chen po 'gyur// gsang sngags bdud rtsi yon tan 'di// sad pa'i phyir yang bsgrub dgos na// mkhas pas bden
324b1(rnying rgyud): pa don shes nas// don la the tsom ci ste za// zhes the tshom bcad la/ dngos grub brang ba'i sngags 'di'o// a hoHsa kha d+harA g+hA ya nAM/ A mra tasad+d+hi hrIHzhes dngos grub thang ngo // gnas lnga dag tu bsam pa yang // sku gtsug dbus pra zla ba 'o//
324b2(rnying rgyud): nI oM dkar 'od ldan pa// 'od zer lnga ni 'phros pa las// sgrar 'dus snang mdzad gtso bo ste// rtag pa'i phyag rgya bcings pa'o// lce la hri dmar 'od 'phros pa// slar 'dus mtha' yas chos kyi gsung // mnyam pa'i phyag rgyar gnas pa'o// ting ga
324b3(rnying rgyud): yi ge hUM mji ga/ 'od zer lnga ni 'phro ba'o// slar 'dus mi 'khrugs sems dpa' ste// phyag gnyis rdo rje dril bu bsnams// yang nu bdud 'dul sa gnon no// lte bar yaM ge sA ser po/ 'od zer lnga ni 'phro ba las// slar 'dus rin chen dam pa'i ga/
324b4(rnying rgyud): yidade bzhin sbyin pa'o// gsang bar yi ge ha ljang gu// 'od zer snga lnga 'phro ba las// slar 'dus don yod grub pa ste// zhi ba'i phyag rgyar mnyam rdzogs pa'o// rigs lnga gtogs pa 'di kun yang // rang 'byung gi ni dkyil 'khor yin//
324b5(rnying rgyud): ltar 'od zer lnga lnga yis// nyi shu rtsa lnga'i 'phro 'dra las// khams gsum 'gro ba'i don byas nas// sgrar 'dus sman lnga nyid la bsdu// spyan nyid phyag rgyar gsal 'bar nas// 'od zer snga lnga slar 'dus nas// phyag mtshan so sor gsal
324b6(rnying rgyud): 'gyur te// gser gyi 'khor lo zur brgyud las// dri chen bdud rtsi zhu ba'o// hU~M las rdo rje tsa lnga pa// 'bar nas byang chub sems su zhu// swA las rin chen 'od 'bar te// ma hA mis bdud tsi ri thA'o// Sh+T+r-iHlas 'od zer sna tshogs pa'o// pa
324b7(rnying rgyud): rAk+Sha thig ler zhu'o// ha ljang 'od 'phro sna tshogs pas// dag pa'i dri chu bdung rtsi tshu'o// de ltar 'phro 'du bya ba yang // goms pas yang nas yang du bya'o// de nas bdud rtsi rnam lnga la// bsam pa'i yi gi dam pa lnga// oM hU~M swA hU~M A/ rtsa ba/
325a1(rnying rgyud): // yo ge lnga po yang // 'od zer 'gro ba sna ma bzhin// de nas 'jab bsgom bzlas pa'i sngags// dgu pa 'di ni 'dzad du drung // oM badz+ra notasu ma yA hA Ta/ de la bdud rje'i phyag cha ni// lag pa g.yon pa'i dbang ba bcad// mtho bong srin lag ma
325a2(rnying rgyud): dag/ rdorje mtshon gang bcas pa dang // mdzung mo gung mom shes rlung brgyad// sbya te lag pa'i mthil m+b+hi hU~M// bdud kyi snod kyi steng du brjin// de nas bdudu kyi byin gyis brlab// ting 'dzin me dang 'dra ba las// dkyus brjod drung dang 'dra ba yis// glal dang lung dus
325a3(rnying rgyud): par mi gcad// de nus bdud rtsi byin gyis brlab// badz+ra a mr-i ta oM AHhU~M hri thA// 'di ni rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor lde'o// dzaHhU~M bi hoH/ ma hA a mr-i ta A be sha hoH/ zhes bcom ldan 'das bdud rtsi rgyal pos bka' stsal to// bdud rtsi dam pa mchog gI lung

325a6(rnying rgyud): ma yi sbyar lugs dang // rtsi sman 'khrungs pa'i yul khams dang // shing dang nags kyi lha mo'i gnas// ri bor sman ljongs tsan+dan gnas// bzhugs pa'i gnas su bsrub par bya'o// dug rnams bdud rtsir sbyar ba'i thabs// rtse ba dang ni yan lag

327a1(rnying rgyud): rba ta sra nam hA/ oM zhes dado// de nas grub pa pa can thos pa la mthar \u0f7f/ dngus da sram thos ngas te ska pa do// gas ba can rnams // sangs rgyas su banan ran/ na
327a2(rnying rgyud): don las 'byung // byang chub smod pa'i gnas 'di yin// smad par bya ba'i rdzas lnga po// gcig la yon tan lnga lnga 'am// gcig la'ang yon tan gsum du dbye// dam tshig rtsa be badz+ra wA yin// yan lag nyi shu rtsa brgyad // snong bcung
