327a7(rnying rgyud): 'arjod de/ bdud rtsi rnam lnga byin gyis brlab cing bskul lo// de nas yang rtse ba brgyad dang yan lag stong du 'dus shing sbyar ba dang bsgral ba'i tshig 'od brjod do// de nas yang snod spyong par chun chang dang / sbrang chang dang / gya chang dang / lur mcha
327b1(rnying rgyud): dang rlung / ngadu chags gang sho nga smrad pa // sa pa ya sa su/ sgyu smra gnas// mangs sa 'thad pa// ma nga 'byud// dgra kyis grangs man na
327b2(rnying rgyud): prad s+thA hA/ oM ra ba kAhA/ sman chad du thugs la/ dkrugs pa'i sngags/ mra sa la mAs pa/ ri ma tshig go 'phang byed par 'gyur// mi gtsang bal 'ang gtsang ba med// man ngag can gyi grub pa pos// mkhas pas gnyis med sbyar bas na// @
327b3(rnying rgyud): nyid kyi don thob 'gyur// krot+taM shwa re sho d+ha ya saM sho d+ha ya/ yang 'o me sna tshogs spring zhing 'di skad brjod do// ta dang me la sogs pa yi// ji ltar 'o mar gyur pa la// mkhas ldan chen pos rab sbya na// yon tan zho dang mar ltar snang // de bzhin rdzas
327b4(rnying rgyud): rnams bsgyur bas na// mnyam nyid yon tan mA ra ltar 'grub// zhes brjod de/ byang chub sems kyi snod du snying ngo // de nas rin po che sna tshogs bdar zhing 'di skad brjod do// dper na gser dang rin chen ltar// gcig tu bsres dang so sor gan
327b5(rnying rgyud): song gnas kyang rang re shi// kha dog mtshan nyid so sor gsal// rin chen yon tan de 'dra yang // rje sa na sa yon tan rmang du 'gyur// dbas gnyis sngas mdzes par snying // de bzhin rdzas kyi yon tan yang // rang gi yon tan rin chen ldang //
327b6(rnying rgyud): byed mnyam par sbyar bas na// bla med yon tan rmad du 'gyur// thams cad gcig tu bsdu ba'o// de nas bdud rtsi nga sa ya na sna tshogs 'ardzus te/ stod stong par chu sna tshogs sbreng zhing 'di brjod do// chu rnams sna tshogs tha dad pa// rgya mtshor phyin na lan
327b7(rnying rgyud): de dag thams cad bsdus pa'i dpal// rgya mtsho tsam du rlabs che la// chos kyi dgyes su ro gcig go// 'byung ba lnga yi thugs rdo las// sprin dang bdud rtsi rnam lnga po// 'gro ba yongs kyi gsos mdzad pa// thugs rjes byin gyis brlabs pa
328a1(rnying rgyud): dngas po med pas dngas supa dang // byang chub sems kyi sprin yin pas/ ji skar dmigs pa bden du 'grub par 'gyur de skad pas brjod de/ smya dugan gyus nas/ ngas ngas rgyas sa gdutun pa / du gyung bad dad nga/
328a2(rnying rgyud): rtsa brgyad stong las sbyar ba'i sman// ra sa ya na la sogs rdzas// rtsa bu 'brum phrag yangs pa'i bcud// gnyis med bde chen las 'byung ba'i// byang chub sems ni rdo rje ste// sha rkyen mchod pa rin po che// zas ma tshaM yi ji rnon po// me tog
328a3(rnying rgyud): yang dag ldan// rdo rje chu lce bdud rtsi mchod// gabur shel gyi spos phor bri// rin chen me ltar 'brar ba'i tshogs// yonA tan 'bum phrag yangs pa'i bcud// rigs lnga dam tshig lnga yi dngos// ye shes lnga rdzogs grub pa'i rdzas// rgyud lnga
328a4(rnying rgyud): sems can thun sgrol ba'i// dug lnga sel ba'i thabs mchog ste// thams cad rnal 'byor bdud rtsi che// ma lus 'dus pa'i thig le ste// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor phyir// gcig tu dbang po ro rnams dang // gnyis su med par mnyam sbyar
328a5(rnying rgyud): nas// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad dang // rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams la mchod// zhes brjod do// de nas shes rab yum rnams kyis/ sman lag tu bzhag la/ yang bkra shis pa/ don la dam pa 'di brjod do// ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos//
328a6(rnying rgyud): nAm mkha' dang ni mnyam pa'i gnas// rnam par mi rtog snang ba las// kun rdzob tsam du bstan pa mtshar// zhes brjod do// sman snod bcud chus par lag tu blangs la yum gyi gtso bo la bdud rtsi phul te/ gtso bos blangs te phyag rgya chen por bsgyur
328a7(rnying rgyud): zhing bsgom mo// de nas bsgrub pa po gca bos dpa' chas su zhugs te/ ba yang nyo ba ti dang / ba yang shang gi ra dang / na ra si ra dang / thil chen gyi thig les pan+d+han ta/ kro \u0f7f a dza na dang / dbug cing g.yab pa'i dam rdzas/ mchog gi ha sta dang / ba
328b1(rnying rgyud): ca sa sgyu su nga sa smra sa smra sa du gas su sa pa sa na
328b2(rnying rgyud): ga ga// shA ma ma'i gsang ga ni rtags chos marung sa bdin byar nas thogs te/ kyil 'khor yang 'i ma rgya bya// dngas su shes slong bang ba gcig gli das pa'i steng du sbyin spangab ba/ rngubapa pa yang yum sang par brlob parnan
328b3(rnying rgyud): sunag gi na pabyam dan da ga do/ den pa kyid da // gang ba'i'i bang tshigs te cig dang/ na la dbacug dag pa na
328b4(rnying rgyud): nga / ba /
328b5(rnying rgyud): ga la pa nga// de su sa sa nas kyang nyiman mdade// yang da kyi ga // ga pa ma'i smig byung de ldan bye kyi yin pa da do// mam ta tham pa ba/ a bajas nam pa yis
328b6(rnying rgyud): sa rba ta na sa sa hru/ / 'arjes hU~M smra / myed smrag dang / na ba nang du thugs sa// nas sems dpa'i rgyan 'dud par
328b7(rnying rgyud): sus rapa kyi nag dang / srabab sog ga dang / dun gdang shu dreg slo gro mi yi bre 'a ma 'a dang / dus mngan su thagasas bcwa gang
329a1(rnying rgyud): // nas/ dkrugs la nyan d+ha ra sum te/ b+han d+ha gnyis kha sbyar la/ dar gyis bcings la/ mtshams sku rgyas btab la/ gzod dkyil 'khor zla gam gyi dbus smra gzhag go// sngags dgu pa 'jab du dang ngo // 'di mug mjug gatshogs
329a2(rnying rgyud): pa bar mi bcad/ mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyi 'phro 'du yang bya/ sman bsgrub pa'i don dang / sbyar thabs bstan pa'i lung dang / las kyi rim pa'i skul tshig dang / yo byad du byas pa'i rnams bdud rtsi chen po mchog gi lung las bdud rtsi bum pa'i lung gi dam po
329a3(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal nyid sku rdo rje lta bu byang chub kyi dgongs pa nyid la bzhugs pa la/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems rdo rje kun du bzang po ni/ dus gsum 'du 'bral med pa'i/ yum gyi tshal chen po na dgongs pa chos kyi dbyings
329a4(rnying rgyud): mgras pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / drang srong chen po dang / lha dang klu dang / li g+ha bI la sogs pa'i mi rnams kunang dpal kun du bang gos pan tu sus pa/ nan tan gyis ni brtson 'grus bskyed// the tshom mdan nges par 'grub// bad rje chen po rnam lnga 'di/
329a5(rnying rgyud): spyad cing bcangs pa'i yon tan dang // rang bzhin dang ni ngo bo dang // mthu dang byin gyis brlangs kyis 'grub// mi brjed rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin// nges pa'i bsgrub pa'i yon tan ni// nges pa'i man ngag gsum du bstan zhes bka' stsal nas/ sdud pa po chos kyi don/ 'jam dpa
329b1(rnying rgyud): byol ba ta dang // da du 'babs pa 'am dpal byas/ da byas tha kyil 'khor gyi lta la zar rdzobs rgya coM dang cas parnams pa 'anan du // sa rmAs sarnas kun du'ang // gas can cag la byed la rabs// sa rag samasas na rdzas/ nga /
329b2(rnying rgyud): ma sa ste/ sa sathas pa shA / byung sa dag/ myed pa // /
329b3(rnying rgyud): mtha' yas// don yod bdu rtsi 'brel pa y-i// dkris shing byas pas phyag brgyab po// byings lhag sum gyi tshogs rnams la// de 'du ba'i yid kyis 'a phyag 'tshal// lagan rdo rje rgyal po dang // srin bzung blorlos chen pa dang // don rabs spyad la sogs ma
329b4(rnying rgyud): gus byas phyag 'tshal po// rnam mkha'i 'jig rten dbang po dang // 'gro ba 'dzin mchog dam pa laM// gnyis med gus pas phyag 'tshal lo// dag la rang bzhin dri med b+ha// tshul bzhin byung ba dbyangs dang gar// spyod mchog dga' sdug phyag 'tshal lo// bdug pa ma
329b5(rnying rgyud): ma ma to// gzugs mchog mnyes mdzad lta mo la// mos pas 'dud cid phrag 'tshal lo// rig byed rdzogs kyi bdag po mchog// rdo srin po 'dral mdzad pa// 9 ny+tsa'i ya'i yum 'khor ba bstsol// gus pas ba skyed daphyag 'tshal lo// de nas 'khor nul ba rgyam
329b6(rnying rgyud): bcas pa rnams kyis legapas legs pa// yul la b+h+yoHzhes brjod nas gan // de nas da'ang byin te/ 'phags pa byung chubs pas dbang sams dbang chen po khyod kyis/ tham pa cad bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin la/ mkhyen rab dang pos sun gyi mdzad pa chen po mdza
329b7(rnying rgyud): ma nyid kyis nyid la mched de/ 'di ma na chad ye shes kyi sgra rnams kyis ting nge 'dzin byang chub kyi sems bdud rtsi chen por thos nas/ mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings la mi snang bar byas nas/ me hA su kha la sbas te 'khrugs pa las// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpa' dra/
330a1(rnying rgyud): // du bzang po dang / rigs lnga bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis 'phags pa 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i mkhyen rab kyi dang po khyod la/ dang kyi chos 'di bsdus te bshad do// 'jam dpal rdo rje chos 'di lta ste/ e ma hoHgsang ba
330a2(rnying rgyud): byung ba'i// ma rig mun sel sgron ma'i mchog/ dpa' bo khyod la skyabs su mchi'o// nan tan gyis ni brtson 'gyis byos// zhes pa dang / 'jam dpal brgyad si 'di'i chos kyi don ni/ dper na mi dang 'dra ste/ chung skye rdul tsam nas che ste srid pa'i ro yang sreg go// de ba
330a3(rnying rgyud): dubadud rtsi 'di ni dper na nyi ma dang 'dra ste/ nyi ma'i 'od zer chen po ni 'dzam bu gling du theg ma nyid du ri'i rgyal po chen po brgyad la snang bar byed do// de'i 'og tu kho ra khor yug tu snang bar byed do// de'i 'og tu ri bo che rnams la snang bar byed do// de'i 'og tu ri nag po
330a4(rnying rgyud): rnams la snang bar byed do// de'i 'og tu gangs ri mthon po rnams la snang bar byed do// de'i 'og tu 'dzam bu gling 'diras phyogs dma' ba rnams la snang bar byed do// nyi ma'i 'od zer chen po de la/ glang dor med de me tog mi sems so// rnam par yang mi rtog ma
330a5(rnying rgyud): sems so// rdo rje chos dang 'jam dpal nyi ma'i 'od rnams hU~M/ dbri bsgrol ma do// de bzhin du sems can gyi rnam par shes pa la yang / de dang 'dra ste de bri bskol med do// phye ba dang bskyed pa dang / bsgyangs pa yang med do// de bzhin du chos bdud rtsi 'di yang bas
330a6(rnying rgyud): gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings su bstan pa yin pa'i phyir/ bdud rtsi chen po 'di dbu las bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan zhes smos pa yin no// de bzhin du chos bdud rtsi chen po'i lung 'di yang ma skyes mi 'gag mi rtog pas/ mtshan dang mtshan ma med pa dang / mi gnas pa
330a7(rnying rgyud): la rnam par khyab ste gnas so// de bzhin du chos bdud rtsi chen po 'di yang nyi ma'i 'od zer dang 'dra bar kun la khyab par gnas te/ skal ldan rigs lngas 'byung ba lnga la khyab cing / 'byung ba lnga nyid rigs kyi yum lnga'i tshal chen po ste/ yum lnga dang yab lnga
330b1(rnying rgyud): yang gdod nas dag ste/ nyi ma'i 'od bzhin du shar ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor rgyal ba rgya mtshornams la bshad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor rgyal ba sku mtsho rnams la thub bo// de nas srid pa'i 'jig rten ma mdzad kyi bdag ngo tshangs
330b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i lha rnams dang klu rnams la khyab po// de nas mi'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang rim pas nam mkha'i nyi ma bzhin khyab cing shar ba ste/ thugs rje'i bdud rtsi 'di yang srid pa gsum du nyi ma bzhin du shar bar bya ste/ 'jam dpang stong gsum
330b3(rnying rgyud): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing phra rab skyed la bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i lus phul bas ni/ bdud rtsi chen po 'di lus la bcangs pa bsod nams che'o// 'jam dpal dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su spang ba bas
330b4(rnying rgyud): ni/ bdud rtsi 'di lus kyi mgul du btags pa 'bum gyi char yang mi phod do// 'jam dpal bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed gyi sangs rgyas rnams la spyi bos bkur zhing phyag bya ba'i don ni/ bdud rtsi chen po 'di spyi bo la bkur 'a'i yon tan ni/ sangs
330b5(rnying rgyud): rgyas thams cad bkur ba yin no// 'jam dpal bskul pa stong gi bar du sems can gyi don bya ba bas ni/ bdud rtsi chen po 'dis lan cig gis 'gro ba'i don byas pas/ dmyal khams brgyad kyi 'jig rten yang thar pa'i lam du 'dren pa yin no
330b6(rnying rgyud): zhes gsungs pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ bdud rtsi chen po'i rang bzhin ni// kha dog dbyibs dang mtshan ma med// 'gog pa med cing dbye ba'ang med// rtsa ba med cing rten pa'ang med// bdud rtsi che la brjod pa
330b7(rnying rgyud): med// nyon mongs dug dang bdud bzhi bcom// dri med dag pa'i byang chub sems// nges don de la 'dud par byos// de nas bcom ldan 'das dang dam pa'i chos bdud rtse'i lung 'di la 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis spar la lan gsum du bskyod pa/ nam ma
331a1(rnying rgyud): mtshan nyid sangs rgyas te// mtshan nyid med pas nam mkha' 'dra'o// bya ba med pas grol ba ste// bdud rtsi mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// chu zla bzhin du de bral bas// thams cad tog pa yongs su spangs// bdag tu 'dzin med rnam par dang // bdud rtsi rtsal la phyag 'a
331a2(rnying rgyud): dus gsum chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam// bdud dang ngan song gsum las thar// len pa med cing gtong ba'ang med// dri med dag pa'i byang chub sems// bdud ce mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// dus gsum sangs rgyas bskyed pa'i rgya// khams gsum sems can 'dren pa'i dpal//
331a3(rnying rgyud): gi hrIb sbyor pa// bdud rtsi rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// de skad ces gsol nas/ phyi nang gi snod bcud ril sman ra sa ya na dang / bdud rtsir gnas so zhes lung dang man ngag dag tu bsdus te bka' stsal pa'o// bdud rtsi chen po mchog gi lung / lung gi rgyal po chen po tog pa'i mchog las 'khor lo
331a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i nang nas lung gi bam po chen po brgyad pa'i 'grel pa chen po'i don/ bam po chen po brgyad pa rdzogs s+ho// spyir bdud rtsi 'bum sde las myur shas tsam thiga'i ma la mai tris bshad cing / lo b+h+yo badz+nyA na ku ma ras bsgyur ba'o// rdo rje yang dbang gter kye la grwa rdzogs s+ho// // cha gar skad du/ sarba
331a5(rnying rgyud): bsam mr-i ta swa b+hA ba/ bod skad du/ thams cad bdud rtsi lha'i rang bzhin/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor na/ shin tu rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang thabs kyi
331a6(rnying rgyud): bzhugs te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / theg pa chen po'i mdo sde'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' dang / dgra bcom pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun chen po dag ming yang mi grag pa'i nang du/ gsang sngags kyi snying po bdud rtsi'i mchog tu bya ba'i blta ba dang / spyod pa dang bsrub pa 'di gsungs so//
331a7(rnying rgyud): bsam gyis mi lub bstan pa dang // brgyang bri bzhi stong rnam grangs kyang // theg pa'i sgo ni gsum du 'dus// gsang gnyis theg par 'dus dang bzhi// sdom por dgongs dang don dam yang // 'bri ba'i don de sangs rgyas yin// rnabargyad ston pas thugs brtol te// ngas pa'i lang yang sangs rgyas la/
331b1(rnying rgyud): nyam dang dbyings su'agro// byang rlabs mA 'di kun bzang // rdzogs pa 'am shes par can nyid// ga spyod pa'i yul ma yin// ma lus mtha' dag nyid bye na// sa nas bya ma bya sa dgos// na dang bras bu 'byul ba'i sa// thang chab 'dod ba srung bde gnas// bas
331b2(rnying rgyud): gnas// nga dang lung dang mad dag kyang // dmangs dang 'u dang rgyal po'i rgyal// bud par sal 'dung thug ring yang // gcig lagacig brten gcig gi dang // gcig ste rnam pa yangs kyis med// debs smrig lung thug+sa kyi bdag/ sde dang ldan dang 'dzer lo yang // gang can nang ma'i dang
331b3(rnying rgyud): rje bzhind du 'khor ba yang // ye shes sangs rgyas de las med// blta ba 'di la gnas pa ni// rnal 'byor 'di ni skal ba bzang // ci spyad ce bsgom gyi bsgrubs kyang // bdud ci nyid de sman gyi mchog/ bde gshegs kun gyi thugs du ma nyid// rgyal ba rgyam tsho rnams kyi gsos// sangs mas
331b4(rnying rgyud): chen nyid las byung // mtha' yas sems can don gyi phyir// rang la mchod cing rang gis bza'// sgrub pa pos ni nan tan bya// zhes bkang lal to// blta ba'i gnas skabs rdzogs so// // bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// las 'di lung ga bslab pa na/ ma
331b5(rnying rgyud): dang dang du blang // spyad pa'i dam tshig bco lnga bsrung // de yang ma hA sa ma ya// bzhi po rdzogs na kun tu bzang // zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod dang // mnan bzlog drug ni gcig tu'o// dang la ga Na'i lung bshad ste// b+ha ga bA na ni nyid kyi bka'o// lha yi bdud dang glang po'i bdud /
331b6(rnying rgyud): mongs bdud dang 'tsho bdag bcom// phyag rgya chen po bzhi dang ldan// byang chub 'khor ba mya ngan 'das// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to// sangs rgyas sems can thams cad dang // mtshan mar btags pa thams cad kun// bde chen nyid las gzhan ma yin// 'di chen
331b7(rnying rgyud): delas gzhan pa'i chos// sangs kyis nyid kyis mi brnyes so// phyi nang ma lus snod bcud kyang // yab yum bde ba'i ngang du gsal// 'di ni snying po byang chub lung // de nas tan bshad par bya// khams gsum thams cad bsgral ba'i phyir// ma skyes pas na 'ag ga pa
332a1(rnying rgyud): 'jig/ bdag nyid med na mnyam pa'i lung // thugs rje chen pos car mi mdzad// yang dag nyid la yang dag sgrol// yang dag bskal na bde chen thob// stong gsum ma lus bton pa las// 'byam gyis char yang mi thod do// skyes bu chen po rnal 'byor gyis// bskal ba
332a2(rnying rgyud): zhig nyid rje mchog/ mi ldog dbyings su yang dag yid// thig le chen por dbang bskur te// zla gsang dbus na byang chub sems// rdzogs sangs rgyas la som nye med// ji tshan rnam par snang bar mdzad// mi bskyod byang chub sems dpa' nyid// mI ga rin chen 'byung ldan che// k+ta spang
332a3(rnying rgyud): mtha' yas gsungs// dri chu don yod las grub po// thams cad ma lus sangs rgyas lnga// lus pa med pa ye shes lnga// ma bcos ye nas de nyid do// de phyir sman chen bcud kyi mchog/ bdud rtsi zhes ni de la bya// rtog pa'i klungs su su 'dris pa// mi zhes bya ba sangs rgyas yin/
332a4(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das ni gung na med// ces bka' stsal to// spyod pa'i skabs rdzogs so// // rigs lnga bde bar gshegs la phyag 'tshal lo// byin rlabs dbab pa bstan par bya// yid 'ong gnas su 'dug nas ni// bya ba med pa'i lam 'di bsgrag/ maN+Dal
332a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i gzhung bzhin du// dpal dang ldan pa'i snod bzhag ste// stong las 'byor pa ye nas dag/ btag dang btsag dang gcal ba yis// nyi zla gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor du// 'bru lnga ye shes 'gro 'du las// stong khams khyab par don byas te// ba
332a6(rnying rgyud): snying po kun bsdus nas// dus gsum sangs rgyas mchod pa'i phyir// mu tig dkar po dri med ltar// sgrub pa pos ni nan tan du// pra h+ya lag gi phyag rgya ni// gzhung bzhin bstan nas 'pho 'du bya// de dbus klu bdags bon gyis// dngo
332a7(rnying rgyud): grub dam pa bla'i bar // dgu pa'i sngags kyis btab nas ni// le lo med pa'i brtson 'grus kyis// bar chad med pa'i 'phro 'dra bya// gsal la 'byung 'jug ston no'o// rtags dang mtshan ma bdun gyis 'byung // 'od da
332b1(rnying rgyud): dad gra/ mo'i gzugs kyang spyan par zla// mang bulalal na 'grab rtags yin// dal la ma na bsgyung mazla// mtshan ma dag ma byung na// bas gas mig sa char rgyu/ sogs thabs bsgyur nas cal shugs dbyung /
332b2(rnying rgyud): rdzas rnams kyang ni bstar bar bya// de nas mchod cing dngos grub byung // slob ma la yang dbang bskur ro// tshe dang skongs dang yid du 'ong // nod dang bral dang ci 'dod dang // 'grogs rnams zhi ba la sogs pa'i// yon tan ba
332b3(rnying rgyud): rnams 'di yis thob// snying po chem Sh+Ta bcud kyi mchog/ gtsob lnga dang 'bras bu lnga// 'di dag rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir// ji zhi ma dud ldan thamam cad kun// mang po 'dus pa'i mthu byin ze// yangs shing rgyung la glos pa dang /
332b4(rnying rgyud): med pa' brtul gtsang sbra can// zlags dang kar dmar cung dkar gyi// nyung yang pergya yan chad kyi// mi gyid pa yi bdun gnas pa'i// thugs kyi dngos grub dam pa 'di// re ba med pas blang bar bya// 'di tshe 'bru ni brtag par bya//
332b5(rnying rgyud): ma dag pa ni mtshams gcad do// las kyi gtsor ni bskang gso dang // sbyang dang mtshams dang bsal ba yis// nan tan gyis ni brtson 'grus bskyed// the tshom med na nges par 'grub// ces bka' stsal nas/ shin tu rnal 'byor
332b6(rnying rgyud): dbang gyu/ chen po kun yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// e ma ho gsang ba las byung ba'i// byang chub bde chen nyid la rdzog pa// ma rig mun sel ye shes skon// dpa' bo khyod la skyabs su mchi// zhes
332b7(rnying rgyud): bsgrub po'i sabs rdzogs so// shin tu rna 'byor dang 'phyug chen po'i / bdud rtsi mchog gi lung / dum bu gsum pa'i rgyu ngas bye ba rdzogs so// rgyug skad du// a mr-i ta rad+na rmA dz+nyAn \u0f89\u0fa4t+tarmA/ da
333a1(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi na pa tsho ye shes gsang ba 'khor lo'i spyad ces bya / dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
333a2(rnying rgyud): rgyas longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i kun tu bzang po de/ dbyings rnam par dag pa'i b+ha gar rtag tu bzhugs so// de'i gnas kyang b+ha ga yangs pa'i bzung dang ldan pa'i bdud rtsi'i b+hag zhes mkha' dbyings
333a3(rnying rgyud): rin po che'i gzhal yas khang / rgya dang tshad las 'das pa/ gru bzhi dang sgo bzhir 'dug pa/ rta babs dang them skas dang ldan pa/ dra ba dang dra byed la sogs pa ka ba brgyad dang / gdung bcu drug gis bres pa/ sna tshogs pa'i gzugs dang //
333a4(rnying rgyud): tshogs pa'i dbyibs dang / sna tshogs pa'i rgyan la sogs pas brgyan pa dang / nyid las mi gzhan pa'i 'khor sman lha'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dpal thogs pa med pa sman gyi lha rnams kyi rgyal po dang / gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa spa
333a5(rnying rgyud): kyi bla bai DUr+ya 'od kyi rgyal po dang / gzhan yang steng gi khyogs na sman gyi lha mo grags mo rgyal dang / 'og gi phyogs na sman gyi lha mo 'phel byed ma dang / shar phyogs na sman gyi lha mo grags dbyangs ma dang / lho phyogs na shing gi lha mo 'od 'chang ma
333a6(rnying rgyud): dang / nub phyogs nas dri'i lha mo e byin snying po ma dang / byang phyogs na rtsi'i lha mo grub pa'i blo gros ma la sogs pa'i sman dang / spyi dang dri dar shing dang nags tshal la sogs pa'i lha rnams dang / gzhan yang de rnams kyi dbang po dang / de bzhin
333a7(rnying rgyud): pu ye nas yin pa'i lha rnams de bzhin gshegs pa dpa la rnam par snang mdza' dang / rdo rje sems dpa' dang / chen 'bal dang / 'od kun tu snang ba dang / don yod grub pa rnams kyi yum dang 'khor dang / gzhan yang go'u rI la sogs pa'i
333b1(rnying rgyud): 'khor dang / gzhan yang seng gdong la sogs pa'i 'khor dang / gzhan yang spro bzhi'i gtso mo dbang phyug ma dang / gzhan yang lha dang drang srong dang / klu dang / bram ze dang / mi dang / mi'i dge bsnyen dang / gzhan yang tshangs pa nyes
333b2(rnying rgyud): 'dun na gnas la sogs pa'i 'khor mang pos yongs su bskor nas thabs cig tu zhugs so// de nas mchod pa'i lha mo rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces gsol to// nam mkha'i mthong nas 'od byung ba/
333b3(rnying rgyud): rje sprin mthong nyi shar 'dra// mun par sgron me btegs pa bzhin// 'gro ba yongs la snang bar mdzod// ces gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bdud rtsi'i gling zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dpal kun tu bzang po de zha
333b4(rnying rgyud): gsum phyag drug pa'i tshul dang ldan par bzhengs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po des/ phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad steng 'og tu bltas sam gzigs pas sems can nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis gdudru pa la gzigs /
333b5(rnying rgyud): la bcud kyi gling gi 'od zer dang 'od du bcas pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang bar 'phros so// 'thos pas sems can thams cad la bdud rtsi gling gi 'tsho ba'i sngun du gyur nas/ sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa las thar
333b6(rnying rgyud): nus/ bde 'di sa la gnas par gyur to// de nas ston pa kun tu bzang po des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nyon mongs sems can gso ba'i phyir// bzad kyi gling gi sman nyid kyis// grol lam bde ba'i sa thob nas// yang dag ye shes
333b7(rnying rgyud): thob par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// bdud rin po che ye shes gsang pa'i 'khor lo las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas yang ston pa dpal kun tu bzang po des 'di skad ces bka' stsa s+ho/ ci ltar 'du
334a1(rnying rgyud): gyur ba la// ba tha ba dang // dbazhinangs par dbyab na// zhes gsungs pas/ bcam ldan 'das rnarnams rgyas 'ad smra dus smras so// sa ma hA s+ya sa rna b+hA Aldan 'das/
334a2(rnying rgyud): mang ba dang rmongs pa la// dbye ba'i don ni rnam pa gsum// de bzhin yan lag rnam rgya 'tshal// zhes gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de yi don gying bye ba yang // skyon cig de bzhin rdo rje ches//
334a3(rnying rgyud): la ni gnyis yod de// de bzhin gnyis pa lnga rwa bshad// de bzhin gsum pa de bzhin gsum// zhes bka' stsal to// de nas rdo rje chos kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// yan lag don
334a4(rnying rgyud): de lags na// rgyas pa'i don ni gang gsungs pa// de yang de bzhin gshegs pas gsung // zhes gsol to// de nas yang bka' stsal pa/ dang po'i don ni gnyis yin te// gnyis pa'i dang po gang yin pa// de bzhin 'dres dang
334a5(rnying rgyud): ma 'dres gnyis// de bzhin gnyis pa drug po ni// de bzhin ye shes drug pa'o// gnyis pa lnga pa'i don bshad ni// lnga pa'i gnyis pa gang yin na// chos nyid dang ni ye shes so// de bzhin lnga pa'i gAsum pa ni// dang po dngos
334a6(rnying rgyud): gaN+DI rnam pa lnga// de bzhin gyi sman thams cad dang // de ltar mtshon po'ide bdud rtsi'o// de bzhin gsum pa'i gsum pa yang // mtshon pa dang ni mtshon byed dang // de bzhin mtshon par byed pa'o// bdud ci rin po che ye shes gsang ba
334a7(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo las/ bdud rtsi'i dbye ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang bdud rtsi nges pa'i tshig bka' stsal to// ci ltar bdud rtsir gyur pa la// nges dang rab tu nges pa dang // de bzhin yang dag nges pa'o// de ltar ngas
334b1(rnying rgyud): bdan bstan pa// kun gyis dang du thang ba bya// zhus pa yang dgas pa' lus 'das// bdud canas nang pa tha'o// ngam tha dag pa dang na pa yos// yang dag na 'ju nas// dang das da
334b2(rnying rgyud): babadud dang 'drab la// chos nyid 'den pa'i rtsabatang bas// brdad rtsinas ni la bya// kun rdo'i lha ma'i dpe brgyang la// ye shes chen po'i sa btang bas// badz+rad rtsa zhes ni de laH// phung de lda ni bdud ny-inate// rgyal ri
334b3(rnying rgyud): rje btang bas// bdud DI zhes nr-i de la bya// de bzhin mig la sogs pa yi// skye mched rnam sa ni 'dzor yin che// sems dpa' sems ma'i rgya btang bas// bdud rtsi nas ni ma \u0f7f// 'byung ba la ni bdud yin // de bzhin
334b4(rnying rgyud): ci btung bas// bdud mi nas ni la zla// gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams la// de bzhin dmog pa brda yinaH// dang 'dzin med pa kyi btang bas// 'adz+ra zhis ni de la \u0f7f// da kho ba'i bag zugs la// thug
334b5(rnying rgyud): chen po'i ci btang bas// bdud rtsi zhes ni de la d+ha// de kyilas ni mnyam gnas te// srin thams cad badrad yin pas/ nga yi Ti ni ta zhes kyi// de bzhin sa ni dri yin te// kr-i ni rnams cad ldan yon no// de bzhin tan chen bshad// na
334b6(rnying rgyud): tham pa rAg rgya min te// l+r-i ni thams cad 'bras yin no// de latan thabs su gsungs// an chos nyid yang dag kye// mr-in ya shes chen po'o// ta na yongs su dag pa'o// de bzhin rgya 'bras thams cad la// bdud rtsi gas ni yis
334b7(rnying rgyud): sa // 'a myi ba gre na// da 'du / bdud kyid spyod // des tugs sugs nas pa yan
335a1(rnying rgyud): bdud kyi ci ni bsam gtan yin// bdud kyi rtseni brtson 'grus yin// bdud kyurtsa ni tshul khrims yin// bdud kyi can stobs yanaH// bdud kyi rtse ni ye shas yin// dal badrad rtsi zhes bya'o// bdung baHna/
335a2(rnying rgyud): da pa yin// bdud kyi ci ni sems bskyed yin// bdud kyi rtsi ni tshad med yin// bdud kyi tshe ni bsdu ba yin// bdud kyi ci ni zin las yin// bdud kyi rtse ni dge ba yini// bdud kyi ci ni dkyil 'a khor yin// nga la sogs te mtha
335a3(rnying rgyud): yas mjog/ thams cad thams cad brdung po zhes// ngad nga yis bstan pa dang // gzhan dang gzhan gyis bstan pa dang // 'das dang mabyon thams cad dang // de bzhin rgyalasas kun gyis gsungs// zhes bka' bral to// @

337a1(rnying rgyud): la bkur bar bya// yon tan brgyad dang ldan pa yis// slob dpon chen po yin par grags// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang rdo rje chos kyis yang gsol pa// a ma ho sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/

338b3(rnying rgyud): gtan nas 'joms// ma spangs 'bras bu rin chen 'byung // so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyis// 'dod chags 'khor brtsad nas gcod// ma spang 'bras bu snang mtha' yas// bya ba nan tan ye shes kyis// nyon mongs phrag dog rtsad
338b4(rnying rgyud): nas gcod// ma spangs 'bras bu don yod grub// chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyis// gti mug 'khor brtsad nas gcod// ma spangs 'bras bu rnam snang mdzad// rang byung chen po'i ye shes kyis// rgyun gyi nyon mongs rtsad nas
338b5(rnying rgyud): gcod// ma spangs 'bras bu he ru ka/ ye shes dbu ni nyi shu gcig/ 'bar ba'i phyag ni bzhi bcu gnyis// brtan pa'i zhabs ni rnam pa brgyad// sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam pa bdun// de yis 'gro ba'i don la spyod// ces gsung
338b6(rnying rgyud): so// bdud rtsi rin po che ye shes gsang ba'i 'khor lo las/ bdud rtsi ji ltar yin pa dang de'i 'bras bu bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas yang bdud rtsi'i sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas
338b7(rnying rgyud): 'di gsungs so// nyon cig bdud rtsi rdo rje chos// bdud rtsi'i lus ni 'chang 'dod na// btag pa cag las ni zin pa dang // nang dang phyi yi dngos po kun// bdud rtsi'i lus kyi rang bzhin to// thams cad sbyar ba'i dbus nyid du//
339a1(rnying rgyud): sha gsum gyi phye ma gzhag/ de yi nang gi rnam pa la// skad dang mi mthun rnam pa ste// spyi mi mos ni thams cad gzhag/ de yi nang gi rnam pa la// cha bkasum nyid sbyar ba gzhag/ de yi nang gi rnam pa la//
339a2(rnying rgyud): grur bum la sogs rnam pa lnga// de yi nang gi rnam pa la// dA ti phal btab pa gzhag/ de yi nang du ga pur te// dr-i yi rgyal po dang nas dgye// 'od dang du ba dri dang sgra// phun sum tshogs pa 'byang bar 'gyur// zhes bya sangs so//
339a3(rnying rgyud): de nas yang 'di gsungs so// zhal bu ka pA la yi mtshan gsol ba// ye shes lnga ldan zhal bu ka pA la// 'bar ba'i sku yi bu ga gnyis dang ldan// mtha' gnyis mi 'dod phyir na dbus su gzhag/ sku gsum ldan grub rdo rje ka pA la/
339a4(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba'i skud pa tshangs pa'i dkyil na yod// lhag nas spyi tshur yongs 'dus brtol 'dra// zhe sdang ma spangs phyir na shar du dgod par bya// yid bzhin gter ltar rdo rje ka pA la// rin chen dbribs la dgos 'dod 'byung ba de// dang
339a5(rnying rgyud): bsam shing buM bu ga gnyis dang ldan// nga rgyal ma sbyad sa lho yi phyogs su gzhag/ khams gsum yongs sgrol rdo rje ka pA la// thams cad dbang du sdud pas dum bu gcig pa ste// dbyings dang ye shes tha dad dbyer med phyir//
339a6(rnying rgyud): 'dod chags ma spangs nub kyi phyogs su gzhag/ cho 'phrul rtags 'byin rdo rje ka pA la// las bzhi mthar ru phyin pas b+han+ta sul bzhi pa// drag po'i las la shis pas rgya gram bzhin du 'dug/ phrag dog ma spangs byung gi phyogs su gzhag
339a7(rnying rgyud): ye shes lnga dang ldan pas phyogs bzhi dbus dang lnga// bde bar gshegs pa rigs lnga'i pho brang yin par grags// de ru mI sa gshang gci khu ba khrag/ skyobs dang rtsa bar sbyar te gzhag par bya// de nas yang b+han+d+ha'i stobs 'di gsungs so//
339b1(rnying rgyud): mi 'gyur g.yung rdung rdo rje ka stsa la// mchod rten dbyibs su 'dug pa bkra shis sgo mang ste// mtshan dang ldan pas b+han+ta ye shes stobs// mi shigs mdzod ldan rdo rje ka pA la// rtsal gsum rdzogs pa yang gi 'thod pa ste// thams cad ma
339b2(rnying rgyud): lus zil gyis gnon pa ste// stobs ldan ye shes shar lho mtsham su gzhag/ srid pa yongs sgrol rdo rje ka pA la// srin po da sha b+hI ba tul glang po che// dmag dpung khar 'gyed khyu mchog rin po che// stobs ldan ye shes sto nub
339b3(rnying rgyud): mtshams su gzhag/ dug gsum gtan sdug rdo rje ka pA la// lha chen ma hA de ba bskal ba'i thod pa ste// 'jig rten nang na che btsan bkra shis rtags// ye shes chen po nub byang mtshams su gzhag/ mtshan ma smos bral rdo rje ka pA la/
339b4(rnying rgyud): mi chen lang ka'i gzugs kyi phung po ste// li tsitsa ku re'i thod pa dngos grub rdzas// gtum chen ye shes byang shar mtshams su gzhag/ gzhan yang de bzhin gru chad la// sgrub pa po yi bkra shis rdzas// yongs su rdzogs ldan rdo rje ka pA la//
339b5(rnying rgyud): lug phran 'phel byed ye shes gsang ba'i rdzas// shar gyi klu la de bzhin gzhag par bya// bkra shis mtshan ldan rdo rje ka pA lA// ga pur gangs zhun dkar po 'joms pa yis// dmigs su ma gyi ris su bzhon pa yi// ye shes gas
339b6(rnying rgyud): ba'i thod pa lho yi gru// mi 'gyur sram khreg rdo rje ka pA la// ma dma'am shi lcag phran sdong po 'dra// de ni b+har+b+ha yang dag bkra shis te// ye shes gsang ba'i thod pa nub kyi bu// A yuHdpal ldan rdo rje ka pA la// mkhas pa mang po'i ga
339b7(rnying rgyud): ma byas pa yi// dbang bskur dbang dang ldan pa thod pa de// ye shes gsang ba'i tshad pa byang gi gru// gzhan yang ye shes thod pa bzhi// sgo bzhi dag tu gzhag par bya// zhes gsungs so// bdud rtsi rin po che ye shes gsang ba
340a1(rnying rgyud): lo las/ bdud kyi 'byung ba'i rgyal sogs pa dang / b+har+g+ha'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i lan ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das thams cad dbang gi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa pa/
340a2(rnying rgyud): rdo rje chos kyis 'di skad ces gsol ba btab po// kye kye sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// rnam pa dang ni dad pa dang // dang ba dang ni dam tshig gis// ma smin pa la sbyin par mdzod// ma grol ba la grol bar mdzod// dbugs me dbyin pa
340a3(rnying rgyud): dbugs babyin mdzod// dbang dang ldan ni gsang sngags mchog/ ces gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dus la bab na rdo rje chos// dbang dang ldan pa'i dam tshig gis// nus pa mthu dang ldan mar
340a4(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad sgo rim gnyis// dbus kyi 'khor lo'i gdan steng du// ye shes gsang ba'i stan bting nas// nub kyi dkyil 'khor lnga pa la// dbus su pad+ma 'dab brgyad bri// slob ma dbu dang go rim gyis// de
340a5(rnying rgyud): nyid dag tu snyam pa gzhag/ de nas maN+Dal dbus su ni// rdo rje slob dpon rnal 'byor gyis// pho brang bang du thogs nas kyang // chub phyogs dag tu kha bltas te// gzhug dang me tog dor ba dang // bstan pa dang ni gsol ba gdab// de
340a6(rnying rgyud): phan dang nus pa'i dbang// ci ltar 'tshams pa bzhin du bskur// slob mas ci ltar gsol ba ni// byang chub rdo rjes sangs rgyas la// ci ltar mchod chen bgyis pa ltar// bdag kyang rab tu bskal ba'i phyir// nam mkha'i rdo rje bdag
340a7(rnying rgyud): lagrol// zhes gsol ba btab po// de nas rdo rje slob de pan gyis// dbang dang bsgrub par bya ba ni// skal ldan rnal 'gyor rigs kyi za// sems dpa' chen po 'byed pa'i phyir// da lta nyid nas sems bskyed nas// bu khyod dgal
340b1(rnying rgyud): 'acol dgang / zhus pang // yang rnams gsol pa// bdag nis/ la ldan pa ldan la// rab dpas dag la bdag dga' sa// bla ma dbyang chub zabathung phyir// skal ba bzang la bdag dgas// nas pas matan 'du /
340b2(rnying rgyud): yang // dung khrod gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor 'dir// gsang mchog rdzas kyi me tog dor nas kyang // sra gsung thugs kyi dngos grub rab 'byams rnams// skal ldan rnal 'byor bdag la phul du gsol// pra tI
340b3(rnying rgyud): b+h+rUM gis dor bgyi// dge slong khrims dang ldan pa yi// gsang bar bsngags pa'i dog pa la// kha tshar ma nyams ras dgu gi// yol bas bcad pa dgye bar bya// de yang pra be sha phaT/ mig dbye ba'i sngags yin no// snyan pa'i
340b4(rnying rgyud): dbyangs 'di blang pa yis// me tog lha ru bcas pa rnams// slob ma'i spyi bor gzhag par bya'o// dur khrod gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor 'dir// byang chub rdo rje'i lam la drangs nas kyang // phra gsung thugs kyi dngos grub rab
340b5(rnying rgyud): 'byams rnams// skal ldan rnal 'byor khyed la sbyin par bya// chos kyi phyag rgya snying la gnas bya zhing // skye nas snying gar chu ba'i rgyun bzhin 'bab// gsang ba'i ma ga~M rnarje pa gsum du bor// de nas phan dang nus pa dbang rnams rnapa
340b6(rnying rgyud): pa la gdams pa gtad// pho brang pang du blangs la slob ma'i spyi bor gzhag/ gnyis su med pa bum pa'i dbang yang bskur bar bya// sems bskyed mang ba sngon du 'gro bar bya// dbyangs tshig don dang ldan pa na bar baphrag/ gdad nas
340b7(rnying rgyud): ma skyes rnam dag chos kyi dbyings// dge dang ma dag mi rtog dngo la gnas// dus gsum gcig tu phyi bshol med// dngos grub sna tshogs rlabs chen par ma chad// su 'dod sbyin gyis da lta nga las long // bskal par bsgribs dang
341a1(rnying rgyud): gti mug mun pa la// sprin mtho nyi shar khud par dro ba bzhin// bdud rtsi'i rgyal po'i dbang chen 'di byin pas// rig 'dzin rgyal po'i gtso bo'i go 'phang 'thob// tshe dang bskang dang yid du 'ong // bgags
341a2(rnying rgyud): rnams zhi ba la sogs te// nad dang bral nas ci 'dod pa// yon tan rtsa brgyad 'dis 'thob po// de nas bdud rtsi bum pa'i dbang // spyi bo la sogs thig le lnga// sku lnga ye shes 'phro 'dra'i don// rgya steng du yang gzhag par bya// 'phrong
341a3(rnying rgyud): pas gzhal yas khang du 'gyur// nang du dpa' bo 'bru lnga las// phyag mtshan lnga dang sku lngar 'gyur// 'phro 'du las kyi sbyor ba las// mu tig dkar po dri med bzhin// bum pa'i nang du gang bar bsam// 'od 'phros rgyal
341a4(rnying rgyud): ba'i thugs dam bskul// ye shes chu rgyun gnyis med bstim// dbyangs tshig blang ba 'di lta ste// hoHyi ge phyag mtshan 'phro 'du las// yab yub bcu yi sku ru gsal// gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba las// byang chub sems kyi
341a5(rnying rgyud): char chen pob// bum pa mgo yi thog tu gi zhag/ oM Ar+g+haM/ bud+d+ha ma hA shrI he ru ka bud+ha kro d+hi shwa rI a b+hi Shi ny+tsatAM/ badz+ra shrI he ru ka badz+ra kro d+hI shwa rI a b+hi Shiny+tsa guM/ rat+na shrI he ru ka rat+na krod+hI shwa rI a b+hi ShiSh+ThaswA/ pad+ma shrI he ru ka pad+ma kro d+hI shwa rI a d+hi
341a6(rnying rgyud): AM/ kA ma shrI he ru ka kArma kro trI shwa rI aSh+NI ShiHha/ bdu N+DI bum pa'i dbade bskur bas// phung po lnga yaM dri ma dag/ slob dpo nA ga nang ba bsgrag byar bya// oM AHhU~M sarba pa~M l+ya sa m+me tab+hud+d+ha bi ro tsan a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M hrIH/ oM AHhUM sarba
341a7(rnying rgyud): ma mr-i ta a mai d+h+ye kha~M hrI a g+ni Ta hU~M dz+dza we/ oM AHhUMsarba ba s+yas mr-i ta aN+Do Sh+ya a b+hiShi hU~M hrI tha/ oM AHb+h+yas rbab ma mr-i raSh+Tasa~M b+hA we oM t+ma hU~M hrIH/ oM A b+h+yasarbab s+ya sa mr-i ta a mo b+ha ba d+hi ma Sh+T+r-I \u0f7fhU~M hrIH/ de ster byeg rgyas rgyas bteb nas/
341b1(rnying rgyud): ts+tsha nad tan byas pang // denas bla nga sbrang ga dang // mu sbyang gsum du theg labya// 'od rlung blo bu skor ba pas// zang chub sams kyi gzhal pas khang // hU~Mng ga shA ng+gA gas la byung bya// dran macung gra gsum las// du
341b2(rnying rgyud): sa ga dag sa
341b3(rnying rgyud): chub sems kyi 'od zer gyis// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rjer dzim// a~M na maHsarba ta thA ga ta kA la badz+ra swa bA wa At+ma ko&haM/ oM na maHparba ta thA ga ta wA ka badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ti tsat+ta badz+ra swab+hA wI Ar+tha ko/
341b4(rnying rgyud): ga sa na
341b5(rnying rgyud): cad dbang bskur ro// oM ma hA shuN+yed+d+ha d+han badz+ra sar+b+ba thA AH/ I mA hA A dan+ta dz+nyAn badz+ra swad+d+ha wa AHko&ha~M/ A ma hA t+ya bak+Shan dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA wa AH ko&taM/ I ma ta pA ba tAd+hI n+ta badz+ra swa b+ha wa yA (\u0f7f/ I mahA
341b6(rnying rgyud): d+han badz+ra sa b+hA wa At+ma kaH/ de nas rdo rje slob dang na gyis// ye shes lnga yi gnang du bslag/ de na cicad pan gyib rgyang dang dra// A sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA lA~M pA radz+nyA Sh+Ta b+ha wa A ts+tsha/ sarba te thA ga ta re hwe wIka badz+ra swaSh+Ta wi I
341b7(rnying rgyud): rnam sa gag ta ma bangs ga pa yi dbang ba// dal na sa mtshan rjem gyung// der pa gas pa rgya/ da yod// / thams pa 'dzin par ra/
342a1(rnying rgyud): /
342a2(rnying rgyud): drA // das seM po pa zhugs / med byang chub sems su / rten dgas mi chag spyan drangs/ zlab kyis sna thugs par bsam/ ba dpa dab sa// dag

342a4(rnying rgyud): rgyalas klu pa so// mi gas sems dpa'i spyan drang bzlugs// de la gnang ba bsgrag par / danam ldan las dbang ba sgru hU~M/ lug phyi'i kyil srog \u0f7f// del thos sa nga /

342a7(rnying rgyud): kyimags sa// khyo mang byang chub sems sun+de// tho du las kyi spa ba las// 'du rdzogs mchog spyan drangs nas// skyes stong drugazhag par bya// de las gnang bsgrag par du// jig \u0f7f/
342b1(rnying rgyud): 'byos pas gzhal yas khang // dpa' bo 'bu lnga 'asbyor ba las// phyag mtshan las nas so'i sgra// rgyal ba rigs lnga'i ye shes te// chos nyid gnyis su med par sbyor// byang chub sems kyu 'od zer las// rgyal ba yab yum stan da
342b2(rnying rgyud): spyi bor bstim// de la gnang ba bsgrag par bya// de nas gsang ba'i dbang bskur te// byang chub sems kyi dbang yin pas// rig ma'i mtshan nyid brtag pa dang // brtul zhugs can gyis rdo rje'i dbang // rdo rje la ni rdo rje dbang // shes rab
342b3(rnying rgyud): yo shes dbang mchog ni// phyag rgya mo la gnas bcas nas// lo brang gzungs mar byin gyis brlab// yang na dngos po kho na la// de la gnang ba bsgrag par bya// dpa' bong dang 'dra ba yis// dbang gi rtags dang btags par bya//
342b4(rnying rgyud): la yod 'bul slob ma ni// shes rab dang ni snying rje dang // dad pa dang ni brtson 'grus dang // sbyin pa dang ni bsam gtan dang // gces pa dang ni yid 'thad dang // shin tu snying nye yon gyi mchog/ 'di brgyad yon gyi mchog yin no// 'dud
342b5(rnying rgyud): rin po che ye shes gsang ba'i 'khor lo las/ dbang dang yon tan bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// / de nas yang bdud rtsi'i phrad dang stob bstan par bya ste/ rdzogs pa gsum gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas bzhengs so//
342b6(rnying rgyud): rdo rje chos kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal cig/ ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ e ma tsa chos la ngo mtshar che// rdzogs pa'i chos la
342b7(rnying rgyud): ngomatshar che// skyeb med las ngo mtshar che// skyes pa nyid na ngo mtshar che// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang rdo rje chos kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// dzas las sangs rgyas ngo mtshar che// bcom ldan 'das
343a1(rnying rgyud): rnas pa gang rgyan mas// banam ldan 'das kyis bklu ma pa// sa shA zhugs// gnas sangs rgyas nga pa paH// dngas snangs na nas can
343a2(rnying rgyud): 'dis da ces gsungs s+ho// rgya chog ldan pa bras b+ha// ma shes sangs rgyas y-i ga d-iH/ bdud kyi lngal zang du'o// bam pa pa'i rgyam napa mig/ denamamatsham ldan das kyis 'di na ces gsungs so// ma rda ri ma sags
343a3(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f// kaprar n+dan dri la sogs// man dur brid rtsi mi mchog/ bdu kyi lnga li stobs yin pas// gsang ba mchog gis bsag par bya// gzhan yang zlum zin ldum mo nas// ci rigs rdzas rnams thams cad bsag/ tsa
343a4(rnying rgyud): gsungs s+ho// bad kyi rin po che le shes gsang ba'i mamang molas/ bdud rtsi'i phrang dang spobs bstan pa sa mtha k+ta brgyab // rnanas yang don dam pa'i 'dzang rtsi bstan par / de 'dzin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
343a5(rnying rgyud): zhes pa'i ting nge 'dzin la byams par grags nas/ don gyi blta ba 'di rdo chos kyis zhus pa/ sakyi sangs kyis bcom ldan 'das// sangs rgyas zhes ni gang yin pa// bad+mag cag rnams la bstun dugaso la// zhes zhus pa dang /
343a6(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das sa ka' stsal pa// tshangs du drang srong ma stegs dang // nyan thos dgra patsam rang rgyal dang // klu dang tham zas gtsang mas// de dan rten pa btsun pa'i tsho// bdud rtsil dang zha lnga dang // gzhan ya
343a7(rnying rgyud): bcad pa ye ngas// mi gtsang ba la gtsang bar bzlog/ de dag gtsang mar bzlog pa ni// chos kyi sku yi don rtogs na// de dag thams cad gtsang ma tha// badz+rad rtsizhes ni da laH// bdud rtsi zhes ni bye ba yang // snang ba med na bdud rtsi /
343b1(rnying rgyud): TIka k+shi tugs na bdud rtsayan// mnyam par mthang na bdud rtsi yin// mthung ba ma na badrad rtsa yin// banam du mdun bdud rtsi yin// thog las 'das na bdud pa yig// dmigs pa thams cad 'dud rtsa yan// dug lnga thams cad
343b2(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi yin// phung po khams dang skye mched rnams// bdud rtsi'i dngos po yang dag go// chos nyid la yang chos nyid med// de bas chos nyid bdud rtsi yin// sems nyid la yang sems nyid med// de bas sems nyid bdud rtsi yin//
343b3(rnying rgyud): ye shes la yang ye shes med// de bas ye shes bdud rtsi yin// skye ba med las skye ba med// skyes pa nyid na skye ba med// de bas skye med bdud rtsi yin// 'gag pa nyid na 'gag pa med// 'gag pa med na bdud rtsi yin// 'ong ba med
343b4(rnying rgyud): dang 'gro med pa// bdud rtsi de las gzhan med pas// tha snyad 'dogs na bdud ci min// de bas dngos po dngos med na// smos pa'i mtha' dang bral ba ste// bdud rtsi zhes ni de la bya// de la tshangs dang drang srong sogs// de la bla dang
343b5(rnying rgyud): bram ze ltos// de la nyan thos rang rgyal ltos// de la rtag chad mAr thug ltos// zhes gsungs so// bdud kyi rin po che ye shes gsang ba'i 'khor lo las/ don dam pa'i bdud rtsi bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / danas
343b6(rnying rgyud): yang bdud rtsi rin po che ye shes gsang ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i ting nge'i rin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'di gsungs so// yang dag par gsungs so// rgyang bla dang ni ring bu dang // lde gra dang na khrol bu dang // rtse ma dang ni go zla dang /
343b7(rnying rgyud): sman dzin rtsil dang // nyim dang ni tha ba dang // de bzhin rjeng ba lhag zan dang // sa ma skyes pa bdud rtsel// san tu bar ma byin rlabs kyis// 'byung ba bzhin bdud ci she// lab grem mkha' na bdud rtsi'i lam// gas lan
344a1(rnying rgyud): skad// mAM sa bshang gis khrag zag/ dag pa'i rgya sde bdud rtsi'i gso// la la naN bo gcig las sgrub// la la ga tso po gnyis las grub// la la gaHba gsum las sgrub// la lagaca po bzhi las thug
344a2(rnying rgyud): lal ga bo lnga las grub// la la bskal pa gcig gis 'grub// las bskal ga gnyis kyis 'byug/ lal bskal lags ma gyis 'thag// la la bskal pa bzhi la rdzogs// la la thang gcig yad kyis 'brab// la la nyi zhag
344a3(rnying rgyud): gis 'brab// la la zla ba bdun gyis 'grub// la la lo dgu dag gis 'grub// lnga la tshe lo gcig gis 'grub// la la lus dang sbyar bas 'grub// la la ngag dang sbyor bas 'grub// la la sems dang sbyar bas 'grub// la la
344a4(rnying rgyud): kun tshogs sgo nas 'grub// ces gsungs so// bdud rtsi rin po che ye shes gsang ba'i 'khor lo las/ bsgrub pa'i rim pa dus dang bcas pa bstan pa'i ledra ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang gsang ba'i rim pa bstan par
344a5(rnying rgyud): a mr-i tA rA ga pa ti sa mA ya s+t+waM/ sa ma ya hUM/ sa ma ya su kha d+hIH/ bdud rtsi pad+ma'i las kyi sngags so// oM AHhUM/ badz+ra satwA hUM sarba oM ho shud d+he/ a mr-i ta srA kha ma hA yo gan+d+haM/ tsit+ta d+h+waM/ oM AH/ ak+Sho b+ha dwe Sha ra ti sa ma ya s+t+waM/ dzarje
344a6(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi'i sngags so// oM At+ma/ bai ro tsan mo ha ra ti sa ma ya s+t+waM/ ma hA yo ga a d+hi ba ta na/ ba liM ta a mr-i ta~M u ts+tshat+ta a d+hi tiSh+Tha s+t+waM/ oM// bdud rtsi 'khor lo'i sngags so// oM AHt+ma ma hA sa ma ya ma hA a mr-i ta/ dza ho ha rat+na ra ti sa ma pa
344b1(rnying rgyud): nA/ 'on can bad kya' thugs su// oM A nus tha bamam mata/ rAsA lan tun nga la/ klu da sdug gsang ba'i sngags thams cad / ma ba a mnyan sa/ rgyal bathams cad bya 'jugs na/ mas
344b2(rnying rgyud): sha swA hA/ dza gad thams cad spyi'i byin gyis rlobs pa'i sngags so// oM kro d+hI shwa rI sho d+ha ya/ 'o ma sems can thams cad kyi skyobs kyi sngags so// oM AHhUM sArba par+Na a mr-i ta rad+hIHta tsit+ta trUM hrIH/ gser la sogs pa spang bsngag
344b3(rnying rgyud): AM tai nab+h+yAM au te na hUM/ tet+te d+h+waM/ bi d+h+wa na kro nI shwa rI sa ma ya d+h+waM/ gon nan la sbrel ba'i sngags so// au dza b+ha swA hA/ chang gi sngags lhag ma dang bcaswa pa'o// au kro d+hA shwa rI sho d+ha ya/ mA ma kaM mA stang ba'i sngags so// AM sarba
344b4(rnying rgyud): ta badz+ra tsit+ta sa ma yaM hUM/ rdo rje sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po'o// au a mr-i ta ha na hA na/ mkha' dbyings rnam par dag pa'i sngags so// AM a m+l-i ta shur+d+he sho d+ha ya tsa ka lan b+han+ta b+hat+ta/ rtog pa ngan pa btsag pa'i sngags so// su
344b5(rnying rgyud): mA sa la/ kun klod pa'i sngags so// AM a mr-i ta san ma hA yo ka hUM/ A~M badz+ra sa ma ya tAM/ AM ma hA sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta ma hA su kha hrIH/ sarba e ho shud+d+he AM kro d+hI shI rI sarba sho d+hA ya/ oM AHd+h+waM dza amr-i ta h+yaM d+hIH/ zhi ba smai'i sngags
344b6(rnying rgyud): oM AHhU~M badz+ra a mr-i ta hU~M hrIH/ kye ma khro bos lhang ba'i sngags so// oM AHhUM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta kun Da li hUM hrIHtha/ ye shes mkha' la bskyil ba'i sngags so// oM AHhU~M me pa be sha ya pheM pheM hUM hrIHtha/ mu tig dkar po d+ha ma med pa
344b7(rnying rgyud): gang gA klung gi chu bo bzhin du 'babs so// zhes sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // yang gsang thugs las byung ngo // bsnyen pa'i rtags ni byung ba dang // sgrub pa po yis dngos grub blang // oM ma hA shrI he ru ka a ho su kha d+harma kA
345a1(rnying rgyud): swam+ma ta sa d+hi hU~M ny+dzaH// de nas dngos grub blang bar bya// de yis gnyis med don dam mthong // cha yi rag 'angan thos ci dgapa// sra gsung thugs su bdag thong bas// sra gsang thugs kyi dngos dud
345a2(rnying rgyud): das sa na sa
345a3(rnying rgyud): sang pa smras / gas / pa rnams ma da
345a4(rnying rgyud): nasu byi ma ma snang bas/ badrangs rnasus 'tshogs pa // nas khri mas / na pananas cing ba sa nga dan sa sto ga / ba
345a5(rnying rgyud): sa sa na sa
345b1(rnying rgyud): steng du bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga// so so'i rigs dang mthun par gzhag/ de la bshad pa'i chog bya// de nas maN+Dal sbyang rdul bya// ma rbad khog pa kha gyes la// gzhal las khang du byin gyis brlab// TIg rnams legs par btab pa dang /
345b2(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi khyams dang ldan// de bzhin sgo dang lcags re la// lnga rnams legs par tshad dang ldan// shar du tshogs pa'i dkyil 'khor te// me long lta bu'i ye shes yin// gasdu pa'i dkyil 'khor la// mnyam pa nyid kyi ye
345b3(rnying rgyud): shes yin// nub tu sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor te// so sor rtog pa'i ye shes yin// byang du sgrol ba'i dkyil 'khor te// bya ba nan tan ye shes yin// de ltar dbus dang ye shes lnga// zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor mngon sangs rgyas// dbus nas
345b4(rnying rgyud): brtsam ste lha rnams kyi// snying po phyag rgya gang yang rung // dbus su rin chen khri btsug ste// sman gyi pho brang srung ste bzhag/ rgyal po la sogs mdun mdun du// sman mi rig 'dzin bskur ba'i phyir// bzed phor re dang aN+Da re//
345b5(rnying rgyud): bzhin phyogs bzhir bkram par bya// mchod pa dus drug de bzhin bya// phyi nang snod bcud rnam par dag/ shU n+ya tA yi sngags brjod las// yang dag sa la des byin te// de bzhin nyid kyi ting 'dzin gsal// de nas byas par mi shes pas/
345b6(rnying rgyud): tshad med bzhi yis mngon phyung ste// kun la khyab par snang bas na// kun tu snang ba'i ting 'dzin gsal// de las rgyu yi sa bon te// shin tu dkar zhing 'od 'phros pas// de las bskyed pa'i a dkar po// de las thams cad bskyed pa'i phyir
345b7(rnying rgyud): rgyu yi sa bon nges par 'byung // 'byung ba lnga dang gzhal yas khang // rim pa bzhin du de las 'byung // nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par// rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin te// rgyal ba thams cad bskyed pa'o// zhes gsungs so//
346a1(rnying rgyud): nam na ldan ma stan pa da pa / sa/ pa la dgas dus/
346a2(rnying rgyud): par gsungs so// sku gsung thugs dzA ni las byung ngo // hU~M badz+rA d+h+waM// mr-id+hAt+ti shwA ni/ IM dzi ni ka/ mAM ng+ge Sha n+ti/ sA rat+na d+h+r-ika/ mAM mot+ta rati/ AM A ro li ka/ pA rA ga ra t+ti/ ha pran+d+ha dz+r-ika/ traM badz+ra ra ti/ glai tsi rA dA pa/ dz+ha l+yA s+t+waM sa ma ya s+t+waM/
346a3(rnying rgyud): la gnapa/ tham ma sum la to// bat+sA bdam rbeg// smon ti gnas la na/ pa wi kA/ hU~Mnas thA la swAH/ praSh+Ta a hr-I shA la/ sa narna lasas/ de bsreg de/
346a4(rnying rgyud): oM cag ya swAhA \u0f7f/ 'adz+rag s+t+wa~M// a sa pa so/ sa na sa ni/ oM mAn snyam/ oMman gris/ mA swA~M/ oM mr-inab+h+yaswAH/ oM mra na le skye/ rgyal mA t+ta Ta/ oM
346a5(rnying rgyud): badz+ra ta ra ma hA kro tI shwa rI dI li ni hU~M phaT/ b+ha~M bi b+ha nAn ta dza tra phaT/ oM rat+na d+ha ra ma hA kro trA~M shA rI dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ oM pad+mAn+ta kr-ita phaT/ oM ma hA bad+mA d+hA ra ma hA kro N+Di shwa rI dz+wa la ni hU~M phaT/ hU~M pr-i tAn+ta kr-i ta phaT/ A~M karma d+ha rA ma hA kr-i tI shwa rI dz+wa le ni hU~M phaT/ da
346a6(rnying rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyi rig pa'o// de nas yang phyug mtshan bag // de dgra rnams kyi phyog rgyani// 'debs pa'i phyir na phyag d+hA \u0f7f// rgyal 'bras bus rgyas 'dabs pas// de kho na nyid las sku bskyed do// phyag
346a7(rnying rgyud): las ni sgra chags la// ded pyir rdo rdo dril bu dang // 'awadza mdapa ni dril bra dang // rin po che dang dril bu dang // padz+ra dang ni dril tha dang // ral gri dang ni dril bu dang // gzhan yang rin pa ze dang mya gre dang // ma yang ral gri phreng ba
346b1(rnying rgyud): dang dru dag/ chugang rnam sa dang dang/ gar kyalagasacas kyi 'tha pa maN+Da ga dang/ ngan sa tshal mam dang / mar ma ut+pal dun 'ag/ dadang dag thams cad na babyung ba'i zug cag/ gshes pananyam par gnan na
346b2(rnying rgyud): ni/ pi wang go cha gseg par dang // po ti sgrom bu me chu nr-i mgo gdengs pa'o// lcags kyu rdo rje zhags pa dang // thod sbrul lcags sgrog rdo rje rgya gram dang // dril bur gyur pa de rnams so// zhes gsungs so// bdud rtsi rin po che ye
346b3(rnying rgyud): shes gsang ba'i 'khor lo las/ rig pa dang rig ma'i rgyu bstan pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// / de nas rdo rje dpung rnam par bzlog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te khro bo'i dkyil 'khor 'di rig pa dang bca
346b4(rnying rgyud): nas/ mngon pa'i ting nge 'dzin du 'du mdzad pa 'di ched du 'arjod do// a yi phyag rgya hU~M du gsal// hUM las thugs las rdo rje 'bar// de las tshe mchog phyag rgyar gsal// oM badz+ra ma hA shrI he ru ka ra dz+wa la hUM/ de yang dbu nyi shu rtsa gcig
346b5(rnying rgyud): phyag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis gsal ba'o// de nas yang 'di gsungs so// de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings las ni// khro mo dbang phyug mngon phyung ba// gro tI shA rI ga nam zhal ma// gsang ba'i yu ma yang yab dang mthun// oM badz+ra ma hA hU~M he ru ka/
346b6(rnying rgyud): dbu dgu phyag kyang bco brgyad ste// dang po rdo rje dril bu bsdams// lhag ma brgyad gnyis de bzhin bsnams// de nas yang 'di gsungs so// hU~M las rdo rje pa las badz+ra/ sa ma ya ho// sa ma ya tAM/ ra ha~M ha~M/ rA ga yA ma/ oM
346b7(rnying rgyud): taSh+T+rA ga ti ana? rAg Na badz+ra swa b+hA wa~M At+ma kau rgyu/ A sarbata thA ga tu blang badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma t+ye/ mchod pa'i sngags sbyor ba'i tshig go// de las gsal ba'i byang chub sems// yang dag par na byang chub sems// byang chub sems las
347a1(rnying rgyud): ye shes gsal// de las d+hu d+hA hUM sems kyis Ta// oM badz+ra kro ta bi da ya d+h+waM/ hA na han hUM baT/ oM badz+ra kro ti nI la dan+thak+taM/ da ha da ha hUM paT+Ta/ oM badz+ra kro ta ya mAn+ta ka Sh+kaM/ pa rbab tsa d+hu phaT+Ta/ oM badz+ra
347a2(rnying rgyud): ta Ar+ya a tsa la hUM/ b+han+ta b+han+ta hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro ta ta ya kI wa d+h+waM/ hu wa hu lu hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro tA a pa ri dzi ta hU/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro tA b+h+r-i kA ra hUM/ ge rdzi gardza hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra kro ta ma hA ba la trA~M/ s+phoT k+Sho T+Ta hU~M phaT/ ta kr-i ta chen po brgyad
347a3(rnying rgyud): du gsal lo// de nas yang 'di dag thugs las phyung ngo // oM bud+d+ha shrI he ru ka hUM phaT/ oM rat+na shi he ru ka hUM phaT/ oM parba shrI he ru ka hUM phaT/ oM karma shrI he ru ka hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra shrI he ru ka hU~M phaT/ gyol song gi gtso bo brgyad mnan pa'o// sra
347a4(rnying rgyud): ye shes gsal ba las// ta kr-i te brgyad dang rigs kyi gtso// kun kyang zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// de stang rigs bzhi he ru ka/ dpal ni khrag 'thung chen po dang // rin po che pad+ma dang // las su gyur te khro rgyal bzhi// dbu gsum phyag
347a5(rnying rgyud): drug zhabs bzhir mnan// de steng badz+ra he ru ka/ dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi yis// rigs bzhi khrag 'thung dbu rnams mnan// de steng khro mo gnam zhal ma// dbu dgu phyag kyang bco brkyang ste// zhabs brgyad rdo rje khrag 'thung
347a6(rnying rgyud): ma sa dus smras sagasas pa la sa smras/ sum // dungs nga gso sas// dadas khye du

347b1(rnying rgyud): rim pa sna la thub cu drug pa d+hA// de nas yang dran thabs ma nor ba 'di lta zla gsangs so// ma shes nga 'dun shes bya ba la snrums par bzhugs nas/ dad pa dang nang ma ma gags// rlung gnadas
347b2(rnying rgyud): gshegs // sngon ma mag can 'apas// da grang la ba rgyas gshenas sogs so// med 'dud 'i dkyil 'tsha nas// dpal 'byu// nid ga hUM dang tsud /

348b5(rnying rgyud): sdug dang bsngal ba dang // skye ba dang ni rga ba dang // bar ma do yi sems can dbyung // gzu bo chen po gzu mdzod la// 'tsho byed sman pas sman gyis gsos/ zhes gsol pas/ de la bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po de thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas bzhengs
348b6(rnying rgyud): yongs su gsungs pa/ skyen na 'chi'i sdug bsngal la// gzu bor srul 'dzi chos// sman par sprul pa rdo rje chos// legs par zhus pa lan gyi mchog/ nga yi yid las byung ba 'di// nyon cig nyon cig rdo chos// sdug bsngal dag gi mtshan nyid ni//
348b7(rnying rgyud): ci ltang rna bar chu song ba// chu gzhan dag gis 'byin byed pa// ci ltar chu yis tshig pa la// chu gzhan dag gis bgrang bar bya// ci ltar chu yis 'khyags pa la// chu gzhan dag gis bgrang bar bya// ji ltar rgya yis za ba la// chu gzhan dag gis
349a1(rnying rgyud): dbyung bar bya// ci ltar me yis tshig pa la// me gzhan dag gis bsro bar bya// ci ltar me yis gdungs pa la// me gzhan dag gis dbyung bar bya// me yis me btang me yis bskam// me la me btang ma
349a2(rnying rgyud): yis bsreg/ ces gsungs so// de nas yang 'di gsungs so// nad pa dag la na ba gces// tsha ba dag la tsha ba gces// skom pa dag la skom pa gces// bkres pa dag la bkres pa gces// sdug pa dag la bsngal ba gces// bsngal/
349a3(rnying rgyud): bdag la sdug pa gces// skye ba dag la rgas pa gces/ rgas pa dag la skye ba gces// dpe ni rgyal po me bzhin no// de nas yang 'di gsungs so// stag mo sdig pa'i sbyor ba yis// a g+ni las rnams the tshom med// rnal 'byor mched//
349a4(rnying rgyud): pa gang dag gis// shi ba'i rol de byas na// ba slang dag gi rgyal khams bsreg/ dper na stag mo'i me bzhin no// de nas yang 'di gsungs so// mdor na chos rnams thams cad ni// byis pa'i rtsed mo ci bzhin te// zag cha dag la byis pa/

349a6(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// rnal 'byor thams cad sdom pa las// chos sku gcig la tha dad pa// sa dang lam gyi rim pa yi// nye ring 'tsho mtha'i gru bzhin no// dper na dngul chu'i gser tshol 'dra// de nas yang 'di gsungs so// lus dang ngag dang sre
349a7(rnying rgyud): dang gsum// mdud khyim bzhin du yongs su bstan// gcig 'gyel gnyis 'gyel gcig mi grong // lus ngag yid gsum 'dam bu 'dra// dpe ni slob dpon slob ma bzhin// gcig gis sdig byas mnyam por bsreg/ de nas yang 'di
349b1(rnying rgyud): gsungs sa// lta ba spyod pa dam tshig gsum// gcig la gcig brten yongs kyis tshad// gcig ma tshang bar gcig mi tshad// gcig gis gcig la ma brten na// dmangs dang rje dang rgyal po 'dra// dper na gsar gling rgyal khams dra/
349b2(rnying rgyud): de nas yang 'di gsungs so// sman dang dri dang rtsi dang gsum// gcig gis gcig sbyar bdud rtsi ste// gcig la gcig brten sman gyi mchog/ 'dus nas sman du rab sbyar na// rtsi yi mchog ni dar ya kan// dpe ni kha che'i grwar bum 'dra/
349b3(rnying rgyud): zhes gsungs so// bdud rtsi rin po che ye shes gsang ba'i 'khor lo las/ khams gsum gyi sems can skye ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal bsal ba'i thabs bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// / de nas yang brtag pa'i byal
349b4(rnying rgyud): ma 'di yongs su bshad do// de nas yang dbang bskur dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'di yongs su yang dag par gsungs so// sman gyi lha mo nor gyi rgyan// dri yi lha mo dri chab ma// rtsi yi lha mo grub pa mo// shing
349b5(rnying rgyud): lha mo 'od 'chang ma// lha mo khyod la stsal ba ni// byis pa lo brgyad gtsang ma yis// shar phyogs dag la kha bltas te// go zu dkar po gon nas ni// dar dkar dag gis sham thabs bya// lus dang ngag gis bkras nas ni// lha phyag phog
349b6(rnying rgyud): gsum btsal nas ni// sman drang rtsi dang dri gsum btsal// rdo rje chos kyis yang zhus pa// ston pa bcom ldan mgon po dag/ spyan dang rtsi yi lha mo dang // shing dang nags kyi lha mo la// bud+d+ha ya yis phyag btsal nas// bdud rtsi dngos ni
349b7(rnying rgyud): gangs cwo// bdud bya'i las ni gang ma // bdud rtsi dbye ba gang la brtse// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsong// lha ma rnams kyis bstan du gsol// zhes nam ma ta// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bla du /
350a1(rnying rgyud): yi lha mo dang // shing dang nags kyi lha mo dang // bstan pa dang ni ston pa dang // rang dang gzhan gyi skye bo dang // da lta nga dang nga yis la// zhu ba dag la gnang bar bya// nyan pa dag la snyan par smra//
350a2(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' dag la bsam gtan sbyin// gtong ba dag la sbyin pa bslab// las rnams kun gyi sngon rol du// sems bskyed pa ni bstan pa'i mchog/ nga dang nga yis bstan pa la// khyod kyis zhus pa nga yis bshad// bshad pa
350a3(rnying rgyud): yang dag chos kyi mchog/ bdud rtsi dngos ni chos nyid lags// bdud rtsi'i las ni phrin las lags// bdud rtsi'i don ni skye shi med// bdud rtsi'i dbye ba bden pa gnyis// sems bskyed sems can don la sems// gzhan don byed
350a4(rnying rgyud): dang rnam gnyis so// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang rdo rje chos kyis zhus pa// e ma bdud rtsi'i mgon po khyod// legs mthong gang yin 'dir phyag yin// mchod pa gang yin dga' ba yin// bdud rtsi'i nges don bshad du gsol// zhes
350a5(rnying rgyud): gus pa las// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba// nyon cig nyon cig rdo rje chos// / gsang bsngags kyi dam pa ste// sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid nges pa'i don// spros pa'i mtha' rgya nges pa'i don// lhangs kyis rtogs pa nges pa'i don// bas
350a6(rnying rgyud): dra med pa nges pa'i don// bsgom du med pa nges pa'i don// brjod las 'das pa nges pa'i don// tshig las 'das pa nges pa'i don// snang ba med pa nges pa'i don// bcos su med pa nges pa'i don// thig le chen po nges pa'i don// dbyings
350a7(rnying rgyud): kyi dbyings nyid nges pa'i don// mthong ba med pa nges pa'i don// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang rdo rje chos kyis zhus pa// e ma ho bcom ldan mgon po dpal// rten gyi sangs rgyas bstan pa dang // lung gi sangs rgyas bstan pa dang //
350b1(rnying rgyud): sems kyi sangs rgyas bstan pa dang // rang bzhin sangs rgyas bstan du gsol// zhes gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rten gyi sangs rgyas 'byung ba che// lung gi sangs rgyas bden pa'i mchog/ sems rgya
350b2(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas nam mkha' che// rang bzhin sangs rgyas yongs la khyab// ces bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje chos kyis yang zhus pa/ kye kye sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// rten gyi sangs rgyas rdzogs pa'i mchog/
350b3(rnying rgyud): rgya ba rlung dang gnas pa rtsa// de bzhin 'babs pa byang chub sems// de la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// gang lags ci lags bstan du gsol// zhes gsol to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems
350b4(rnying rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' rdo rje chos// 'byung ba lnga la brten pa'i lus// bdud rtsi lnga yi dngas ma ni// rtsa ba rlung nyid yin par bshad// brtan par byed pas bdud rtsi'o// de nyid sdod kyi dngas ma yin// dge 'phel ma dang rnam rten dang //
350b5(rnying rgyud): rnam rtog dang ni yongs 'dus so// de yi 'bras bu bstan pa ni// ga pur mu tig shel lta bu// de la ma tshang gcig kyang med// bdud rtsi zhes kyang de la bya// gzhan yang bdud rtsi gang yin pa// sems nyid rnam par dag pa la// bdud
350b6(rnying rgyud): rtsi zhes ni de la bya// bdud rtsi rnyed nas bdud rtsi 'tshol// bdud rtsi gzhan du mtshol cig/ ces gsungs so// bdud rtsi rin po che ye shes gsang ba'i 'khor lo las/ bdud rtsi nges pa'i lung bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//
350b7(rnying rgyud): nas yang bdud rtsi ldang thang gi rim pa bstan pa la/ bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ shin tu mnal ba la/ yang rdo rje chos kyis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdud rtsi zhes bya ba'i don
351a1(rnying rgyud): 'di la ldang ba'i thabs du nam mchis// bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la sogs pa'i rtog pa bsal drags ma// gzhan la phan 'dzags pa'i don bshad du gsol/ nyid kyi dngos po mkhyen pa'i ye shes
351a2(rnying rgyud): dam pa bskyed pa'i phyir// lung stsal du gsol zhes zhug pa la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lung stsal pa/ rdo rje chos yang dang yang dag sa na/ bdud rtsi ni rnam pa gsum ste/ sangs rgyas bdud rtsi dang / chos bdud rtsi dang / dge 'dun bdu
351a3(rnying rgyud): dang rnam pa gsum mo// de gsum gyi mtshan nyid bstan pa ni// ldang thang zhes 'das pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad dang / da ltar dang bcas pa'i bstan pa dang / dam pa'i skye ba rnams dang / ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas che ge mo la sogs pas
351a4(rnying rgyud): kyang bdud rtsi ni rnam pa gsum las ma gsungs so// zhes gsungs so// de nas rdo rje chos kyis bcom ldan 'das la yang dag par 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ci'i phyir na ldang thang yin gang las btags nas ldang
351a5(rnying rgyud): yin/ sra la dgos nas ldang ba yin/ 'bras bu ji ltar smin pas ldang zhes gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje chos khyod legs so legs mi legs par yid la zlang zhig/ rgyud dang 'bras bu thabs dang rnam
351a6(rnying rgyud): pa gsum dang 'brel pas ldang ba'o// gdags pa'i chu ni rnam pa drug/ tshangs dang drang srong klu rnams dang // nyan thos dgra bcom rang rgyal dang // tham mu stegs mur thug ma// dgongs pa'i dgongs pa bstan pa yin// 'bras rba
351a7(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas rin pa che// dgos 'dod rab 'byung ba'i bya// yang dag par na chos kyi sra// de las sangs rgyas gzhan med pas// gzhan las sangs kyis 'dod pa ni// tshig la brten nas drang ba'i don// ming dang mtshan du grags
351b1(rnying rgyud): 'dun dang gangadadra thags pa dang // ga dang yog grags pag+sa/ dab na rgyal ba brnyanam 'gyu/ chos kyi sbrul sam gtags pa// sangs rgyas 'dags pa gas sa nag nas/ u dang byags nags cag//
351b2(rnying rgyud): de yi nyid ma de mi 'gyur// zhes gsungs ma// de nas yang ni chos kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces yang dag pa ga mamat+te/ mkhyen pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// brgyad len 'drad ci bsgrub 'arjodan// gdun
351b3(rnying rgyud): de lta phra zhig btsal// rten nI gang lta bu la brtsi// bcom ldan 'das yang dag par bka' stsol dang zhes gsol to// de nas yang gsang ba'i mdzod kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems dpa' chen po yang dag par nyan par gyis shig/ rgyas rigs
351b4(rnying rgyud): de ni bum pa'i rigs// gdol pa mo yang dang du\u0f88\u0f90ng+ga// bai r+b+ha gnyis bcoMmra ny+dzi grwa gnyis// sam rtsag ga man chad du// legs par brtag byas/ thas b+hA sa? y+YA// dzi \u0f7f kun gyis thug par bya// dkyi la bar khrags sa'i bzhis/
351b5(rnying rgyud): 'ad rtsi ma sa legs thug// le tshe lo thig btab // babang rigs dang matsun du// ga bzhin du y-i kyis na// sman la sa pa'i steng ba// phyag rgyangs ni stong ba dan / gau rab
351b6(rnying rgyud): gleng bzhin d+ha tham pa nino // legs par bdud cir gyur ba dang // tha ma'i lag la gzhag par bya// dkon mchog gsam b+hi ma na brjod pa// dkyil 'bar thams cad kyis par bsam/ nyid du la byor byin parlabs pa//
351b7(rnying rgyud): cing gis ma nas// bdag kyang ngan par bab // / de las zla ba 'bal bar 'gyur// mdzin na sbyor bar babyas te// 'khrig pa rje gtun gyis pa// / thab 'bal bag/ // tel byam pabus sum /
352a1(rnying rgyud): ni dang po'i sbyor ba'o// de nas yang dag bsam gtan bya// gang yang rung ba'i zas zos la// gang yang rung ba'i bsam gtan bya// de ltar yin la byas pas ni// lha dang mnyam pa'i tshe ru 'gyur// de ni bgyed pa'i rim pa ste// rdzogs pa'i rim pa 'dod pa lA
352a2(rnying rgyud): gas kyi rim pa lta bur gsungs// bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor rnam mang yang // byang chub sems kyi dung khang na// ga pur dkar po'i rgyun 'bab pa// dbang gi rim pas byin brlabs pa// bro mo dag gi mkha' la dbab// de yang dang po dga' di'i gnas// mu tig dkar ma ni gyi
352a3(rnying rgyud): rgyan// pa yi zag pa tsam zhig dbub// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i bdud rtsi yis// chos kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba// chos dang mthun par 'khor lo ste// byang chub sems kyi bsti ma gnas pa// sprul pa'i 'khor lo dga' ba'i gnas// bdud rtsi'i khang pa yang dag ste// da
352a4(rnying rgyud): ba dang po dga' ba yin// de nas gnyis pa dga' ba yis// ngal bso ba yi dga' ba ste// gsum pa bram pa'i dga' ba po// bzhi pa byang chub dga' ba ste// bral ma thag gi bdud rtsi'o// bdud rtsi zhes su bshad pa'ang // tshul la mthabs kyis gzhag par bya// de la bdud rtsi
352a5(rnying rgyud): lnga tshang bas// bdud kyi lan gyi bdud rtsi'o// lus kyi bde ba nyams myang bas// sems kyi bde 'thob par 'gyur// de ltar bde ba nyams myong nas// rnam par dben pa gsum la gnas// dben pa gsum gyis thob na// dbugs ni thig le nyid la gnas// sems kyis sems la
352a6(rnying rgyud): bltas pas na// tig le 'od las 'gro drug gsal// a ni pre du lhag mar bcas// yang dag par nas la'o// zhes gsungs so// bdud rtsinyin po che ye shes gsang ba'i 'khor lo las/ bskyed rdzogs gnyis zung du bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer gcig pa'o// // de nas yang
352a7(rnying rgyud): dgugs 'byin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas nyidi gsungs so// sangs rgyas sems can mnyam pa'i phyir// sku gcig pa la tha dang med// de yang sems can rnams kyi dbugs// phung po lnga ni sangs rgyas lnga// de yang sems can rnams kyi dbugs// 'byung sa
352b1(rnying rgyud): lnga nyid rigs kyi yum// de yang sems can rnams kyi dbugs// rnam par shes pa sems dpa'i tshogs// de yang sems can rnams kyi dbugs// dam rdzas rnam lnga spangs rgyas lnga// de yang sems can rnams kyi dbugs// shA lnga sangs rgyas lnga la gdan//
352b2(rnying rgyud): yang sems can rang bzhin yin// de yang sems can rnams kyi dbugs// snod kyi 'jig rten gzhal mas te// sems can thams cad sangs rgyas pas// de yang sems can rnam kyi dbugs// zhes gsungs so// de la rdo chos kyis 'di skad byas te/ ston pa
352b3(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das// thugs rje che lathabs mkhas pas// rdzogs dang rdzogs pa chen po yi// don thabs ma nor bka' stsal pa// bdag cag rnams ni ngo mtshar che// e ma 'ongo mtshar sman gyi chos// de ni rang bzhin rdzogs pa ste// thabs kyi rdzogs pa bka' stsal
352b4(rnying rgyud): 'tshal// zhes yongs su zhus so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po gnas lung stobs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ thabs kyi rdzogs pa 'di bka' stsal to// mkhyen pa thabs kyi rdzogs pa ni// rtsa dang 'khor lo
352b5(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems// pags pa'i mtha' na mi gnas te// gnas pa rnams kyi drag lnga'i rgya// phyi rol di la mi brtan te// bdud rtsi rnam lnga gnas bral// g.yas dang g.yon dang dbus kyi rtsa// de la sogs pa'i rtsa rnams kun// bdud rtsi lnga yis gang bar gnas/
352b6(rnying rgyud): de yi rten byed rlung lnga ste// yi ge phyed pa nyid dang drug/ de yis bdud rtsi 'phel bar byed// mAM sa bshang gci khru ba khrag/ dag par gyur te bdud rtsi lnga// ye nas bder gshegs lnga yi dang // bdud rtsi zhes ni de la bya// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang bsgrub pa rnams
352b7(rnying rgyud): bstan par bya ste/ de yang gang dag ga rnams ston pa la// des kyang sha rnams bstan par bya// gang dag gser rnams ston pa la// des kyang gser rnams bstan par bya// gang dag rdzas rnams ston pa la// des kyang rdzas rnams bstan par bya// rgya mchog lnga yi rna ba dang /
353a1(rnying rgyud): la sogs pa rnam lnga la// rin chen sna lnga tshang bya'i phyir// 'bras bu lnga la rtsa ba lnga// rtsa ba lngal rin chen lnga// de bsgrub 'grub pas ci bsam 'grub// ces gsungs pas/ rdzas kyi rnam pa 'bras bu lnga// bskal ba'i spyi la sogs pa lnga//
353a2(rnying rgyud): rin po che rnam pa lngar sgrub pa gsungs so// de nas yang ro rjes su bsgrub pa gsungs te/ maN+Dal 'dom gad gru bzhi la// bdud rtsi sman gyis chag chag gdab// byang chub sems kyi thig le bya// phrin las rnam bzhi'i phur pa la// byin brlab dbang bskur
353a3(rnying rgyud): na
353a4(rnying rgyud): bar b+ha// bdag gi tshe dang bsod nams dang // rnal 'byor gzhan gyi bsosad nams la// de la btab pas rgyas par bya// dgra bsnyegs gang yin mi mun pa// gdabapas thams cad ba du 'dra// rims nad thams cad gcad pa dang // babregs rnams thams ca dag ma
353a5(rnying rgyud): ba'i phyir// zhi ba'i phur bas zhi bar bya// hUM sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs// gti mug bde gshegs 'khor dang bcas// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams na// shin tu rmongs pa'i sems can rnams// zhi ba chen po'i thugs rje yis// zhi bar ma gyur gang yang med// zhi
353a6(rnying rgyud): mdzad lha la phyag 'tshal lo// shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ b+h+rUM sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs// nga rgyal rin chen 'khor bcas rnams// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams na// dregs pa'i sems can ma lus kun// tshe dbang dngos grub rgyas mdzad pa'i// rgyas par ma gyur gang yang
353a7(rnying rgyud): med// rgyas mdzad lha la phyag 'tshal lo// praSh+TiM ku ru swA hA/ hUM sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs// 'dod chags pad+ma 'khor bcas rnams// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams na// shin tu chags pa'i sems can rnams// yud tsam gyis ni dbang bsdus nas// dbang du/
353b1(rnying rgyud): ma gyur gang yang med// dbang mdzad lha la phyag 'tshal lo// bshang ku ru swA hA/ hUM sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs// zhe sdang rdo rje 'khor dang bcas// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams na// shin tu gdug pa'i sems can rnams// yud tsam gyis ni pad+ma sa btub nas/
353b2(rnying rgyud): dum brlag gang yang med// brlag mdzad lha la phyag 'tshal lo// sum b+hU ni sra ma b+ha hUM/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/ gr-i h+NA ba ya gr-i h+NA ba ya hU~M/ A na ya ho/ b+ha ga wAn/ bed+yA rA dza/ nA sha ya staM b+ha ya/ ya ma da ma sristaM b+ha ya hUM phaT/ ces rdzas kyis bslab pa'o// bdud ky-i r-i
353b3(rnying rgyud): ye shes gsang ba'i 'khor lo las/ dbugs dbyung ba dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa dang / ro bsgrub par bstan pa'i le'u skye nyer gnyis pa'o// // de nas yang stan pa kun tu bzang po des/ 'khor dang yongs kyi rnal 'byor pa la gdams pa dang / gtad pa 'di yongs su gsungs pa
353b4(rnying rgyud): 'khor thams cad la yang bzhad pa'i tshul kyis bltas nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// ngas bstan pa'i gnang ba'i bdud rtsi 'di/ bcud kyi gdeng rnam pa gsum gyis/ sems can thams cad la lus rnam par dben pa dang / ngag rnam par dben pa dang / sams rnam par dben pa dang / yang dag
353b5(rnying rgyud): mtha' la sku dang ye shes 'byung bar byos shig/ 'di la ma mos gang dag la/ brag phug kha byad du bltas pa bzhin du/ thugs rje chen po 'di 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// 'di la mi mos pa gang la la dag la/ bdud rtsi'i bum pa yang mgo la reg pa'i gnas med do// 'di la mi mos pa gang dag la/ gsang
353b6(rnying rgyud): ba'i don 'di dag tshig tsam yang zos par mi 'gyur ro// 'di la mi mos pa gang dag la bstan pa gang dag la gnas pa'i don rnal 'byor dang rjes su rnal 'byor dang / shin tu rnal 'byor gyi don gang yang thos par mi 'gyur ro// 'di la mi mos pa gang dag la tshe rabs gang du yang than su
353b7(rnying rgyud): gyi chos kyang thos par mi 'gyur/ yid la yang mi byed/ mtha' 'khob rgyal po ngan pa'i rgyal khams kyi blon po'i tshul can du skye'o// 'di la nyan pa dang / ston pa dang / yid la byed pa dang / 'bri ba dang / 'chang ba dang / snyan par smra ba dang / nges pa'i don du byed pa dang /
354a1(rnying rgyud): byed pa dang / bkur stir byed pa/ don gtan la phab pa rnams ni/ sangs rgyas mdzod pa yang yin/ chos gsang pa'i rnal 'byor mthong ba yang yin/ theg pa chen po'i dge 'dun dang / phreng ba dang / khams dang skye mched dang / lha dang lha mo'i dpe 'khor ma
354a2(rnying rgyud): la byed pa mthong ba yin no// gzhan yang sa dang lam la mkhas pa yang / 'di kho na'i yon tan yin no// 'di yid la byed pa rnams ni/ sangs rgyas yid la byed pa'o// chos yid la byed pa'o// dge 'dun yid la byed pa'o// de ltar yid la byed pa gsang ba dang / gsang chen dang ye
354a3(rnying rgyud): snying po'i don nyams su blangs nas/ tshe 'di nyid la sa dang / bden pa'i lam mthong / gnyis su med pa'i sa thob/ ma phyin pa'i ye shes dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang ngas bstan pa'i chos phun sum tshogs pa 'di/ sems can yongs la smin par gyis shig
354a4(rnying rgyud): 'dis dbang bskur bar gyis shig/ 'dis dbugs 'byin par gyis shig/ 'dis ma dad pa rnams dad par gyis shig/ 'di khyed rnams la yongs su gtad do// bcang ba dang / bstan pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / bri ba dang / bklag pa dang / blta ba rnams legs par chos
354a5(rnying rgyud): shig/ dang ni mya ngan 'das 'og tu// lho phyogs bye ta'i yul shed du// byams ldan mgon po klu zhes 'byung // de las bstan pa dam pa gzung // bdud rtsi brgyad kyi gdeng rnam pa gsum las/ bas po khro ba'i nang nas stong pa'i rgyud rin po che gsang ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya
354a6(rnying rgyud): ba/ rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i phyogs gsang chen thig le'i rgyud gtad nas ston pa nyid mi snang bar gyur to// 'khor rnams kyis kyang pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// bdud rtsi rin po che gsang ba 'khar lo'i
354a7(rnying rgyud): rgyud rdzogs so// / rgya gar mkhas pa bi ma la mr-i dra dang / zhus chen gyi lo tsA dang dz+nyA nas gtan la phab pa'o// phyis skab dpal brtsegs la sogs pas yongs su gtan la phab pa'o//
